name: Amazing Duplex Apartment
summary: Magnificent charming 6 1/2 apartment in a beautiful classical Montreal duplex, which is located on rue Bullion in the heart of Plateau in proximity to Montreal downtown area.
description: Magnificent charming 6 1/2 apartment in a beautiful classical Montreal duplex, which is located on rue Bullion in the heart of Plateau in proximity to Montreal downtown area.  I can answer questions regarding activities and restaurants in the neighborhood if needed Plateau Mont-Royal is the best neighbourhood in town, you are close to everything. The Mont-Royal metro station is 6 minutes away by foot, you can also catch a bus on St Laurent which is 3 minutes away
neighborhood_overview: Plateau Mont-Royal is the best neighbourhood in town, you are close to everything.
transit: The Mont-Royal metro station is 6 minutes away by foot, you can also catch a bus on St Laurent which is 3 minutes away
interaction: I can answer questions regarding activities and restaurants in the neighborhood if needed

host.host_about: I am from France, I love sports, cultures, languages, traveling, food and learning about anything!

reviews.comments: We didn't get to meet Nico, but his roommates were very nice! It was easy to pick up the keys, and when leaving we just left the key in the house on our way out. The place was clean, and the bed was awesome! We got to control the heat in our own room which was really nice, since it was freezing outside! We ended up taking a lot of Uber rides, but we did take the Metro once, and it was convenient to get to. About a 5 minutes walk.

Thank you so much Nicolas. You are such a great host. Your place was well located, super super super clean and the bed was incredible.

I recommand this place for sure !
Nico and his house mates were very hospitable! The room was great and very clean. The house was in a prefect location. All round great experience!

Well, I didn't meet Nico, but his roommate Moran was very kind, nice and handsome! lol The room and bed was clean. well located. and there is a free bike rental shop near the station which is just 7min walk from this place.

Stayed here in my first few days of moving to Montreal. The apartment was very well located and the room was perfectly clean; the bed was extremely comfortable and just what I needed to nurse jet lag. Nico's housemate, Morgan was around to answer my questions and was helpful. Morgan's mom who was visiting, was also sweet, and so very pleasant to be around. 

I didn't meet Nico until I returned two weeks later to pick up my two large suitcases, which Nico and his housemates have kindly allowed me to store in the apartment. While I needed only the basics: good sleep, hot water for coffee, hot shower, central location -- from my quick chat with Nico, I get the sense that he's the kind of host I would like to have when in a new city. He genuinely cared about his guests, and had time in his day to have a quick chat.
highly recommend it, great location and great host
Nico's place was perfect for my brief stay in Montreal! His roommate was helpful, and the apartment is in the middle of a neighborhood with many cool shops, places to eat, and nightlife destinations.
Great host and extremely attentive and quick to respond to any questions and concerns. Great location as well!

Nico's place is perfect for a Montreal getaway. The bed is REALLY comfortable. Very clean place and perfectly located right close to restaurants, bars and lots of places. The good thing is that it is close but not so close to bother at night when trying to sleep. Nico was an excellent host and provided us with all we needed. He received us even when we arrived late at night and gave us a tour of the house. Highly recommended.
Good place if you are looking for stay night time at Montreal. Good location. Close to most of restaurant and mont royal. Transportation for bus or subway is pretty close
Très bon hôte, très gentil et serviable, très bon emplacement et surtout très propre, très bon séjour, je recommande fortement!

name: Musical Porto
summary: Excelente apartamento novo, com um fantástico terraço de 31 m2 e uma vista fabulosa para a Casa da Música e área circundante, com o mar na linha do horizonte, virada a poente (lindíssimo pôr-do-sol).
space: Edifício novo, com ótimos acabamentos, situado numa zona muito agradável e tranquila. Acomoda 4 pessoas muito comodamente.
description: Excelente apartamento novo, com um fantástico terraço de 31 m2 e uma vista fabulosa para a Casa da Música e área circundante, com o mar na linha do horizonte, virada a poente (lindíssimo pôr-do-sol). Edifício novo, com ótimos acabamentos, situado numa zona muito agradável e tranquila. Acomoda 4 pessoas muito comodamente. O apartamento dispõe de Internet WiFi e parque privado para uma viatura. Situa-se a 500 metros da Casa da Música onde poderá assistir a excelentes espetáculos. Muito fácil acesso a cafés, supermercados e outros estabelecimentos comerciais, nomeadamente o Mercado do Bom Sucesso. Situa-se a a 5 minutos a pé das estações de metro da Casa da Música e Carolina Michaelis. Do Aeroporto, através da linha E do metro, sair na estação Casa da Música (tempo de viagem - 22 minutos). Daqui, seguir a pé em direção à Rua Dom António Barroso. Seguir pela direita e logo a seguir, na Rua Oliveira Monteiro, virar à esquerda. Mais 70 metros e chegou ao apartamento. Encontra paragem de auto
neighborhood_overview: Situa-se a 500 metros da Casa da Música onde poderá assistir a excelentes espetáculos. Muito fácil acesso a cafés, supermercados e outros estabelecimentos comerciais, nomeadamente o Mercado do Bom Sucesso.
notes: Casa da Música com excelentes espetáculos durante todo o ano ( (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Centro histórico do Porto classificado como Património Cultural da Humanidade - inúmeros monumentos com destaque para a Torre dos Clérigos e Ponte de Dom Luiz. Caves do Vinho do Porto ( (Website hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Situa-se a a 5 minutos a pé das estações de metro da Casa da Música e Carolina Michaelis. Do Aeroporto, através da linha E do metro, sair na estação Casa da Música (tempo de viagem - 22 minutos). Daqui, seguir a pé em direção à Rua Dom António Barroso. Seguir pela direita e logo a seguir, na Rua Oliveira Monteiro, virar à esquerda. Mais 70 metros e chegou ao apartamento. Encontra paragem de autocarro à porta do edifício.
access: O apartamento dispõe de Internet WiFi e parque privado para uma viatura.
house_rules: Não são permitidos animais de estimação

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Super accueil de Sandra, que dire de son appartement si ce n'est que c'est le top, équipements complets et de qualité, place de parking sous terrain, très propre, tout est prévu pour s'y sentir toute de suite bien. Et nous remercions encore Sandra pour toutes ses petites attentions. 
Nous pratiquons les locations entre particuliers depuis plus d'une dizaine d'années et nous avons rarement été aussi bien accueilli.

Bien que nous soyons un peu en retard ( nous avions averti mais quand). Elle nous attendait à la porte. Nous a donné plein d'infos sur la ville. Nous a fait faire un tour détaillé de l'appartement. Elle s'est montrée disponible pour la rejoindre en tout temps. Très très gentille Sandra et sa petite famille

Un appartement très agréable dans un quartier idéal proche des commodités: magasins, métro. Proche du centre historique , même à pied.
Un accueil fort chaleureux que nous n'oublierons pas, avec tous les petits détails qui font apprécier le séjour.
Une adresse que nous gardons!

The apartment is just like the pictures show it. The huge balcony is perfect for a little sunbath. Everything is very very clean and well equipped. 
Sandra's father in law checked us in and out and was very nice and helpful as he also showed us a lot of spots one has to visit in Porto on a map. He even had some croissants and pastries waiting for us when we arrived which was a nice and welcome surprise. 
The apartment is close enough to the city center to walk (about 15 min) but located on a rather quite street. 
We totally recommend and would love to come back!

Great location and great service! Sandra is a wonderful host. When I return to Porto I look forward to staying here. Check in and check out were super smooth. When we arrived we had Porto wine waiting and some fruits and a traditional Portuguese pastry! The view from the balcony is gorgeous. We had breakfast on the terrace every day. Great for 4 people as the terrace can be your living room when weather is nice. Can’t say enough nice things.

We had an excellent stay at Sandra's apartment. The apartment looks exactly as it does in the photos, and was spotlessly clean. It is very spacious, with lots of towels, strong wifi, good air conditioning, and a well equipped kitchen.  We loved watching the sunset from the big terrace! The apartment is located in a great area with lots of restaurants/cafes/bakeries/stores, and we travelled very quickly (and cheaply) into the city center by taxi. Sandra is an excellent host - very quick at communication, there was fresh fruit and pastris waiting for us upon our arrival, and the check in and check out process was very smooth.  The private parking spot was also a huge plus. Would highly recommend!

name: Best location in Leblon - 1 bedroom
summary: - 1 bedroom loft, 40 sq. mt - Prime location in Leblon, close to the best bars and restaurants in Rio, 2 blocks from Leblon beach! - Air conditioner, ceiling fan - Tv, cable, wi-fi, desk  - Full kitchen with appliances, including washing machine
space: - 1 bedroom 40mt2  loft studio - 2 beds, 1 Queen Size, 1 cozy couch  - Air conditioning  ceiling fan, cable Tv, wi-fi, - Full kitchen with appliances including washing machine.  - 2 blocks from Leblon beach - Very ventilated, kitchen and bathroom fully renovated
description: - 1 bedroom loft, 40 sq. mt - Prime location in Leblon, close to the best bars and restaurants in Rio, 2 blocks from Leblon beach! - Air conditioner, ceiling fan - Tv, cable, wi-fi, desk  - Full kitchen with appliances, including washing machine - 1 bedroom 40mt2  loft studio - 2 beds, 1 Queen Size, 1 cozy couch  - Air conditioning  ceiling fan, cable Tv, wi-fi, - Full kitchen with appliances including washing machine.  - 2 blocks from Leblon beach - Very ventilated, kitchen and bathroom fully renovated  - Doorman from 9am to 6pm, elevator building  - The apt is so cozy that you will want to stay in and rest, but so close from the action and the beach that you will probably not stay in at all! - I may be available to receive the guests at arrival, reachable by phone in case you need anything, tips of Rio and such. - Priviledged location in Rio in the heart of the best neighborhood of Rio, Leblon  - 2 blocks from the beach  - Walking distance from the best bars and restaurants of Rio.
neighborhood_overview: - Priviledged location in Rio in the heart of the best neighborhood of Rio, Leblon  - 2 blocks from the beach  - Walking distance from the best bars and restaurants of Rio.  - Anything you may need within a block of distance, 24 hour bakery, café, pizzeria, bar, pharmacy, supermarket  - Lively neighborhood, but the apt faces the back of the building so super silent.  - Safe, friendly and residential neighborhood
notes: Fits 2 people only, no extra guests allowed.
transit: - Walking distance from the best bars and restaurants of Rio.  -  Taxi stand on the corner, close to bus stops including subway integration.
access: - Doorman from 9am to 6pm, elevator building  - The apt is so cozy that you will want to stay in and rest, but so close from the action and the beach that you will probably not stay in at all!
interaction: - I may be available to receive the guests at arrival, reachable by phone in case you need anything, tips of Rio and such.
house_rules: - Photo ID required via email prior to arrival -  For non-smokers only - No pets, - No minors under 18 unless accompanied by guardian - No loud noise or parties allowed - No subletting to other parties

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: “Happiness comes of the capacity to feel deeply, to enjoy simply, to think freely, to risk life, to be needed.”  Storm Jameson

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: It was a very good experience. The apartment was just like she said in the anounncement and she gave us a lot of tips abput rio.
El apartamento es muy lindo y en una zona muy buena. Renata es una excelente anfitriona. Sin dudas volveré a tenerlo en cuenta para la proxima visita a rio de janeiro.

Nuestra estadía en Rio fue hermosa. Renata y su amiga Monica fueron muy amables con nosotros y nos facilitaron toda la información necesaria. El departamento es lindo, cómodo, muy bien equipado y esta ubicado un un barrio divino. Todo salió muy bien. Es muy recomendable!

Increible!!! El depto es perfecto, ubicación deseada y Renata una genia, todo la predisposición y amabilidad en nuestra estadía.
Nuestra casa en Rio!

Renata's place is a bright and cozy flat in a cool area of Rio. Whatever you need to enjoy the city is next door: beaches, trendy shops& restaurants, taxi, high frequency buses to Copacabana and Downtown. Renata is a lovely and smiling host. I really appreciated her flexibility for my late check-out. Great experience!

Renata's apartment is wonderful! Super comfortable and and very stylish. It's quite obvious she has put a great deal of effort into the design and furnishing. As nice as the photos appear, its even nicer in person. The location is ideal. In the heart of Leblon (the most upscale neighborhood in Rio), within minutes walking to the best bars, restaurants and of course the beach. Renata could not be more helpful and is always available to answer questions. As a former resident of Rio and a regular Airbnb user, I highly recommend Renata's apartment.
Excellent experience.  The place is newly renovated, bright and clean.  The best location in Rio.  Renata is alway available on (Hidden by Airbnb) and responds quickly.  I will definitely be back.

Excellent location - very close to Leblon beach, a good supermarket one block away, many places to eat within a walking distance. The apartment is not very big but nice for 1-2 people and very cosy. Renata was very friendly and nice - early check-in was very handy, as well as late check-out :) Highly recommended!

Adoramos el departamento de Renata. El lugar es tal como se ve en las fotos publicadas en la página. La ambientación es hermosa, todo muy limpio y bien equipado. La ubicación es perfecta, el departamento está a sólo dos cuadras del mar, rodeado de los mejores bares de Leblon, frente a un mercado que atiende las 24 hs. Sin dudas sería el lugar adonde volvería en mi próxima visita a Río. Gracias!

Renata's apartment was great. Very comfortable, clean and well  decorated. Newly renovated bathroom as well. Perfect for one person or couple. 

Fantastic location, two blocks from the beach, great delicatessen across the street, access to several banks (both local and international) within a block, and just a few blocks from all the great restaurants on Rua dias ferreira. 

Don't hesitate, just book!

Excelente el departamento, muy bien ambientado y equipado. La ubicación es perfecta, a dos cuadras de la playa y cerca de supermercado, bares, restaurantes, casas de cambio y todo lo que normalmente se necesita para tener una excelente estadia. 

Renata fue una excelente anfitriona, disponible frente a cualquier inquietud y recomendación.
Renato was always very nice and helpful. She kept in touch from the time of our booking until arrival. Location is perfect! Just few steps away from the beach. We highly recommend this place.

This is a lovely apartment, and Renate was a great host!  The apartment is only a few blocks from the beach in a very pleasant and open part of Leblon.  It's stylish and modern and looks exactly like the photos posted on airbnb, which in my experience is uncommon.  The kitchen was well supplied, and the washing machine worked fine.   Best of all, the internet connection was quite stable.  Renate went out of her way to help us, including printing out for us some tickets to visit the Christ statue.  She is a very friendly and generous person.  The apartment is an excellent value, and I am definitely planning to come back.   I hope that this very positive review doesn't make it hard to book Renata's apartment in the future!

Renatas Place was our home in Rio. It's very cosy and close to anything you deserve. We enjoyed our stay very much and would like to come back. Renata is a great host and gave us tipps and Support in multiple situations. Every Email was answered directly. So, Go there: it's Great!
The host canceled this reservation 366 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Renata was a great host who helped us on our first night and recommended excelent places to go in Rio. The apartment is tidy and well equipped. The neighborhood is safe and most importantly, in an excellent location. Highly recommended.

Thank you Airbnb - i found accommodation AND made a friend for life. Renata is so knowledgeable about Rio, and about so many other things, she can send you to those precious secret eateries, and off the beaten track hidden gems you just need to ask. She is bilingual in English which is consequential for those of you who have no time to learn Portuguese. Her flat is so intelligently done, so functional, perfectly equipped and pretty in what is the best part of Leblon which itself is the best part of Rio every thing is 2mn walk away and a supermarket is right in front. I hope she will not raise prices like she should haha. It is really the best find in its category in Rio pure and simple so consider yourself lucky if you catch it !

Pasamos unos días increíbles en Rio. Es nuestra segunda vez en el departamento, que es hermoso, bien equipado y muy bien ubicado. Renata super amable , como siempre atenta a nuestras necesidades. 
Nuestra casa en Rio! 
Lo recomendamos!

Amazingly cute apartment in the best location. Perfect size for a single occupancy or a couple, open plan and has everything that you need for a nice holiday stay. Very secure, has a porter in the building  during the day as well and so super close to the beach. It looked very pretty in the pictures and it was even better when I arrived. Modern and vintage chic combo! Beautifully decorated. It even has a cute mini bar! 
Renata was a joy to deal with, got all my pre-trip questions answered, info provided and details explained. She's only round the corner so I could always drop her a message if I needed something. I was also able to check in earlier (I arrived in the morning), which was really helpful.
I've been in Rio before but Renata had lots of useful tips/maps of Rio and general advice.
Leblon is the best place to stay in Rio if you want nice neighbourhood, beach, cute shops and restaurants, juice bars and above all, not too touristy. It's like Soho in New York and Chelsea in London.

Really highly recommended!

We had a phantastic stay at Renata's appartment! It is very nicely decorated & has all amenities you need. Felt like home from the first minute! The location in Leblon is great... close to bakery, supermarket, restaurants, shops & just a 3min walk to Leblon beach which was very safe! Getting there from the airport by taxi is easy and also going around in Rio catching a taxi infront of the building is safe. We loved the breakfast at Talho Capixaba and the Acai at Balada Mix! Communicating with Renata was easy, unfortunately we were also too busy to meet her. But she was always available via (Hidden by Airbnb) if we had questions! Definitely a perfect place to explore Rio de Janeiro!

We arrived at 2200 and were greeted by Renata. She was a very welcoming host. Prior to our arrival she answered any queries we had about the area and activities we wanted to do. This continued during our trip, Renata also messaged us during our stay to make sure all was ok. The apartment is exactly as listed, so no surprises, it was excellent, clean and fully equipped. As this was our first trip to Rio we were unsure about the area, however, Leblon is a great place, with the apartment located in the perfect position with regards to restaurants, bars, shopping and the superb beach which is just a 5 minute walk away. The area has an upmarket feel to it and we always felt safe. Transport is easy, with a taxi rank just over the road, and taxis are super cheap. Overall this was an excellent choice. Thanks Renata.

Ubicación extraordinaria, a una cuadra de la playa y al lado de muy buenos restaurantes y bares. El departamento está remodelado y todo parece nuevo. 
Solo dos observaciones: la cama es chica y el departamento no tiene vista. En todo caso me volvería a quedar ahí! Para mí nada de esto le restó puntos al lugar.
Absolutely Perfect!

This is a great little apartment in a perfect location - right in the heart of Leblon which is the best suburb in Rio! Close to the beach, 3 supermarkets within easy walking distance, bars, cafes, restaurants, public transport etc. The apartment is small but nicely fitted out and has everything you need for a short or a long stay. Bed was small but comfortable, shower worked excellently, kitchen is well equipped and the wifi worked perfectly. Overall an awesome little place and would definitely stay here again if back in Rio.

I came to Rio for the Olympics and this was my first time staying at an Airbnb.  I was a little wary at first, but I must say, staying at this property was a wonderful first experience and really contributed to the success of our trip.  

Renata was out of town, so was unable to meet us, but her father was patiently waiting for us at the apartment even though our flight was delayed several hours.  Upon arrival, he showed us around the apartment and left us with the keys.

The description of this property, "Best location in Leblon" could not have been more accurate.  It was less than a 5 minute walk from the closest metro station, Antero de Quental, on the new Line 4.  This station is only a few stops from General Osorio station in Ipanema.  The area was lively and felt safe.

There were tons of restaurants and two shopping malls very near to the property.  All of our best meals came from Renata's recommendations, so I highly recommend taking a look at those. 

Would definitely stay here again and recommend this property!  Thank you Renata!
Tivemos uma ótima estadia no apto da Renata. O apto é bem localizado, bem decorado e muito funcional. Somente a cama que é um pouco pequena, mas de resto foi tudo ótimo.

L'appartement de Renata est décoré avec goût et offre tout le confort nécessaire. L'emplacement à deux pas de la plage d'Ipanema et en plein cœur de Leblon est super! Renata a été très disponible en cas de question.
À recommander sans hésitation !
Apartamento lindo, limpo e bem confortável perto de tudo no Leblon.

Well appointed apartment showcasing nice personality.
Exceptional location right by the most sought after restaurants and bars of Leblon and 3 minutes away from the beach by foot.
Quiet, comfortable, fast internet, nice bathroom, washer but absolutely no view. The doorman is not present 24 hours but the building and surroundings a safe,
Highly recommended.
Excelente anfitriã, atenciosa e prestativa. O apto é excelente e condiz exatamente com as fotos! A localização é perfeita, no local mais charmoso do Leblon! Adorei a estadia, voltarei em breve!
Excelente localização, apartamento confortável, bom custo-benefício. Recomendo!

A localização é ótima, dá para se fazer tudo à pé. A estadia e a recepção também foi tranquila e a Renata é muito atenciosa. O apto é confortável é exatamente igual as fotos. Definitivamente eu recomendo o apto.

Renata e Sr. José foram excelentes, desde o primeiro contato até nosso check out. Nos sentimos confortáveis. O apartamento é exatamente como mostrado em fotos e perfeito para duas pessoas, muito bem localizado, perto dos melhores shoppings, restaurantes, mercados, bares e praia. Ideal para lazer, férias, negócios ou até mesmo um final de semana diferente! Eu recomendo este espaço de olhos fechados!

Excelente ubicación, el barrio es muy lindo y tiene todo cerca: a dos cuadras de la playa de Leblon, a media cuadra del Metro y en plena zona de bares y acceso a todo fácil. El departamento es muy lindo y la atención de Renata EXCELENTE!!

O apartamento da Renata é lindo, super aconchegante, limpo. A localização é excelente. Um dos melhores Airbnb do Rio.
Ficamos apenas dois dias, mas queríamos ficar mais e aproveitar. Afinal, é perto da praia, de bares, restaurantes. Este é o melhor pedacinho do Rio.
Estuvo todo perfecto. Altamente recomendable y la ubicación es óptima. El departamento impecable! Renata muy atenta.

Apartamento perfeito no coração do Leblon para uma pessoa ou um casal. O espaço é pequeno, mas mais que suficiente para uma estadia perfeita! A decoração é moderna e bem cuidado. Até os livros são bem pensados para agradar a diferentes gostos. O chuveiro é maravilhoso!!!! Tudo muito limpo e perfeitamente como nas fotos anunciadas. A facilidade de contato, de check-in e de check-out foram as melhores que já experimentei. Pertíssimo de bares, padaria (as melhores do Rio! Padaria Lisboa que fica aberta 24h e o Talho Capixaba que é delicioso e tem produtos diferenciados _inclusive sem gluten e sem lactose, ficam em frente!), ponto de taxi em frente, ponto de onibus muito perto, o metro a 230m e a praia há dois quarteirões. Fármacia ao lado. tudo funcionou perfeitamente, inclusive a internet.A simpatia da Renata e do Sr. José são um bonus à parte! O porteiro, Sr. Geraldo, tbm foi muito prestativo e simpático.
Vale muito a pena experimentar! Com certeza voltarei outras vezes.

O apartamento da Renata é exatamente como está nas fotos: lindo, bem decorado, com tudo o que se precisa para uma hospedagem muito confortável, além de limpeza impecável. A comunicação com ela e seu assistente foi sempre muito rápida e super atenciosa. A localização é excelente, dá para fazer tudo a pé: praia, lojas, shopping, restaurantes e bares. Difícil é manter a dieta tendo a padaria Talho Capixaba do outro lado da rua com sanduíches maravilhosos para o café da manhã ;-)
Amei o apartamento, super recomendo.

Apartamento aconchegante, muito bem localizado! Na cara do gol!

Anfitriã muito responsavel.

El departamento está muy bien equipado, es espacioso, muy funcional y con linda decoración. Todo está impecable y funciona bárbaro. Está ubicado en una zona central de Leblon: a dos cuadras de la playa y a mano de una zona llena de bares y negocios lindos. Carece de vista, pero no la echamos de menos. Como contrapartida, el silencio y la privacidad que ofrece es total. Volveríamos sin dudas.
Excelente apartamento, tamanho ideal, ótima localização no Leblon. Super limpo e aconchegante. Renata foi nota mil como anfitriã! Super recomendo!
muy lindo el departamento! a dos cuadras del puesto 12, super recomendable para ir en pareja
Great place in a truly great location. Would stay there again!
Confortável, ótima localização, perfeito para descanso.

Everything is very nice at Renata's! The apartment itself and most of all the location. I am definitely coming back!! Definitely.
Thank you Renata!
Muy bueno todo!! Recomiendo

Apartamento super funcional para umas férias no Rio de Janeiro mas com conforto adicional ao que costumo encontrar no Airbnb. Localização super segura e pertíssimo da praia, bem no centro da vida noturna do Leblon. Recomendo vivamente!

L'appartement de Renata est exactement comme décrit. 
Il contient tout ce dont on peut avoir besoin et nous avons même reçu à manger notre fille et sa famille. 
L'appartement étant à l'arrière de l'édifice il n'y a pas de vue sur la rue avant mais ceci est parfait pour des nuits calmes et sans bruit. 
Nous avons vraiment apprécié l'emplacement près du métro, d'un café - pâtisserie et de 2 épiceries ainsi qu'à 2 rues seulement de la plage de Leblon. 
Le système d'air climatisé -nécessaire -  est bruyant mais sera remplacé nous a confirmé Renata. 
Nous le recommandons fortement!

Ever since I was 16 I wanted to move to NYC & live in my very own small but quirky studio apartment. Renata's Rio apartment reminded me of that dream & it gave me that exact excited feeling. Of living in a new, inspiring city. A city that you are hardly ever at home because you are exploring but if you are, you need a place that makes you feel happy & secure. This place did this for me. I really felt like I lived in Rio. You walk out onto one of the most happening few streets in Leblon & two blocks from the beach! So to anyone that wants to feel like a local, I recommend Renata's joint :)

A casa é muito agradável e bem localizada. A Renata é bastante disponível, e deixa toalhas, roupa de cama, etc, o que torna a estada muito mais agradável por não ter que se preocupar com esse tipo de detalhe.

Es la segunda vez que nos hospedamos en el departamento de Renata, ya lo adoptamos como nuestro lugarcito en Río! La ubicación es perfecta, muy bien ambientado el Depto y Renata es súper amable, siempre está para lo que necesitamos. Lo recomiendo!
Apartamento em perfeita condição, Renata é super atenciosa, a localização é ótima!

El departamento fue tan fantástico cómo se aprecia en las fotos. Sumamente cómodo y equipado a la perfección con absolutamente todo lo que puedas necesitar. La zona es hermosa, queda a 2 cuadras de la playa y los padres de Renata son muy cordiales. Volveremos. Indudablemente
Hermoso departamento, ubicacion excelente, cerca de la playa . Muy lindo y tranquilo para salir de noche también. Renata un amor siempre pendiente de todo, seguramente volvemos.
Excelente localização, apartamento limpo e muito bem decorado!! Recomendo demais a estadia para casais!!
Super bem localizado, o apartamento é perfeito para 2 pessoas. Limpo, iluminado, bem cuidado, uma gracinha!!A Renata foi muito atenciosa em todos os momentos. Recomendo demais.
I loved the central lively location and feeling like a local while staying at Renata's place. Many thanks for your hospitality.
Meus pais que se hospedaram na residência da Renata. Eles gostaram de quase tudo. Acharam a localização ótima e o apartamento tinha boa infraestrutura!
Tastefully decorated apartment; great location.
Nice apartment, looks exactly like as shown in pictures. Great location, very much convenient.

2nd stay in Renata's studio: Stylish, functional and perfectly located in the best area of Rio.
Renata's communication is very good. That makes it a perfect stay in Rio once again. Thanks!
Apartamento muito bom, muito limpo, tudo funcionando. Fica em uma localização ótima no Leblon, próximo a tudo. A Renata é atenciosa e rápida nas respostas e também bastante flexível. Recomendo!

Apartamento muito organizado e limpo, super bem localizado (dá pra ir a pé pra praia, bares, restaurantes, meteô e cafés). Como fui no período do rock in rio, senti falta de alguns canais na tv pra assistir a alguns shows (só tem canais mais básicos), mas nada que atrapalhasse a estadia, até porque raramente se assiste tv durante uma (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza me hospedaria novamente. Indico!

Renata é atenciosa e disponível, a localização é perfeita, ao lado de mercados, bancos, bares e restaurantes excelentes, e muito próximo a praia, o tamanho  do apartamento é ideal para duas pessoas. 
O que deixou a desejar foi a limpeza, mofo e sujidades na cozinha, nos armários do quarto e banheiro com cabelos, pelos e poeiras.  A sala com poeira e lixo atrás da almofadas. O ar condicionado é de janela que normalmente faz barulho e está  fixado na janela o que piora o barulho, faz a janela tremer e dificulta o sono. A cortina fica raspando em cima da cabeça enquanto dormimos.
O apartamento tem poucas luzes e  mesmo com todas acessas  fica escuro.
Tirando esses detalhes tudo foi perfeito.

Espaço charmoso, aconchegante, localização excelente, perto da praia, restaurantes, supermercado, farmacia. Ótimo! A Renata, muito solicita e atenciosa, em todas as questões respondeu prontamente e sempre muito gentil!
Adoramos a estadia! Com certeza, voltaremos!
Small but cozy apartment in a perfect location. Loved the attention to details and the cleanliness. Can only but recommend it.

Leblon is a great and safe part of the city to stroll through the area and having a good coffee (I recommend Talho Capixaba directly across the street). Renata´s flat is only two blocks away from the beach which is perfect for a run in the morning or to relax at the beach. The flat had everything we needed for preparing our own meals which was very nice after some days in a hotel. Thanks, Renata, for our stay at your nice flat!
Ótima localização, apartamento estiloso, limpo !!!! Ótima opção no coração do leblon realmente.

El departamento es muy cómodo, tal como se muestra en las fotos. Muy buena relación precio  calidad.- Tiene todo lo que se necesita de vacaciones. El edificio es muy silencioso. La ubicación del departamento es muy buena;  ómnibus pasan enfrente y el subte a una cuadra; el barrio es muy seguro y tiene muchos bares y restaurantes de primera. La playa excepcional. Renata muy amable, estuvo todo el tiempo disponible, rápida y puntual recepción, sin problemas de ningún tipo. Muy bueno todo, Dios mediante volveremos a Río y a ese apartamento!

Todo espectacular. Ubicadisimo. A dos cuadras de la playa. A la noche lleno de bares y lugares divinos para ir. Impecable la
Limpieza, las instalaciones y la ropa de cama y toallas. Todo increible. Y Renata muy atenta a todo lo que necesitamos y aconsejándonos en todo lo que le pedimos! Sin dudas el mejor lugar de Leblon para parar!

El departamento cuenta con todo lo necesario, esta a dos cuadras de la playa de leblon, está cerca de pub restaurantes y minimarket está cerca del metro de río, todo espectacular, a esto sumar que Renata siempre está atenta a las preguntas, nada más que agradecer, 100% recomendado! Saludos!
Todo perfecto, recomendable 100% el departamento!
Um lugar bacana, limpo,bem cuidado,gostei muito. Recomendo

Apartamento mesmo no centro do Leblon, junto de comércio, restaurantes e vida noturna. Muito perto da praia. Casa perfeita para 2 pessoas. A Renata sempre foi muito atenciosa e disponível antes e durante a estadia. Recomendo!

O apartamento é uma graça, super agradável e estiloso! Muito bem localizado, perto de tudo. A Renata é uma ótima anfitriã e faz de tudo pra fazer com que o hóspede se sinta à vontade. Adoramos passar esses dias lá e esperamos voltar!

O apartamento da Renata está super bem localizado! Fica perto da praia, do supermercado, restaurantes, cinema, teatro e etc... Além disso, é muito aconchegante: decoração impecável; cozinha boa para cozinhar; banheiro bonito e com chuveiro bom; cama confortável.
Enfim, eu e meu marido adoramos o apartamento. Esperamos voltar outras vezes.

Amazing location, perfect size for one or two people, a wonderful value for such an adorable space, and stellar communication from the Hostess. We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Renata’s space and would do it again in a heartbeat!

La atención de Renata antes y durante el viaje fue perfecta! Nos entregó datos y ubicaciones que nos ayudaron mucho en nuestra estadía. El departamento muy limpio y con todo lo necesario para una estancia cómoda, además la ubicación era increíble!

Nos encantó el departamento. Muy lindo y prolijo como se ve en las imágenes.
Destaco la ubicación inmejorable, a dos cuadras de la playa, que a nuestro gusto es la más linda. La zona es muy tranquila y siendo una avenida importante, tiene el negocio que busques a su alrededor. Además de lugares para salir de noche. 
Cómodo para viajar ya que hay colectivos que van para cualquier lugar y tienen paradas a unos metros.
Lo recomendamos totalmente, y volveríamos sin dudarlo. 
Muchas gracias!!
Genial Lugar para parejas ¡¡¡ Muy , muy recomendado
Lovely place to stay in Rio!! Beach, Shops and Restaurants are all close by & very safe!

A estadia foi ótima! A Renata é muito gentil e responde rapidamente quando acionada.
A localização é sem igual. Ótimo custo benefício.

I have stayed several times in this Apt in Leblon. Small but stylish and well equipped, ideally located in Leblon, easy communication and check-in.
Highly recommended and will like to stay again there in the future.
Já fiquei diversas vezes no apartamento da Renata, e melhor lugar no Rio de Janeiro não há! Melhor localização e apartamento impecável! Com certeza voltarei muitas vezes :)

O apartamento é muito charmoso e bem decorado. A localização é fantástica! No melhor ponto do Leblon - em frente a padarias, supermercado e muito próximo ao metrô. Apesar do edifício ficar numa rua movimentada, o apartamento é bem silencioso e muito confortável. É uma ótima opção para 1 ou 2 pessoas. O processo de checkin e checkout correu perfeitamente e a Renata respondeu sempre com muita agilidade.
O apartamento da Renata é excelente. Bem localizado e exatamente igual as fotos! Ótima conexao de internet e um bom chuveiro!
Excelente apto , súper confortable , con todos los detalles y la mejor ubicación

Renata’s place is in a vibrant area. Lots of restaurants and shopping mall nearby. A lovely clean apartment. Collection of keys should be at the Airbnb apartment address instead of keys being collected from another address. It was a total inconvenience for me because I asked the taxi driver to wait while I collected the keys from the doorman as per host instructions but he drove off with my luggage.
Excelente localização, comunicação fácil, perfeito para um casal.

A Renata é uma ótima anfitriã, gentil e responde prontamente.
A estadia foi perfeita, o apartamento é bem localizado e é muito charmoso e aconchegante.
Super recomendado!

Renata's apartment is extremely well located in the heart of Leblon, a lovely and safe neighborhood. The apartment is close to the beach, a subway station and many restaurants --- and it's across the street from 2 very nice bakeries serving a great breakfast. Very good value.

O apartamento da Renata é uma graça, super limpo e organizado e com uma localização invejável.  O chuveiro é maravilhoso, o WiFi funciona super bem e rápido. O apartamento, por ser de fundos, é super tranquilo e não há barulho da rua. Fui recebida pela Kelly, muito gentil e atenciosa que me explicou todo o funcionamento, incluindo a máquina de lavar. A apartamento tem tudo que vc precisa para uma estadia até mais longa.  A Renata tem uma comunicação rápida e eficiente e eu vou  retornar com certeza e recomendar o apartamento dela para meus amigos.
He vuelto por segunda vez y volveré cada vez que esté en Río, excelente ubicación, súper confortable, limpio, seguro y con todos los detalles,  atención impecable

Highly recommended. Great great location in Rio. Renata’s place is in the heart of Leblon, pretty close to excellent restaurants, the beach, malls, and bars. She answers very fast the messages. Her place was cozy and cute, it’s perfect for solo travelers.
Muy buena ubicación a dos cuadras de la playa y cerca de lugares para comer ! Departamento confortable La anfitriona muy amable y servicial
Tudo correu tranquilamente. O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, a localização é excelente e a Renata foi muito solicita. Ficarei outras vezes e recomendo.

Location! Location! Location! Two blocks from the beach and right in the middle of everything that Leblon has to offer! the building is old, but Renata's apartment is very comfortable. We really enjoyed our stay there.
Excellent location and the best breakfast across the street
A Renata foi muito atencioasa em me receber em ajudar com o check-in e check-out. apartamento é otimo, bem decorado e em excelente localização

My wife and I had a fantastic stay. Location was perfect, the apartment was clean and had everything we needed, the building manager was friendly and helpful and host Renata was always very quick to answer our questions. Would definitely recommend staying here.
O apartamento da Renata é em um dos melhores locais do Rio, tamanho ótimo pra um casal, bem decorado, ar-condicionado split perfeito.  A comunicação foi fácil e eficiente. Recomendo muito.

name: Nice Bright Room by the Beach!
summary: We are renting a nice and cozy double room in Barceloneta. The apartment is very colorful and bright with a fully equipped kitchen, fast internet and a balcony with sea views. Just  2 blocks away from the beach and walking distance to the city center . Great location !!
space: The best location and complicity!
description: We are renting a nice and cozy double room in Barceloneta. The apartment is very colorful and bright with a fully equipped kitchen, fast internet and a balcony with sea views. Just  2 blocks away from the beach and walking distance to the city center . Great location !! The best location and complicity! Everything!! Shower, internet, kitchen balcony and terrace . We are easy !!! The sea and the easy access to any where in the city! Plenty to choose from!
neighborhood_overview: The sea and the easy access to any where in the city!
transit: Plenty to choose from!
access: Everything!! Shower, internet, kitchen balcony and terrace .
interaction: We are easy !!!
house_rules: To be respectful !

host.host_about:
We are a young, romantic and fun loving  couple with an optimistic vision of the World and life itself.  We have lived in Barcelona for more than 7 years.  We believe in people...we believe in destiny...

Ernesto:  I cannot live without sun, without hopes, without Sonia nor her potato salad.  One of my favorite destinations is Punta Sal in the North of Honduras… a mixture of jungle, delicious white sand and the light turquoise sea.
Amongst my favorite books are: Treasure Island and Top of the World.  I love reggae!!!
Sonia: I cannot live without the sea, music…not without dreams nor seafood!!  I´m a passionate reader and love to try new things, food and experiences at least once…!

Our Casita del Mar is a mixture of vibrant colors in which as soon as you come in your entire self will become full of positive vibrations.

"Happiness is a journey...not a destination…"

********
Somos una pareja joven, romantica y soñadora con una visión optimista de Mundo y de la vida.  Hemos vivido en Barcelona por más de 7 años.  Creemos en las personas...creemos en el destino...

Ernesto: No puedo vivir sin el sol, sin ilusiones, sin Sonia ni su ensalada de patatas. Uno de mis destinos favoritos es Punta Sal en el norte de Honduras. Una mezcla entre jungla y deliciosa arena blanca y mar azul turquesa. 
Entre mis libros favoritos están La Isla del Tesoro o El País de las Sombras Largas. Me encanta el REGGAE.
Sonia: No puedo vivir sin el mar, sin música, sin sueños y sin mariscos!!! Soy una ávida lectora y me encanta probar nuevas cosas, comida y experiencias por lo menos alguna vez en mi vida.

Nuestra Casita del Mar es una mezcla de colores que en cuanto entrés por la puerta te llenarás de pura positivad!

"La felicidad es el (Website hidden by Airbnb) la destinación..."

reviews.comments: Ernesto + Sonia were amazing hosts! They were so nice, helped find fun things to do, and provided everything we could ever need! Their apartment was perfectly located. The beach and the marina are a 2 minute walk from the apartment. Their apartment is many floors up, so you will have to walk up stairs but the view from the terrace is way worth the climb! Also they own the cutest Jack Russel terrier! I definitely recommend this Airbnb for a relaxing trip to Barcelona!

Fue como quedarme en casa de unos amigos.., Sonia es un encanto y Ernesto te da la información de todo lo que te surga. (una pareja encantadora!)
La ubicación no está mal, y haces ejercicio todos los días subiendo escalones ;)
Probablemente vuelva a verles...

Wow what a warm welcome we had, candle light, flowers on the table and a welcome bottle of Spanish wine! And our guest are the best, very friendly, helpful and joyful. 
The location is the best, at least if you want to stay at the beach and taste the atmosphere of how the locals live. Lots of bar, restaurant and the best a perfect beach at 2 min walk. 
The room itself is tiny, yet clean, good bed and enough space for your clothes to put. Another nice detail, towels are provided 
All in all we can strongly recommend this place.

Appartement très bien situer avec un toit Terrasse très agréable . Pour ce qui est de l'appart nous avions réserver pour 3 . Et nous avions qu'un lit double ...
La salle de bain est très petite . 
Les hôtes sont très sympa et arrangeant pour les horaires

Very nice small room in barceloneta!
The hosts are just the best! The tell you what you can do in barcelona, they gave me a map and they where very flexibl!

1. Excellent location: a few steps away the beach, the historic part of town 10 minutes walk! 2. Very friendly, open and helpful owners (Sonia and Ernesto, thank you for the reception), cute dog! 3. Small, clean and comfortable room, but in the summer, when plus 30 degrees is very hot. 4. Helpful sports daily - rise to the 5th floor walk;) In general, all very much, thank you! Recommended!
Ernesto and Sonia were great hosts and welcomed me into their lovely home. Although I wasn't in need I have no doubt they have a store of suggestions for visitors to Barcelona

Good location, Nice people !
Good place to stay in Barcelona

Vi blev välkomnade med öppna armar av Sonia och Ernesto och de tog god hand om oss. De var villiga att hjälpa till och tipsa, men lät oss också vara ifred när vi ville, trots att vi bodde i samma lägenhet. Det bästa med lägenheten var läget, en minut ner till stranden. Det fanns även en takterass där man hade fin utsikt.
We had a very nice time at Sonia's & Ernesto's place. The location is a few steps away from the beach and both hosts are very friendly. We can recommend this place to everyone!
Ernesto and Sonia welcomed us in their very nice apartment well located in Barceloneta. We spent a really good weekend enjoying the proximity of the city centre and the beach. Muchas Gracias :-)

Los que estuvieron alojados fueron mis padres, pero por lo que me contaron, Ernesto y Sonia se portaron de maravilla con ellos, muy amables y abiertos, la casa es una monada y se encuentra realmente al lado de la playa.

Genial!

Small but really cozy room in a nice quiet neighborhood in a nice part of the city. Quite a lot restaurants and bars in the area (having in mind that it's almost at the beach). Really close to train station and bus stops. Ernesto and Sonia were really helpful with tips and advises, very friendly and fun!
Super friendly. Location is the best

We spent three nights at Sonia & Ernesto's guestroom. The two were very nice and great hosts. We missed the freshly brewed coffee, we got  every morning and the bed was the most comfortable that we ever had on travels.
We want to come back as soon as possible. :)

Staying with Ernesto and Sonia was amazing.  Their place is one block from the beach in Barceloneta, 2 minute walk to marina, maybe 15-20 mins to Ramblas.
Sonia gave me a map and showed me some spots to check out right when I arrived. It was a holiday weekend so she and Ernesto threw a rooftop party which was SUPER fun (I was very fortunate to be there that weekend).
The place is on the 5th floor, stairs only, if that is a problem
Thanks again for everything Ernesto and Sonia!!

Very welcoming, helpful and friendly couple. Showed us the true spirit of catalunya and even more barceloneta. Coffee, cheesecake and a beautiful dog named Rumba.Ideal for couples. A stones throw from the beach, and a stroll from the best parts of the city. It's a pity our stay was so brief, will definitely be coming back. Until next time...

Ernesto and Sonya are a one of a kind couple! We felt at home immediately upon our arrival when Ernesto gave us the keys and set up our room for us. Both Ernesto and Sonya are very helpful and accommodating which is so impressive because they are hard working individuals that balance the air bnb service with their careers. They spent time getting to know us over coffee in the morning and provided small breakfast items if we wanted them! If not, they encouraged us to use their kitchen to make our own food. 

Not only did we feel welcomed and comfortable with their recommendations on things to do, but we felt loved. It was a sad departure!

It was a pleasure to stay at Sonias and Ernestos place. A lot of fun at the roof top while observing the sunset. The beach is near and a countless small bars and restaurants will keep you busy. Next time in Barcelona we will definitely come again and stay at Sonias and Ernestos place. Thanks for all.

Everything was just perfect! Sonia & Ernesto are so friendly, sweet and funny! They made us feel like home. The room was cozy and the location was the best we could imagine! And the roof-top terrace was amazing! Thank you for everything!
Everything was perfect, Ernesto and Sonaia are very nice and the room is in a perfect location. I'll come back...

These two hosts are absolutely amazing! I sincerely wish there was a love button on this review because my sister and I loved staying here! The apartment is beautiful and located so close to the beach/city center that  everything felt so easy to access. Both Ernesto and Sonia are so full of life, generousity, and kindness you would want to spend hours talking and getting to know both. The first day Sonia provided us with maps, suggestions to great restaurants,sights, etc and Ernesto was even kind enough to lug my baby sister's luggage up 5 flights of stairs. Furthermore, their terrace overlooking barcelona makes you fall in love with the city even more. On our last day, Sonia was kind enough to make us coffee and breakfast which was so delicious! These two are incredible hosts and phenomenal people, I highly recommend staying here :)

Ernesto and Sonia made us feel very at home, and were extremely accommodating of us during our stay. The room was smaller than expected, but they made up for the smaller room with their advice, friendliness, and cleanliness. The location is also hard to beat - their apartment is right on the Barceloneta beach, which is really convenient for first time visitors.

Ernest & Sonia are fantastic people with a wonderful place right by the beach in Barceloneta. They are incredibly friendly and helpful and provide you a nice room with shared kitchen space in their apartment. You can not find a better deal with better people. Added bonus is a lovely rooftop terrace.

What can I say?! Ernesto and Sonia were the sweetest, easy going, and down to earth hosts.  Their love exude throughout their eclectic apartment. The place was clean and so accessible to everything especially the beach and great restaurants. Sonia and Ernesto were easy to talk to about everything from their neighborhood, Barcelona, their history together and life in general. They both were gracious host and very accommodating. The bonus spot was their beautiful terrace upstairs overlooking the ocean and Barceloneta. Ernesto was kind enough to help us with our luggage from their apartment all the way down to the first floor, oh yea, by the way, they live on the 5th floor and only stairs. Good exercise after eating paella near the beach

We had an amazing stay. The location was perfect. Very clean and a super cute puppy!

They gave us great suggestions and let us do our laundry.

Ernesto & Sonia are friendly. Very central.

But the room is not my taste.

Ernesto and Sonia are lovely, friendly people that possess a great balance of respecting one's privacy and are happy to share a drink with you. They  provided great recommendations to us, and were caring regarding our well-being. Some minor down sides included the small space and that it became very hot at night (albeit, we visited in the summertime, so it is expected). We definitely recommend staying with this lovely couple. 
Thank you both for the hospitality!
Awesome stay. Perfect location for exploring Barcelona and right by the beach! Great advice for local food and hidden gems from Ernesto. Hope to be back to stay again.

super accueil  par Ernesto et la maman de Sonia
dommage nous n avons pas rencontré Sonia
nous souhaitons plein de bonnes choses aux futurs parents 
encore merci pour ce super séjour
We had amazing stay. Perfect location and very nice flat. Thanks a lot for everything!
