Flat Residencial em Copacabana com serviços, academia, sauna,  recepção 24hrs, compartilha áreas comuns do flat . ** Este anúncio é referente a esta unidade como nas fotos, sala tv que é reversível à quarto com sofá cama. Ideal para 1 pessoa ou casal. Espaço confortável e privativo. Irá compartilhar a sala, cozinha e banheiro. Este espaço é muito original, confortável e privativo. O Flat dispõe de todos os serviços e facilidades para seu conforto, lazer e segurança. O anúncio é referente ao quarto de hóspedes, da sala tv que é totalmente reversível e independente, podendo utilizar as outras áreas do apartamento, inclusive a varanda privativa.[ compartilha banheiro, sala e cozinha]. Acesso a todo apartamento, uso da cozinha e áreas comuns. o Condomínio tem garagem, sauna, academia,  serviço de mensageiros, portaria 24 hrs. Referente ao
neighborhood_overview: A localização é bem central em Copacabana, numa área residencial, a poucas quadras da praia. Fica ao lado de um dos mais importantes hospitais do Rio de Janeiro, o Copa d'Or, tendo na porta do condomínio ponto permanente de taxi e segurança 24 hrs. Próximo a praia, comércio, metro, supermercados, bancos e pontos turísticos.
notes: Todas as senhas para uso de wifi e informações sobre o funcionamento do flat serão fornecidas na chegada.
transit: Fácil locomoção, estando a apenas 2 quadras da estação de metrô, ponto de ônibus em frente ao condomínio, taxis e muito pratico para deslocamentos a pé, visto a localização central em Copacabana.
access: Acesso a todo apartamento, uso da cozinha e áreas comuns. o Condomínio tem garagem, sauna, academia,  serviço de mensageiros, portaria 24 hrs. Referente ao uso da Academia, devido a nova legislação brasileira, à partir de 01 de janeiro de 2019 , só será permitido uso da academia com a presença de  profissional formado em Educação Física contratado pelo condomínio, sendo o horário de funcionamento  limitado  a: das 17 hrs às 22 hrs [ de segunda a sexta feira] , não havendo funcionamento nos sábados, domingos e feriados.
interaction: Este flat é minha residência e terei grande prazer em compartilhar este espaço. Gostaria de saber mais informações sobre o objetivo de sua viagem , afim de melhor proporcionar uma estadia confortável, segura e que corresponda suas expectativas e necessidades. Estou sempre à disposição para qualquer dúvida ou informações que necessite. Seja Benvindo[a]!
house_rules: Regras básicas de convivência impostas pelo condomínio. Sociabilidade, respeito e educação são bem vindos . Somente hóspedes registrados no check in poderão ter acesso ao apartamento e facilidades do condomínio. É necessário especificar, previamente no momento da reserva, o número , nome e documentos dos hóspedes que serão autorizados para hospedagem. Por motivos de segurança, festas, eventos ou visitas não serão permitidos. ****** Somos contra o Turismo Sexual , protegido pela Lei Estadual n. (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

host.host_about:
Profissional em hospedagem ,vivência em vários países com experiência multicultural, fácil relacionamento e disponibilidade em ajudar a tornar sua estada mais agradável , confortável e segura.

Working in hospitality , living in various countries with multi cultural experience , easy relationship and availability to help and make your most pleasant , comfortable and safe stay.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Gracias por todo Ricardo!! Realmente disfrute mucho mi estadía aquí, en todo momento me sentí como en casa. Es una muy buena persona y siempre estuvo dispuesto a ayudar en todo lo que necesité tanto en el hogar como para poder disfrutar de Río. El departamento es muy bonito y el edificio también, con personal muy respetuoso y simpático.

Foi tudo fantástico, o espaço é super confortável , super bem decorado com limpeza impecável. A varanda com vista pra praia é excelente. Ricardo foi super gentil em tudo.
Voltarei com certeza!
É a segunda vez que me hospedo no flat e gostei muito, voltarei .Super recomendo.

Adoramos nossa hospedagem no apartamento, realmente ele é igual nas fotos, não muda nada! O Ricardo foi super cuidadoso e atencioso com a gente! Recomendamos demais o apartamento, saímos bem satisfeitos com a nossa estadia nos dias q ficamos lá! Fora que ele deixa bombons no quarto e sucos, refrigerantes entre outras coisas como cortesia na geladeira!

Safe area, amazing hospitality, nice room with wonderful balcony, coffee machine + kitchen equipment, overall cleaness, gym with everything you need during vacation, the view from the balcony and roof of the building, and kindness from Ricardo. 6/5 experience. Great for couples or singles! I recommend.
Apartamento impecável, cheiroso, Ricardo super atencioso! Amei tudo!

name: Great view,superb located penthouse
summary: Penthouse with great sea and city view  is located in the heart of Istanbul;very close to all city highlights; Galata Bridge and Galata Tower, historical peninsula.  The stylish, comfortable and bright penthouse is available for 5 guests...
space: The stylish & full decorated penthouse is located in central Istanbul; very close to all city highlights; Galata Bridge; Galata Tower, and historical peninsula. The penthouse has a great sea and city view including the  historical peninsula, Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Galata Tower etc.  The stylish, comfortable and bright apartment has 1 bedroom with a saloon, having also a sofa which can be a double bed. An additional bad can be placed in the living room or bed room.  So we have opportunity for the accommodation of 5 people. There is 24 hours of reception and you can feel the hotel comfort during your stay . We can serve for you breakfast (with an additional fee) downstairs at the lovely cafeteria. Set in a reformed, century-old building, having feature elegant modern décor. All brand new, air-conditioned apartments are equipped with free Wi-Fi, private bathroom and open-plan kitchen with electrical hob, refrigerator, microwave and kitchenware. There is also a living room with phone,
description: Penthouse with great sea and city view  is located in the heart of Istanbul;very close to all city highlights; Galata Bridge and Galata Tower, historical peninsula.  The stylish, comfortable and bright penthouse is available for 5 guests...  The stylish & full decorated penthouse is located in central Istanbul; very close to all city highlights; Galata Bridge; Galata Tower, and historical peninsula. The penthouse has a great sea and city view including the  historical peninsula, Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Galata Tower etc.  The stylish, comfortable and bright apartment has 1 bedroom with a saloon, having also a sofa which can be a double bed. An additional bad can be placed in the living room or bed room.  So we have opportunity for the accommodation of 5 people. There is 24 hours of reception and you can feel the hotel comfort during your stay . We can serve for you breakfast (with an additional fee) downstairs at the lovely cafeteria. Set in a reformed, century-old building, having f
neighborhood_overview: The Karakoy Neighbourhood is the center of Galata Region. It is the real heart of Istanbul.
transit: All the central tram and metro stations are only a couple of minutes away from your door.. We can call taxis and shuttles through our reception anytime you want...

host.host_about: I am an architect who loves travelling and hosting guests from all over the world.

reviews.comments: Son derece profosyonel ve guleryuzlu bir ekipten olusan karakoy aparts cok keyifli bir zaman gecirmemize sebep oldu. Lokasyon ve daireler yazilanlarin karsiligini verdi. Ali Bey'e ulasilabilirligi, ilgisi ve iyi niyeti icin cok tesekkurler kusursuz bir iletisim oldu. Kucuk suprizler icin, guzel zamanlar icin ve karakoye ait hissetmek icin guzel bir tercih olarak tavsiye ederim..

Ali is a wonderful, amazing host, he takes care of his guest like he would do with his friend.
The place is really nice in a startegic spot.

Thanks Ali 
Marisa

Ali Bey butun mesajlara cok guzel bir sekilde yanit verip bizi cok rahatlatti. Her konuda yardimci oldu cok tesekkur ederiz. Evde resimlerde gosterileni birebir yasama firsatimiz oldu. Karakoy'un gobeginde cok guzel bir yer.

Alì è stato molto chiaro e preciso in tutte le informazioni prima di arrivare. La zona è caratteristica e movimentata, facile da raggiungere (dall'aeroporto ci vogliono 30 min), sulla via ci sono tutte le tipologie di botteghe per i vari souvenir e ricordi; c'è sempre qualcuno di turno ad accoglierti. La camera è posizionata benissimo, con vista sul bosforo: eccezionale svegliarsi all'alba!
Non guasterebbe qualche comfort in più, ma è molto ben attrezzata e pulita.
Lo staff è disponibile e cortese (un ringraziamento particolare a Gokhan!)
Ve lo consiglio!

Karakoy Aparts was great! The room was spacious and looked exactly like it does in the photos. The staff at reception were friendly and inviting.

We loved the neighborhood too--located right across from the tram making it easy to get anywhere quickly. There are also lots of great cafes and restaurants close by! Highly recommend this place!
THERE IS A RECEPTION 24 HOURS SO THAT MAKES IT VERY CONVENIENT - the front desk is very friendly to assist with anything you need

We enjoyed our stay at Ali's penthouse appartment. It was righly located a few hundred meters from Galata Tower in the center of culturally intense Karakoy area. Beautiful view on Sultanamet and Bosphora detroit. Great location to cover the historic sites of Istanbul. Just a few meters from the tramway.

We were unable to meet Ali; however, we had no issues getting checked into and out of our room.  It is part of an apartment building with a 24-hour reception desk.  They were very helpful in providing us everything we needed for our stay and even helped arrange our ride to the airport.  Location is good--within walking distance of the sights on the south side of Istanbul as well as to the more active nightlight on the north side.

L'hôtel est très bien situé à Istanbul, à un nœud de transports en commun : tramway, funiculaire, bateau. L'accès est donc aisé vers les quartiers historiques et également vers les quartiers modernes. La rue dans laquelle se situe l'hôtel monte jusqu'à la Tour de Galata et rejoint la place Taksim en passant par une grande artère commerçante. Il y a de nombreuses petites boutiques à proximité, des restaurants, et de la restauration rapide. Le quartier est très agréable.
Notre appartement était situé au dernier étage et avait une vue magnifique sur la corne d'or, le Bosphore, le palais de Topkapi, Sainte Sophie et la tour de Galata.
L'espace était suffisant pour 2 adultes et 3 enfants.

This apartment is totally amazing!I love the bathroom so much!The 24 hour reception is really helpful as well!Ali recommended me many restaurants and I found these places are really nice!Escapecially the Hamdi restaurant!Hope will visit this place again!

Ali's penthouse private apartment boasts an amazing view and central location (few minutes walk away from Galata Tower, Istiklal for shopping, and the bars and restaurants lining the Bosphorus is this up and coming neighborhood). The old town with the main tourist sites is a short, inexpensive taxi or train ride away, and can even be done on foot. The staff were hospitable, friendly, and willing to lend a hand with pretty much anything, all without smothering us. My fiancée and I thoroughly enjoyed the space, and highly recommend the rental.
Central location. Very courteous and helpful management. Highly recommended.
Ótima localização e uma excelente vista da Galata Bridge. Aquecimento muito bom também. De negativo apenas o ralo do chuveiro estava entupido e o sofá r móveis da cozinha um pouco judiados.

Never stay at this place! The place is filthy dirty! None of the description is matching! I am travelling now for business the past 35 years with up to 210 overnights per year. This has been by far the worst experience!

This apartment has a great location, a beautiful view, and very friendly reception staff. Public transit is a short walk away, and there are numerous great restaurants nearby. The interior has very modern decor and was recently renovated, so everything looks brand new; the bathrooms looked especially good. The 24hr reception was helpful in dealing with afterhours requests.
Very central and convenient flat. Very reactive, available and responsive people at the reception.

Excellent location walking distance  from Topkapi palace, Hagia Sophia, and Galata Tower. great view over Bosphorus. Only negative was the lack of water pressure in the shower; otherwise a fantastic experience
I recommend this place and nice hotel and I would like to thanks mr.Ali specially and all the working in the reception Amat and the others thank u so much for the great reception and dealing

This apartment is in an amazing location and we had an absolutely beautiful view of several mosques and even the Topkapi Palace at a distance. However, do not expect what the photos portray for the inside of the apartment. It is extremely outdated and needs a major renovation. The towels are very dingy and we had issues with the hot water not working in the shower. That being said, any issue we brought upon the front reception they were very responsive. In fact, the reason I am giving 3 stars is solely based upon how amazing the front staff was as they were considerate to the fact that we were three women traveling alone. They went out of the way to help us with even the smallest of tasks (thank you again for the birthday gift!) and we felt safe that there was a 24/7 reception. Also, you can't beat the location - it is walking distance to several cafes and shops. This apartment has a lot of potentials to be better regarding cleanliness and the outdated atmosphere. Since we were on the top floor the generator made a lot of noise which will bother light sleepers (such as my mom) but some soundproof windows can solve this issue! I would come back and stay in this apartment because of the location and the hospitable staff.

Please note that this apartment is, in fact, part of a hotel, with a small cafe in the "lobby" and a front desk and most features that a small hotel or hostel would have. 

And it's a place with many excellent attributes. Let's start with the fact that the view from this room/suite is fantastic. I don't have a basis for comparison, but I was wary of hotel rooms that claimed a view because I didn't know how good the views were. The pictures on the listing are actual pictures from the room. I spent a lot of time just looking out the windows.

Also positive was the attitude of the staff.  They were very friendly and helpful. One man walked me to a nearby supermarket to show me, another started breakfast a bit early for me, and they were all responsive in every way. 

Breakfast is fantastic, given that this is a small hotel, not a big multi-star place. You get a large plate of cheese, bread, fruits, yogurt, a boiled egg, some meat, honey, butter, jam. There is also coffee and tea and cold cereal and so on. It's a simple place, but they do a very nice job on breakfast.

The location is outstanding, too. It is at the bottom end of a steep tourist street very near the main bridge connecting the two old parts of Istanbul. You can walk to the Metro/tram in a few minutes and even walk across the bridge to the Hagia Sophia or Sultanahmet mosque (Blue Mosque). The Galata Tower is just a hundred meters or so just up the very steep street.

I loved the place, other than the fact that the living room furniture was sparse and quite stained. The bathroom is very high quality, you get a fridge and a sink and a microwave, and the bedroom is very nice. I am planning to go to Istanbul again in the next few weeks and the only reason I wouldn't stay there is because I might want to try a different neighborhood next time.

Perfect location with an amazing view. one thing to keep in mind was that because the location was so central there was quite a bit of noise from the road. This is only something to consider if you're a very light sleeper though, otherwise I couldn't recommend this place more.

It was a wonderful week being at Ali's apartment with great hospitality and support in a timely manner. He was also very friendly and his tips to the neighborhood were excellent. We would like to spend in his place again when we come to Istanbul next time. Teşekkür!!!

Folks, if you’re looking for a place with a great view of the Bosphorus on the European side, then there is no place better located than this. The people are very helpful & you all will have a great time for sure. Highly recommended for sure
Perfect view, great location!
Great location, friendly host, spectacular view.  Be prepared for accommodation that is spacious and comfortable but not outfitted at the highest quality level.
Everything was pretty much perfect. The whole staff was very nice. We can totally recommend this place.

The location & view were a big tick for us. We loved watching the activity on the Bosphorus and when it came to exploring the city it was easy to get to most places either on foot or by public transport. The bonus was being near the ferry to Kadiköy (Asian side) so we had access to the best of both worlds. Ali’s apartment was as it appears in the photos and while it could do with a more comfortable couch  it really was a fabulous base in Karaköy. All the staff at the apart-hotel were friendly and helpful and we’d definitely recommend it.
Je ne conseille pas ce logement. Seule la vue est fidèle aux photos. Rien ne fonctionne correctement.

La vue est fantastique, l'emplacement optimal, la chambre très confortable. Personnel disponible et aimable.
A recommander

To get a glimp of the almighty Bosphurus we decided last minute to stay at Ali’s place. Actually it’s not a place where people live but A hotel. It surprised us when reaching out to the ‘room’. The location is great. The view over the Bosphurus is nice but not spectacular. Overall the stay was oke but there were minor issues. The lamp in the living room was not working, the door between living- and bedroom was not closing properly, the sewer smell from the airco was not nice and the difficulties to get grip of the water temprature when showering was annoying (too hot or too cold).
موقع جميل و قريب من المعالم و من وسائل النقل العامه

This is not an independent apartment, but an apartment in a hotel. Good location, but too expensive for an one bedroom and one bathroom hotel room (two places on the sofa are counted in the number of beds).  The welcome is good, but the description is not accurate.

name: Aluguel para 2015
summary: Apartamento com sala, 1 quarto, cozinha e banheiro, fundos, bem situado no Centro próximo ao comércio e Sambódromo, dando para ir a pé assistir o carnaval. Ideal para um casal com 1 filho ou sem filhos, ou três amigos.
space: O espaço é bom, o prédio tem porteiro 24h/dia, com interfone, mas não pode fazer barulho ou bagunça nenhuma hora do dia ou noite por causa da Lei do Silêncio.
description: Apartamento com sala, 1 quarto, cozinha e banheiro, fundos, bem situado no Centro próximo ao comércio e Sambódromo, dando para ir a pé assistir o carnaval. Ideal para um casal com 1 filho ou sem filhos, ou três amigos.    O espaço é bom, o prédio tem porteiro 24h/dia, com interfone, mas não pode fazer barulho ou bagunça nenhuma hora do dia ou noite por causa da Lei do Silêncio. O apartamento está bem localizado, possuindo transporte para Zona Sul, podendo ir para a Lapa á e ao Sambódromo.  Não permito bebidas, drogas, animais nem festas no apartamento.  Não possuí internet, mas existem várias Lan House perto do prédio. O valor de aluguel para o apartamento no Carnaval 5 dias é de R$ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , caso a pessoa queira ficar mais dias poderemos combinar outro valor. A alegria da Lapa, a possibilidade de ir e vir a qualquer hora do dia e noite que terá movimento na rua. Fica próximo ao aeroporto Santos Dumont, ao Aterro do Flamengo(lugar arborizado, um parque). Exist
neighborhood_overview: A alegria da Lapa, a possibilidade de ir e vir a qualquer hora do dia e noite que terá movimento na rua. Fica próximo ao aeroporto Santos Dumont, ao Aterro do Flamengo(lugar arborizado, um parque).
notes: A rua é movimentada todas as horas de dia e noite, tem condução para a Zona Sul e Norte, existem vários restaurantes, bares, lanchonetes, gente bonita para se ver, principalmente no carnaval, que o movimento aumenta.
transit: Existe bastante transporte público para pegar ônibus, carro, táxi e pode ir à pé pegar o metro.
access: O apartamento está bem localizado, possuindo transporte para Zona Sul, podendo ir para a Lapa á e ao Sambódromo.  Não permito bebidas, drogas, animais nem festas no apartamento.  Não possuí internet, mas existem várias Lan House perto do prédio.
interaction: O valor de aluguel para o apartamento no Carnaval 5 dias é de R$ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , caso a pessoa queira ficar mais dias poderemos combinar outro valor.
house_rules: Não aceito bebidas, drogas, festas ou qualquer outro dia de encontro que gere perturbação para os vizinhos. Conservar o apartamento, mantendo-o limpo e arrumado. Respeitar a lei do silêncio. Não permito animais de estimação. Espero quem vá se hospedar no apartamento tenha responsabilidades com o imóvel assim como com os mobiliários que compõe o apartamento.

host.host_about: sou do Rio de Janeiro, gosto de ir a praia, cinema, qualquer passeio ou programa que envolva cultura e natureza.

address.street: rio de janeiro, rio de janeiro, Brazil

name: Best Location on the UWS!!
summary: Clean cozy room on the UWS, a minute walk to the 86th street subways, you can be in midtown in no time. Comfortably fits 2 people (one bed for a couple + cot). The apartment features a baby grand piano and an antique book collection. Hosts cook! )))
space: We're a unique multi-cultural home, pet- and people-friendly! We're long-time residents of this neighborhood and New York City in general and would be more than happy to point you in the right direction and give you tips for a better stay in New York! We also have a 2-year-old dog (a pointer mix), he's extremely friendly and nice. The building has a concierge and elevators, as well as a laundry room, if need be. Side note: the bed IS a full-size bed, not the twin like in the photos. We'll be updating the pictures shortly.
description: Clean cozy room on the UWS, a minute walk to the 86th street subways, you can be in midtown in no time. Comfortably fits 2 people (one bed for a couple + cot). The apartment features a baby grand piano and an antique book collection. Hosts cook! ))) We're a unique multi-cultural home, pet- and people-friendly! We're long-time residents of this neighborhood and New York City in general and would be more than happy to point you in the right direction and give you tips for a better stay in New York! We also have a 2-year-old dog (a pointer mix), he's extremely friendly and nice. The building has a concierge and elevators, as well as a laundry room, if need be. Side note: the bed IS a full-size bed, not the twin like in the photos. We'll be updating the pictures shortly. Kitchen, both bathrooms, internet As much as they guests want us to interact with them, it's completely up to them. The mix of cultures and backgrounds, the diversity, is what makes the Upper West Side such a great place t
neighborhood_overview: The mix of cultures and backgrounds, the diversity, is what makes the Upper West Side such a great place to live and visit. There is always something to do within three minutes walking distance, plus we have Central Park and Riverside Park practically next door. Amsterdam Avenue is all bars and restaurants, so there is always something to do and some place to go.
notes: We have a 2-year old dog in the house, he's extremely friendly and playful, not aggressive at all.
transit: The proximity to public transportation is SO nice. We're a block away from the subway and 15 minutes from midtown! Parking is available in the building ($40 for 24 hours for sedans, $50 for SUVs), or you can find free parking in the streets, though that sometimes might take 15-20 minutes of searching, Hey, it's New York. Fuhgeddaboudit! ))
access: Kitchen, both bathrooms, internet
interaction: As much as they guests want us to interact with them, it's completely up to them.
house_rules: Clean and quiet, we are definitely not into party animals who bring the party home with them. We are young and love to have fun, but within reasonable limits, and out home is our sanctuary form the hustle and bustle of NYC, we expect our guests to respect that.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Business professional, avid cook, ex-military daredevil and huge animal lover, and total gearhead! We've been married for three years now, so the household is all about love )))). We love traveling and meeting people (I've been to more than 70 countries myself), so we know how to make our guests feel at home. 

“Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.”– William James

reviews.comments:
I am so thankful to Sasha and his wife for hosting us so well. He met me at the subway stop a few blocks from his apartment, and walked me there, showing his favorite places to eat along the way, and showing how nice and family friendly the neighborhood is. 
We could count on them to help choosing the best route to the airport and around the city using the public transportation. They would be available by phone to give directions in case we needed, and this was a great support for me because I have the poorest sense of direction ever.
We loved staying there and would stay again.
.

Staying with Sasha and his wife was a perfect idea! They were so kind with us, friendly and they helped us all the time with everything we need. The room was so comfortable and clean. And the neighborhood is so convenient. Close to the subway and central park. Also they were very flexible with our checkout and they help us to get to the airport in an easy way. 
Sasha's wife made us an amazing applecake with icecream and invited us with delicious tea. 
Of course we highly recommend it.
Thanks for everything and hope to see you soon!

We had a great stay at Sasha's. He had some awesome advise on what to do in NYC that you cannot find on tourist sites plus had the perfect location to commute downtown easily or simply head into Central Park. The room was comfortable with great natural light and aircon. Sasha accommodated our checking in at a late hour (organised ahead of time). Would definitely stay there again.
Sasha was a very frendly guy, but the apartment was dirty. The room was nice though.

It was my first experience with airbnb and i was lucky to find such incredible hosts as Sasha and his wife, Vika. They are very easy-going, friendly , helpful and hospitable. My friend and I just fell in love with their pet, such a cute and lovable dog. The location is great, easy to get everywhere you want. It is close to the subway and there are also many different places where you can find everything you need. The room was nice and cosy. I will definitely stay at their place again if i go to NYC and I for sure recommend them.

Sasha was a wonderful host. He was very friendly and helpful to indicate us where to go in NYC. The room was large and clean with all the necessary appliances. Furthermore the neighborhood is very nice, I would like to really recommend his place.

Хозяин Саша очень гостеприимный, в день приезда встретил нас у выхода из метро, давал советы по поездке. Квартира находится недалеко от станции метро. Комната ухоженная. Этот район нам понравился: находится в трех кварталах от Центрального парка и недалеко от Музея естествознания. Рекомендую.

Obviously, it's a fantastic location, right between the two parks. Subway is just a block away. The neighborhood is safe enough and also the building (it has a doorman) and I didn't worry leaving my laptop there.
Sasha and Vicky are really nice and helpful (getting around, recommendations etc). Also, thei're very interesting people who are fun to talk to. They keep the apartment very tidy and clean.
Their dog Jax is well trained and super friendly (and funny).

I definitely recommend staying there.

Sasha was an excellent host - he's friendly, flexible and helpful. I was in town for meetings and was looking for a quiet and comfortable place today. Sasha was very flexible with my arrival and departure time and gave excellent help in navigating the New York subway. Everything turned out as expected, the room was clean and the neighborhood was quiet. On top of this Sacha made sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed. He was very friendly and was open to share his personal stories and opinions with me - I really enjoyed talking with him. That said, when I needed my own space, Sasha knew it and let me do my own thing. Jax is an incredibly well trained and happy dog. I would absolutely stay at Sasha's place if I visit New York again!
Great location and great host. We would definitely recommend for anyone going to NY.

Sasha and his wife, Vika, made us feel very welcome in their comfortable flat in its wonderful location close to Central Park.  When we arrived, Sasha met us at the subway station and showed us the way to his flat.  After giving us tea, he took us on a long walk and showed us the sights in the area.  The flat was clean and quiet and the room was just as shown in the picture.  Thank you for everything, Sasha.  We would certainly recommend Sasha's place to anyone looking for somewhere central to stay in New York.

Sasha's location was perfect for us. We were making a quick trip to NYC, with the purpose of walking everywhere and seeing as much as we could. He was great at emails before we arrived, and when we got there he spent an hour walking us around the neighborhood, showing us some sites, and dropping us off at the door of our first museum! 

The room was exactly as pictured. On the second night his wife made us tea and shared some treats and we stayed up chatting.

Thanks for a great trip to NYC!

Sasha was the best host I could have asked for for my first time using Airbnb. He told me what metro lines to take when I was lost, gave me advice to where I should eat, and where I should go. He's the friendliest, the most helpful host. If I ever stay in NY again, Sasha would be my first choice if he would ever have me again! Sasha I'm sorry that we never got to walk your dog with you!

It was lovely staying with Sasha and his wife. Their cozy home is clean, and the bedroom is just as pictured. Sasha picked me up at the subway station, answered all of my myriad questions, and his wife gave me a warm bowl of soup (so great after a long day). If you're new and lost in this bustling city, this is the perfect place to rest.

When we check air bnb places to stay we feel comfortable with the past reviews and book the place, I read the reviews and booked Sasha's place and it was exactly what the reviews said and what Sasha describe his place and surroundings. I have stayed in quite a few and without doubt he is the friendliest. He is very helpful and enjoyed the conversations, the room was clean and good enough and he went to the extent of fixing a new A/C even when I didn't complain about it. Great location, quiet, clean and value for money in NYC. I would recommend to all and I would go back again to stay at Sasha's place.
Sasha was very helpful with transportation info and even met me at the subway stop. The room met all expectations. The location is great for public transportation.

We had a great stay at Sasha's place! 
He was always friendly and accommodating whenever we spoke. 
If you are planning on exploring Manhattan the location doesn't get much better than this. It's fairly quick and easy to catch a train or cab to where you want to go :)

Had a great time with Sasha! Helpful and kind, a great pair to stay with. Sasha is friendly and personable and provided homegrown suggestions about local spots to check out. We were quite comfy in our air conditioned room. Easy to get to, clean, lots to do/see nearby. Also their dog Jax is super friendly and totally adorable, and we liked the Marvel posters in the room :)

Sasha was a great host! My boyfriend and I stayed at his place for 11 days and it was great. The room is very spacious and the apartment is very close to the subway, Central Park, and lots of stores and restaurants. Sasha was very helpful and showed us the area while we walked with his dog. His wife Vika was also very nice and made the best tea and pies. If we every get the opportunity to go back to New York, we would definitely stay with Sasha.
A great location, convenient to the subway and to Central Park/ the riverfront.

We had a really great week staying with Sasha and his wife. They made us feel very welcome from the start and gave us tips for exploring the city, aswell as taking us to Jacobs Pickles, a great local restaurant. The room was very clean and as described, so too was the bathroom. The location is perfect for exploring New York, with the subway only a 2 min walk and Central Park 2 blocks away. We were sad to leave and would love to come back and stay there again.
It was a pleasure meeting Sasha and his wife. The apartment is ideally located on the UWS and allowed us to easily visit friends.

We could not have asked for a better first airbnb experience than we had with Sasha. He greeted us right on time, took us for a tour of his neighborhood, and was more than welcoming. His flat is clean and cozy, and not to mention in the best location near the park, tons of restaurants and the subway. Sasha even let us leave our bags behind as we had a late flight the day of our check out, it was a really great stay and I would definitely do it again!

Era nuestro primer viaje a NY , Sacha nos dio el alcance en la estacion del metro, lo que nos parecio un detalle muy bueno de parte suya. La habitacion muy limpia, tiene aire acondicionado, muy comoda la cama, el departamento muy bonito y perfectamente ubicado, a dos cuadras de Central Park lo que nos parecio genial, el barrio tranquilo y tiene cerca tiendas y resturantes.
Sacha y Victoria son excelentes anfitriones, nos hicieron sentir muy bien en nuestra visita.
Really great stay with Sasha. He was very accommodating, and the room was exactly as described. Sasha is a very pleasant individual to stay with!

Perfect location, nice people, adorable dog, comfortable room.. Thank you for everything, even if we haven't talked so much because of our "busy tourist's life" but it's for the next time to NY, now we know where to stay !
Sasha was remarkable.  Awesome host and wonderful life story.  His room and my stay were equally fantastic ... clean, quite, perfect location and most enjoyable.  Great experience!

I  was very pleased with my host. Building is placed close to the subway,  apartmant was decent, and room was big enough and clean.  The most important thing is that I was feeling safe during my stay.  Thank you Sasha

L'appartement correspondait bien à la description. Nous avions un espace bien à nous. Nous ne sommes pas resté beaucoup à l appartement car nous avons passé beaucoup de temps à l'extérieur mais le temps passé avec Sacha était agréable. Il nous a très bien  accueilli et nous a conseillé sur les lieux à visiter. Première expérience en chambre privée très positive.
Very hospitable and welcoming. Made the process very smooth and easy.  A great host.

Sorry for the delayed review. We had to extend our stay in Canada. Sasha was really very chatty and friendly. Sasha and his wife were wonderful hosts.  Gave us a tour re new york and  the subway. Have friends from Australia visiting new york will definitely recommend Sashas apt.
Sasha was great!  He was extremely punctual and gave us a great tour of Central Park.

What a nice stay at Sasha's apartment. We couldn't have asked for better hosts for our trip to New York. Sasha and Vicky were like family to us. The area was perfect to enjoy the city day/night. We were so sad to leave them and of course Jax their sweetest dog !!! Thanks again for everything we're going to miss you guys and Vicky's delicious apple pie of course ;)

Sasha was a great host- full of information about New York and he made us feel very welcome. We loved the location - close to the subway, supermarkets, and the closeness to Central Park was such a bonus.

We really enjoyed our stay with Sasha and his wife. The room was just as described and the location was great! Just a couple minute walk to the subway and to central park. Sasha was a wonderful host! He was very welcoming, had great knowledge about the city, and recommended some great places to eat. We would definately consider staying there again if we come back to the city!

la descripción del anuncio es correcto, la atención y servicio de Sasha es muy buena, muy atentos todo el tiempo, hasta nos acompañó a tomar el taxi el la mañana muy temprano. El lugar esta muy bien ubicado en una zona tranquila a una cuadra del Metro numero 1.
Everything was exactly as advertised.  Pleasant host.  Will return.

The apartment is located in a very good place, near the subway station and easy to go to everywhere. There are good restaurants and shops nearby. Sacha and Victoria were wonderful: nice and kind. I feel very comfortable staying with them. Thank you!

Notre séjour chez Sasha était très agréable. Nous avons pu communiquer facilement et son accueil a été très chaleureux.
Il n'a pas hésité à nous donner les bonnes adresses New Yorkaises et à partager quelques moments avec nous !
La description de la chambre correspondait parfaitement à ce qui est donné sur le site (propre et agréable quoi que un peu bruyante mais c'est le propre de NYC). Nous avions même notre salle de bain privative.
Agréablement surprise par le quartier qui est très vivant (plein de bons restos et de magasins hipster), central Park est à 5 minutes à pieds de plus le quartier est très bien desservi en transports (10 minutes de la 5th avenue) 
Nous recommandons vivement l'appartement de Sasha et nous y retournerons avec plaisir !

Great stay with Sasha. Good location near to the subway and out of the hustle and bustle of the centre but only 15 mins away. Very accommodating and nothing was too much trouble for them. Wish I could have stayed longer and had more time to get to know them better. If I return to NYC I will definitely be staying here. Thank you.

Best first experience with Airbnb! Sasha was a great host and the accommodations were as described on the listing. We had everything we needed for a great stay and the location was so convenient to midtown. We had a crazy/busy 24 hour stay and Sasha made us feel right at home for the short time we were there. Highly recommend plus there is a sweet dog to hang out with!!

To the room: The location is just perfect, so many possibilities for lunch and brunch. Central Park and Time Square reachable by foot, 
Subway station just 3 mins away.
the bed is so comfortable and everything is so clean. We felt like home... SO HOME that we took the keys with us (Hope you they reached you already...sorry again :D)
JUST PERFECT!

To Sasha and Vikki: YOU ARE AMAZING! We had so luck with you. both let us feel like home just from the first day. 
You have to be with them on Thanksgiving, because this guy is doing the best Turkey ever. 
We miss you so much... "Dear Alkoholiker". You are a big part of our unforgettable trip. Love & Kisses

Sasha and Vicky made me feel very welcome.
Room was clean, spacious and comfortable as was bed.
Location is great, building very nice with doorman.  Vicky even made me coffee Sunday morning!  I would stay there again.

Sasha was a very nice host. We had a good time at his place, the room was exactly as pictured and the bed way very comfi for the two of us. The location is perfect for getting to know the upper westside and the central park, nice little cafes and restaurants are nearby and you can reach the metro station very easy within 5 walking minutes. Sasha was very kind, the communication was perfect before and during our stay, he even picked us up from the metro with his cute dog and showed us some good places to eat. We would definitely recommend it!

The description of the accommodation's was very accurate. The host Sasha is an absolutely amazing person. His dog Jax is just as wonderful and his wife was very fun and hospitable, always asking if we would like some coffee or tea. Sasha helped us get fast seating as a popular local eater, willingly toured us around central park and other areas, and all around exceeded our expectations. He helped with directions and recommendations as this was our first time really touring the city. The neighborhood is fantastic and there are dogs EVERYWHERE! We were in puppy heaven (we always miss our dogs when on vacation). It is also very conveniently placed by the 1 line. :-) All around we plan to definitely use Sasha again next time we are in the city.

The room was a spacious and comfortable. Sasha and his wife Victoria were both extremely warm, kind, and accommodating. I felt very comfortable staying here and would recommend it to anyone new to New York City like I was.
Sasha is a very friendly and helpful host. Privacy was a plus. I would recommend him to anyone.
Sasha is a very good host. He's got s lovely house and if you like dogs you will love his dog. We had a great stay in New York and the localization of the apartment makes everything easier.

Sasha and Victoria welcomed us and they were so kind! Sasha took us to Central Park with his dog, Jax. We had really good time during the stay. He also introduced his favourite restaurant to us, and the owner (his friend) treated us so very well that we enjoyed not only atmosphere but also dishes we had that night. Thank you Sasha and Victoria!!
I really liked the location. Really close to metro and the central park. The host was also very kind :) It was a really cozy place to stay in.

My husband and I were fortunate to find such a wonderful host in Sasha.  The area in which the flat is located is phenomenal; just west of Central Park, and between two subway stations that link to many parts of the city and its five Burroughs.  The accommodations are quaint and fitting for the traveler who will bask in the many sites and sounds of the city that never sleeps.  With great host with a kind temperament, and a place that puts the action of the city accessible at your leisure, makes this economical shared flat an ideal place for your visit in NYC.

The hosts were great! Very hospitable, friendly, and helpful. The owners' dog was friendly. 
The location of the apartment is wonderful; just one block away from Broadway and two blocks from Central Park.

Sasha met me at the nearby subway stop with his well-behaved dog, and we chatted during the short walk to his apartment. The private bedroom was comfortable and street noise was minimal. I enjoyed my brief stay and Sasha and his wife made me feel welcome.

Spacious, clean & bright bedroom.  Comfy bed & great location.  Two bathrooms, nice.  Sasha was a great host.  He met me in front of the building, showed me around & served  Cognac.  Jax, his dog became my instant buddy.
Sasha was very accommodating and made some suggestions about where to eat in the area.  The room was as in the picture.  The location was very suitable for me.

Fantastic place. Sahasha and his partner were fantastic. Very helpful and they gave us the privacy that we need it. Defenetly the place to stay. We had to leave very early and we couldn't say good bye and thanks a lot to make us feel like at home

Sasha and Viktoriya are unusually cosmopolitan warm and hospitable.  This is a welcoming apartment with great charm  - from the wonderful antiques to the  interesting hosts delightful conversational range and skill to the most endearing of dogs.   You are made  to feel at home.  Thank you too Sasha for introducing me to a great new comic. This was my first Airbnb experience and it could not have been better.  The room, spacious, clean and comfortable, with a great bed and plenty of light situated one block from the subway between two parks.  There is privacy here too if you wish in this  fascinating large Upper West Side apartment.  Perfect!

Both Sasha and Viktoriya are really nice people and vey very good hosts. The room was exactly as described, finding the flat was super easy and the whole neighborhood was nice and safe. I will look for them again if I make it to New York!

Great place. Beautiful apartment with a cosmopolitan air. Met our expectations. Very convenient location for walking and/or getting to public transportation-metro/bus. Great neighborhood. Both Sasha and his wife Vicky were very friendly,  welcoming and accommodating. Sasha met us outside the metro stop and we all walked along with his very friendly well behaved dog Jax. We appreciated Sasha's conversations with us although we didn't spend much time in the apartment. The room is quiet and has plenty of light and pleasant decor. The bed is very comfortable. We would stay there again next time.
Sasha and Victoria both friendly and kindhearted. The dog is so qute and do not hurt people. This location is convenient to everywhere, room quiet and clear.

I had a great time staying at Sasha's! He was super helpful in giving me directions and suggestions. His apartment is also really close to two subway stops which was also really useful for traveling around the city. If I am ever in the city again and need a place to crash, I would definitely come back to Sasha's!
Sasha met me when I arrived and was very welcoming.  Showed me the ropes of the apartment and gave me pointers on local info.  Very pleasant guy.

Sasha, his wife Victoria and their dog Jax were absolutely amazing!!! Very nice, friendly and always willing to help Sasha even picked us up from the airport and showed us around. Their apartment was super clean and comfortable and is located in a very safe area that I'm sure anyone will fall I love with. They are very good hosts who even cooked for us and their dog is very friendly and lovable. Thank you for making us feel so welcome!!!
Sasha & Victoria were nice and friendly hosts. Everything was OK.
Excellent house and host! looking forward to coming back

Sasha & Viktoriya are excellent hosts and their apartment is in a great location in Upper Manhattan, great accessibility to the rest of the island. Sasha is intelligent and charismatic. I enjoyed listening to his story as a Russian immigrant and his experience serving in the US Air Force and his travels around the world. Jax is their very friendly dog, a wonderful part of the home. It was awesome to be back in New York and I was fortunate to have the opportunity to be hosted by Sasha.

The apartment was well located on the upper west side near the subway. Sasha was very friendly and hospitable, and he came and met us at the subway stop and offered us suggestions on where to go. The room was fine but not great and the bed was uncomfortable and squeaky because it had some sort of plastic covering. The house smelled like the dog.  Though the part of the experience that turned us off the most was that we were quietly talking in our room at night and we were shushed and told to be quiet because her mother was sleeping. We were told that there was no curfew and then from that point on we didn't feel comfortable in the house.

Sacha et sa femme Victoria sont absolument adorables!!! L'appart est très central, très bien situé, propre, et nos hôtes ont tout fait pour qu'on se sente à l'aise. Ils nous ont donné toutes les indications touristiques possibles, pour une arrivée à NY, ça a été génial!!
Sasha was a wonderful and friendly host. The room itself is just as advertised. A nice, clean apartment in a great neighborhood. 10/10 would recommend.

Värden var väldigt hjälsam. Han mötte mig vid närmsta tunnelbanestation och hade gett tips på hur jag skulle ta mig dit från flygplatsen. Sasha och hans fru var mycket vänliga och lätta att ha att göra med under hela vistelsen. Kvarteret kändes tryggt att vara i även sent på kvällen. Nattetid störde trafiken en aning, i övrigt var allt bra!
Great place to stay for exploring Manhattan! Great location, nice room, and very welcoming people! My friend and I very much enjoyed our stay with Sasha and Victoria (and Jax of course!)
My first Airbnb experience. Sasha and his wife were my first time great hosts! They behave personally and made your stay rocks. I'd recommend their offerings on Airbnb.

Sasha was kind enough to pick us up at the subway station and walked with us to his apartment. A very kind and hospitable man. We stayed there for four nights and didn't see him and his wife much during our stay because we were in town most of the time. The apartment was okay, but not very clean. The dog was well-behaved and playful, but his hairs were all-over. The location is very good! Nice safe neighborhood, lots of restaurants nearby, super close to the subway and 2 blocks to central park. The price was decent as well.

My cousin and I were looking for a place to stay for a couple of days at the last minute and we were so lucky to have found this listing! Sasha was very quick with his replies and was very accommodating. He was very friendly and had the cutest dog. The room was perfect for two people and it was very quiet, in a nice neighborhood with plenty of great coffee shops and restaurants in walking distance.  We really felt like were home. We were sad to have only stayed a couple of days but definitely recommend him!

Although my trip to NYC this time was short, I couldn't have asked for a better place to lay my head. Sasha's room was exactly perfect for my short stay - comfortable bed with good pillows, cold A/C, warm shower and right around the corner from the Metro. I'm only sad I didn't get more time to chat with Sasha, his lovely wife and their adorable dog! I felt very safe and welcome, and on the last morning, I got a lovely cup of coffee with some Russian chocolates. I'd love to stay here again.

Perfect location, really close to several subway routes. Nice room, looks exactly the same as on the photos.
As concerning hosts, very friendly family, answering all possible questions and able to help you with anything. And their dog is just adorable!

Gutes Apartment in sehr guter Lage. Mit der U-Bahn sehr gut erreichbar und man ist schnell zu Fuss im Central Park und mit der U-Bahn kann man Downtown fahren. Sasha war sehr nett und hilfsbereit und der Hund ist auch sehr freundlich. Er ist sehr gut erzogen und man muss auf jeden Fall keine Angst vor ihm haben

Really good location- very easy access to subway and therefore whole city. 
Very friendly and helpful hosts
Sasha was so helpful and kind. Not only did he show us around his area of the town, he brought us to Jacob's Pickles which was AMAZING. Highly recommend Sasha and his wife. Very nice and helpful!
Sasha is welcoming and easy-going. The location is very nice and convenient. Our stay was pleasant.

Great location! Great host! Sasha was very helpful and more than welcoming. The place is quiet and the area is nice, safe and not too noisy. Close access to metro makes it easy to get anywhere in Manhattan in no time. We would go back anytime!
Jax is an amazingly quiet and friendly dog :-)

Très accueillants, sympathiques et disponibles, en ayant eu l'occasion de discuter avec Sasha et sa femme. Logement exactement comme sur les photos, très proche de la ligne 1 pour aller au centre de Manhattan (ou pour monter sur Harlem). Je suis resté 5 nuits, tout s'est très bien passé ! Je retournerai là-bas sans hésiter !

I had a great time at Sasha's place .
Santa greeted me and gave me some tips on the neighborhood and then I hardly saw him or his beautiful wife after that! ( But when I did they were always charming and welcoming). Nice neighborhood -be sure to visit the Sturgeon King a half a block away!
Sasha and his wife are very friendly. He was very helpful and gave us very good advice about New York. His place is very convenient to public transportation.

We had a great stay in NYC at Sasha's and Victoria's, the place was very convenient and 2 blocks away from the subway. The hosts were very open and helpful when asking for recomendations or directions.
Definitely we would stay again!
Thank you guys!
Great location in the UWS - close to the subway, Central Park, and great restaurants and bars. Very welcoming, easy-going, and kind hosts. Highly recommended!
Perfect location and great hospitality!

Accoglienza perfetta e massima disponibilità, assolutamente consigliato, non è proprio in centro ma è molto vicino alla fermata della metro.
Grazie a Sasha per l'ospitalità.
Alla prossima occasione!

Gabot
Sasha was an awesome host.  Always making sure I am comfortable and feel at home.  We also had great conversations.  Would definitely love to stay again.

Sasha was great. Very welcoming and fun to talk to. I enjoyed spending time with him and his suggestions regarding the city were spot on.  The area surrounding his apartment is awesome. Great bars and great food. The room was clean and comfortable. Enjoyed my stay and will definitely stay there again in the future.

Everything was good. Location and clean room, tour information, great hospitality.
If I go to NY again, I'd like to make a reservation again.
Quick answers, clear communication,  fantastic location,  safe neighbourhood, friendly atmosphere, lovely wife and dog. Totally worth choosing Sasha's place!

I really enjoyed staying at Sasha's apartment - he was very accommodating and let me check-in earlier than usual. Sasha and his wife were very friendly and made me feel at home although it was a short stay. The apartment is located very close to the subway and it is clean and spacious. Would definitely want to stay again if I get the chance to visit NYC next time!

We (a girlfriend and me) stay for 4 nights/ 5 days at Sashas apartment. The location of the apartment is pretty good. You have only 3 minutes walking to the metro station of lines 1,2,3 who drives really good for typical tourist attractions. Also you need only 5-10min walk to the central park. Sashas room was similar as on the pictures. The room has only a desk, a little site board and the bed, but this was enough for our purposes. The room was very clean and we got towels of Sasha. Further he and his wife and also his dog are really nice and helpful and Sasha told us about really nice not typical tourist places in the City. Our Facit, we would everytime again stay at Sashas apartment!

Отличное место расположения, рядом две ветки метро, аптека, кафешки. 
Комната очень чистая, Саша и Вика, а так же пес Джастин, очень приветливые, милые, интересные, дружелюбные. 
Спасибо большое!!! Обязательно рекомендую всем!!!

Sasha was very welcoming in our stay. He is a very down to earth guy that respects privacy but is also willing to give many suggestions about the city. Great location. Felt safe no matter the time and was close to a subway to get anywhere in the city.

Sasha's place is perfect!!! After staying in a hotel for a week it felt great to stay somewhere that felt just like home.  The apartment is super clean and convenient and Sasha is a warm and kind host.  Don't hesitate to stay here :) this has been my favorite airbnb stay to date.

La estadía en la casa de Sasha fue estupenda, Victoria divina, la mamá increíble, Jakx una mascota adorable.
La verdad todo perfecto, la habitación súper limpia y acogedora. De hecho le pedimos favor dejar las maletas porque nuestro vuelo salía más tarde y no tuvieron inconveniente. 
Muy amables y serviciales en todo.
Sin dudas volveríamos a hospedarnos en su casa!
The room was cozy and in a great neighborhood.  Lots of good food in the area and the train being two blocks away was a bonus. It was easy to communicate with the host and we really enjoyed the stay.

The room wad exactly as described. The location was perfect to explore the city. Very nice and safe neigbourhood! Sasha and his wife were very good hosts and they always answered our questions and provided us with information. Thanks a lot we would  book it again!

Sasha was very friendly and so communicative. He gives us all the informations as possible. 
The room was perfect, very clean and the bed very comfortable. 
Him and his wife were perfect and that it allowed us to have an amazing time in NY ! 
The location was very nice to : close to the metro, and Central Park. 
A big thank to them and Jack the dog

Sasha and Vikki were excellent hosts and we couldn't have enjoyed our vacation as much as we did without their companionship. The night we arrived Sasha immediately made us feel at home, welcoming us with open arms and personally walking us over to a great nearby restaurant (check out Jacob's Pickles!). Along with their personality, Sasha and Vikki's home provided the perfect space for our base of operations, boasting spacious living quarters, a lovely bed, and ample storage. The neighborhood was also ideal; we had everything we needed within walking distance, and two nearby subway stops for when we wanted to go downtown. We highly recommend this apartment to anyone spending some time in New York! You won't regret it.
Sasha welcomed me as if I was family. The home was very comfortable and it was a very nice place to return to after a day in the city.
Quality people offering a simple and reliable place to stay. This is not a five a five star resort, just a simple place to sleep.
Excellent location and great hosts. I could not have asked for something better in this short stay in NYC.

Had a very pleasant stay at Sasha and his wife. The location of the apartment is great too for exploring the city.  And special thanks for staying up that late and welcoming me so friendly after my flight was delayed that much.

Sasha was great - very friendly, had all necessities available, and checked in with us often but not obtrusively. His "guard dog" was just as sweet as could be; we wanted to take him home with us! We would definitely recommend him for any guests wanting to explore the city.

Sasha and his wife were excellent hosts! They let my friend and I check in early, and when we arrived the room was very clean and they even gave us a key for our door. The room was clean, and the apartment was very close to subway stations and restaurants. Sasha was very pleasant to talk too and was very helpful in suggesting things to do in the city. I would recommended his place to anyone!
Sasha is a great guy and I had a lot of fun staying at his place. He was always ready to help out with getting around the city. Added bonus of staying at his place was playing with his adorable dog!

Sacha et sa femme sont des hôtes super. Ils ont été accueillants des le début. 
La chambre est parfaite, le lit très confortable, un bel espace. 
La situation de l'immeuble est excellente!
Je recommande vivement !
Would come again!

Sasha's place was nice. He was also great at communication as said previously in other reviews. My friend and I got in at 7am and he even let us drop off our bags once we got there, so we had time to explore. One thing to note the door is a bit of a pain, but other than that it was a nice stay.

This was a great cozy little room for me and my fiancé in a fantastic location on the Upper West Side of Manhattan. Sasha was extremely friendly, showed us around the apartment and gave us food recommendations when we arrived. I ended up having to do some work during my stay and the apartment was quiet and comfortable for that. There was a table with two chairs and a full bed in the room. Keep in mind you are sharing space and a bathroom/shower with another couple. Plus their adorable dog Jackson, who was a welcome added bonus. Would stay here again!

Very accommodating hosts in an easy going environment. Will
definitely stay again and again.
Great location, and Sasha is a very friendly and accommodating host. Vika was very kind, too, and their dog Jax is lovely.

Great hospitality, clean comfortable bed in a cozy room for my sister and I. Subway and restaurants close by. Sasha was super nice and accessible, while also giving us our space. He allowed us leave our bags after checking out and come back later that evening to get them.

Sasha's place was one of the best I've stayed at through Airbnb! My friend wanted to visit NYC, and Sasha made us both feel at home in their apartment. The only minus is that we could only stay for one night - I would have loved the opportunity to talk with him and his family more.
Also, DEFINITELY take his recommendation for Jacob's Pickles. It is divine!
Espetacular place and host. Very quiet neighborhood but next to subway, lots of good restaurants and very close to Central Park! Sasha is a very nice person, always ready to help!
If you want to find a home away from home in New York - Sasha's place is a gem. I am definitely coming back. Loved the stay and even more - the company!
Nice bedroom in a good location at a very affordable price. Near central park and lots of famous museums.
I had a very comfortable stay at Sasha's, would highly recommend it. Perfect to visit the Natural History museum and Central Park.

Location was great and host was awesome! Had a pleasant experience. The home was very convenient to the subway, and a walk away from Central Park. Can't get anything better for the price and location as this one! Definitely recommend this place if you need a good place to stay in the middle of NYC.

Sasha was very accommodating, polite, helpful, and an overall great host! He was even willing to put us up an extra night when our train got canceled due to the store! Thank you again, Sasha! Come visit us in Texas!

Sasha was extremely friendly and flexible. Shasa is not only a great host but great guy to hang out with. The room was clean and the bed was comfy.  The next time I am in New York I would definitely stay with him again.

Sasha is a great guy! We had lots of fun with him and he gave us great tips for our stay in New York. 
1 minute walk to the subway...5 mins to Central Park by foot.
It's a small room with only a bed, a table + two chairs and a dresser...if you don't need much, it's the perfect location for you.
We had a blast!
Sasha was a very good host. I highly recommend his place.
Fantastic location to get around NYC! Sasha welcomed me like an old friend, and Jax the dog was very friendly. Recommended spot to stay in NYC.

This was our first Airbnb experience and it was unforgettable! Sasha was very knowledgable about everything around the city and his hospitality really made us feel right at home. His adorable dog was an added bonus.
Awesome location and very friendly host.
Great place right near the subway. Sasha is a great host!
Sasha and his wife were very helpful during our stay and helped us to feel comfortable.

Sasha and his wife are very nice, the room matches the description perfectly and the location is amazing, a block or so from central park and the subway right out of the doorstep. Best price I could find in Manhattan!
I can only recommend this place. Very nice hosts and great value you get
Absolutely wonderful hosts and location. Sasha and his wife were very accommodating and flexible with checking in/out. Would recommend to anyone, especially if this is your first time using airbnb.
Sasha y Victoria son atentos. Su perrito es hermoso y ama a todos. El departamento está muy bien ubicado y puedes llegar fácilmente a Downtown.

The location of Sasha's place is fantastic. The room is very simple but completely serviceable. The room is on a busy well-lit street and it is very loud at night. I would definitely recommend bringing a mask to sleep in if light bothers you as the curtains are sheer.

Sasha and his wife were very easy to communicate with and overall my stay was good. The check in and check out process was a breeze and It was nice to explore a part of New York I've never stayed in before.  Highly recommend this place if you're on a budget and don't need a lot of frills.

A convenient option with good access to the city. Seemed to be a lot of people in the apartment - so sharing the bathroom was a challenge. Communication was a bit of a challenge, but the room was simple, clean, and a great option for a night. Hosts were very nice and welcoming.
Great location, friendly owners and super cute dog! We had a great first airbnb experience
The location is excellent. 2 mins walk to the subway. Sasha and his wife are very nice. They made arrangement for my early check in and late chevk out. Their dog is so cute and quiet.
Great location and hosts. I would stay here again.

There is the best location for travelers, near Central Park and Museum of Natural History. Sasha and Viktoria are very friendly and always ready for help. The room and restroom are confortable and clean. Very reconmmendable.
Nice clean room with a great location, close to a metro station. The host is really friendly and can give you good tips what to see and do in the city. Nice dog
Perfect location and wonderful hosts! The room is basic and simple but there is no need for more then that.

We love the stay, very nice neighborhood, lot a things to do it around. Sasha and his wife are very friendly. There is a nice shower and nice bedroom.
We love they dog Jack.
It's a very nice place to stay and save some money. 
I recommend to all.

The host couple was very friendly and gentle.He said to us that you can make yourself at home, so we could relax. The dog was also very cute and so smart.
If you are  women and worried about stay, you don't have to do that Because they live with a couple.
I am glad to stay again when I go to New York.

..Simple room with A/C. Shared bathroom. Bldg in quiet neighborhood even for weekdays. Close to metro and bus stop with delis and food shops within quick walking distance. Sasha is kind and considerate making sure I had the correct metro card. Attentive and gives you space. Wonderful sweet dog. Washer/dryer available but must bring $5 to access card machine. Very greatful sasha avails his house at a great price. Definitely recommend this location for the non partier !!

The location is very nice to go to downtown, and close to the famous restaurant and bagel shop.
We also could explore new NY appeals.
Sasha est très présent pour conseiller ses invités, ce qui est très appréciable et évite de perdre du temps.
Great location, satisfactory bedroom, and Sasha is a congenial, helpful host.

Sasha is a great host and took care for all we needed.
Apartment was perfect for our needs.
Looking forward to staying with them again.
Really a good location away from crowds and near restaurants. The room is clean, tidy and in a simple style.

Sasha's place provided exactly what we wanted. We needed a safe place to sleep after traveling around NYC during the day and early mornings. The place was super close to a metro stop, and then we took the 1 line to most of our destinations. Also...highly recommend getting a citibike! We had fun biking around Central Park and the city for a bargain!
Sasha was a super friendly and helpful host, and it was super easy to get around the city from his place.

we had a great experience and Sasha, Victoria and jack were super nice and helpful. We had a lot of privacy and felt very comfortable. I wish we had some time to hangout with them. Definitely would recommend them to anyone!

Had a great stay at Sasha's! The place is simple but adequate and clean; and Sasha and his wife were most welcoming showing me the neighbourhood and helping me with my luggage. Lots of places to eat and close to Central Park and subways.
Great location and great person and great dog!!
Very welcoming and helpful hosts!

I liked the stay with Sasha, his wife (Vika) and their dog Jacks. He is a very friendly dog which adores cuddles. Sasha and Vika were helpful and nice. The location is great : there r Starbucks, a lot of restaurants, public transit stops and Central Park is about 5 minutes walk and there r raccoons there!
Perfect localization. With metro number 1 really close. Sasha and his wife are great hostess and their dog, Jacks, is amazing! I trully recommend!!

Sasha was a great host during our stay in NYC. He was very friendly and helpful with directions and suggestions of where to go. Our room was very clean with a comfy bed and air conditioned. It is a great base to explore Manhattan from!!
Sasha is so nice and helpful, the place is so convenient, only blocks from the metro station. It’s easy to get to the Central Park. Definitely choose this next time to New York!

The apartment is located a two blocks from Central Park, you have near the subway, shops, restaurants, excellent ubication. Sacha and Victoria are great persons who cares about their tenants, always giving their best.
Great value in a perfect location. Quiet room. Comfortable bed. Would stay there again

Sasha, Viktoryia and Jax are wonderful hosts! We really had a great stay at their  place!! Sasha is super friendly and nice. He and Vika were all the time trying to help us! I got a flu in my first day there and they made me a hot tea with a bit of chocolate  (it was so nice from them!!). We couldn't feel better at their apartment. As Sasha says, we felt at home at their home! This was an amazing experience!! We really appreciate their hospitality, good conversation and laughs! Thanks for all, guys! You are the best!

P.S: By the way, Sasha's apartment is situated in great and convenient place. It's only two blocks from Central Park, one block from subway and you are near to so many shops, nice restaurants, coffee shops, etc.
Great location!
This place and host is fantastic. Really close to Central Park and subway. Host is really friendly and helpful. Highly recommended.

I appreciated my stay in Sasha’s apartment but even more his welcoming and our discussion.
It is very well located 3 minutes to the subway station.

The location  it’s perfect ... few blocks to the subway and the Central Park in a very safe area ... Sasha is very friendly and give us very good tips to go Around to the city , good price for the area ...
If you like escape room this crib is for you.

Appartamento situato in un bel punto di Manhattan, supermercati, bar, pizzerie a portata di mano. Metropolitana a 2 minuti a piedi l'unica cosa che posso dire di negativo della casa è la pulizia del bagno tutto il resto è ottimo. Sasha il padrone di casa e molto alla mano e qualsiasi problema che hai puoi chiedere tranquillamente e lui ti darà tutte le spiegazioni.

Sasha was a great host! Very friendly, hospitable, funny, and makes sure that you have everything you need. The place is a great value for a prime location on the uws and the room is spacious and tidy.

name: Sun-Filled Apartment 1 Minute From Subway
summary: Super sun-filled, two bedroom apartment. When guest visit, they stay in one bedroom which has a full size bed. The 2nd bedroom in the apartment is my bedroom. Guest with multiple visitors also have access to a super comfy queen size futon bed located in the living room (as pictured in the listing).  Washer and dryer in the apartment. Walking distance to Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park   My apartment is located 1 minute away from multiple public transit options.
space: Sun-filled Home Walking distance to Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park Washer and dryer in unit Cozy and welcoming common  area Full kitchen access Comfortable beds Great shower pressure Two minute walk to the subway Access to many bus routes Free coffee and tea available And I might even surprise you with some fresh home baked goods.
description: Super sun-filled, two bedroom apartment. When guest visit, they stay in one bedroom which has a full size bed. The 2nd bedroom in the apartment is my bedroom. Guest with multiple visitors also have access to a super comfy queen size futon bed located in the living room (as pictured in the listing).  Washer and dryer in the apartment. Walking distance to Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park   My apartment is located 1 minute away from multiple public transit options.
