Guest have access to a Sun-filled Home, washer/dryer in unit, Wifi, tea and coffee,  Cozy and welcoming common  area, Full kitchen, Comfortable be
neighborhood_overview: Crown Heights is one of Brooklyn treasures. It's the home to many diverse communities sharing one neighborhood. Filled with hip new bars and restaurants, ethnic cultures, parks, gardens, museums... Crown Heights has it all.
notes: My airbnb guest bedroom has a full size bed that can host up to two people. Upon request, the living room has a super comfortable queen size futon bed that can host up to two more people.
transit: Getting around is super convenient. My apartment is just a minute walk to/from multiple subway lines. The apartment is also located near multiple city bus lines...
access: Guest have access to a Sun-filled Home, washer/dryer in unit, Wifi, tea and coffee,  Cozy and welcoming common  area, Full kitchen, Comfortable beds, and Great shower pressure.
interaction: Who am i? I'm a busy college student getting a degree in social work while also working as an ABA therapist. As a airbnb host I have been enjoying welcoming guest from all over the world. I love the idea that I can open my home to travelers and allow my guess the opportunity to feel like a real locals. I live in bedroom #1 unless I'm traveling.
house_rules: Respect the apartment. Quiet time after 11pm out of respect to the neighbors.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I live in this apartment and I'm happy to share it with people visiting Brooklyn. Its a cozy apartment within walking distance to many Brooklyn Hot Spots including: Brooklyn Public Library, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Prospect Park, Brooklyn Art Museum, Brooklyn Childrens Museum, Jewish Childrens Museum, and Franklin Avenue with many fine restaurants and bars. There is so much going on in this crown heights area.

reviews.comments: Cozy room, very close to the 2 and 5 trains. Made for a productive stay!

Rivka was an absolute pleasure to stay with. She was very kind and welcoming throughout my whole stay, and the location of her place is beyond ideal, being only a block away from the 2 and 5 trains for Manhattan access. I would absolutely recommend her as a reliable host. For the location and comfort, her asking price is certainly a great deal. If you need a cozy place to stay while in Brooklyn, this is an excellent option. Very satisfied with my stay.

Rivka's home was in a very convenient location to a subway that was literally round the corner so that we could easily get to and from the city. Her home was exactly as described, and Rivka would always get back to any questions we had more or less right away. The only thing was carrying our heavy luggage up many flights of stairs.

Rivka is the most charming host and she has a great apartment. Highest recommendations. 

The apartment is in one of the last authentic neighbourhoods in Brooklyn. There's good coffee around the corner and great beer a few blocks north. 

It's a few flights up, but worth it. The apartment is warm and cozy. The bed is comfortable and the water pressure is surprisingly good for NY.  

On the social side, Rivka made Shakshouka the first night, and brought me along to an engagement party. I had a great time.

Rivka is very kind and careful host. Home was exactly as described, it was clean and room was cozy and nice. Neighborhood is good, near to small markets and supermarket and close to the 2 & 5 subway station.
The last day she cooked some cookies and unfortunately I could not take some of them with me.

A small room in a sunny, and somewhat shabby apt. The bed was comfy and you have lots of bedding to choose from. Rivka was nice. For some reason she posts a photo of her own (much nicer) bedroom in the ad, which seems a bit odd, as it has nothing to do with guest's space.

R. ist eine herzliche, freundliche, hilfsbereite, unkomplizierte Gastgeberin. Das Appartement ist nett und liegt in einem angenehmen Stadtviertel von Brooklyn. Manhattan ist mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln gut zu erreichen, etwa 20 min. Sehr empfehlenswert und immer wieder herzlich gerne!!!

Rivka's place is a perfect spot to stay in while working in NYC. Close to trains and buses. Near Prospect Park. Rivka is a wonderful host, friendly, attentive and a great baker that left delicious goodies to snack on.
We needed a place quickly and Rivka responded immediately and got our room ready on very short notice. She was very flexible and very accommodating!

A comfy little apartment in a very convenient part of Brooklyn, one block from several subway lines. Wish we'd had more time to explore prospect Park. 

Clean, tidy, and good value.  Rivka was extremely helpful and friendly.
Good wifi near to subway value for money

Rivka is such a nice and warm person! She is so kind to us and showed me lots of things if we need help. And she prepared for coffee when we left early morning!
The room was clean, tidy and cozy. But the heater in the living room was a bit noisy so that I couldn't sleep well but I could sleep well in the bedroom.(This often happens in New York though, and my friends could sleep well even in the living room:))
So if you don't care about it it's a really good house to stay at, especially for long stay! You can walk to subway station within 3 minutes:)

Rivka's was one of a couple places I stayed at after moving to the City while I was still looking for an apartment, and hers was certainly my favorite. Carrying my bags up the stairs was a bit of a chore, but from there the stay was nothing but pleasant. Rivka's very knowledgeable about the area and always had a helpful suggestion for places to check out. 
The apartment is blocks away from prime subway spots and the Brooklyn Museum and Brooklyn Public Library are only a couple stops away, if not walking distance if you don't mind a trek.
I loved staying with her and highly recommend it for anyone looking for a comfortable place to stop for either a trip to the city or moving transition.

There isn't much more to say without repeating myself.
Rivka's a wonderful host. I had to extend my stay an extra night and she was wonderfully flexible about the whole thing. Thanks ever so much for having me~

Serious, tidy and friendly; definitely a five stars host!  The host was very well organized and was around for all of our questions.  We had a terrific time at her place and we definitely are looking forward to coming back again.
Rivka was a great host! The bed was comfortable and perfect after a long day of walking. Easy access to the metro to get around.
Great host. Great neighborhood. Clean, quiet, and safe. Post marathon the host let us come back and shower before we head out, and she had freshly made cookies!! Highly recommend.

Rivka is a great host! She's very welcoming and friendly. The room's neat, clean and comfy. The apartment is located in a nice neighborhood and is close to the subway stations. Brooklyn Museum and Botanical Gardens are at a walkable distance, and so are restaurants and bars. Today, when I was leaving, I was pleasantly surprised, when Rivka offered freshly baked cookies! 

Overall, it was a delightful experience. Highly recommended.

Rivka was an excellent host. We unfortunately did not get to meet her however, she was extremely accomidating and had 2 beds made up when we arrived in addition to some cookies! We had one small issue getting in however, it was quickly resolved and Rivka was very responsive. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed including some extra blankets and towels. The area is pretty centrally located. We went to a show in Prospect Park and walked both ways ~20 minutes. Overall, we had a great stay and would recomend it to anyone! Thank you Rivka!

-Emma

I contacted Rivka looking for a same day booking as I'd been let down by a previous booking. She was so sweet about it and only asked that I give her a couple of hours to get it ready.
She was so welcoming and showed me on some local maps of the best way to get around and she was so enthusiastic about the local area which was so nice!
If you're looking to get into city, it's perfect t. Direct 2 or5 trains into Manhattan with 3 nearby as well.
The flat is lovely and the bed was super comfy; I slept so well every night. Rivka even provides tea and good coffee and even baked a yummy pastry which I could help myself too!
I would 100% stay again and am looking forward to exploring more of the area!

Very homey feel, very safe room to stay in. Awesome experience! Not to mention our host Rivka was the best! Very awesome easygoing person. She even sent us home with some delicious home baked cookies!!
This was a wonderful place to stay. Rivka was very accommodating and the location was less then a 5 min walk to public transit. I would definitely recommend it.
I loved space, it was just right. It looks just how it does in the pictures.
Rivka's warmth and hospitality really made the stay a lovely one. And the bedroom was super spacious and comfortable. Highly recommended!

She is  a suprehost. I travel a lot with airbnb and she was the best. Rivka help me a lot and give me a good tips where to go. She was so nice and i had so much to talk with her. The room is in good size and very clean. The bed is so comfort. I was feel like home. Thank you!

Rivka was so lovely, she was very flexible with check out and let me keep my stuff at her house till 6pm when I could check into my next place. She even made delicious cookies for guests! I would highly recommend her place to stay.
Çok konuksever birisi ve sorularıma çok detaylı cevaplar veriyordu. Benimle gerçekten iyi ilgileniyordu. Teşekkür ederim Rivka!
Rivka place is great, I really enjoyed my time there and I will love to go back. The area is unique and quiet and the apartment is clean and confi . I had a really good and pleasant time.

A very comfortable, simple cozy setting - totally clean -the best bed I've ever slept in and the host is sweet helpful warm patient and exactly what I was looking for. I did not realize it was on the fourth floor, and had a suitcase which Rivka carried up the stairs for me. She saved me and my back.

Location was very well . Subway was very close you can use subway 2 and 5 so you can go easily everywhere rivka was helpful she gave more information about the new york I recommend this home strongly:)
We had a great time staying with Rivka! She gave us fantastic advice about using the subway to get around town and overall provided a wonderful experience.

My wife, daughter and I stayed with Rivka during our trip to New York. We were not sure how we would feel staying in the same apartment as the host but Rivka is so friendly and accommodating that we felt like were staying with an old friend. The place was clean and in a great location.  Look forward to visiting again.
The location is great, its only 2mins walk to the subway station, which is very easy for us to get to Manhattan and many tourist attractions. Rivka is also a very nice host. I recommend her place.

There are two things i wanna to add. The apartment is on the forth floor and there is no elevator, so if you have many luuages you  need to consider it. And i suggest you to bring a earplug when you sleep for the reason that the sound of the heating raditor is loud when it is working in the midnight.
Everything else are fine and the owner is very kind and nice too. She cooked some delicious cookies for my friend and i.
Appartement agréable avec hôte très accueillante! Proche métro

Excellent place to rest in Brooklyn and enjoy NYC, Highly recommend, nice quiet, affordable, dont think about it twice, Rivka is cool and would help on everything, cook for you too ! We are coming back  Greetings from Albania

Staying at Rivka's place it was amazing for us. We even forgot that it was Airbnb. Besides the perfect location, cleanness, communication and pricing Rivka is such an awesome person. We're really happy about staying over there. Also, she knows how to cook. Really. Her place is really, really well located. Literally 2mins from subway, restaurants, groceries, coffee shops and such. She has a cozy place and we felt like home.
Host is super nice, and the apartment is super convenience.
rivka was super cool and let us check in last minute. very flexible and easy going. getting there and getting in was a breeze.  the apartment's in a dope spot close to prospect park.

Staying at Rivka’s was beyond what I expected! I moved to NYC and stayed with her for over a month and a half while I was figuring out permanent housing. She provided the most hospitable situation I have ever encountered anywhere. She treats you like you are staying at a close family members house and goes above and beyond to make you feel comfortable. Fun conversations, movie nights, and dinners were just some of the highlights of the stay. Staying here is good for introverts and extroverts because you have the space and quiet you need but also the social interactions. I’m honestly honored to have met such a great person and I now consider Rivka an actual friend even after I left her house!

name: A Romantic Loft plus terrace  Heart of Brooklyn
summary: This is a legal, 2-family home, permitted for short-term rentals under the NY State Multiple Dwelling Law. My romantic loft (750 sq ft, 10 ft high ceilings) in a gut-renovated landmark house. It’s a loft ( not a one bedroom) big Maroccan tiled patio/terrace with a view of my garden.     Queen bed perfect for 2 guests, and two floor ‘futons' allowing for a 3rd guest. Ideally a younger adult. Beautiful kitchen. Because  allergies pets not allowed even if I love them. No smoking No parties
space: It's in a unique  multi ethnic  landmark/historic neighborhood that took me one year to find! One block away from the amazing saraghina, it's restaurant, bakery and wine bar and near bar lunatico that offers live music every evening. If you come from the country this is Brooklyn so sometimes mornings you can hear noise coming from the street because  the queen bed is by the big window. The window is triple paned and the street is not very big but we are in a city and not the country. The  guests coming from the country might notice the noice  in the morning more than city guests. It reminds me of being in Rome  as I am Italian,with it's food, fresh pasta, fresh bread. Many Italians have moved to Halsey and nearby because of Saragina s bakery, restaurant and wine bar and now the great music at bar lunatico across the street. The neighborhood, is multicultural and is just amazing in the spring summer and fall but loses its appeal in the winter as the flowers die. the A express train is a
