neighborhood_overview: This landmark section of Bedstuy  is called Stuyvisan heights and it has a lot of history and great cafes and restaurants. I especially love Saraghina s bakery, restaurant and wine bar. It is a multicultural  multi ethnic and a jazz  Neighborhood.
notes: The neighborhood is beautiful in the spring summer and fall and is the heart of airbnb but gets darker  as flowers fall and less beautiful in the winter. It's Brooklyn and you need to be aware that we are not in the upper west side of Manhattan nor in park slope. But airbnb was born here in this part of the city and you will see many foreigners walking  the streets. I love it, it's intercultural, bi racial and full of life, people Greet you as you walk. Please greet back.
transit: Yes the A express is 7/8mn walk from my house And takes you to manhattan in 15 minutes, the Village in 18 minutes and Chelsea in 20. The C local takes you to fort green and Brooklyn academy of music in ten. The bus across the street is great and takes you to fort green and downtown Brooklyn in  15. The express bus to Williamsburg around the corner will take you to Bushwick s art scene is 8 minutes and Williamsburg in 18 minutes.
access: To everything Brooklyn can offer, Bushwick and it's art scene is a six minute ride or fifteen minutes walk, park slope, botanical garden and the Brooklyn museum are reachable in a fifteen minutes shuttle train ride! Williamsburg express bus takes you from Halsey to It in 18 minutes ride. The javitz center, 15 minutes away. Saraghina, peaches george Andre, Manny  s cafe are around the corner, l antagoniste, great French bistro. All the wine bars five minutes walk from Here. Across the street Super French cafe just opened a yoga studio for children and moms, On it's way to developing adult yoga and movement classes. An Italian new bar lunatico  with live music just opened  one block up this month,for live evening music, lunch and breakfast. The subway has two lines the A express and the C lines around the corner that reach manhattan in 15 minutes, bus across  the street gets you to fort Greene and Clinton hill in ten-15 minutes and the express bus to Bushwick and Williamsburg reaches one
interaction: I was one of the first hosts in Paris  six years ago with Airbnb. I love the interaction with guests from around the world. I am Lucky, my guests are amazing and respectful.
house_rules: I expect my guests to behave as If it was their house, to be comfortable but love it as I do. Be mindful of Neighboors and keep voice and sounds lower after 10.00 pm and respect the environment! Please don't smoke inside and if you do Outside use an ashtray in the patio. Please do not use the garden nor the antique stove. No parties allowed. Enjoy. Thank you

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am an actress/artistic director living betwen New York and Paris.
I have an acting school in both cities.

reviews.comments:
Amy was a really amazing and caring host, and her flat is a beautiful and serene oasis in an up-and-coming Brooklyn neighborhood with great restaurants, like Saraghina (which also has a really cool bar) and Peaches (owned by Fort Greene's Smoke Joint with the best BBQ in the city!) and a nice cafe one block down with coffee and sandwiches. And, most important, there is a bodega with tons of great organic staples for cooking and a wine shop down the block. I lived in Fort Greene for 8 years, and I still can't believe how quiet her apartment is, so it is the perfect place to rest if you are out sightseeing all day (also really close to buses and trains) or, if you need to get work done, like me. I am a PhD student with a young child at home and needed a comfy and quiet place near great food options to work on writing my dissertation. Amy's apartment was perfect! I worked straight for 8 days at her amazing long wood table with a row of windows of light pouring in. And, after these long days of work, I cooked in Amy's beautiful kitchen and slept in the most comfy bed ever! 

This was my first time using Airbnb, and I didn't know what to expect or how everything would work. Amy was really great, and her son Yasha who lives downstairs was sweet and helpful if I needed anything. When I submitted my reservation request, Amy responded within an hour and answered all of my questions, and we talked on the phone the next day to solidify things. She was there to greet me when I checked in (with coffee and tea and fresh baked bread and chocolate!!) and met my husband and son who were dropping me off for my retreat. Everything went so smoothly, so great in fact that I have already booked her place for another writing retreat in March. 

I absolutely recommend Amy's place for work or holiday or maybe even if you just need a night to yourself.

Amy was an amazing host!
Her place is beautiful and really clean.
I had a wonderful time!!

This was my second visit at Amy's lovely flat in Bed-Stuy. It was just as beautiful and amazing as my first time. Amy is a wonderful and caring host, who offered her quiet and calm home for me to complete the writing of my dissertation. I have been working for seven years in this project and was able to finish the final parts and turn it in to my committee only because I had such a soothing and inspirational home to work from. And after, my husband and I celebrated with dinner and drinks down the street at Saraghina, which has the best gin & tonic in the universe!! 

Thank you, Amy, I could not have done it without you!!
Amys Apartment ist just beautiful and I can only recommend to stay there-simply perfect! Thank you so much, Amy!

This comfortable first-floor studio, conveniently located near both the A and C subway lines in a lovely section of Bed-Stuy, was perfect for our recent 8-night stay. This light-filled apartment has all the charm of the older brownstones, plus the spacious feel and modern conveniences of a recently renovated building. For two people, this is a perfect spot. Small grocery stores (classic NY bodegas) are close by, as are restaurants, cafés, and a delicious bakery. Amy is a friendly and accommodating host, who graciously provided us with fresh bread and pastries on our first morning. We very much enjoyed meeting her.  We enthusiastically recommend this studio and hope to return again ourselves!

Amy est vraiment extrêmement attentionnée et dévouée. Son appartement est impeccable et très lumineux un tout petit peu trop le matin, si il fait beau et qu'on veut pinailler. Le quartier est très calme et un peu "street" mais pas dangereux. Je vous recommande vivement cet appart qui est aussi beau que sur les photos ! Encore merci Amy :)

We enjoyed every minute of our stay in Amy's loft. It is beautiful, spacious, very bright and extemely neat and well kept. 
Amy was very generous and thoughtful. She had prepared a small bed for our toddler and even had cookies for her upon our arrival. She is also very easy to get in touch with. 
There isnt much to do in close proximity to the appartment but there are 2-3 amazing restaurants and the subway is a 10 min walk. But overall the location is good and feels safe.

Amy hat uns am Tag unserer Ankunft mit frischem Brot und Tee empfangen und uns das schöne Loft gezeigt. Es ist dort alles vorhanden was man benötigt und entspricht absolut den auf Airbnb gezeigten Fotos. Die Lage des Loftes ist perfekt um die Stadt zu erkunden. Mit der nahe gelegenen Subway A ist man in ca.25 min in Manhattan. Das Loft ist wunderschön renoviert und lichtdurchflutet. Ich hätte mir gewünscht das der Lärm der Familie die darüber wohnt abends nicht so stark gewesen wäre und wenn das Loft zur Gartenseite einen Vorhang zum Abdunkeln bekommen würde. Abschließend haben wir uns sehr wohl gefühlt in Amys zu hause und würden wieder bei ihr buchen.

Nous avons passer un excellent séjour dans le loft d'Amy. Elle nous a accueilli chaleureusement, et nous a donné pleins d'informations sur le quartier. 
Le loft est très beau, très lumineux, avec tout ce dont nous avions besoins (machine à laver, lave vaisselle, machine à café,...) c'était très agréable de pouvoir y séjourner pendant 9 jours.
L'accès au métro est très rapide (5 minutes à pieds) et le quartier est très sympa.
Petit plus : elle avait prévu pour nous de quoi faire nos petits déjeuner (pain de mie, café, gâteaux, ....)
Un grand merci à Amy, en espérant peu être pouvoir revenir une prochaine fois.

Amy a été une hôte fantastique, elle a tout fait pour qu'on se sente bien et à l'aise. Le loft est comme sur les photos, très lumineux, très confortable et décoré avec gout. Nous ne savions pas à quoi nous attendre pour le quartier mais nous avons été agréablement surpris. Les voisins sont très agréables, souriants, accueillants. La quartier est jeune, mais la rue est très calme. On va très vite jusqu'à manhattan avec le métro. Définitivement, on conseille ce loft !
Great flat, conveniently located and friendly, welcoming and helpful hosts. We felt at home.
It was a grateful staying at the loft,confortable, full equiped and the atention from Amy was excelent, the place is quiet and easy for reach Manhattan !!! I hope to come back!!! Thanks!!!

I couldn't love Amy's flat more. It's beautifully decorated, very clean, and has all the conveniences of home (a dishwasher and laundry in NY? Not to mention the Netflix). 

Amy greeted us upon arrival and gave us a tour, along with helpful advice about the neighborhood and subway. We loved our stay - our trip was part work and part vacation and it suited both purposes perfectly. We hope to stay here again!

Das Apartment ist genauso wie auf den Fotos. Sehr sauber und hübsch eingerichtet. Man hat sehr viel Platz und bald wird sogar die Terrasse fertig. In der Küche ist alles vorhanden was man zum selber kochen braucht. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden das unseren Freunden empfehlen.

It was amazing staying at Amy's house. Everything perfect, location, pampering, cleaning, organizing, beautiful, well located, safe neighborhood, responds quickly. I want to thank for my best days in New York! thank you

Amy is the perfect host of a welcoming, light loft in a very friendly, leafy street. Her space is full of character and wonderfully presented. It's located brilliantly, giving you a flavour of daily Bed-Stuy life, with everything else only a tube ride away. It's the type of place that makes you linger in the morning and that you hope you'll be coming back to even long before you leave.

This is a lovely apartment with fantastic interior decoration, Amy  has put a lot of effort into making it a great and unique place to stay. Comfortable bed and really good kitchen. It's just one floor up from the street so there is good light but not too many stairs to carry your bags up. We really enjoyed the neighbourhood - there are a couple of corner shops to buy supplies (one of them selling a lot of organic food) and some really nice restaurants and cafes too, and a short walk to the subway. I would highly recommend Amy's apartment.
We loved staying in Amy's home-- it was clean, comfortable and bright. The neighborhood was great with lots of cute restaurants/cafes and easy access to Manhattan. We would stay here again!
Amy is a wonderful host. The suite is even more beautiful in person and had everything I could have needed during my stay. I was sad to leave!
Amy was so like a mother to us! She truly took care of us and made sure we were as comfortable as possible. Her loft is beautiful and cozy. Convenient location, near many cute restaurants and bars.

Beautiful apartment, good place, quiet, cloth to a subway station, very convinient. We didn't have the change to meet Amy but we chat each other through Airbnb / (Hidden by Airbnb) . She answered every question we had. The apartment is clean, safe, charming. Very good for a couple. And we can have help from Amy's friends. I will come back there if possible.

Absolutely charming apartment. One big room that feels (and is) very spacious, plus a deck. Wifi is fast!

Amy and Monique were very helpful in getting me situated and checked in (despite my delayed flight). Would absolutely stay again next time I am in Brooklyn!

Amy made us feel welcome and secure from the time of booking. Any questions we had leading up to our stay was quickly answered and no problem. The apartment was amazing- exactly as it is in the photos and was fantastic to come home to after walking all over Brooklyn and NYC. Thank God for the aircon because otherwise there is no air in the hot NYC summer. The neighbourhood is safe and a few blocks down from the subway- I suggest you use the Fulton park entrance for the subway as it appears safer and not as much rubbish around.

We really enjoyed staying at this apartment. From the start Amy was a great host; very helpful and friendly. The apartment is beautifully designed and cared for with an artistic flair; also comfortable and good for a couple. Cooking facilities are excellent. We enjoyed the neighbourhood; the nearby restaurants and health food store with fresh organic fruit and vegetables, were a treat. We would love to stay here again.

L'appartement est aussi beau et agréable que sur les photos. Amy est une personne que l'on a envie de rencontrer et facile à contacter. Le métro n'est pas loin. Le bus permet de sortir le soir dans Brooklyn facilement. Bref, on a passé un bon moment chez Amy !la

We stayed in Amy's loft during a heat wave, and found it to be a comfortable refuge from the "mean streets" of Bed Stuy. There is a serenity that is almost palpable in her choice of decor, minimal but tasteful furnishings and views of the garden beyond the French doors. We didn't get to meet Amy but her presence was strongly felt...everything we needed was provided for us, and she was prompt to respond to questions via email. Highly recommended to those wishing to explore an up-and-coming transitional neighborhood of Brooklyn.

Ein traumhafter Ort ...Wir hatten Amys Apartment für zwei Wochen und haben jeden Tag sehr genossen . Es ist sauber, hat eine ganz besondere bezaubernde Atmosphäre, ist liebe- und stilvoll eingerichtet, sodass man sich dort sofort wohl fühlt. Die Terrasse im Backyard war für uns abends nach „stressigen“ Tagen in NYC eine Insel des Friedens und der Entspannung. Wir haben Amy als äußerst herzliche und zuvorkommende Person kennengelernt – es liegt ihr sehr am Herzen, dass ihre Gäste zufrieden und glücklich sind. Wir können das Apartment uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen und würden jederzeit wiederkommen. 
Amy, thank you very much for being the warm  and charming person that we had the pleasure to meet...all the best! Goenuel & Malte

Amy has a wonderful loft that whisks you away to another world!  It is very bright, cozy and relaxing.  It is on the first floor of a brownstone.  The neighbors are quite and the surroundings are quiet.  There is a community garden you can order veggies from, and fresh pasta at Saraghines.  Oh did I mention the loft has a full kitchen and a washer and dryer?! It has tons of great eateries within walking distance.  Definitely eat at the local resturants and get a Latte.  The subway is in walking distance, I'm a Lyft girl myself though:). I will return in the future to stay at Amy's place! And I highly recommend it!
We had a great time at Amys lovely flat which looks exactly as viewable on the pictures. Amy was a perfect host and gave us lots of tipps. (Don't miss the italian backery in the neighboorhood!)

Amy met me with a very warm welcome and her apartment is SO COOL.  The apartment is spacious and clean, neatly decorated (love the art, huge mirror and your countertops) lovely patio area out back to enjoy a glass of wine.  If you find yourself staying in Amy's apartment make sure you taker her suggestion on visiting Saraghina.  Delicious food and cappuccinos! All in all, the apartment was perfect and I would be lucky to stay in her space again.  Thank you so much, Amy.  I hope you found the bottle of wine I left for you.

I arrived in New York during a huge rainstorm. Amy greeted me at the apartment with a pot of tea and cookies, and I immediately felt at home. I was traveling alone, had never stayed in Brooklyn, and was running late for an event in Manhattan, and she helped me figure out the best way to get there. The metro station is only a few blocks away in this very cute section of Stuyvesant Heights, and I felt safe the whole time. The apartment itself is light, airy, sweet, and homey. It was such a lovely place to come back to every night. Knowing that I could contact Amy or the other tenant in the building if I needed anything was reassuring.

I was very, very happy at Amy's house. The neighborhood let you feel the real spirit of Brooklyn, sometimes like jazz and others like hip hop. There's a metro station a few blocks away, so you can go direct to Manhattan without any problem in the A or C train. But this place is so beautiful that you can just stay in the terrace drinking a glass of wine, cooking or reading a book while the warm light of the afternoon turns everything better. And Amy was so nice and caring that I really felt in home.

Nous avons passé 8 jours chez Amy,son loft est très charmant fidèle aux photos,nous étions comme à lamaison
Amy est une hôte très sympatique et elle a fait de son loft un petit cocon douillet

Pour découvrir brooklyn l appartement est  bien situé dans un quartier calme et tranquille, par contre il n y a pas trop d'animation autour (2 restaurants et une excellente boulangerie) ,il faut venir ici pour se retrouver au calme après de longues journées passées à manhattan ( le métro est à 5mn à pieds)

My husband and I can't say enough great things about Amy! From booking to checking in to throughout our stay, Amy was incredibly helpful, responsive, and accommodating. She greeted us when we arrived, gave us excellent restaurant recommendations and made sure that we settled in, and checked in with us throughout our stay (in a professional, hospitable way; not in the pestering way). This was our first trip to NY, and we were so thrilled with both our stay in her beautiful loft and with booking through Amy. The space is even more stunning in person, and you can tell that Amy put in so much love, creativity, and passion into the space. We will definitely be back to NY, and look forward to connecting with Amy when we do!
We found the apartment very homely, exactly what we wanted for our Brooklyn stay.  Amy was extremely helpful, personable and friendly.

Amy was the perfect host with tea on our arrival! Moreover the apartment was exactly as described and a delight to stay in. 

I walked pretty much everywhere, it's about a 30 min walk to Williamsburg which was great. The apartment is also situated really close to the subway with great access to Manhattan. 

I loved staying here and would definitely come back! Thanks Amy!

Amy was a very gracious host that met us as soon as we arrived and quickly showed us around her loft.  The space was beautiful, very big, and looked just like it does on the site if not better.  

The loft is located in a very neat little neighborhood in Brooklyn with several things to do nearby.  Amy was more than happy to provide some great recommendations which we took, great food and drink!

Absolutely would go back, we had a great stay!

Amy was the best host you can ask for and you can definitely expect we'll be coming back. If you're staying in Brooklyn, it doesn't get better than this. My Fiance and I did our engagement session and Amy let us start at hour loft, the place was perfect for a romantic session and only a few stops from the waterfront where we finished our session. Can't rave about this place enough! Thank you again Amy and see you in the future!

I enjoyed my stay very much. I was comfortable in the neighborhood but didn't go out alone at night.
Amy is an attentive host and went out of her way to make me feel at home. 
I tried several of the neighborhood restaurants & grocery shops up the street.
It was so convenient having a kitchen & laundry facilities right in the apartment.
I made use of the A train often & enjoyed the few block walk to get there. The Cloisters Museum is on the line & is well worth a visit.
The space is charming & looks like the photos.

Amy was a great host starting from the first email contact. Her place is even more beautiful once you see it live. Amy gave us lots of tips to find the cool spots in the neighborhood. Also she made checking in and checking out a breeze. We enjoyed sunbathing in the middle of December through the big windows by the terrace. Best place I had stayed through Airbnb.

Amy was extremely helpful and welcoming when we arrived. She offered great advice on restaurants and visiting the local Brooklyn area. The flat was lovely and warm and very well maintained. This was our first airbnb abroad and we were very impressed.

Amy was a wonderful host - she welcomes with tea and lots of useful information about the area. The loft is beautiful and well kept, would be happy to visit again.  Thank you Amy for a great experience!

Amy was a great host giving lots of advices regarding the city and local stores. When we arrived she was offering us tea and a tasty cake. After that she showed us all the important things to know in the apartment. She has always been available when we had questions all over the week. Great host!

Amy's flat is great. After a very nice welcome with tea and croissants, she took the time to let us know about the neighbourhood, and everything we needed to know (where to go for breakfast, diner, groceries, etc etc).
The flat is a little more than 5 min to the A train which directly goes to Manhattan. 
It takes a bit of time to appreciate the surroundings but it feels nice and quiet. And there are great places to eat.
For who wants the super trendy Brooklyn, it's getting there but not yet.
For who wants Manhattan, it might feel a bit too far.
But for someone searching for a very cosy and nice flat at a great rate, and the possibility to get to Manhattan or Williamsburg at a few stops away, that's the one.

Amy is a great host - really welcoming, generous and helpful. The apartment was just as described and we loved staying there. The area is very nice too with a quiet neighbourhood feel and there are frequent trains to Manhattan and good connectivity to other parts of the city.

Amy Amy Amy, where do I even begin? A wonderful stay from start to finish. I was greeted warmly with hot tea, a delicious pastry, and more information about the neighborhood than I could hope to explore during my short stay. Amy was particularly accommodating to my cooking needs; the kitchen is equipped with just about anything you could imagine needing, and I was directed to all of the local markets in the neighborhood. 

As for the place itself, it's very secure and safe. So much so that I accidentally locked myself out on the first night (the door to the foyer locks automatically, so don't forget your keys! ;)  Amy, however, was quick to come to the rescue and saved me from the cold. Inside, you'll find that though the photos are wonderful, they don't do justice to the apartment. It's more spacious than you would imagine, and the lighting is fantastic. I only wish I could come back in the warmer months to make use of the lovely patio out back. Plenty of natural light coming in the back windows (not by the bed) making the kitchen area perfect for cooking breakfast, reading, or even rolling your mat out and doing a little yoga; the large mirror is perfect for checking your alignment :)

The washer and dryer are in great shape if you need to do laundry, and there's space in the bathroom and closets for all of your things. 

Simply put, it doesn't get much better than Amy's. If you're looking for a place that's not overly busy itself, with easy access to the more bustling parts of Brooklyn, this is the place. Cheers!

This might be the best place to stay in Brooklyn! If you are searching for a place, this is it! Really close to the subway where you can get to anywhere in Manhattan. The neighborhood is really lovely with great restaurants and coffee shops. I always felt safe at night even when I was on my own. We didn't get to enjoy the patio because it was freezing outside, but that would be really lovely in warmer weather. The apartment looks exactly like it does in the photos, very cozy and lots of daylight coming in in the afternoon. Everything is provided and very thoughtful. I would not hesitate for a second to recommend this place to anyone and I hope to stay there again! Amy is really great!

What a gem this place is! Amy was so very kind and attentive upon our arrival and throughout the weekend. Despite the copious amounts of snow dumped upon NYC, we had an amazing time, which primarily centered around this fantastic loft. The light is amazing, the decor is perfectly eclectic, the bed SO comfortable...a short walk to multiple unique places to dine and an easy few blocks to the subway. Now we just cannot wait to come back in a different season and experience Brooklyn with green! We never once felt unsafe in our neighborhood and in fact met some lovely people on our walks. We will miss this place very much until we can return! Thank you so much for everything, Amy!

I had a wonderful stay at Amy's loft. Was in town for work and Amy's loft provided a clean, tranquil, and beautiful escape. Having lived in NYC before, staying at Amy's made me crave returning to live again. Everything I needed was provided and Amy was very responsive with any question I had. Would love to stay here again.

This was a perfect place to stay.  The unit itself is warm and inviting, and the neighborhood is great.  Amy was a wonderful host.  She provided lots of helpful information and made me feel quite welcome.

Amy was very nice, it was a very easy process.. The place looked the same as in the photos, amazing! she left me great tea and cookies that were much appreciated. The neighborhood was very up and coming, some streets were nice, some were a little less.. Over all not scary and very Brooklyn.. The train was close by and easy to get anywhere in Manhattan if needed. I really liked the art in the Loft it was great!
super séjour chez Amy qui nous a accueilli de son appartement lumineux et très sympatique, notamment le matin pour prendre son petit déjeuner.

This Loft was great, Amy take some good care that all works out! Very good Neighbour, except the Subway is not so close, but still fine. The Place was clean, quite and have a lot of Space. The Backyard Garden owns another but friendly Neighbour. Sone good Shops and Spots for Food and Nightlife are very near. We are very enjoy this place, thank you!!

Amy's apartment is beautifully furnished, and contained everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Although we never got to meet Amy, she was quick to respond when we had any questions and checked in on how we were going a few times during our stay. The apartment was in a beautiful street close to many public transport options, with lots of great places to eat and drink within walking distance.

Nous avons passé un super séjour chez Amy.
Quartier sympathique, transports de proximité.
Le loft est clair calme et on s y sent bien...
Amy nous a accueillis chaleureusement ( avec thé et gateaux) et la communication a été très simple...
Nous recommandons vivement ...
The loft was cozy and comfortable and we enjoyed our stay.
Nous sommes arrivées avec un beau soleil, et avons été reçu par AMY, avec un thé et un gateau délicieux. L'appartement est tel que décrit, très lumineux, agréable.
Amy was so kind! Left the place spotless and even surprised us with a delicious cake. Her apartment was as beautiful in person as the pictures indicated.
Amy was wonderful. She was warm and welcoming. She greeted us with espresso and baked goods and was eager to share tips and highlights of the neighbourhood.

From the outset Amy was hugely attentive via email and ensured our stay and the run up was hassle free. The loft was exactly as pictured and was beautifully clean. The loft is a 5 minute walk to the Subway and easily accessible to Manhatten and Williamsburgh. The neighbourhood is very quiet and residential with some great bars and restaurants just up the street; perfect if you want a much more relaxed experience than the hustle and bustle. We had a brilliant time and would highly recommend the loft and Amy as a host.
Excellent experience in Brooklyn. Amy is a super host and the loft is super comfortable. The place is in an upcoming area and it's pretty far to go to Manhattan.

Only word to describe this amazing Brownstone is fantastic!  The neighborhood is alive with wonderful restaurants. Amy greeted us with tea and local cookies and shared her knowledge of the area- all extremely helpful. Patio is a rare treat in NYC . Just book it- you will be happy you did !

Amy and the place were absolutely lovely, the bed super super comfy... Check-in was easy, even with my ever changing schedule, and Amy really seems to care so much about your stay.  I would definitely come again, and the neighborhood is fabulous.

Amy was a great host, always on hand to answer our questions. The loft was beautiful and a great base for exploring New York. Make sure to follow the right directions(provided by Amy) from the subway as the 2 exits take you to 2 very different areas. 

We loved our stay and will be back.

Thank you!
Very nice, beautifully furnished loft! Thanks Amy for having us!

Amy was a very welcoming and informative host. She greeted us personally, and even had cake and tea waiting. Her restaurant recommendations for the local Brooklyn area were very helpful. Fantastic host!

Not sure where to start...other than to say it was the perfect stay! Amy is a fantastic host, very welcoming and offered some great tips on the local area. 
The loft is perfect and exactly like it looks in the photos.
Location wise, it is very convenient to get in and out of Manhattan (we bought Metro cards which we just topped up as needed), but also enjoyed exploring Brooklyn and the local area.
It really was a fantastic stay and highly, highly recommend staying here. I will be looking to return!

We had an absolutely lovely experience living i Amy's beautiful loft.
The loft, is light, well quipped and with lots of warmth and love.
Good and all equipped kitchen, nice terrace.
Amy is a wonderful host, caring, helpfull and gentle. 
The nabohood is rustic, but safe, open and friendly, with lots of nice bars, restaurants and cafe's. 
The loft is very close to both busses and Subway, close to manhattan and JFK airport.
We would love to come back to this place again.

Perfekter Ort, wenn man nicht mitten in Manhatten wohnen will. Sehr ruhig, in einer grünen Umgebung gelegen, mit coolen Bars in der Nähe. Mit der Subway ist man in 20 Minuten Downtown. Amy ist die perfekte Gastgeberin, ich fühlte mich jederzeit wie zu Hause, einfach grossartig!

Amy was a great host.  When we arrived she gave us some neighbourhood orientation over some coffee and cake that she bought from a local bakery and then left us to enjoy our stay.  We had wanted to experience staying in Brooklyn and between the delicious produce in the corner shop only a few doors away and the location of the apartment close by the Subway in this lovely leafy suburb we had all we needed.  The apartment is impressive and we were not disappointed in relation to its AirBnB listing.  We wouldn't change a thing about our stay there.

Amy is an outstanding host!  She met us when we arrived at 10:00pm with tea and cookies and went over some of the local bars and restaurants with us.  The loft is impeccable with everything you need to feel comfortable during your stay, and the neighborhood is fantastic!  It is quiet and friendly.  We enjoyed feeling a part of the community.  We are already planning to return and are hoping that we can stay at the loft again.
Amy was a great host and the flat was lovely!

Amy's Loft is a really large and bright lighted place. You can feel the italian-french influence in every part of the loft... you can discover a lot of inspiring details, like books, art etc. In the night it is quiet and the bed is comfortable. To Manhattan take the MTA 'A' Express in just 15-20 Min. Amy is a very caring host, holding always connection to you. A top place to discover NYC!!

We had a wonderful stay at Amy's cool NYC apartment which was equipped with all you needed for a comfortable stay. What we really loved was Amy's warm welcome with fresh baked cookies and coffee.

The neighborhood was also fine with beautiful brownstone architecture and nice street festivals. You can find some good restaurants and bars in the immediate area. Have in mind that it takes you about 30 minutes to get to Manhattan via subway -especially during the rush hour overcrowded...but hey, this is NYC, right? ;-)

Amy hat uns vorab genaue und hilfreiche Hinweise geschickt und auch die abendliche Ankunft war sorgfältig vorbereitet. Kaum hatten wir das weite Loft betreten, fühlten wir uns zuhause. Die Beschreibung deckt sich mit unseren Erfahrungen. Dieser Teil von Brooklyn gilt als 'the greenest block'. Die kleine Terrasse mit den Pflanzen, die Amy extra angeschafft hatte, war ein wunderbarer Tagesbeginn. Wir kommen  gerne wieder!
Amy's apartment was fantastic and is in a perfect location with easy access to the subway. I would definitely stay here again the next time im in New York.

We had a lovely couple of days staying in Amy's apartment. It was a nice respite from the oppressive July heat of NYC. The space definitely sings of Amy's artistic personality. It would have been good to used the lovely deck but unfortunately it was just too hot while we were there.
Amy'loft is very nice!The kitchen  is woderful!The location is very convenience. It's a good experience for us. I love it very much!

This was the first Airbnb I booked myself and have no complaints. Whenever I travel in the furture, I will always resort to Airbnb first. Amy's loft was the best part of the trip, like we had a home away from home. We will definitely choose Amy's loft the next time we are in Brooklyn. Brooklyn has cornor stores that are very convient and allowed us to cook in the loft when we didn't feel like eating out.

We have stayed with Amy previously and as before the expectations we had were above standard!
The place is beautiful and Amy is warm and inviting
We'd definitely love to stay again with you Amy!  :)
The host made me feel welcome, welcomed me with the keys in person when we got there, and the spot was centrally located to the subway. Really nice urban getaway.
Although Amy was out of town, Anne was there to greet us. Amy's place is very nice, and close to some great food in Brooklyn! Would happily recommend to anyone looking to stay in Brooklyn.

Perfect arrival, place was perfect. However we both felt neighbourhood was noisy and perhaps a bit daunting, we live in the country so this is not a reflection on the host or the accommodation.

Apartment was fine and location ok in terms of getting about, however on the Saturday we found ourselves boxed in by a block party which we had no idea about, and our leaving by car was not taken too kindly by the locals.

However, if you love the city buzz and a bit of outside noise doesn't bother you, Amys' place is perfect

Amy was incredibly helpful, gracious, courteous and informative - helped make our brief stay very enjoyable and problem free.

Would 100% stay here again - thanks Amy!

Amy Werba nous a très bien expliqué par écrit tout ce qui concernait son logement, son quartier, nos déplacements à venir, en outre, nous avons été très bien accueillis par l'une de ses amies, et nous savions à quels magasins nous adresser, etc. Son logement est ravissant, très confortable et pratique, dans un quartier très calme, et très accessible par les transports en commun.

The place was amazing! The first day we had car trouble but to our luck the families in the area were so much help! I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a beautiful place to stay in Brooklyn.
Our stay at Amy's was very comfortable! Her home is beautifully renovated and complete with everything you need for a great stay. The nearby Seraghina was incredible. Thanks for a great stay!
Amy's place is lovely. The perfect spot to get back to at the end of the day. Neighborhood is super friendly too. A great stay! Thanks Amy (and Anne!)

Lovely apartment in a relaxed area - made for a great base away from the hustle and bustle of Manhattan (but still convenient on the A train). Anne (standing in for Amy) was there when I arrived to show me in,  give some good tips on the local shops, restaurants etc and was available for any queries during my stay (but gave me the space I wanted). All in all a very good stay.

We had such an amazing time at Amy's. We try to visit NYC every two years and this visit did not disappoint. Amy was so great with communicating all the way from booking up to the end of our actual stay. We met Anne when arriving and she was so flexible with our times and questions. Both hosts were amazing with any questions or problems that we had. The actual apartment was stunning, clean and had everything that we needed. There was Netflix available which allowed for some lazy mornings which is so nice on vacation.The back patio was a peaceful oasis for tea in the AM or a glass of wine at the end of the day. We would stay here again in a heartbeat. Thank you Amy and Anne for such spectacular accomodation!

Es war einfach sensationell, die schönste Unterkunft, welche ich je über Airbnb gebucht habe! Sehr inspirierend, gemütlich, einfach rund um zum Wohlfühlen und entspannen aus der mega City!
Amy war von Anfang an sehr sympathisch und hat sich toll um uns und alles gekümmert! Vielen herzlichen Dank dafür! Gern kommen wir wieder!!!

Amy welcomed us with coffee and cake. She was very helpful and had prepared a list of restaurants and things to see in NY. The apartment was beautiful just as shown in the pictures. Great little place if traveling to Manhattan isn't a problem for you - we loved it!

Amy is an excellent host! She greeted us at the Airbnb with French pastry and coffee. She went over all the details of the apartment and gave us many recommendations of things within walking distance. She is knowlegable of the area and can assist when you need it. She is delightful and it was a pleasure to meet her!!
We enjoyed our stay very much!
We particularly enjoyed Saraghina, two blocks away and a bike tour of Brooklyn, by 'Get up and Ride'.

Beautiful apartment, comfortable bed and plenty of hot water. Up and coming area with lots of places to eat. Amy gives lots of helpful recommendations as well. Lots of citibikes for a quick ride to Williamsburg or bushwick areas and 10 min walk to A train for a quick 20 minute ride to heart of downtown, but personally I would focus on the many trendy, slightly rougher, and the upscale areas in Brooklyn while staying here. 

Amy was very helpful and quickly provided wine glasses and shower body wash on request. Much appreciated.

Amy met us personally at the font door, even though we arrived at 10 pm. She gave us lots of useful information over a cups of tea and coffee. The flat was quite beautiful, but also cozy and light.
The area was good but Amy did warn us to avoid certain nearby neighbourhoods at night, and we felt that was good advice.
There were good shops close by and especially the splendid Saraghina restaurant, where we had one the best dinners of our ten day stay in New York. Also very good connections to the rest of Brooklyn and Manhattan.

This is a wonderful place to stay! The neighbourhood is great and Amy pointed out a great local bakery for breakfast, recommended lots of places to us and made us feel totally welcome. The apartment is beautiful; we found it to be more spacious than it appears in the photos and so beautifully decorated it was like a home away from home. Absolutely loved being here, easy access to the subway, and it was a place we looked forward to coming back to at the end of the evening.

My sister and I stayed in Amy's incredibly beautiful decorated loft for 3 days. The kitchen is great, the bed comfortable and everything is big enough for two persons. Coming from Manhatten the area was a bit contrasting at the beginning but after following some tips and advises on activities and restaurants we eventually were perfectly ok!

Amy was a great host! We were driving to NYC and we were 2hrs late to meeting Amy. She was extremely understand and very welcoming. She sat us down for tea and coffee and made suggestions for restaurants and bars in the area. I would highly recommend her as an airbnb. I will use her again!
This is a very comfortable place to stay, easy acxess

Amy welcomed us with coffee, sweets and tips and made us feel right at home. We really enjoyed her place, which was an oasis of rest in an otherwise hectic city. We recommend anyone to stay at her home which is beautifully decorated. Big thank you for an all round enjoyable stay!

What a wonderful place and host! 
Thank you for the warm welcome and easy communication. 
Love to come back !

Amy was extremely good at communicating throughout. The place was nicer than I expected with a great patio and backyard. Even in this cold weather, the sun warmed up the back patio nicely.
Amy was super proactive in making sure nothing is missed in informing about everything from places in the area to arrival, departure and the apartment. 
This is a quiet neighborhood and is more suitable for people who prefer that for a night after rushing in the city.
There are enough nice places in the area to eat.

Amy's home was exactly as you see in the images (apart from the armchair shown with sheepskins on) very clean and the bed extremely comfortable.  There was only one water glass so perhaps a couple more would be useful but other than that the apartment was lovely.  There is a lovely restaurant one block from here with great food and fabulous atmosphere would definitely recommend a visit there...think it was called Saraghina but Amy has all the details of this. Amy was a great host away at the time we stayed but still contactable should we need anything.
When staying in Brooklyn, this is a great choice.  The apartment is clean, bright, and in a good neighborhood with restaurants and plenty of shops.  Amy worked very hard to make our stay comfortable.
Amazing place in Brooklyn. Spacious, lots of sunlight, nice kitchen (which we cooked pasta at midnight!). Not directly at a subway but a bit of walk was pleasant.

Amy is a perfect host! Really! She did her best, sent us all the information before the flight, collect great recommendations. She was very delicate and always there to help us. We liked her apartment a lot: it's cozy and stylish. This place is gorgeous for a couple or single  person. The only thing that this apartment is quit far from Manhattan and it took us too much time to get there. And the neighborhood looked a little bit scary later at night))
But we was in love with it! 
Thanks Amy!

Amy was very friendly and helpful, she even got us extra blankets which wasn't a requirement. It was really appreciated. We hadn't been to Brooklyn before but found we had to taxi a small bit to the areas we were most drawn to for restaurants and pubs. The location itself is nice and has some good coffee and breakfast places. 
Also it's close to a subway if you need. 

The apartment itself was one of the nicest I have ever been in using air bnb, great interior design, warm and very clean. I would recommend this place to anyone and would happily stay here again.

Thanks Amy for everything!

Amy's place was lovely.  Great communication. She came by to meet us and brought some delicious treats for us in the morning, from a famous bakery.
The home is very comfy and homie. The bed is heaven. The floor is lovely and it does not get cold (since we went in mid winter with snow out) it was nice to get home take off your winter boots and step on the warm wood floors.  However you can hear the people upstairs walking and coming in and out, even from the basement apartment. The sound does come in thru the front window which is where the bed is by, but I'm already a light sleeper and I wake up early so it didn't bother me much.  If you're a deep sleeper and don't mind, then you should be okay. 
There's a few deli and places to get breakfast and food down the block. There's an awesome bakery two blocks down, Saraghina, awesome place. Great coffee, pastries and bread, everything made there. We really enjoyed our stay here and would stay again.

Living in Amy's apartment was everything we hoped for. It was superclean, cozy and warm. Everything with Amy went well. At first we thought that the location was too far away from Manhattan, but as we understood how to get to the subway, we realised that it was super easy to get to Manhattan and it was only a good thing that the apartment wasn't in the center. The neighborhood felt so safe and the people were nice. We slept well at night, though we woke up in the morning because of the noise outside, but it was ok for us!
Overall, very nice place to stay in! Highly recommend.

First of all, Amy is amazing. She was very communicative with us throughout the entire process and even provided a long list of local restaurants, bars, and other things to do. We arrived pretty late and she ensured that we both knew how to get to the loft and were able to get in without any problems. 

The apartment itself is lovely. It looks exactly how it is represented in the photos, except there is not a white fuzzy chair. The bed was super comfortable and everything was very clean and tidy when we arrived. Additionally, Amy ensured that some light was left on and the heat as on so that we were comfortable and not stumbling in the dark when we arrived. 

The ONLY problem with the loft was the noise. We could hear EVERYTHING going on out on the street. Additionally we could hear the people in the apartment upstairs both going up and down the stairs and walking around in their apartment. Additionally, being an old building, we could hear thee water running in the walls from the heater, which we were not used to since neither of us have lived somewhere like that. However, the noise did not prevent us from sleeping. 

The neighborhood is very quiet and everyone we encountered was very nice. However, there is not a ton of stuff to do around the area, other than a couple of restaurants and some small convenience stores. So, we did have to travel kind of far into Manhattan or to the more poppin areas of Brooklyn, but there is a subway stop about a 10 minute walk from the apartment so it was no problem getting around. 

Overall we had a great time and the apartment was a lovely place to stay!

Amy's place was great. Looked as advertised and very close to the train which made it real easy to get to manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn. The heat stopped working for some reason so I was left without that during my team there. Other than that everything was great and would stay there again.
Brilliant apartment in a lovely area. Amy was great sending over recommendations and all the info you could ever need.

A lovely loft, just as described. The bed is extremely comfortable, the kitchen is well equipped, good lighting, tasteful decor. The apartment is close to the A/C for easy access to Manhattan.  The neighborhood is quiet and charming. I stayed in the winter, and the apartment was warm and inviting. Check in and check out was extremely easy, and Amy was extremely flexible and understanding when I had to change my departure plans. I had work to do while I was in town, and I found the living-room an ideal spot to sit and work, while enjoying the complimentary tea.  The only down-side is that there is some noise from the street in the morning--so if you're a light sleeper or need to sleep in, that might be tricky.  Otherwise, a perfect find.
Amy es una genia. esta constantemente atenta a todo. Habla tres idiomas. El loft es divino. Alta Deco. Buenos Vecinos. Todo funciona y ¨the heat", es perfecta. Altamente recomendable.

The apartment is extremely spacious and cozy at the same time. Decorated beautifully and with everything you could need for a short or long stay. The kitchen is fully equipped and Amy let me with some biscuits which were lovely. The bed is comfortable and I had a wonderful time there. The only thing to be mindful of isnthat the walls are thin so you can hear noise from outside. Apart from that it is absolutely great!!

Amy 是一位完美的房东｡屋内各类生活用品齐全,特别是烘干机,节约了很多旅途中的洗衣时间｡住所的地段周边生活很方便,到达曼哈顿和机场都很方便｡很开心的一次体验｡

Amy is just a perfect host . Everything we need is in the room , especially the dryer . The location is easy to go to the manhattan or airport . Everything is great.
Great place.  It was awesome.
Apartment was as described.  Great patio. Amy was invested in making our stay comfortable and easy.

Amy is a very reliable, helpful and thoughtful host. The apartment is beautiful in a good location. It is very clean and the people around are very friendly. I would definitely recommend staying here.

amy非常细心,还为我们准备了下午茶｡房屋和图片一样!很美!睡床靠近马路偶尔有一点吵,但是住宅区车不多,马路上来的声音有时候听上去也不错,很有意思｡床非常软,非常干净｡天气好的时候,在阳台上坐着真的是一种享受｡
Really good stay at Amy's house.lovely house!i love everything here.clean and romantic.and easy to find food,mini market,live music bar and good restaurant.i'm sure that I will back.
Amy's place is beautiful and cozy to stay in. Loved everything about the loft's decor and interior. It was very clean and well-maintained. Highly recommended!
Heerlijk appartement in een leuke bruisende wijk. Echte aanrader !

Amy's place is very bright and spacious. The neighbourhood is quiet and safe. I especially love the open kitchen and it is well equip! Amy and Alesh are very helpful with all we needed for help. I would recommend this for sure and return!
Loft très  agréable.  Amy est pleine d'attention. Des commerces et restaurants  partout autour. Peut être un peu loin pour qui veut profiter de la vie nocturne de Manhatan.

Amy's place is beautiful and very very comfortable. She really has thought of everything that can make your stay enjoyable and the loft is scrupulously clean. It's a quick walk to the subway for an express train into the city. The local bakery is delicious and there are quite a few great places to eat. Amy is very friendly and lovely and really does go above and beyond to make your stay pleasant, even dropping off some essential oil for the diffuser! The neighbourhood is pleasant, but not as groovy and hipsters generally as some other parts of Brooklyn.
Wonderful host and space.

Es war eine nette Wohnung mit genug Platz für zwei in einer angenehmen Nachbarschaft. Zwei kleine Groceries sind grad um die Ecke. Bei Fragen bekamen wir schnell Antwort. Gastgeberin ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit.

Die Wohnung war sauber, mit dem Charme des Unvollkommenen eingerichtet und zum Wohlfühlen. Amy kümmert sich toll um die Neuankömmlinge. Es hat viele tolle Cafés und Restaurants im Quartier. Hier ist man unter den New Yorkern und hat das volle Brooklynfeeling. Aber Achtung, nichts für Angsthasen. Wir haben es super genossen.

Amy var en helt fantastisk airbnb-värdinna!!! Hon hörde av sig mycket frekvent innan resan när vi ställde frågor och hörde av sig varje dag under vår vistelse där för att se om vi behövde något och om allt var bra. Hon pratade med flygbolaget när vårt bagage försvann och tog emot bagaget på eget initiativ när det kom två dygn efter att vi kommit fram. Hon var behjälplig i alla lägen och var extremt lättillgänglig. Lägenheten var fantastiskt fin och välvårdad och det var rent och snyggt. Lägenheten  har en jättefin liten uteplats som vi satt på morgon och kväll när vi hade chansen. Allt vi behövde fanns och hon hade gjort plats för våra saker i garderober såväl som i badrummet. Vi kunde inte vara mer nöjda med vår vistelse i lägenheten och vi vill väldigt gärna komma tillbaka om vi besöker New York city och Brooklyn igen. Vi rekommenderar varmt Amy's lägenhet för vem som helst som vill åka till New York och bo i Brooklyn. Området var otroligt mysigt och människorna var varma och hjälpsamma. Vi saknade inte något under vår vistelse i Amy's fina lägenhet!   

Amy was a fabulous hostess!!! She was responsive before our stay as well as during our stay when she checked in with us every day to make sure everything was great during our stay. She gave us useful tips and even arranged to meet up with the driver who delivered our lost luggage when the airline called her as they wouldn't call our Swedish number. The apartment is beautiful and we felt very at home there and we loved the little patio where we spent time when we had time in the mornings and evenings. She had made room for our things in the closet and in the bathroom. We will definitely try to stay there again when we visit Brooklyn next time! We would recommend Amy's place to anyone who wants to spend time in Brooklyn while in New York!! All in all this was an amazing stay and we loved the neighborhood too, everyone was incredibly friendly and helpful whenever we had questions or just chatted with people. We didn't miss a single thing hospitality wise during our stay!

I have been in Amy apartment for 11 nights, the apartment is really clean and comfortable; by train is easy go everywhere, the train station is just 5 minutes walking from the apartment. Amy is ready for help you in everything. I had good time in Amy apartment 5 stars are for you Amy!

Lovely studio apartment which is very big and bright. Has all the accessories you need and is very clean. Closest station is 5-10 minutes walk away which takes about 1 hour to get into upper Manhattan. 

Amy offers a lovely book as well which has all the really nice things to do in the local area if your tired. 

Will definitely recommend this to friends and if we return we shall be contacting Amy straight away. Thanks for everything Amy, our holiday was incredible.

Great place to stay and chill out after being in the city, everything you need is there if you want to stay in and there are some great restaurants in the local area if you don't. Very spacious and airy, we would definitely stay again.

Amy is a wonderful host! She is incredible and very accommodating. Her place is beautifully located in BK, very quiet and surrounded by amazing restaurants and a quick 10 minute walk to the station. Amy made sure that I was set, from recommendations on where to eat to obtaining an open line of communication. I can't wait to return to NY and book her place again!
Amy was easy to co-ordinate with and the apartment was spacious and easy!

Unser Aufenthalt bei Amy war sehr angenehm. Sie hat uns im Vorfeld schon sehr viele Informationen über das Apartment, die Wohngegend und die Stadt zukommen lassen, was uns geholfen hat, uns schnell zu orientieren. Sie hat uns mit Kaffee und Kuchen willkommen geheißen und war danach immer gut zu erreichen. Wir haben uns in der Wohnung sehr wohl gefühlt und würden sie sofort weiterempfehlen.
Good stay. No central air and it was 85 degrees inside. Amy had an AC unit but it did not in anyway cool the entire apartment. You basically had to sit next to it to cool down

A great apartment in Brooklyn, beautifully done and clean. It's a short walk from public transport to Manhattan but there are some great hidden treasures on the street including Manny's Wine Shop and Saraghina's, which make it perfect to get local food and drink. A great stay!

First and foremost I highly appreciate how communicative and thorough our host was. The place was BEAUTIFULLLL. We also love the patio; the fireflies added an ambiance that was completely unforgettable. Amy provided us with coffee, tea, and pastries upon arrival. The decor was contemporary and artfully selected. The location was perfect and all of Amy's recommendations did not disappoint. The aesthetic was comfortable and inviting.
Lovely apartment with the most attentive host, highly recommended!
Amy was an amazing host! The place was beautiful. She let me drop my bags before check in and was so helpful. I would absolutely recommend this place :)

Un charmant appartement dans un quartier de Brooklyn, calme, bien desservi par les transports en commun. 
L'appartement est très confortable, bien équipé, décoré avec goût. Nous avons bien apprécié sa terrasse.
La propriétaire est aux petits soins pour ses hôtes.
Adresse que nous conseillons fortement.

Wir hatten eine herrliche Zeit in Amys wunderschönem Loft. Wir wurden herzlich empfangen und Amy war jederzeit für uns erreichbar. Alles war wie beschrieben eingerichtet und ausgestattet! Das Ambiente individuell, künstlerisch, gemütlich, cool, ideal für Gäste, die etwas anderes als 08/15 suchen. Eine Oase nach dem hektischen Treiben dieser aufregenden Stadt! Die Abende mit einem Glas Wein auf Amys Terrasse waren ein wunderbarer Ausklang nach erlebnisreichen Tagen in NY. Wir können Amys Loft uneingeschränkt empfehlen!
This place is great. Really beautiful space, exactly as described and Amy is wonderful host!
it was worth every dollar!

Amy is by far the sweetest woman in the world. When I got in, she had a plate of cookies prepared with minute tea, Italian coffee, and mint infused water. She walked me through the entire space and even gave me the details of the neighborhood. There was a beautifully made handbook to give you the ins and outs of every possible question you could ever have. Restaurants, juice spots nearby. You name it. I will 100% recommend this gem to anyone looking to stay in ny.
Amy was a very attentive and friendly host. The place is amazingly nice, clean and well equipped. Recommended to anyone who visits the area.

Loved the space. Good location and we found it pretty quiet for NYC. Super quick and easy walk to subway station to get anywhere in Brooklyn or Manhattan.  We enjoyed staying in the Bedford–Stuyvesant is a neighbourhood. I would recommend Amy's place and would stay there again!
amy는 정말 친절하고 따뜻한 분이셨어요. 많은 배려가 담긴 집이었습니다. 첫 뉴욕여행에서 잊지못할 추억을 만들수있었어요.

Amy is a warm and welcoming host, charming and bohemian and her spacious and light filled loft reflects all those qualities. A truly lovely space for a couple to share. 

Bed-Sty is that little bit further out but the payoff is wide, safe, leafy streets and really quiet nights for a restorative sleep after a busy day. 

We gladly stay with Amy again on a return holiday in NYC.

We had a fantastic time in NY. Our little air B and B was in a quaint area and had a very artsy/ eclectic vibe to the apartment. The patio area was so relaxing during the day and the weather was beautiful outside at night. Amy was a lovely host and greeted us with fresh Italian coffee, amazing cookies, and hot tea. We loved staying in Bed-Stuy and would recommend this air B and B to any friends or family. Thank you, we had the best weekend.

appartement Brooklyn bobo et plein de charme à 20 minutes de Manhattan
Accueil prévenant par Amy prenant des nouvelles durant le séjour
super souvenir
Amy was very easy to work with and all her places are beautiful! Fantastic communication! Photos exactly as described!

From providing coffee and cookies to constantly checking that we were safe throughout our stay, Amy proved to be the most gracious among the many Airbnb hosts we've stayed with through the years.  Days before our check-in, she was already communicating with us to ensure that we would have no problems getting to and locating the apartment.

We highly recommend this lovely loft to visitors to the great city of New York. It is accessible to public transportation and is in a great part of Brooklyn.

Amy's impeccably clean loft was lovely in a vibrant Brooklyn neighborhood, which includes plenty of restaurants, cafes and the train was a quick walk away. The kitchen is full of sunlight which leads to a relaxing porch.  She left us treats and was a great communicative host.
Thank you Amy! Your place was perfect and as described! It’s a must stay for anyone visiting NYC. Close to everything!! Amy was a great communicator. Can wait to say again!
Hostess very accessible and easy to work with. Profile pictures need to be updated. Place was clean and inviting. Markets, restaurants and transportation close.
Amy & Alesh were an absolute pleasure. Communicated with me whenever I needed. The loft was stunning and very cozy. Thank You!
VERY professional! The apartment is amazing cozy!

Amy's place is beautiful, warm and just what my long-distance partner and I were looking for in a space to reconnect. The local recommendations were spot on as well, especially with Zabka and l'Antagoniste.
Amy's apartment is nice and warmth, the surroundings is quiet and safe. Thanks Amy and Alesh for the great arrangement, we really have a good time during the stay.

Amy's place is the quintessential cosy and creative artist corner.  My team and I spent a day there for our marketing offsite and felt it was the perfect space for collaboration and get the creative juices going.  Well kept, stylized and spacious, we were inspired and felt (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was great as well - would love to return for next year's offsite!

The romantic loft lives up to its name. Beautifully decorated and very spacious. Felt like home. 
Perfect location for Brooklyn and Manhattan via the express A line. 

I will be back.

Such a romantic and beautiful Apartment. Amy & co are just splendid, helpful and thoughtful. I highly recommend staying here, the neighbourhood is so special and easy to get everywhere. So happy to have spent Xmas here, it felt like home. Thank you

A big thank you to Amy for being such a great host by replying to messages promptly and giving guidance on the area and things to see and do! The loft is such a beautiful space and I loved every second that I stayed there! Your guide was very handy and I appreciated the tips on what restaurants to try! My only negative would be the wifi. Every time I switched on Netflix it would freeze or come up error. I did troubleshoot but this did not help. Also, if people are looking to spend a lot of time in Manhattan, like I did, just be mindful of travel time to and from. If I came again I may look at a place closer to Manhattan.

Kind regards,
Kristy.

Amy's place was the best among the five I have lived during my NYC trip. It not only impress you by it's looking but also surprises you with the comforts it can bring when you really live in it. Amy and Alesh were very nice and responsible in communication as well.

Missing the space already. Amys space was the perfect romantic getaway or if you really want to enjoy the heart of Bedstuy from fabulous restaurants, wine bars and coffee houses to the peace and quiet of Amy's place you won't regret it.  It's more than a home away from home.   In frigid temps Charles and I felt cozy and tucked away.  Alesh was incredibly gracious, even when we pushed our arrival time forward 2 hours, because of the snow. The apt has everything you need, great kitchen if you like to cook, it's like a country home in the city.  Even in the cold Amy has made the backyard look magical.  We are looking forward to coming back and enjoying the back yard. Thanks for everything.

Everything was just excellent!
Very clean suny and cozy place, a lot of small nice details, I felt like at home.
Amy is a great person, she told me all the secrets about neighborhoods, she helped me with some things, and it was just a pleasure to talk with her, also she always worries about you, like your mom.
I don't even know what could be better,
Thank you Amy!

We really enjoyed Amy’s loft. It was bigger than expected, and it had a cozy vibe. It was easy to get to Manhattan with the A and C train. And it’s close to cool places like Bushwick and Williamsburg. We really recommend it!

Amy's place is beyond heaven on earth. Great location! Close to cafes, grocery stores, some restaurants as well as major subway lines to get you to wherever you would like to venture in the city. And if your looking to stay in and relax, her place is perfect for that as well. Super cozy with a great kicthen equiped with all the tools you may need to make an amazing meal.

Thanks so much Amy :)
Absolutely amazing
Great apartment and warm hospitality for reasonable money.

This house was so cozy and pretty.
You can see snow or outside view on your bed with netflix, and even though the weather was cold, the room was so warm. 
I highly recommend it. btw if you are sensitive person for sleeping, I don't recommend this house because the noise from outside ( car and fire truck ) was disturbing my sleep.

but I really enjoyed staying here and I would definitely stay here again! :)
Great space. Great neighborhood. Space had great lighting. Loved the decor

Amy was an absolute wonderful host. She worked with my friend to help him get settled in a day before I arrived, and really helped start his first trip to the U.S. off to a wonderful beginning. Her apartment is perfectly cozy and stylish - just what you're wanting in a trip to New York and Brooklyn. I hope I can stay again in the future!

Amy was a fantastic host! Her space is so unique and beautiful and has all the amenities you need to enjoy your stay. During check-in, she sat us down and gave us local recommendations of things to do over tea and cookies. Thanks, Amy!
Amy is a great host and the place was immaculate. The pictures don't do it justice,  I would stay again in a heartbeat. Thanks again Amy!
Brilliant stay at Amy’s place...stylish, comfortable, beautiful decor, great welcome.

We had a wonderful stay at Amy's apartment. The apartment was super clean and cosy with much space. All the little details in the rooms were so nice. The apartment has a fully-equipped kitchen. It was a dream to start the day with a coffee on the beautiful terrace in the morning sun.
Amy was a great host and always replied very fast.

The neighborhood (bedford-stuyvesant) is quiet but hip and cool at the same time. There are a lot of fantastic restaurants, bars and cafés to explore. Amy has a really nice list of restaurants etc. in her guestbook. The subway station with a fast connection to Manhattan and JFK (A express and C trains) is just a short walk away.

We highly recommend a stay at Amy's place and would definitely love come back some day!

Für uns hat alles perfekt gepasst. Wunderschöne Wohnung und Terrasse. Gut ausgestattete Küche. Zahlreiche nette Cafes und Restaurants direkt um die Ecke. Kurze Laufstrecke bis zu den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln und schnelle Erreichbarkeit von Manhatten. Sehr nette und sich kümmernde Gastgeberin! Wir können die Wohnung nur empfehlen und würden jederzeit wiederkommen.

This is a gorgeous Airbnb. It's a floor through studio with terrific light on a great street. Clean, comfortable. Great terrace / porch. Lovely coffee shops and restaurants nearby. About 8 min to the subway. It's rather far out into Brooklyn but the express train makes it relatively fast. This is a residential area with families. The apartment is quiet. We loved our stay and hope to be back.

Great Location
Great Host
Clean and  cool Place
I would do this again !!!
Très beau loft, tout à fait conforme aux photos et à la description. Très bon accueil d’Amy, très aimable. Le métro n’est pas loin, le quartier agréable.

Amy’s apartment is a wonderful place. The room is spacious and full of sunshine, and furniture and room decor are gathered with artistic taste. Amy is very helpful, responsible and warm-hearted host. She responded to my questions very quickly every time and took care of us very well during our stay. I felt like I was a resident of this neighborhood and it wouldn’t be like that if I stayed at a hotel. It was a nice experience.

ｱﾊﾟｰﾄは清潔で､とてもﾌｧｯｼｮﾅﾌﾞﾙな家具やﾃﾞｺﾚｰｼｮﾝで整えられています｡日本によくあるようなﾚﾌﾟﾘｶではなく､本物のﾋﾞﾝﾃｰｼﾞの家具です｡実際にﾌﾞﾙｯｸﾘﾝのお洒落なﾌﾗｯﾄに住んでいるような感覚で､ﾆｭｰﾖｰｸを観光することができました｡英語が話せないとｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝが難しいかも知れませんが､家主さんもとても優しく責任感があり､質問にも迅速にきちんと対応してくれます｡滞在中は安心して生活することができました｡

Very nice apartment.     Pictures are accurate.    Plenty of space, kitchen has everything you need.     Large balcony.   Train stop is about five blocks away.   Neighborhood looks rough when you get off the train, but it really isn’t.   Quiet at night.

This is the first time for me and my wife to be in New York. 

When we arrived, Amy welcomed us at the entrance and kindly explained to our stay here, neighborhood restaurants, transportation etc.
Amy's place is spacious, high ceiling, large window, nice-designed, and   equipped with everything you need in your home away from home. Washer and dryer was real plus.
The large balcony is also nice to enjoy morning coffee or evening beverages.
In addition to an excellent home, communication with Amy is also excellent.

We would highly recommend this place for anyone who wants to stay close to Manhattan and to stay quiet great environment.

Saraghina restaurant Amy have recommended was especially great. 

Thank you very much, Amy.
A great location and an amazing host

Amy’s house was very warm and cozy. The terrance lets in so much natural light it really makes the place come alive. It seemed perfect for morning yoga. The fresh mint tea and cookies were a nice treat as well.

Bed-Stuy is a peaceful, gentle neighbourhood. There are some good coffee shops and restaurants nearby, and Amy’s flat is well located for the express bus to Bedford and A train to Manhattan. I had a lovely stay, what a comfortable bed! And all the fittings are beautiful and modern. Amy is warm, welcoming and accommodating, and gave me great tips.
Great place, just as you’d expect from the great photos. I loved the location - the area, bars, restaurants.  Easy to get into town on the A train.
Amy's place is a beautiful artsy loft with a cool vibe and comfy bed. She was so sweet and left us everything we needed including tea and cookies. Loved our stay here! Hope to return again soon!

Amy is the most welcoming hostess! She had coffee, tea and cookies waiting for us when we arrived.  Her loft is gorgeous and comfortable - walking distance to charming restaurants, grocers and a yummy bakery! Perfect!
Amy is a great host and her place is lovely. We really enjoyed our time in NYC staying at Amy’s place!
Great stay! Amy was very accommodating and gave us a very warm welcome. the place is lovely and the location is great

I visited NY with my 11 year old daughter and partner. We enjoyed the space in Amy’s loft and the beautiful touches she added to make us feel very special. Amy provided us with details on how to access wonderful opportunities and was very prompt in responding to questions. I love Amy’s tastes..... she obviously has the heart of an artist. Amy’s loft was the perfect location for our visit to the ‘big apple.’ My only regret is that I didn’t get to meet her..... maybe next time.
Wonderful stay. Thank you again.
Amy’s flat is lovely, as is the neighborhood. Great restaurants and train close by.  The outdoor terrace was a great bonus!

Absolutely loved Amy's place! Great location, not too far from the city, but far enough to be able to escape and relax. Not only is her place beautifully designed, it also had everything I could have wanted/needed. From a local guide book, delicious coffee, an amazing bed, and many more. Would definitely recommend. Thanks again!
We had a wonderful short stay in Brooklyn. the place was clean and tidy and located well to visit Manhattan. Amy provided a baby bed for our 12 moth old. Everything went smoothly and uncomplicated.

The Loft is really beautiful and it was the perfect place for my writing-retreat in New York; I thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
The apartment is as charming and stylish as shown on the photos. It is excellently equipped, the furniture is of good quality and very well looked after, and it was super clean.
Having a private terrace was such a treat. I also liked the neighbourhood a lot.
Once again, Stephen and Amy have been an amazing hosts! Very hospitable, helpful and easy to communicate with. I have stayed with other hosts in New York and Amy has been by far the best, most organised and generous.
I highly recommend the Romantic Loft for shorter or longer, leisure or work-related trips!
Welcome cookies coffee and tea...who could ask for more! Such an amazing place.
Amy and Steve were very responsive and the place was thoughtfully decorated and cozy!

La maison d'Amy est super, tres bien décorée, bien située (métro à 5 - 10 minutes), le quartier est tres bien servi en bars, restaurants et est calme! En moins de 30 minutes on est à Manhattan tout était parfait! Merci Amy et Stephen !
Beautiful place! A little farther out of the way than we expected. Communication and check in was very easy and we were so happy to find easy street parking very close to the place!

Nice loft quite close from the subway.
Amy and Scott were always available and easy to reach!
I booked this loft for my mom and she really liked it. Thanks Amy!!
Amy was hospitable and very easy to work with. She responded quickly to inquiries and the space was nice and clean. We would definately stay there again!

I had a great stay - Amy was very communicative and made sure that I had everything I needed to enjoy my stay.  Very easy access to transport and while the area has more of a neighbourhood feel, there are still lots of nice cafes, restaurants and other amenities near by. I would definitely recommend this place to others.

Amy is a warm and very open hostess and was waiting for us with cookies and hot coffee / tea. She personally showed us everything in peace in her apartment and offered us her help at any time. The apartment is as nice as in the reviews so far described. The kitchen is well equipped. The apartment is very stylish and you feel very comfortable there. Even Netflix is set up for guests. In the back area is a terrace where you can drink a glass of wine in the evening in peace. The area is also recommended. But Amy did a great manual herself, with tips for restaurants, bars, shopping and so on. This was very helpful. We have always felt very comfortable and would recommend the apartment at any time.

Wow! This place sings! It’s an oasis of serene beauty so pleasing I almost wanted to stay “home” instead of visit Brooklyn sites! It has a glorious balcony too. Absolutely lovely. Amy is equally lovely with great suggestions for food and stuff to see so I hope you get to meet her.
Great place!
Great stay.

This is a great home - exactly as its advertised online. Amy was super responsive and gives you a great guide for getting around the city. The neighbourhood has some great restaurants and bars. The journey to midtown may be slightly too far for some.

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay in the loft. It was a very easy walk to get to the subway station and took only 20 minutes on the express to get to Manhattan.  We drove there and found parking out front on the street easily. 

We are both vegans and there are quite a few vegan option restaurants in the area.

The neighborhood is very nice and very safe. We will definitely stay here again next time we decide to visit the city.

Highly recommend staying here. The location is great and you start feeling like a local with Amy’s suggestions. 

Will defiantly be staying again and recommending to our friends. 

Was the perfect space to spend Christmas in!

This is a very stylish and beautiful Airbnb in a beautiful building located in a very cool neighbourhood in Brooklyn!  Although a far walk from Brooklyn Heights and Manhattan, it is conveniently located very close to a subway station that has the A line express train that will get you anywhere you need to go very quickly.  And the neighbourhood itself was well equipped, we loved the nearby bakery, and also the wine store had great selection - as recommended by our host.  Amy's communication was quick and helpful, we never had trouble getting in touch with her.  Would highly recommend this airbnb!
Looks just like the pictures. A/c train is less than ten min walk.

Amy's place and Daniella's help were excellent. Clean with great amenities in a great neighborhood. I drove and was able to park easily in front of the apartment. The apartment smelled great and had a nice welcome set up on my arrival. The kitchen was wonderful and I was able to prepare some simple meals. Bed was comfortable. Loved the light in the apartment. It was cozy and comfortable. Felt like I was home! The check in was super easy and Amy and Daniella were both very communicative. Definitely, recommend this place! Everything was just great!
It’s a beautiful space. Nice kitchen. Highly recommended.

I really enjoyed staying at Amy's place. The loft is absolutely beautiful, the kitchen has everything that you need, and the neighborhood has some amazing restaurants. Amy's recommendations were spot on.
Gorgeous! Stylish! Amy was a fantastic host, lots of great ideas of what to do in the neighborhood. Would absolutely recommend!

name: Cozy 1 private ensuite room
summary: The apt is conveniently located above soho in the city center and next to the mid-level escalators. Outing and shopping areas are in walking distance/proximity. You can share the facilities in the apt outside your ensuite room. Bedroom is equipped with a double bed and 2 clothes drawers.
space: Ensuite room in a spacey(900sqf), cozy, fully furnished 3 bedrooms apartment in Mid-Level Kitchen (watching machine), living room, balcony Happy to catch up a chat, and share tips for visiting/living in HK as well as other relevant countries.  Soho (and LKF) where nice restaurants and bars are located,central shopping areas,  supermarkets, laundries are within walking distance. The Mid-level escalators are next to the apartment. The distance to walk up to the Peak is about 25-35mins.  Taxi can be flagged at the door. Public transportation is very convenient, so is the access to other part of HK (island).   Feel free to drop me a note if you have any specific request.

It was absolutely great staying at Dannis place in Hong Kong. It was close to everything and the apartment itself was great. Exactly like the photos. I would definitely recommend Dannis place to others and would easily stay there again. She was very accommodating and friendly and was happy to give advice on things to do in the city! 

I had a fabulous time staying here.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

感谢你悉心指引和分享了一个非常棒的家给我们入住!!DanNi是很nice的,一定是大家的合适选择!!

name: Bucolic Eco Art House Cézanne Suite
summary: Suite (room with private bath) with separate entrance giving the guest a total privacy. The room has a large window overlooking the mountain and flowering trees. It has cabinet , split air-conditioning and TV and Wi-FI.
space: House newly renovated, modern, light, fresh, surrounded by fruit trees, garden, pool, barbecue, balcony, pizza oven, kitchen, table games room and TV room. Located in a cul de sac with private security 24 hours providing a total tranquility to guests. Located uphill the house is 200 meters from the main street where you can have access to all kinds of trade: 24 bars, restauramtes, pharmacies, bakeries, deli, store articles of clothing and access to transportation.
