All rooms and rooms come with Wi-Fi and air conditioning. The host couple (Gloria and Alexander) are the parents of Pablo and reside in one of the rooms of Bucoli
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in Laranjeiras, neighborhood of residence many intellectuals and artists, a street uphill 200 meters from Rua General Glicério. Fountain in the square there are free fitness classes 6pm until 10 am every day. On the street the house is a club (Club Lob) with 10 tennis courts that offer paid classes. The house is aa 20-minute walk from the Turistic point of Christ the Redeemer Train Station in Corcovado, in the adjoining neighborhood of Cosme Velho that still has the Naif Museum and the interesting tourist spot of Boticario. At Rua das Laranjeiras has banks, post office, supermarkets and various fine food shops as well as natural-vegetarian food and fast food. The 100m from the house on Saturdays, has the typical Brazilian music fair on the street Praça General Glicério (free), and the beautiful and exotic fair of vegetables, fruits, spices, seafood, flowers, jewelry, crafts, parts Brazilian art and costumes. On Tuesdays there is an organic fair located in the same
transit: There are several bus stops near the house and one of them down the slope by a staircase of one block, take the bus 184 which in 10 minutes connects with the subway at Largo do Machado (10'), and take to the center (5'), Copacabana (10') and Ipanema (12'). In the Largo do Machado and Cosme Velho has bike rack to stroll on the beach of Flamengo and the city. It has three nearby taxi points. We note also that use Easy application Taxi if they want to move around by taxi. It is safe and fast.
access: Guests have free access to the kitchen attached to the barbecue, pizza oven and all appliances (microwave, toast oven, dishwasher, washing machine). All rooms and rooms come with Wi-Fi and air conditioning.
interaction: The host couple (Gloria and Alexander) are the parents of Pablo and reside in one of the rooms of Bucolic Art House. In this sense, they will always be available to meet guests' needs, helping them to integrate into the city by providing valuable tips on how to get around the best way with the means of transport, safety tips and indicating the best tourist trips from a look Rio and tourists: museums, restaurants, bars, party houses, beaches, forests, bike rides, helicopter, pedal boat in the Lagoon and boat ride at sea etc. If interested, we have contact with a registered guide our confidence. If necessary, we can introduce you to the surroundings of the house.
house_rules: Respecting the other guests and the hosts. The pool should be kept free of sand, grass and oily and colored filters. The law of silence (22h the morning 8h) should be respected. It should be cleaned the dishes and cookware and stored properly in the closets.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
I'm 37 years old and absolutely loved with my city Rio de Janeiro. I have studied International Relations and Journalism. Nowadays I´am a camera assistant for commercials, films and TV shows.   

I usually go to Ipanema beach with my closer friends and really like to go to a bar and talk about my life, projects and everything with them. Also I really like to the movies! In the past years I usually travel a lot around Brazil doing my documentaries!

I love to host people around the world to know about diferent cultures and hear about human histories!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Se você tiver a sorte de reservar e ficar no Bucolic Art House, vai com certeza compartilhar da minha opnião. A casa é maravilhosa, muito além do que imaginava. A localização atende a todas as necessidades de deslocamento, transporte e a rua é calma, aprazível e super segura. A suíte é confortável e a casa oferece uma área comum com toda infraestrutura para o hóspede. 
Os anfitriões são pessoas maravilhosas e nos fazem sentir muito a vontade na casa. Sempre dispostos a ajudar!!!!

This was a great place to stay. The location was great for being close to the city but not in the middle of it, with a backyard and pool. The room where I stayed felt like my own apartment because of the private entrance and bathroom, which was really appreciated. The walk to the bus stop is not bad at all, 5 mins, but coming back it's a lot uphill. Overall, I would definitely recommend this place to someone visiting the city.

Gloria est un hôte disponible, bienveillant et particulièrement arrangeant. Elle nous a donné toutes les informations nécessaires quand aux moyens de déplacements sur Rio ainsi que sur les bon plans dans son quartier. 
Polyglote, notre hôte nous mis de suite à l'aise dès notre arrivée à l'aéroport et ce jusqu'à notre départ. 
La maison est magnifique. Située dans un quartier très calme et bien desservi, on s'y sent rapidement à l'aise. Et pour tout voyageur étant seul, il y a souvent d'autres voyageurs chez Gloria avec lesquels on peut échanger.
Le seul point qui pourrait être considéré comme négatif serait la montée pour y parvenir mais vous trouverez toujours un taxi pour vous y amener.
En ce qui concerne la suite Portinari, elle est un peu isolée dès autres chambres donc plus commode pour un couple en ayant tout de même la possibilité de socialiser quand il y a du monde près de la piscine. 
Nous recommandons vivement cet hôte.
estadia maravilhosa. anfitrião atencioso e simpático. casa muito bonita, num local tranquilo e bem localizado. muito bem equipada, organizada e limpa.

The neighborhood is lovely and the house is very nice. I had a good room and Pablo's mother was very nice. The only thing I didn't like were the neighbors dogs. I love dogs but these two where right under my window barking a lot specially at night.....

I have spent a month at Pablo’s mother house. I have never seen nor spoken to Pablo directly, so it is difficult for me to write this review. I intended not to write a comment, but if I had known about the downsides of staying at this property, I would have stayed somewhere else. I noticed Pablo’s mother was highly emotional and aggravated upon the first 5 minutes of my arrival, after politely asking her if the room she was showing me was the same I had booked (the rooms did not have the same name). After seeing her disproportionate reaction to my question, I wrote to Pablo so that I could meet with him and discuss the fact that I was feeling unwelcomed (with the intent of making arrangements to cancel my reservation). He responded that it was a misunderstanding and that I was welcomed, so I decided to move on and let it go (him and I finally never met). I should have trusted my inner voice because from there, things slowly went downhill. I am not going into the details of everything she said and done, but at the end of my stay, I reported Pablo’s mother to Airbnb for psychological harassment (that was a first - I do not feed off negativity and I did everything I could to stay at peace with everyone). Also, the host filed a claim against me for clogging her sewer drain with my used tampons, which was rejected. Long story short, Pablo’s mother tends to blame everybody for everything without acknowledging her own responsibility. I addition, she is not always truthful, not tolerant and does not seem to appreciate people staying at her house, which does not feel homey at all. My analysis of the situation is that her defensive attitude is related to her fear negative comments (because she keeps tab of everything and seems to play a game of chess, which I refuse to engage in). In retrospect, I believe none of that would have happened if Pablo’s mother had an Airbnb account of her own. I also do not appreciate how Pablo handled the situation (he let his mother deal directly with Airbnb and never communicated with me via e-mail, phone or face to face). If I did not have an office space that I could go to everyday and if I was a fragile individual, my stay in Rio would have been deeply affected by this experience (which is why I am writing this review). On a positive note, I recommend staying in Laranjeiras if safety is your first priority, but maybe closer to Rua da Laranjeiras and not as high up in the hills. I am thankful that this place was extremely affordable; otherwise the price for staying there would have been quite high.

Local muito agradável, quase dentro da floresta da Tijuca. O local tem facil acesso à onibus (10min a pé) e até metro (10min de onibus). Anfinitrões bastante atenciosos e compreensivos.  Há diversas regras na casa que devem ser respeitadas para que sua estadia transcorra de modo tranquilo, como higiene e respeito ao meio-ambiente, basta ter bom senso e dar uma boa lida nas regras antes. De resto,  o local é realmente abençoado,  uma rua sem saída, silenciosa e com comércio e facilidades a pouca distância.

Hospitable and kind hosts. The house is beautiful and has many common spaces like psicina and TV room . 
The Suite Cesanne that we stayed is spacious and cozy.
The neighborhood is resideincial , quiet and safe . Next to markets and pharmacies. Our stay was great. I recommend

That goes to all Aibnb comunity.  
Once again I had the privilege and lucky to be able to book a room and stay at the Bucolic Eco Art House.
I believe that was my third time with them and the experience continuos to get better!!!  
The Hosts are the most friendly, well educated and nice people that you could possible wish to deal with.
The other gests as well are in the same mood. Full respect and joy to  be there.
I wish you all the oportunity to have a great time in Rio starting with this loved people.
Big hug and kisses to Pablo, Alexandre and Gloria.
See you all soon!!!
Best Regards.
Alex
I have stayed in Bucolic Eco Art House before and I came back, because I really liked it and felt comfortable there. I am sure I will return some day!
Very beatiful house with nice and intelegent host! House stay in green and very comfortable area near bus stand and shops. Very clean and sun shining house with swiming pool. Thanks so much! =)

Gloria and Pablo  welcoming at home, in which we were happy to spend two weeks:  is  a very beautiful and safe area, place at the foot of the mountains surrounded by greenery, pure air, silence, birds singing, amazing view. The area and the house itself is very safe and are under the supervision of cameras and guards. Very friendly people live in the neighborhood. Also, the house is close to shops restaurants and on Saturdays the market works perfectly. The house is pleased with its purity, green garden (mangoes fall on the ground), comfortable hammock, a clean swimming pool (transparent every day),very nice shover near the pool, wi-fi very fast and strong signal, comfortable kitchen (blender, coffee grinder, juicer).Strong water cold and hot every wear in home. Plenty of space for relaxation and a quiet reading. The room with private bath is very clean and  is equipped with air conditioning and a fan. We were very happy to spend our holiday in this house. The next time we are happy to stay in this house, and advise my friends!

 

 

Гостиприимный Дом в котором мы были счастливы провести две недели находиться в очень живописном и безопасном районе. Место у подножия гор утопает в зелени. Чистый воздух, тишина, пение птиц, изумительный вид. Район и сам дом очень безопасные и находятся под присмотром камер и охранны. Очень благоприятные люди живут по соседству. Также дом расположен рядом с магазинами ресторанами и по субботам работает прекрасный рынок. Дом порадовал своей чистотой, зеленым садом (плоды манго падают на землю), удобным гамаком, чистым бассейном, комфортабельной кухней ( блендер,кофемолка,соковыжималка). Много места для релаксации и спокойного чтения. Комната оснащена кондиционером и вентилятором. Мы были очень рады провести наш отдых иммено в этом доме. В следующий раз мы с удовольствием остановимся в этом доме и посоветуем друзьям! =)

Nuestra experiencia fue breve y muy satisfactoria con la atención de pablo y su flia. Estamos muy agradecidos por todo y esperamos voltar pronto!. Muy linda y confortable la casa. Matias adoró la piscina!. Cariños. Matias y Estefanía

Nous avons sejourné 10jours chez Gloria, Alexandre et Pablo. Logement superbe, très agréable, propre et calme. Chambre privative soignée et parties communes conviviales donnant sur l'agréable piscine exterieure dans le jardien arboré. Le quartier est complètement sécurisé, nous avons pu profiter de la vie nocturne de Rio sans problèmes! L'emplacement est idéal, commerces à proximité, bus desservant les différents quartiers (centro, lapa, plages...) en 15min max. et métro Largo do Machado à 5min en bus. Parfait point de chute pour visiter la ville.

Logement tenu par des hôtes accueillants et chaleureux qui vieillent au bon déroulement de votre séjour ! Du petit guide pratique des alentours aux conseils pour visiter Rio, tout est fait ici pour que nous passions un bon séjour !

Logement fortement recommandé !

Merci à Gloria pour ses gentilles attention et son hospitalité !

Nous avons ADORÉ Rio !!
Olivia, Mélodie et Binta
o anfitrião me deixou muito à vontade, o anúncio bateu 100% com a realidade e o bairro é maravilhoso. super indico a todos. espero voltar em Breve.

Nous avons été très bien reçus par Pablo et Gloria. Les enfants ont beaucoup apprécié de pouvoir bénéficier de la piscine et du jardin, alors qu'il faisait si chaud à Rio. Inespéré en pleine ville. La clim fonctionnait bien, pas trop bruyante. Quartier tranquille et sécurisé. Bonus : Gloria parle français. A recommander.

Pablo & Gloria have a lovely space in Rio. Located in a safe neighborhood, you can walk down the hill to public transport.  The place has all the amenities you will need. They were able to accommodate us on very short notice and we would definitely recommend the Bucolic Art House to those visiting Rio!

The bucolic Eco-house is simply a fantastic place to stay. Gloria and Alexander (the hosts) are incredible people - interesting, caring, passionate, and really wanting to make their home a place of exchange and enrichment. While staying at the Eco-house I've had loads of interesting chats with both the hosts and fellow guests! 

The house itself is a brilliant space, with spacious, comfortable (and always clean!) communal areas, a lovely pool, and complete kitchen facilities. The location is well placed in between the centre and the beaches. It's well connected by bus and off the tourist trail, so you get to experience authentic Carioca life in a laid back neighbourhood. 

As someone who has travelled quite a lot, i think what is available at the bucolic eco house is well beyond anything you'll find for a similar price- especially if you stay at the house long term.

Excelente recepção. Todos muito educados e receptivos. A casa é ótima, com uma estrutura incrível e fica em um excelente bairro, tranquilo e de fácil acesso. 
Gostamos muito da experiência e vamos voltar mais vezes.

Staying with Gloria and Pablo was a refreshing experience.  They are easy to get along with and their house is amazingly catered for Air B&B. I had a fantastic time, and only regret not staying longer.  The house is well situated.  Halfway between the beach scene of Ipanema and the downtown crowd of Lapa.  I was able to move about freely and felt rewarded coming back to my room.  Thank you for the moment in time. 
Alexander

O Bucolic Eco Art House é um ambiente muito agradável, eu e Símie passamos agradáveis momentos à beira da piscina tanto no pequeno almoço mas também a tardinha. Até lembrancinhas recebemos...Recomendamos!

J'ai passé un formidable séjour à la pousada. Gloria est une femme fabuleuse qui aime partager et donner des conseils sur Rio de Janeiro. La pousada est un petit havre de paix au milieu de la folie de Rio. Encore merci pour tout et à très vite!!! Beijos

Glória and Pablo são anfitriões fantásticos com todas as qualidades para tornar a nossa estadia em uma experiência maravilhosa.
O Bucolic Eco Art House é ainda melhor do que as fotos e descrições, sendo um privilégio ser hóspede mais uma vez na casa.
A localização é perfeita, estando perto dos principais pontos turísticos com fácil acesso a todos os meios de transportes. O bairro é uma delícia e muito charmoso.
O conforto na casa é tanto que podemos relaxar e aproveitar a piscina, fazer as refeições com toda a infra estrutura ao ar livre e curtir a natureza.  Nada melhor depois de um dia longo de passeios ou mesmo trabalho do que descansar na tranquilidade do local.
Destaco a limpeza da suíte como em toda a casa. Tudo organizado e sempre cuidado atentamente pelos anfitriões.
Outro detalhe importante é a grande segurança e tranquilidade da rua onde se localiza o Bucolic Eco Art House.
Estive praticamente em casa nesse período. Liberdade total e discrição dos proprietários.

Nous sommes restés chez Pablo et Gloria pendant trois semaines lors des Jeux olympiques (Août 2016). Notre séjour s'est très bien déroulé. Gloria et Pablo sont des hôtes très accueillants et à l'écoute. La maison est très bien équipée, de même que la chambre. Nous logions dans la suite Cézanne. Le quartier est très sécurisé et le logement est bien placé par rapport aux transports publics et aux supermarchés, restaurants et autres (notamment le Corcovado). L'ambiance au sein de la maison était parfaite : des voyageurs de tous les pays réunis pour les Jeux Olympiques. Gloria et Pablo nous ont même invité lors d'un dîner. La piscine est très agréable, surtout le matin et même en hiver, et la cuisine bien équipée. Les espaces communs sont spacieux et décorés avec des peintures réalisées par Gloria. Nous recommandons ce logement à 100% et nous n'aurions pas pu trouver mieux par rapport à tous nos critères. Nous espérons y retourner un jour. Ondine et Benoit

Mais uma estadia na casa da Glória e do Pablo,  desta vez na suite Cézanne. Este  quarto é provavelmente  o melhor da casa,  ideal para um casal.  Estive no Rio a trabalho e este quarto também permite maior privacidade,  mais afastado das restante suites. Mais uma estadia optima. Recomendo.
Good location, peaceful place, great people
Tres bel endroit avec beaucoup de charme. Une literie  confortable et du beau linge.Gloria est une hotesse particulièrement conviviale et interressante.
Séjour très agréable  La maison est superbe, les chambres très propres et le quartier agréable. Gloria est très disponible et parle très bien français. Je recommande vivement!

Já fiquei hospedado diversas vezes na Bucolic Art House e sempre tive uma ótima experiência. A casa é espaçosa, limpa, aconchegante, bonita e está localizada em um dos melhores bairros do Rio de Janeiro. Além disso, os anfitriões são educados, gentis, cultos e sempre demonstraram disposição para me ajudar. Recomendo!
Já fiquei diversas vezes na Bucolic Art House e sempre tive uma ótima experiência. A casa é grande, confortável e organizada. Além disso, fica em um dos melhores bairros do Rio. Recomendo!

Gloria and Pablos home is a beautiful sanctuary in the heart of Rio. I felt right at home as soon as I arrived. Gloria made sure I had everything I needed and was very attentive and helpful going above and beyond what I would usually expect from a host! 
The pool and garden area is a wonderful place to relax, the kitchen facilities are great and the wifi exceptional. The house itself is bonito and having air conditioner was a huge plus!
Thank you Gloria and Pablo for making my time in Rio very enjoyable!

Gloria is a fantastic host that was very accommodating to any requests we had.  She was constantly reaching out to make sure the stay was going well and even asked for suggestions to improve our experience.  We received a well prepared guide with many recommendations as well.  The pool was a lifesaver in the heat of Rio!  It can be a bit of a challenge to walk up the hill but on the positive side it is in a very safe place with a gate and guard before you reach the home.  Highly recommend this place for a relaxing midpoint between the center and the beaches!
Great stay once again!  We returned and enjoyed more time at this welcoming home.

Such a wonderfull place in the middle of Rio. Its so peacefull and yet so central.Its a tropical and secure area with restaurants, cafes and local markets, where you can buy local food and delicates for example. I returned here because the enviroment in laranjeiras is so good. Many turists only knows copacabana and so on . But if you want an area very central to everything in Rio you should choose this place. There is a metro station around 2 kilometers from the house.From this station you can go everywhere in Rio. You can safely walk, take a bus , uber or a taxi to the station. Its an autentic eviroment here in laranjeiras and people are so nice here. 

About the house:
A house with a lovely pool and a romantic and artistic garden , very friendly hosts who respect privacy and at the same time always is ready to give advises too. They speak english.
There is wifi here ,which functions very well also. 
The rooms are cozy and clean and the kitchen area is outdoor . You can sit there in nice sofas enjoying the sun in the daytime or at night enjoy the silence and the sounds of abes and tropical birds.
The owners of the house are both artists and that is obvious when you enter the house. There is a sence for details in the house.
I really enjoyed staying here several times and i will for sure return again.
I recommand this place to others .
Its a good price for good quality.

Meu cantinho no Rio. Como sempre, EXCELENTE! Bairro sossegado, belo e perto de bares e da Rua General Glicério que é um charme e tem boas atrações nos finais de semana! Os anfitriões são maravilhosos! Casal nota 1000! Recomendo!
Tudo maravilhoso como sempre! É sempre um prazer desfrutar da tranquilidade e conforto da casa, e do bairro pitoresco. Recomendo demais!

A casa: bela, confortável, aconchegante, numa rua linda, tranquila, charmosa e perto de tudo.
Os anfitriões: atenciosos, amigos, simpáticos, disponíveis, bons de papo; enfim, tudo maravilhoso, nota 10!

Faisant un séjour d'un an à Rio ( études ) et dans cette maison, je conseille vivement de venir chez Pablo et Gloria. Quartier très calme, et très sûr. Très bonne relation avec Pablo et Gloria, ils sont très disponibles, à l'écoute et très accueillants, tout en parlant plusieurs langues. Maison très propre, très bons équipements ( bonne connexion, grandes cuisines, et piscine ). Maison placée à proximité d'un supermarché, d'un marché ( le Samedi ) et de plusieurs restaurants. 10/10
Nice place! Awesome host! very good tips for the neighborhood. We enjoyed our stay very much!
Melhor lugar do Rio!! Já tenho uma casa todas as vezes que precisar voltar ❤️
A Bucolic Art House é uma gostosura... aconchegante, bonita, limpa e organizada! Qualquer pessoa, das mais exigentes, vai adorar!

Em todas as vezes em que me hospedei na Bucolic fui muito bem recebido. Os anfitriões são ótimos e o espaço é aconchegante e estiloso, além de ter armários e geladeira individuais para cada hóspede.
O bairro das Laranjeiras é calmo e seguro e existe oferta de transportes para os principais pontos da cidade.
Vale ressaltar que a casa está localizada próxima ao Trem do Corcovado, sendo possível ir a pé (+-20 minutos de caminhada).

O quarto é espaçoso e confortável. A casa é linda e muito aconchegante, com um grande espaço de convívio para uso exclusivo dos hóspedes (cozinha, sala, piscina).
Os anfitriões são excelentes, sempre prontos a ajudar fazendo com que a estadia em sua casa seja uma ótima experiência.
Super recomendado.
Lugar aprazível, hospedagem maravilhosa!

l'accueil fut parfait très chaleureux dans un cadre très agréable. 
Gloria et Alexandre sont vraiment des hôtes exceptionnels nous recommandons cette adresse a tout le monde pour passer de très bons moments autour de cette belle piscine. n'hésitez pas allez rendre visite a Gloria et Alexandre ils vous donneront en plus de très bonnes adresses et très bonne analyse de Rio.
Ótima localização, recepção e limpeza no ambiente! Fomos bem recebidos e recebemos boas dicas para turistar por perto! Conforto 10!

name: Quarto amplo em Santa Teresa
summary: Alugo quarto amplo, iluminado, fresco e com uma bela vista. O quarto está disponível para até duas pessoas ocuparem. O apartamento é amplo e com varanda. Está há 10 minutos andando da Lapa e do Largo dos Guimarães.
space: O quarto é amplo e possui uma confortável cama de casal, mesa, ventilador, internet.
description: Alugo quarto amplo, iluminado, fresco e com uma bela vista. O quarto está disponível para até duas pessoas ocuparem. O apartamento é amplo e com varanda. Está há 10 minutos andando da Lapa e do Largo dos Guimarães. O quarto é amplo e possui uma confortável cama de casal, mesa, ventilador, internet.  Os hóspedes terão acesso a lavanderia, cozinha, varanda, sala, banheiro social.  O bairro é tranquilo e bucólico. Por ter restaurantes deliciosos e uma bela vista é o segundo bairro mais visitado pelos turistas no Rio de Janeiro. E está próximo do bairro boêmio da Lapa. ônibus e bonde.
neighborhood_overview: O bairro é tranquilo e bucólico. Por ter restaurantes deliciosos e uma bela vista é o segundo bairro mais visitado pelos turistas no Rio de Janeiro. E está próximo do bairro boêmio da Lapa.
transit: ônibus e bonde.
access: Os hóspedes terão acesso a lavanderia, cozinha, varanda, sala, banheiro social.
house_rules: Os hóspedes devem lavar a louça que usarem.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Joyce was the best host ever. She explained everything very detailed and left all sort of indications on what to do, where to go. 
The apartment is FANTASTIC. It's perfectly located in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods, Santa Teresa. Walking distance to everything, all main buses. 
Everything was very very good and I am very happy I stayed at Joyce's. I recommend it to everyone who is planning to go to Río.

name: Copacabana Christ the Redeemer view
summary: Close to the beach and to trade on Av Nossa Senhora de Copa, almost on the corner of Santa Clara, a 5-minute walk from the Subway, close to supermarkets, restaurants and all transport. Silent, Crhist the Redeemer viewing, bathroom, kitchen and sitting room.
space: Zimmer gut eingerichtet und gut angelegt, ruhige Lage, Tageslicht, mit freiem Blick auf die Christusstatue. Schlafzimmer und Wohnzimmer, alles neu. 24-Stunden-Conciergeservice und Gegensprechanlage. Zimmer mit Klimaanlage, 32-Zoll-LED-TV, Kleiderschrank, Tisch für Notebook.  Wohnzimmer mit Schlafcouch mit 2 Deckenventilatoren, Internet, WLAN, Kabel-TV.  Voll ausgestattete Küche mit Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, elektrische Kaffeemaschine, Gasherd und alle Kochutensilien.  Badezimmer mit Dusche, Waschmaschine und Handtüchern
description: Close to the beach and to trade on Av Nossa Senhora de Copa, almost on the corner of Santa Clara, a 5-minute walk from the Subway, close to supermarkets, restaurants and all transport. Silent, Crhist the Redeemer viewing, bathroom, kitchen and sitting room.
neighborhood_overview: Der Küste der Copacabana ist 4,5 km lang, die Strandpromenade aus Stein ist ein Werk des Landschaftsarchitekten Burle Marx verziert mit Wellen wie vom Meer. Über das Seebad können Besucher die Promenade zu Fuß erreichen. Im Sommer ist es üblich, dass Menschen Nachts ein Bad im Meer genießen, weil die Hitze im Rio sehr stark ist und das Meer von Copacabana sich in einen Mondschein-Pool verwandelt. Die Aussicht ist oft erstaunlich!  In Copacabana gibt es auch zwei Festungen, die besichtigt werden können, die  befinden sich an einem Ende des Strandes. Eine von ihnen ist das Fort von Copacabana. In der Nacht bietet der Strand ein Höchstmaß an Spaß und Erholung, Kioske, Bars und Restaurants sind an der Küste und in den nahe gelegenen Alleen. Die Restaurants servieren die typischsten Getränke von Rio De Janeiro, wie Caipirinha, und auch weitere würzige Snacks.
transit: Am praktischsten und schnellsten kommt man mit der U-Bahn überall hin, die Touristen auch zu dem Haupt-Strand-Zugang bringt. Mehrere Busse fahren durch andere Bezirke an der Küste, die zu einem Spaziergang mit einer atemberaubende Landschaft einladen.
interaction: Verfügbar per (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)
house_rules: Favor remover excesso de areia da praia antes de subir para o apartamento/ Please remove excess sand from the feet before entering the elevator. 1 - Não é permitida a entrada de visitantes/ Guests cannot bring visitors to the apartment. 2 - Animais de estimação não são permitidos (exceto cão-guia). / Pets are not allowed (exception for guide dog). 3 - Não passar roupa em cima da cama, utilizar sempre a tábua de passar. / Do not iron on the bed, always use the iron board. 4 - Não fumar dentro do apartamento. / Do not smoke inside the apartment. 5 - Por se tratar de prédio residencial, respeitar a lei do silêncio das 22h às 8h. / Residential building, please respect silence time from 10pm to 8am 6 - Evite problemas com o consumo excessivo de energia, taxa extra se houver abuso pode ser cobrada.  Ao sair, sempre desligue luzes, ar condicionado, máquina de café, ventilador etc.  /  Avoid problems with the high-energy consumption, an extra fee can be charged.  Do not forget to turn off lamp

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Adoramos ecoturismo, montanha, cachoeira, off road, lama, subidas e descidas. Gostamos de viajar, conhecer as belezas naturais, fazer trilhas e novos amigos. O nosso lado urbano ama o Rio de Janeiro, cidade onde nascemos, vivemos e teremos o maior prazer em recebê-lo.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: A estadia foi perfeita! O apartamento está realmente novo, bem equipado, a cama é muito boa, e a Vilma e o Sidney são super solícitos e muito atenciosos. Adoramos!

O apartamento de Vilma é um doce, exatamente como nas fotos e cheio de charme e mimos para os hóspedes. Limpeza impecável, banho excelente, cama confortável e roupa de cama e banho de qualidade. Vilma prima pela organização. O local tem de tudo por perto e o apartamento é super silencioso. Ou seja, custo-benefício excelente. Quanto à anfitriã, só elogios. Um doce de pessoa eficiente.

The house was wonderful. Bigger than It looks in the photos. Don't expect to do much cooking in the small kitchen, but that isn't a problem with the incredible food of Rio on your doorstep. Great location and perfect little base for a few days in the city. Vilma was great, she was very helpful and accommodating.

Vilmas apartment was absolutely perfect for our 6 night stay for the Olympics. Perfectly located a few blocks from copacabana beach. Right in the heart of everything! The apartment is well equipped and beautifully renovated. Vilma was a fantastic host and very helpful with everything we needed. Loved the snacks and caiprahinas as an extra touch. Highly recommend.

Vilma is a excellent host, she was very helpful and welcoming from the beginning. I had booked way in advanced due to the Olympic Games and she was in constant communication whenever needed. Alos helpful when I was a little worried about the trip. I would reccommend the place to anyone wanting to stay. It is close to public transport, beach and everything else you need. Thre is also a cool pizza place open 24hours just down the road. Vilma was available during the entire stay. I could not ask for a better host. Thank you so much.

The apartment is a jem in Rio. Perfect location in Copacabana, spacious and got evertyhing you need for a pleasant stay. The host was very communicative and gave us flexible check in and check out options. She was really friendly and in contact during our stay. I definietly recommend this apartment.
O apto da Vilma e do Sidney é todo reformado e muito agradável. Nada melhor do que ficar em um lugar novo, limpo e confortável! A localização é excelente!

Excelente apartamento, com localização perfeita.  Muito próximo à praia, restaurantes e meios de locomoção. 
A Vilma nos recebeu super bem.
O apartamento é ótimo, bem arejado. A máquina de lavar roupas quebra um baita galho!! Adoramos tudo!

Vila e Sidney são pessoas maravilhosas. Sempre prontos para apoiar no que for necessário, respondendo de forma imediata. O apartamento é uma graça e a localização privilegiada, a 5 minutos da praia. Não tem lugar melhor.

Excelente experiencia. Viaje con una amiga entre las fechas de fin de año y Reyes. Vilma completamente amable, nos brindó información sobre la zona, sobre qué lugares y cómo recorrerlos, nos aviso sobre un evento nuevo que se hizo en Reyes y el departamento contaba con mucha información turística. Además, súper ordenado, prolijo y limpio con lo necesario para pasar la estadía. Completamente conformes. Lo recomendamos y en caso de volver a Río volveríamos sin duda.

Tiny but very cozy, well equipped, decorated, and located apartment with view to Christ the Redeemer. For 2 adults is perfect in size for budget and style. Vilma is an excellent host very attentive and responsive to needs. Thank you!!

El espacio de Vilma es un monoambiente con una puerta corrediza que permite dividirlo en dos, tiene un solo aire acondicionado pero es suficiente para enfriarlo todo, tiene una cocina pequeñita con microondas y 2 hornallas pero que permite cocinar cosas basicas, baño completo con lavarropas un estar-comedor chico que hace las veces de segunda habitación en caso de un tercer huésped ( en mí opinión sería un poco incómodo para que duerma un adulto) .... La ubicación es muy comoda, es tranquilo ya que está en el piso 11, muy limpio y hermoso como se ve en las fotos, la comunicación con Vilma fue excelente al igual que la llegada. Recomiendo 100%

name: Rio122 - Beachfront apartment in Copacabana
summary: Brazilian style, mixed with classic European elegance makes this 3 bedroom ocean front flat one of Rio's best new offerings.
space: Situated along the legendary Copacabana Beach, and in a prestigious building directly across the street from the Atlantic, this property is ideal for those wanting style and beach life. The flat features three bedrooms, two of which bookend the living room on the ocean side of the building, meaning you have incredible unobstructed beach and ocean views from 2 bedrooms, and the main living/dining area - along with a good sized balcony overlooking the beach.  There is a third bedroom as well, which has views to Christ Redeemer itself, and two modern bathrooms with high powered showers. The kitchen has the latest in modern amenities throughout, and you also have a washing machine to make your stay easier. The entire flat is designed with style in mind - from the European style pillars to the elegant yet comfortable furniture throughout. There is lots of windows that look out onto the ocean, letting in lots of Rio's natural light, and makes you feel the beach life even without leaving your

INTERNATIONAL REPUTATION

Latin Exclusive has been recognized internationally in the media for our unmatched quality of service and our stunning selection of properties. We have won awards and acclaim from the media as well as the endorsements of our exclusive clientele. When you choose Latin Exclusive, you are choosing the company with the best reputation and a history of outstanding results in Rio de Janeiro.

UNRIVALED SELECTION OF PROPERTIES

We pride ourselves on having the most luxurious properties in Latin America. Our expansive network of local connections and the personal relationships we have built with our partners over the years has given us access to properties that no other company can match. Our exclusive portfolio makes us the only company capable of delivering the quality of results that the world’s most discerning clientele expect.

BEST SERVICE AND SUPPORT STAFF

Latin Exclusive has recruited the best talent from around the world. Our reliable, efficient, international team can provide service in English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, Italian, German and Russian. Latin Exclusive is the only real estate company in Rio de Janeiro and in Bogota with its own in-house staff team of maintenance and professionals dedicated to keeping our properties working perfectly for you.  With a full team of handpicked service and support staff you have the security of knowing our team is ready to support your every need during your stay with us.

CHOICE OF THE WORLDS’ ELITE

We are the only company in Rio de Janeiro, Cartagena de Indias and in Bogota to offer properties and services, which provide the quality of 5 star hotels with the privacy of your own home. We are the choice of tourist, executives, diplomats and international celebrities when they come to Latin America. We are the only company with the patronage of such exclusive clientele.

name: BEST of Nature:Porto City Park/ocean of Matosinhos
summary: City Park of Porto: 10min walk. Sea/beach: 15min walk. 10min from the center of Porto by car/20 min by metro(blue line). 10min from the airport by car. METRO station (Parque Real) and free Outdoor CAR PARKING, in front of the building.  Enjoy nature with all the accessibility to where you want. Come and hike, jog or relax, in the restful City Park or by the sea (surf/swim). Everything you need is close: cafes, restaurants, supermarket. Check in can be anticipated, depending on the days.
space: Apartment fully equipped and furnished with two rooms to rent for two people each (to each room corresponds the price advertised per night), one bathroom serves both. Towels, sheets and linen you will need will be provided. The kitchen (fully equipped,to prepare simple meals), the lounge, the dining room and the living room (with TV and a balcony), are at your disposal.  To park your car, there is a location right next to the building. The metro station (Parque Real) is also nearby.
description: City Park of Porto: 10min walk. Sea/beach: 15min walk. 10min from the center of Porto by car/20 min by metro(blue line). 10min from the airport by car. neighborhood_overview: Next to the apartment there are buses and the metro (station: Parque Real) which will allow you to go to the beach, to the center of Porto (10 min by car/ 20 min by metro) , to the casa da música, or to the Serralves Foundation, for example. No need to transport to the beach or the park of the city of Porto, you are 15 and 10 minutes walk, respectively, from these places. Close to the building you still have shopping centers: shops, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets ...
transit: City Park of Porto: 10 min by foot Beach: 15 min by foot Center of Porto (10 min by car/ 20 min by metro)  Airport: 10 min by car Metro station: Parque Real (blue line, direction Senhor de Matosinhos)
access: À côté de l'appartement il y a des bus et le métro (station: PARQUE REAL) qui vous permettront d'aller jusqu'à la plage, au centre ville, à la casa da música, ou jusqu'à la Fondation Serralves, par exemple. Pas besoin de transports pour aller à la plage ou au parc de la ville de Porto, vous êtes à 15 et 10 minutes à pied, respectivement, de ces lieux. À deux pas de l'immeuble vous avez encore des centres de commerce: magasins, restaurants,  cafés, supermarchés ...
interaction: Je me ferai un plaisir de vous recevoir et de vous aider à bien profiter de votre séjour à Matosinhos/Porto, selon vos goûts et préférences, en vous fournissant des plans et des informations touristiques.
house_rules: - Silêncio a partir das 22:00h

host.host_about: Adoro viajar e, receber pessoas provenientes de outros lugares, é para mim a ocasião de o fazer com maior frequência, num espírito de partilha, atendendo às necessidades e ao conforto de quem vem partilhar o meu espaço.

reviews.comments:
Thanks Sofia! 
We had a great week living at your place with your family. Everything was clean, comfortable and Sofia and her family created a really welcoming atmosphere. We enjoyed the sun on the balcony, the self-made cookies and cake from Sofia and loved that we could walk easily to the beach. 
We definitely would go stay at Sofia´s place again if we go to Porto (Matosinhos) again. 
Best regards,
Inga & Emilia

It was a great stay at Sofia's place! She and her family are very friendly and welcoming and gave me lots of hints and ideas for my trip to Porto. The Metro station is only few meters away if you want to use public transport. If you come by car also enough parking spaces are close by.

Sofia and her husband are a very nice and helpful couple. They gave us very good advice for places to eat and drink in Porto. The next train station really is just 50m from the main entrance. Everything was very clean and the bathroom was especially nice.
We had a great time at your place. 
Thank you!

Sophia, ist eine tolle sehr nette und sehr hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Sie hat sich sehr um uns gekümmert und uns einiges über die Stadt Porto erzählt. 
Das Zimmer sowie das Bad und die gesamte Wohnung waren sehr gepflegt doch etwas außerhalb vom Zentrum. Jedoch war direkt eine Metrostation vorhanden. 
Das Meer war in ca. 15 Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen ebenso wie ein Park zum Sport machen. 
Wir würden wieder kommen!

Our stay with Sofia and Luis was really great. They made us feel very at home and provided us with great advice for local sightings and experiences. Their house is immaculate and spacious, parking is easy/close and public transport was also super close. Our stay couldn't have been better, would recommend 100% to all thinking of visiting Porto and Matosinhos!

Idéal pour reprendre des forces avant de continuer son séjour! Vous êtes super bien accueilli chez Sofia qui parle un excellent français qui plus est, appartement propre, chambre impeccable, elle est aux petits soins Avec vous. Emplacement idéal grâce aux nombreux transports à proximité. Je recommande entièrement ce airbnb!!

Just had a wonderful stay in Porto, Sofia is a lovely host and the accomodation is brilliant. 
Nice spacious room and the cleanest bathroom I've had at any AirBnB so far. 

Sofia even baked cookies - yum! 

A short walk to the beach, which was handy for anyone who likes to run as I do, and right next to the Metro stop for when you want to go into Porto (takes about 15 to 20 mins).
If you are in Porto for 3 days, make sure you buy the 3 day Metro pass for 15 Euro, I more than got my value from it.

Pre arrival communication and check in was extremely smooth, Sofia also allowed me to arrive early to leave my bags before check in which was very much appreciated. Sofia also gave a detailed run down of all the places worth seeing while in Porto.

I have no hesitation in recommending you stay with Sofia when in Porto.
Séjour très agréable ! Sofia est très accueillante je recommande !

Sofia and Luis were absolutely wonderful hosts. I wouldn't have enjoyed or learned as much about Porto if it weren't for them. The location is wonderfully convenient for the beach and exploring downtown Porto. I will always remember their hospitality and generosity. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay and time in Porto!
늦은시간에도 반갑게 맞이해주었고 게스트가 편하게 지낼 수 있도록 해주었습니다. 시설도 좋았고 지내는데 크게 불편을 느끼지 못했습니다. 포르토에서 만난 최고의 집과 최고의 호스트 였습니다.

Personne très gentille et qui sait faire preuve d'hospitalité, vous trouverez difficilement mieux à ce prix dans la région de Porto sachant que nous étions à 10-15mn de la plage et juste en face d'un arrêt de métro qui peut vous déposer à Porto en 15mn de 6h à 2h du matin! La chambre était plutôt grande, l'appartement très jolie et aussi très propre! 
Je recommande à 100%

De loin le meilleur air B and B que nous ayions jamais fait ! Sofia et son mari sont des plus adorables, prévenants et accueillants... Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour en leur compagnie... Je recommande les yeux fermés !!!
I advise everyone to choose this apartment if you want to feel like in house of your best friends.

"É uma casa portuguesa, com certeza
É com certeza uma casa Portuguesa!"
Senti-me em casa... ou ainda melhor, na casa da minha mãe!

Paciente, carismática e receptiva, Sofia se demonstrou uma ótima anfitriã, me recebeu muito bem!

Sofia tem muito a nos acrescentar, é professora de francês, sabe nos fazer interessar pela Língua Portuguesa e Francesa e sabe dar dicas turísticas de lugares que apenas os "Nativos" do Porto Sabem: Pasteis de Nata; Mercados; Feiras; OutLets, vinhos bons, Queijos Amanteigados e tudo mais...

Adorei e vou Voltar, inclusive nessa mesma semana!
E da próxima vou comer aquele Pastel de Chaves, certo, Sofia?! 

Além disso, a Casa era ótima, com ótima localização, linda. Os quartos organizados, limpos e com uma vista linda quando o Sol se põe!

A great experience! Sofia is warm and welcoming, her house is right next to a Metro station which makes moving around very easy. There's a huge park nearby and gorgeous beach is within walking distance. Peaceful at night. The room is clean and everything well thought out. So glad I stayed here during my visit.

Sofia was a very friendly and helpful host.  
Flat is close to public transport, very comfortable and it's always clean.
I would recommend the stay.

Foi a minha primeira experiência em Airbnb e foi tudo incrível, a Sofia é maravilhosa, me recebeu super bem e ajudou em tudo. A localização é ótima, do jeito que eu procurava. Mas com certeza a hospitalidade e ajuda da Sofia fez a diferença em tudo. Já sinto saudades.

Nossa estadia no apartamento de Sofia foi extremamente agradável. Ela é uma pessoa excelente, muito educada e sempre disponível a ajudar. Nos deu apoio em tudo que precisava-mos, até mesmo se ofereceu para cuidar da nossa Blair (shih-tzu). 
O apartamento é bem espaçoso, com restaurantes, fast foods, pizzarias e Mercado próximo. Possui metro e autocarro a porta, o que facilita você a chegar em qualquer lugar do Porto. O local é bem tranquilo e ainda situa-se próximo a praia.  
Certamente indicaria essa acomodação a familiares e amigos.
Was a fantastic stay. Sofia was a lovely host, and kindly made a cake for my arrival.  Very friendly and nice to hang out when not at the beach
O local é ótimo, Sofia é muito simpática e comunicativa! A casa é muito limpa e fica ao lado da estação de metro.
Superbe appartement et une super chambre. L’hôte est super, au petit soin ! A recommandé d’urgence !

6박7일동안 머물렀습니다. 숙소는 깨끗하고, 조용하고, 엘리베이터도 2개나 있어 불편한 점은 전혀 없었습니다. 특히, 호스트인 소피아의 도착전부터 지내는동안내내 세심하고 편안한 배려는 최고였습니다. 그리고, 숙소에서 도보로 약 20분정도거리에 넓은 공원과 바다가 있어 구시가지 여행과는 별도의 예상치못한 경험은 덤이었습니다. 
다만, 도심중앙에서 약간 떨어져서인지 숙소에서 중심가까지는 메트로로 약 20분정도 소요되어 이동시간이 필요합니다. 그렇지만 메트로역 바로앞에 숙소가 있고, 이동 시 현지인들의 생활과 함께여서 나름 의미가 있었습니다.

Ich hatte 5 Nächte bei Sofia. Das Zimmer, sowie die ganze Wohnung waren sauber und ordentlich. Sofia gab mir von Anfang an das Gefühl Willkommenen zu sein, so dass ich mich gleich wie zu Hause gefühlt habe.

Sofia ist eine sehr freundliche und offene Person. Sie kennt sich gut in Porto aus und teilt ihr Wissen gern. 

Ich habe mein Aufenthalt bei ihr sehr genossen und bin mir sicher ich komme wieder.  Vielen Dank Sofia :-)
Sofia est une hôtesse parfaite. A l écoute en permanence...
Thanks for a wonderful stay. When we arrived Sofia came and helped us find a free parking place, and helped with directions too. Everything was great, I highly recommend staying here.
Zdecydowanie polecam Sofię jako doskonałego pod względem gościnności gospodarza!!! Czyste, schludne mieszkanie w świetnej lokalizacji!!!
Sofia is a very kind host. The apartment is great, clean and fully-equipped. We recommend it!
the best place that you will find in porto

This place is great due to position - directly by the metro station Parque Real, with the nice cafeteria on the opposite side, 15 min walking to the beach and 10 minutes to reach a street in Matosinhos with great food - fresh fishes on the grill that they are making directly in front of you.

Sofia ist in allen Lagen eine tolle Gastgeberin. Die Lage ist ideal, um Porto zu erkunden (20min. mit der Metro-fährt direkt vor der Tür)  und zu Fuß in 10 min. am Strand zu sein. Ich kann den Aufenthalt hier sehr empfehlen.

Excelente anfitriona, al apartamento no le falta ningún detalle, habitaciones amplias, cocina con todos los servicios, baño amplio y muy limpios todos los espacios. El apartamento esta en una zona tranquila y a un minuto de transporte público. Sofia es una persona muy amable y atenta en cada detalle,  tambien estará disponible para cualquier cosa que necesiten los huéspedes. 100% recomendable.

Sofia is a very special host. She is very kind and friendly. Her place is amazing! Clean and spacious, She gave us everything we needed to felt definitely like in ourself home, besides great tips about Porto and other cities. The location is great, we were  just a few seconds from Subway station and just a few minutes (by foot) from Matosinho's beach and great seafood restaurants and downtown Porto. Fantastic! We strongly recommend!!!

Pour réussir votre séjour, vous êtes à la bonne adresse car Sofia est l'hôte de référence qui fait honneur à l'hospitalité Portugaise, et ses échanges culturels font d'elle une ambassadrice dans l'âme Pour un maximum de confort,  Sofia a une bienveillance  dans l'organisation de la chambre, de la salle de bain,  de la cuisine et salle à manger. Généreuse, nous avons goûté du Porto et apprécié ses délicieux desserts. Plage à proximité,  tram en bas de l'immeuble pour visiter et  l'aéroport à 10 mn, c'est le top.
Nicole et Christian

Sofia nous a réservé un accueil de très grande qualité. Sa gentillesse, sa disponibilité, sa discrétion et ses conseils pour les sorties de toutes sortes nous ont comblé. Un grand merci à elle pour le remarquable séjour qu'elle nous a permis de passer. Si nous devions retourner à Porto, c'est chez elle que nous voudrions aller.
De juiste plek om de stad Porto en het strand te bezoeken.
habitación cómoda con una muy buena vista. cama inmejorable,limpieza perfecta, tranquilidad e intimidad hacen de una estancia perfecta. 100% recomendado

I cannot express better words to tell a happy stay having in Sofía place. Everything is excellent the host, the place, the cleanless, the extremely comfy bed and the easy going anos quiet atmosphere of Sofia house.
Sofía also us an polite nice lady, welcoming and lovely and always with a sincere smile to share and interesting chat with a Porto wine.
I loved the place close to the beach and metro station just at few step of the building entrance.
My holiday in Porto was Great also thanks to Sofía and the accommodation. If I'll back in Porto surely to repeat the Sofia flat experience. Higly reccomended!
Un piso muy amplio y la habitación perfecta
Sophia is a very gracious host.   The accommodations and location are excellent.  Be sure to checkout the nearby beach...the waves are quite impressive.
Sofia is very kind and beautiful lady,and the room is very comfortable. I am very lucky for three days staying.

I had a really great time at Sofia's place! 
She was really a superhost, making sure that everything was ok for me. The room was spacious and she was totally ok with me cooking and using the other area of the apartment. We had dinner sometimes and watched funny TV shows together. I really felt like home away from home. The metro station is just across the street and Porto center and airport isn't far at all. Highly recommended!
Anfitriã maravilhosa. Casa limpa. EXCELENTE localização. Amei muito minha estadia. Super recomendo!

name: Sydney Parkside Apartment
summary: This flat has all the features you desire whilst travelling- comfortable bed, rain-shower head, big kitchen while being centrally located to Sydney city, beaches, great restaurants,entertainment and with beautiful Centennial park right on your doorstep.
space: The Apartment The apartment features a new kitchen kitted out with everything you need to cook up a storm- induction cooktop, dishwasher, oven, pizza stone and fridge.  The bedroom is big with comfy queen size bed and massive wardrobe space.  We have installed a new bathroom with a wonderful  rain-head shower and full sized bath and heated towel rack. Other features include bamboo floors, 6 sea- dining room, awesome couch (you won't want to get off it!), TV, stereo, DVD's and internal laundry with washing machine and portable washing line on the balcony. Location We are located in the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney on Alison Road in Kensington which is approx 4 kms to the Sydney CBD. The flat is centrally located and within walking distance to Moore Park Entertainment Quarter- movie cinemas, bars and restaurants,  Sydney Football stadium, Cricket grounds and Golf course, Randwick racecourse and the University of NSW and beautiful beaches like Coogee or Clovelly beach.  Across the road is Ce
description: This flat has all the features you desire whilst travelling- comfortable bed, rain-shower head, big kitchen while being centrally located to Sydney city, beaches, great restaurants,entertainment and with beautiful Centennial park right on your doorstep. The Apartment The apartment features a new kitchen kitted out with everything you need to cook up a storm- induction cooktop, dishwasher, oven, pizza stone and fridge.  The bedroom is big with comfy queen size bed and massive wardrobe space.  We have installed a new bathroom with a wonderful  rain-head shower and full sized bath and heated towel rack. Other features include bamboo floors, 6 sea- dining room, awesome couch (you won't want to get off it!), TV, stereo, DVD's and internal laundry with washing machine and portable washing line on the balcony. Location We are located in the Eastern Suburbs of Sydney on Alison Road in Kensington which is approx 4 kms to the Sydney CBD. The flat is centrally located and within walking distance
neighborhood_overview: Kensington is a lovely little suburb. It is very safe area. There are many food options within walking distance on Anzac Parade such as Thai, Mexican, Indonesian and Italian.  Plus a lovely cafe called Cafe Jacks that has good coffee and good options for breakfast and lunch. Two blocks walk away is the foodie haven of Danks Street Waterloo where you can have your pick of many restaurants and do your grocery shopping.  The cool area of Surry Hills is also 5 minutes away by bus, Surry Hills also has great restaurants and bars our favourite is Vascos bar and the Clock Hotel- for good pub grub. This area also has a number of designer clothes and jewellery shops.  On Crown st is Messinas the best ice cream shop in Australia!  5 minutes by bus or car and a 15-20 minute walk is Randwick Spot, where  you will be spoilt for choice of restaurants. There is also a  movie cinema- Randwick Ritz and a and a few cool small bars, our top pic is Bat Country right opposite the cinemas.
notes: We would appreciate contacting us via airbnb before making a request.  If you have children then it is your responsibility to ensure their safety at all times in the flat.
transit: The flat is on a major bus transport line and busses come very 2-5 minutes. There are bus stops on both Anzac and the corner of Alison and Doncaster Roads. It is a 7-10 minute bus ride to Central station and 15 mins to Coogee Beach via Randwick. It takes between 20-25 (depending on traffic) minutes to get to Circular Quay- where you can see the Harbour Bridge and Opera House!
access: Price includes unlimited WIFI broadband internet. Also includes all linen and towels and use of all the pots, pans, plates etc in the kitchen. Fresh herbs We have a small balcony that overlooks centennial park feel free to sit out there and have your breakfast whilst listening to the birds in the trees.
interaction: My husband (John) or I will welcome you to the flat and take you through all you need to know for a great holiday.  We will happy to field any questions you might have.
house_rules: We ask that you keep the place neat and tidy. By all means have a fun time, but please respect our neighbours by not having the music up too loud, slamming security door or walking in high heels.   There is to be no smoking inside the flat and please don't ash in our herb garden. We would really appreciate if you could water the plants if you are staying for more than 1 week.

host.host_about:
I am a  fun loving person with a taste for travel and adventure. I like to travel off the beaten path which has taken me to some amazing destinations. I am passionate about nature and find myself more at home in a rainforest then in the city. I love to garden and we have a small balcony garden with a green wall and lots of herbs to add that extra spice to cooking.

The apartment reflects my partner and I laid back style with all the comforts that you will have at home. I will go out of my way to help you during your stay and ensure its clean to a very high standard. We hope that you enjoy your stay.

reviews.comments:
Great stay at Luise's flat. It was modern and new, very clean and simply we felt like home from home.
Luise is a perfect host and so friendly, she provided us with everything we could need to know in sydney. Highly recommended host and definitely I wish to meet her again once I get Sydney.

It was a lovely apartment with a relatively good location. There were numerous buses that could get us to town quickly. The house was very well furnished. The furniture and fittings and kitchenware were all clean and new. The exterior of the building may seem rather run-down but once you enter the apartment, it truly feels like a home away from home. Louise was a great host and we would be happy to return again in the future.
Great place. Clean, modern and tidy.

Absolutely perfect! 
Tidy, clean, tasty furnished. Location is great too: opposite Centennial Park, 15 minutes bus ride to the spectacular beaches of Clovelly and Coogee and 10 minutes to the CBD. 
Louise was a great host, very kind and helpful...I definitely loved her place.

I really enjoyed my stay at Louise's place. She was always responsive an helpful and her apartment has everything you need - not to mention convenient. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend her place to others!
The reservation was canceled 175 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Comfortable apartment right next to a beautiful park. Sits in one of the major traffic hub in eastern Sydney with buses to take you into City and south eastern suburbs conveniently.
Helpful and friendly hosts too!

We have enjoyed our stay at Louise's flat. It is modern and spacious, and full of sun light. All the appliances are new and working excellently. The little herb garden was useful in cooking with fresh herbs. Louise is very considerate and friendly. I would very much recommend the flat for a comfortable unforgotten stay.

I had a fantastic time at Louise's apartment. Its a full of light airy apartment- a quality I just love. It was very neat and tidy with lots of space, great wardrobes and a fully functional kitchen with some lovely spices and goodies. The herb patch is my favourite part and I enjoyed all the fresh thyme roesmary and parsley.
Its a 20 minute bus travel to the city with a great frequency of buses and a bus stop just opposite the house.
Thanks Louise for a wonderful stay :)

Spotless Sydney apartment for a decent price, that hidden gem that we are all secretly looking for. There are few things better than having breakfast on the balcony, on a sunny day, and stalking parrots from nearby trees. Louise was a great host and cared to our every need.

We enjoyed our stay in Louise's apartment this past January. The flat is really  fantastic, both beautiful and practical, very well equipped and pleasant. Louise and John were nice and helpful.  We would recommend this place to anyone. Only one little note: Alison Rd is very busy and rather noisy at the peak hours.

Thank you so much Louise and John, what an amazing apartment and location. We really enjoyed our stay and it made our time in Sydney very relaxing. Would definitely recommend staying here and we will be sure to try and book this apartment for our yearly visits. Thank you again.

We were easily able to walk to our event at Moore Park and it was a cheap taxi fare from neighbouring suburbs of Paddiington and Surry Hills. Some great local dining options also just around the corner. The amazing Coogee beach is an easy car ride away and also has other great dining venues too. I am a lover of dining out but if you wanted to stay in and cook the apartment has a great kitchen too

Louise nous a accueillis très chaleureusement.
On a trouvé un appartement très propre, bien décoré et agencé. Situé entre les belles plages (Coogee, Clovelly, Bondi) et le centre de la City il est très pratique de circuler rapidement en bus d'un côté comme de l'autre (environ 15 mn de trajet).
Nous vous le recommandons volontier.

I spent a lovely long weekend at Louise's apartment. The place is modern, comfortable and spotlessly clean - exactly as it looks in the photos. The location is great too, with easy access into the city and to the beaches. I ummed and ahhed about getting a more expensive, but not as nice place by the beach and i'm really glad I chose not too. This was the perfect for getting around easily and spending  a few days of feeling at home in a city that's very far away from home! Plus Louise could not have been a more accommodating host - thank you for helping to make my last week in Sydney so great.

Very lovely, sunny and clean apartment.
Very tastefully furnished.
All equipment available including washing machine and dryer.
Although we did not meet Louise she arranged everything perfectly!
It might be a little noisy because of nearby mainroad.....

Louise's place was perfect for traveller, work or couple, quiet yet very convenient location with transport at the door to the city in 10 mins, very clean and hospitable hosts, it was a pleasure and I will be returning soon I'm sure

The apartment was as immaculate and perfect as the pictures and has everything u need. The location of the apartment was awesome, a short 5-10min drive to the city and Westfield Eastgardens where we went for a late night movie. The only thing to note is that there are no lifts so be prepared to walk up 4 flight of stairs. Other than that, all was good. Louise was amazing, she was very responsive and helpful. Highly recommended :)

Our stay in Louise's apartment was like a home from home and she was always available, helpful and answered any queries promptly.The bed was very comfortable and our adult son was more than happy on the sofa bed and in front of the TV!
The immediate area was not so good for food shopping but we always managed to get what we needed in the CBD before returning each day. Bus journeys in and out were easily negotiated.
Thank you Louise for making us so welcome!
Another wonderful Airbnb experience! Exceptional apartment with great instructions.

I stayed at Louise apartment for 2 weeks cause it is close to UNSW. It is convenient to visit my son who studies there. The apartment is same as the pictures shown in website, it is very clean with well equipped kitchen. I feel like at home and both me and my husband are satisfied staying here.

Louise's place is fantastically airy and inviting, with big open windows that view out onto the Sydney skyline. The space was plenty big for my girlfriend and I for 4 weeks after we relocated our lives from London to Sydney. The kitchen has everything you need to prepare meals and everything is of top notch quality (we even bought the same kettle after using the one in Louise's kitchen!). The bedroom has the most comfortable bed ever and tons of wardrobe space to store your stuff. Massive TV in the lounge room and the dining table allowed us to work during the day and have full meals of an evening. Buses to the city are right out on Alison Rd and it only takes 20 min to be in the heart of Sydney. Quiet neighbourhood, close to shops in Kensington and a short drive from Randwick/Waterloo for more shopping. Centennial Park across the road is great for weekend walks too.
Had a very good time here, lovely apartment, easy travel as local buses frequent to city, central station,  circular quay, and beaches would highly recommend.Fast wifi. Very friendly welcoming host.

The apartment is as the photos portray it. It is well located, and we got around fairly easily having a car with us.  The sofabed is convenient if you prefer two sleeping places.  The dishwasher and washing machine worked reasonably well and the kitchen was outfitted well enough for cooking some meals at home.  Jenny keeps a great garden outside, and it's nice to have a couple basil or salad leaves at hand.  Do bear in mind the walk up when booking, we were well aware of this, so it was fine, but understandably for some with many bags it could get a little tough.  The neighborhood is otherwise quiet, and parking seemed to work out fine.

Very clean and tidy apartment. Just opposite Centennial Park. Few minutes from the bus station departing to all major stops.  7-8 mins to grocery (a bit expensive but serves your need). The flat is on the second/third floor (stairs no lift). WIFI, TV, Cooking, Heating all facilities available. Highly recommended.

The apartment was very clean and had everything i required for a short stay. Bed was a great size and very comfortable. Really liked the couch, great for relaxing on. Excellent sound system. Louise was very helpful. Everything was as shown in pictures if not better.
Good communication with host. Very central location to all major neighborhoods in the city. Unit is well furnished.
Lovely place! Very convenient to central area (10 mins bus ride), safe place. Will definitely come back again

This place I was just perfect for our trip. The place is just as shown in the pictures: clean, organized, bright. The kitchen is well equipped and the living room / bedroom are very comfortable. It takes only one bus to go to city centre. The host was impeccable, very efficient in the communication and made my first "airbnb" experience so much easier. Totally recommended!
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 58 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Apartment was excellent - cosy, spacy and including all necessities and more - real home away from home. Apartment is very clean, has excellent bed, nice bathroom, all exactly like in the pictures.
Communication with Louise was easy, prompt and polite. 
Lack of aircon did not bother us at all, as it was possible to keep the windows open and thus get nice cool breeze towards evenings and in the night time. We were especially happy about the insect shields in all windows.
We would propably have missed the Centennial park visit if we had stayed elsewhere. Now, as it was so close, we got there on several days and enjoyed the parklife, birds, especially. 
Bus stops were quite close the apartment and there were very frequent schedules, short waits only, to city center (ca. 20 minutes by bus).
Altogether very positive first ever experience for us of using airbnb.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our stay at Louise's place was fantastic - we didn't want to leave! The apartment was very clean with a well-stocked kitchen - everything we needed to have an enjoyable stay was right at our fingertips and Louise was incredibly helpful and had great suggestions for things to do/see. Would recommend for anyone looking for a cozy home base to explore Sydney!
It was good!!!
We needed a base in Sydney for two weeks work and Louise & John's place worked perfectly. It was probably a little better equipped than described: always great to get back to.
a really nice flat, tiny and clean, good for three person. nice kitchen. close to the city and opera. i would stay there again...thx

Wonderful apartment unit. Very clean and cozy. Louise mum was an absolute superstar. Clean bathroom too. Getting to CBD was easy. We always travel by UberX to Central Station which usually will cost us around $12-15 dollars. Many eateries within 10 minutes walking distance. The "travel around guide note" and "house manual print-out" which was prepared by Lousie  was very helpful indeed. The downside is the unit is on the 3rd floor with no lift. But in overall, we enjoyed the stay.
I very enjoyed Louise's flat. It gave a very good experience of what it feels like to live in a modern flat in Sydney.

Louise responded to our requests so quickly both for the initial booking & on arrival to make sure everything was to our satisfaction.
Great location for doing business in Sydney with everything required for the stay. Thanks!

Place as described if not better. Was quite hot without aircon, but still completely bearable. Great location, close to shops, restaurants, bowling, bars etc.. Paid about $15-20 for an uber to circular quay! Thanks for the lovely stay.
Very clean house as it shows in the picture. Me and my family enjoyed staying here. Not really close to city but quite nice neighbourhood!

Just spent a comfortable couple of nights at Louise's spotlessly clean, modern apartment. Everything was exactly as described, the TV is huge, the bed is extremely comfortable and the kitchen has everything you could need to whip up any sort of meal. I hired a car and was able to park easily close by, but the busses are also frequent. The bathroom has a great shower head, and there is a washing machine if you need to do any washing. Louise responded promptly to any messages, and was friendly and helpful. It is on the third floor, so there are stairs to climb, but it does mean that the flat gets a lovely breeze. A 100% positive experience. Thanks again Louise
Clean and tidy, within easy reach of buses to the centre.  Everything we could need was provided.
the appartment was very clean and pretty. Location was absolutely perfect;  not in the center of the city but close enough!
Great place to stay.  They are very helpful if you need anything

Nice host  Beautiful flat. Convenient  transportation. Good location 
Everything was perfect so my friends and I had great time:)
Close to amenities, lovely, clean & good value for money.
Louise is such a nice host. She answered my every single question patiently and gave us thorough instructions. She's really thoughtful and she prepares everything that you can think of in the house.

The room is clean with beautiful sunrooms. Close to bus station and national park. 
However, i am very disappointed about what happened here. After I went back to my home. The house ownner emailed me about several questions need me to pay. He mentioned about stains on the rug in the living room and damage to the rug. (I strongly doubt this point) and also mentioned the flat was not left very clean (We washed all dished, throwed all wastes and cleaned living room). We are still discussing about the repaire fee. Please everyone, be caution.

Louise's apartment was very clean and tidy. We were greeted by her partner in the afternoon and he showed us where everything was. 
Was so close to public transport, shops and restaurants. We had the best time and would recommend this place to anyone.
The apartment was so clean and tidy. Very helpful, we did get a little lost, made contact and all sorted. Overall it was a great stay, great apartment in a great location.
Louise’s place is ideally located to walk to SCG (Sydney Cricket Ground) or any type of event located at Moore Park.
Louise was so friendly and welcoming with us. Her place is so clean and nice. Short drive to Bondi beach and Coogee beach. Loved stay here!
Great location and value for money. Check in and out was easy. Would definitely recommend.

fantastic place. close to airport, Sydney cricket ground/ Allianz stadium entertainment quarter. 
louise was efficient with responses, and her apartment has everything you'd need. 
thanks louise!
Great location between airport and city.

Louise’s place was really nice. The rooms and beds were as described and nice and clean. The only downside was that the parking was really inconvenient. There wasn’t parking guaranteed for us, and the back streets weren’t clean whether it was one way or not, so it was a bit dangerous. There was only two visitor spots that could only fit small cars, not recommended for big cars. 
Other than that, everything else was awesome. Was a very homey and cute place with heating and a nice TV.

I spent a very good time in Louise's apartment. Everything was as described. The arrival was very easy with the key in the key lock and Louise and her husband gave me all the information needed. They were very responsive and available by email. Internet connection worked perfectly in the apartment. The amazing city center is accessible by several buses (bus stop is about one minute by walk). The surrounding is quiet, I really appreciated the parrots coming on the balcony in the morning. Thanks Louise and John.

Louise's flat is a great, centrally located space with tons of beautiful natural light, easy access to public transportation and across-the-street proximity to a wonderful Sydney public park! Louise went out of her way to welcome us to her flat and go over local eateries, beaches and transportation for our trip. The flat was a great start to our Aussie adventures!

Excellent host! Very responsive and helpful prior to booking. Also available to assist during stay if required (though in our case not required). Apartment very well presented and clean. Excellent location for the Kensington area and also for commuting to city; public transport very easy to manage and close by. Thank you very much. Would definitely book again.

name: Room w/pvt bathroom on Central Park
summary: A beautiful guest bedroom with private black marble bathroom in my renovated 3BR apartment on the Upper West Side of Manhattan; right on Central Park West in a classic turn-of-the century (pre-war) building, right near subway, buses, museums & more!
space: Hello! I have a dedicated, beautiful guest bedroom with a private black marble bathroom, in my apartment in Manhattan on the Upper West Side. This classic New York building is turn-of-the century (pre-war / c. 1912), on the corner of Central Park West and 100th street... across the street is Central Park! It was renovated before I moved in (2004) and just had it re-painted in early July 2018.  The apartment is conveniently located near subway and buses... within walking distance to over a dozen museums, and you can get almost anywhere in Manhattan within 20-40 minutes, door-to door! * Since the question comes up a lot, I am only renting this bedroom, not the entire apartment (I live in 3rd bedroom!). If you need another room, I rent out the other room in this apartment, please check out my other listing. Also, please do not rent the room because of the piano... this is not a practice studio or a concert instrument. Guests may use the piano occasionally but its not for hours of practice
description: A beautiful guest bedroom with private black marble bathroom in my renovated 3BR apartment on the Upper West Side of Manhattan; right on Central Park West in a classic turn-of-the century (pre-war) building, right near subway, buses, museums & more! Hello! I have a dedicated, beautiful guest bedroom with a private black marble bathroom, in my apartment in Manhattan on the Upper West Side. This classic New York building is turn-of-the century (pre-war / c. 1912), on the corner of Central Park West and 100th street... across the street is Central Park! It was renovated before I moved in (2004) and just had it re-painted in early July 2018.  The apartment is conveniently located near subway and buses... within walking distance to over a dozen museums, and you can get almost anywhere in Manhattan within 20-40 minutes, door-to door! * Since the question comes up a lot, I am only renting this bedroom, not the entire apartment (I live in 3rd bedroom!). If you need another room, I rent out the
neighborhood_overview: The Upper West Side is a residential area of Manhattan next to Central Park. Its wonderful to be in Manhattan but not directly in the heart of the hustle n bustle of midtown (though you can be there in about 20 min!)
notes: This is an older building so it has quirks that older buildings tend to have. Its charming an beautiful, but its not a modern building with all the amenities! Also this is a 4th floor walkup, no elevator. Any questions please ask :-)
transit: Subway and busses are just a couple blocks away on 96th St. Can get anywhere in the city in about 20-40 min by public transportation. For people unfamiliar with the subway and bus system I recommend using (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Maps to get detailed travel directions. Also if you are here for more then a few days, get a weekly metro card for unlimited rides!
access: Guests have access to the room they rent, and the living room/kitchen.
interaction: I work from home, so I am in my room a lot during the daytime, and often out in the evenings. I try to be home during guest checkins, but sometimes is not possible. Lets be in contact a day or two before you travel to arrange for checkin time. If not home, I can easily leave the keys in a lockbox outside the building door.
house_rules: No Smoking or drugs. Food and booze in apartment belongs to myself and roommates, but you are more then welcome to bring your own.  Considerate, clean and quiet guests only... no party animals please :-) Please do not eat in the bedroom or leave food open. Food must be put away into the cabinets or fridge... this is still NYC, and we don't want an "unwelcome guests"! Please be aware that this building is a 4th floor walk up.  If you were to need any assistance with your luggage just let me know I'll be glad to help.  Please do not rent the room because of the piano... this is not a practice studio or a concert instrument. Guests may use the piano occasionally but its not for hours of practice a day. No events, parties, or photoshoots allowed.  The apartment is in a pre-war (old early 1900's) building. It has some quirks, but the apartment itself is newly renovated. I will do whatever I can to accommodate any reasonable guest requests. Any questions - please feel free to ask!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Greetings! My name is Patrick Soluri -  I grew up here in New York City! I am a composer, writing music for ballet, opera, film and TV. I also run Prohibition Productions, the largest independent producer of hot jazz & swing dance events in NYC.

reviews.comments: Patrick and his roommate are very nice and always willing to help. The apartment was very clean and the room was big enough for 2 people. The bed was soft and comfy. Also they were out all the time and we basically had the whole apartment! The apartment was warm and had good Wi-fi coverage. The location is great, it is a quiet neighborhood, and everything you need is just around the corner. Highly recommended.

We had a great experience in NY! Patrick's flat is really nice, just in front of Central Park. It was easy to move from there (subway 5 min walking) Patrick and his roommate Anthony welcomed us warmly and they tried to help us every time we needed it! We recommand this place to all those who are looking for a quiet, comfortable and tidy  place in NY.

My friend Cody and I came to NYC for our Spring Break, and we decided to stay in Patrick's private room. It was WONDERFUL to say the least! He was an amazing host.
