staying at patrick's place was a delight! the 4-storey walkup was no problem for us, and we appreciated the 'forced' exercise after eating our way through nyc anyway! location was good and in a quiet neighbourhood, near the B/C subways so we could get to the major spots easily. we stayed for 9 nights and the common areas were always kept clean, the ensuite tub was a pleasant have as well. we won't hesitate to book this place again should we return to nyc :)

Patrick is an excellent host, his place is 100% as described, and excellent. 
If you want a quiet place to crash in NYC, this is unbeatable. 
Being directly across street from Central Park and citibike kiosk is superb.

La prise de contact et l'accueil avec Patrick se sont très bien passé.
L'appartement est idéalement situé  (proche metro/bus, central park et commerces), et le bâtiment a beaucoup de cachet et est très calme.
seul point négatif: un manque d'hygiène dans la cuisine  (frigo et gazinière) ainsi que dans la chambre ou nous avons trouvé plusieurs cafards.
Great location! Close to public transportation and Patrick was really accommodating.
The location is fantastic. Patrick was very nice and always answered quickly. I Would definitely stay at this place again.
Excellent location almost on top of Central Park and close to public transport. Patrick did a great job of providing us with information regarding sites to see as well as places to eat!

Patrick's place is an amazing value for NYC. We visited during a heat wave in July and were thankful for the AC. The apartment is quiet and clean and close to subway, bus, and Whole Foods. Take the time to read through Patrick's printed info sheet waiting for you in your room and your stay will be the better for it. We would definitely stay here again.
Close to subway and Central Park.
Thanks To Patrick who was helpfull each time we needed. The appartement is very well located and the bed is confortable.

The apartment is very nice for travelers who are looking for a safe place close to the subway station and Central Park. The host is very friendly, helpful and good at communication. If you are concerned about the noise of the cars and people, this place is perfect for getting a good night sleep.
good place, safe, and close to subway.

Patrick's place is great! Very well located, you can either choose to walk or take the subway from very close by. Everything was super clean and Patrick was super fast to communicate when we had questions. Would absolutely recommend!
Patrick is nice host in his apartment. The location is really good to explore near Central Park NYC or go around the NYC by Subway.
Thank you very much Patrick for letting us Stay at yours - it was the Perfect Bnb for only a few days we had in New York! :)

The apartment is directly opposite of Central Park. There is a Metro Station just a corner away. 
The room is pretty small, we came with a bunch of stuff from our three week trip through the US. We couldn’t even open both our suitcases at the same time. The bed was not so very comfortable, but since you’ll probably just stay a couple of nights, it’s okay.  
Patrick, the host, was really nice, gave us a lot of advice and tips. 
If you’ll be out and about all day, the apartment is alright. If you want to stay in, try to find something bigger, more comfortable.
Patrick's place is clean, quiet, and in a great location.  The bed is really comfortable.  Connecting with Patrick was easy.  I would stay here again.
Patrick's place has the potential to be a wonderful and homey spot in NYC, however that was not the case for us. It is in a great location near central park, and offers easy access to public transit.
Great location, just the opposite of the central park. Less than 5 mins walk to Metro Station. The room is clean and 100% as described. The host is very helpful and friendly!

As my  first time experience of Airbnb this was excellent. Patrick's apartment is very nice; a good room with its own lovely bathroom, and the location is fabulous!  The apartment block may look like a little bit of faded glory but  the apartment is wonderful. And the 4 flights of stairs are character-building after a big day out. Patrick is  a gracious host,  and very helpful. Can't recommend it enough.

Patrick's place is super cozy! It comes with a bonus work out up the his suite which is really not as bad as I thought it would be. My boyfriend and I were able to fall into a deep sleep and wake up feeling refreshed in the morning.

There is ample storage within the room so you can unpack and organize. The private bathroom is a rare find and definitely advantageous after a whole day of exploring. Location is great with lots of food and transit options. We felt safe the entire time there and Central Park is so close!

We loved the location, close to the park, great food, bars and transport links. We got to explore what felt like a more authentic part of the city away from the crowds.
The apartment was everything you can wish from a NY apartment - comfy bed and exposed brick wall included(!)
We had some ensuite troubles that Patrick was very quick to sort out. There were a couple of nights where we were woken up by other house mates on their return home. After exploring the city or needing to get up for a flight this was a little frustrating but we do understand it is their home.
All in all a great stay, thank you Patrick.

The apartment location is great and the host was quick to respond on queries and friendly.

However a few things that really disappointed us
1.	The apartment is a lot smaller and darker than advertised.
2.	If you like a semi firm mattress and a good night's sleep then this place is not for 
       you.  Bed was super soft and super noisy.  Every turn woke us as well as being able to 
       hear everything in the room next door.
3.	We found the Apartment to be only clean on the surface .(in our experience)  The (Website hidden by Airbnb) toilet had dirty rings and the bath/shower tiles was full of limescale. The kitchen 
       area where you are meant to store your food was dirty with old dripping food stains (Website hidden by Airbnb) Fridge and cooker very much the same.  We chose not to cook or eat at the 
       apartment.
4.	We could hear everything in the room next door which also had guest in.
5.	Apartment was quite smelly and could really do with a scented candle or room (Website hidden by Airbnb) scent.

We checked out earlier and got a hotel nearby which offered us a similar price.  We could finally get a good night’s sleep and peach of mind.
Our takeaway lesson was to also take note of the negative reviews and not rely on a percentage of good vs bad.

Great location, safe, and very accessible to everything I needed. Patrick was very good host, check-in was fast, almost all the information were given.  The host was easy to talk to, and was willng to answer all my inquiries. About his place, I have no complaints. Highly recommended!
A great New York space! We arrived super late but check in was a breeze, the space was beautiful, the bed was comfy, and the bedroom was QUIET. That’s a serious amenity in New York!
Cozy flat!

Patrick was a great host! Check in was quick and easy, and Patrick even left tips and recommendations for things to do around his place. It’s also right next to Central Park, literally. So you really couldn’t have a better location! Close to subway stops make it easy to get downtown, we couldn’t have asked for anything better!

Staying at Patrick’s place was as easy as abc. The place was clean, he was super responsive and truly made an effort to be home when I arrived. 
The location is amazing, right at Central Park with convenient stores close by. 
Would definitely stay at his place again and/or recommend him and his Airbnb to others. 
Thanks again, Patrick!

Patrick’s place was great! It was no-frills, but we loved the location to everything and his hospitality. Communication was great and easy, and Patrick was a wonderful host. Having the private bathroom connected to the bedroom made things extra comfortable and allowed us our privacy. If we come back, we would stay here again in a heart beat!

Comfortable and cozy! The place is great, clean, and having our own bathroom was fantastic. Patrick is an amazing host, he provided us some tips to places around and always replied to our texts. Definitely will come back!

This was a great spot for our trip. Across the street from Central Park, food, coffee, and groceries just a block away! The bed was clean and comfortable, and the shower had hot water - just what we were looking for!
Patrick was really helpful and flexible when we had issues with our airline, and the location is perfect for exploring manhattan and the rest of New York.

Patrick’s place was very clean, safe location! It was surprisingly very quiet at night with it being such a busy a city was expecting to hear sirens all night. Patrick’s place is right off the north part of Central Park! He is super close to the subway as well! He was a great host and very accommodating for us! We would definitely recommend his place!
Great experience, excellent location
Patrick's place is a great location, near 96th St. metro and Central Park.  Patrick is very friendly and accessible and his place has a great vibe!
You can expect Patrick to be a wonderful host!
Great location. Very professional and friendly host.
It felt like New York.  Not a cookie cutter hotel room.  I will difitnately stay again if given an opportunity.
This location is perfect overall. You’re like 100ft away from Central Park 1
I appreciate Patrick being flexible.  he is very kind and welcoming.
Great ubication. Lovely apartment. Recommended 100%

name: Friday I'm in Love - Gorgeous 2Bedroom Flat Lagoa
summary: Cute quiet apartment with two bedrooms, a washroom a bathroom a service bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, large, spacious and bright living room on a a very quiet street. Close to Humaita, Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas e Jardim Botânico. Great Location!
space: Two bedrooms, one with a king size double bed another with two singles, a double futon in the living where two more people can sleep. Fully equipped kitchen, Large, spacious and airy living room, laundry, renovated bathrooms. Close To Humaita and its wide choice of restaurants and night life. Close to the Lagoa for the practice of sports, a nice morning run, close to Jardim Botanico, Gavea. You will be amazed to stay here.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Hi, 
These are Shushma e Nityam - Nityam is my son and together we manage quite a few properties in Rio.

I was named Shushma by my Spiritual teacher, Satyaprem, and this is how I wish to be called. My previous name was Lakini and for sometime you will still see reviews for my old name.
Nityam is my son and his name was also given by our teacher Satyaprem.

We live in Rio de Janeiro and we love this city!

Rio is a wonderful place to be, the nature, the beaches, bars, restaurants, the "carioca's" laid back style, the music, the dance , there is so much charm to it!!

We are advertising a few places here at AirBnB, so people can come and stay  in Rio according to their personal preferences, demands, needs and naturally to their own budgets.

Get in touch with us and our agency, Hot Spot Homes and we will do our best to help you find the right accommodation whether it is for your family, friends or other travel companions.

Airport pick ups, tour guides, house cleaning and babysitting can be arranged upon previous requirement at additional cost.

We are into meditation, healthy lifestyle, Arts and Traveling.
Nityam is a photographer and gymnast.

At work we enjoy making sure you get a nice, comfy and clean place to stay, we love welcoming people to our city and to our country. 
If you book one of our Hot Spots you will receive a list of suggestions of places to visit and tips how to make the most of your trip in Rio. 
We love decoration and providing a homy atmosphere to wherever we go.
Looking forward to be your next hosts in Rio ;)

Thank you!

Warm regards,

Shushma and Nityam



Dear guests, 

Please, make sure you get the correct rates for Special seasons, holidays and special events in town. Sometimes the rates may not be updated in some of the apartments, so please, inquire first.
NOTE: rates vary according to the different seasons.

Bank Holidays, New Year's, Carnival, summer days and Olympics have special rates. 
Please, keep this in mind!

Please, inquire before sending reservation requests. This is very important. Most apartments are being advertised on other sites too, unfortunately we do not have a tool to keep all the dates updated in all of them.

I will be glad to help you find the best suited location for you, your travel companions and family.

Warm regards from Rio de Janeiro,

Shushma

reviews.comments: Oda gorünenden biraz küçük ancak fiyatına göre yeterli. Balkon kapısında açıklık vardî ruzgar ve ses rahatsiz etti.Mahalle biraz ıssız. Sıcak su sorunu vardı 2 gün kullanamadık ancak giderildi heralde o da bizim şanssızlığımız. Hotel çalışanları ilgiliydi ayrıca ücretsiz temizlik de yaptılar.

I really was impressed with Mehmet and his staff !!! They are really the best I've ever met !) The room is the same as the photo is. The staff is more than just helpful . It was really a big pleasant for me to be here .

Apartment is located close to the public transport. It took us 10 minutes to reach the metro station and around 15 to find the main street with shops and restaurants. So it is the best place for people who want to travel. Owner was really nice and everybody was ready to help us.
Очень хорошее местоположение. Мехмет отзывчивый и всегда помогал. За такие деньги лучше не найти.
Mehmet was always helpful. I had no problem with his place. Very close to taksim square.

I stayed 11 nights / 12 days at this property.. 

The hotel cleanness is perfect .. the bed is comfortable too. 
The hotel at quite area with friendly neighbors.
Easy access to Taksim metro and Istiklal street.
Mehmet and Hassan are the best they help me a lots during my stay and they always answer my calls..

We stayed 14 nights and had no problem with this place. Staffs were always helpful. Internet was slower than I expected, but everything else was good as described. It's located very close to Taksim square. as a semi-local guy who lived in Istanbul for 4 years, I should warn you that most affordable apartments are 4-5 story buildings without elevator. Today is your lucky day! this affordable apartment has an elevator, book this if you don't want to climb five stories every day :)
Very nice staying and host was amazingly friendly!
Small but cosy room close to Taxim and Istiklal. Very clean and good service. We had a problem with the lock which was fixed immediately.
The host was very kind and very helpful from the moment we arrived. The rooms are as it seems in the photos. It's just a 5 minute walk away from Taksim which is very convenient.
2 gece kaldık, oda beklediğimizden küçük olsa da güzeldi. Taksim'e ve istiklale son derece yakın, cadde üstü değil. Sessiz ve guzel bir mekandı. Fiyat-konum olarak çok iyiydi.
He was friendly and helpful

The place is run like a hotel room but cheaper. There is somebody available for you 24/7 in the lobby. Very convenient. The water temperature and pressure can change a lot in the shower but that's a quite common problem in istanbul. If things like that bother you, mabye it is not the right city  ;)

Mehmet has been a great host during our 6 day stay in Istanbul. The residence is located is a very lively neighbourhood with many restaurants and cafés around, just a few minutes from Taksim square. Good value for money.
Personnel sympa et excellent placement

Hi everyone wishing to stay here,
very nice place, close to transport witch you will need in a big city. Only 1 min to a large choice of buses and taksim metro station is only 4 min away. Also securue place and always peaple are aroud the street. It will be your right choice.

The staff of the place are very friendly, and they will try their best to help you. However, The only main problem is that the street where the place is, is so noisy and you can’t sleep at all at night. So if you don’t mind not getting a proper sleep go for this. If you are the kind with a light sleep, skip booking here.

The staff are nice and friendly.  the location of the place is nearby taksim square.However, at night lots of noise there. drunk women around shouting and people just talk so loud i think in that street. The rooms need a bit of maintenance also. You can find cheaper places with that same standard. So i was expecting something slightly better.

neighborhood_overview: POP ART flat from the 70! With open views from all sides of the flat. Car free street ! No noise ! 3 min walk  to metro stations FONTANA or LESSEPS (  3 min to Catalunya Square) for airobus to airport.  Nearby the trendy shops ,bars, restaurants and the beautiful squares of GRACIA.    GRACIA is a trendy neighbourhood along with BORN or EIXAMPLE, the most visited areas in barcelona. There is a huge amount of restaurants, bars and design boutiques. There are small and charming squares with terrasses, a relaxing place to have a drink. GRACIA is in the middle of Barcelona, very well connected through metro or bus. 10 minutes walking to Paseo de Gracia or Rambla Catalunya. Very well connected!! Airport Plaza Catalunya  by bus  Take L3 ( 3 stops ) 3 min walk to the flat Take train from airport to Passeig de gracia  Take L 3  ( 2 stops ) 3 min walk to the flat. 20 min walk distance from the center of BARCELONA
notes: THE PRICES ARE BASED FOR 2 PEOPLE, For 3 or 4 guest cheque price list , just a additional amount extra to cover linen and general cost.  Pls be honest don't book for 2 and come with 4 as we will find out and Airbnb will be contacted.  My prices are below standard prices for what you get.   Baby's go for free and I have one cot available  Several discount  during the year just Cheque regular prices and availability.  You can  split   your holidays in Barcelona with some days at the beach in Sitges, 30 kms aways from Barcelona where we have another appartment. By traín via Passeig de gracia only 4 stops to Sitges !!You can have a look at www.airbnb.es/rooms/719943
transit: The flat is very well located, in the middle of Barcelona, only a 3 minute walk to Fontana metro station L·3, two stops to Passeig de gracia ,three stops to Plaza Catalunya.,five stops to the port/ beach  . A 15 min walk to Parque Guell.  Bus stop ( nr 39) to borne / zoo/ trainstation (estation de Francia ) beach ( barceloneta) and end stop W hotel . Several Supermarkets around the corner  and few minutes away of shopping street of gracia, cafes , bars , restaurants , vintage shops ...... Connections to airport via Passeig de gracia metro station ( traín) or via plz Catalunya ( Airbus)
access: What you see is what you get .. Access to the hole flat and bedrooms. Very nice decorated and maintained. Updates whenever I can. Very high cleaning standards. Also a patio for smokers as inside it's forbidden. Car parking at 1 min from the flat at 20 e for 24h PLS ASK IF FLAT IS AV BEFORE MAKING BOOKING TO BE SURE.  Thanks Ps: possible to stay for min 2 night on request !

house_rules: Behave and respect this place as you would do the same at home. Feel home and enjoy your stay. My house is yours and if you are not happy with something just let me know I am mostly 24 h available . Smokers are welcome if you use patio area to smoke this in respect to non smokers. Unfortunately pets are not allowed as I have strict cleaning rules.

host.host_about:
HI THERE
come and stay with us !

reviews.comments: Peter was a very thorough host, making sure I had everything I could possibly need during my stay, and his communication via email was great. His place, newly renovated, was amazing and very comfortable. His flat is located in a great district of Barcelona so you won't be disappointed! Additionally, the high-speed internet was extremely appreciated.

Unser Gastgeber holte uns sogar von der Metrostation Fontana ab, um uns zur Wohnung zu begleiten. Die Wohnung liegt in einem sympathischen Viertel in einer verkehrsberuhigten Straße. Gegenüber befindet sich der Schulhof, auf dem es manchmal etwas lebendiger zugeht. Wir mochten das. Die Wohnung liegt im ersten Stock und ist liebevoll renoviert worden. Uns hat sie auf Anhieb gefallen. Sie bietet alles, was man sich wünscht. Sogar einen lauschigen Patio, wo man wunderbar speisen oder ein Gläschen Wein trinken kann. Der Vermieter hat wirklich an alles gedacht, was für einen längeren Aufenthalt nötig ist. Vom Bügeleisen über Föhn, der Nespresso-Maschine bis zur Waschmaschine ist alles da. Wenn man mal keine Lust hatte, Essen zu gehen, gab es ja noch die toll eingerichtete Küche. Das Kochen hat richtig Spaß gemacht. Paul hat uns aber auch mit ausgezeichneten Ausflugs- und Restauranttipps versorgt. Ich kann diese Unterkunft nur jedem empfehlen.

The flat was great. It is situated in convenient area with lots of cafes, supermarkets and close to metro station. The flat is stylish and has nice terrace. The only thing may be confusing is a school on the other side of the road so it was noisy after 8:30 a.m.
Hemos disfrutado mucho de la estancia en la casa de Peter Paul, tambien del barrio y de la amabilidad del anfitrión. Esperamos poder repetir!

We were very pleased with our entire experience. Peter Paul came down to meet us at metro station,  to guide us to apartment. The apartment is very conveniently located near metro, dining, shopping, and sightseeing. Barcelona was honestly our favorite city of several we visited. Peter is very friendly and helpful, made us feel right at home. He spent at least an hour with us on our arrival at the apartment answering our questions, making suggestions,  recommendations about seeing the city. The apartment is in a very nice area, feels very safe.  It has been updated recently and has everything you could need. There is an elevator which helps with luggage. But it is only on second floor. Peter Paul was awesome. He made himself available for any questions or problems that might come up. Great guy.  Highly recommend his place and will definitely stay there on our next trip. I know the review is quite positive, but this is honestly our experience. Enjoy.

Situation idéale à Barcelone, le quartier de Gracia est pour moi le meilleur quartier de Barcelone pour séjourner près du centre tout en profitant du calme !
L' appartement de Peter est très propre, et parfaitement situé à 2 min à pied de la station de métro.
Nous avons particulièrement apprécié la petite terrasse et la décoration de l appartement tout neuf.
2 grandes chambre aérées, savon et essuies à disposition, rien à redire!
Pour notre hôte Paul, merci pour sa sympathie et ses conseils pour Barcelone !
Un appartement charmant, un hôte super sympa et le meilleur quartier de Barcelone, parfait merci!

Svensk vers
En riktigt fin designad och fräsch lya mitt i smeten med alla nödvändiga faciliteter bl.a. ett fullt utrustad kök med alla tillbehör, ett nytt renoverat badrum, ett stort sovrum med dubbelsäng och mindre rum med två enkla sängar, fräscha sängkläder gör att ni känner er som hemma. Den lilla terrasen tillför extra touch till det hela! Värden är mycket hjälpsam och hjälper till ifall ni behöver ngt eller undrar. Ligger nära tuben och sevärdigheter. Slå till om ni har möjlighet - bästa upplevelse hittills på airbnb! 

Enlgish vers
A really nice and clean appartment at cool and exciting location. You get all possible facilities like fully equipped kitchen, new bathroom, wi-fi, air conditioning, new bed clothes perfect for both short and longer stay for 2-3 ppl with liten own garden! The host is also really helpful person so you can feel our safe ! Best experience so far on airbnb!

Wir hatten einen sehr angenehmen Aufenthalt in dieser wirklich schönen Wohnung. Es ist alles vorhanden, was das Herz begehrt, z.B. Klima-Anlage, Fernseher, Nespressomaschine, Mikrowelle, ein bequemes Doppelbett, elektrische Rolläden im großen Schlafzimmer,  u.s.w. Auch das Badezimmer ist recht groß und duschen  kann man mit Blick auf die schöne Holzterrasse. Peter Paul war äußerst nett und entgegen kommend. Zu erwähnen ist noch die ruhige Lage, da die kleine Straße, an der das Apartment liegt, durch zwei in der Mitte aufgestellte große Blumenschalen nicht von Autos durchfahren werden kann. Gerne jederzeit wieder!!!

Our host Peter Paul was waiting for us at the apartment.  The apartment is lovely and very well equipped.  It has everything you need in the kitchen to cook a nice meal.  
He also has an electricity adapter so we could use and charge our computer, phone, ipad.  
The apartment is extremely clean and beautiful.  Two comfortable bedrooms, a nice bathroom with a great shower, a roomy living room/dining room, a nice kitchen, and a lovely private patio.
The apartment also has good air conditioning, which was great during the warm Barcelona summer.  It is great to come back from walking around the town and being able to turn on the air conditioning and relax.
The apartment is located within a block of the street Carrer Gran de Gracia, with lost of shops and restaurants.  The neighborhood is lovely and not touristy.  You see lots of families and locals.  The apartment is on a very quiet street, so you can sleep very well.  
Peter Paul was available to us for any questions we had, and checked in through e-mail to see if we needed anything.  
We traveled with our 8-year old daughter, and the place was very comfortable for her, as well as the neighborhood.  There are parks and plazas nearby with playground equipment.  There are also lots of toy stores and gelaterias.
We highly recommend this apartment.  Thank you Peter Paul, for helping us have a lovely stay at your apartment!  We will definitely stay here again next time we are in Barcelona.

Peter Paul's apartment is a nice place to stay in Barcelona. The terrace is nice for a morning coffee and evening chat, especially during the warm summer. It's near a metro station and in a quiet area of the vibrant Gracia neighborhood. The rooms are silent and cosy enough to welcome 3 to 4 persons. I didn't get the chance to meet Peter Paul, but in his pro-active communication he was always helpful, correct and friendly.

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona. The apartement being close to L3/Fontana we could reach any destination in B. in no time. The apartment is quite nice and we had everything we needed. We'd come back anytime! Thanks a lot to Peter!

Amazing amazing apartment! In a quiet and beautiful area...you have everything you need walks away, all public transportation to wherever you want in barcelona..
The apartment was clean and beautiful just waiting to host us.
Peter was an amazing host with all the information available to us ..everything se needed he provided and was always available...We had a blast!

The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed. The location was also very convenient- close to 2 metro stops, shops, cafes, supermarkets, and major attractions. Peter Paul was also very flexible with letting us check-in early due to our early arrival. This was a great place to stay!

Het appartement is leuk ingericht, mix tussen modern en jaren 70 stijl en ligt in de leuke wijk Gracia. Wij waren er in augustus waarbij het de hele maand augustus feest is Gracia. Peter Paul stemt alles netjes af en is erg behulpzaam.

Il s'agissait de notre troisième séjour à Barcelone et donc de notre troisième logement. Celui-ci était de loin le meilleur des trois! L'emplacement était parfait : à quelques minutes de la ligne 3 du métro (très très pratique!), à quelques rues des fêtes de Gracia mais loin du tumulte qui s'en dégageait. Le quartier est calme et les voisins aussi! La chambre principale, bien qu'elle donne sur la rue, a été très confortable, car la rue en question est une impasse donc quasiment aucun trafic, seulement des piétons donc idéal. 

Peter a véritablement été un hôte parfait! Pour commencer, il était là à notre arrivée, souriant et agréable.. il a même fait l'effort de nous parler en Français. Il nous a fait visiter l'appartement, très propre, décoré avec soin et très bien agencé. L'appartement était fidèle aux nombreuses photos publiées. On y a trouvé tout ce dont on avait besoin (jusqu'au fer à repasser et le presse agrumes!). Le patio et la climatisation sont appréciables.
Peter s'est rendu disponible et prompt à nous conseiller. Attention, il n'était pas omniprésent mais disponible lorsque nous le sollicitions, ce que nous avons vraiment apprécié. 

Bref, nous avons tout aimé et espérons pouvoir renouveler cette belle expérience lors de notre prochain séjour. Nous vous recommandons donc vivement ce petit nid douillet où chacun devrait facilement trouver ses marques.

We stayed in Barcelona for four days. Peter's flat was just perfect. Spacious, clean, well-equipped, located in the centre of Barcelona with metro and bus stations just around the corner. Peter is a lovely host! He was very flexible in terms of arrival and departure time. We were able to store our luggage during the day and only picked it up when departing for our evening flights. Thank you for having us, Peter

Nuestra experiencia en Barcelona fue muy positiva. Empezando por el apartamento de Peter Paul que resultó todo lo que se anuncia en la página de Airbnb, además de muy limpio y completo. Tiene una excelente ubicación y por ausencia del anfitrión fue dignamente representado por Marcelo y Oscar. Volvería, y lo recomiendo 
Merece resaltarse la hospitalidad y gentileza de los catalanes. Fue una muy grata experiencia en todo. Larga vida a Catalunya

We had the most fantastic stay at Peter Paul's wonderful apartment. Situated in a great and convenient location the apartment has everything you need including a lovely terrace. 

You can tell Peter Paul really takes pride in the place as it is super clean and decorated with cool '70s decor and lots of little touches like maps, leaflets, tea, coffee, shower gel all those little things you need. 

Gracia itself has lots of lovely shops, bars and restaurants - we liked Sol Soler and Cafe De Sol at Placa de Sol very near to the apartment where you can sit out on the terrace eating good and inexpensive tapas and drinking cocktails. 

From the apartment it's just a few moments walk to Fontana Metro and there is a great bus just around the corner that goes all the way to Ciutedella Park and the beach in around 20 minutes. 

Both Oscar who welcomed us and Peter
Paul who came and saw us off and checked on us through the visit were kind and went out of their way to be flexible, letting us check out late and waiting for us when we arrived later than planned. 

If you are looking for a spotless, well equipped apartment in a great area, as your base for exploring Barcelona then this is it! I would stay there again in a heartbeat, it's fab!
The flat was beautiful and the location was perfect!  Peter was a fabulous host and extremely helpful and accommodating.  I would recommend his place and I hope to come back soon.

Nuestra experiencia en la casa de Peter Paul fue total! La casa es exactamente igual a las fotografías mostradas en el anuncio. La casa es cómoda, espaciosa, muy luminosa y tiene una preciosa terracita que convierte la estancia en ideal!
La calle donde se encuentra el apartamento es muy silenciosa. 
El barrio es perfecto, la casa está muy cerca del metro y tiene buenas combinaciones de bus. A tres manzanas hay una calle llena de tiendas y bares muy símpatica.
Peter es muy amable y no puso ningún reparo en acomodarse a nuestros horarios de entrada o salida.
Y un detalle simpático es que hay una escuela en frente y con la entrada y salida de los niños la casa se llena de sonrisas infantiles. 
Si volvemos a Barcelona no dudaremos en volver a casa de Peter Paul!!!

Uma ótima experiência minha primeira utilização do Airbnb! O apartamento era exatamente como nas fotos e descrições, de fácil acesso e bem localizado . Peter Paul foi muito pontual, atencioso e sempre disposto.

Peter's appartment was spotlessly clean and in a brilliant location and just as the pictures would have you believe. Anything we needed he would help with. Peter was very very quick to communicate and nothing was too much trouble. I would go back there many times. Thank you Peter!

We were made very welcome by Sandra and found the flat very comfortable. It is in a quiet neighbourhood at night but with bars and cafes close by. There is a primary school opposite which gave us a reasonably early wake-up call, useful to get us moving, but this was a minor inconvenience. Peter let us leave our bags at the flat until we had to leave for the airport which was very useful. The balcony would be a perfect place to sit out on in the summer.

Nous avons passé un bon séjour chez Peter, l'appartement est spacieux et agréable. Peter est très sympathique et disponible. Nous avons apprécié le quartier de Gracia et ses petites rues commerçantes. 
L'appartement est un peu sonore mais la rue est calme en dehors des sorties d'école et le quartier est calme aussi.

The apartment was exactly as described and totally what we needed. The location was superb and Peter was extremely helpful.  We spent five days here and loved being able to hang out here when we just needed a break.

We loved the apartment! it was really cosy and the area of gracia was just perfect for us. the most thing we liked at the apartment was the balkon which is awesome!

Peter was really helpfull and waited for us to arrive at the place (which was a bit late) 
it made our stay in barcelona perfect and we would go back there any time!
Peter was great. His apartment was stylish, we'll kept, and centrally located. I would stay here again!

I had  an amazing stay at ORANGE Tree view flat which is ideally located in Gracia barrio. Everything just look like exactly the picture. The flat is very well furnished and equipped with everything you might need to feel just like home (Pan, salt, iron, hair dryer, extra blanket...). It is perfect for a family and Peter has been a perfect host explaining us how to reach the flat and collecting us at tube station, giving us advice for enjoying BCN. I will certainly come back.

Beste Peter

We hadden een perfect verblijf in jouw appartement, alles was zeer net en het appartement ziet eruit als op de foto's. Gracia is een toffe wijk om te verblijven, gezellig en authentiek. Het in- en uitchecken verliep vlot en het was fijn dat we de bagage even langer konden laten, zo hebben we nog op ons gemakje het park Guël kunnen bezoeken, die op 15 min. wandelafstand ligt van het appartement.
Linda en Jean Marie, Belgium, gent

Peter has a great sense of interior.
That location is very good, clean up was never easy and it was great.
Peter was a very very friendly and description is also very recommended.
If i visit BCN again, I'll be sure to revisit his house.

We had a wonderful stay at Peters appartement. It's even more beautiful and cozy as pictured, clean and fully equipped with everything you need. We felt at home from the first moment. The location is perfect to explore the city by metro, bus or foot. The street is calm, especially at night. A lot of restaurants, cafes, bars, supermarkets and shops are around the corner. Peter is a great host, very attentive and easy to communicate with before, during and after our stay. I highly recommend the flat and will definitely stay here again!

Peter was a lovely and very friendly host from the moment we booked. He was happy and fast to reply to messages and also very nice in person. He welcomed us with ease and gave us some great ideas of what to do in the short time we had there. I would definitely recommend staying at this apartment as it has a great location and the whole apartment is beautiful.

A terrific apartment for exploring Gracia, one of Barcelona's most vibrant, cultural areas. The property itself is a stunning, modernist jewel, the attention to detail is brilliant. A joy, I shall be back.

Stayed in Peter's flat for 6 nights. Very interesting neighborhood to live in and a great base for experiencing lives in Barcelona. Lots of bakery, restaurants, and supermarkets in walking distance. 4 blocks from metro station. Having lunch/dinner in one of the neighborhood square/plaza and enjoy people watching is a must. The flat is nicely decorated and the little garden outside the kitchen makes the flat even more charming. One suggestion for Peter is to increase the functional lighting to make reading easier at night. Also the master bedroom is right above the school entrance so you will hear the noise from parents and kids waiting for the school door to open in the morning. Suggest you double confirm the exact location of the flat if you are not familiar with the area because there are many small streets and (Hidden by Airbnb) map doesn't show it correctly.

Trois génération pour un petit séjour à Barcelone et plus particulièrement dans ce magnifique appartement. Les photos m'avaient inspirées et nous n'avons pas été déçu puisque l'appartement est encore mieux. 
Le soin porté à la décoration dans ses détails, la propreté irréprochable  font de cet endroit un lieux idéal pour se détendre après une journée de visite et ballade.
De 15 à 85 ans, nous avons adorés !
Peter est vraiment à l'écoute des besoins et n'hésite pas à rendre service.
Jorge nous a très bien accueilli à notre arrivée pour la remise des clefs et la mauvaise volonté du chauffage à se mettre en route n'a pas résisté à leur réactivité et la rapide intervention. 
A notre retour le lendemain, tout fonctionnait.
Le quartier ressemble à un village et nous a tout à fait correspondu dans le choix des bars et restaurants. La très bonne boulangerie presque au coin de la rue est parfaite pour le petit déjeuner à savourer sur la terrasse.
Si vous prenez à gauche en sortant, un bar à bières très sympa avec des hamburgers à tomber, une petite entorse à la cuisine catalane.
Les arrêts de métro Lesseps et Fontana rende toute la ville accessible et le bus 24 vous conduit devant le parc Güell.

Bref, nous avons trouver notre "place to be" à Barcelone !
Un grand MERCI pour tout de notre part à tous et à bientôt Peter.

Had a lovely stay at Peter's apartment. The place was so welcoming and clean. Loved the area, so close to the metro and a nice walk away from bars and places to eat. The bakeries on our doorstep made it perfect for the morning breakfast run. The little outdoor garden/seating area was just perfect in the mornings when having breakfast and in the evenings whilst having a glass of wine.

Peter's friend welcomed us on our arrival as Peter was away, but was really polite and accommodating and we caught up with Peter on our last day to say hi and he was lovely. 

I would highly recommend staying here and will definitely be back again soon. Thank You Peter for making my first visit to Barcelona such a memorable one. Sara :) x

Peters place is one of the best in our trip, its beautiful, cozy, well equipped and central located in the garcia area, very close to metro station, supermarkets, restaurants etc, the apartment have everything we need and look exactly same as the pictures..the patio ia different a bonus point..peter is very friendly and helpful, giving us advice and tips on places to go and eat, and very kind to help us arrnage taxi on the day we (Website hidden by Airbnb) really feels like home.. l like the area and l love his place..lf l do come back to barcelona, l surely will return to peters apartment....only one small advice is l hope its a bit more lighting for the living room...lts prefect in day time but a bit too dim at night.

We hebben met ons gezin een heerlijke week vakantie gehad in het appartement van Peter Paul. Het appartement is echt net zo mooi als op de foto’s! Het is schoon, van alle gemakken voorzien en de patio is heerlijk. De locatie is ideaal als je niet meteen in het toeristische gedeelte van Barcelona wilt verblijven, met 2 metrostations in de buurt is alles overigens heel snel en gemakkelijk bereikbaar. Het contact met Peter Paul verloopt bijzonder snel en gemakkelijk. Bij afwezigheid van Peter Paul werden we ontvangen door Oscar, wat al even prettig verliep. Peter Paul en Oscar bedankt voor alles, we hebben genoten en zullen Orange Tree zeker aanraden!

propriétaire a l’écoute
Appartement fonctionnel bien situe a proximité du métro Lesseps dans une rue sans possibilité de circulation routière en face d'une école. L'ascenseur est le bienvenue en cas d'handicap.
Merci a Peter

Peters apartment including patio is super nice and furnished with great attention to detail. We have felt ourselves very well! 
The only thing we did not like were the mattresses, that should be to optimize...
The apartment is also very centrally located; "Gracia" is a great, trendy neighborhood, with very nice bars and restaurants.
We would come back in any case!
Thanks for everything , Peter :-)

Peter Pauls flat in the Gracia area of Barcelona is lovely. Well laid out, spacious and nicely decorated. Very clean and tidy, well equipped and has a pretty little patio. Great location, easy to get about on bus, metro and on foot. Lots of shops, bars, restaurants and lovely patisseries on the doorstep. The host was extremely helpful and friendly. Comfortable beds and plenty of storage space. Would highly recommend this flat and this area. Would be very happy to stay here again.

Peter made us feel very welcome. He was in contact via email as we arrived at the airport and was flexible with his timings as our flight was delayed. He welcomes us to the flat and gave us lots of useful tips to enjoy the city. The neighbourhood was peaceful but not boring with plenty of bars, shops and cafes nearby and two Metro stations.

We had a wonderful time at Orange Tree View. The apartment is really nice, very well located in what we consider our favorite area of Barcelona. Although it's in a low level, you don't get noise from the streets cause the windows are soundproof. The main bedroom also can get pitch dark by closing down the blinder. Peter Paul is a very nice host, he was there to welcome us and help us carry our luggage, also shared some tips on the neighborhood. Although he was out of town for a few days he messaged us to see if everything was alright and was available through (Hidden by Airbnb) . We recommend his place to families and couples.

This is a lovely apartment. It is neat, clean and spacious. It is in a great part of town, easy to reach by metro and close to good restaurants and bars. Peter and his friend Oscar were really helpful, communication with them was clear and easy throughout, even though we were delayed by a train strike in France Oscar patiently waited for us and he also helped us by arranging a taxi when we left. I would highly recommend this apartment to you, I will definitely come back next time I visit Barcelona.

Peter and his friend Oscar are so helpful and friendly.
The location of the apartment are  very good to go around for eating and shopping. They advised nice street and restaurants.
We love the street "Verdi".
He arranged a taxi to the airport for us in the early morning.
We want to stay at his apartment again.
Thank you so much !
Great place to stay in Barcelona. Near good food, supermarket, good shopping. The Gracia district is the place to be.

Fantastic apartment in a great location..... Minutes walk to two metro stations and loads of bars, restaurants and shops. Both Peter and Oscar are fantastic hosts, offering loads of tips and assistance. Highly recommend!

This is a great apartment!  The hosts, Peter Paul and Oscar were great and very accommodating. The flat is just as described, if not better.  The location is wonderful as it is in a quiet neighborhood that isn't overrun with tourists. I highly recommend it and look forward to staying here again someday

Our stay on Peter's apartment was great! The kitchen was great, and the apartment was well equipped. The location was lovely, the neighborhood was calm and quiet, we were able to enjoy our short stay!

Thank you Peter!! Ist was so so Nice in your flat. Everything was very clean, the flat was very Central and the quarter very Nice :) maybe we will see us in a few years back! Best wishes for you, Janina, Emine and Christina

Peter Paul is a fantastic host and has a beautiful home located in the Gracia neighborhood area, not too far from Park Guell. Easily accessible to public transportation and in an area with many bars and restaurants. Peter Paul himself is such a wonderful person and made us feel at home. Offered many suggestions of things to do, had pamphlets for tourists destinations in the area, and has nicely decorated his home. I would highly recommend staying here. My only regret is not spending more time at Peter Paul's place. I'll be back again for sure!

A really lovely apartment in a great location, everything walkable and close to the metro if you chose to leave the lovely Gracia. The apartment looks great and has all the things that you could need, including a small outdoor deck which was lovely for hot summer nights. Peter was a lovely host too.

Peter-Paul was an excellent host and his apartment is lovely. We thought the area was just great. 

He was very accommodating and really well-informed. We were delayed at the airport on our arrival (they lost our stroller - we are travelling with our 2 year old) and he waited patiently for us, for hours, even though his sister was in town and they were supposed to leave that day for a short holiday. And when we finally got to the apartment, he had a stroller we could borrow! He also recommended a day trip about 40 minutes away that we took, and it turned out to be fantastic!

Peter-Paul was always prompt at returning my messages and answered all of my questions very quickly. The apartment was clean and had all the necessary amenities, as well as nicely furnished. The little porch was a very nice addition. We highly recommend staying here.

Barcelona was the final destination of our 12 day trip to Spain where we had booked the Orange Tree condominium apartment that belonged to our host Peter. We were a group of 4 ladies, visiting Spain for the first time. From the get go, Peter's communication and response time was excellent. He was very prompt in replying to any initial queries I had in terms of the proximity of his place from the City centre, etc. 
As we were approaching our final leg, Peter connected with me to get the details of our arrival. Upon learning that we would reach by 10:30 a.m., he advised us to stay at a Cafe or at the airport and not arrive before 11:15 a.m. as his previous guests were at the apartment. Although, the check in was at 2:00 p.m., he allowed us to keep our luggage in the apartment at 11:15, very considerate of him. 
Upon meeting him face to face, Peter came across as a personable, helpful and a caring person. He helped us figure out how to go about in the city, the transit system etc. 
His apartment was very clean, well equipped with towels, toiletries, kitchen equipment etc. 
We were very happy with his hospitality, cosy and comfortable apartment. I would highly recommend staying at this apartment and experience a warm welcome by the host, Peter Paul!!!

Beautiful Apt in the heart of Grazia district full of cafes and restaurants but still quiet. We visited with small kids and Peter Paul was very accomodating. There are apartments where owners put their hearts into and this one is definitely one of those. Lovely decor, great equipement and a nice patio area to enjoy evening cuppa

Staying at PeterPauls flat was a great experience. Peter is a wonderful host. He gives a lot of tips and is always reachable for  questions. He furnished the flat with love and very lovely furniture from the 70ths. You will find everything you need, even a Nespresso coffee mashine. On the balcony you can find little orange flowers which are fixed at the real plants  and on the balcony you can have your breakfast or let fade out a warm summer evening. 
The flat is very silent because it is in a small street. Outside and nearby you will find a lot of restaurants and. Don't miss the Foccaria on Carrer del Torrent d'  olla. You will find also shops were you will  find arts from local artists.  Metro and busstation is  also near by. 
We can fully recomend this flat.  And thanks to Peter Paul. The best host we ever had. 
Peter Paul ist ein wunderbarer Gastgeber. Er gibt Tipps und ist immer erreichbar. Die Wohnung ist mit Liebe und der Vorliebe für 70er Jahre Möbel und Assecoires eingerichtet. Es fehlt an nichts. Sogar eine Nespresso Kaffee  Maschine ist da. Auf der Terrasse kann man herrlich frühstücken oder den Abend ausklingen lassen. Wer genau hinschaut, sieht, dass kleine orangefarbenen Blüten mit Draht ganz unauffällig an die Hecke appliziert wurden. Es ist ruhig in der Wohnung  obwohl sie mitten immStadtteil Garcia liegt . Fußläufig sind Cafés und Restaurants, kleine Supermärkte erreichbar.  Besonders gut kann man in den kleinen Geschäften shoppen und findet auch Angebote einheimischer Künstler. Metro und Bus sind ganz in der Nähe. Wir können die Wohnung uneingeschränkt empfehlen und bedanken uns bei PeterPaul ganz herzlich für seine  Gastfreundschaft.
Very cute apartment and wonderful, attentive hosts!
Very welcoming ,met on our arrival, local info provided

Appartement très bien situé et conforme aux photos. Très bien localisé pour visiter Barcelone à pied ou en métro (comme toute grande ville, pas recommandé en voiture car pas de stationnement et difficile de circuler dans le quartier). Propreté impeccable, rénové avec goût et belle petite galerie. Bonne communication avec Peter et Oscar malgré le fait que les planchers de l'immeuble furent refaits durant notre séjour sans qu'on soit avisé préalablement (très bruyant 3 journées consécutives). Peter a expliqué que ce n'était pas prévu. Comprenant notre désagrément et suite à notre demande, il nous a offert une compensation. Mucho Gracias Peter y Oscar!

Our experience in Barcelona was 100% great because of our stay in the Orange Tree flat. It was the type of place you expect to come home to after a long day of walking up and down La Diagonal. The L3 metro line was a couple blocks down and made it perfect to take everywhere we planned to go. There is many supermercat's around the area where you can go grab some fruit or a 6 pack of Estrellas (what we drank our entire trip). We were able to go buy eggs, coffee, and bread to make breakfast at 3 in the morning. We were extremely happy to stay in the neighborhood of Gracia. Peter and Oscar were very accommodating. They made sure we were comfortable and felt at home. From the cozy balcony to the vintage typewriter in the living room, everything about the Orange Tree flat gave us the best Barcelona experience. 

Tips to other Air BnB visitors: 
1. Get lost in the streets of Gracia. Like seriously. Forget the GPS and walk around and turn corners. You will find beauty everywhere you go. We took that chance and ended up at a free jazz concert in one of the gorgeous squares and had an amazing time.
2. Bring European plug adapters.
3. Grab a map of the Metro line. Peter has some by the table.

Peter-Paul a été un hôte remarquable, disponible et vraiment très gentil. L'appartement est confortable, la décoration soignée et la terrasse une petite oasis de verdure. L'appartement est également très sécuritaire pour les jeunes enfants. Le quartier de Gracia, où est situé l'appartement, à été notre coup de cœur. Sympathique et très familiale. Bref, un excellent séjour et je recommande chaleureusement Peter-Paul et cet appartement.

Peter was a very friendly and courteous host. The communication was excellent. He welcomed us already at the entrance and gave us lots of information. The apartment was clean and very well equipped. We spent a wonderful time in Barcelona and would go back anytime. Thanks Peter !!

Peter war ein sehr freundlicher und zuvorkommender Gastgeber. Die Kommunikation war erstklassig. Er hat uns schon am Eingang empfangen und gab uns viele Informationen. Das Appartement war sauber und sehr gut ausgestattet. Wir haben eine wundervolle Zeit in Barcelona verbracht und würde jederzeit wieder kommen. Thanks Peter!!
Peter's flat was perfect for our 3 night stay. We were 3 and the flat was a perfect size. All the amenities have been thoughtfully attended to and the location is one of the best in BCN!

Peter Paul nous a très bien accueillies malgré notre retard d'environ une heure. Il s'est montré très prévenant et a répondu à toutes nos questions. Il a également pris des nouvelles pendant notre séjour.

Peter Paul was out of town when we arrived to Barcelona but did everything in his power to get us set up successfully. His colleague Oscar was a great help and met us and toured the apartment with us. He even helped us with getting reservations for dinner. The flat is absolutely lovely and very spacious! It's an easy walk to the metro and very safe. The towels were very nice too.

Peter Paul and his friend Oscar were the perfect hosts for our first time in Barcelona.  Peter Paul was quick to correspond with me throughout the process from booking our place in June until after we left.  
This was the first time using AirBNB so he set a high standard for others to achieve.  
The apartment itself was wonderful. It was clean and it looked exactly like the pictures. Such a great style.  The patio is great for a cup of wine in the morning or a glass of wine at night.  
The location was perfect, as we felt like we lived in Barcelona for our 4 night visit.  The neighborhood of Garcia is perfection. Great coffee shops, bars, restaurants, and markets all within 5 minute walking distance and beyond and the Fontana Metro stop is the gateway to the rest of Barcelona. 
Oscar was nice enough to let us know the layout of the city and special events happening during the weekend, which included La Merce, the largest festival Barcelona puts on during the year. The events and fireworks were incredible. 
We also wrote Oscar during our trip for advice on a Paella restaurant. He gave us a couple of options and we chose 7 Portes and it was fantastic. 
Our time in Barcelona was absolutely perfect, and the apartment was definitely a piece of that puzzle.
This is a great apartment! It is nice and clean, and at a very good location. Peter is really helpful and you can easily get in contact with him. Highly recommend it!

We love this place! It's clean, big, and comfortable. We specially love the small patio, it's good to have afternoon tea outside! The flat is spacious for four people, and you have everything you need in the neighborhood.

We were very nice time in Paul's house. And Paul was a perfect!
He explained very clearly about everything! About the house, supermarket, Barcelona street etc.

He's house located very close to the metro and also the place is calm.

We really appreciate him and we hope to be again!!

We had a very nice time at The Orange Tree! The apartment was even more beautiful as pictured, clean and located in a great neighburhood. A lot of restaurants, bars, shops and supermarkets in the area. Peter Paul was a fantastic host, welcomed us at the entrance and gave us lots of information. The communication before and during our stay was excellent. Well we arrived at 11:00 a.m. Peter Paul allowed us to keep our luggage in the apartment althoug the check in was at 2:00 p.m. and let us leave it until we had to leave for the airport. We highly recommend staying at this beautiful apartment!
Peter's apartment was very cool. It had a retro feel to it, yet provided all the modern comforts you could want in an apartment. Good location, very clean. Bed was ok.

Peter Paul was very helpful.  We were running a little late from the airport and he made us feel completely at home.  Showed us around the apartment and then offered help on the neighborhood layout.  Neighborhood is very quiet and the electric shutters make the bedroom completely dark.  There are two metro stops within just a few blocks of the location, as well as multiple grocery stores and restaurants.  Main bedroom has a large bed that I believe is a queen.  I am 6ft 4in and this was a requirement for my site selection.  Wifi worked very well and the TV was very good for catching up on some sporting news.

Nous avons séjourné dans l'appartement de Peter pendant 10 jours en octobre 2016, mon compagnon, notre fils de 3 ans et moi-même. 

L'appartement est très beau, très bien décoré et confortable. Il était également très propre et bien équipé. 

Le quartier, notamment pour une famille, est très sympathique et convivial, en dehors des zones touristiques qui sont néanmoins facilement accessibles en métro. 

Peter n'était pas à Barcelone pendant notre séjour et c'est un ami à lui qui nous a accueilli de façon très chaleureuse. Peter et son ami nous ont à plusieurs reprises envoyé des messages pour s'assurer que notre séjour se déroulait bien. La communication avec eux était très fluide et agréable.

En conclusion, tout nous a plu et nous recommandons très vivement cet appartement.

Peter Paul is the perfect host! He was in regular contact before our stay and although sadly he was working the day we arrived he arranged for his friend Marcelo to meet us at the flat and hand over the keys and explain everything we needed to know. Peter Paul very kindly kept in touch during our stay to make sure we were ok. Orange Tree View is spacious, comfortable and stylish with a lovely patio area where we enjoyed our morning coffee and pastry and our evening salad with plenty of olives and Manchego cheese! Gracia is a great base for exploring everything Barcelona has to offer and has narrow roads with interesting shops and beautiful squares - we loved the lively Placa del Sol and the graceful Placa de la Vila de Gracia with its splendid clock tower. We can wholeheartedly recommend Orange Tree View and plan to come back again soon!
AMAZING THANKS!! STRONGLY RECOMMEND

Very nice experience in Peter Paul's place. We arrived early, Peter Paul was there to welcome us and give us guidance for our stay in Barcelona. The apartment is conveniently located in Gracia, 5 minutes walk from metro Fontana in a quite street. Restaurants are a few minutes walk away, and with Line 3 you get easily to Barcelona's most frequented area's. The apartment is clean, comfortable, and all amenities you need. Definitely recommended!

Our stay here at the Orange Tree flat was great!  I would totally recommend other to stay here for a trip in Barcelona.  The location is convientant and lots of little shops and restaurants nearby.  The flat itself was spacious and clean, and we loved the vintage feel of the decor.  Lots of little extras also, there was tea for the morning that we could use and even an iPad we used to look up directions.  The flat and neighborhood is great for families.  We brought our 9 month old baby it was the prefect amount of space for her - plus Peter let us borrow a travel crib for the week which was a huge plus and worked out really well for us.  The only thing to be aware of is there is a school across the street which can be a little noisy if you plan to sleep in late.  It was not a big deal for us though and we absolutely loved our stay here!

Accoglienza ottima e bellissimo appartamento con tutti i confort e anche di più, in una posizione molto comoda per raggiungere le zone più belle della città. 
Sembra di stare a casa propria, una casa decisamente particolare, con arredamento di qualità anni 70, come si vede chiaramente nelle foto offerte.
Un soggiorno che consiglio caldamente a tutti!!!!

The apartment is in Gracia, a charming residential neighbourhood, with quiet streets, shops, markets, boutiques and restaurants.  The nearest metros are a 5 minute walk, putting you in central Barcelona in less than 10 minutes. Fabulous coffee at Bermont Coffee (opp Fontana Metro in a small street)

Apartment is great, very clean, cosy and light filled. On first floor (with lift), with Orange trees outside.  Peter is a great host. Would definitely stay here again.

Peter was extremely helpful even before we arrived in Barcelona by recommending the best way to get to the apartment from the airport, and then welcoming us personally when we arrived at the apartment. He even took the time to go over some places that we might want to see and checked in with us the next day to make sure we had an umbrella as it was a little cold and rainy during our stay (but the apartment was warm and cozy!) We highly recommend this beautiful and conveniently located apartment and will  we would definitely stay here again next time we visit Barcelona! Thank you, Peter!!
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a really lovely little flat on a quiet street but near to lots of shops, bars and restaurants. The best thing about it is that there are oranges growing on trees right outside the window - that and the little balcony patio!

Hey everyone!
Firstly, Peter were very reactive, answering always very fast and confirming the reservation in only few minutes with every details, which is really great and reassuring!

He's a very friendly and welcoming person, spending time with us on arrival to explain everything about the appartment and getting to know each other without being hurried =).

Peter will be also available by message for news, advices or whatever during the week; which is always very pleasant! 

The appartment is exactly as described and as in pictures (except some new decorations elements, changing according to Peter's discoveries) with a very nice vintage atmosphere! We love it!
Something described as a pleasant dive in the 70's without the kitsch/ugly side.

The terrace is simply just a must for taking breakfast and smoking!
Everything is very well maintained and clean, so no stress during the stay.
Metro L3 is only at 4 minutes by walk and you'll find great places for eating in the neighborhood. 
The Gracia area is beautiful and quiet, perfect for family or people who want to be close to center but without the agitation.

Our only annoyance was the bed which was a bit too hard for us, so not always relaxing unfortunately.
But it's just a matter of preference/habit ^^

Anyway, thank you very much for all Peter, you are a great host and easily deserve your 5 stars rating!

Paul's place is brilliant! Lovely, comfortable set-up at the house and just around the corner from some great cafés and restaurants. Paul was very helpful and quick to help as well. I would highly recommend staying here.

Wonderful apartment, great host! 
Peter Paul war sehr aufmerksam, hat schnell geantwortet und ist ein freundlicher und warmherziger Mensch. Das Apartment ist sehr schön und geschmackvoll eingerichtet, die Betten waren sehr bequem und wir haben sehr gut geschlafen. Sehr sauber, gut ausgestattet mit allem was man braucht. Ruhige Wohngegend, Metrostation in kurzer Laufnähe. Absolut empfehlenswert! Besten Dank!

Peter Paul's flat is really lovely, its comfortable and well equipped and so nice to have balcony space especially for breakfast.
The flat is in a lovely area with plenty of lovely places to eat within walking distance, lots of little squares to relax and have coffee or drinks.
We walked lots but the transport links are good.
Peter Paul is a great host and looked after us very well,
it was a great first city break for our 12 year old.
We will return.
There are shops very near also.
Supernice and decorative 70s-flat, central but quiet and 1000 bars, shops, places &restaurants (and playgrounds) close by.

We had a great stay at Orange Tree. Peter Paul was very responsive to all of our questions.  The flat was as described.  We were glad to know about the school across the street ahead of time.  It was noisy, but it did not bother us.  Marcelo greeted us when we arrived and he was very helpful.  The best part of the flat was the location.   Close to the metro, and Gracia is a wonderful neighborhood.

First of all, Peter Paul should write the book on how to be a great AirBnB host. Excellent communication, very clear directions and very responsive. The flat is JUST AS LISTED and shown in the pictures. Clean, well-stocked, and easy to get to. We loved the neighborhood, and our short stay in Barcelona! 
(Great bed, btw, .. better than mine at home!)

Het appartement is erg goed gelegen, rustige straat maar toch kortbij alles. Peter Paul is een zeer vriendelijke gastheer. Hij heeft ons heel hartelijk ontvangen. Het appartement is zeer mooi ingericht en vooral het terrasje is fantastisch.

The location of this apartment can't be beat - Gracia is our favorite part of Barcelona, packed full of shops, restaurants, and lively squares. It's also about 5min walk to the metro which was super convenient. The apartment itself was quiet, super functional, and very cute! Peter Paul was a great host - by far the best communication we've had to date on AirBnB. Overall it was a great experience!

A wonderful, stylish apartment in an excellent neighbourhood. It's a great location for bars and restaurants and close to multiple Metro stations which makes getting around Barcelona a breeze. Highly recommended.

Peter Paul was the perfect host, very thoughtful and attentive. The flat was immaculate, stylish and the outside terrace a lovely haven for the afternoon sun. The area was cool, safe and away from crowded tourist traps with lovely bars, squares and restaurants.  I highly recommend this flat and would definitely stay here again when in Barcelona.
Thank you Peter for being a great host. The flat was very spacious, best located and Fully equipped.  It is close to the metro and to everything you may need. Absolutely recommend it!
lovely, clean flat in a hip neighbourhood in Barcelona.  close to metro station.  host was excellent at communication.  would recommend.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Peter Paul. We arrived quite late in the evening, however Oscar was on hand to greet us and made sure we arrived safely. Oscar then spent half an hour showing us around the apartment and answering any queries we had regarding our stay. The apartment itself is very nice. Everything we required for our stay was provided. The apartment was very clean and in a nice quiet neighbourhood about a 3 minute walk to the "Fontana" metro station which we were able to utilise to make our way around the city. There is a small balcony as well that can be used to enjoy meals (mainly breakfast for us) and the air conditioning was fantastic. We would highly recommend staying here if visiting Barcelona. Peter Paul and Oscar were fantastic hosts and went out of there way to make sure we achieved the most out of our trip.

Peter welcomed us nicely and gave us all the details we could need. He got back to us several times to check everything was ok, and even booked a cab for us on the last day. Great person. His flat is very well located, very close to lively streets (bars, independent cloth shops etc.) but not one of them (which makes it very descent from a noise perspective). The decoration is excellent, the terrasse  is not large but well designed , which makes it a very nice place to stay. We'll be back. Betsy and Josselin
Really nice place to stay to get to know barcelona! The apartment was fully stocked with handy items that when Travelling you wouldn't have
L'appartement est super! La décoration vintage est soignée et accueillante. Il est  bien situé, confortable, les matelas sont très confortables. Tout correspond à la description donnée.

Peter Paul's flat was the perfect place to call home for our first visit to Barcelona. The neighborhood is enchanting with winding close alleys and warm brightly colored homes, quiet at night but still very close to nice bars and restaurants. The flat itself is well equipped, comfortable, clean and beautiful. Peter Paul was an excellent host and communication and check-in went very smoothly. All in all a fantastic experience, we hope we can stay again soon!
Peter's place was an absolute delight. The mid century theme was stunning. Location was great and will recommend the place to anybody.

Wir haben uns bei Peter sehr wohl gefühlt, eine bezaubernde und gemütliche und vor allem sehr saubere Wohnung! 
Die Wohnung liegt gegenüber eines Schulhofs, weshalb es zu den Stoßzeiten schonmal etwas turbulent zugeht. Ansonsten ist die Lage top, sehr zentral! Metro, Supermärkte und und und direkt um die Ecke. Auch das Viertel ist sehr charmant.

Everything about this flat was perfect for our stay in Barcelona. The neighborhood is abuzz with restaurants, shops and street life, yet the apartment is on a lane without auto traffic. 

Peter-Paul is a wonderful host, welcoming us and showing us around the flat, checking in by email to ensure all is well, and arranging a taxi for our early AM flight onward.

This apartment is really great. It's got everything you need for your trip and the design is cool too. It's in Gracia which is a quieter neighbourhood with very easy access to the main parts of the city by metro, bus, walking or cycling. It's a good neighbourhood in its own right though, with plenty of restaurants, shops and bars. During our trip there was a fireworks festival in the streets around the apartment which was the icing on the cake. I would definitely recommend this apartment to others and Peter Paul's hosting was fantastic.

I stayed at the Orange Tree flat for a wonderful month. It was clean, comfortable, and pleasant. 

The Gracia neighborhood was very quaint with narrow streets and shady plazas where the locals gather to relax and socialize. There are many restaurants, grocery stores, and shops a short distance from the flat. Gracia offers the opportunity to meet some of the Catalan and Spanish residents, while avoiding the crowd of tourists in the Ramble, Barri Gotic, and El Born. These areas are an easy and quick Metro ride away. The Metro stop is a short two block walk. 

Peter is very friendly, helpful and eager to assist in any possible way. 

Five stars for the Orange Tree Flat and five stars for Peter.

We stayed with Peter for Christmas, my children (18 and 28 years of age) and I (60), and had a wonderful time. Peter is quick and considerate in communication. He also is keen to give you a nice stay in Gracia and in Barcelona. The flat works well for three to four adults to stay in. It was very well tidied when we came.  The kitchen is well equipped and the orange tree outside is a nice view. Peter likes "retro" furnitures and lamps. We loved to walk round in the neighborhood and look at the old houses (Modernista), the small squares and shops and restaurants. We love to return to this part of Barcelona again.

Peter Paul's apartment had all our family of three needed & wanted. Its location, amenities,character & feel, & cleanliness were outstanding. The local neighbourhood felt safe, welcoming & was fascinating to explore & discover. A perfect place that had people going about their everyday lives, just as we would at home.
We were not able to meet Peter Paul, but were met by Oscar, who welcomed us warmly & was very helpful & informative. 
We would not hesitate to stay here again nor to recommend this apartment & its welcoming hosts. Thank you. Koula, Ziggy & Philip(Melbourne, Australia).
Estuvimos muy a gusto. La casa es cálida, muy mona decorada y estaba limpia. La comunicación ha sido perfecta.

Peter's apartment is the perfect place to stay when visiting Barcelona. The apartment has everything you need, the neighborhood  is calm and relaxed, yet there is plenty of shops, bars, restaurants and playgrounds just around the corner. The metro station is 5 min. away and many of Barcelona sights are in walkable distance from the apartment. Peter was very friendly, attentive and easy to communicate with. Great experience! Highly recommended!
The host canceled this reservation 57 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Bell' appartamento c'è l'essenziale
Really lovely flat in such a good location! Would definitely recommend!

Peter's place is a retro treat and stocked with everything you could possibly need! The little patio was great for an early evening drink. The place is tucked away on a carless road so was mostly very peaceful, just some noise from passersby and neighbours on weekend nights, as you'd expect! It is all double-glazed though and nice and dark. Peter greeted us himself and even walked us down the road to get our bearings. He recommended a lovely area for food nearby which didn't disappoint. Communication was great and I recommend the apartment to anyone who prefers to feel part of a neighbourhood instead of staying in a clinical hotel! Easy to walk to some key sights but so close to the Metro we used it most days.
Die Wohnung ist genial. Toll gelegen, schöner Balkon und stylisch eingerichtet!!!

We really enjoyed our stay at Peter’s apartment. It is very clean, wel furnished, the beds are good. Nice neighberhood. Peter is a great host. 
In one word: it was great!!

We had the best time in Barcelona - a huge part of it was Peter and the apartment.
Everything was amazing - Peter wa ssuper easy to reach, he sent us several messages throughout the whole trip to make sure we have everything we need. 
Upon arrival he greeted us and told us all there is to know about the apartment,the neighborhood and how to get to the best places - to eat, to shop, to do sightseeing. The tip about the bus was amazing!
The apartment is spotless clean, it has everything you would need - and more.
The location is just perfect, quiet and friendly neighborhood, a few minutes walk to Parc Guell, to shops and restaurants - and very well connected by metro and buses.
We highly recommend staying in Peter's apartment, he made us feel very welcome and all the good reviews here are very much deserved.
Five stars from us!
Hope to see you again!

Very clean and stylish 
Location is very near to everything

Peter's apartment is fantastic! The location is in a fun and safe little neighborhood close to cozy tapas bars and cafés. Peter himself met us at the front door upon arrival and gave us the tour and basic information about the apartment. He also took the time to recommend more places for us to go and where to take the buses. I highly recommend looking at the binder he's created of information. Super helpful! The apartment itself is very warm and cozy—we loved to unwind with some wine in the living room before turning in. He also left a lot of amenities in the bathroom's mirrored cabinets and under the sink so we had everything we needed to get ready. We made tea to counter the colder weather this time of year while we enjoyed the beautiful back porch as well. Also, be sure to sign the guestbook! :) Peter's place is a Gràcia gem and definitely where we will stay when we revisit Barcelona!
all top rate. location, flat and all

name: GREEN NEST IN  SHEUNG WAN HEART
summary: Quiet and Bright apartment in a green and upcoming neighborhood with walking distance cafe,bakery, restaurants and art galleries.
space: This bright and cozy apartment is located on the charming street, Po Hing Fong. In the heart of Sheung Wan, Hong Kong's oldest district.  Just below you will find Hollywood Road and the historic Man Mo Temple, chic cafes, a famous cheese and wine cellar, antique stores and the city's art galleries.  A 5-minute walk to downtown Central where a huge variety of exciting bars and  restaurants, including traditional Dim Sum and local Chinese street food, await.  Convenient transportation right at the doorstep:   Taxis,  7minute walk to Sheung Wan MTR and Central al MTR   5-minutes walk to the tramway  Apartment includes: queen size bed with full linen Towels Sofa with pull-out bed Air conditioning Fully equipped kitchen with gas stove, microwave, toaster, kettle and fridge LCD TV with access to international channels DVD player Wifi Internet Bathroom with amenities, such as hair dryer and soap dispenser A personalized travel guide book on Hong Kong After booking is made, I'll be happy to as
description: Quiet and Bright apartment in a green and upcoming neighborhood with walking distance cafe,bakery, restaurants and art galleries. This bright and cozy apartment is located on the charming street, Po Hing Fong. In the heart of Sheung Wan, Hong Kong's oldest district.  Just below you will find Hollywood Road and the historic Man Mo Temple, chic cafes, a famous cheese and wine cellar, antique stores and the city's art galleries.  A 5-minute walk to downtown Central where a huge variety of exciting bars and  restaurants, including traditional Dim Sum and local Chinese street food, await.  Convenient transportation right at the doorstep:   Taxis,  7minute walk to Sheung Wan MTR and Central al MTR   5-minutes walk to the tramway  Apartment includes: queen size bed with full linen Towels Sofa with pull-out bed Air conditioning Fully equipped kitchen with gas stove, microwave, toaster, kettle and fridge LCD TV with access to international channels DVD player Wifi Internet Bathroom with ameniti
access: Guests will have access to the whole apartment
house_rules: Dear Guest, Hope you ll feel home far from home and that you respect those few rules as: following house rules from the booklet No smoking in the flat

host.host_about:
i live in Hong Kong since 2008 and work in healthcare.
i love travelling and diving. as much as Asia's hidden treasures such as Indonesia Laos and Cambodia

reviews.comments: I would recommend booking with Audrey anytime she is polite pleasant and helpful

I enjoyed my stay in Audrey's flat.  It is very conveniently located. 7 min walk to MTR. 7 min walk  to Soho restaurants. Apartment is quiet, clean, bed is comfortable, Wi Fi is fast.  Audrey is a great communicator, she was always available via txt, email, or phone.  Apartment is good for one to 2 people.

It could not have been any better. Audrey's helper Rosa was there to greet me and hand over the keys and show me the flat. Flat is small but one must remember this is Hong Kong. Flat had everything and more. Clean and very cozy. We didn't do any cooking but all was there if we wanted to. I have nothing but good to say about the entire stay. Even on our final day Audrey was kind enough to let us leave when we were ready (late flight out). Try and get that from any hotel in HK. Great neighborhood but lots of stairs going up if you are walking home (that's why they have taxis). Even the security people were great. Make sure you go visit the old lady who runs a tiny little convenient store for water and cheap beer. She doesn't speak any English but she is always happy to see you. Will definitely stay here if available for my next trip in October. Thanks Audrey.

Audreys flat is well located in the central district of HK, about 10minutes walk down the hill to the nearest metro and 5minutes to Hollywood where you can find some nice coffee shops and retaurants. Its clean, well maintained and contemporary in style. Its a great opportunity to sample some HK aprtment living but there a couple of things to be aware of;
