1) this is a small apartment about 35sqm total. So, by the time you have unpacked your suitcase there is not much floor space left!
2) the bed is small. I am 1.80m and found it difficult to stretch out in the bed. 
3) the shower water temperature is very erratic. It goes from scalding hot to ambient temperature. Disappointing as it makes having a longer shower difficult.

I stayed at Audrey's apartment for 4 days and had an absolutely amazing time!! close to everything from the MRT, Soho and Central, yet in a quiet street. Would reccomend the apartment to anyone looking to stay in HK. Audrey was also a great host, answering emails in no time, making sure all my questions were answered and ensuring I was comfortable. Audrey was also flexible with check in and check out times. My flight was delayed 2 hours coming into HK which was no problems. Leaving HK, my flight was at 11.30pm and Audrey had no issues with a late checkout. THANKS SO MUCH FOR YOUR HOSPITALITY AUDREY!! look forward to staying here again on my next vistit

I stayed here for a month and found the flat terrific! The location is great with lots of restaurants and cafes nearby as well as quick acess to public transport. The flat has a good layout and is easy to feel at home in.I can really recommend it to anyone visiting Hong Kong.
We enjoyed a two-week stay in Audrey's apartment.  It has everything a visitor could want, both in comfort and convenience.

A+!  Audrey was great and her apartment was excellent. Very cute 1 bedroom in Sheung Wan. Would definitely stay again and it was a nice place to stay for a week. The previous reviewer that said the shower was too hot was correct but there is a natural gas water heater in the bathroom closet that you can adjust to decrease the water temperature. Cheers to Audrey!

Audrey is the ideal host – friendly, attentive, professional – and her apartment is exactly as advertised: prime HK location, clean, safe & quiet, and with all the amenities that make for a perfect stay.  
Thanks Audrey for your hospitality.
Audrey's place was great. Nice location, very cosy apartment. I didn't get to meet Audrey in person, but she made sure that my check-in and stay were very easy and enjoyable.

We were four friends and had an amazing trip in Hong Kong. Audrey's flat in Sheung Wan has a perfect location while being in a very quiet area (not far away from the MTR/subway station and near Soho where it feels good to go out for a drink at night or for a walk). It was really easy to pick up the keys and Audrey was there for us anytime we needed during our stay (per email or phone). I would totally recommend this small but cozy apartment for a stay in Hong Kong where four people can fit, although you would be more comfortable by being maximum 3 people. We will remember our trip for a long time and I wouldn't hesitate to book this apartment again if I go back to Hong Kong.

We stayed a week and it was a perfect flat for a hk getaway. Location can't be beat.. Minutes to Soho and the escalators and central. There's an excellent bakery at the top of the street too! 

Place was cozy and clean. No problems whatsoever.

Audrey's place is a real gem, tucked away in a quiet corner of Hong Kong, yet right in the centre. The street is serene - pure bliss when you come home after a day of noise and bustle! Opposite the flat is a park you can walk through, there are three temples in the vicinity and you get the feeling of living in a real neighbourhood rather than being a tourist. The flat itself is great, small but with a fantastic view which makes it feel much bigger than it is. Audrey is a great host - warm and accommodating. Check -in was seamless. All in all, a wonderful hong hong experience. Highly recommended!

We had a wonderful week in Hong Kong staying at Audrey's place. The apartment is clean, quiet, very comfortable, has great views and is well equipped. It is in an excellent location, lots of great food nearby, close to an MTR station and such a convenient place to be based. Audrey is a terrific host. She is very friendly and helpful, replied promptly to all enquiries and met us for check in. I highly recommend this apartment and would definitely stay here again on my next trip to Hong Kong.

A very nice flat in an ideal location ("PoHo"). The street itself is quiet since it isn't a thru-street, and overlooks a park. It's a short walk to Soho, mid-levels, and metro. Restaurants, grocers, cafes are all nearby.

We had a great time staying at Audrey's place in Sheung Wan. The apartment is wonderfully situated on a quite and green street, close to the city's bustling centre, its bars, restaurants, shops and sights. The apartment has a great view over the city and is designed both tastefully and practically. We felt at home immediately and would love to stay again at the flat if we would ever come back to Hong Kong. The bakery (and it's terrace) at the corner of the street is also greatly recommended for breakfasts in the sun!

We are a couple in our 50s from Australia.  We found Audrey's apartment lovely to stay in, a retreat from the bustle and heat with views from all windows making it light and airy.  It is small but doesn't feel at all cramped for two.  The location is terrific: the short walk to the MTR is filled with interest (be prepared for stairs). Audrey is lovely, and as helpful as everyone says.

Audrey was a really great host and although there were a few problems they were fixed very quickly and without me lifting a finger. Audrey is always there to help if you need her.
The area around the apartment is really great part of Hong Kong and it is just the perfect size for 1-2 people, not too big and not too small.
I had a really great time here!
Thanks Audrey!

I stayed for a week at Audrey's place and it was wonderful. The place is very cosy, clean and has all you need. The location is very convenient and close to an MRT station, nice restaurants, some sights and amazing bars. Audrey was very helpful and always responded very quickly to my messages. 

Next time Ill go to Hong Kong I hope I can stay there again, thx Audrey :).

Sehr schöne, gemütliche Wohnung in top Lage!
Audrey war nett und sehr hilfsbereit. 
Wir haben mit zwei Freunden dort übernachtet, was kein Problem war mit ausgeklappten Sofa. 
Hat uns gut gefallen!

Very nice contact and helpfull right from the beginning. 
Allthough i had to last minute cancel the trip - i will make the same choice next time.

Good location. Very tidy and clean. Small, but enough for four people if you are on a budget holiday. Audrey is very fast at responding emails. Everything was very well organised. The street is also a treasure which is full of high end workshops and bakeries.
Good price if it is shared by two. It will be a incredible value if four friends share the cost!

Audrey’s Green Nest is truly a hidden treasure. Small, but that’s Hong Kong. It’s very rare that pictures give a correct idea of a flat or room. No disappointment and highly recommendable. Close enough to SoHo but far enough to experience a true residential atmosphere. Hope to return some day!

We spent ten days in Audreys apartment and we really loved it! It is very clean and cosy and very well located. Sheung Wan is a great part of the city, a lot of pubs and restaurants and just a few minutes walk to the ferry pier and the bus, tram and MTR station.
Audrey is a very nice host, she was very helpful and gave us a lot of information via e-mail before our trip.
We had a fantastic time in Hong Kong and we really felt home far from home!

Audrey´s flat is very nice, well located in an area full of character with a lot of designer studios and shops!
The house has all the basics it was the easiest check in we had!
Is a great place to relax after a day walking around in Hong Kong!
Audrey was an amazing host, always available and concern with us.
Joli appartement, conforme aux photos du site, idéal pour 2 personnes. De plus, il est très bien situé. Vraiment, que du positif !

Very nice unit in general. Within walking distance to town and MTR if you can deal with hiking up some steep steps to reach the unit. Easy to get to from HK station where the express airport train stops. Audrey did a nice job decorating her apartment, is perfect for 2 persons. I would use it again in the future.

Nous avons séjourné pendant 3 semaines en Novembre dans l'appartement d'Audrey au coeur de Sheun Wan dans une ville que nous fréquentons régulièrement depuis 20 ans.Nous l'avions choisi en fonction de son emplacement excellemment
situé,a proximité immédiate des transports en commun(métro,tram,bus) et d'ou nous pouvions facilement relier à pied les quartiers de Hong Kong que nous affectionnons
(Central,Wanchai,Causeway Bay,Sheun Wan ,Kennedy Town)
L'appartement quoique un peu petit(environ 20 m2) est parfaitement adapté à un séjour de cette durée;Il est très lumineux au 21 eme étage d'un building qui en comporte 23
et dispose de tous les équipements nécessaires sauf peut être
une table haute pour prendre des repas à l'européenne.
Nous le recommandons donc sans problème

Very clean and tidy when I first step into the apartment. Audrey was always more than readily available to revert to my queries and etc. Most of everything is either provided in the apartment or easily purchased from the 7-11 nearby. She even has an apartment booklet prepared to answer all your questions from apartment facilities to places to visit in HK. Definitely will be looking Audrey up when I visit HK again.

Modern, clean and cute apartment with a splendid view over Hongkong Island. Very good aerea close to SOHO with lots of coffee shops, restaurants and nice little shops. Audrey was very nice and helpful, it was a great stay in here apartment.

I had a great two-night stay at Audrey's place in Shueng Wan. All the instructions provided in advance were clear and helpful so my arrival and "check in" were very smooth. The apartment was immaculate when I arrived. It was small, but normal by Hong Kong standards, and perfect for one person. The wifi was great, it was very safe and had lots of windows to take in the views. I absolutely loved the area - very quiet, great for exploring the new cafes and boutiques popping up. It's easy to get to the MTR, and just up the stairs from Hollywood Road, where you can find great antique shops and make your way to Central on foot. 
There were a few issues during my stay (toilet water pump in the building not working, heat, TV), and Audrey responded in a timely manner to address everything. I was really happy that I chose Audrey's place as my home base while in Hong Kong. If you want a great neighbourhood vibe, a clean, safe place and a responsible, caring host - look no further than Audrey's place in Shueng Wan.

We really enjoyed our stay at Audrey's apartment :). We liked the location, loved the view, and thought it was really nicely designed.  We found the bed to be comfortable and the unit to be nice and quiet.  The detections for arrival were very clear and simple to follow making check in a breeze.  The apartment was tidy and there were plenty of blankets and towels.  It is a "Hong Kong sized apartment," but that's really no problem at all because there is so much storage for you to put all of your stuff.  Once unpacked, the apartment feels quite roomy for a couple :)  Thanks again, we highly recommend this place!

Great apartment in a perfect location. The flat was very comfortable and a wonderful place to come back to after long days spent exploring Hong Kong.

Audrey was very easily contactable and eager to help with any queries and questions. A great host! Thanks Audrey!!

Would highly recommend this place and would certainly book again!

The apartment was perfect for my needs.  It was clean, comfortable, quiet and safe.  I enjoyed the neighborhood: there is a wonderful bakery just down the street,  a laundry nearby (although there is a washing machine in the apartment), a gorgeous little park in close proximity and restaurants within easy walking distance.  Communication with Audrey was pleasant, timely and straightforward.  I enjoyed staying in the apartment and would not hesitate to stay there again.
The location is great! Quet place, excellent view. Special thanks to Audrey - pleasant person and always in touch in case.

Our stay in Audrey,s apartment was very enjoyable. The location was great. Everything we needed was close by. The apartment was well designed. The kitchen contained everything one might need. The view was nice and Audrey was very helpful. The location on the 21st. floor was quiet. Would not hesitate to stay there again

Beautiful light from windows all around. This is a cosy little place not far from Man Mo Temple  within walking distance of Central. Very quiet and peaceful--simply furnished--perfect for a romantic tryst or a shopping weekend. Close to antique stores and perfect for walk abouts; a tanka gallery one street over, home furnishing places here and there, a bakery on the corner and basket ball courts across the street from the apartment all make for a laid-back neighborhood feel. This is quite nice considering it's a mere 5 minute walk to the bustle of Hollywood Road with its shopping, bars and restaurants. Audrey was great about communicating information.  I would certainly stay here again, though I must stress that I find it surprising that the place is listed as sleeping four people. There is one full sized bed and a love seat that pulls out into a mattress. I'd say it sleeps 3 comfortably--3 that are okay with close quarters. By Hong Kong standards, I suppose it isn't tiny, but it is definitely not roomy for more than 2!

The "Green Nest" was perfect. Great views, fantastic neighborhood, easy instructions. The apartment is cozy and well appointed. It was the perfect location for my trip: easy to walk to the strain and go anywhere I needed. It was a short walk to tons of restaurants and shops.

I loved staying here. The apartment was clean, light and airy, had everything I needed and was yards from a bakery and a great cafe. It was also about ten minutes' walk to Sheung Wan MTR station and to the mid-level escalator, which meant that getting around on foot was really convenient. I didn't get to meet Audrey but she and her husband were extremely helpful when it came to sorting out a problem with the plumbing. They even sent a bottle of wine to the apartment in recognition of the inconvenience! Highly recommended.

Audrey's apartment is quite fabulous!!!

It is a great location, and it is very very quiet, cozy and clean! With beauty view, you can see the whole landscape of HK island. 

I definitely love her apartment.

I stayed her place for my first Hong Kong trip. The apartment is located near Soho (not soho) which is terrific I could walk nice bar and restaurants also not crowded or noisy.  I had minor problem but she was very helpful. I will definitely stay here for next trip. (there is nice bakery just next door called 'Po atelier' I recommend you to have brunch there!!)

we had a pleasant stay at the green nest. the apartment looked exactly like the photos - bright & airy! the apartment is located in a nice neighbourhood with many nice cafes, eateries, dried seafood and bird nests shops! the lady security on the ground floor was very friendly - she greeted us every time and reminded us to bring umbrella when it was raining.
Audrey and her husband were very helpful and prompt in his response.
we only had issues with: (1) steep flight of stairs before reaching the apartment - 86 steps in total;  and (2) the water heater - erratic water temperature - it's either scalding hot or freezing cold. we tried adjusting the heater but it didn't work.

We loved the Green Nest.  This location couldn't be more perfect. The place is in the heart of sheng wan but is high enough that it is super quiet. You feel like you are staying in a neighborhood and getting a feel for Hong Kong vs. what you'd get at a hotel. Also it is in the heart of local boutiques and restaurants and close to temples and old Hong Kong.  Place is small but all you really need.

Great location and instructions for arrival that do not require you to meet up with host. Safe area. Comfortable apartment. My clothes were trapped inside the broken washing machine and made available the day before I was due to leave. I was happy with the owners attention to this despite the length of time it took to be resolved until they asked me to pay for damages. The  wi fi and air con worked well but the shower temperature was unstable as other guests have noted. The microwave did not work. Hail on the exterior metal air con made a lot of noise which impeded my sleep. The bed was comfortable and the apartment clean and well appointed.

A wonderful apartment in sheung wan. The apartment is small but fitted the four of us (2 adults and 2 children) comfortably. It has amazing views down across to the harbour and Kowloon. The neighbourhood is a very hip place. Audrey and jonas are delightful friendly hosts. The instructions and guide to hong kong they gave are great. highly recommended for anyone wanting a getaway in HK.

Audrey was a great host.  She gave us lots of useful information before we arrived and there was a guide book and other information at the apartment. She was also quick to respond to any queries we had.
The apartment is in a super part of Sheung Wan; close to the shops, bars and restaurants but on a very quiet road without a lot of traffic.  It was nice to have the concierges around to add to the sense of safety and security - not that we felt unsafe at any time during our stay. 
We loved the convenience of the apartment. 'Small but perfectly formed' sums it up!  It is clean and tidy and very comfortable and well equipped.  The views of Hong Kong were great, and ever changing.  There is even a glimpse of the Strait. And when the buildings are lit up at night - wow!
There are several good bars and restaurants within a few minutes walk, plus a small, local park opposite a café that does a good coffee and nice café type food.  Having Sheung Wan MTR station within easy walking distance makes travel very easy.  I'd recommend using it; safe, cheap and fast.
We'd definitely stay at Audrey's place again.

A wonderful apartment in the heart of a really cool area of Hong Kong island. Sheung Wan is not touristy, but is where you can see locals going about their business and enjoy living amongst them.

The apartment is small (this is Hong Kong), but perfect as a base to explore. Audrey and Jonas are perfect hosts - friendly, helpful and available when you need them.

The bed is comfortable, towels are provided, the air con cools the place down almost instantly, and there is a small sitting area. 

A great place and highly recommended.
Great location in Sheung Wan, neighborhood feel and walkable to main centre. Cosy, clean apartment, in a secure building. Had everything we needed.

Audrey's house was exactly what I expected, and the location was convenient as recommended. A good all day brunch and dining restaurant  "Oolala" was near there. 

However, mosquitos had irritated us, so if anyone use this house in summer season, should brought the mosquito kill sprays, smokes, medicines or something. 
And, the audio system was not correctly connected with TV, so we have to fix it. Now, the TV and Audio are perfectly well functioned. 

After using this house, we had felt the feeling like as a local people in HK.

The host was not there but the room was really clean and nice. It was smaller then what I expected but enough for 4 people. Audrey gave very detailed information about the location of the house so it was really easy to find the house. The house was located very near the Sheoung Wan station, like 5 mins walking distance. The apartment was situated on the upper hill so I would not recommend it to elder guests. 
Everything else was really good, the air conditioner was working really nice and towels, pillows, shampoo everything was there.

L'appartement d'Audrey est vraiment très beau et bien organisé, la décoration est parfaite comme le montrent les photos et la vue impressionnante. Il était très propre, vraiment parfait. J'y ai passé un séjour très agréable. D'autant que le quartier est très sympa, avec de la verdure, des petites rues, qui offrent un peu d'oxygène après des journées dans le centre. Audrey avait très bien organisé le séjour, avec toutes les informations possibles, et un départ un peu tardif sans problème. J'y reviendrai avec plaisir!
The location was great. Quick walk to soho and mid levels.  Really nice to be in the heart of the city. Audrey was great at providing clear instructions.  Really enjoyed the stay!

No chance to meet Audrey in real life but she's been really available & preventive. Really nice flat, well located, great neighborhood. 
200% recommended! 

Nous n'avons pas pu rencontrer Audrey mais elle a été disponible et prévoyante. Bel appartement, très bien situé, super quartier. 
Recommandé à 200% !
Host was extremely helpful and the apartment was great. Located in a very calm and nice area, extremely convenient. Would come again for sure!

We had a great time in this nice arranged apartment! It was very clean and has everything you could need. We loved the cool view from the bed! The location is perfect. Audrey gave very detailed information about the location and all the surroundings. Highly recommend!

Audrey made us felt welcome and the listing was accurate.  We especially appreciated her help related to our late luggage delivery.  The neighborhood and location was the best part of this place; very central and easy to get around, a park right across from the apartment provided welcome "green", and little shops, restaurants and cafes near by were convenient.

Small but comfy and very clean and well equipped apartment in the middle of one of Hongkongs hippest neighborhoods. Audrey did everything to make our stay as comfortable as possible. We just had a great time in Hongkong, absolutely recommended!
Audrey sent a detailed email on building access, key retrieval etc which I found extremely helpful. The neighbourhood is quiet and pleasant with minimal traffic. It was a pleasant stay.
Lovely apartment in a good neighbourhood.  Exelent place for our first visit to Hongkong. We would definitely recommend it

The Green Nest in Sheung Wan was the perfect retreat for our Hong Kong stay. The location is perfect - right in the middle of the city's top restaurants and cafes. The apartment itself had great views, was clean and exactly as pictured.

There are plenty of maps, guidebooks and "best of" list provided by Audrey herself. A great tourist resource.

Audrey was incredibly responsive and helpful, both prior to our stay and during. We had one instance where the previous guest turned off the gas leaving us without hot water and Audrey responded to my cry for help within a mere 10 minutes. She was fantastic. Ultimately, we just needed to flip a switch, but having her be on top of it was amazing. Thank you!!

Audrey was great - she sent detailed instructions of how to find the flat and access the keys, along with a document about some site seeing activities in Hong Kong. I also ordered a modem to use in Hong Kong which Audrey accepted at her home flat for me and dropped round the AirBnB where I was staying. This was beyond the call of duty for a host and I really appreciated the effort.
The flat is fantastic - spotlessly clean with an awesome view. I love the size and the use of space. The building has security guard too. The neighbourhood, Sheung Wan, is centrally located but quiet and I walked almost everywhere. There are restaurants, a laundry and bodegas nearby. I would definitely stay in the Green Nest again and have already recommended it to a friend.

100% in accordance with the description. Very nice and clean place, best suitable for 2 adults. Gives you the impression to live amongst locals. Superb location close to bars and restaurants, transportation-wise very convenient.
We have not met our host personally, but communicated via phone and eMail. Audrey was very helful in finding solutions for our little problems. In summary: highly recommendable.

Das war bereits das 2. Mal in diesem Monat wo wir bei Audrey gewohnt haben. Und es war genauso toll wie beim ersten Mal. Das Flat sehr sauber, einladend, in eine superben Lage, sehr guter WiFi Empfang, weg vom Touristenrummel, aber ausgezeichnet gelegen um gut zu lesen und zu trinken.
Audrey hat den Aufenthalt bestens organisiert.
Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen.

Fabulous location, just minutes from Soho with lots of bars, restaurants etc , 15 min walk to Central, less to next Subway station and bus. 

Well equipped apartment, clean and cozy, if we come back to HongKong we will definitely book it again.

Didn't meet Audrey personally, but had great contact. Handover of keys no problem, any questions were replied fast and to our fullest satisfaction.

Thanks Audreay for a great HongKong experience
great appartment with good location right next to soho, where you find many bars and restaurants. you can also walk to victoria peak from the appartment.

Very happy to recommend, very well suited to single or couple travelling. Instructions and guides all clear, flat is nicely set up with necessities, clean and neat. This is Hong Kong so you cannot expect acres of space but having lived there and seen many other flats, this is fine and fairly priced. Location is excellent for restaurants etc but be aware a few minutes walk to public transport. Very happy.
I had a lovely stay. The apt was just as listed, clean and bright. Audrey checked to make sure I got in, made me feel at home.
Nice, cosy adobe~

Audrey is a very friendly host.
She gave us the details of the apt location.
Soho, Central, SheungWan was really easy to get around in the neighborhood. Overall clean, the view is really good. 
Easy to cook because the kitchen is clean.
I had a great stay at Audrey's. The location and apt was (Website hidden by Airbnb) of my favorite areas in HK.  Communication was very smooth with Audrey and overall a very convenient process.

We had a great time in Hong Kong! The flat was perfect for our time spent there. Audrey was a wonderful host! She made sure we had a portable crib for our little one, and she even recommended some places to eat that were kid friendly. We got a little lost trying to find the place, but once we found it it was a breeze getting around.

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at this apartment, it had everything I needed! The space was extremely clean, well-kept, and perfect for my long weekend stay. The location was great, close enough to Central and dining areas. I would recommend this apartment to my friends!

Great location and well equipped yet simple little pad - would definitely stay here again. Audrey was a great host, non invasive and on hand for any enquiries, all
in all a good option if you're looking for somewhere comfortable to rest after seeing all Hong Kong has to offer.

I really loved staying at this apartment. Great location - a quiet street, yet conveniently located. I love the Hollywood Rd. area of Hong Kong. Of course, pretty compact, but a normal size for Hong Kong.

Cozy and bright apartment in the heart of a funky area. We loved walking around the streets photographing the interesting graffiti art and beautiful old stairways and buildings. Having the little kitchenette was very convenient to prepare some quick meals and the MTR was exactly 8 minutes walk from the flat. 
Thanks Audrey!

Audrey's apartment in Sheung Wan was brilliant! I stayed here for just over 4 weeks. Audrey was very quick to respond to any of my queries I had over the duration of my stay. The apartment is clean and secure with all the amenities you will require for your stay. Close by to many galleries, boutiques, restaurants and bars I couldn't recommend this apartment more for a relaxed and enjoyable stay in Hong Kong!

Audrey's apt is in an excellent location! Apt is close to bars and restaurants and easy to walk around and discover antique markets and new places to eat. When we got to the apt there was a problem with the drain but she was able to get a plumber to resolve the issue quickly and without it interfering with our stay. Audrey provides a great booklet of recos of things to see in HK and also has several guide books for in the apt for additional ref. I would def stay at Audrey's apt again!! One thing to note is if you have large luggage pieces getting to the apt may be a bit of work since Hong Kong island is hilly and has steep streets and or stairs to get further into the neighbourhoods

excellent location, short walk to MTR, abundance of excellent  restaurants under 15mins walk.

there is a park (blake garden) directly across from the building which is nice if you have kids or are athletic and want to join the pickup basketball games with the locals.

everything in the apartment itself is typical HK.  it's very small and if you are coming from north america be prepared for a lifestyle adjustment.

we stayed for 3 weeks and would definitely stay here again!

The place is very comfortable for 2 people. It is also very well equipped. The place has an elevator which was a blessing, since it requires quite a few steps to reach the building. Also the location is great as you can walk to Central as well

One of the best AirBnB experiences I have had. 

The apartment was fantastic and very clean. 
The views from the apartment were spectacular. Almost 360 degree view of Hong Kong. Breathtaking. 
The location of the apartment was also very very nice. It was in a really charming and authentic Hong Kong neighborhood. Fantastic atmosphere with all the locals going about their daily lives. 
If there is 1 downside to the location though it's that it's hard work walking there everyday. The hills can be steep and there is many steps so you'll most likely be tired when you get to the apartment. Just be prepared for that. However I wouldn't say this as a negative because I feel the pros of the apartment outweigh any negatives you can have about it. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat. LOVED IT. 

Audrey was also a fantastic host and she was great to communicate with. Always a simple message away and would always reply quickly if you had any questions or anything. 

You just need to look at all the positive reviews this place has to see that it's amazing. 

If you're looking for an apartment in Hong Kong, stop your search and book this one. You will NOT regret it.

Great experience! Audrey was extremely welcoming, making sure to send us instructions and extra information about the neighborhood. She even went out of her way to make sure that we got our pocket WiFi delivered! The apartment was fantastic and very clean. Couldn't have asked for a better first trip to Hong Kong.

Audrey was so nice and helpful with my early arrival and trouble shooting. 
Her place was clean, convenient and quiet with a nice view.
My daughter and I had a wonderful stay.
I would definitely recommend her place if my friends are going to Hong Kong. Thank you so much, Audrey and Jonas!

Audrey's place was good for our small family as she provided a portable baby cot and bed linen for my 2yr old daughter - I just needed to bring along my child's pillows and a blanket. The apartment was very clean and also had everything I needed (like a microwave, stove and sink so I could prepare simple baby food for my kid). Audrey's instructions and HK guide was also very precise and useful, and she was also very accommodating to my requests and always responded very quickly, which I appreciate greatly! 

The apartment is set on a quiet street and is flanked by nice cafes serving good food and coffee so we had no problems finding breakfast each morning. My only problem was trying to get a cab as that street did not have many cabs passing by and so we had to trek down Pound Lane (a rather steep flight of steps) to flag a cab from Hollywood street instead, which was quite inconvenient for me because we constantly had to carry our baby and the stroller up and down those stairs. Fortunately I had a friend in HK who helped me book a cab to the airport so I didn't have to worry about finding transport to the airport when I was leaving HK. Aside from the cab issue, I felt everything else was good!

The location of the apartment is ideal in several aspects, including local eateries, public transport, the environs, etc. The apartment itself is also very pleasant. The hosts are extremely helpful both before and during our stay even though they were half a globe away. All queries have been answered nearly immediate despite of the time difference. I would definitely recommend this place again, any time.

Stayed at Audrey's twice. She was very helpful with my stay and responsive to my questions.
Appartment was very clean and comfortable.
Excellent location with easy access and great view.
Definitely recommend her flat.
Many thanks Audrey.
Great location, Bright apartment (HK size), very clean. Never met Audrey, but she was quick to respond on email and sms.

My romantic staycation in Audrey's flat was wonderful, from the friendly security guard that always greeted us with a smile to our exploration and enjoyment of the quiet and charming neighborhood in which it is nestled. We enjoyed discovering new eateries, shops as well as a few parks while on evening strolls. 
The flat itself was well represented as in the photos...clean, tidy and with all the amenities we needed to be comfortable. 
I would definitely return.
Thank you Audrey !

Very nice apartment with a beautiful view over Sheung Wan. A good place to stay on Hongkong Island! Audrey was very friendly, she offered us an early check-in. All queries have been answered immediately. I would definitely recommend this place again, any time.

This was our second stay in Audrey's apartment. It was every bit as nice as our first stay. Audrey has gotten many great reviews. There is not much one can add to that. With Audrey everything goes smoothly and help is always near at hand, if needed.

Henry

Audrey's apartment was just right for our needs. Very easy to get to from the airport and instructions for accessing the building and room were clear. The space was clean and stayed nice and cool in the evening with the air con on. Great views out into the city too as on the 21st floor, so was glad to see an elevator on arrival! Within walking distance of a huge variety of restaurants and bars in SOHO but still based in a nice quiet area. Taxis are always nearby if you need to travel a little further (which can be a welcome relief with the steep hills and stairs). Overall Hong Kong was a great city, would love to visit again. Thanks a million Audrey! :)

Audrey's apartment is very comfortable, in a hip and growing area of Sheung Wan, away from traffic noises, and about 7-10 minutes walk to MTR and tram stops.  I've already made another booking.  'Nuf said.
great place, walking distance to main venues. Clean and well organized space

My overall experience was great. The unit was accurately listed and the neighborhood was good. There are 2 AC units which is nice to cool down the apartment quickly. The lights in the bathroom went out one night, but Audrey/Jonas were very responsive and came over quickly to replace the bulbs. Only a small comment, and I suspect this is the case for many apartments in Hong Kong: rain on the AC units can be a bit loud, and may be problematic for a light sleeper. Thanks for hosting me!

Exactly as advertised.  Lovely apartment in a charming neighborhood.  The hosts were very accommodating - offering to send a housekeeper to clean and change linens after my first week, plus allowing me to check out quite late on my final day.
A fantastic spot. Audrey was the perfect host. Next time I am in HK I will be sure to look this up. Thanks Audrey for your hospitality.

Nous avons trouvé cet appartement Airbnb que nous voulions à la base pour 6 mois. Nous nous sommes mis d'accord avec l'hôte pour réserver d'abord uniquement le premier mois. Les photos laissaient voir un appartement moderne, rénové, propre et avec beaucoup de place de rangement. Malheureusement, ce ne fût pas le cas: des trous dans le mur, peu d'espaces, des traces de poussières sur les armoires, les armoires presque remplies des affaires personnelles de l'hôte etc...
Nous avons donc commencé notre séjour par une déception... qui a duré 1 mois. L'hôte nous a cependant proposé une machine a café et d'autres ustensiles pour cuisiner, mais suite à notre demande d'annulation dès le deuxième jour suivant notre arrivée nous n'avons pas exprimé le désir de ceux-ci. Puisque nous voulions entreposer nos valises, nous avons demandé à notre hôte si nous pouvions les entreposer dans le couloir ou dans la cage d'escaliers (puisque l'appartement est sécurisé et qu'un portier est à la réception). Elle nous a suggéré de demander au portier si nous pouvions les mettre dans la cage d'escalier, ce dernier nous a dit "OK" après quelques explications. Cependant quelques heures après les valises avaient disparues de la cage d'escalier car cet endroit été en fait le coin ordures (ce qui n'a pas été mentionné par l'hôte) et quelqu'un les a prises et jetées à la poubelle. Suite à notre requête concernant la détérioration du bien et donc le fait que les photos ne reflétaient pas la réalité, Airbnb nous a donné gain de cause en nous remboursant une partie de la réservation.
A notre grande déception, les rangements étaient quasi inexistants, en effet l'armoire était littéralement à moitié occupée par les affaires de l'hôte, même chose pour le bureau et salle de bain. 
La cuisine quand à elle n'était pas propre, les assiettes collantes ainsi des traces de rouilles sur le comptoir (qui partent pourtant à la brosse..). Le plan de travail vieillit et abimé.
A prendre en compte aussi le fait que lorsqu'il pleut, la pluie ricoche sur une pièce métallisée à proximité du lit ce qui provoque un bruit incessant et pas franchement agréable car beaucoup trop assourdissant. 
Le quartier est néanmoins très sympathique même si l'appartement est certes à Sheung Wan mais dans les très hauteurs et qu'il est épuisant de monter les TRES nombreux escaliers depuis le métro pour parvenir à l'appartement, notamment en pleine journée d'été. En résumé: le prix est excessif pour le bien proposé, les photos en ligne ne reflètent pas le bien proposé et ce dernier ne convient certainement pas pour un long séjour. Cependant il peut être agréable pour une ou deux personnes à une période où il ne fait pas trop chaud et humide (à éviter en Juillet et Aout) à Hong Kong, pour un week end ou un nombre restreint de jours. Il nous a surtout déçu car il n'était pas à la hauteur du standard des photos publiées mais également dû au prix exorbitant de ce bien.

The flat was very clean and very cosy! Smaller than it looks in the pictures. 

The flat was situated in the quieter end of a very trendy area. I had a lot of fun walking around the streets looking at street art and going into the excellent bars and restaurants on the doorstep. Thanks for having me!

I stayed in Audrey's apartment for about two months during an extended business trip to HK. Perfect place - good location near restaurants and bars, but actually on a quiet dead end street. Very livable. I plan to book it again the next time I'm in HK.

Host was excellent - provided me with great information prior to arriving. Also made sure that everything was going well during our stay and allowed us to check out a few hours later due to our flight time. Neighbourhood was perfect, lots of restaurants/bars and cafes within walking distance and close to the train.

We had a great stay at Audrey's place. The space was small, like any apartment in Hong Kong, but it was cozy and contained everything we needed. We enjoyed the city views, especially from the kitchen. If you're a taller person be aware that the bed is in a nook, so your feet may touch the wall. 

Walking to the apartment does require climbing some stairs in the neighborhood but it was close to the metro - about a 10 minute walk. There are some nice restaurants and a cool little market nearby. Across the street there's a public park with basketball courts. 

Audrey sent lots of useful information ahead of time, and Audrey's husband Jonas was helpful and responsive during our stay. 

Overall I'd say the place is a solid choice for a stay in Hong Kong. It's not fancy but it's comfortable and secure.
Good value for the price. Unit clean, but older building, older section of HK. If coming from train station, expect a lot of steps, but that's just a part of HK island.

The apartment is very cozy, very close to the heart of the city centre, but located in a nice, quiet part. Many good restaurants, shops, services and tourist attractions are located within a walking distance from the apartment. Also if you are in Hong Kong for business purposes it`s a convenient place, as you may reach main office buildings within a 15/20 min walk, so there may be no need to take a taxi or other means of public transport.
Host communication was excellent and the apartment was as advertised. We loved the location - close to SoHo and great restaurants and bars. Felt safe and comfortable. A fantastic trip to HK!

Me and my girlfriend stayed here for a week. We were so happy with this apartment!
Excellent location! Walking distance to a lot of things, and we had to two of the best places for brunch in all of HK as neighbours.
As expected the general insolation and water heating in HK isn't as good as in Sweden. Wee needed to take quick and effective showers.
And when the outside temperature was below 15 degrees at night, we needed our pyjamas.
But as I said, this is normal and totally as expected.
I would really recommend this apartment!
Audrey and Jonas have been so lovely and professional. Our arrival and staying went as smooth as it possibly could thanks to their information and booklet. And we could call them at any time if needed.
Thanks for a great week!

Perfectly located in what locals are describing as THE area to be in, he appt is a small but cosy space from which to base your HK visit. It was lovely and quiet and close to good shops and the metro. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend it.
Great stay here. The room is not big but it is very quiet and clean.  And the building manager is very nice. Not far from bus station, with several cafe and galleries. So it is a good place to stay.
Super central and cool location - flat is not very large but had everything needed for a convenient stay.
Audrey place is more conveniet, very clean! i think I will book next time~

Loved everything about Audrey's place! Checking in was super easy and she gave us perfectly detailed instructions for every single thing about the place. The location is really fantastic for experiencing Hong Kong. We were right in the middle of a really cool area and everything else we wanted to do was super accessible. Very clean with all the essentials taken care of like hairdryer, towels, etc. Like many places in HK it's a small apartment but we definitely had plenty of room. I only mention the size to say that I think it's quite comfortable. We would certainly stay again :)

We stayed at Audreys small but efficient and very well located flat in Hong Kong for 4 days. 
The flat was lovely, clean and Audrey was an excellent host with great information of what to do in Hong Kong.

We accidentally took the key with us when we left and Audrey was very patient and kind when we where faffing about trying to get it to her.

A good place to stay when in HK for sure.

Stayed alone for 5 nights in April. Perfect location for me visiting friends nearby and Sheung Wan also my favourite neighbourhood in HK. Great communication with Audrey and her husband and perfect instructions for accessing the apartment, I had no trouble at all. Friendly doorman at building entrance. High floor so good views of the mid-levels and towards HKU. Fairly small as photos show but ok for me and manageable for a couple. Limited kitchen but useful fridge and I ate out mostly, enjoying the local food in Sheung Wan, and lots of places on and around Hollywood Road only short walk away. If you don't know the area, you won't be aware of the steep paths and steps. If you have lots of luggage, you can obviously take taxi but also buses go from Exchange Square in front of Hong Kong station (8 or 22) to Hospital Road which is just above where the apartment is and then is a walk down steps rather than up which is handy!

This apartment is lovely. It is small (though not by Hong Kong standards), but feels spacious because of the great light and views from all the windows. We enjoyed being able to walk everywhere as well. Some chargers/adapters helped keep our phones charged.

I definitely recommend this apartment.

The location of the apartment is great, it is walkable to everywhere - public transport, supermarkets and restaurants. There are no shortages of cafes/restaurants/bars within the area. The size of the apartment is perfect for 1-2 people and Audrey has provided all the daily necessities. There is also a nice view from the windows. Definitely recommended for both short and long term stay.

Great location within easy walking distance to restaurants, shops and public transportation. The apartment is perfect for two people with all the necessities provided for a great base from which to visit HK. Audrey gave us very detailed instructions for a smooth check-in and places to visit in HK.  Wouldn't hesitate to stay there again!
Very clean and cosy place. I was unfortunate to experience 2 times the malfunction of the lifts and had to use staircase. I definitely recommend this place.

The apartment was small but well appointed. Audrey was very thoughtful in preparation - pre-arrival instructions were clear and accurate; and there was a folder with every bit of info we'd need and beyond. The neighborhood is lovely and quiet. Would definitely book again should the need arise.

Stayed for two nights in Aug.   Very little left to add to the other reviews - clean, light, well-designed, great neighbourhood, night views - everything as described.  The best part was Audrey, a detailed, thoughtful host, who took care to ensure I had a smooth, enjoyable visit.  Don't hesitate to book here.

Overall, we had a pleasant stay. The Sheung Wan MTR station is about 15-20mins walk including a fair bit of stairs as the apartment is located above the Blake Garden, in a quiet residential area which is lovely.

The flat was  reasonably sized, nice and bright. A bit too bright in the morning as the blinds don't block the sunlight completely.

We had the worst sleep one night due to the noise made by the heavy rain hitting the metal-encased air conditioning units - it was so loud that it kept us awake all night.

The hot water was very difficult to control to get the right temperature.

Other than that, we had a pleasant stay and want to say thank you to Audrey for the hospitality.
The view of the flat was amazing. And audrey was very kind.
Well described. Nice little apartment. Great location.

We stayed a week in Hong Kong and this flat was the perfect place for us. In a calm neighborhood but close to the subway.  
The flat was very clean with a nice bathroom.
We would recommend this place to our friends if they want to visit Hong Kong.

We had a great stay in Audrey's apartment! The apartment was wonderful, very light and airy. The views were spectacular, we could even see the harbour! The area surrounding the apartment was great, lots of interesting places to eat and just near a great coffee place called Cupping room, which I can definitely recommend. Easy walk into Central for shopping and dining. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here, will definitely be back!
I had a wonderful stay in this Appartement! Such a nice Area and an awesome view. Would book again next time :)

Cet appartement est vraiment sympa. Vous y trouverez tout le necessaire pour votre séjour. Très central, il est possible de tout faire à pieds. Audrey est très réactive et nous a donnée de précieux conseils pour rendre notre séjour inoubliable. Je recommande fortement ce logement. Merci encore Audrey :)

i had initially planned to stay in hk for less than 24 hrs but extended my long layover to just over 24 hrs and audrey and jonas were great with communication related to my earlier arrival.

the flat is perfectly situated to explore what i found to be the best neighborhoods of hk. directions from the mtr station were very easy to follow and the area is very safe.

the flat itself was quiet despite being so well located and the views were great. the place was very clean and the bed very comfortable, and while i spent the vast majority of my too short time in hk out exploring the city, the flat was perfect to return to and get some needed sleep. goes without saying that i want to plan a longer return to hk and without hesitation would stay here again. thank you!
Nice cozy appartment. Departamento chico muy acogedor.
Great stay! Close to the subway but in a quiet area. Lots of good restaurants nearby!
The perfect cozy apartment high up in Sheung Wan, beautiful views, great decor, all round perfect!

We stayed at Audrey’s apartment for close to a month, and enjoyed it greatly. The area is very nice for families with kids! A tea house, a good bakery, playgrounds (several), grocery stores etc nearby. Also a renowned coffee bar, interesting stores, and a yoga studio less than a minute’s walk from the front door. And a gentlemen’s tailor in the same building. The view from the apartment is stunning, all the way across the water to Kowloon and beyond. Audrey’s apt is small but with ample storage (even for a month long stay).  It is immaculately clean. Hot water is only available in the shower, not in the kitchen or bathroom sink which is fairly common in older buildings. The building is safe, well maintained with a circulating trio of care takers working out of an office by the elevators. We are already planning our return visit. Feel safe in the knowledge that if you choose to stay with Audrey you are making a good decision.
Slightly cramped, worn apartment but in a great location.
Absolutely loved the place and the view from 21st floor!
Excellent apartment and location with great views.
我们乘坐出租车到达住所,地点很好找,在半山上,比较安静,周边有不少特色餐厅､酒吧,很有特色,这里很多人讲英文,文化交织,可以体验融合｡公寓非常干净,小屋虽小但物品齐全｡我很喜欢公寓的软床,很舒服｡房东很细心,提供的资料特别齐全,联络顺畅｡
Great apartment with typical HK views in nice area, recommended!

Awesome place with a great view of the city. It was a nice quiet location, but central and the MTR are only a short walk. There was a great park down the street as well. Our one critique is the shower. It was difficult to get a comfortable water temperature. The slightest movement of the nozzle would make it burning hot or ice cold.
Fantastic, safe and clean neighborhood. Thanks for the wine and chocolate for the greeting. Quick and nice response!
Great location and great host!
真的很好,房东非常非常贴心,抽屉里会有小惊喜!美中不足的是在山上,地铁上环下车走的有些远｡其他都很棒!
A compact and very conveniently located flat in a cool area. Lots of hidden gems to explore in the immediate vicinity.
正呀,很清靜的環境!
Well-located, cosy, comfortable bedroom, nice view, very good value, caring hosts. Would go back without hesitation!
Great location - likely the most hipster neighborhood in the city!
Great location, spacious for HK. Wonderful view.

Kleines, aber zweckvoll eingerichtetes Appartement, für den Aufenthalt von zwei Personen völlig ausreichend. Im 21. Stock gelegen, verfügt man über eine beeindruckende Aussicht, zudem ist es, zumindest nachts, recht ruhig. Unsere Vermieter, Audrey und Jonas, haben wir zwar persönlich nicht kennengelernt, doch war Jonas jederzeit problemlos per eMail zu erreichen.  Sehr attraktiv ist zudem das Stadtviertel, Sheung Wan, mit Cafés, Gastronomie, Galerien und einem nur 10 minütigen Fußweg zu den Piers. Fazit: sehr zu empfehlen.
Perfect Sheung Wan hangout! Thank you, Audrey!
Small apartment in a super position. I can only recommend it. The communication with Audrey was also great.
Great location, super fast responses. The place is spacious for HK standards, super clean and safe.

This is in a great location and kept clean and tidy. Check-in/out was very easy and seamless. It is a small space, as are most spaces in HK so if you may want to spend more time at the Air BNB, a larger space may be more appropriate (for more than one person). It was easy to get to most major attractions and had lots of restaurants and coffee shops nearby. My only complaint is that the neighbour seems to be a heavy smoker and at night the cigarette smoke would seep under the doorway and fill up the small space quickly.
I felt at my HK home. Close to any desirable place I like in the city. Calm neighbourhood either. The aptm is really loyal to the pics. I will for sure come back!!

Audrey and Jonas were wonderful hosts. They were quick to respond to my requests and questions. 
The place was perfect for my last few weeks in HK. Location was prime. Quiet yet close to necessities. 
Coffee, laundromat and more. 
As I was staying for 4 weeks I organised for the cleaner to come mid way through my stay. She was also great to communicate with and affordable. 
Plenty of space to hang clothes, living area great to chill out in. 
This place is perfect for a single or couple. 
Check in and out was super easy. 
Walking distance to Soho and Hollywood road..... Loads of restaurants and bars. 
UBER easier option as taxis don't come past as it's a dead end street. But it's walking distance as I mentioned. 
Audrey was able to be flexible with check out which was very helpful. 
Highly recommend for a short or long term stay in HK.
Audrey and Jonas were great, with great communication and flexibility. The place is cozy but clean and close to many cool places in Soho.
perfect for a couple in central HK

Audrey was great and communicative. The experience was easy and comfortable.  The apartment was incredibly clean and in a great spot.  This was one of the best Airbnb stays I’ve ever had. Highly recommend!
지하철 역에서는 8분 정도 걸어야 합니다. 깨끗하고 좋은 뷰를 가지고 있어 좋았습니다. 바로 옆에 있는 작은 카페의 커피와 브런치 음식이 매우 훌륭합니다. 호스트도 친절하시고 지내는 데 특별히 불편함은 없도록 잘 배려해주셨습니다.
Loved our stay here! Our original accommodations in Hong Kong were awful, so we booked with Audrey day of and it was absolutely perfect!

We spent 3 nights at Audrey’s place, and her hospitality was incredible. 
All the details are well explained and she made us feel welcome from the beginning. She was also quick to respond to any messages we needed to send.

Highly recommended - would stay again.

We enjoyed our stay at Audrey's place. The apartment is exactly as depicted and is clean and a good size for 2 people (based on Hong Kong standards). The neighborhood is charming with lots of stairways, parks, and little coffee shops. Beware it is uphill from the central part of the island and requires some uphill walking (or use of the super long automatic walkway) to reach.

This is a great place - clean, cozy, lots of light. I was in Hong Kong for work and it was an ideal spot to use as a base, and easy to get anywhere. Amazing views from the apartment and a few steps away from excellent coffee shops and AMAZING food. In a friendly, quiet, and safe building.
Had a wonderful stay! Awesome location. Super host. Everything you could want from a home away from home.

Perfect location set above the craziness of central and soho, but still easy to walk down if you’re after a drink or a delicious bite! The place itself was cozy, sure, but was great for two of us. We were inside all day during the typhoon but the strong WiFi and little kitchen served us perfectly despite the nerve-wracking weather. Audrey was a wonderful host, quickly answering our many questions and providing good advice and local knowledge.

Comfortable flat with great views.

Well equipped to ensure a pleasant stay.

Older visitors should be aware it is located a hilly part of Hong Kong.

This listing is in a great location for first-timers to Hong Kong. It’s close enough to walk to the MTR station (8 minutes) or to central Hong Kong (15 minutes). Sheung Wan itself is a great place to stay in itself. The apartment has great views and has everything my girlfriend and I needed for the 6 days we were there. I would stay here the next time I’m in Hong Kong.

Perfect location, ez find and quiet. Lovely coffee shop just walk out within 1min. 
Warm and clean place for me, hope I can book again :)

Great stay at Audrey's place, it is simple but cosy and the location is absolutely great!

It is easy to find, clean, precise...

It was pricey, but I guess that it's more about HK than it is about Audrey 

Suggestion: a cafetière? ;)

Would definitely recommend.

Outstanding location in Sheung Wan. After three days of trekking through almost every square mile of Hong Kong and Kowloon, we all felt PoHo has the most vibrancy and charm hands down. Audrey's place is squarely at ground zero, perfect for a home base. Room is clean and airy, with exceptional upper-floor three quarter views. Check-in process is simple and all communications precise and easily understandable.
Nice place in a good location. Apartment was small but sufficient for a couple. Audrey and Jonas were helpful and easily contactable. Would stay again.

Audrey and Jonas were great hosts!  Their place was very spacious and in an incredible location. We were pleasantly surprised by how close it is to everything and how spacious it was. They helped me make my anniversary special and made tons of suggestions. After having some issues with the internet, they refunded me some of what I paid (without me asking) and got the internet upgraded. For future guests, you will have BLAZING fast internet!  I cannot day enough great things about this place!  I only wish we could stay permanently! :)

房東非常和善~對於提問回覆快速
非常好的住宿經驗

Audrey’s place was wonderful and the perfect size for a place in the city. She was very responsive and easy to work with. You definitely will feel like you were getting a taste of what it’s like to live in the city. Also, close to tons of places to eat and easy to get places.

Perfect location in the heart of Sheung Wan. Easy access to all of HK, but the neighborhood itself is the star. Great mix of old and new HK. Audrey was also super responsive and helpful before and during the stay.
highly recommended
The place was great for a short stay! Loved the neighborhood and the place was super comfortable to stay in.

Audrey is very nice host, she answers very quickly and gives you good and convenient advices. Her appartement is very well located, very nice and clear, with a nice view! I recommend you you this appartement, we enjoyed our stay !
Clean and tidy place. Convenient and quiet location. Great hospitality.

The locations is awesome, you are close to two train stations and can also walk to Central if you really want. Audrey was exceptional in every aspect with communication and with the overall experience. It is a great space with a lovely surrounding neighbourhood. Would recommend to everyone this airbnb.
房間很小只適合2人住宿
Audrey’s place is lovely. Good location and better than the hotel you need to pay the same price. Will love to stay again!

name: pb2 IDEAL LOCATION! WITH TERRACE CHARMING & QUIET!
summary: Greetings from Barcelona! Beautiful bright and sunny spacious "Acomodis" apartment with terrace located in central Barcelona, in L'Eixample in a very nice and safe neighbourhood. This is a nice and quiet 1 bedroom "Acomodis" apartment with double sofa bed in the living room in a perfect location in the city!
space: Welcome to Barcelona and to our "Acomodis" Apartment! This "Acomodis" apartment is ideally located in the prestigious quarter of "L'Eixample" very close to the prestigious "Hospital Clínic" and not far from the city center. Good connections by bus, metro and train. A good location in the middle of Barcelona. Very lively area with restaurants, bars and local shops. There is a nice terrace. Really quiet! The "Acomodis" apartment is in perfect state and entirely renovated. There is a room with 1 double bed and principal part with 1 comfortable sofa-bed for 2 people. It is very well equipped for max. 4 people. The kitchen is equipped with all amenities. Sheets and towels are included. Entirely renovated. We provide baby cot if you need it. We provide linen and towels. There is washer (no dryer). There is dishwasher. DO NOT HESITATE TO CONTACT FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION When you book we email you directions from the airport to the "Acomodis" apartment from either the train or bus.
description: Greetings from Barcelona! Beautiful bright and sunny spacious "Acomodis" apartment with terrace located in central Barcelona, in L'Eixample in a very nice and safe neighbourhood. This is a nice and quiet 1 bedroom "Acomodis" apartment with double sofa bed in the living room in a perfect location in the city! Welcome to Barcelona and to our "Acomodis" Apartment! This "Acomodis" apartment is ideally located in the prestigious quarter of "L'Eixample" very close to the prestigious "Hospital Clínic" and not far from the city center. Good connections by bus, metro and train. A good location in the middle of Barcelona. Very lively area with restaurants, bars and local shops. There is a nice terrace. Really quiet! The "Acomodis" apartment is in perfect state and entirely renovated. There is a room with 1 double bed and principal part with 1 comfortable sofa-bed for 2 people. It is very well equipped for max. 4 people. The kitchen is equipped with all amenities. Sheets and towels are included.
neighborhood_overview: This unique area is rich in history, architecture, culture, and cuisine. Just a short distance to the trendy Passeig de Gràcia you will find, La Pedrera, Casa Batlló, and Casa Milà along with several upscale shops and restaurants. On summer (July and August) a few meters away there is the "Eixample beach" where relax and refresh yourself.  Also, within walking distance there is the Mercat del Ninot, Passeig de Gràcia, Plaça Espanya, Magic Fountain... Even the beaches are only 15 minutes by metro. The location is truly ideal to enjoy all of the splendors Barcelona offers. Great shopping, excellent galleries and restaurants all around!
notes: As you will be staying in a fully touristic licensed "Acomodis" apartment There is a tourist tax of 2.5 cent per adult per night, this needs to be paid on check in please. Children under 17's are free.
transit: The public transportation in the area is excellent with numerous bus stops and 1 metro line. The metro lines nº5 (blue), Station “Hospital Clínic” is only a 1 minute walk away. This will bring you to Las Ramblas (old town) in just 10 minutes and likewise you can go directly to Plaza Catalunya (main square in Barcelona) and Las Ramblas (main street downtown in the Gothic Quarter) in similar time. The excellent public transportation options are easily accessible from the "Acomodis" apartment, allow you to reach the main points of interest of the city of Barcelona in just minutes. Alternatively to reach these destinations you can grab a taxi which will take 5 minutes. The taxis are in multitude here and very reasonable. At the temple of La Sagrada Família and at Plaza Cataluña you will find the sightseeing bus stop, which will take you to see the major tourist attractions of the city. It is a safe and bustling area with restaurants, café terraces and small shops. At night it becomes a ple
access: You'll have full access to the "Acomodis" apartment. It'll be all yours for your stay.
interaction: We'll be on hand to help in any way we can. We promise to do all we can to make your stay a very pleasant and comfortable one. If you have any questions please get in touch and we will get back to you promptly :)
house_rules: - No smoking in the apartment please  - The kitchen is of course available for your use, please be safe.  - Reasonable quiet noise levels especially after 21pm. - Respect of the property and neighbours.  - No loud parties. - With the hot weather we would really appreciate if you could clean down kitchen surfaces at least once a day (only if used) and bring out the garbage at least every second day. This is necessary in the hot weather, thank you! The garbage bins are located very close to your apartment - near the main front door. They are the big grey plastic containers - you can't miss them! Cheers!  - Most importantly relax and enjoy your stay! RESPECT FOR NEIGHBOURS. As the apartment is very quiet, for the centre of Barcelona, or any part of Barcelona, for that matter, I ask visitors to be mindful of noise levels. ON ARRIVAL: - We'll give you the rental contract. - There is 150€ security deposit hold with credit card.  - Late check in (21h to 9h) has an additional fee of 35 euros.

host.host_about:
We are a Catalan and Venezuelan couple with 3 daughters and we started using airbnb as our personal account. But since we were getting more apartments to manage we founded our small “family agency” called “Acomodis”. We are part of a happy team and we all work full time managing short term rentals and organizing cooking activities. We absolutely love what we do and we are more than happy to meet amazing people from all around the world and ensure our guests enjoy this incredible city. We are happy when our guests are happy!

ACOMODIS APARTMENTS - Self-catering apartments in Barcelona - The easy and secure place to book quality vacation apartments. Always great deals, always great service from Acomodis!

Hola amigos,

In order to help you, I and my wife offer a wide variety of apartments in Barcelona to make it easier for you to enjoy a pleasant stay and experience.

In addition to trust us in regard to housing, we believe the most important is to have a nice experience and maximize what Barcelona has to offer. That's why we invite you to apply for any information you need before and during your stay to enjoy as ever. 
Also, if you want to enjoy a very special gastronomic activity do not hesitate to ask for information.

We speak English, French, Spanish, Catalan and on the telephone.

We are happy because we love what we do!

reviews.comments: Everything went perfect and the house is really nice.

I had a good time in this apartment. It has an unique feeling to it. I really liked the balcony, the dishwasher and how close it is to the metro. Things I liked were how small the space is where the toilet is located (the rest of the bathroom was fine) and that I had internet issues during the last days of my stay. But I'm sure they will be solved until the next guest arrives. Thanks for having me! :)

host.host_about: I'm form turkey. I'm a film producer and director. I like going out withe friends. I also like travelling and knowing new cultures and people.

reviews.comments: I had a lovely time at Ozan's flat in Istanbul. It is a short walk to the metro station sisli  to the direction Taksim square. The flat is quiet and peaceful and clean. And the view from the terrace is very beautifull. Ozan was a responsive, lovely, perfect host and called and asked me everyday, if i needed something . It was a great airbnb experience. thanks Ozan!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Beachfront resort on Lantau
summary: Uniquely nestled on shore of Silvermine Bay in Mui Wo, Silvermine Beach Resort sets amidst the picturesque backdrop of sky and sea. Come to experience the finest touch of sunshine and beach, and indulge yourself in fun of indoor/outdoor actvities.
description: Uniquely nestled on shore of Silvermine Bay in Mui Wo, Silvermine Beach Resort sets amidst the picturesque backdrop of sky and sea. Come to experience the finest touch of sunshine and beach, and indulge yourself in fun of indoor/outdoor actvities. • No additional charge for children under 12 years old when sharing room with parents • Maximum of two adults and two children under 12 years old to stay in a room • Free WIFI is at lobby only and the cost of room WiFi is HK$ 100 per day.  • Valid HKID card or Passport should be presented when you check-in. • Deposit via Credit Card Auth ( MasterCard,Visa) or Hong Kong Dollars in cash upon check in.
notes: • No additional charge for children under 12 years old when sharing room with parents • Maximum of two adults and two children under 12 years old to stay in a room • Free WIFI is at lobby only and the cost of room WiFi is HK$ 100 per day.  • Valid HKID card or Passport should be presented when you check-in. • Deposit via Credit Card Auth ( MasterCard,Visa) or Hong Kong Dollars in cash upon check in.

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Staff was friendly and check in was easy. We got a room facing the beach so was nice. The building was old but the room was okay, the king bed was very nice and comfy. Breakfast was included which was a pleasant surprise as I didn't know that when i booked. Although the weather was foggy, the tide was in when we had breakfast so was great :) We went for a few walks  around the area too bad we couldn't find the upper waterfalls. We will return.

我們訂的是海景房,在check in時,他們說我們房間被upgrade了,它在北冀! 我們進房時發現裝備是舊舊的,海景被前邊樹木遮掩了,北冀的海景其實比check in那楝的差!房間的樣子比相片的是兩回事!而冷氣開了兩小時也不冷,致電服務台投訴,15分鐘後有工程人員來檢查,他說冷氣壞了會和我們換房｡
我們要求換去check in那楝!被調的房裝備是新的,和我們在相片看到的很似!地下舖地板感覺比剛才北冀舖地毯的乾淨很多!冷氣正常,海景比剛才北冀的好很多!但這房間是沒有浴缸的(剛才北冀的房是有),不過沒浴缸也好,乾淨很好!但講到清潔度,兩間房的也不太好!櫃上佈有麈,浴室牆上有污積!
房間隔音很差!早上小孩在走廊玩耍的聲音完全清楚聽見!早餐很差｡
很漂亮而且寧靜的酒店...臨近海灘,景色優美
gorgeous

name: Long Term Rent, Studio Apartments
summary: This apartment is solely yours for when you book. It is located in a quiet area near the city with easy access to local eateries as well as a short trip to other places in Kowloon and Hong Kong. Convenient public transport nearby and on your doorstep
space: This apartment is solely yours for when you book. It is located in a quiet area with easy access to local eateries as well as a short trip to more high-end dining spots. A short cab ride can take you to the Pier of the Star Ferry & Ocean Terminal (Mall). This provides easy access for sightseeing the rest of Hong Kong.  Hung Hom is a peaceful area with low-rise buildings surrounding the area. Supermarkets and convenient stores are nearby when you come out of the apartment. Public transport is an ease in Hong Kong, and you will be able to get around to all areas of Hong Kong within in a short period of time. address.street: Hung Hom, Hong Kong, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Place: I was in this apartment for 4 months, which means I did a lot of research before choosing a place to stay. Cleanliness and ease of access were extremely important to me, and I'm happy to say that I was very pleased, in both these aspects and others, with this apartment. It was well cleaned when I got there. Apartments in HK are naturally small. Dont be thrown off by this. The fridge, bed, wardrobe, and desk were more than enough for a long term stay. The washroom was a decent size as well, and had good shower and flushing. You'll get used to how small it is, and honestly, based on other apartments I saw my friends staying in while we were in HK, this place is a good size. I fit an extra person for a week comfortably when a friend visited me. Also, don't be throw off by the exterior and front of the building. The inside is quite clean and new! A/C was great as well, and I used it just as a fan (cool setting was turned to lowest) to keep the air flowing even when the weather got cold. All in all, good apartment for long term (and I am extremely picky). In terms of the actual location, I loved it. Great grocery stores around (chatham place is around the corner, and then the other way there are a handful of different grocery stores too). At least 5 grocery stores are within a couple blocks. Good fast food around as well. And ofc, being Hong Kong, there are 7-11s and Circle Ks just across the street and around the block. Take a walk around on your first day! In particular, I liked how this street was more quiet and more residential than HK island. I was in central for work on a daily basis, and so this place is a nice escape from the crowded tall buildings. Buses around the block go basically everywhere. I prefer buses personally but if you need the train, Hung Hom station is a 10 min bus ride away. Hung Hom also has the train that goes towards Shenzhen, so makes for a good day trip location. All in all, convenient and safe. Didnt feel weird walking around at 1 am. Theres a little family owned restaurant right downstairs that's open very late. 

Owner: kind, very responsive. At one point, the toilet didn't flush and Chris was very fast in replying to me. In the end, it was just a building issue so it had nothing to do with them. But he was still very fast in responding and trying to set up someone to come by. Chris is very professional and responsible. Thank you!

Overall speaking, not a pleasant experience and not a good choice to stay for me. The big street right outside of the room is very noisy even during the late night. When it is raining, the water pour on the top of the AC unit which has a thin metal case and cause super loud noise all night long. The toilet tank is leaking so the floor is constantly wet. Hot water boiler of the bath was suddenly malfunction once during my 40 days long stay. Chris got someone to fix it when I was away. Room size is about 2.1m x 3.5m including the toilet/bathroom which is about 0.9m x 1.4m. Blanket is thin and I can't sleep well because it was pretty chilly and wet on early March. A tiny fridge and a water boiler for instant noodles is provided but no hairdryer. Shampoo and shower gel is mixed with a lot of water. Laundromat is few blocks away. Free WiFi is slow.
房源描述必須真實
Good place to stay and will book again very soon
Chris is very helpful and responsive host and your trip will be in comfortable zone.

Tiny room but normal compared to most Hong Kong appartement.
Desk, TV, fridge, closet,  boiler, nice bed and bathroom available which makes a nice living place.
Not too far (15 minutes max) from subway stations, bus stop nearby as well.
Maybe not suitable for short buisness trip but definitely a great place to live in case of a longer stay.
Special mention for having fixed the electric switches in less than a day, very serious and nice owner.

Won't be disapointed if you are looking for 3+ weeks stay for 1-2 people
great host with friendly and quick respond. location was very accessible for different essentials

Chris place is optimum place for budget and good for a single person stay as almost all amenities of a private room are in place and  train, bus, market are all close by. Recommended for people who wants a short stay to travel and enjoy  with least commotion around..
交通方便!

Great location and decent price for Hong Kong. I stayed there for about four months and was quite happy with it overall. Chris responded very quickly to any problems. My main issue was that it wasn’t so clean upon arrival and I had to clean up quite a bit of mould.

name: LetsgoBarcelona Diagonal Ave. Duplex
summary: A modern and elegant one bedroom duplex apartment for up to five people, two blocks from the magnificent Passeig de Gracia, near the Pedrera and Casa Batlo in Barcelona. Montly rental only!
space: Situated near two of the most beautiful streets in the city, this recently refurbished apartment is ideal for two couples or a small family. The apartment itself has many splendid features such as new quality furnishings, a modern bathroom, beautiful floors, delightful art work, elegant lighting. The living room combines with an open-plan kitchen and contains a large double sofa-bed and an single sofa-bed, a big new 55 flat screen TV and a charming dining table with seating for five guests. The kitchen, with great city views, is fully equipped with everything needed to make a tasty dish such as, an oven, a hob, a microwave, a fridge and a freezer. The bedroom on the second floor has a large comfortable king size double bed, a big television, night-stands, bedside lamps, a working area and a large wardrobe for all your travel accessories. The bathroom has been completely remodeled with a chic marble finish with a toilet, a designer washbasin, an elegant mirror and a massage shower . For
description: A modern and elegant one bedroom duplex apartment for up to five people, two blocks from the magnificent Passeig de Gracia, near the Pedrera and Casa Batlo in Barcelona. Montly rental only! Situated near two of the most beautiful streets in the city, this recently refurbished apartment is ideal for two couples or a small family. The apartment itself has many splendid features such as new quality furnishings, a modern bathroom, beautiful floors, delightful art work, elegant lighting. The living room combines with an open-plan kitchen and contains a large double sofa-bed and an single sofa-bed, a big new 55 flat screen TV and a charming dining table with seating for five guests.
