The bedroom on the second floor has a large comfortable king size double bed, a big television, night-stands, bedside lamps, a working area and a large wa
neighborhood_overview: Located in the modernist Eixample district, this apartment is in one of the most fascinating areas of Barcelona. Less than five minutes from your front door you come to Passeig De Gracia. Littered with designer shops, bars and restaurants, this is home to three stunning examples of the modernist movement, La Pedrera, Casa Battlo and Casa Amatller. Take a walk in the other direction from your apartment down the Passeig De Sant Joan and it will bring you into Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf, this will lead you onto a beautiful boulevard that takes you to the Parc Ciutadella, which houses the Zoo, the botanical gardens and many more attractions. If that is not enough for you, the metro stops Girona and Passeig de Gracia are only five minutes away from your front door and take you to the heart of the centre in less than ten minutes. All in all, a perfect place for you to enjoy this great city.
notes: This apartment is cleaned by a professional cleaning service and provided with freshly, professional laundered, bed linen and towels. A babycot can be provided upon request. This apartment is cleaned by a professional cleaning service and provided with freshly, professional laundered, bed linen and towels.
transit: Buslines in front of the apartment:  27   Tarragona-Pl Espanya 32   Pl dels Països Catalans-St Antoni N5  Pl. de Catalunya V15 Pl. Rosa dels Vents Metro/Train line L6 and L7 every 5 minutes from Plaza catalunya. Metro Line 3 until Diagonal
access: Free Wifi
interaction: Although guests enjoy the entire apartment to themselves, we will personally be there for check-in. We will welcome you in the front of the building, happily answer any questions, and hand over the keys so you can get your vacation started.
house_rules: We hosts are very keen to find guest who treat our homes with care. - Enjoy yourself but please don’t have parties or loud music. - Smoking is strictly outside. - If anything breaks please let me know. LAF (Leave As Found). I like this airbnb rule of helping together. It’s a home sharing web page and not a hotel. That's why prices are much more affordable.There’s no need to leave things immaculate. It means leaving the bathroom, kitchen and rest of the flat in clean condition and making sure all food and trash is removed from the apartment and put in the bins on the street. Of course you do not have to wash the sheets or towels. I’ll take care of that. Basically it's someones home and they like it returned nicely. After all, the most important rule is to enjoy yourself and have a good time.

host.host_about:
Hi,

i am from Holland and live allready over 23 years in Barcelona.  My hobbies are outdoorsports like sea swimming, bicycle and running.
Hope you all have a nice stay in Barcelona!

reviews.comments:
My girlfriend and I loved this apartment. It is beautifully appointed and located in a quiet neighborhood, but still close to downtown Barcelona/lots of restaurants/bars. Not as touristy as other places. In an elevator building with a doorman. There were some scratches on the walls but otherwise everything is really beautiful. The shower is very strong and hot; the bed is very comfortable. 

There was a little confusion when I arrived at the apartment, but once I got in (after about 20 minutes) everything was super. I can highly recommend this apartment.

This went beyond my expectations.  I visited Barcelona on business and was disapointed that I couldn't spend more time in the apartment. It reminded me of a top class new York penthouse. All the upmarket comforts I could ask for in a quiet yet perfectly located neighbourhood. A quick pleasant walk to the metro and the newly renovated diagonal street which in itself is beautiful. The apartment was clean and everything worked very well. I had no reason to call the hosts at any stage. Thank you for the stay and I will definitely be using this place as my base in Barcelona in future.

Beautifull apartment, nice location, however not the place if youre gonna have a party - not exactly soundproof walls, and the neighboors arent too happy with music in the late hours. Still, we had a great stay. Oh yeah, the A/C could have worked better, but i guess thats more the humid weathers fault than the A/C's. All in all, very reccomendable!
The host made us feel so welcome and at home. The service we received exceed our expectations.

My wife arrived on Saturday afternoon at the apartment and it was extremely hot. The landlord associate noted the same thing and said the space should cool down. She stated the fans and air conditioning are extremely loud throughout the day and would not recommend staying in the apartment in the afternoon (not an optimal situation if you are with a young child). After a full day of waiting, the apartment temperature got worse. It was so hot it was impossible to be in the space for more than (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes as the vents were blowing out heated air.  We texted the landlords associate and immediately received a response back of "oops!"  She quickly noted nothing could be done until Monday. The responses were so immediate we began to wonder if this was already an ongoing issue.  I was arriving later in the day with our toddler and told my wife to go to a hotel as the space was not habitable. I called the landlord who informed us he owned the property since Feb and this was their first summer. I explained we only had a few more days and I would like a refund which he agreed to immediately. It seemed the landlord was going to resolve the situation with a full refund but THIS DID NOT HAPPEN. After 10 days, I had not receive a refund so I called the landlord. He stated he was going to refund my money outside of airbnb as it was complex and asked for my (Hidden by Airbnb) account. When this did not happen I called airbnb who informed me refunds outside airbnb are not recommended policy. Airbnb is now involved for a resolution. Just to mention the apartment looked very good aesthetically but there was no door on the bathroom which is actually upstairs in the bedroom.  This may be uncomfortable for most from a privacy standpoint.  There were also some exposed wires in the bathroom looking as though there were some lighting renovations being done.  Overall, beautiful apartment but not habitable in the Barcelona summer heat with the broken air conditioner. No matter how beautiful  this apartment looks  if it can not be cooled down because it is on the top floor it is not a penthouse it is an attic.We did not spend even one night in this apartment and look forward to providing all the information we have to airbnb to hopefully get the promised refund.

The stay in Barcelona,was amazing!!!
Marissa met me within minutes with keys, and so much valuable information. And if needed was avalible very quickly with just a phone call away.
The apartment was just as described, I give it a five star rating.
Large comfortable bed, beautiful bathroom,and a kitchen fully stocked to make the best foods. Thank you so much for making our stay, one we will remember for a long time to come.

We had an enjoyable experience at the apartment. It's ulta modern and very clean and situated in Gracia, which is a less touristy, but interesting and quaint neighborhood in Barcelona with a lot of character.  We found the air conditioning adequate, even though Barcelona was experiencing a heat wave during our visit. The only drawback was that the small deck was unusable because the AC unit was located there and was blowing out hot air. This would not be an issue if the AC was not being used, or if sitting on a deck is not important to you. All  in all it was a very positive stay and we were glad to have chosen this property.

I can honestly say I have never experienced a smoother check-in before. The place is very well located to all main attraction spots. Willem and Gonzalo were incredibly helpful and very friendly. Highly recommend this apartment to anyone. Also furniture nd layout were impressive especially the lighting system. Awesome overall experience
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Excfellent apartment, clean and great location.  Had a helpful welcoming and was exactly as described.  Would definitely recommend it as the location is close enough to the city without incurring all the noise!

host.host_about:
Bonjour,
Il me fera plaisir de partager avec vous sur vos voyages et de vous aider à découvrir Montréal. J'aime l'idée d'accueillir des voyageurs et d'apprendre à connaître un peu les différentes cultures... De chez moi en attendant le prochain voyage :)

reviews.comments: Très bon accueil, chambre propre et confortable. Dans un quartier bien sympathique. Véronique est une personne agréable et ouverte. Je recommande!
The host was very nice. She gave us our private space. She is flexible with check in ad check out time. The location is also close to the biodome, Olympic stadium and the park. Nice place!

Amazing time in Montreal thanks to Veronique...Super friendly girl with a great pad close to Rue Mont Royal...Great with directions tips and advice, we actually walked it to the centre every day so havent used metro and buses. Good room, comfi bed and good towels...Looking forward to cme back in Autumn
Veronique was very warm and welcoming. The room description was accurate. The building was quiet and the neighbourhood great. There are plenty of shops and eateries on the street.
Thanks so much Veronique for your hospitality. I quickly felt welcome at your place by your kindness and generosity. I slept like an angel in a comfortable bed in your nice and clean apartment.
Room was clean and comfortable, exactly as advertised. Cool neighborhood. Veronique was very flexible, responsive, and easy to communicate with.
Véronique a été une hôte formidable, merci pour l'accueil, je la recommande si vous fait une petite pause sur Montréal

Veronique was a very  flexible and nice host. Her flat is well equiped, clean and the location is ideal, quiet and village-like. You can find everything in the street she lives in. I would definitely recomand anyone to be hosted at he place.
Accurate as described. Great location.

We spent 3 nights at Veronique's apartment in the Old Rosemont neighborhood and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We drove to Montreal from NYC and there was plenty of street parking nearby. We went for the World Cup and it was an easy walk to Olympic Stadium and downtown Montreal was quickly accessible by car. Veronique was very responsive leading up to our trip and had towels, sheets and information on Montreal ready for us. We appreciated how easy going and flexible she was as we arrived late on a Friday evening! Wifi was speedy and there are plenty of cafes and restaurants right down the street from the apartment. Great host!

I spent four days in Montreal for the Womens World Cup. The apartment is in a nice neighborhood where you can walk to restaurants, shops, and public transportation. The room was clean and very comfortable with reliable wifi. Veronique is a friendly and helpful host.

Si. Muy bien
Muy libre, agusto y agradable

Véronique est une très bonne hôte. Elle est très sympa et n'hésite pas à partager un peu de sa culture Canadienne. L'appartement est bien avec une chambre mignonne et la rue Masson et sympathique.  Situé à 10 min de bus de la station Beri - Uqam qui est une station menant partout dans Montréal.
All went smooth at Veronique's place. I highly recommend it. Great host and great location :)

Veronique is a very nice and easy-going host, who make you feel like home. The flat is also very nice. 
The neighborhood is not super lively, but by the end of my stay I discovered some very good places nearby where I enjoyed talking to local people. I would definitely go back.

Veronique was a very gracious host. She gave good suggestions on where to go in Montreal and helped us find restaurants. Her house is cute, clean, and though not directly downtown, on a street close to many very good restaurants, amenities and public transportation. Getting downtown was not challenging and we enjoyed the walk (transiting was easy as well).
Veronique étais très gentille ! Elle nous a laissé l'appartement pour nous comme elle partais pour le weekend :) super appartement

Veronique is awesome!
She was welcoming and very helpful. Made us feel right at home. The place was charming and the neighborhood has everything you need. Definitely recommend her place.
Veronique was a lovely host and the room very comfortable.  My daughter and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Véronique received us last minute in total trust she allowed us to come in even if she was at work. Thank you Véronique !

Veronique is a great host, very helpful and accommodating. Her flat is lovely and the neighbourhood has everything you need just along the street. It is easy to get into the centre of Montreal. I had a great stay.

I had a wonderful stay in Veronique's apartment. She was a great host. Very nice, easy-going, and helpful:) The apartment was nice and clean. In its charming neighborhood there are good restaurants, cafes, and boulangeries just within a walking distance. Also the view through the window in my room showing beautiful sky and tress always made me wow. Highly recommended!

Veronique is a wonderful host-- cheerful, friendly, helpful-- and her place is as it looks: light, peaceful.  Only a couple blocks from  restaurants and cafes; bus right outside.  Plentiful and shaded parking on nearby streets.
Veronique was a friendly host and in a good location in Rosemont. The apartment is right near a bus stop and many local restaurants. Veronique was a very nice and friendly host!

Véronique is an incredible host. Is very easy to communicate with her, she's very kind and always ready to help.
Very comfy bed and very nice neighbourhood...was also very easy to find a parking spot in the area.
We cannot recommend this place enough!

Veronique fue una gran anfitriona, nos oriento y proporciono informacion todo el tiempo, el departamento es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, y su gato Phil es muy jugueton, a mi esposa le encanto tenerlo en casa.
Petit appart sympa, chat enjoué et Véronique est très accueillante
Veronique was very welcoming and nice to me. And her cat is super sweet!

Un endroit calme, dans un joli quartier plein de choses à faire ... 20 minutes en bus jusqu'à la gare de train proche du centre-ville. C'était vraiment un bon endroit pour rester. Et le chat est un excellent petit copain.
A calm place, within a nice quartier full of stuff to do...20 minutes by bus to the near train station to city center. Was a real nice place to stay. And the cat is a great little buddy

Veronique is a nice person, she tries to make the stay enjoyable and we had some nice chat sometimes. She maintains the place organized and clean, and in respect we tried to do our part also.
The cat phil (hope that is how I write the name) is nice and wants cuddles all time. 
The place has a good space, a really great balcony outside the kitchen. Also is in a street with  pharmacies, markets, bakeries, restaurants, bars, some stores, an awesome fruit/vegetable and a butcher's shop.
Although a little far it is easy to go to downtown, and as a bonus the olympic sport center is close.

Appartement bien situé, des bus permettent de nous amener vers le métro (20-30 min du centre) - à 1h à pieds du centre.
La rue est parfaite pour les restaurants, les hypermarchés ! 

Véronique est très accueillante et son chat très mignon !
Le logement est bien situé, près des transports et on peut faire ses achats à pieds. Plusieurs parc sont à proximité afin de profiter de l'été.

Veronique's place was exactly as described. Very easy to access by public transit and you find all facilities nearby. Veronique hosted my dad for almost 2 months and he loved the place. Communication was easy with Veronique and she was very helpful! We highly recommend Veronique's place for a stay in Montreal!

Véronique nous ouvre la porte de son appartement à Montréal avec beaucoup de gentillesse et de sympathie. Phil le chat est un compagnon adorable en quête de câlins. Les photos sont tout à fait conformes, l'appartement est charmant, le lit confortable, et l'endroit est calme. Le bus 47 s'arrête presque devant, et le 27 et le 67 passent non loin. Un Métro (supermarché) est à 5 minutes à pied, la promenade Masson avec commerces et restaurants à quelques minutes à pied. A 15-20 minutes à pied de l'espace pour la vie avec le jardin botanique magnifique. Prévoir un peu de temps dans les transports pour rejoindre le centre ville, mais Montréal est tellement vaste qu'on ne peut pas tout avoir. Ravie de ce séjour ! Merci Véronique.

It was really good staying!
Veronique is very kind and her reply is fast.
Her house was clean,bright and near a bus stop so it was very confortable.
There are some grocery store, farmacy, cafe and my favorite noodle restaurant("Juste Nouilles") around the place so it was also convinient!!
Appartement propre et calme. Hôte sympathique et disponible.
Everything was great
Accueil sympathique. Le chat de Véronique est très accueillant.
Super chambre, propre, bien aménagée. Proche de certains bus donc facile de se déplacer. Véronique met à l'aise et nous laisse nous sentir comme chez nous. En plus, son chat est adorable.
Séjour parfait, appartement conforme à la description et ressentis partagé avec les commentaires précédents ! Rien à rajouter merci Veronique.. Phil tu vas nous manquer ! Chat exceptionnel !

Veronique’s home was beautiful and cozy. Her home is not far from the botanical garden and Olympic Park which made walking easy. The ride into town was 15 minutes by car and 40 minutes by bike which made commuting easy. Overall great location and her cat Phil was so cute and cuddly.
Clean and cozy apartment in a great part of the city ! Also adorable cat to keep you company. Had a lovely experience :)
Comfy bed, on a bus route, very friendly cat! Veronique was very accommodating for my short stay.
La chambre est très bien et l'appartement est bien aménagé, on se sent comme à la maison et Phil est un bon hôte, toujours très accueillant.

Phill (the cat) is wonderful and kind !!

Apartment’s localization is good.

Veronique was great and very hospitable. Nice lady and her cat was adorable.
Great location and clean.

Véronique est une hôte très accueillante, elle me donnait pleins de conseils et d'idées pour découvrir la région.  Je me sentais comme chez moi dans le airbnb. La chambre et le lit sont confortables, son chat Phil est adorable ! J'ai passé un très bon séjour...
The apartment is very nice and comfortable! Location is very convenient, near shops and public transport. Veronique was very helpful and friendly. Would definitely recommend.
Great location and space for a great price! Veronique was a great host. Her cat is very cute and friendly. I enjoyed my stay and would definitely come back!

Veronique's place is down a lovely street, with pretty much everything you need. There's a couple of pharmacies, a few grocery stores, nd plenty of places to eat. There's a little place that does amazing pastries and coffee on the corner near where the bus is (opposite the noodle place) that I really recommend! It's right near two bus routes, both of which that take you to metros so transport is really good.
In terms of the actual house, it has everything you would need. It's not fancy, but the bed is comfy, there's plenty of storage, and the shower is nice and hot! There is only one plug location in the room so I would take a cord or something if there's two of you but aside from that, Veronique has everything you need. Phil the cat is delightful (he's so big!!!) and gives you a lovely welcome. 
Thank you!

We stayed at Veronique's home about one month and we had nice time there.
Our room was comfy and clean with enough space for our big luggage. 
There were all necessary amenities in the kitchen that you can make your own meal if you like.
There were two balconies which in winter time it is freezing out there to enjoy the fresh air but surely in summer time it would be wonderful. 
Location is perfect, near several of restaurants, pharmacies, grocery stores and shops which helps you to eat or buy what you want. it is close enough to bus stops that take you to metro stations.
If you like to talk you can have nice chat with Veronique and if you want to have your own privacy she is really respectful.
Last but not least, we enjoyed playing with Mr. Phil during our stay as he is so cute and friendly.
Très bien

It was my first day in Canada and my first Airbnb with a host. Veronique was friendly and super kind, and her cat as well;) She suggested me to wear her winter sport pants if i wanted due to the amazing temperature of Canada. For four days in her place, i had felt such a warm atmosphere and i enjoyed a lot in Montreal due to that. The room was same with photo and it had shower amenities and a hair dryer as well. Everything was fine.

We spend there around 10 days and we felt very comfortable. The kitchen is fully equipped and we could cook and prepare our meals in the cold winter of Montreal. The room was very nice and the bed super comfortable. Sometimes it was difficult to wake up in the mornings
 Véronique work during the day but her lovely cat Phil was the guardian of the house all day. He loves to be cuddled. You should like cats if you want to spend time at the apparent.
una estancia muy cómoda, excelente ubicacion para todo lo que quieras hacer

I have no problem with domestics litle (URL HIDDEN) muita tranquilidade para não incomodar os vizinhos e que cuidem bem do apartamento. Qualquer problema ou defeito que possa eventualmente ocorrer, estarei sempre com muito prazer a disposiço para ajudar. Nao tenho problemas com animais de estimação.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Sou formado em Economia no Brasil com cursos de especialização no Exterior, fui Controller de multinacionais dentre elas a Ericsson, Baker Hughes,  USSteel. Gosto de velejar, andar na praia e andar a cavalo. Atualmente estou aposentado e dedico meu tempo a administração de meus imoveis e de amigos que me solicitaçao tal administração,  principalmente por temporada

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
El departamento de Marcos es maravilloso, está remodelado y sus instalaciones ahora son muy nuevas. Es muy cómodo y luce como en las fotografías. 
Está muy cerca de la playa y con varios restaurantes alrededor. 
Marcos es una persona muy gentil, muy alegre y siempre dispuesto a ayudar en cualquier cosa que se presente. Estuve en su departamento durante un mes y no dudaría en regresar!

name: Gramercy Pk Area, w Rooftop Gdn!
summary: This is a large apartment by Manhattan standards, and is in a highly desirable, charming neighborhood. It is walking distance to many other fun areas. Do note: we have done some redecorating, and the living and dining rooms are different now.
space: This is a one-bedroom apartment in the Gramercy Park area of Manhattan [East 25th St]. It is a sunny, spacious, well appointed apartment. One of the best features is the rooftop garden atop the building. See the Empire State and Chrysler Bldgs and much more, while sipping wine at the end of the day! Very romantic and serene.  The apartment is fully equipped: stereo, microwave oven, air conditioning, cable television, Internet access, 24-hour doorman. It is on the ninth floor of an elevator building.  The neighborhood is pretty, as well as convenient. Within a few blocks we have some of NYC's best restaurants, such as Eleven Madison Park and Gramercy Tavern. Also, three blocks away, there is lovely Madison Square Park, which is surrounded by historic NYC buildings, including the beautiful and iconic Flatiron Building and the new culinary hotspot, Eataly. A fifteen minute walk west brings you into the heart of Chelsea. A ten minute walk south brings you to the trendy East Village. Walkin

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a professor of anthropology at a college here in Manhattan. My hobbies are trying to play the piano (especially Bach, Chopin Beethoven), working out, biking and traveling. My partner is a lawyer. In the background of this picture is the kitchen and dining room area.

reviews.comments: Jackie was a great host. She left us tonnes of information about NYC, and gave us all the tips we needed to ensure our stay was wonderful. Her apartment is lovely and comfortable. And the location is great too.

This is the best place to stay in NYC in every way:  location, comfort, a gorgeous apartment, and helpful host. We enjoyed a week here eating and going to the theatre. It is so easy to take subways, the bus, or walk, or a city bike from Jackie's place. We will return!

name: Lovely Penthouse in Barcelona
space: This delightful penthouse apartment is  located in a peaceful, traditional Barcelona neighborhood. With this location, you can escape the noise and crowds  and enjoy the amenities of local neighborhood as well as a quiet, restful night’s sleep. The city and its many attractions are a short, easy subway ride. With three bedrooms (one single and two doubles), two bathrooms, a dining room, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a spacious terrace, the apartment is perfect for a couple or a family of up to five . The apartment's bright and airy rooms are tastefully decorated with elegant antiques from Barcelona's  market. The large open terrace is one of the biggest draws of the apartment. It is the perfect spot for a morning cup of coffee, a relaxing nap in the afternoon after a long day of sightseeing, or a candle-lit dinner. The kitchen is equipped with a large refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, and stocked with basic cooking ingredients and kitchen supplies. At the doorstep of this lovely ap

host.host_about:
Hello!
 
My name is Sara and I’m  from Barcelona, one of the most beautiful cities  in the Mediterranean area. I’m open minded, easy going and very sociable . I love to learn and share with nice people from different (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a pleasure for me  making our guests feel confortable and at home.
I love Barcelona, it is a unique place that  combines history with an exciting youthful energy. I am sure you will find Barcelona as delightful as I do ,so... come and  visit.Stay in my place, a lovely space where you can relax and enjoy the city. 
I am looking forward to meeting you and helping you enjoy your vacations. 
Hasta pronto
Sara

reviews.comments:
Nous étions 3 personnes et nous avons loué l'appartement de Sara. L'appartement est conforme aux photos,en bas deux chambres,une avec un lit simple et la seconde avec un lit double plus un lit simple superposé. Il y a aussi une salle de bain avec douche et WC. La cuisine est bien équipée cafetière italienne,micro-onde,four, un frigo assez grand et tous le nécessaire pour cuisiné. Un petit salon avec un canapé deux place plus une table et 4 chaises sont aussi présente ainsi qu'une Tv a écran plat et le Wi-fi. Et a l'étage une chambre double avec une salle de bain ( baignoire) et un WC. Le plus de cet appartement et sa terrasse qui est bien ensoleillée toute la journée mais il y store qui permet de ce faire une petite place d'ombre bien agréable,elle possède une grande table avec un banc et des chaise plus un bain de soleil pour des scéances bronzage. Nous avons passé la plupart de notre temps sur cette terrasse,vraiment très agréable.  Le quartier est calme de jour comme de nuit,peu de passage dans la rue qui est a sens unique. Une épicerie,un marchand de fruit et légume, une boulangerie sont a 2min même pas de l'appartement,ainsi que le métro (station Congrès ligne bleu ),il il y a également juste a côté un tabac et deux petits bar a tapas typique. Il y aussi tous les containers pour le tri sélectif des déchets donc pratique aussi même si on y pense pas tout de suite.  Et si vous venais en voiture je vous conseille le parking qui est a même pas 100m,très utiles parce que stationné dans le quartier c'est mission impossible,il faut précisé a Sara pour le parking et elle s'occupe de tout a un tarif avantageux. Ensuite un point aussi positif c'est que l'appartement est très accessible lorsque l'ont viens de France et de même,pour repartir de Barcelone c'est pas trop compliqué et plus ou moins rapide suivant la circulation bien sur. 
Sara a étais vraiment très gentille et serviable si vous avais des questions un problème demandé lui elle fera le nécessaire pour que votre séjour ce passe au mieux,de plus par mail elle répond rapidement ce qui permet un échange plus clair

Cette appartement nous a enchanté pour beaucoup de raisons; en premier lieu, une arrivée facile( nous étions en voiture)et un accueil ( par Sonia) des plus charmant :o).
Parking à proximité et le gardien était déjà prévenu de notre arrivée.
Très bons contacts avant notre venue avec Sara; très réactive, réponses rapides, c'est très agréable.
Le quartier est calme ; à 20m , une très bonne boulangerie et 20m plus loin, l'entrée du métro, impeccable.
Une super adresse de tapas ( pourvu qu'ils gardent cette qualité et cet accueil ) le Toca Teca, à ne pas manquer !
En conclusion :nous étions un couple et 2 ados, la disposition de l'appartement est parfaite avec ses 2 salle de (Website hidden by Airbnb) grande terrasse est très agréable également avec de belles plantes et assez calme au 4eme étage.
( Juste prévoir bouchons d'oreilles à cause du moteur de l'ascenseur mais ma compagne , elle, n'a pas été dérangé et au final, nous avons très bien dormi :o)
Un grand merci à Sara et Sonia qui sont toutes 2 très disponibles.
A bientôt sans aucun doute !!
Marielle et Pascal Octobre 2014

We were two couple staying at the apartment for 3 nights between February 28th and March 3rd 2015

We chose the apartment because of its excellent pricing, the nice neighborhood, excellent amenities and last but not least very convenient access to the subway.

The first impression from the host was how nice and friendly we were going through the reservation process and this first impression was reassured once we arrived at the location. 
We received excellent briefing on the apartment, we were provided with 2 pairs of keys and we got all our requirements addressed upfront.

The apartment is very cozy and stylishly furnished and what is more it has a huge terrace with big table to accommodate all guests. The subway station is right across the street where we could also find a bakery, a supermarket and some small restaurants.

We did not have any problems throughout our stay and we would like to recommend this place to anyone willing to spend some quality time in Barcelona.

J'ai des amis qui utilisent régulièrement Airbnb pour se loger en voyage et qui me recommandaient de l'utiliser pour Barcelone. A priori, j'avais certaines craintes, mais je suis vraiment bien tombé avec Sara. Le logement était au-delà de nos espérances! Beau, propre, bien situé, bien aménagé, nous avons été ravis. La terrasse a été particulièrement appréciée. Sonia, la personne désignée par Sara pour nous accueillir, a été tout à fait aimable, ponctuelle et disponible pour aider au besoin. Je ne peux que recommander vivement ce merveilleux "Attico"!
Perfect quite location for a short stay. The rooms were very clean and we had everything in the kitchen that we needed.

Hemos pasado una estancia muy agradable, el apartamento es muy amplio y bonito, tal y como muestran las fotos. Está situado muy cerca del metro y de distintos supermercados. La zona es muy tranquila aunque un poco apartada del centro. 
La anfitriona se preocupó en todo momento de satisfacer nuestras necesidades por lo que volveremos sin duda esperemos que pronto.

Hemos estado muy a gusto. La casa esta un poco vieja pero decorada con mucho gusto y muy bien equipada. Cocina y baños con todo lo necesario, menaje completo de cocina,  tostadora, hervidor de agua, secador de pelo, etc. También dispone de mapas y folletos de los lugares más emblemáticos de Barcelona.
 Las camas muy cómodas. La terraza está muy bien para poder comer e incluso desayunar y cenar cuando haga algo más de calor... se está genial!

La casa es igual-igual que como aparece en las fotos. Lo único que no aparece en el anuncio son los 30€ de la limpieza. 
El barrio está en una zona muy tranquila, con todo lo necesario muy cerca de la casa... farmacia, supermercados, panadería, bares, incluso la entrada del metro está tan cerca que no tocamos el coche en toda la semana. Dejamos el coche en el parking que está en la calle de al lado.
Como dato negativo indicaría el olor a cañería de los baños, sobre todo en el del piso de abajo. La maquinaria del ascensor se escucha bastante en la habitación del piso de arriba, pero no molesta a la hora de dormir, por la noche, ya que apenas hay movimiento a esas horas. Y hay que tener en cuenta también, para los que necesiten oscuridad total para dormir, que tanto en la habitación de arriba como en la pequeña de abajo no hay persiana. Lo cual te ayuda a madrugar para disfrutar del día desde bien prontito.

L'appartement correspond à la description, très propre à notre arrivée, charmant et une terrasse sympa sans vis à vis. Nous étions 2 enfants et 2 adultes, nous avons occupé les 3 chambres et les 2 salles de bain étaient bien pratiques. C'est un excellent rapport qualité prix. Les + sont la sortie de métro Congres (à 3 ou 4 stations de la Sagrada Familia) à 50m, la possibilité de garer son véhicule dans un garage privé et surveillé pour un prix modique et le calme du quartier
Et biensur l'accueil très chaleureux de Sonia.

Un grand merci Sara  pour sa réactivité  et à  Sonia pour sa disponibilité  et ses précieux  conseils. L' appartement est conforme aux photos propre clair et au calme. A deux pas de deux stations qui nous mènent directement au coeur des monuments et à plage ; ). Nous étions deux couples et nous recommandons cet appartement un très bon rapport qualité prix. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir.

My three children (two are young adults) and I had a nice stay in this decorative and well-equipped apartment. There is no particular attraction nearby so we took taxis around. It was about 15 euros to la Ramblas. Plenty of convenient stores nearby.

Superbe appartement, organisation pour récupérer les clefs sans aucun problème. 
L'appartement était exactement comme sur les photos.
Un quartier très agréables et très pratique : métro et alimentation en bas de l'appartement, un restaurant de tapas  excellent situé à 2' de l'appartement tout comme un restaurant  japonais très bon et très raisonnable.

L'hôte et la responsable AirBnb ont été très accueillantes et très serviables !

Un séjour comme nous le souhaitions  !

Great apartment. We loved our stay here. We were very warmly welcomed and everything was ready for us. Great neighbourhood - right by Congres Metro station and lots of good food shops and restaurants nearby. 

Perfect for our needs. We loved the balcony in particular. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

Sara a été très réactive et très présente dès la réservation. Elle a répondu à toutes nos questions rapidement. 
Le logement est conforme aux photos. Il est propre, bien équipé et fonctionnel. Nous avons pu profiter de la grande terrasse qui est très agréable. L'appartement est dans un quartier calme avec toutes les commodités et proche de 2 lignes de métro amenant directement au centre ville. 
L'accueil sur place a été des plus chaleureux (merci Sonia!).
Bref, nous recommandons vivement cet appartement.

Très bel appartement agréable et lumineux dans un quartier calme mais à proximité du métro . L accueil était très chaleureux . On se sent chez soi... Je recommande vivement :-) 
Merci encore , c était un séjour extra :-)

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour à Barcelone.

Sonia nous a très bien accueillis et renseignés à notre arrivée.

L'appartement de Sara est parfait pour une famille de quatre personnes.
La présence de deux salles de bain permet de gagner du temps avant de sortir (toilettes en haut et en bas).
La cuisine est très fonctionnelle.
La terrasse est grande et agréable.
Les ouvrants coté rue sont bien isolés du bruit.

L'appartement est situé à 100 mètres de la station de métro Congrès.
On trouve tout ce qu'il faut dans le quartier (Pharmacie, boulangerie, restaurants, fruits et légumes et supermarchés).
Nous avons été trés bien acceuilli, l'appartement correspondait à la description tout était impécable le quatier est calme en effet la proximité du métro est trés pratique.
Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen, die Wohnung liegt verkehrsgünstig bei zwei Metrohaltestellen, Lebensmittelgeschäfte in der Nähe, in einem ganz normalen Viertel.
Great host, lovely apartment with a perfect rooftop terrace. Couldn't have been better.

La experiencia fue muy placentera. Fuimos recibidos en persona, se nos entregaron las llaves y explicaciones de todo lo que necesitamos saber. El piso es muy luminoso y está bien decorado. Tiene una terraza muy grata. El vecindario es decente, y tiene metro a la puerta.

Sara is a good host. She made sure a friend was waiting for us to be received.She also provided us with a fan when requested as the house had no a/c. The only inconvenience was the stairway to the penthouse which was very steep not fit for older people. Our group consisted of three people over 65 years old. The location was perfect close to metro station.Our overall stay was very good loved the balcony/ verandah.

Sara a tout fait pour que notre arrivée se passe dans de bonnes conditions. L'accueil a été fort sympathique,et l'appartement conforme à ce que nous avions pu imaginer grâce aux photos,adorable! Le quartier,bien qu'excentré,est très agréable, avec sa station de métro vraiment tout près,un supermarché au coin de la rue, une boulangerie,des petits restaurants... Merci!

The place is very close to public transportation (metro, bus) and everything in Barcelona is easily accessible. The host is very responsive by phone and email, the communication was easy, and everything that was promised was there. The kitchen is great, we cooked a lot, and it is well equipped with pots and plates. The balcony is great, it was nice to relax there. Tapas bars, grocery stores, etc. are very close but the street is quiet. I will definitely stay here during my next visit to Barcelona.

Sara's place is a lovely apartment with everything you could want at your disposal. 

The balcony was absolutely gorgeous and a great place to relax and Sonia, who was there to greet us, was amazingly helpful and friendly - offering advice and help whenever we needed! We would definitely recommend this apartment!

name: Prvate Family Room For 4 travellers
summary: The apartment situated in the Mongkok. Mongkok is the famous shopping district in Kowloon. Transportation is convenient for both shopping and sightseeing. Just a 3 minutes walk distance, you can reach the nearby Mongkok MTR Station E1 Exit. You can take MTR directly to the Disneyland and the Ngon Ping 760 Cable car Station . There is only 1 min walk distance from the nearby A21/N21( Midnight airport bus) stop. You can also take only a 10 minutes walk to the CTS Hong Kong - Canton (China) bus terminal. Beside, the Mongkok East Rail Train Station is only 15 min walking distance form the place, You can take train from there to Lowu and transit to Shenzhen and Guangzhou. The room has 1 double bed 1200mm width fits for 2 and 2 single beds 900mm width with mattress. One extendable 750 single bed is available underneath the double bed for extra guest   Facilities include 1. Private washroom with shampoo, liquid soap, toilet paper, towels, toothbrush and paste, cold and hot water supply . 2. A

reviews.comments: 房间很干净和很光亮｡还有,房东很友善和通情達理｡
Great welcome, received a lot of information to go around and see Hong Kong. Very helpful.

Tudo correu bem e as instruções do anfitrião sobre como chegar ao quarto foram precisas.
O quarto era exactamente como nas fotografias pelo que não houve surpresas.
入住体验好,晚上对面街很热闹,性价比高,值得入住

Room is clean.
Warm welcome.
You can ask them all about your trip.

summary: Hola,es una habitación con dos camas individuales,sin pestillo,con ventana,armarios,la casa es de 4 dormitorios con 2 wc,nos gustaria que fueran estancias de minimo 5 dias,llave propia de la casa y si teneis dudas podeis escribirme.Un saludo

name: Luxurious Master Bedroom in 2BR!
summary: Amazing and luxurious private bedroom in a spacious 2BR available for the light traveler or for an extended stay. Perfect for singles or couples.  Complete amenities provided. Deluxe Full Plush Memory Foam Bed, iHome with 4S or earlier connectivity, brand new fixtures. Spectacular location!
space: This apartment is a corner unit which allows the most amount of natural sunlight throughout all times of the day. Hardwood floors and brand new appliances with dishes, pots, pans, dining and living area, reading material, games, along fresh food within walking distance - this apartment is a slice of heaven in Brooklyn! Each guest is provided with fresh linens, towels, Paul Mitchell hair products, and bottled water upon arrival! All guests are treated with the highest care possible!

neighborhood_overview: Bed Stuy is the beating heart of Brooklyn. Centrally located near both local and express trains, our home is also minutes from some of the most delicious Soul Food in New York City! French restaurants and organic coffee bars are mere blocks from the apartment, along with specialty retail and grocery stores.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Young professional couple who love New York City and want to share our home with people looking for an affordable vacation in the Big Apple. We are both from the mid west and bring strong values and genuine hospitality. Friendly, outgoing, and resourceful so our guests feel welcomed and appreciated.

reviews.comments: Great guy and neat , always there to assist me with anything i want

Good and simply solution. Have everything, near everything. Safe zone.
Very nice Host.
Hello Lee, thank you for your welcoming. Your room was a good value for the price . It's a good point that your apartment is near from the Subway.

Hi Lee & Daniel,

Thank you so much for accommodating us over the weekend. We loved the room! You guys were great hosts and we highly recommend you and your apartment to other Airbnb guests. The room is very clean and the bed is very comfortable with the memory foam mattress. When we arrived there were clean towels, shampoo and conditioner, and cold water nicely prepared for us. Lee & Daniel are really easy to deal with and more than helpful in recommending places to go and providing concise instructions in using the transit system. The apartment is located 7 minutes walk from 2 train stations and frequent bus services just around the corner so getting to and from Manhattan was quite easy. 

Thank you again Lee & Daniel for your great hospitality. Hope to cross paths with the both of you in the future.

Regards
Zoey & Jay

Lee and Daniel were absolutely the most gracious hosts. They were extremely communicative, polite, and respectful. The apartment is immaculate, the memory foam bed feels like you're sleeping on a cloud, and it was generally the perfect Airbnb experience. This is how it should be folks. Go stay with these dudes, you won't regret it.

Lee and Daniel were perfect hosts! Although we didn’t interact with them too much due to being busy sightseeing, they were very kind and gracious in our short interactions and via text, gave us our privacy, very accessible and provided everything we could possibly need. We arrived the first day to a wonderfully made up bed and a five-star hotel-like arrangement of fresh towels, tissue, shampoo and conditioner, and free bottled water sitting right on top of it. The bed was very comfortable. The AC worked perfect. The room was a good space. And the bathroom was clean, modern looking, and perfect size as well. Few days in, we noted how the only things missing in the room would be a towel rack and mirror and miraculously (almost scary, mind-reading type scary), Lee and Daniel had a new towel rack and mirror waiting for us the very next day. Seriously, FIVE STAR service. My girlfriend even remarked that they should open up their own hotel! The place was also very short walk away from both AC and J trains (which both take you to Manhattan in no time). Convenient stores close all over. We highly recommend staying with Lee and Daniel. They were very responsive to all our concerns and didn’t even mind our late-night arrivals, even though we felt bad because we didn’t want to wake them up with the door noise and such. Hope you choose their place and have as great a time with them as we did!

The host made my partner in I feel very welcomed would have wanted the bathroom and bedroom to be a bit cleaner as there was hair on the floor in the bedroom that was not ours and the bathroom was a bit moldy.
We had a really great stay! Great hosts, very organized and a great place!

Both Lee and Daniel are very friendly host. We stayed 13 nights here. The house is neat and clean. Everything is very organised. It's in a safe community and there's 2 subway station within 10 mins walk and 1 min to the nearest bus stop. We enjoyed our stay very much and would recommend this listing to anyone visiting New York.

Meme si avec notre programme chargé nous étions très peu a l'appartement nous avons été très bien accueilli et  bien conseillé également.
L'appartement est très propre et situé à 10/15 min à pied de 2 lignes de métro et la chambre a un lit super confortable!
6 nuits qui sont passées très rapidement!

It has been an absolute pleasure to have met Lee and Daniel: my girlfriend and I both wished we could have stayed more than just one night. The guys were very welcoming, and we had a great conversation comparing notes on New York and the US versus or home Europe - a moment for the likes of which we swear by AirBnB despite being rather private people. 

The apartment and room are very clean and light. It's conveniently close to the metro which gets you to Manhattan, a bus to Williamsburg, and an affordable Uber ride to JFK. Great place, good location, fantastic value.

We would absolutely recommend staying with Lee and Daniel!

This was our first time and Brooklyn and didn't know what to expect, after staying here we would definitely want to go back. This colorful neighborhood is fun, save and unique. Lee and Daniel was helpful, friendly and went out of their way to improve our stay. 
I love NY and this was a true living like a local experience. Easy parking outside the apartment and short walk to the train station to get into Manhattan. The area is full coffee shops and eateries to keep you busy.  Lee and Daniel did a fabulous job in creating a space that is comfortable and inviting. As seasoned travelers who've stayed in a couple of places, this one ticks all the boxes, we would highly recommend you stay here.

Lee and Daniel son increíbles!!!! Son divertidísimos, buena gente y serviciales, nos dieron consejos utilísimos. La comunicación con ellos es perfecta, contestan al momento que les escribes, siendo siempre super resolutivos. El apartamento es inmejorable. La habitación es comodísima, tiene una ventana que da al exterior y la cama es estupenda también, enorme!! En nuestra estancia coincidió que los días eran un poco fríos y contamos con un radiador que nos calentó al instante. El baño es muy cómodo y los chicos son muy limpios, todo está limpísimo. Para movernos utilizamos el metro, del que tienes dos paradas a escasos 10 minutos. Por todo, no dudéis en ir a casa de Lee y Daniel, es una opción estupenda para pasar unos días en Nueva York. Thank you guys!! Enjoy and take care!!
Lee and Daniel were really nice and friendly hosts! The room was really clean and tidy as well! Will definitely book this apartment again if I am back in NY!

Awesome stay at Lee and Daniel home! Very clean appartment, real Brooklyn experience, close to train and buses...
Lee and Daniel have always been available to answer questions, and gave fantastic food recommendations.
We would definitely recommend this place and come back next time we visit NYC.
Thank you guys!

All I can say is, amazing! Check in was convenient, the apt was clean and comfortable; very accurately depicted, maybe even better. The neighborhood is really nice, close to trains/bus, and has easy access to grocery stores, cafes, etc. 

As for our hosts, Lee and Daniel were super nice, asking if we needed anything and making sure we were taken care of, but not overly involved. It was really simple staying here and we could come and go as we pleased. Recommend!

Really nice place, that have everything you need near by! Lee and Daniel were really nice and were very good at making sure we felt at home and that we did'nt needed anything!! It was a really good experience, and we would definitely stay there again :-)

Although I couldn't spend much time with them I can say that they are incredible hosts. The room was so good and the bed is extremely comfortable. They are so kind and are always ready to answer any question. Thanks for everything guys !!!!
Everything is fantastic here. I really recommend this place.

We had a fantastic time here! The location is super close to the Brown Line trains (5-10 mins walk) in Brooklyn with easy street parking. Our hosts were awesome and room was very comfortable. There's also an amazing Indian restaurant close by. Thanks so much for an awesome stay!

Totally enjoyed our stay at Lee and Daniel's place! 
Apartment is very clean and tidy. We stayed in the master bedroom and were provided clean towels and all kinds of toiletries. 
Lee and Daniel are wonderful hosts! They made us feel like home and recommended us a nice breakfast spot called Trade Union. Everybody should go check out! It's 9 blocks away next to Utica Ave metro. 
Location is great. Within walking distance to two metro stations. Very safe and quiet neighborhood with easy access to restaurants and grocery shops. Neighbors are pretty friendly as well :)
I'd totally recommend Lee and Daniel's place to anybody wanting to stay in Brooklyn :)

Lee and Daniel were amazing! They were very communicable and accommodating! The first night Lee gave us several suggestions on where to dine and go out to bars. They were present when we needed them but gave us our privacy when we wanted it. Thank you!
Great stay in Brooklyn! Lee and Daniel were super flexible and kind. Wonderful comfortable bed. Although it's an up-and-coming area the neighborhood itself is certainly not high-end.

We had a wonderful stay at Lee's place. The room was as advertised spacious enough for 2 persons and very tidy and clean. Lee and Daniel did everything they could to make sure that we had a pleasant stay, e.g. providing us with tipps and tricks regarding public transportation or even recommendations where to have great meals!
We definitely would come again and can recommend this Airbnb room - very good value for the price, considering that it is in New York! :-)

Lee and Daniel were very welcoming hosts. They double checked if we had everything we needed and made our arrival, as well as the whole stay, very convenient and comfortable. The location of their apartment is great, close to the subway and several restaurants/bars.
Thanks again for having us!

It's a really great apartment, got enough space for two and we really enjoyed the time there. We had privacy when we needed and was treated very well by Lee and Daniel. They also gave us good suggestions and guidance, and contributed to a great start for us for our first time in NYC.

Lee and Daniel were great hosts. We saw Lee for only 5 seconds, but met Daniel a few times and he was so sweet and welcomming. We loved our stay. It is a bit far up in Brooklyn, but there are a few great restaurants around and many subway lines taking you directly to the city. The check in was easy and they were super flexible on the checkout.  We'd recommend staying here. Thanks guys!

Lee & Daniels have been great hosts! Leaving us privacy but helping whenever was needed. Their place is nice and cozy! And the neighbour is quite and people really friendly! We definitely recommended!

Lee and Daniel were great host! 
They helped us with every question we had and were very courteous.  
The room has a good size and the bed was very very comfortable!! The whole Apartement was very clean. 
I can recomment everyone to stay in Lee and Daniels apartement.
Lee and Daniel were great hosts. I felt welcome and they had everything I needed.  The place was clean and comfy.  It was a great stay!

We had a very good stay at Lee and Daniel's place. They've been kind and attentive and have done everything to make things easy . The apartment is very comfortable and the neighbourhood is wonderful. We surely recommand Lee and Daniel's place!

Lee y Daniel fueron excelentes anfitriones, nos sentimos muy cómodos en su casa! El barrio está bien, hay varios lugares para comer por ahí y el subte queda a algunas cuadras de caminata. 
Los recomendamos!
Lee and Daniel's place has a great location and is very clean. My sister enjoyed the comfy bed and it worked out perfectly for our NYC get-a-way. The hosts are very welcoming and communicative.
Lee and Daniel are awesome! Though we didn't have a chance to meet in person, communications went on well. Had great time at their place. Happy New Year!

We stayed at Lee and Daniel's place over new year. We didnt get a chance to meet them in person but they were very prompt in answering any questions we had. Their place was a little bit far from Manhattan, but easy access to transport. Room was cozy & clean. Would recommend Lee and Daniel to others.

My husband and I, had a very nice trip in NYC thanks to Lee and Daniel's welcoming. The apartment was close to the trains (about 5-10 minutes by feet). It was really clean and the bed is very confortable. Lee and Daniel are really kind and they are full of good advices. We didn't see them a lot because we were visiting a lot, so we came back to the apartment a bit later but it was really sympathic to meet them and we had a warm welcome so that's was awesome. 
Thanks guys !

Nous avons passé deux excellentes nuits chez Lee et Daniel.
L'appartement, surtout la chambre et la salle de bain que nous avons utilisés, étaient très propres et bien aménagés et correspondaient amplement à nos besoins.
L'appartement est situé à proximité de la station de métro Gates Avenue, à Brooklyn.
Le chemin vers Manhattan se fait donc très bien... à condition que le métro soit fonctionnel, ce qui n'a malheureusement pas toujours été le cas lors de notre séjour.
Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer Lee et Daniel car nous ne les avons pas croisés, mais ils ont fait en sorte que nous ayons tout ce dont nous avions besoin.
Points positif: le stationnement gratuit en face de leur immeuble!

Lee's place was def a excellent stay for my girlfriend and I. Nice location and easy parking. Really nice neighborhood with great brunch spots in the morning. Room was comfy and just what we needed. Would recommend this stay for anybody!

Lee was kind and super flexible with check-in check out. He provided some great suggestions of things to do and placed to eat around the city. The apartment is comfortable and near some great bars and some tasty restaurants.  We would definitely stay again.

Great place to stay in NY. Bed-Stuy is a cool neighborhood with cafes and restaurants nearby. Easy access to Manhattan via A/C or J/Z trains. Lee and Daniel are very friendly and welcoming hosts. The place is super clean and comfy. Would definitely stay again!

We had a great experience and cozy stay at Lee and Daniel's place!The apartment is located in Brooklyn, 35-40 minutes ride by subway to the city center, easy to find and walk around in the neighborhood. The room is comfy and clean, bathroom and kitchen are shared with the hosts. Guys are very friendly and hospitable! We've received great tips (on getting to La Guardia airport, shops nearby, could borrow so much needed umbrellas, etc.) and generally, we had nice random chats. It was a real pleasure to stay and feel like at home! Thank you guys!

Lee and Daniel's room is at a 10-minute walk from 2 metro stations and it's about a 40-minute ride to Midtown Manhattan from either of the stations. The room was clean with an air conditioner, which was very helpful when we stayed there during a heatwave in New York. Nice and pleasant hosts and they make you comfortable very quickly.
Awesome spot -- very comfortable, organized, clean. Appreciated the little touches that made the stay feel like home! Super friendly and flexible hosts. Thank you!

Lee's place was clean, presentable and comfortable. 

His place is 10-15 minute walk about from 3 major lines into Manhattan so you can get just about anywhere within an hour. Very useful! 

Parking was a bit awkward as you had to move your car for street cleaning but otherwise fine. We also had to let the host into our room so he could get his clothes out every evening. This probably wouldn't be an issue if you didn't come back to the room after 8pm. 

Overall great value.

Great stay. Very clean, cozy place. Checking in was very easy. Parking right on the street and easy access to the city. Host checked on us a couple times but otherwise left us to enjoy the trip. Would book again easily.

Lee and Daniel were great! Although we only saw each other a few times, they always took the time to make sure we were as comfortable as we needed to be. Their place was very close to the subway. The room itself was extremely clean and the bed was so comfortable it had us struggling to get out of it each morning. We were sad to leave but can't wait to come visit again soon!
Good clean place in a good spot with great international food nearby.

Great place, and very accomodating host(s)!
The pictures and the desciptions are accurate.
Lee and Daniel were wonderful host, very polite with great recommendations. The apartment was clean and nice, the bed VERY comfortable. Close to public transportation and great restaurants.

Many thanks to Lee and Daniel for hospitality, they were very nice and attentive hosts. The room like a hole place was clean and cosy. Everything was like in the description and on the pictures. Would definitely recommend it to everyone.
Awesome location. The room was clean and cozy as described and photographed. With no doubt, it was a great stay!
For our first visit to NYC, Lee and Daniel's apartment was very good. They were flexible with check in and check out, and very accommodating during our stay. Thank you guys for being great hosts!
Fantastic hosts, clean and comfortable place in a very nice quaint neighbourhood

Lee and Daniel has a lovely home in Brooklyn. It was a great and safe neighborhood with great access to public transportation and free parking. Also with some easy shops and restaurants around a few blocks. I enjoyed my stay with them. They were very friendly and helpful and also gave me my privacy when i needed it. Thanks guys again!

I had a great time. These two hosts are sweet, super easy going, clean, friendly and helpful. Once you know your way around it is easy. 
You are well connected with the subway, and the train would.
The room is nice, and the bed is comfortable.
 Everything was clean.  I felt I stayed in a very authentic neighbourhood.
 I  would stay here again. I had nice chats with my hosts, and tehy gave me good information. Wonderful people. 
 See you in the future  lots of love Jutta

Comfortable bed and nice room. Easy check-in and check-out. Lee always answered my questions promptly. I saw Lee and Daniel only a couple of times.
It's fairly far from Manhattan (about 45 min by train) and even from downtown Brooklyn, but it's certainly a good place to stay if want to get a "real experience" from NY, not as the touristic place, but rather how is living there.

Lee’s place is a jewel for couples and solo traveler who want to explore the city. It’s in a calm neighborhood, very good connected to two main metro lines - that can bring you straight to Manhattan or JFK.

Room is comfortable and cozy. Big size bed. Bathroom is clean and well maintained. 

Lee and Daniel considerate and kind hosts.

We enjoyed our stay and we highly recommend staying here

Impeccably clean room with a very comfy bed and all facilities available. We had the whole apartment to ourselves since our hosts were out of town. Lee was very easy to communicate with and all instructions were clear. 

The neighborhood is very laid-back and full of shops and restaurants that have a non-touristy feel to them.
Transport is fairly easy with a couple of buses around the corner and several subway trains on about 10-15 minutes walking distance. The trip to and from JFK is really straightforward.

During the week the neighborhood is quiet, on Friday the streets are busier. 
All in all I would totally recommend this room, we have no complaints whatsoever.

The room and bed were very comfortable after a long day! Close walk to the train and delis. Inside, the apartment was clean and Lee was friendly & casual - very easy to have a quick convo with before heading out. They were extremely quick with communication and helpful with check-in. I would definitely recommend this to a visitor. Thank you for the stay!
Awesome hosts, awesome place.
Lee and Daniel are great hosts - we felt so welcomed in their home and had a lovely time. I would recommend this place to anyone without hesitation.

We stayed at Lee and Daniel’s for almost a week. It was a great place to come back to after a long day out on the town. Everything from check-in to check-out was smooth and they made themselves easy to contact in case we needed anything. 

A subway station was only a few minutes away and there was a nice bar just down the street. 

Would definitely come back!

Lee e Daniel sono stati fantastici: simpatici e puliti, ci hanno aiutato a prenotare il pullman per boston ed altre cose.
La stanza si trova a 10 min a piedi dalla metro a e c che in 30 min porta a Manhattan! 
Consigliatissimo!!!! 
Grazie Lee e Daniel!!!
Nice and comfy room within reach of public transportation. Would stay here again!
The place is nice and clean.  Comfy bed.   Very quiet and private. Definitely will recommend it to anyone and would love to stay again with them.

I needed a place to stay for a couple of nights in Brooklyn and this was a great spot hosted by Lee & Daniel. They were very easy to communicate with from booking through checkout. I only met Lee and Daniel for a brief bit but they were  friendly and easy to talk with. The apartment was very clean including the bathroom and bedroom with fresh linens and towels. The bedroom was very quiet and included a comfortable mattress which made for a good nights sleep. It had been very hot and humid outside during my stay in June and the air conditioner in the bedroom cooled me down!

Staying with Lee and Daniel was an absolute pleasure and I warmly recommend them to anyone planning a visit to NYC. They are fantastic and considerate hosts and their place is comfortable and spacious. Neighborhood is great as well, but also convenient for transportation elsewhere.

Daniel was super nice, felt like meeting a friend! Didn't get the opportunity to meet Lee. Place is a bit deeper into Brooklyn, but the street parking wasn't difficult and the subway was under a mile  away on foot. Neighbors could be rowdy, but couldn't hear them much through the walls. Nice place with comfy bed!
Lee and Daniel are extraordinarily hospitable. Enjoyed our stay a lot. It's a ten minute walk to a subway station, and the apartment itself is close to a laundromat, restaurants and coffeshops.
Nuestra estancia fue genial. Lee y Daniel son dos chicos encantadores, que nos ayudaron en todo lo que pudieron. Totalmente recomendable.
Lee and daniel were super nice and the best hosts we could ask for. The place is very clean and close to a bus stop and a subway station.

name: A quiet well located apartment
summary: Nicely renovated 1 bedroom + study Art Deco apartment is conveniently located 10-15 minute walk to Bondi Beach/cafe strip and 10 minute walk to Bondi Junction shopping centre. Room has a queen bed and inbuilt wardrobe. Small balcony with BBQ.
description: Nicely renovated 1 bedroom + study Art Deco apartment is conveniently located 10-15 minute walk to Bondi Beach/cafe strip and 10 minute walk to Bondi Junction shopping centre. Room has a queen bed and inbuilt wardrobe. Small balcony with BBQ. Apartment located on a nice quiet cul de sac with a park in the same block. There is a cute cafe which has nice coffee, a dry cleaner (does bag washes) and a corner store 2 blocks away. Buses run from the end of the street up to Bondi Junction and into the city. Regular in peak times and every 30 minutes in non peak times. Trains run regularly from Bondi Junction into the city.
neighborhood_overview: Apartment located on a nice quiet cul de sac with a park in the same block. There is a cute cafe which has nice coffee, a dry cleaner (does bag washes) and a corner store 2 blocks away.
transit: Buses run from the end of the street up to Bondi Junction and into the city. Regular in peak times and every 30 minutes in non peak times. Trains run regularly from Bondi Junction into the city.
house_rules: No smoking in the apartment and no parties.

host.host_about:
I am an easy going friendly gay guy. I love the beach, travel and keeping fit. I have traveled all over the world with my work and enjoy hanging out with other well traveled souls. 

I like to live in a clean environment and enjoy hosting people. I am happy to share my inside tips on Sydney and the Eastern suburbs or I can leave you to your own devices if you prefer your privacy. I have a great 'welcome to Sydney' itinerary for those want to be wow'd by my beautiful home city.

reviews.comments: Great apartment and everything we needed was there. Ideal location and very comfortable. Enjoyed our stay very much. Thank you Ant for making it so easy ;)
Anthony made clear plans so I could access the apartment. Good communication. It was a tidy and nice place to stay - about a 15 min walk to Bondi beach.

We had a fantastic stay at Anthony's place in Bondi. 
The apartment was very clean, modern and exactly as the pictures show. The morning sun on the balcony is perfect for a cup of tea or coffee and a relaxed time.
It is tucked away on a quiet street, which was excellent for a quiet nights sleep, but still just a quick walk to the main shops of Bondi and the beach.
Great spot. The owner was super prompt with replying to emails, accommodating and helpful. Perfect spot.

Anthony's place was just as described. Great location, very clean, walking distance to everywhere. 10 minutes to the beach and even closer to cafes and shops.I would definitely stay there again and recommend it when staying in bondi

A lovely apartment in a great location, Anthony's place was perfect for me. Tucked away in a lovely quiet part of Bondi, it's a 15-minute walk to the beach and seconds to the bus stop to head into the city. The apartment is clean, modern and well maintained. I had a fantastic stay at Anthony's place in Bondi.
We had a brilliant time staying at Anthony's place. It's clean, has everything you need, and is well located to enjoy Bondi and the rest of Sydney. Highly recommended!

The apartment is conveniently located in a quiet suburban Bondi street but close enough to walk to the  beach and local cafes, so it's very handy. A clean and comfortable home away from home. Anthony is an awesome host who is very responsive to questions and give lots of useful local tips. Will definitely recommend it for a pleasant stay in Bondi Beach. Nice welcome touch on self-check in :-)
PERFECT!! I couldn't ask for anything more. The space is decorated really nicely, location is awesome and Anthony is a thoughtful host. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone.

My partner and I stayed for the weekend and were very happy with the accomodation, very clean and modern! Really good spot walking distance to the beach and lots of cafes and restaurants would definitely stay again, highly recommend Anthony’s place.
Nice place to stay. Highly recommended!
Anthony’s place was perfect. We enjoyed two nights. He was great to communicate with. Would highly recommend this accommodation
Great stay at Anthony’s place. Lovely apartment and really nice welcoming gift.  We’ve been able to enjoy Bondi. Thanks a lot Anthony!
Very nice place, great communication,great location, highly recommend, thanks so much!

This place was everything we expected and more! Anthony was an amazing host, accommodating our early check in. The place was left super clean and tidy and had everything we needed not to mention the complimentary wine/chocolate. Location was amazing with a short walk to bondi and 20min Uber to airport (Sunday). The ease of checkin/check out and communication throughout our stay was impeccable. We loved staying at Anthony's place in Bondi and would definitely love to stay again one day

name: New and central apartment up to 4!
summary: This one bedroom apartment has been lovingly renovated and beautifully restored. It is a quiet place to stay for vacation or business trip located in the Eixample, an area of the city close to everywhere.CITY TAX: compulsory to pay upon arrival (2,50 euros per day/person). Private parking (15 euros/day) Internet free. License: HUTB-011275. Late checkin fee: 30 euros from 21:00, 50 euros from 23:00
space: FULLY REFURBISHED 1 BEDROOM APARTMENT NEAR SAGRADA FAMILIA   This apartment has been lovingly renovated and beautifully restored. It is a quiet place to stay for vacation or business trip located in the Eixample, an area of the city close to everywhere. Just a stone's throw away you will be at the Basilica of the Sagrada Familia, one of the most universal signs of identity of the city and the country. The apartment has a double bed and double sofa bed in the living room. The apartment access to an exterior balcony. Living and dining room with open kitchen which is fully equipped (ceramic hob, oven, coffee maker, frigde, microwave, kettle, toaster). Stylish bathroom with shower. The apartment comes equipped with everything needed: Wi-fi, Plasma screen TV , Air conditioning/ Heating in the living room, Washer, iron and iron board, hairdryer). Bed lines and towels provided. Cosy apartment ideal for those wishing to share the good spirit of the Catalan capital.
description: This one bedroom apartment has been lovingly renovated and beautifully restored. It is a quiet place to stay for vacation or business trip located in the Eixample, an area of the city close to everywhere.CITY TAX: compulsory to pay upon arrival (2,50 euros per day/person). Private parking (15 euros/day) Internet free. License: HUTB-011275. Late checkin fee: 30 euros from 21:00, 50 euros from 23:00 FULLY REFURBISHED 1 BEDROOM APARTMENT NEAR SAGRADA FAMILIA   This apartment has been lovingly renovated and beautifully restored. It is a quiet place to stay for vacation or business trip located in the Eixample, an area of the city close to everywhere. Just a stone's throw away you will be at the Basilica of the Sagrada Familia, one of the most universal signs of identity of the city and the country. The apartment has a double bed and double sofa bed in the living room. The apartment access to an exterior balcony. Living and dining room with open kitchen which is fully equipped (ceramic hob,
neighborhood_overview: Location: There are several supermarkets and a large open market just around the corner. Shops and some restaurants just in front of the building as well as nice bars to go and chill out and have a drink. Safe, well located, quite and popular neighbourhood
notes: PLEASE NOTE   -There is an extra fee for late check in: From 21:00 pm: 30 euros. From 23:00 pm: 40 euros. From 24:00 pm: 50 euros -BABYCOT  under request (30 euros extra) Flexible Check in depending on previous guests departure time. Flexible Check out depending on future guests arrival time. Don't leave the key inside the lock during your stay. When checkout leave both sets of keys on the table and close the door behind you
transit: The apartment is directly between two metro stations: L2-Tetuan and L4-Girona. The bus stop is also a minute away.  However most of the city's attractions are a walk away distance. A 10 minute walking distance from Arc de Triomf where trains can be taken if you plan to travel outside the city.
access: Private Parking, 15 euros per day
interaction: Tourist tax: the 7 first nights in Barcelona are charged with a touristic tax. Hosts over 16 years old will have to pay 2,50 euros per night. This amount has to be paid in cash.  I will be meeting guests at checkin  only I will give them a 24 hours phone number to contact with me during the stay Don't leave the key inside the lock during your stay. When checkout leave both sets of keys on the table and close the door behind you
house_rules: Following the law it is compulsory for persons staying in accommodation establishments located in Catalonia to register to the Police therefore we request Full Name, Date of Birth and Passport Number. Article 2 of Order IRP/(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN), of 5 August, on the obligation for registration and communication to the Directorate General of the Police of persons staying in accommodation establishments located in Catalonia. Smoking allowed preferebly at the balcony. Please respect the neighbours.

host.host_about:
nice and friendly brothers who love meet people from different countries. 
we will do our best to make guests feel as at home
we love travel

reviews.comments:
Wohnung:
Die Wohnung schaut genau so aus wie auf den Bildern. Sie ist frisch renoviert und man fühlt sich bereits beim betreten der Wohnung wohl und zu Hause. Die Schlüsselübergabe hat einwandfrei geklappt und war sehr unkompliziert. Bei auftretenden Fragen konnten wir Vanessa sofort telefonisch erreichen und sie hat uns geholfen. Wir konnten sogar unsere Koffer noch in einem der Apartments lassen, so dass wir diese erst am Abend abholen brauchten und nicht am letzten Tag mit durch die Stadt ziehen mussten.

Lage:
Die Lage ist hervorragend. Zu Fuß ist man überall innerhalb von 10 Minuten, egal ob zum Strand, Sehenswürdigkeiten, Rambla oder zur Metro. Cafés, Supermärkte und Apotheken sind in unmittelbarer Umgebung.

Fazit:
Bei der nächsten Barcelona-Reise werden wir eines der Zimmer von Vanessa und Daniel buchen. Preislich absolut angemessen und gerechtfertigt für den erbrachten Gegenwert!

Nicely located and furnished flat. Neighbourhood is quiet and close to main attractions. Even though kitchen was nice and equipped, there were some basic things (such as olive oil or salt) missing. This may be the problem if you plan to stay for a short period of time.

Vanesa est sympathique et surtout honnête ; juste avant que nous arrivions elle s'est rendue compte d'un problème d'eau chaude dans l'appartement et nous a immédiatement contacté pour s'excuser et nous proposer un appartement de rechange (d'ailleurs encore mieux que celui que nous avions loué initialement) Le lendemain le problème était résolu et nous avons pu, comme prévu, regagner notre appartement. 

L'appartement est conforme aux photos ; neuf, moderne, agréable, équipé... et très bien placé puisque, outre de nombreuses stations de métro à proximité, vous pouvez presque tout faire à pied. Enfin, concernant les modalités (remise des clefs, état des lieux...), Vanesa nous a fait confiance donc tout s'est fait très simplement et rapidement, ce qui est appréciable après un long trajet. 

Merci encore.

L'appartement était très bien, propre et super bien placé (visite de la Sagrada Familia à pieds ). Les photos correspondent vraiment à la réalité. Vanessa a été très réactive lorsque nous avons besoin d'elle, merci ! 
Un petit bémol : bien lire les conditions de réservation dans le descriptif de l'appartement, apparemment les propriétaires à Barcelone ont l'habitude de demander des suppléments assez importants  (50 €) pour le check in tardif et le check out très matinal. Ce n'était par contre pas mentionné dans le détail du tarif annoncé par AirBnB.

Estuvimos en el apartamento de Vanesa y Daniel durante dos días. El apartamento es exactamente igual que en las fotografías, a nuestro parecer muy cómodo y agradable. Pudimos estar como en casa.
 Tuvimos algún problema y nos lo solucionaron enseguida y muy amablemente. Muy contentos del trato que nos dieron. 
El apartamento esta muy bien situado y tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en Barcelona.
Nice, clean, friendly place with high-quality WiFi and a good price. The only downside was that you could hear the neighbors' music, etc. through the walls. Close to Sagrada Familia.
Excellent experience. Everything was as expected. Clean apartment and well located. Thanks.

Vanessa and Daniel made it very easy to get the keys and drop them off afterwards. The place was cosy and just the right size for us. It was super clean and made us feel like we lived in Barcelona for a short time! The area was also very quiet but super close to sagrada familia. We would recommend it.

Accueil par la personne en charge du ménage. Très sympathique. Elle s’est assurée que tout allait bien pour nous (nous étions arrivés avant l’heure du RDV). Quartier résidentiel, proche métro TETUAN, très central.
We had a lovely stay in this apartment. It was clean and spacious in a lovely area and very easy to get there transport wise. Vanesa and Daniel were both very helpful and friendly.
Nice apartment, very convenient location, very clean. The only inconvenience is that if you're more than 2 people, you'll need to take turns to take a shower as hot water may not be sufficient.

The apartment is very cozy and is in an amazing location with almost everything you want to see in a walking distance. Vanesa is a very great host. She provided all the necessary information and helped with internet access issues even late in the evening.

Great apartment and location. Vanesa welcomed us on arrival and showed us around her lovely apartment. The apartment itself is lovely and exactly how it looks in the pictures. Be aware that the apartment walls are a bit thin so if you're a light sleeper your afternoon nap might be disturbed by neighbours going about their day. That wasn't a problem for us though and we would definitely stay again.

Appartement bien décoré (tel que sur les photos) très propre avec tout ce qu'il faut ! Bien Situé(quartier calme) à 20min a pied de "las ramblas" et du cœur de la ville et 5min de la Sagrada Familia !
Great location: cafe's and grocery nearby; 20 min walk to Placa De Catalunya. Love the space: simple and welcoming design with all amenities we needed. Will tell others about this listing.
Vanesa and Daniel have a fabulous apartment which is also conveniently situated. Vanesa was very responsive and communicated well. I highly recommend this apartment!
