Vanesa met us right on time and showed us around the apartment. She told us about the local area, and was smiley and friendly throughout. We stayed for 8 days, and needed nothing else from her as the apartment was stocked exactly as described and there was a supermarket for all the food/drink we needed. Neighbourhood was quiet and residential (not very touristy), and had great bus and metro links for the beach (we were staying for Primavera Festival) and the older city. We walked and rode bikes everywhere. Neighbours in the block were a little noisy, which wasn't great for our strange sleep schedule during the festival, but nothing some earplugs couldn't fix. Little balcony was lovely for breakfast.

The apartment is great! Location is convenient since it is quite close to the metro station. Also there are several markets and cafes nearby for whatever is needed! Communication with Vanesa was very easy and even though we didn't meet, she arranged everything for our arrival to be as easy as possible. I loved my stay at her place and would definitely recommend it for anyone!
Boli sme velmi spokojni, odporucam

Both Vanessa and Daniel were very welcoming hosts. Vanessa was helpful when directing us from the airport to the apartment, and Daniel met us at the apartment to show us around. The apartment was spotless and completely true to the photos shown on the website.  It was in a great location, with lots of sites within walking distance. It was also very close to Tetuan Metro station which made exploring the whole of Barcelona very easy. I would highly recomend this apartment  to others wishing to visit Barcelona.

The place was exactly as described. The apartment was clean and is only a short walk from La Segrada Familia. The only drawback to our stay was the wifi service which cut out each morning. If not for this minor wifi issue, this apartment would get 5-stars.

The apartment was great! Very centrally located. Perfect for a couple. Everything was very modern and in great condition, only 4 minutes away from the metro. Vanessa met us promptly upon arrival and even gave us fliers as to where we could leave our luggage after check out since we still had quite a few hours until our flight. Located in a great neighborhood that really made our visit feel like home.

Veldig flott leilighet! Fin balkong til å spise frokost eller drikke vin på. Fint bad og god dusj, og deilig med aircondition på varme dager. Bra lokasjon, nært metro og med både cafe og et lite supermarket på andre siden av gata. Vanesa var veldig hjelpsom og responderte raskt, både på telefon og e-post. Perfekt for par, varmt anbefalt. Tusen takk!

Hi all. Just stayed 6 nights at vanesa's and Daniel's apartment. 
Location of the apartment is good. 5 minutes walk to purple and yellow metro. Another good thing was the cleanness of the apartment. 
But. Those things were the only positive stuff. Here are the things that annoyed me.
1. In the photos, the apartment looks much bigger than it actually is. Its not that its small. Its just that the photos are not accurate. 
2. I think its a minimum courtesy to have atleast a bottle of milk in the fridge and small bag of coffee for the new tenants. 
I was shocked to see totaly empty cupboards and only 4 rolls of toilet paper for the entire 6 nights for 2 adults.

In general I dont think that the apartment is bad. I just think that for the amount of Euro we paid we should have been getting better service and better value for money which we didn't have.

Wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt für 5 Tage in Vanesas Appartement. Klimaanlage, Balkon, gut ausgestattete Küche und die gute Lage machen es zu einem perfekten Aufenthaltsort für einen Barcelona Trip. Für 2 Personen von der Größe her perfekt, für 4 etwas klein. Ruhige Nachbarschaft, supermarkt direkt um die ecke und zur nächsten ubahn station nur 5min zu fuß.

Vanesa war sehr flexibel mit der schlüssel übergabe und jederzeit erreichbar.

Wir können diese unterkunft für städtetrips sehr empfehlen und kommen gerne wieder.

We had a lovely stay in this apartment. Apartment is nice, very clean and has a very convenient location close to metro/bus, but also in walking distance to almost all sights. There are several markets and cafes nearby for whatever is needed. Vanesa is flexible and made things easy for us. All recommendations.
Appartement très agréable et bien situé. Nous avons passé un séjour conforme a nos attentes.
Wa passed a good week in your home

I stayed at Vanesa&Daniel's apartment for 3 nights. Communication with the host has been very easy throughout the reservation procedure and on my arrival in Barcelona. The flat is located in a quiet neighborhood of the city centre, very close to Plaça Tetuan and within walking distance from the central Plaça Catalunya. The closest underground station is Tetuan (Line 2). The apartment, that I found clean and tidy, is brand new and well decorated, as it appears in the pics; it is also quite bright and comfortable and perfect for single travellers or a couple. It has a well furnished kitchen (with big fridge, microwave and whatever you need to prepare food and eat in the apartment). The wi-fi connection and the A/C worked without problems.  I really enjoyed my stay in this apartment and I definitely would recommend it to my friends and to Airbnb Community!
Wonderful location,the room is really clean,and Vanesa is really nice
The apartment was very nice in an excellent location close to old city center.

Bonjour, 
nous avons eu le plaisir d'effectuer un petit voyage à Barcelone, pour ce faire nous avons donc réservé ce petit appartement qui nous as séduit sur ses photos et ses commentaire élogieux. Chose étonnante pour une réservation AirBnB, nous avons dû fournir un grand nombre de renseignements qui sont habituellement demandés lors d'une réservation auprès d'un professionnel (N° de passeport, information personnelle ... ), y aurait-il une activité professionnelle cachée derrière ces annonces d'appartements particuliers ? ou Vanessa posséderait-elle, à elle seule une bonne dizaine d'appartements ? 

L'appartement est dans un bon quartier, et est correct mais un peu cher lors de notre location (109euros). Son emplacement est intéressant, situé dans la partie droite de l'eixample entre la vieille ville (gothique) et la Sagrada Famillia de Gaudi. le métro est à 5 minutes à pied du métro Tetuan.

Une fois les clés remises, nous avons constaté que la fenêtre de la salle de bain menaçait de tomber si nous tentions de l'ouvrir ( fenêtre glissante ne glissant plus sur son rail), pire, la fenêtre de la chambre ne fermait pas du tout ! Ce qui est peu sécurisant au premier étage même si il ne faut pas tomber dans la paranoïa. Après appel et avoir expliqué  le problème, la fenêtre a été réparée dans la matinée suivante par le frère de Vanessa. 

Autre point négatif, une odeur de relent d’égout se faisait sentir par vague même après aération de l'appartement en ouvrant ce qu'il était possible d'ouvrir, l'odeur revenait peu de temps après. Nous comprenons donc mieux pourquoi un désodorisant fraîcheur marine ainsi qu'un pot d’encens huilé était présent et actif avant notre arrivée.

Le quartier n'est pas spécialement bruyant (pas de fêtards) mais l'appartement étant peu isolé et les locaux aimant parler fort et tard (3h du matin) nous avons était gênés 2 nuits sur les 5 passées sur place.

La porte coulissante de la salle de bien ne permet pas une bonne isolation avec la pièce principale, laissant un jour de 5 cm dans le haut et semblant un peu fragile. Comment font les gens pour satisfaire leurs besoins sans ainsi en faire part à leur partenaire et je ne parle pas dans le cas ou il y a 4 personnes à résidence.

Conclusions, un peu déçu de ce séjour en amoureux, légèrement entaché par ces mésaventures.

We enjoyed our stay at BCN. The house was good and as described. Daniel was a wonderful host and explained things to get us started.  Daniel and Vanesa were prompt in communication and we could co-ordinate easily. The house is in a central location and we could commute easily to the various sights in BCN. 
Fact, Not a Negative: Guests will have to climb a few steep stairs and is recommended to be attentive, especially if you have luggage. 
Will stay again if we get the chance. Thank you Daniel and Vanesa

Квартира нам очень понравилась .Расположение отличное (рядом метро ), для прогулок этот район отлично подходит потому что много достопримечательностей и заведений рядом.Квартира выглядит как на фото , также есть маленький балкончик
Спасибо Ванесса

Nuestra estadía en Barcelona fue excelente. El departamento esta en muy buenas condiciones, muy moderno y confortable; está muy bien ubicado, en una zona tranquila con negocios, restaurantes y supermercados en las cercanías. Fácil acceso al metro y líneas de bus.

The host was friendly, helpful and organized. The apartment was lovely. The location was perfect. Easy walk to Segrada Familia and other great areas. Nice restaurants in the immediate neighborhood. Very safe area.
The aparment was beautiful and the location was good. All in alle we had a great time in Barcelona..
We had a great stay. Everything was taken care of. Thanks!

Very clean and tidy - almost like new. David, Vanesa's colleague, was very polite and welcoming. The apartment is in a good location - about 10 min walk from Sagrada Familia and 15 min walk to La Ramblas. Vanesa was also flexible about our check out time too.

Great apartment and experience.
Appartamento molto bello e pulito. Posizione molto buona e centrale. Host gentili e disponibili. Grazie
Fantastic apartment perfect for solo traveler or couple. Most sights within walking distance or metro very close. Would stay again great.

Vanesa is a wonderful host! She met us on arrival providing all necessary details regarding our stay. Her apartment is perfectly located and very well equipped with all necessary amenities. Highly recommended host and a place where you can stay in Barcelona!

Vanesa était là à notre arrivée pour nous accueillir. L'appartement correspond aux photos et bien équipé. Il est situé dans un quartier calme et accessible à pied ou en métro des différents sites touristiques à visiter.
Perfect apt as seen on the pictures! And good placement too

Very clean and new appatment! In 10 minutes you can each Arc de Triomf and city center. Metro station is around the corner. There are nice bakeries with coffee in the area. Overall impression was great! Thanks for the stay!

We loved this apartment. It had everything we needed and it was really well located. It was close to everything. 
The apartment was really clean and comfortable, and Vanesa was really nice and helped with everything we needed. We will definitely stay there again if we get the chance.

We stay seven days in Vanessa's apartment. The place is nice, clean and the location is great. There are several markets and cafes nearby for whatever is needed. I didn't meet Vanesa in person but your friend David was our host. I recommend this apartment.

We met Rachel on arrival who was very welcoming! The apartment was very clean and tidy, very similar to the photos. We loved having breakfast on the balcony :) the apartment is pretty near to the centre of town so easy to get around. A very pleasant stay, would recommend staying here!

Gorgeous apartment - exactly as it looked in the photographs. The balcony is a great sun trap in the mornings. The apartment had everything we needed and was spotlessly clean. The area is great, very safe and close to some amazing sights, and with plenty of places to eat nearby - plus, there's a supermarket around the corner. Our host, Vanesa, was really friendly and wonderful to deal with. A brilliant stay - we would definitely book this apartment again.
房子內部如圖片一樣,裝修很新,二人入住空間很多｡地點雖不在市中心購物點,但還算方便,走5分鐘能到地鐵站｡廚房設備齊全,我們煮食有足夠器皿可使用｡由於房子沒有升降機,需走一條長樓梯,帶大型行李者需要考慮｡另晚間到達的朋友亦需留意遲check in 手續費挺高的｡我們遇上航班晚點,就需付上40歐元｡總括來說房子舒適,但價錢有點小貴

Muy buen departamento. Limpio, ordenado, bien equipado y muy bien ubicado (próximo a supermercados, restaurantes y metro). Óptimo para dos personas, o dos y un bebé, como nosotros. Recalco la responsabilidad de Vanesa para hacernos entrega de la llave y luego devolver un dinero mal cobrado. La única sugerencia, tratar de proponer una forma de coordinar la entrega de la llave no sólo por teléfono, ya que quienes no somod de Europa es posible que no tengamos servicio de móvil.

A great location in a nice quite area. The apartment is what the photo's showed and was everything we needed for our five nights stay. Daniel was very helpful on our arrival. Having the washing machine was a bonus.

Checkin was super simple. We were able to check in a bit earlier with no problem since our flight got in earlier than the checkin time. The location was easy to get to most places and felt very safe. There is a nice Argentinian restaurant across the street and the couple that runs it is very nice.

Vanesa and Daniel have a very nice appartment. Very clean and neat. Although it is too small for more than two persons. It was just perfect for my wife and I. 

The appartment is well located, in the middle of barcelona. Everything is near: Supermarket, Metro and even Taxi cab. All the main touristic attractions were within 15 mn. 

We really enjoyed our stay and definitely recommend this appartment to anyone in search of a nice place to stay in Barcelona
Very nice apartment in a central but quite location in Barcelona. The apartment is equipped with everything you need. We really enjoyed our stay.
Хорошее место. Хорошие хозяева. До пляжа около 3 км. Магазины рядом.

Logement adapté pour deux personnes.
Bon rapport qualité prix.

All major points have already been mentioned in the other reviews: the location is great, it is well connected to the public transport network, the bed is big and comfy, and the balcony is a big plus. Definitely recommend it over a hotel.

Communication is excellent! 
Communication with the host was super easy and we were welcomed at our arrival. Our hosts also remained available for any problem we might had (but we didn't have any!) 

Location is perfect! 
The place is perfectly located to discover Barcelona and we spent a week walking all around and even when tired,  it made more sense to walk back home then to take public transportation. There are also plenty of food stores around for your needs. 

Overall, I would recommend this place for anyone who wishes to discover Barcelona the right way!

This was my second visit to Barcelona one year apart.

First time I came with my fiancé and we stayed in one of their other apartments and we had such a good experience I decided to book again and I must say it was a really good visit again.

I would def book again 

Great hosts

Jessica and Daniels' place was amazing. It was very clean when i arrived. although I was not able to meet with them personally,it was very easy to communicate with them. Personally,i love the place due to the central location it offers from most of Barcelona's attractions. The trams and buses are just 3-4 min away. Overall,my experience with this place was 10/10. Thanks Jessica and Daniel!
Bonito y confortable apartamento, que tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unas vacaciones geniales.
Gute Lage, gemütlich und total unkompliziert - sehr gerne wieder und auch weiterzuempfehlen.
Lovelly place to stay !

The host was nice. Gave detailed suggestions about how to get to the apartment from the airport. The place was as described. Clean and centrally located. Night noise from nearby residents on terrace side of apartment was present unfortunately.

The apartment was very nice, exactly as the pictures. Very clean and spacious for our group of three. It was in a good location, very close to the metro station and within a walkable distance to many of the sites in Barcelona. Our only complaint was a strange smell coming into the apartment from the corridor but once we told them about it they offered to fix it straight away. Other than that it was truly a great apartment which all of us really loved.

The flat is exactly as in the pictures. It was very nice and spacious for us (couple). Location is perfect - close to Sagrada Familia, metro station and many of the sites in Barcelona. Few shops and good restaurants are also around. Vanesa and Daniel were helpful and replied to our messages very quickly. We would come back if we were visiting Barcelona again! I definitely recommened.

El piso es encantador, con techos altos y una decoración preciosa. La cocina, aunque pequeña, tiene todo lo que uno puede necesitar. El piso es una delicia, si bien cabe señalar que es un poco frío, a pesar de la estufa eléctrica. Por lo demás, una gozada. ¡Espero poder alojarme allí otra vez!
As we were travelling with our 3 months old baby, we needed an extra clean&quiet place in an easy reachable location. This place was perfect and the hosts were really helpful.

Nice apartment. Well-located close to Tetuan subway station or buses. A few restaurants around but so close walking distance to arc de triomphe or city center. A few blocks from Segrada Familia, not far running to Parc Güell. Walked to most of the places in the center (cathedral, market, Gothic Quarter...). Supermarkets available in walking distance too.

The apartment itself was very functional for our party of two (one adult and one teenager). Stayed 5 nights. Sleeping needs were comfy. Possibility to cook were nice to have. Cool little balcony as well. 
Communication went very smoothly with the hosts. Got help with the keys upon arrival and then with the WiFi. No worries. 

A bit of annoyance was however the heavy bad smell when entering the apartment. We thought first it came from the bathroom but no. Mentioned this to the host, but nothing was done. A real pity as the apartment is very clean and nice but smell pretty bad. 
We were pretty cold as well, but after turn-in the radiators during all our stay while we were in the apartment, it went fine. Cold air was coming through the surrounding of the bedroom window which made it pretty chilly for the head. 

All-in-all a nice apartment, well-located and very functional.
Espectacular todo!
Muy buen lugar. Cerca de varias atracciones de Barcelona.
Trevliga värdar som var lätta att få kontakt med. Lägenheten ligger jättebra till, gångavstånd till många sevärdheter. Bilderna är precis som verkligheten. Rekommenderas!

El apartamento es muy lindo, moderno y equipado igual a lo que se muestra en las fotos; tiene una muy buena ubicación, muy céntrica y bien conectado con algunos lugares para hacer el super o bien para ir a comer o beber algo cerca.
Me estuve comunicando con Vanesa y siempre se mostró dispuesta y accesible; David nos recibió y nos dio indicaciones oportunas y valiosas  para cada momento durante la estancia, el departamento también es muy limpio y todo se ve muy nuevo el único inconveniente es que tiene un ligero mal olor (como a cañería) y también nos tocó el inconveniente de que estaban en construcción/remodelación del departamento del otro lado del balcón y nos despertó muy temprano el ruido y la maquinaria empleada.

The apartment was exactly the same of the pictures. Very cozy, had everything we needed for small meals and very close to the subway and bus lines and Vanessa was great! We've spent an amazing period there!
Thank you!!

Vanesa and Daniel's apartment was perfect for our 3 night stay. It is a short walk from the nearest metro stop and in walking distance of some attractions. We arrived on a Sunday so the supermarkets were closed but we managed to get some fresh fruit and veg from the local grocers around the corner. The actual apartment is very clean and has a toaster/kettle/microwave etc for your meals. The street outside is very quiet so there was no problem getting to sleep. I would definitely recommend the apartment for a short stay in Barcelona.
Great place, walking distance to everything but still in a nice, quiet neighborhood. We would definitely rent this apartment next time we're in Barcelona.
Booked for a long weekend with two friends - perfect base for exploring the city!

Lovely and comfortable apartment. Looks exactly like in the pictures. Very well equipped. The location is perfect as it is in a quiet neighbourhood but very close to most of Barcelona's attractions and public transport. Many shops, restaurants, cafes etc. around. Vanesa was a great host, very helpful and flexible. Thank you for our lovely stay in beautiful Barcelona.
exactamente como se puede ver en las fotos. Trato super amable y estancia perfecta en Bcn :-)
Great apartment in a wonderful location.  Would certainly stay again.

We hadden een fantastisch verblijf. Appartement was top. Heel schoon en modern. Ligging voor ons perfect. Niet te druk maar wel genoeg aanloop op straat. En als je niet vies bent van wat wandelen is alles prima te doen.
El departamento se encuentra bien ubicado y es tal cual figura en las fotos. Todo salió de acuerdo a lo pactado.

This clean and modern apartment was everything we could have hoped for. The facilities were briallant and the location is great for getting to see some of the key tourist attractions. 
Vanesa and Daniel were so easy to communicate with, the whole process was quick and simple and they were very friendly and on hand to answer any questions we had.
I would definitely go back to this apartment again.
Great place and well located! Vanesa was very helpful and always  available

Nice modern flat, with a nice little terrace. Kitchen was fully equipped. With few restaurants, markets, and metro with in walking distance.

There is a big mercadona (spanish supermarket just 10 min walking)
Although we didnt meet Vanessa and Daniel, they reassure that the checkin was smooth and all the communication previous to that was quick and concised.

We would recommend it.
clean apartment with ac and a nice balcony in a good location
Very fast response time, central location, clean and pretty accommodations. Couldn't have asked for anything better!
Great apartment, it was just as described. Only have good things to say about our stay. Vanesa was also very helpful at check in.
El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy funcional y bien equipado, y el barrio muy lindo y agradable.

Nous n'avons pas été accueillis par Vanesa et Daniel. L’appartement est sombre (ouvertures sur une cour avec bâtiments précaires). La porte fenêtre qui donne sur le balcon est vétuste ce qui rend l’appartement peu sécurisant. De fréquentes remontées de mauvaises odeurs d'égouts envahissent l'appartement et la climatisation ne fonctionne pas. Équipements sommaires réduits au strict minimum.
Enjoy staying at Vanesa apartment, excellent location and above expectations.

Trés bel appartement idéalement situé ! 
Daniel et Vanesa ont été adorable avec nous a l'arrivée ! Je recommande vivement !

Had a great time visiting! Fue mi primera vez en Barcelona y la comunicación fue muy simple y no tenía ningun problema. La apartamento es muy lindo y definitivamente lo recomiendo a viajeros que quieren explorar la ciudad!
Great location and very nice flat, worth a visit

It's a nice place to stay, great area, and i would certainly recommend it. Vanessa was great on communication initially but the welcome was a little hasty -- I wasn't welcomed by Vanessa as told, and I did have the sense that i was a one of a long line of people that Daniel or David needed to hurry into their places. The internet password was also not working and I felt i was ignored  for longer than necessary when i pointed that out. But nice place otherwise

My husband and 1 x friend of ours stayed in the apartment, and absolutely loved the location and modern feel of the apartment. There was enough room for us to chill out and not be cramped. The location was great, and we walked absolutely everywhere. It was great to be central to so many different neighbourhoods. Vanesa was very quick to respond to all emails, and David was great upon check in. Thanks for such a wonderful stay! Hoping to visit again.

This was a perfect place to stay for our 5-day trip to Barcelona.  On a street that is quiet but busy enough to have lots of markets and restaurants very close by.  Also only a short walk from multiple metro stops - making it very convenient to the major sights.  Honestly, we mostly walked everywhere, and felt very safe doing so.  The house is extremely clean, furnished with exactly what we needed.  We would absolutely stay there again!

This is a great place in a quiet area. Location is great being near the Sagrada Familia and a metro station to get to the rest of the city. Had to contact the hosts on a couple of occasions and were dealt with efficiently.

Vanesa and Daniel were great, they met us when we arrived and gave us some great tips for where to go for our stay. The apartment was really clean and tidy when we arrived, and is well placed in the city. They also stayed in touch whilst we were there, and Daniel was kind enough to arrange a taxi to take us back to the airport, as we were leaving early.
Un sitio muy comodo y con ubicacion y servicios de la zona inmejorables.

Vanesa and Daniel were brilliant hosts, they went above and beyond for us. The apartment is very central, close to all the attractions. Apartment is very clean, convenient has everything you need. Highly recommend

The apartment is in great location, within 2 min. from Tetuan metro station, 15 min. from Sagrada Familia. There are  a lot of small supermarkets around to buy food for early breakfast in the apartment. There are a lot of restaurants across the street and within walking distance. For seafood lovers try 'LA PARADETA' (by Sagrada Familia), we also enjoyed Hungarian place 'Hungaryto'. Overall, we had a wonderful time in Barcelona!

Aunque la zona parece descuidada como el edificio, el departamento esta bien salvo un detalle de limpieza y olor a humedad de la lavadora de ropa que encontramos y reportamos a la anfitriona. El apartamento es muy céntrico y con excelentes vías de acceso para llegar caminando o en transporte público a casi toda la ciudad.

This was a great place, would recommend booking. The apartment is very central, but still in a charming, non-touristy area. Spacious and new inside. Daniel was a great host. Went above and beyond, and even scheduled cabs to come drop us off to the airport when we left. Would recommend.
The place was lovely, with all facilities needed  for a weekend in Barcelona. The balcony was so nice, and the apartment was so quiet, but still so central.

A small and charming apartment with an okay location from the city center.
Hoped the apartment was a little more bigger.

A little noise from other apartments and smell of smoke from outside.

We could have used an extra quilt for the nights.

Vanessa was easy to communicate with.
Really recommend, great place, nice and clean flat. Good location by walk and with public transportation.

The communication and the check in was easy and went well. David, who welcomed us was very friendly and gave us tips for the neighborhoood. The appartment was well situated close to the arc triomf and only two stops by metro to Universitat. The appartment was well equipped. The only thing which could be improved is the cleaningness of the appartment. There was still a lady shaver in the bathroom and the floors seemed not very well sweeped. Other than than we had a good stay and would recommend the place.

Great location near to public transport. Vanessa was very helpful and was always available.
The wi-fi is a bit slow and the bathroom is not very private, it only has a sliding glass door. Besides that it is a good value for money.

The place is in a great location!! Very accessible to publicó transportes but you can actually walk to most places !
But we were alocated tô a different apartment, we didn't realize at first because we are travelling a lot, in place after another, so we cant remember what it looks like. Vanessa offered us to change places but we were already installed and we asked for a discount in the city tax.  
The problem was the bad smell coming frim the plumbing, it was terrible, Vanessa even bought something to put in the drains but it didnt work. The whole time we stayed there we had to put up with the smell.
Nos ha encantado el piso. Tiene todo lo necesario para sentirte como en casa y poder disfrutar de un par de días en la ciudad. Recomendable 100%
Perfect location for exploring Barcelona. Everything was as expected and we got a very nice welcome, even though we arrived late in the evening.

The flat is not a personal air bb. It's just one of the flats in a building with plenty of air bbs. Hence it feels  a bit cold when you first go in. 

Not as quite as advertised. You can hear the air conditioning machines outside the bedroom window (which does not close very well). You can also hear the neighbors.  

Otherwise, nice, clean flat with everything you need for your stay. Close to nice restaurants and bars.

I enjoyed my stay here. It is close by taxi to the park and beach. Also to ramblas. The bed was very comfortable and check in was super easy. The only issue for me personally was the unreliability of the wifi which would disconnect continuously. I work online so it is needed. But if you are just here to enjoy the city and holiday it won't be any issue. I recommend this place.
Solid location, stylish apartment, and very comfortable bed.

This is a good place to stay for a small family of thee or four. Its  centrally located with lots of restaurants and supermarked nearby. Good communication, helpful and friendly host. We can recommend this place and would surely go back again. Thank you Vanessa and Daniel.
The place was great and clean and the host were very helpful.
The location of this apartment could not have been better. Close to the Metro and walking distance to many sites. Lots of good restaurants around. We highly recommend this place.
The place is very clean and comfortable. the location is perfect! great neighbourhood, close to the public transport.

We loved our stay at Vanesa and Daniel’s apartment. The hosts were not only very kind and pleasant at check in but always fast and flexible when responding to some of our individual needs. In specific, we liked that there were supermarkets and restaurants literally right across the street (including a gluten free cafe!).
great location, everything can be done on foot if you like walking around the city. very convenient. a little noisy at night.

I was checked-in by their friend Mark, who spoke fluent English and gave me some great local guidance for my visit.

The apartment is in a fantastic location, it's got 3 Metro stations a short walk away, for 3 different lines which makes it perfect for getting between Barcelona's sporadic sights. It's also got a lot of good places to eat within walking distance as well, from great value to fine dining.

The apartment itself is nice, it has a balcony overlooking the back of other apartment buildings but it gets sun and is a pleasant place to eat your lunch or take your morning coffee. The kitchen is well equipped for a short-stay and had a small welcome pack of kitchen essentials which was a nice touch. The apartment does have an air conditioner but it's quite high up the wall of a spacious apartment so its effects are not entirely noticeable. I got better cooling by leaving the french doors open for a while when there was a breeze. The bathroom is perfectly fine, the toilet is in an alcove and can be a tight space for someone of my height (6ft 4).

The bedroom is lovely, big and very comfortable bed (difficult to wake up in the morning!) and it has a window and blackout blinds which were very effective. The window is a great way to keep the bedroom cool at night.

This apartment was very centrally located in Eixample and was walking distance to many of the main attractions. It looks exactly like the pictures, and is a great value for the area. Vanesa was very helpful and allowed us to store our luggage in the apartment after check out.

This place was great! We were told we were near public transportation but we really never used it. We walked to Sagrada Familia, Barceloneta Beach, El Gothic...etc. The location was really ideal—there were great restaurants right across the street (our favorites are the Argentinian place and another place about two doors to its right...sorry, I forget the name but their seafood paella was amazing). 
The apartmrbt itself was clean and had everything we needed. Highly recommended!!

Vanesa and Daniel's place is really nice and can be highly recommended. The apartment is very well located in the city center, but also quiet at night. The balcony is perfect for a late breakfast or a drink after a city tour. The kitchen is well-equipped, and the apartment has everything you need :)
Comfortable, close to all that you need with some wonderful restaurants nearby.  This apartment delivered all that was promised.
Nice flat but too small for 3 people and a half hour walk / taxi to most places
Muy buena ubicación y servicios. Recomendable 100%
Good location, nice and clean space

Great location: 5 mins walking to the metro, bus stop around the corner. 
Lots of mini shops and nice little bars and restaurants just around the corner. Appartment is good for two people.

Fantastic location, very very cute apartment, and in the heat of summer in Barcelona, the AC was very appreciated. Beware that there is a late check-in fee after 9pm, as well as a tax on people staying, so we ended up paying about 60 euros additional on top of the original cost. Be aware also that walls are thin and sometimes the neighbors like to party into the wee hours of morning. The apartment seems newly renovated, and has high ceilings, very spacious, nice couch, good shower, etc. Los Platitos, right around the corner, has amazing tapas. Very much enjoyed the stay!
Nice clean appartment. Good communication with host. Recommended.
Wonderful location and sparkling clean!

The apartment is nice, comfortable, all as in the photo. Lived together with her daughter, if the company is more, you need to keep in mind that the door to the bathroom is made of frosted glass and does not lock. The apartments are conveniently located, a lot
  attractions in 15-30 minutes walk, to the beach 40 minutes on foot, near several supermarkets, cafes, metro. I liked everything, thank you.
Great apartment and location. We spent some great evenings in apartment when our kid was sleeping.

Appartement très très bien placé. Sombre. Rien pour cuisiner alors que c'était indiqué (pas de sel, huile, poivre). Appartement propre ! La taxe en arrivant TROP BIZARRE en espèces comme ça donner trop bizarre c'est pas un Hôtel quand même

Well-located in a quiet and safe neighbourhood, the apartment is a perfect spot for a Barcelona getaway. It is clean, modern and comfortable, and a short walk to the metro line and Sagrada Familia (and a slightly longer  (and enjoyable) walk to other landmarks).
Great spot in a great area! Close enough to walk to La Sagrada Familia and the beach in Barceloneta as well as La Rambla.
Vanesa and Daniel’s place is in a great location and you can walk to many attractions and great restaurants! The space is very clean and updated. Highly recommend!
Alojamiento recomendado 100%.
El departamento se encuentra muy bien ubicado y es muy moderno. Súper recomendable !

The check-in was easy, the apartment was clean. Good location, about 15 minutes walk from Las ramblas and Passeig de Gracia. We really enjoyed our stay with my girlfriend :) At times there was a little bit noise from the neighbours and from the hallway since the entry door/walls aren't very soundproof (nothing unusual though, we slept our nights fine). We can warmly recommend staying here.

Photos of the apartment are an accurate depiction of the place! Good location (walking distance to main attractions) with many surrounding restaurants. If you are a light sleeper, I would suggest ear plugs. The noise from the common stairwell can wake someone up; closing the bedroom door reduces most of the noise, but also blocks A/C circulation (for those staying in summer months). Comfortable bed. Overall - great value and a really nice sized space for two people. We were happy with our stay :).
Enjoyed the stay. Great central location. Easy to walk or metro to anywhere

Good place. Well located. Small but comfortable. Very clean. Not great for more than two. They let us in early which was great because we had all our luggage. Close to metro and a bunch of bars and restaurants.
Nice place
Sehr sauberes Apartment in toller Lage. Sehr gute Verkehrsanbindung.
Had a great stay at Vanesa and Daniel's place in Barcelona. Great location, clean space, and had everything we needed. Would stay again!
Nice place with good location :)
Netter Empfang und gute Kommunikation
Great bed and pilows, quite place and  great location, walking distance to main atraction. Thanks for pleasant stay.
Super appart très propre

Great apartment! Location is perfect to all main areas. High ceilings and balcony are nice touch.
Would stay again!

Vanessa and Daniels apartment was perfect for my 4 day trip to Barcelona. It was walking distance to all of the big shops, just a 5€ Uber to the night clubs, and there were super markets and restaurants just right across the street. The place is small, but perfect for 2-4 people who don’t mind sharing a tight space. The apartment was clean and super stylish. I felt like it was my own little home in Barcelona. We really enjoyed our time. Thanks Vanessa and Daniel!
Boa localização
Appartement bien situé.

Near to town easy to walk to most places.
Too small for more than 2 people.
Excelente apartamento, muy bien ubicado. Anfitriones muy amables
Nice tiny apartment, perfect location for exploring Barcelona!

The flat was in a great location and it was good value for money. Check-in was easy and clear. Only problem we had was the smell of sewer (presumably from outside), but there was an air freshner and it wasn't the owner's fault. Would be better for summer as it was a little cold too. All in all, it was great for a weekend getaway.

It is nice and clean, close to most of the places you’d like to visit.
Thanks Vanessa and Daniel!

Vanessa and Daniel's place was located in an area easily accessible to bus stops and subway stations. Vanessa was also very accommodating for our check in and had quick and open communication when we arrived in Barcelona to get us checked in to her AirBnB. The flat is very clean as they have cleaners who most definitely clean between each visitor and do a very thorough job. If you get cold easily, there is a space heater available as well.
Casa in centro a Barcellona comoda a tutti servizi fantastico

name: Cozy Private Room for one female
summary: Apartment has a single bed in  small private bedroom. Full access to shared kitchen/ bath. Towels and sheets included. Very clean and cozy and 30 sec. walk from subway. 2 bl. from Central Park
space: Cozy, friendly space available for one female. Private one bedroom.
description: Apartment has a single bed in  small private bedroom. Full access to shared kitchen/ bath. Towels and sheets included. Very clean and cozy and 30 sec. walk from subway. 2 bl. from Central Park Cozy, friendly space available for one female. Private one bedroom. Full bath and eat in kitchen with living area. I can be helpful with directions information about the city. The guest will enjoy a quiet and friendly space. This neighborhood is 2 blocks from Central Park and walking distance  to many world famous museums. Bus across the street and subway stop a 30 second walk from apartment I will only rent to one female due to the sharing arrangement. No extra guess.
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is 2 blocks from Central Park and walking distance  to many world famous museums.
notes: I will only rent to one female due to the sharing arrangement. No extra guess.
transit: Bus across the street and subway stop a 30 second walk from apartment
access: Full bath and eat in kitchen with living area.
interaction: I can be helpful with directions information about the city. The guest will enjoy a quiet and friendly space.
house_rules: I will rent only to mature and responsible individuals. No smoking.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hi,
I am a middle age woman living in NYC. I own a small
clothing that is separate from my apartment. I am friendly,
easy going and clean.

reviews.comments: Christine is a really Nice and anxious host and her apartment is central located and cozy !! Thank you very much for the great stay :)

Christine is very welcoming and relaxed. She was very flexible to accommodate me almost at the last minute. The apartment is quite small but cosy. It is set up in a way so that complete privacy is not possible, but that was not a problem for me. The neighborhood is also very interesting and convenient.
Christine's place is small and cozy. She was very accommodating to our schedules and unusual situation. The apartment is in a great location close to Central Park! I highly recommend. Joana
Really great location and sweet flat. Christine was lovely and I had a great time!
I had a really nice stay, the apartment was really nice decorated and the room was small but comfortable, and in a really central location. Christine is a lovely host, really helpful and friendly.

The apartment on airb&b is part of a business space.Christine did make a fruit salad for us. Advantages: it's really near line 6, 2mins on foot; also, the M 96, which bus can transfer you to the west of Central Park; disadvantages: the room for airb&b  is really small, and not exactly like the pictures on airb&b.

It was perfect! She is friendly, home clean, the room is exactly as picture, really small but for a woman traveling alone is very convenient, there is coffee, grocery, pharmacy super close. I would stay there again.
Very happy with the hostess of that period of time. She is a wonderful woman. Her house where the traffic is very convenient.
Christine is very welcoming and the place very cosy. The apartment is very clean and has a great location, near the subway station.
Christine was very welcoming and made me feel comfortable in her home.  The space is small as described, but fine for a light traveller.  Great location for the park and subway.
Convenient stay, but very cramped accommodation. Appreciated the late arrival check in.

We recently booked Christine's room for my mother who was visiting NYC for a weekend. Christine is very communicative and friendly. The feedback from my mother is that the room was small but comfortable, and that it had everything she needed for her weekend stay. No complaints.
Christine I would love to come back. You are great.
Great place to stay. I would definitely stay there next time when I visit NYC.

Chris is an exceptional host. Since the first time she replied all my messages immediately and helped me a lot with all my inquiries. At the time i arrived to NYC she was waiting for me at the apartment, which I must say it is a real cozy apartment, perfect for one single woman, everything was clean, organized and settled for me. The location of this apt is pretty convenient for my first stay at the city, the subway and bus were right there in the corner and the neighborhood it's beautiful and safe (even if you are walking after midnight). So! For my first airbnb experience, was perfect!!!
Il m'a accueillie chaleureusement et s'est montré très disponible.

Christine was a gracious and accommodating host. The apartment was very clean. The bed was soft and comfortable with plenty of pillows, clean sheets and blankets. There isn't really any space on either side of the bed - you kind of have to climb into it from this spot near the end. This didn't bother me. There are plenty of drawers and cubbies to hold your items while you're there. The kitchen is available to use, and the bathroom is perfectly adequate and very clean. Also the neighborhood is very safe and nice. The apartment is right next to a subway stop for easy access to whatever you're doing, and there is a lot of good food within walking distance. I'll definitely try to stay with Christine the next time I need to go to New York.

I stayed with Christine for a long time. She is very nice, funny and helpful. The house is little but clear and with all you need. The position is fantastic, near central park and the metro station (green). I love her and the house!!

Christine was a wonderful host. Very friendly, welcoming and helpful. The apartment is as described - cozy - but very well looked after and comfortable. The neighbourhood is safe and interesting. Location is great- close to shops, subway and Central Park. A great place to stay for a New York experience.
房东人热情､随和,提供了一些必需的东西｡房间是用家具做了一个分隔,房东会睡在客厅的沙发,公用厨房卫生间｡虽然很小很局促,但设施齐全,也很干净,考虑到曼哈顿的高房价,这个已经算性价比可以的了,比较适合一个人行李不多短期的旅行｡房间所处的地理位置极佳,离地铁6号线很近,到中央公园和博物馆步行可到,周围超市很多｡
Christine was a great host! She was very responsive when contacted and her place is exactly as described. Highly recommend it if you're simply looking fora place to crash in NY.

Christine est vraiment une super hôte qui vous met tout de suite à l'aise. Le logement était totalement conforme à la description. Son emplacement à deux pas de la ligne 6 du métro est un super atout. On y est vraiment en moins de 2 minutes. La literie était super confortable et j'avais un accès à la cuisine et à la salle de bain. C'est une petite perle dans Manhattan. Je recommande ce logement à toutes les filles de passage à New York qui veulent rester au cœur de cette magnifique ville qu'est NYC. Merci encore à Christine pour son accueil et sa gentillesse.
I enjoyed staying at Christine's. The whole flat is lovely and the bed located in a small but very cosy ankle of the room with a cupboard in front so that you feel a bit like in a nest

Christine is an awesome host. She is very nice, friendly and accommodative. My wife stayed there for a month and had nothing but great things to say about Christine. The place is cozy and fits in perfect for 1 person. Its just few steps from the subway station and is very safe. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.

Christine was a very welcoming and friendly host. The location was ideal for me, only a few steps from the subway and a few minutes walk from the Central Park. The apartment is cosy and the room is facing the back courtyard which is great for a light sleeper. All in all, a great stay!
Christine was an excellent hostess.   She made me feel right at home, and was so friendly and helpful.  The apartment location is super convenient, being near a subway stop, museums and stores.
Great host, great apartment, great location, great experience... Amazing on every level... Highly Recommend!!!
Le logement est assez bien situé et un métro se trouve dans le même «bloc», c'est donc très facile de se déplacer. Christine est une personne gentille et attentionnée. L'appartement est propre.
she is a really great host! 100% recommended! Makes you feel at home.

It was a delightful stay with an awesome lady!  The space is small, but it was totally comfortable.  Chris is so accommodating that you almost feel as though you are right at home upon arrival.  The apartment is so convenient to amenities and transportation!  Her store is really awesome too and I managed to pick up some cool gifts for my family...and myself!  Thank you Chris for your fine company and hospitality!
Christine is a great host, very nice and helpful ! I really appreciated my stay there. Even if the room is small, the appartement is very convenient and has everything you need.

The stay at Christine's was just what was needed. The bed in a cozy corner of the living room was sufficient. As this was a very last minute booking that was needed for only 7 hours--a night's rest and a shower--I was grateful that Christine accepted the request. She was helpful with directions and due to the late hour (10 pm) she retreated to bed.  At that point, it was like having the small apartment to oneself. Due to the summer heat, the fan in the window in front of the bed was a welcome addition. Overall, staying there was a pleasant experience, especially due to the artistic flair to the apartment and the privacy the short visit afforded.

This is really a sweet and lovely place!!! Every little things are so cute and the lights are beautiful!!! It's cozy, tidy and clean, just suitable for a woman. Besides, Chris is an amazing woman and she helped me a lot. I felt like I was at home even if I was in a different country alone. If you are a single woman in NYC, I would definitely recommend this place for you!!!
Space has a great location, right next to 6 train which gets you pretty much everywhere! Chris is very welcoming and easy going. Bed is soft and enough pillows! Good for a weekend trip!
The place was just as is shown in the pictures and just a block from central park. Very neat and tidy. Chris is a very welcoming person and was very flexible with checkin as well. Highly recommended.

Christine's place is as quaint as they come,  great location- subway was literally 1/2 block. Christine is nice and easy going, completely respects privacy, place was quiet inside, clean, good water pressure for the shower, bed was comfortable. highly recommend!

Chris is very considerate and nice host. She provided me with all necessities. Location of the apartment is excellent. However, I didn't expect that the room be this small, but I guess this is what you can get for that price in the center of Manhattan.

Flexible check-in and out. Really good location, the subway is like 2 minutes walk. Christine was really nice even made me coffee in the morning.:) 

Csak ajánlani tudom!!

Chris stayed up late to meet me as I arrived to the city. I only stayed for one night, and in that time she was very kind and accommodating. She even allowed me to leave my things in her living space while I interviewed the day of my departure. Thanks, Chris!
Lovely hostess, great location!, fabulous price for staying in NYC.

At a conference that started at 7am and ran until 7pm. I need a place near by. This was perfect. Christine was so nice and the spot was great felt like I was crashing with a friend. Strong internet connection is a plus too!

I had a wonderful experience in Christine's house, GREAT connectivity the subway is just a 30 sec walk. She was so flexible about check in and out and so nice and polite. The place is very clean and very cool decorations, the shower was great too. I would most definitely recommend this place and Christine for a cool and safe visit to NYC

Christine ha sido muy amable, en los dos días en los que me he alojado en su casa y he sentido que me ha apoyado en lo que he pedido, me informó sobre algunas cuestiones de la ciudad y me permitió dejar las maletas después de hacer el check out.
La casa es chiquitita, pero la verdad es que el espacio es suficiente. Es un departamento limpio y bonito.

Das kleine Apartment von Christine liegt total günstig, gleich neben der U-Bahn, Supermärkte sind in wenigen Minuten zu erreichen. Die kleine Wohnung liegt hinter ihrem Laden. Es ist alles zwar klein, das Bett befindet sich hinter einem hohen Regal, aber alles ist gemütlich und total ausreichend, da man ja ohnehin in der Stadt unterwegs sein möchte. Es ist alles da, was man braucht und Christine ist zuvorkommend und aufgeschlossen. Für einen kurzen Aufenthalt würde ich jederzeit wiederkommen. Danke für alles!

This was my first AIRBNB experience as well as my first time in NYC so I was quite nervous. Christine quickly put my worries at ease and made this experience amazing. She was very kind, offered helpful tourist tips and went above and beyond to accommodate my late check in and check out times!

 The bed is so comfy and I found the small space to be quite cozy like a little caccoon. The neighborhood was peaceful at night so no need for earplugs.

The location is perfect. There are lots of food options and small convenient stores close by. Her place is also 2 blocks away from Central Park and different museums.

I would highly recommend Christine to any female visiting NYC. This is a perfect place if you're an NYC Noob like myself. I will definitely book here again!
Christine's place was comfortable, clean, and cozy, as well as conveniently located near great restaurants and a subway stop. Christine was an excellent host, and I would stay here again!
Christine is a gracious hostess. I was very anxious about the whole AIRBB experience, but she made it easy and comfortable. I hope to stay there again in the future.
Great place for short term stay

Christine est une super hôtesse. Elle a été très accueillante et souple sur mes horaires d'arrivée / départ. 
C'est une chambre salon, le descriptif est conforme à l'annonce. Le logement est propre. Christine a dormi dans la pièce à côté qui est une boutique. 
La rue est calme. Dans l'appartement on peut entendre les bruits de passage des autres habitants de l'immeuble. Cela ne m'a pas empêché de dormir ceci dit! La localisation de l'appartement est très bien, très près du métro.

Christine is great and so accommodating!  I stayed with her over the summer and it was a great location and near so much.  When I needed a place to hang this time around, I made sure to look her up. Highly recommended!
Good place to stay for mount sinai interview!

I had an interview at Mount Sinai and I found Christine's apartment to be perfectly located about a 10 min walk from the hospital and 2min walk from the subway. Christine was very kind and accommodating.
Lovely and cozy place, very comfy bed, super convenient location (less than a block away from subway, walking distance to Mount Sinai). Christine is a great host. Would come back again!
Very good location. Walking distance to Central Park and Museums. Cosy room and Christine was very accommodating with all my needs. Will consider staying at her place again
I love to stay with Christine.  She is a great hostess and the location of the apartment is ideal.
Chris is very nice, she is really kind and welcoming towards her guests. The room is a little small but enough, and good value for money
I love staying with Chris!  Perfect location and hostess.
I always love staying with Chris!  Convenient location and comfy apartment.

Stayed here for a few nights while I was in the city for several events on the UES. The space was perfect for what I needed: quiet, adorable, and close to transit. Chris was very welcoming, and I especially appreciated how flexible she was around check in/out.

Christine place is close to everything, walking distance to Central Park, metro right on the corner and bus stop on the same block. Even though it's very centric, it's a quiet residential area, that becomes the perfect balance for traveling in the day and resting at night. The room and apartment are just like the pictures. Christine was very kind and flexible with the check in/out times.
Great location, cozy apartment, very kind and responsive host.
Ideal for a short stay.  Close to the subway station as well as Central Park.

Christine is very accommodating and the bed is comfortable! Small space, but very cozy and she makes sure you have plenty of privacy. Nice hot shower and good location close to the 6 train and Central Park.

Christine was a wonderful host. Felt comfortable getting to know her from the moment I walked in. And I elt it was mutual. A perfect safe place for a single female.  It's tight quarters, but I never felt either of us were in the way.  Her location is perfect for bus and subway to any where. And there some good food nearby. This was my first airbnb experience and I look forward to another one!

El departamento es tal como se anuncia. El espacio es pequeño y aún así muy confortable. Viajé sola y en plan turista, la ubicación es excelente para trasladarse por la ciudad. El lugar es muy limpio y Christine es una excelente anfitriona. Gracias Christine!

Chris is very nice and give good ideas when there are special events in New York (festivals...). Her appartment is a really great location: the subway is at the corner of the street, and the line 6 is direct to uptown and the main attractions in the city. The room is clean and confortable.
Such a nice apartment, cozy and comfortable. The location is super good, you can walk to Central Park, MET, Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum within 10min, Subway stations just near by.

I stayed here because it was walking distance for my interview for Mount Sinai. Quiet, safe and lovely apartment. Christine was flexible with my check-in time because of my unfortunate late flight and was very lovely! Cozy bed and I was able to maneuver around the bathroom. I'm so glad I found this place and thank you!
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The apartment is located near public transportation, restaurants, and shops. Chris is a great host.
Christine is a wonderful host. The place is very clean and location is very close to public transportation. Great value pick!

Location, value, convenience. If you're looking for a place to hang out at, then a) what are you doing in New York? and b) this isn't the place for you. It's exactly as described - cozy, small, and literally at the subway stop. It's a super small space, so if you're not comfortable with that, this also might not be the space for you. Christine was really nice and let me bring my luggage in before check in time, and it never felt awkward. This was my first shared airbnb experience, and it was super reassuring to know that there would only be me and her, and no male guests. Perfect for solo female travelers. Hot shower, towels, no frills, and excellent value. I would definitely come back.

Christine is a great host! She is super accommodating and quiet in the mornings (which is good because I'm a super light sleeper). The location of her place is great, too. I would definitely stay here again as Christine goes above and beyond for her guests.
It was superb!  Super clean in an awesome neighborhood. Would do it again.
Fabulous location, cozy room, warm wonderful hostess

Great location close to Central Park and Museum row.  Easy walk to midtown and the subway is just down the street. Very safe area with lots of restaurants and shops.  Christine is super nice and easygoing.  Great if you’re in NY for a few days.
Christine is very accommodating. Her place is tiny but very neat and clean! The bed is a bit small for me (I’m about 5 foot 4 of height) but it’s very soft and smell of clean laundry.

Great value! Warm bed! Nice host!

Near the park, but not near much else.

This was my first time using Airbnb and Christine made me very at home while I was at her place. She also worked with my schedule for check-in and check-out.  Location was great - close to Central Park and the 6 subway line. Her place was perfect for my short trip to New York.
Stayed for one night for an interview at Mt. Sinai. Great location. Easy check-in. Quick communication.

El alojamiento es tal como está anunciado, Christine es una gran anfitriona, atenta, limpia, respetuosa de la privacidad y flexible con el check-in/check out. También dio buenas recomendaciones. La ubicación es fenomenal, el lugar es cómodo y tranquilo, casi sin ruido. Recomendable si el plan es salir todo el día y después llegar a descansar.
Had a lovely time staying with Christine before my interview at Mt. Sinai. Even got some of my christmas shopping done :)
She is very hospitable.Location was great just minute from metro. Room was not so big but you have all amenities. Definitely will stay there on my next trip.
Christine is an excellent hostess. Your house is very cozy and very well located. Christine gave me good advice and I was very well received at her house.
This is a great location with a cute Starbucks on the corner. The little sleeping area is super cosy.
Like everyone else said, the place is tiny but incredibly cute and clean. Christine is also flexible with check in and out, that was very helpful. I totally recommend it!
Christine is an amazing host. She's thoughtful, kind, and responsive (and has amazing style). Had no complaints and will definitely be coming back!

The room/apartment is tiny, exactly as you can see in the pictures, but very clean and Christine is so nice. If you are looking for something close to the subway and Central Park, where you could go walking to the city is perfect for you. Around the apartment there are restaurants, deli's and markets where you can have dinner or buy foods for your stay.
The only problem was that my flight was cancelled till following day and I missed one night :(

Great place to stay only a short walk away from Central Park and close to the subway. This is definitely a *small* “room” like others have said, but I had a wonderful stay as I spent most days exploring the city anyway!

The place was right next to the D train and in a relatively quite part of NYC. It was cozy and warm space, with a comfortable bed. Christine is very helpful and made me feel a lot safer about travelling here alone. A great place if you just need a spot to touch down in during your stay in NYC.
Great location very close to subway, clean quite and comfortable room, will stay there again if I have chance visit NYC in future.
Christine is a great host! Super friendly and sweet. Although the place is small, I would still highly recommend for any solo travellers.

Christine's place was a great location to stay in Manhattan if you want to explore New York City. It was very close to Central Park and walking distance to several museums, and really easy access to the subway to get downtown. While there isn't much room for sitting and chilling inside the apartment, the pictures explain perfectly how much space you have to stay in, so I would suggest this place if you plan on being out and about during your stay. It was very clean. I would stay here again if I'm traveling solo to Manhattan!

The place is very close to the station and there are a store and Starbucks  nearby. The room was neat and clean, having cute furnitures. Plus, Christine is a wonderful lady. It was my pleasure to spend 2 nights with her. My flight going back home was canceled due to the terrible weather but she was very helpful in such situation. She definitely made my NY stay a great one :)

The apartment and bed space are both small, but for someone like me that was just looking for a place to sleep at the end of the day, it was perfect for the price and location. In addition, Christine was a great host - she was flexible with my check-in time and then I was able to come and go from the apartment as I pleased.
Very close to the subway, super cozy, and a nice market on the corner. Perfect for a quick overnight stay!
Cozy place. Wonderful hostess.

The space was very small but it was clean and welcoming. Good location. Christine was flexible with check-in and check-out times and she is very friendly. I would definitely stay at hers again if I ever come back to New York.
Super flexible check-in and check-out times. Thanks so much, Chris!!
I really enjoyed my stay at Christine's place. It was small but clean and situated in a nice location. Christine was a lovely hostess.

I booked this last-minute, and it turned out to be a great choice! Christine’s apartment is in a fantastic location, walking distance to the Guggenheim and the Met.  It’s a little small but it feels very cozy and comfortable.  In addition, it is very quiet at night - I had no troubling falling asleep and staying asleep.  

Overall, I highly recommend this Airbnb for its location and price!

Very convenient location. Great for a short stay. 

Thanks Christine.
This is a perfect spot! Adjacent to everything and Christine is an amazing hostess :-) Could not ask for a better spot! I will be back!
Bien situé, cet appartiennent est parfait pour pouvoir aller facilement  visiter les meilleurs lieu de la ville de New York.
The place is comfortable and convenient to museums, shopping places. Christine is a friendly and welcoming host. I had a good rest and enjoyed NYC.
Chris is everything you want in a host--responsive, helpful, flexible.  It was a short visit but worth it.
Apartment was situated perfectly to get around the city - close to the subway, close to museums, close to restaurants.  Small apartment, but certainly has everything you need.

El espacio es como lo publicado. Christine es una excelente anfitriona. Excelente ubicación con dos líneas de subway cercanas. Para un par de noches si el plan es salir todo el día y volver a descansar.
Christine is a gracious and hospitable host. Her apartment is conveniently located in a neighborhood that feels quite safe. Cozy and comfortable accommodations.

I didn’t spend a tremendous amount of time in the room, but the time I did spend was pleasant and perfectly comfortable. Christine is a wonderful, responsive host, and her place is perfectly situated right beside the subway. Most importantly for me, the bed was incredibly comfortable, which was much appreciated after a full day of walking. The comfy bed and ideal locale would incline me to stay here again!
Perfect location, totally cozy nights sleep in a very cool place. Would recommend to anyone

Christine's apartment is conveniently located just steps from one subway station, and only a couple blocks from another. The Park and the Museum Mile are also an easy walk from her door. Lots of good restaurants within a few block radius, and plenty more just a short train ride away. Christine was very accommodating and quick to respond and  work out a check in that accommodated my schedule.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The place is just as expected! Clean, cute, and in an amazing location. Would definitely stay again
Lovely room, great location, and comfy bed!
All as expected. Raccomended for solo traveling.

Christine is a nice considerate host and was flexible with check in as I was very exhausted after 26 hour long haul arriving early am. The place is a very tight fit like many NYC’s apartments,but in a good location and ground floor which was good for me with issues with stairs. I didn’t have a lot of time there, just a place to sleep, so fine and good value for the budget traveller. I felt very safe & secure. The area is close to numerous subways Central Park. I would guess the limited space would be an issue for some however.
More of a private nook than a private room.

Quarters are tight but the place is very clean, the bed was comfortable, and I felt safe.  I got in later than I expected and had to wake Christine up to be let into the building.  Very hospitable - clean, cozy apartment - I'd recommend if you will be out and about most of the day and need an affordable place to sleep.

Christine is a very nice host! Flexible with check in. Very nice area, close to Central Park and the subway.
I was able to leave my bags at her apartment, because I had a late flight.

I would recommend this spot to anyone who wants easy access to musuem mile and Central Park (it's about a fifteen/twenty minute walk) in a quiet and beautiful neighborhood. Chris was friendly and the little sleeping nook is cute and comfy.
Lovely place. Great for quick work trips to the city and in an ideal location with everything around that you need.

Chris's AirBNB was as cozy as it comes.  Also, the convenience to amenities and the subway can't be beat.  Chris made me feel very, very welcome, one New Yorker to another.  While I didn't need to ask many questions, I know that Chris would be very accommodating no matter what the guest's needs.  Highly recommended!  Loren

I had a great stay at Christine’s. The apartment is very close to the metro and the space itself is very clean and stylish. She was very welcoming and accommodating despite my late check-in. Thanks again for a great stay!
Christine is nice and kind. Her house is clean and stylish. There are some beautiful paintings on the wall. I could spend good time in NYC.

Small but perfect if you are looking for a bed to crash in and an affordable price! Christine was very accommodating, gave some great recommendations, and I couldn’t have picked a better experience for my brief one night stay!

Chris is a wonderful host. Her place is connected to her store, which she sleeps in when you are at her place if she's there to give you the most privacy. Cozy bed and bathroom were very clean. All in all a great place to crash for the night during interview season!

Perfect location & a perfect host!
Chris’s place worked out great for my needs and I’d love to stay again next time I’m in NYC. She’s funny, smart and an overall great person I’m happy to be acquainted with!
Clean and cozy. She's a great host!

Christine’s place has very good location: super close to the metro station and supermarket, the Central park is in walking distance.

It is a backyard of her nice store, so guests might have some privacy during the night.

I think it is perfect for the single traveler.

All as expected. Lovely host, comfy bed, clean and great location.
Thank you Chris.
最寄り駅から2分くらいでとてもいいﾛｹｰｼｮﾝで､ﾆｭｰﾖｰｸの雰囲気が出ているとても素敵な空間でした｡
Great located just 1 minute walk away from the next subway station. It takes around 20 min. to get to Lower Manhattan. Chris is very welcoming and considerated of her guests.

This is a perfect location, on a block where the host knows everyone. Two blocks from the park, 50 feet away from the 6 train that gets you anywhere in Manhattan. Healthy, affordable food at corner markets. This is a small clean space, perfect for sleeping, and the host assures you have privacy.

Chris’s place is exactly as described but the location is amazing. You are steps away from the 6 which connects you to Midtown, Bronx, Grand Central, WTC, and other subway stops. A delicious pizza place is two steps away ($4 for a slice and soda) along with two grocery locations on either side of the block. I had no fear walking around the neighborhood at night while on the phone- I went towards Park Ave and down towards the 80s. 

Chris is an awesome host. Very accommodating and great for recommendations on points of interests. I stayed for 6 nights and she gave great suggestions including what to get at the grocery for my developing cold and what to do in Chelsea. When I’m back in town, I will definitely check her availability.
Es pequeño, limpio, muy bien ubicado, buen precio, justo lo que necesitas para llegar a dormir
Christine was a thoughtful and accommodating host. Cozy place to sleep, quiet neighborhood, right next to subway station.
Christine was a thoughtful host and her place is super close to the subway station. It’s a quiet, comfy place to sleep.
Neat place, convenient and close to uptown subway and Central Park.

This place was exactly what I needed. It is a cozy little place that is conveniently located for people visiting Mount Sinai for interviews. The place is clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay again!
Just as the photos! Small but cozy apartment and Christine really respectful and sweet. Good if you are planning to be out all day and just go to sleep. Lovely bed!
Cozy, small space, but comfortable and close enough to everything in Manhatten.  Hostess is very accommodating and helpful.  I enjoyed my stay and will choose this place again in the future.

Christine é uma anfitriã sem igual. Como o espaço é pequeno, ela sempre perguntava se podia ligar a tv, ou aumentar o volume, para não incomodar, o que achei muito respeitoso.  Ela dormia na loja, que fica na área da frente do apto, de modo que eu ficava sozinha, proporcionando privacidade total, eu quase nem a via. Como minha primeira experiência em apto compartilhado, só posso dizer que foi excelente, acima das expectativas. O espaço é realmente bem pequeno, mas limpo e acolhedor. Checkin e checkout em horários facilitados. Metro, mercado e starbucks na esquina,  a meia quadra do apto. Recomendo sem ressalvas e agradeço à Christine por tudo.

The apartment and its history are very cool and a super convenient subway stop (I can't remember which one, but it goes everywhere) is right on the corner. The space is tight but comfy and Christine is very nice!
Great location.

Great location - 3 min to the subway and walking distance to Guggenheim, etc or central park. The space is very cute and small, great for a short stay. Christine sleeps in the other room so there's privacy for the guest. The space is very cute & comfy. Thank you!

This was a perfect spot for what I needed on this trip - a comfy, safe, convenient place to sleep and gather myself while exploring the city.  The space is small, yes, but cozy, warm, and comfortable, and I would definitely come back and stay here again on my next solo NYC adventure.
Nice place
Christine très sympa. Appartement bien situé.

It was very good location and convenience place!
And her house was very clean and cute. I stayed there only one night, but I had a good time.
She is very kind person. I recommend you this place .
Comfortable bed, cozy small apartment. Ideal for short stays. Christine was welcoming and gave me tips on places to visit. The place is rather small but cozy, thus recommended for short stays.

Christine is a charming host!  Appreciated the clean and very comfortable bed after a long day in the city.  Very convenient location- a block from the 6 train, Starbucks, restaurants and grocery.  Recommended!
Christine is welcoming and the apartment is exactly as described. Great option to see NYC on a budget!
Great, super convenient place to stay! Christine was a great host
My flight got delayed due to weather and Christine was flexible and accommodating with my check-in time. Bed was comfortable and apartment was clean. I highly recommend staying with Christine!
Very small space in the back of the host's clothing store, but perfect for a short one night stay. Great location just steps from the subway. Christine was a very sweet and welcoming host!

The room was very small with little space to move around or store luggage, but it was fine for a brief stay for one person. Christine was very accommodating and nice, especially when my train was delayed and I didn't get in until almost 11 PM at night!
Tidy. Responsiveness. Simplicity.
Nice cozy place in NYC

name: Cozy one-bedroom in E Village
summary: Come and stay at my comfortable 1-bedroom in the heart of the East Village, New York's best neighborhood. Steps from the best bars, restaurants and 2 subway stops.
space: This is a convenient, comfy gem of an apartment situated in the heart of the East Village, between Union Square and Tompkins Square Park. You have a comfortable and newly furnished living room, a fully equipped kitchen, plus a very comfortable bedroom. More than that, you can lie in bed and see the Empire State Building from the window!
description: Come and stay at my comfortable 1-bedroom in the heart of the East Village, New York's best neighborhood. Steps from the best bars, restaurants and 2 subway stops. This is a convenient, comfy gem of an apartment situated in the heart of the East Village, between Union Square and Tompkins Square Park. You have a comfortable and newly furnished living room, a fully equipped kitchen, plus a very comfortable bedroom. More than that, you can lie in bed and see the Empire State Building from the window! The whole apartment. Some of the world's richest pickings of bars, restaurants and music venues are in the 5-6 blocks around the apartment. Food and drink in the East Village is better than the West Village and about 60% of the cost. This is the best part of the city to base yourself for a week or weekend's exploring. Super-quick transport links to pretty much anywhere in Manhattan. A short walk from Union Square subway (which takes you straight up to Central Park or down to Wall Street), and
neighborhood_overview: Some of the world's richest pickings of bars, restaurants and music venues are in the 5-6 blocks around the apartment. Food and drink in the East Village is better than the West Village and about 60% of the cost. This is the best part of the city to base yourself for a week or weekend's exploring. Super-quick transport links to pretty much anywhere in Manhattan.
notes: The apartment is in a traditional pre-war building, located on the fourth floor. There's no elevator, so be prepared for some stairs. But in return you get the most atmospheric and genuine part of the city, steeped in Greenwich Village history.
transit: A short walk from Union Square subway (which takes you straight up to Central Park or down to Wall Street), and a few steps from 1st Avenue (a 4-minute ride away from central Williamsburg).
access: The whole apartment.
house_rules: It's a New York walk-up apartment so be prepared to climb some stairs! I have nice kind neighbors, so please be respectful of them by not having parties or loud gatherings.

host.host_location: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
host.host_about:
I'm originally from Kent, in the southeast of England, and have been living abroad for 6 years now - including in New York and most recently the great city of Washington DC!

I'm in my mid-30s and work in international development. AirBnB has been part of my life for some time now, and I am looking forward to hosting some wonderful people at my new house.

I take pride in providing you with a great environment for your stay, and sharing some local info at the same time.

reviews.comments: Our weekend stay and the location at Nick's place was just right for us. Will recommend to anyone. Thanks Nick.

I had the pleasure of staying at Nicks place for an entire month and it was amazing. Great location, in the heart of the east village, great food, bars,stores all around. I have lived in NY previously so i know what im talking about. The apartment is just as described and as it looks in the pictures. Its cozy and really cute, with enough space for your stuff. The rooftop is a plus and you have awesome views of Brooklyn bridge, Empire state etc. Nick was super quick to respond to any questions and was super friendly. Definitely recommend staying here!

My friend and I really enjoyed staying at Nick's place. Location in EV was great. Picking up the key and getting into the apt was a piece of cake with zero complications. Nick was easy to get in touch with and very accommodating to my flight schedule. He's super friendly and ready to offer recommendations and suggestions if needed. The apartment was clean and very comfortable.  I took the bedroom, and my friend stayed in the living area. There was a blow-up mattress available to us, but she decided to just sleep on the couch and was happy there. The rooftop view was super cool!!  Would definitely stay here again.

Le quartier est très sympathique et assez central pour visiter un maximum Manathan. 
Nick nous a fourni tous les conseils nécessaires pour trouver facilement l'appartement à notre arrivée et nous a aussi donné de bonnes adresses de restaurants ! 
L'appartement étant proche d'Union Square, cela nous a facilité les transports (carte de métro illimité sur 7 jours très pratique !)
Merci à Nick pour son accueil.

Nick's apartment is great, with an actual living room, a kitchen and a bedroom. Everything was clean and Nick also left me some fruits as a welcoming gift.
