He was very responsive whenever I tried to contact him and gave me good suggestions about the neighbourhood (restaurants, bars, music and activities). Overall, a great experience!

Regarding the location, it is very close to the subway and few minutes away from Tompkins Square Park, one of my favourite spots in East Village. The flat is also very close to many restaurants of any cuisine flavour. 

Great experience and highly recommend!

Nick has a lovely flat. Really good location - loads of restaurants, bars, good shops around, and very close to a subway line. The flat is very cool and is made even better by the roof area that is great to sit out on on a warm summer's afternoon. The flat is also very quiet, which is lovely (and quite rare in Manhattan!)

Nick himself was incredibly friendly, and brilliant at keeping me informed. I would recommend this cool flat to anyone

4 étages sans ascenseur pourraient faire peur à plus d'une personne mais c'est un bon exercice ! ;)
Et au final comme nous sommes venues pour visiter NY nous avons passé peu de temps dans l'appart et ne montions les escaliers qu'1 ou 2 fois par jour.
Il y a plein de resto et vendeurs de rue sympa à proximité et le métro est vraiment à côté.
Cerise sur le gâteau, la vue sur le toit est absolument magnifique !!!
Je recommande les yeux fermés

Nick's place is in a great location and reasonably priced. I stay in New York for a week every January, and always have to balance cost, location, and quality. This was my best stay so far - the apartment was warm, the communication with Nick was easy, and the check-in and check-out processes were seamless. I'd definitely stay at his place again.

Le logement de Nick est très central et parfait pour visiter New York. Nous le conseillons très fortement. Nick est réactif et de bons conseils. Cerise sur le gâteau, nous avons pu profiter de la vue du toit-terrasse de l'immeuble.
Nick has a nice little appartement well furnished and with a great view of New York. The metro is just 5 min by walking and Nick is always in touch with you if you need advices or anything.

Nick’s place in the East Village is conveniently located near anything you need in the city: subway stations, parks, food, night life. While there were a few hiccups during our stay, Nick did his best to help us through situations, which we did ultimately appreciate.

Nick was also very receptive to feedback on improving the place for future guests, and I sincerely believe he will do his best to make the experience even better.

A great apartment in an ideal location with access to everything you could need. Only a couple of minutes walk from the subway and close to many restaurants and shops. Nicks apartment is welcoming and comfortable, like a home from home, full of interesting books and the air-con was a definite bonus. Couldn't have been better for our stay in the city.

Nicks apartment in East Village is a little diamond, full of character....this little hidden gem made my stay in NYC with my dad the most amazing and authentic experience....from the minute we landed, Nick was on hand...key collection from the shop around the block was a breeze...although there are a few flights of stairs to climb to get to the apartment, it didn’t bother us and my dad is 74! We both felt at home instantly......then nick told us about the roof!!!!! Breathtaking! No need for TOTR...you can see uptown, downtown and Manhattan bridge, stunning views...the area is amazing also, it’s east village, can’t go wrong really! We even made friends with the food wagon guys outside on corner(of 11th)  1st Avenue subway is 5 minutes walk away, if even! And if that is out of service(L (Website hidden by Airbnb) doesn’t run on weekends!)  Union square is only 10/15 minutes walk away...(bustle brilliant station)connections on subway are great  if you stay here you are truly honestly in an amazing spot 
I had never been to NY before and was worried  going with my 74 old dad but Nicks place really was a blessing...we wanted authentic and we got that with love, music, plants and just general comfort ❤️ 
Nick, Nick himself, he couldn’t have been more accommodating, very considerate, genuine guy ❤️  he texted me local places to go, made sure we had settled in, not pushy, just perfect...incredibly accommodating...had a beer in the fridge and was just an A Class Host....thank you Nick....I will be back xx 
Anyone thinking of staying here, think no more....book and enjoy the true beauty of New York

We had a great time in New York at Nick's place. Perfectly situated to explore the city. Cozy apartment, where we could relax after long days of sightseeing. Nick was very helpful and a great host. Would recommend.

We had a wonderful time!
Thank you for everything!

name: Very central place-small room for 1
summary: My flat is very centrally located (in Sisli) and accessable from anywhere in town. One very small room with a single bed and wardrobe is ideal for a student.
space: About Sisli, the neighbourhood: - Located on the European side of the city, central Sisli (where I live) is full of residences in the back alleys, and shops and eateries on the main streets Abide-I Hürriyet and Halaskargazi.  - I was working as a journalist for Food and Travel and TimeOut Istanbul magazines before, therefore I can easily recommend you best spots in the city written or verbally.  - 5 minutes of walking distance to the Metro station (Sisli on Line M2). By making connections at metro; you can go to Hagia Sofia, Sultanahmet area approximately in 25mins. - 10-15 mins of bus ride to the Taksim Square. By metro, it takes about 10mins. About your room and the apartment in general: - 1 small bedroom with a single bed that overlooks the well. - There is no air conditioning in the apartment but if you feel too hot during summer, I have a little fan.  - The apartment is well-heated during winter. - Hi-speed wireless Internet is available.  - I have a satellite TV in the living roo
description: My flat is very centrally located (in Sisli) and accessable from anywhere in town. One very small room with a single bed and wardrobe is ideal for a student. About Sisli, the neighbourhood: - Located on the European side of the city, central Sisli (where I live) is full of residences in the back alleys, and shops and eateries on the main streets Abide-I Hürriyet and Halaskargazi.  - I was working as a journalist for Food and Travel and TimeOut Istanbul magazines before, therefore I can easily recommend you best spots in the city written or verbally.  - 5 minutes of walking distance to the Metro station (Sisli on Line M2). By making connections at metro; you can go to Hagia Sofia, Sultanahmet area approximately in 25mins. - 10-15 mins of bus ride to the Taksim Square. By metro, it takes about 10mins. About your room and the apartment in general: - 1 small bedroom with a single bed that overlooks the well. - There is no air conditioning in the apartment but if you feel too hot during sum
neighborhood_overview: The neighrbourhood is known to be very central and accessable by almost everywhere in Istanbul.
notes: I still have not uploaded the picture of the room so please don't take it as I'm renting the big room in the pics out.
house_rules: The walls are not sundproof, so being careful about making noise would help.

host.host_about:
For people who meet me for the first time, I usually look cold and cocky. Actually I consider myself quite fun and caring most of the time but you have to get to know me a little until you see these features:)
I also think that I respect other people's personal space and need of privacy, which are the basic elements in personal relationships.
I have travelled to a few countries so far and my favorite destination was Hamburg. It's such a dynamic and alive city. I could actually live there:)

reviews.comments: Great place. Couldn't have been better. The apt is situated in residential area which gives you piece and quite time at night, at the same time it takes two subway stops to get to the razzle dazzle of the city. Biray was very nice and helpful at all times. Clean and charming place to be at one of the busiest cities in the world. I would highly recommend the place without any hesitations.

Biray has been the key to this wonderful trip in Istanbul. First of all the place was very clean and comfy, great location which is only two station away from central but you can get a sense where the local lives. The price is a bargain. She is the most warm and helpful host ever. Gives great advices and insights of the city. Because of her we fell in love with Istanbul and will definitely go back again. Thank you Biray! xx

The room was spacious and with lots of light. The bed was confortable and the room has enough place to put your travel belongins The appartment is not far from Istambul main turistic attractions but at the same time located in a quiet neighborhood. Biray was very helpful and gave us good advices about places to go in Istambul and around. We had a great time!

Biray was on holiday while I was at her home, but she was kind enough to let me stay anyway. Her flat is sunny and spacious and her cat is absolutely darling. Everything is in good working order as far as kitchen and bathroom go. Her home is close to Sisli metro and also within walking distance of the Mecidiyekoy metrobus, which is very convenient if you want to bypass the crowds in Taksim and Sultanahmet. The main road has lots of little cafes with a variety of dishes to choose from, and Istanbul Cevahir shopping mall is right across from the metro station. The neighborhood does close up in the late evening, so be alert if you're walking alone at night (which is applicable to most places in Turkey). Excellent location, generous hostess.

We had a great stay in istanbul, it was a very clean and spacious room. The apartement is very central located and the metro-station can be reached very quickly. Biray is very nice & lovely and made us try to help with any questions about istanbul. :)

Biray's place was nice, and so was Biray and her cat. It would have been cool to stay longer, as 6 days went by so fast - Biray was able to meet and hangout after work a couple times, and share her knowledge on Istanbul's cuisine.

I stayed at Biray's apartment for four nights while she was on vacation. Her cat is very friendly, and the building itself is located in a wonderful neighborhood, within easy walking distance of a metro station. The room is full of natural light and the bed is very comfortable. Biray was easy to contact, even while she was away. In short, I had a great time.

Biray est une hôte très sympathique et disponible, elle connait de bonnes adresses afin de rendre le séjour encore plus agréable. Zeitin la chatte est très marrant et très câlin. L'endroit est bien placé, calme et permet d'accéder rapidement aux endroits stratégiques et touristiques. Je recommande cette adresse pour toutes ces raisons.

Great Host!
Biray Anil helped us a lot when needed, she introduced us to her friends for other advice and to get to know istanbul better. 
The appartement is spacious and the room is comfortable. The flat is well located, nice neighbourhood, everything you need is around the corner, easy to go to other places of interest, and just 5 min walk from the biggest shopping mall!!

The honest proportion price and quality! 
though we saw each other just a few times, Biray was very nice and ready to help. She also has a lovely cat which likes to be petted)
The room is really spacious and good located. 
I'd like to stay there again when I'm coming to Istanbul next time.
We had a great time in Istanbul. Biray is highly recommended!

Biray was such a sweet host. My boyfriend and I rented her room for one week, and had an awesome time. She has a very loving cat, a lovely room with lots of space, and a laid back attitude that makes you feel at home in her home. We enjoyed some good conversations with her, as she is very intelligent, and were also still able to enjoy a lot of time alone. Her apartment is the perfect size for renting, the location was great, and I would definitely recommend this space to anyone travelling to Istanbul.

Biray's place is very cozy and perfectly located if you want to experience some true Istanbul everyday life, not only tourist smash hits. It is not in the very center, which is great to avoid noice and millions of tourists, but again very close to Taxim (2 metro stops, around 30 min. walk) and full of local shops, restaurants and all you might need. Biray and Zeytin (her cat) were great hosts, friendly, helpful and warm, and we are very much recommending their place for having a lovely time in this lovely city.

Tatjana & Bosko

My wife and I stayed in Anil's apartment for five nights. She always helped us with the transport choice to get to a particular place in Istanbul. She also advised us which restaurants and cafes are worth a visit. There is a comfortable double bed in the room. The building is located about 700 meters from the subway station Şişli (two subway stops from Taksim Square). There is a large shopping center near the metro station. On the way to the apartment you can find a lot of cafes, pastry shops, as well as several small supermarkets.
The reservation was canceled 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Biray was a most accommodating host. We were able to check in in the afternoon (she came home during her lunch hour to pass us the keys!) and she allowed us to use her laptop when we had problems booking air tickets on our mobile phones. The room was clean and tidy (the rest of the house less so) and the location of the apartment is great, close to many eateries and supermarkets. You could walk to Taksim too in 20-30 minutes.

Our week long stay at Biray's apartment was absolutely fantastic. Biray is a really friendly, kind and intelligent girl with a great taste in movies and literature. We had amazing conversations with her and we felt right at home from the start. Biray was away most of the time, but always really quick to respond; as a result, we had the whole apartment to ourselves, which worked out great for us since as we had to work from home during the day. The personable Zeytin, Biray's cat, was an additional bonus to keep us company, as well as her cousin who stayed over on occasion too. The apartment was in a perfect neighborhood, with lots of local shops  with fresh produce and food options nearby. The taxim square and Istiklal Cadessi were only a 25min walk away. A friendly host, great location and certainly a memorable stay.

It was our first time that we used Airbnb and it was really good experience.
the neighborhood, the apartment and the host were Great!
Perfect location with good public tranportation to everywhere in the city and you can get everithing you might need around.
Biray is  a lovely and intresting person. We had good time together. She was intresting and fun to talk to and she also had great tips of istanbul to share.
Highly recomended!!!
Very comfortable and modern flat, very friendly and pleasant Biray Anil !!)) hope we' ll stay there again, if we visit Istanbul !

We had a great time in Istanbul, Biray is very cool and worm host. The flat is located in Sisli which is very convenient to travel anywhere in Istanbul. Neighbourhood is super nice and everyone is friendly. Room is big with very comfy bed and super sweet cat hanging around. We felt at the place very comfortable and relaxed. If we come back to Istanbul we definitely stay at Biray's
Biray is good host. She was so kind and her cat was pretty. It was so easy to arrive her place. It is very good location for sight seeing! Thank you so much, Biray! See you again!!

We could not feel more comfortable and quiet. Biray is very attentive and helpful, she cooked for us and also made us coffee, the cat is very cute. The room is very central and is easy to get to anywhere. Our stay was wonderful, thanks Biray for all and please don't forget where we come from ;)

I will start my review with the wise Turkish people's saying: Cevahir is Istanbul, Istanbul is Cevahir! The thing that Biray didn't emphasize enough is that her neighbour is only the best shopping-entartainment mall in the entire world - Cevahir! :D
On a side note, there really isn't anything that a guest could complain about while staying at Biray's residence. The location is perfect, since it's also 5-10 minutes on foot to metro, that gets you to Taksim in just 2 stops. The room is nice, and so is the toalet, kitchen, and the balcony. Only bit of an issue can be a WiFi which reaches to around the door of the room. Regarding the hosts, Biray and her cat were very considerate and polite. We didn't get much of a chance to get to know Biray very well, but she certainly is a professional host and always ready to give you useful advices and insights of her city. Overall, for the price we payed, this place is a true bargain.

We was at Biray's home for 2 week and it was perfect! Great host, great location, lovely cat! It's in the center of the Istanbul and you have everything you need - shops, fish markets, mall, places to eat, metro and bus stations. Apartment is worm and cozy, fully equipped kitchen, WiFi. Biray is very friendly and she respect your own space. She is very clever and nice girl - glad to meet her!
I highly recommend it!

We had a very great stay at Biray's place. We found the apartments location close to a metro line to make all areas we wanted to see very easy to reach. The room was comfortable and her cat made it even more cozy. Most of all, Biray was an exceptionally kind host by helping us out with some flight scheduling issues we encountered, by calling the airline in turkish, for example. We also very much appreciated the tips she gave us about what to see in the city. Staying there made Istanbul a great trip, thanks again Biray! :) 

Gerco and Lily

My boyfriend and I stayed with Biray for a week during New Years and we had a blast! Biray's apartment is located in the European area of Istanbul and there is both a Carrefour and a Migros grocery store close by along with various other shops, so it is certainly convenient. Biray gave us great suggestions for restaurants to try in the area as well as where to go to celebrate NYE. Her cat is adorable as well!

I'm really glad we had opportunity to stay at Biray's home. We've got a lot of advises, what to see or eat, we had nice chat about Istanbul culture and people. Room was very spacious, clean and cosy. Location is very good, close to touristic attractions and public transport. Thank you Biray!
Biray was a good host. She showed us nice places to have lunch and recommended good food. The room is nice and comfy and the location is great. Cute and friendly cat!

I with my friend spent nine wonderful days visiting Biray. After almost 20 hour of traveling we arrived in cozy flat where was all set for comfortable rest. Every evening after our walks we met with gentle black girl (cat) Zeytin.
There is bus stop, metro and metrobus near home, you can reach almost any place in town, include Old city. Nearby is a lot of different shops where you can buy anything, from food to whatever you fantasy can imagine. One of unexpected pleasant thing for us was Cevahir AVM (biggest shopping mall of Europe) which is nearby too.
Our host, Biray, is charming, graceful girl with intresting look at things. She is great companion, we can just listen for her fascinating speech. Thank to Biray for a warm welcome, Kadıköy tour, wonderful evening with wine, and for essential gift. Special thanks for helped us to get acquainted with the magnificent city Istambul.
See you again!
Nothing to complain about. Everything as described. Nice contact. Valuable hints.
Very nice and clean room (as well as rest of the apartment) with a very friendly and welcoming host. Hey, what more can you wish for? :) Thank you very much, Biray!

Hi Biray! Sorry for delay feedback ;) I would like to say thank You and your funny, active cat! We had only one night to talk, however I understand that you are a good person. It was easy to talk with you. Thanks for SMS support during all my trip!
About apartments - everything as described on the picture

P.S. Biray speaks English very well:)

Birary was a fantasic host who was great with communication from the beginning, providing directions to her place easily in English and Turkish. She also provided valuable insight into local and distant attractions and transport options.

Her place was comfortable and spacious and we felt very welcomed. Her cat (Zeytin) is very friendly, often coming up for pats and rubs. The room is soundproof and Sisli has everything you need; food, shops, etc. The people in Sisli are also warm and receptive of people who can't speak English.

Transport is close and runs frequently to get you into Old Town.

The experience was fantastic overall and cannot be recommended more highly.

Staying with Biray was an excellent experience. She is a really nice and helpful person, full of great advices. With her, we felt like living with a close friend. We went to have breakfast, shared stories and talk a lot about everything. Her house and the room is really nice, modern, big and with lots of light. The neighbourhood is perfect, near the metro and bus stations, lots of shops, markets, bakeries, cafes, restaurants, etc. I definetely recommend staying with Biray, for me, an excellent place to get to know Istanbul!

Bonjour Biray,
On te remercie, Ramzi et moi, du fond du cœur pour ta gentillesse et ta disponibilité. Tu nous as beaucoup aidés pour découvrir la ville d’Istanbul.
La chambre était lumineuse et bien aérée, on se sentait chez nous et en bonne compagnie. L’appartement est bien situé et le quartier est très calme.
Merci encore et à la prochaine.

It was perfect to stay at Biray place. Everything was well prepared, comfortable and we felt like at home. She is great host which offer you the best and is very helpful. Flat is very well located in great district where you can find really everything. Big plus is here cool and friendly cat which we really lovec.

The room is clean, nice and comfortable.  Biray is a good host - friendly, full of recommendations and kind.  Her cat is very cute and friendly.  Lastly, the area is great -- very local with no tourists -- lots of great places to eat and explore, and well connected to transport (5-10 minute walk to the metro).

My friend & I had a great experience staying with Biray! She is extremely friendly, welcoming, and helpful. Her apartment is really nice, clean, and in a GREAT location. I would highly recommend staying here!

We loved our stay at Biray's! Very well located for our needs and very affordable. Biray was a lovely host that made us feel welcomed and very comfortable, just like we were visiting a friend. Her cat is the most amazing roommate we could ask for and we were very happy with her company.
The house was as messy as a friend's house which made it feel more homy, the room was clean and very comfortable and the internet worked perfectly.
I would recommend it and return, for sure!

We had booked the Biray Anil place for 6 night stay. The choice was made initially as it was an excellent location very near to the to Taksim .The room was very clean & comfortable The kitchen had all necessary items .Durring our stay Biray was out of town so we could not spend time with her The place is very well connected through local transport - bus stop metro  is a in 10 minute walk.it is a great value for money and an excellent choice.

Biray is a very helpful and hospitable person. The apartment looks exactly as it is on the photos. The location is perfect! Central district with lots of shops, and the biggest shopping mall in Europe is also near. It was nice and comfortable to stay in this apartment!
The host canceled this reservation 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Cosy house with balcony view
summary: Its a modern designed house with a bosporus view from a balcony.
description: Its a modern designed house with a bosporus view from a balcony.

host.host_about: I'm a positive person who likes to travel and listening music a lot.

name: Design Loft in Pera 1
summary: Lovely little loft located on the 1st floor. Closest Metro Station name is "Sishane"  Closest Bus Stop name is " Sishane"  Closest Pier name is "Kasimpasa" Very Friendly and nice blend of residantial and touristic neighborhood
space: The apartment is 35ms with kitchenette and bathroom with extra large shower. The bed can be used as double bed or can be separated into 2 single beds.
description: Lovely little loft located on the 1st floor. Closest Metro Station name is "Sishane"  Closest Bus Stop name is " Sishane"  Closest Pier name is "Kasimpasa" Very Friendly and nice blend of residantial and touristic neighborhood The apartment is 35ms with kitchenette and bathroom with extra large shower. The bed can be used as double bed or can be separated into 2 single beds. Free wifi Clean towels and linen Coffee Machine Kettle Pans I am trying to interact with my guest as much as possible. I am always available to reach out for question and/or help with restaurant reservations, tour arrangements The loft is located in a central but very quiet zone. It is a Safe residantial neighbourhood of Beyoglu. You are just a few hundert meters away from the Istiklal Avenue and the metro station Sishane. Bus and metro
neighborhood_overview: The loft is located in a central but very quiet zone. It is a Safe residantial neighbourhood of Beyoglu. You are just a few hundert meters away from the Istiklal Avenue and the metro station Sishane.
transit: Bus and metro
access: Free wifi Clean towels and linen Coffee Machine Kettle Pans
interaction: I am trying to interact with my guest as much as possible. I am always available to reach out for question and/or help with restaurant reservations, tour arrangements
house_rules: Thank you in advance for not smoking in the apartments ;)

host.host_about:
Hi there!
My name is Irem. 
I love to travel, to discover new places and to meet new people.
I will be glad hosting you on your trip to magical Istanbul...

reviews.comments: Staying at the Design Loft  in Pera 1 was an amazing experience! I felt at home as soon as I arrived to the property. The hosts Aylin and Jeff were superb. The apt exceeded my expectations. The pictures are 100% accurate and yet looks even better in person. It is centrally located in one of the best neighborhoods in Istanbul. The train station, the newest Soho house and all shopping and restaurant areas are nearby. I would stay here again when I go back to Istanbul! 100% recommended.

We spent a great 5 days in Istanbul. It was our first time and we are still dreaming about it back to Paris.))))) Aylin was very responsive to my messages while booking as well as during our stay. Easy communication.The location is great for getting around the famous sites of Istanbul. The apartment is cozy, stylishly decorated and has all the necessities for a short stay. There is some humidity smell coming from the kitchen, but nothing an ambience refresher would not manage to solve. All in all, a good place to stay in the heart of the city.

Aylin ha sido una muy buena anfitrona, nos ha recomendado sitios para comer, nos ha conseguido una cuna para nuestro bebe y un transfer desde el aeropuerto. La habitación era muy bien situada, súper bonita, limpia y perfecto de tamaño. Volveremos seguro. Gracias Aylin!

Aylin hat unser sehr nett empfangen und hat uns auch immer geholfen wenn wir Hilfe gebraucht haben ! Das Apartment ist sehr sauber und schön eingerichtet ,es liegt sehr zetral so das man in der Früh und auch Abend immer in der näheren Umgebung des Apartments was Unternehmen kann .10 meter etfernt im Nachbarhaus ist ein kleiner Kiosk wo man kleinigkeiten einkaufen kann und in 3 minuten gehweg ist eine tolle Bäckerei.Was noch gesagt gehört das Apartment liegt in einem neuem Haus wo nur Ferienapartments ,dadurch finde ich es sicherer !Das einzige es riecht bissl unangenehm von der Klimaanlage oder Badezimmer. Wir würden das Apartment zu 100% Weiterempfehlen !

The apartment is really great. There are no negative comments to make. Perfect location, very clean, easy access, calm, good reception. 
We had a really great stay at Aylin's place and Aylin was very helpful in terms of restaurants, places to go etc ...

Very nicely designed and decorated, we had a great time in Aylin's place. fully furnished with all the comfort. Nice view. Perfect location, 5 min by foot from the living heart of istanbul or the subway without the inconvenience. Aylin is a cool and great host. I can just recommend her place warmly.
Thanks Aylin for sharing places like this. 
Julien&Anne

Our flight to Istanbul was cancelled on the departure day at the airport, so we weren't able to make it to Istanbul. I contaced Aylin, and she was very understanding and nice, even we cancelled on very short-notice.  As soon as we come to finally do this trip to Istanbul, we will definitely again book the apartment (and hope this time to make it- with another airline ;) ).

Nous avons adoré ce studio très bien situé dans le quartier moderne d'Istanbul. Il est décoré avec beaucoup de goût, refait à neuf, les équipements sont en parfait état, la literie très confortable et la vue dégagée sur la ville très reposante. Il est vraiment conforme à ce qu'on peut voir sur les photos. Tout en étant à proximité des quartiers vivants de la ville, il se trouve dans une rue calme ce qui en fait un hâvre de paix quand on rentre. L'accueil d'Aylin était fantastique. elle nous a trouvé un excellent chauffeur de taxi pour le trajet de retour à l'aéroport. En bref, nous le recommandons vivement à tous ceux qui veulent un hébergement dans la partie animée d'Istanbul.

The apartment was beautiful, clean and with a very comfy bed. A great view over the Bosphorus, with double glazing so no traffic noise - but we preferred leaving the windows open so we could hear the call to prayer! A great location to explore the trendy area around Taksim full of bars and restaurants, and an easy taxi ride to the old sites. Also near the port to get the ferry to the Asian side, which is fantastic. So all in all, a great and comfortable place to explore the city. 

As well as this Aylin was a wonderful host - so warm, welcoming and friendly, had great recommendations and answered all our questions and teacher very quickly and helpfully. We can't recommend her place highly enough. Thank you so much Aylin for a wonderful weekend, we can't wait to come back!!

The apartment was a great base to explore Istanbul. Aylin was very helpful in booking us taxis and recommending places to eat. 

The apartment is clean and has everything we needed for our stay. We walked to most places from here but public transport is easy to use and there is a metro stop nearby.
It can be quite loud at night as it's in the city centre.

An app we found really useful for places to eat listed by area was called zawarib. 

A must see is the basilica cistern and I would also suggest getting a ferry to Kadikoy to eat. It's very cheap and the food is amazing.

Perfect place, standards of cleanliness are really high which I mostly appreciate. Aylin is a lovely host and was extremely helpful. The modern decor is lovely and the location is great in a quiet area (I think there is no more quiet area in Istanbul). We really enjoyed the view from the big windows, the very comfartable bed. I will stay there again next visit to Istanbul.

What an amazing flat!! Not only is it in a happening part of town, but it is also also perfectly sized for a stay in Istanbul. We stayed there for 6 days. Aylin iş lovely and I'd definitely recommend staying  here. Tips: Have dinner at Milka across the road at night the view is stunning over Istanbul (apx 175TL).

We arrived in a little later in the evening, but Aylin was a superb hostess - she not only met us, but took the time to provide local recommendations on places to visit, eat, and also helped us arrange transportation services to the airport. The arranged taxi driver didn't actually show up on time, but that was a bit beyond her control and we were able to arrange otherwise. The flat is super cute and conveniently located - we absolutely loved our stay at Design Loft in Pera 1! Thank you!!

I had the most wonderful stay at La Casa Pera. Aylin is uncompromising when it comes to quality and cleanliness. We spent the entire day walking around the city, averaging 50,000 steps a day. It made the visit that much more enjoyable to be able to come home to a cosy, clean and safe place that's right at the heart of the city but in a quiet corner. I highly recommend anybody to stay here on their visit to Istanbul. Aylin was always available to answer any questions and her response time is impeccable

We very much enjoyed our stay at the Pera Lofts and Aylin was a great host. The space was perfect for a few days of leisure travel in Istanbul - ideally located in the great Shishane neighborhood, walkable to restaurants, shopping, and a few really shops (bakery, wine, cheese, etc.). The space was comfortable and we would definitely stay again when traveling to Istanbul!

Aylin, das Loft und Istanbul waren wundervoll und haben unsere Reise zu einem tollen Erlebnis gemacht. Die Wohnung ist ruhig und zentral gelegen, picobello sauber und wunderschön. Ausserdem ist das Bett sehr bequem. Aylin war super hilfsbereit und sympathisch. Schon im Vorfeld half sie mir, den Geburtstag meines Freundes zu organisieren und auch vor Ort war sie stets für uns erreichbar. Alles in allem  sehr empfehlenswert!
Alles Super! Apartment entspricht Beschreibung und Bildern. Die Lage Top und nette, hilfsbereite Gastgeberin!

Aylin, thank you so much for this wonderful stay!  
The flat is perfect, clean, bright, located in a safe area and it is exactly like in the pictures. If you are looking for a nice place to stay in Istanbul, this is it!
Aylin was a wonderful host. The apartment was well located and clean.

Aylin was a great host and my husband and I just loved the apartment! Without a doubt we will look nowhere else when we come to Istanbul. I would highly recommend this apartment and Aylin to anyone. 
We were looking to stay an extra day and Aylin was able to accommodate our request with no hassle at all. The location is perfect. Walking distance to Istiklal and Galata Tower, but not full of tourists. After just a day we felt like locals and made friends with the shop owners on the street. We can't wait to come back and stay here again.
The perfect place to visit Istanbul. The apartment is small but convenient enough for a couple and very clean. Aylin provided us some local tips.

Excellent host, excellent location, great price.

Spotlessly clean.

Perfect.

Great location and excellent apartment. Very modern albeit on the small size. It had everything we needed for our 3 night stay. No washing machine which was a pain but we just washed at the next place. The bed was super comfy and the apartment was secure. The room can be a little noisy when people are walking up the stairs and the internet is temperamental- which Aylin was looking into. The location was very central and only a few minutes walk from Istaklal. The apartment was hard to find for our taxi driver and a your we did, so get the taxi driver to speak with Aylin before you start driving to avoid any confusion. Highly recommended

My boyfriend and I had two great nights in Aylin's apartment! The apartment is centrally located on a quiet side street, really close to Galata and loads of restaurants and shops. The apartment itself was spacious, clean, tidy & super cosy! Aylin & her husband were also lovely and made us feel very at home, providing tea, coffee and juice, even slippers were included. One watchout is that the pin drop on Airbnb is a little off location, and doesn't come up on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps (it's a small side street) & our taxi driver didn't know the street, so might be worth making sure you've got directions just in case. However, this was no bother and would highly recommend staying here!

Design Loft Pera 1 was a delight to stay in. Tucked away in a quieter street, yet about a 5 minute walk from a main street of shopping and food that leads right into Taksim Square. The room was small but fit 3 of us comfortably. It is very clean and had everything we could need. There are also two small markets right around the corner where you can get all the essentials. We never got to meet Aylin, but she was very helpful - always quick to answer our questions and calls. Would definitely stay here again!

My husband and I spent 9 days  in casa pera for our honey moon. Everything was perfect and even better than expected. Aylin is siply the best host you can have: very present, helpful and kind as turkish people everywhere :) Of course, I recomend it and I will come back very soon.

Great Place, extremely clean and a perfect neighbourhood to be in. A few mins away from Taksim/Istiklal in a quite area with a newly renovated building. The place was exactly like shown in the pictures and we had an amazing time staying in such a comfortable loft. Aylin was a wonderful host and lovely person to talk to. Will see you soon!

Aylin is a great host. She was very welcoming and available. The appartement is very nice ( like on pictures ), stylish, clean, comfortable and perfectly located. 
Building fully renovated in 2015, 15min walk from the Galata tower and few minutes from the subway station Shishane. Many little grocery stores around the flat.
We enjoyed our trip to Istanbul and will recommend the appartement anytime ! Thank you Aylin !

The apartment - Exactly like shown in pics, modern, cosy, clean and well maintained and easily accessible by walk/cab. The location - Perfect, walking distance from Istiklal street but just distant enough in a quiet and upscale neighborhood. The host - the best part of all, she is ALWAYS available, helpful, resourceful and goes an extra mile to help and accomodate your requests. 5 stars for that. This is a gem of a combination, so if your next stop is Istanbul, this should end your search for the perfect place to stay.
Perfect Stay, Perfect Host with great recommendations locations!

The apartment is just as it looks in the pictures and beats any hotel room for quality and value. The location is also ideal, set on a quiet hillside but a perfect launchpad for all of the restaurants, cafes and bars in Galata. Very good access to public transport which we took everywhere without issues. Aylin was also very responsive to our questions and made the logistics of checking in and out completely hassle free!

In short this is best Airbnb I've stayed in... The photos accurately reflect the interior, which is excellent. The space is spotless with everything you need, the little extras (such as mini shampoo) are a lovely touch too. Aylin a pleasure to liaise with and was available if we had any questions. I thoroughly recommend staying here!

The apartment was excellent and had recently been refurbished to a very high standard. Absolutely no complaints. Well located near restaurants and bars with good public transport and grocery shops seconds away. We did not meet Aylin during our stay but she responded to online queries immediately and arranged transfers from the airport for us. Would stay again and recommend her to our friends.

Great location. Not too far to some of the tourist areas and very close to some very nice restaurants, cafés and bars. Accommodation was clean and as described. Alyin was great in organising transport to and from airport too. Would definately recommend for a trip to Istanbul.

We had a great time in Istanbul in October 2015. Ayline organised everything and the flat was just great. It is located in a nice and calm neighbourhood, with small shops and a very nice caffee close by. It takes not more than 10 min. walk to the heart of Beyoglu with nice locantas and bars.
The flat is abundantly recommendable and we would definitely book it once more, when coming to Istanbul again.
Beautiful flat in a great location. Would highly recommend!
Weary nice apartment, everything just like on pictures. Perfect location and housekeeping

Our stay with Aylin was very easy and comfortable. The location is great with access to grocery stores and restaurants. The "big" tourist destinations are within walking distance from the apartment and public transport seems readily accessible if you don't have the time. Aylin was very helpful in confirming a day tour we had organised as we had no phone and could not speak the language. I definitely hope I make it back to Istanbul and Aylin's loft again.

Aylin è molto gentile e simpatica;  parla inglese ma anche un ottimo italiano e tedesco. All'inizio il posto è un po' difficile da trovare (da Sabiha Gokcen) ma dopo un giorno ci accorgemmo che  l'appartamento è situato in una ottima zona: si tratta del cuore di Beyoglu Istanbul, con tantissimi ristoranti, bar, negozi; c'è anche l'Hotel inizio novecento dove soggiornava Agata Christie! Posto stupendo! La fermata Sishane della Metr (Website hidden by Airbnb) minuti, e la linea del tram T1 è vicina. 
Il nostro soggiorno è stato bellissimo, nessun problema, e spero di tornare di nuovo.  Istanbul è una città affascinante e l'appartamento di Aylin è perfetto per visitarla!

Wir hatten eine wunderbare Zeit in diesem Loft. Die Lage und die Ausstattung lassen keine Wünsche offen. Aylin hat uns vor der Anreise und auch während des Aufenthaltes mit Tips versorgt. Vielen Dank!

Pretty cool place, it was great having the airport transfer, that made it really easy. It's a really good location, close to the hustle and bustle of Istanbul but not noisy. Best of both worlds! Very comfortable and clean, and I would definitely stay their again. Aylin is a great host and this place is the perfect blend between a hotel and a home away from home.

Aylin is a great host. She was very warm and communicative throughout our stay and helped us to schedule airport pick-ups with a local car service. It works out cheaper and easier than taxis or other services one might book. The flat is well decorated and maintained. The only downside is a slightly musty odor around the bathroom. It's in a great location and very comfy, and you won't be in the flat enough to worry about that since here is so much to do close by and across the city. It's well worth the price.
Very nice place, good location. Host was extremely nice. Helped arrange taxis to airport
Great apartment perfect location
We loved the apartment. Great location.

We had the most fabulous five night stay in Aylin's apartment. The location was amazing- so close to all the fantastic restaurants and bars and a quick tram trip across to Sultanahmet. Aylin was a fabulous host providing lots of helpful advice for navigating Istanbul as well as great places to eat. We will definitely stay here again the next time we are in Istanbul.

We stayed in Istanbul 2 weeks ago. This appartment was just as it is in the pictures and a great location! Aylin The perfect host and recommended some great restaurants. We would definitely stay there again!

Aylin is very kind and amazing host. She made sure that everything is perfect and smooth. The flat is very central, quiet and comfortable. Just few minutes to Istıklal and other central locations around Taksim. You can take a cap around the corner and Istanbul waits ahead in its charming invitation.
Great location for this beautiful and comfortable apartment ,Aylin was very friendly and care all the time for us all the time i recommend to anyone who want to visit the Istanbul.

Bugüne kadar yaşadığım en iyi Airbnb deneyimiydi. Ev, fotoğrafta görülenden çok daha iyiydi, lokasyon her yere çok yakın. 

Ev gayet temizdi, ve Aylin'le iletişim kurmak çok kolaydı. Çok kibar ver yardımsever biriydi.

İstanbul'da tekrar bir yerde kalmam gerekirse muhakkak tercih ederim.

Your apartment was perfect and the help you gave us with bookings and tours was fantastic. Everything worked out perfectly and it was all stress free! We loved our visit to Istanbul and our trip to Gallopoli and Ayvalik. Thank you so much for your personal touch!

I had my best stay so far. Aylin's place felt much more like a luxury hotel then an apartment. The location was superb. Close to almost any intresting place but also very close to places from where you can catch transportation to places of interest that are more far away.  The bed was very comfortable, shops for small needs were steps away and Aylin was very friendly and helpful during all my stay. When i return to beautiful istanbul again i would love to stay in Aylin's place again without hasistation.
Amazing apartment, would really recommend!!

We had a fantastic time at Aylin's apartment beautifully decorated and spotlessly clean, just like in the photos. Great location in walking distance to tourist attractions and tram-line. Aylin was very helpful with all the questions we needed to ask her and we always got an answer back promptly, she even organised our shuttle to and from the airport. Thanks for a great stay Aylin!!
Amazing apartment. Aylin was very communicative and hospitable. Fantastic location! Aylin let us arrive early and stay a little later. Would definitely come back here again!

Wir haben uns in dem Loft sehr wohl gefühlt! Es war hell, gemütlich und sehr zentral zu allen Highlights Istanbuls gelegen. 
Bei Fragen oder Tipps hat Aylin innerhalb kürzester Zeit geantwortet. 
Vielen lieben Dank für alles, wir kommen gerne wieder:-)

The apartment is amazing and Aylin is the perfect host! She arranged our transportation from the airport and made sure everything was perfect for us during our stay. Will definitely come back to this places when I'm back in Istanbul.

Beautiful apartment in a great location. Aylin kindly arranged a taxi from the airport for us and met us at the apartment. Highly recommended heading to Soho House around the corner for cocktails! Thanks Aylin, we hope to be back! Laura & Marcus
Aylin was there to receive us, very friendly and explained everything clearly and even gave us great tips for touristing.

Aylin was a fantastic host, and offered many recommendations and even helped me to make transfers and bookings.  Although I arrived earlier than expected, she ensured that I got into the apartment on time. The location is excellent and quaint too, near to Taksim's shopping district and to the metro. It's private, and a very unique and artistic part of Istanbul. We enjoyed ourselves very much!

This is a lovely, modern flat in a really good location. Close to istiklal, tunel and lots of restaurants and cafes. I met aylin at the flat, she was a very helpful and welcoming host, including when we accidentally locked ourselves out. I would recommend this as a place to stay.

Aylin' apartment  was great. Aylin met us at the apartment when we arrived from the airport. She arranged for the airport pick up. The apartment itself is beautiful -very modern European. The location is excellent. Easy walks to the Golata Tower area and
Tacsim but also only a short taxi ride from the center of the city with all the famous sites. The apartment has all the amenities you would want and was very (Website hidden by Airbnb) has a nice view of the Golden Horn. Check out was very easy.The area is very safe. Walking around  the neighborhood  at night  was  easy and safe. All in all a great place to stay when you visit Istanbul.

Was soll ich groß sagen? Die Bewertungen sprechen für sich. Mein Erster Ausflug nach Istanbul und ich war vorher etwas unsicher: Ist die Lage gut? Brauche ich weit um die ganzen Sehenswürdigkeiten zu erreichen? Sichere Lage? Ruhig?

Im nachhinein: Besser geht's nicht. Man ist zu Fuß in 5min am Taksim Platz und Co., wo all die Geschäfte und Restaurants sind. Man muss wirklich nur eine Straße hochlaufen. Von dort aus fährt auch die Metro. 

Ich bin abends meist gegen Mitternacht rum heim und es war alles sicher. Immer sind irgendwo Touristen unterwegs, sodass man nie das Gefühl hat, als sei man in einer dunklen Gasse oder sonstiges.

Vom Zimmer aus hört man nichts. Man kann wirklich in Ruhe entspannen und auch sonst sieht es aus wie auf den Bildern. Sat-TV sei Dank muss man nicht einmal abends auf die dt. Sender verzichten :) 

Aylin ist unglaublich nett und hat mir vorab und auch vor Ort sehr weitergeholfen mit Tipps und generell. Ich weiß definitiv, wo ich das nächste Mal wieder hingehen werde.

Beautiful apartment in a great location. Aylin arranged a taxi from and back to the airport for us. She told us all the places to visit and how to get around. Thanks Aylin, we loved the place !!! Highly Recommended !!!!
Great location! Small cosy apartment with everything you need! Aylin was a very nice host and responded on all messages, I ll definitely recommend this place!
Aylins's apartment was very nice, clean and comfortable. Location was perfect. I'd recommend her place and would stay again.

L'appartement est très confortable, bien meublé et très propre. 
J'y ai passé un séjour très agréable. Merci à Irem.  

Daire cok rahat ve çok temiz idi. Mobilyalar gayet güzel ve kullanisli. Cok guzel bir zaman gecirdim. Tesekkur ederim İrem.

I stayed at Irem's Apartment in Beyuglu .
Apartment is very modern with all Mod con.
It's a great location . Irem has been a great host, she even arranged the airport pick up and drop service for me .
She has responded to my texts in timely manner .
I recommend this place highly .
Irem's place felt like home! The design of the place was beautiful and I felt so cozy and warm staying there. I will definitely come back again!
Все отлично! Квартира меньше, чем казалась на фото. В остальном - полное соответствие ожиданиям.

Die Unterkunft war toll, alles entsprach den Bildern. Die Lage ist sehr ruhig aber dennoch sehr Zentral zur Metro Station und zur Istiklal Caddesi. Die Gastgeberin hat uns den Transfer vom und zum Flughafen organisiert und hat sich sehr viel Mühe gegeben. Die Unterkunkt kann ich nur empfehlen!
Amazing host, great place

We were so happy about this place. It was beautiful och clean and close to everything you need. Never met Irem in person, but she was so kind and helpt us with everything we needed. She also got us a taxi in the middle of the night to the airport.

Irem was a fantastic host she answered my (Hidden by Airbnb) messages pretty much instantly and even made us a reversation for a restaurant on our first night. She also arranged the taxi pick up service to and from the apartment which was great (Irem you need to find out who drove us back to the airport and always request him because he was hilarious). The flat was super clean and the bed and pillows were like a soft cloud of comfiness after our long walks exploring the city. It was quiet too which in a crazy, bustling place like Istanbul was a god send, with several tiny conveníance shops just round the corner. The location was perfect and just what we prefer when we travel- a quiet residential neighbourhood a stones throw away from the lively main shopping street, istiklal caddesi and near the bohemian Karakoy. This side of the city has the best shopping, restaurants and bars so was great to return here in the evenings. I'll definitely use Irems place next time I visit this amazing city :)
Irem ist eine tolle Gastgeberin ! Sehr hilfsbereit, spontan wenn es um Geburtstagsorganisationen geht (Tischreservierung, Blumen...) und hat ein tolles Apartment. Immer wieder gerne !

If you have a chance to visit Istanbul surely you have to stay on Irem's place. It is very comfortable, clean, has a nice interior and the most important thing is very near the crowd. You can go to Istiklal street by feet, literally. There is a metro station named Shishane about 200 metres from the loft, so you can travel to many places thereafter. Very nice place. 5 out of 5.
Irem's falt is very lovely,  well located and good equipped. I can recommend it.
Amazing little apartment in a great location. The apartment was exactly as pictured. Our host was friendly, accommodating and very responsive.

We had unforgotable 6 days in Istanbul.The flat was very cosy and beautiful with great location. It was easy to reach any place.And what about Irem? She is so kind and pleasent girl,ready to answer any time.So visit this amazing country and Irem's perfect flat✌️

No matter from which side are excellent, clean, stylish, comfortable, stay is more convenient, it is recommended. Landlord Irem very thoughtful and careful in her help all the problems can be solved, no doubt I will choose here again

I highly recommend this apartment. It is perfectly located but also quiet. Irem was in advance and during our stay very helpful.
Great apartment for a couple who wants to discover Istanbul :)

I've spend three days with my wife in  Istanbul. We had a really good time in the Irem apartment. Everything was very good organized. Even if we unfortunately didn't have privilege to meet Irem in person, we didn't have any problems to check in, or after that. Irem was always available over (Hidden by Airbnb) for us, and she responds always very quickly. She did even organize our transport from airport on the first day, and to the airport on the last day. Thank you very much for a very nice apartment and for a nice time for us in Istanbul. I would always recommend this apartment to my friends and colleagues in Istanbul.

Everything was perfect. Irem was very helpful and we could leave our luggage till the late afternoon. The loft is nearby the very vivid an "hip" center of beyoglu - but quite calm at night. A perfect "homebase" to discover Istanbul.

Ultra chic, yet cosy and fantastically located, this accommodation ticks all the boxes. Host friendly and quick to communicate, apartment full of all the necessary amenities and very clean. Wonderfully decorated and warm. Located in an amazing place, next to the busy commercial centre, but very quiet and safe, with a remarkable view, even from the first floor. Loved it. One of the best experiences I've had on airbnb.

My wife had an excellent sty at Istanbul. The apartment was excellent. Everything was perfect. Will definitely stay with you next time we come to Istanbul.

The place was close to restaurant, metro, night life, and was secluded and private at the same time.

Irems place is very clean and cozy and was as described. She is  also a very friendly and helpful person! 

I would say that initially it's location was hard to find but is in a very safe neighbourhood. Our taxi driver could not pinpoint it exactly - I would advise giving Irems phone number to the taxi driver for instructions. Overall great place to stay when in Istanbul, highly recommended.
Great location, secure, safe, nice room with everything you might need (apart from washing machine). The host was so helpful we couldn't ask for more! Recommended!
Amazing place in a great location! Everything was perfect. Highly recommended!

Had such a great time! It was a wonderful, clean apartment with nice touches of small bottles of amenities like shampoo etc. Very cosy place that made us look forward to going home at night. Side note that the wifi was slightly wonky at times, it took a bit of patience to connect and reconnect but it was a small issue! Great location - close to sishane walking / shopping district, cafes and clubs and pubs all within the area. Amazing amazing time. We even walked to Taksim square :)
Très bien. Je recommande

I stayed at this place for three nights and found it to be very clean, comfortable and generally well situated in-between Taksim Sq and Galata Tower.  The wi-fi worked, but was a little slow for downloading work files, but otherwise was a good spot to work from.  This is my send time in Istanbul this year and I would recommend this place to anyone.

The flat is super clean and tidyn 5-10 min walk from the subway and very close to Istiklal avenue and Taksim Square. You can easily get to Galata tower by feet from it.
Irem provides very useful tips and some good restaurants recommandations.
I enjoyed my stay in Istanbul, thank you Irem!
Great location for staying in Istanbul, easily access sultanahmet and other areas of the city. Irem was a pleasure to deal with and made life extremely easy. Would recommend to anyone.
Marvelous!

muy bueno el departamento, la zona genial para pasear, recomiendo este departamento agradable , excelente.
y volveria alojarme en casa  de Irem, excelente atención
de parte de Irem gran persona , muy atenta y simpática  
sin duda lo recomiendo !!! un placer enorme

This apartment was so cozy and felt like a home away from home. Irem was available every step of the way and answered all my questions promptly and thoroughly. She also arranged an airport transfer for us and let us pay her back at our convenience. She is a lovely person and that shines through in her work. The flat was clean and had everything you need and was in walking distance to İstiklal St. The locals were also very friendly. I will definitely be booking with Irem on my next trip and you should too ;) 5/5

The room is a bit smaller than what it looks like on the photos, but that is totally unimportant, because you will get a very clean, bright and comfortable place with everything you need. We liked that the place is somewhat hidden from the crowd, yet you only need 10 mins on relaxed foot to get to Galata tower and ~45 mins to get to Sultanahmet. For those who enjoy their walks it is definitely the place to rent.
Irem as a host is very polite, friendly and helping. I would totally recommend staying at this place if you are: couple, like to walk, dont really need parties and noise, enjoy and respect clean conditions. 
Transportation is close, plenty of coffeeshops to start your day in the area.

Отличный апартаменты ! Отдыхали с женой вдвоём. Очень хорошее местоположение - рядом с центром, но при этом тихо. 
Номер очень стильный и чистый, классные окна в пол. Все здорово, Хозяйка Irem очень отзывчивая и всегда готова помочь ! Обязательно вернёмся.
Top accomodation!!! I recommend!!!!The space is contemporary fashionable and comfortable.
Irem is a very nice host and the room is decorated with very good taste and it's brand new, the Şişane metro station is close.

The space was great and the same as the pictures. Very well decorated and there were lots of thoughtful touches. Irem was very helpful in giving us tips throughout our stay and answering any of our questions. It was a great experience, everything was clean and comfortable and the location is really great - we walked to Istiklal street every night.

You can’t find elsewhere better than Irem’s place for your stay in Istanbul. Irem’s place make you feel like home but with a hotel standard. The room is exactly like what you see from the photos. The room is modern, clean and has everything you need. It is also very close to the Istiklal Street with few minutes walk. The bed and pillow is so comfortable which I think is much better than many high end hotel. The only flaw is that the heater take some time to heat up water after one shower and there’s some weird smell coming from the kitchen. Other than that, everything is perfect for the price you pay. Highly recommended!!!
Lovely central studio apartment

We really loved staying at this place. When we left the apartment, we were inmediatly looking forward to coming home again (It felt like home for us). We would definitely recommend this apartment to other people! The location is perfect too!

Irem is a good host. her apartment is cozy & lovely, and has everything we need. 
while it has some smells in the room, we also recommended it because of the good location.

Irem is a very helpful person. She responded fast and even gave us some tips where to go. The appartment was exactly as described on the page / pictures. everything was clean and the location is close to the metro station or bus. also you can reach the city center very easily from that appartment. I hope to be back soon and I would stay anytime at that place!!
Genel olarak kalınmak için süper bir yer.
Lovely apartment. Just as seen in the pictures. Irem was a great host, ready to respond in case I had any doubts. I would stay here again.
Nice modern apartment. Great view, good bed.
If you are fine with a smell of canalization so this place is for you. Disappointed.
Lovely place to stay in Istanbul. Irem made everything really easy and the flat was great.

Irem booked a Transfer at the Airport for us, which worked out perfectly. The location of the apartment is very close to the center and there are amazing restaurants for dinner or dessert right around the apartment, which my boyfriend and I really liked! A few downsides were the disgusting smell in the apartment which lasted the whole stay and the low water pressure in the shower. The check-in and check- out worked without any problem and Irem booked reservations at restaurants for us, whenever we asked her to. Since our flight was in the afternoon but check out is at 11am, Irem offered us a secure space to leave our luggage, so we didn't have to carry it around and enjoy the last few hours. The bed wasn't super comfortable especially since it was two beds just placed next to each other, so the gap in between was a bit annyoing and uncomfortable. Last but not least the apartment seems very safe and we had an amazing stay in Istanbul.

Замечательное жильё для семейной пары. Близко все развлечения и в то же время очень тихо, если хочется тишины вечером, так как лофт в 2 минутах от İstiklal. Приём такой, что чувствуешь будто приехал домой. Надеемся приехать снова.

Irem è gentilissima e sempre pronta a rispondere ad ogni richiesta. La casa è piccola ma molto carina: è molto luminosa e arredata con gusto. Si trova in una zona molto tranquilla, ma allo stesso tempo a 5 minuti a piedi dalla fermata della metro e dalle vie principali. Un piccolo paradiso
Te ayuda en todo...lugares que visitar...Tips...Lugar con exelente y estrategica ubicacion
Appartement propre et très bien situé! Irem est très réactive et nous a conseillé des bons plans.

Very nice and designed little flat.
Great location as only 5 min by foot to very nice places in Pera.
Also much appreciated is the little market at next door 
Very quite during the night despite the night life.
Taxi available at 2 min
Thanks to Irem for her quick communication and help in Turkish with the taxi driver

We have had a good time at Irem’s place. The apartment is furnished as shown in the pictures and the kitchen is equipped with the basics for preparing a meal. We only used it for preparing food for our baby for this it was sufficient. Also the restaurants around are quiet to good to spent too much time at home  ask Irem for restaurant recommendations; she has very good onces!
Wonderful place in Beyoglu, Irem is a fantastic host. Highly recommendable :-)
All around good
Irem’s apartment was perfect for us in Istanbul. It was an amazing location we could walk out and be in the centre in minutes and the apartment itself was very tastefully decorated and modern!

The appartment was very clean and quiet and centrally located in Beyoglu. It is a perfect spot to explore the city from there. Irem was a great host, very responsive and provided help to store our luggage after check-out.

It was the perfect location to visit Istanbul really, everything is at your disposal, different kind of public transports. Also Irem was a really  nice person each time we have have a question or something to ask we called her and she was really accessible with good advices and tips. I will recommand you the flat of Irem.
Great location, convenience stores next door, 5 minutes to restaurants and close to tourist areas without being too close.
Tout était parfait
Wonderful apartment with a beautiful view- nice location, near to shopping, the football station and a lot of great eating spots
Great stay, lovely and thoughtful host, and nice location as well!

We had a great stay at Irem’s apartment. 
We arrived quite late but Irem gave us instructions and the self check-in was very easy. 
The apartment is located a few minutes from the heart of Beyoğlu district and in a very quiet and safe area. It is the perfect size for 2 people. 
Irem made sure that we had everything we needed upon arrival. 
It is a great value for money, I definitely recommend it!!
Great apartment, great value. Very good location for restaurants and shopping. Very clean and had all the amenities we required. Very secure too.
Nice location
We enjoyed staying at Irems place. Great location, Great house and Great host. thanks

El Apartamento es justo para 2 personas, limpio, muy bien ubicado, cercania de metro, restaurants, pubs y avenida principal turistica.
Es muy recomendable.
Good place to stay

The location is great and the apartment clean and we recommend it as good value unless you are worried about mold and smell. The biggest issue for us was the low water pressure in the toilet which made it impossible to flush it properly

We were here on a business trip, and enjoyed the location being very quiet but still central and close to food markets, taxi (just around the corner) and shopping. Very nice and stylish apartment, just refurbished and upgraded. Irem was very helpful and nice, quick to answer any question and provided local tips. Highly recommended!

It was the worst experience I ever had. I wish i can give less than one star, I wish I can add some pictures of the real apartment. It will be enough to describe the situation of this apartment. 
We couldn’t satay more than 30 minutes because of the smell. We call Airbnb they told us to stay at any coffee shop, until they solve our problem. Once we send them the picture, they approve the cancellation right away.
AC not working. 
Nothing was correct, as they describe on the listing

Insgesamt waren wir zufrieden. Die Lage/Nähe zum Zentrum ist sehr gut. Drei kleine Kritikpunkte haben wir:
 1. die Toilettenspülung war praktisch nicht vorhanden und  wir mussten mit einen Eimer Wasser nachhelfen (soll laut Gastgeberin sofort repariert werden)
2. es ist etwas feucht und modrig in der Wohnung
3. es fehlen Insektenschutzgitter an den Fenstern, wir kämpften
Nachts mit Stechmücken

Wie gesagt, insgesamt waren wir trotzdem zufrieden! Kann man weiter empfehlen.
Great location, nice apartment, exactly what you need for a stay in Istanbul.

The apartment was small but tidy. Everything you need for a short week end trip. The location is very good. Negative point was that we had ants in the bathroom, coming through a hole in the bathroom. We solved the problem by ourselves because there was no answer from Irem. However, before our arrival she was very attentive and spontaneously organized a transport for us from the airport to the apartment which was very nice.
Konforlu odalar, harika lokasyon. İrem Hanım oldukça iletişime açık ve yardımcı.

We had a fantastic week in this cute studio. Perfect location and warm welcome by the hostess. Got help with booking a transfer and everything was easy and smooth. The area is perfect, lots of restaurants easy with communication buses walking distance. Quiet and nice at night. We will definitely be back.

name: AUBERGE ST. LOUIS
summary: Auberge St-Louis is a historical 20th century inn that was converted into luxurious suites available for short term rentals or extended stays.
space: Deluxe finishes were carefully selected to make each suite uniquely elegant and comfortable. All suites in this luxury retreat offer our corporate stay guests a fully equipped kitchen, marble bathroom, and several other amenities. Auberge St-Louis offers stunning ornate wood and slate finishes with a double-sided fireplace for your entertainment purposes.
description: Auberge St-Louis is a historical 20th century inn that was converted into luxurious suites available for short term rentals or extended stays. Deluxe finishes were carefully selected to make each suite uniquely elegant and comfortable. All suites in this luxury retreat offer our corporate stay guests a fully equipped kitchen, marble bathroom, and several other amenities. Auberge St-Louis offers stunning ornate wood and slate finishes with a double-sided fireplace for your entertainment purposes. Fitness facilities are complimentary and catering services are available. It is the oldest city in the West Island dating back to 1667, and one of the oldest cities in Canada.
