neighborhood_overview: Dorval is a suburb on the island of Montreal in southwestern Quebec. It is the oldest city in the West Island dating back to 1667, and one of the oldest cities in Canada. The southern area of Dorval is densely populated with most of the 19,000 residents because of the Trudeau airport, which takes up 3/5 of the city’s land.
notes: Enjoy complimentary high speed WIFI Internet, complimentary digital cable TV service, complimentary local calling & Voicemail and housekeeping service every two weeks
transit: We offer outdoor parking included in the rate and indoor parking is $5.00 + taxes per night/ Aeorport International Pierre-Elliott Trudeau, formerly Montreal-Dorval International Airport serves the Greater Montreal and adjacent regions in Ontario, Vermont and New York. It is one of eight Canadian airports with United States border preclearance. Airlines servicing Trudeau offer non-stop flights to countries in Africa, Asia, Europe, North America and South America.
access: Fitness facilities are complimentary and catering services are available. Housekeeping Service Every Two Weeks for reservations over 31 nights

host.host_about: Luxury furnished accommodations provider for extended stay requirements

reviews.comments: Great service from the team. Apartment fully equipped. Thanks you for 6 great weeks in Dorval.

name: Above Graham stop - L train
space: Charming Williamsburg apartment located conveniently right above the Graham Stop off the L train. Extremely close access to subway and bus stop. Cute bars, restaurants, bodegas, grocery, laundry, and coffee shops. Air conditioned room w/full size bed. Living room, kitchen and spacious bathroom. Internet, easy street parking, and lots of natural sunlight, windows in every room.  10 minute walk to Bedford, Bushwick, McCarren Park and Greenpoint.
description: Charming Williamsburg apartment located conveniently right above the Graham Stop off the L train. Extremely close access to subway and bus stop. Cute bars, restaurants, bodegas, grocery, laundry, and coffee shops. Air conditioned room w/full size bed. Living room, kitchen and spacious bathroom. Internet, easy street parking, and lots of natural sunlight, windows in every room.  10 minute walk to Bedford, Bushwick, McCarren Park and Greenpoint.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Young professional working in interior design.

reviews.comments: Walker is a great guy and has a nice room in a good part of town. Didn't get to spend a ton of time with him and his two roommates but there was a relaxed and casual atmosphere. Everyone seemed just as happy to hang out as they did to let me do my own thing. Probably best suited for younger travellers, but I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a casual, low-key place in Brooklyn.

Before booking this room I was skeptic because I could see just one pic of it, very little information and no ratings at all. Fortunately I was happily surprised by this experience. The accommodation is literally 10 metres from the Graham stop of the L line. In a very few minutes one can be in Manhattan (subway runs the whole night). It is also surrounded by shops that are cheaper as compared to other areas in Williamsburg. The room is spacious, with air conditioning, and it is furnished with a few vintage pieces and overall very good taste. Walker was very kind and he provided me with all the information I needed. Moreover he allowed me to have a very late check in that was great, as I had to work the day following my last night I  stayed at his place. Also the other (Hidden by Airbnb) were very nice and friendly. 
I would also recommend this place mainly to young people because of the general vibe, as the previous reviewer did. 
Last but not least, the apartment have access to a roof with a breathtaking view of Manhattan skyline! You might have a chance to see it as it happened to me one of the evenings i was there! Amazing!

Our stay at Walker's place -DIRECTLY off the L Train Graham stop (it really is on the corner, and this really is awesome)-  was nothing but just simply pleasurable and filled with great decor, great company, and again, a top-notch location. 

Walker shares his apartment with two other roommates. We were lucky enough to meet one of them during a lovely evening amongst friends, when we were invited to join them for a cordial drink or two up at their rooftop. The weather was perfect and the view was stunning. Walker and his friends are mad witty and smart and I wouldn't think it twice to join them again for a beer! It is truly great to know one can meet enticing people such as Walker and his friends through a medium such as AirBnB.

Regarding the apartment: Walker's room and the common areas in general are so clean, and organized in a way that you wished a) they were yours b) something that was yours had looked like that at some point. It is really mad incredible, with a myriad of awesome details to delight in. The apartment counts with a fully equipped kitchen, ample bathroom, ACs, wifi, and full-on privacy. There was another AirBnBer staying at the other roommate's room while we were there as well, and we barely noticed any other noises and/or disturbances. Everything was extremely quiet and everyone was very  polite. Aside from that, Walker made himself available for anything we needed. Thanks so much once again, we enjoyed our stay! Hope to see you again soon!

We were warmly welcomed by Walker and his roommate! We instantly felt at ease. The room is artsy and interesting. This was just the place for us and so perfectly located. You could roll out of bed straight into the L train.

We only stayed in Walker's apartment a couple nights, and we were gone most of the day, but we had a great experience. The apartment is wonderful and the subway is practically right outside the door. Walker was very welcoming to us and our stay here was stress-free and enjoyable. Would love to stay here again.

Walker's place is great! Walker and his roommates are super chill and friendly and the apartment is updated and nice. Not to mention awesome AC - very important in NYC in August. Really great area  - this is a perfect place to stay if you need a bed in NYC for a few nights!

We stayed at Walker’s for two nights. We didn't get to see them much, however, up, until and throughout our stay Walker was really helpful and responded to all our messages quickly. He left a key for us so we were able to come and go as we please and had left the AC on so it was nice and cool for our arrival. The room was just as the pictures showed, clean and tidy and, as mentioned, has AC so was nice and cool when we slept. The apartment is literally on the same corner as Graham Av station, which is 6 stops and about 15 minutes on the subway from the centre of Manhattan, which then links to numerous other lines to get elsewhere. It’s location in Williamsburg itself is really good too, within close walking distance to Bedford Av, Lorimer st and McClaren Park. We would recommend Walker’s place and would definitely consider it again if we were to come back to NYC.

Very nice place, cozy and convenient. It is located just above the L line and quite close to supermarket. Walker is an awesome host, nice and considerate, very easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend this place if people want a short stay in New York.
The reservation was canceled 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Very cozy place and the location is pretty much unbeatable, in a very nice part of Brooklyn and not 30 seconds from the L train (which takes you to the heart of Manhattan in no time).

The room itself was big, clean, and comfortable, a great value for the price. Walker was flexible and accommodating and his roommates were very friendly. Overall the apartment has a chill, artistic vibe. Highly recommend this place, would definitely stay here again!

name: Quarto amplo em local tranquilo!
summary: Quarto grande e confortável, arejado, mobiliado, em lugar tranquilo, em meio a natureza , próximo ao Centro e a Tijuca, largo do Machado, Laranjeiras,Botafogo. Ônibus na porta que leva até ao metrô.  Não  possuo animais! Em Santa Teresa, bairro lindo
space: O quarto é amplo e arejado possui uma treliche, mesa para notebook,  uma comoda para guardar roupas. Aramado com cabideiro e ventilador de teto.
description: Quarto grande e confortável, arejado, mobiliado, em lugar tranquilo, em meio a natureza , próximo ao Centro e a Tijuca, largo do Machado, Laranjeiras,Botafogo. Ônibus na porta que leva até ao metrô.  Não  possuo animais! Em Santa Teresa, bairro lindo O quarto é amplo e arejado possui uma treliche, mesa para notebook,  uma comoda para guardar roupas. Aramado com cabideiro e ventilador de teto. A cozinha, banheiro , sala, tv, dependências do Condomínio, como praça, mirante. O quanto permitirem, sou sociável adoro conversar mas também sei respeitar o espaço e a privacidade do outro. Visitas de namorado ou amigos tem que ser combinadas com antecedência. Santa Teresa é um bairro residencial, boemio que abriga lindos casarões antigos e fica acomodado em meio a natureza. Não possui comércio . Por isso a tranquilidade é prioridade. O Condomínio Equitativa prima por sua tranquilidade, ar puro e por acomodar e respeitar pessoas de todas as tribos porem com limpeza, organização e respeito. Um Con
neighborhood_overview: Santa Teresa é um bairro residencial, boemio que abriga lindos casarões antigos e fica acomodado em meio a natureza. Não possui comércio . Por isso a tranquilidade é prioridade. O Condomínio Equitativa prima por sua tranquilidade, ar puro e por acomodar e respeitar pessoas de todas as tribos porem com limpeza, organização e respeito. Um Condomínio amplo , rodeado pela natureza e animais silvestres.
notes: Gostaria que a pessoa fosse, limpa e organizada, honesta e respeitosa. E que  fique claro que as refeições não fazem parte do aluguel. Somente alugo o quarto. O hospede pode comprar suas coisas e usar a cozinha para cozinhar deixando-a sempre limpa e organizada.  Não ofereço cama e café, somente o aluguel do quarto. Claro que existem exceções a serem conversadas.A lavanderia pode ser usada e o material como sabão em pó e amaciante também tem que ser comprados pelo hospede. O aluguel do quarto inclui água, luz, internet. O uso do telefone fixo será cobrado à parte.
transit: O Condomínio tem ponto de ônibus na porta que leva ao centro da cidade e ao Largo do Machado, estação do metro.
access: A cozinha, banheiro , sala, tv, dependências do Condomínio, como praça, mirante.
interaction: O quanto permitirem, sou sociável adoro conversar mas também sei respeitar o espaço e a privacidade do outro. Visitas de namorado ou amigos tem que ser combinadas com antecedência.
house_rules: Som alto demais não será permitido, festas tambem não.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Moro em um lugar lindo, amo abrir minha janela e ver o Pão de Açucar e a Baia de Guanabara, onde o sol nasce formando um cenário de tirar o folego.
Gosto da natureza e suas belezas e quero muito dividir isso com outras pessoas, Gosto de Hospedar e dividir conhecimento e cultura. Já viajei para varios lugares do Brasil amo esse pais. Sou alegre, comunicativa, organizada, gosto de manter a casa limpa e gosto de interagir com as pessoas. Posso indicar lugares lindos para se conhecer no Rio, já que trabalhei com turismo. Estou aberta a negociação de preços. Sou tranquila e calma. E gosto de viver em paz.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: The reservation was canceled 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Chic Inner City - 3 mins to Trains
summary: We are 3 mins walk to trains and 1 min to buses. Train/bus ride 10-15 mins to Sydney City! Quiet B&B house but walk to trendy cafes, restaurants, theatre and trains/buses. Shared home, CLEAN & MODERN bathroom, kitchen and plush bed!
space: Only 3 mins walk to the train station and 1 min walk to the buses! Then only a 10-15 mins ride into the Sydney City!  Perfect for getting around Sydney! Seriously! - 3 minutes walk to Trains (Newtown Station) - 1 minute walk to Buses (on King Street or Enmore road) - 10-15 mins train/bus ride to major TOURIST attractions - Opera House, Sydney Tower, Darling Harbour, Westfield Pitt Street, Chinatown, Sydney Fish Market, Circular Quay, The Rocks. - 15-20 mins taxi ride to/from airport - 1 minute walk to King Street's buzzing cafes, restaurants and pubs - 3 minutes walk to the Famous Enmore Theatre - 15 minutes walk to RPA hospital - 1 minute walk to two nearby Bag Wash Laundry facility (NOTE: Not suitable for children under 10 years old)
description: We are 3 mins walk to trains and 1 min to buses. Train/bus ride 10-15 mins to Sydney City! Quiet B&B house but walk to trendy cafes, restaurants, theatre and trains/buses. Shared home, CLEAN & MODERN bathroom, kitchen and plush bed!  Only 3 mins walk to the train station and 1 min walk to the buses! Then only a 10-15 mins ride into the Sydney City!  Perfect for getting around Sydney! Seriously! - 3 minutes walk to Trains (Newtown Station) - 1 minute walk to Buses (on King Street or Enmore road) - 10-15 mins train/bus ride to major TOURIST attractions - Opera House, Sydney Tower, Darling Harbour, Westfield Pitt Street, Chinatown, Sydney Fish Market, Circular Quay, The Rocks. - 15-20 mins taxi ride to/from airport - 1 minute walk to King Street's buzzing cafes, restaurants and pubs - 3 minutes walk to the Famous Enmore Theatre - 15 minutes walk to RPA hospital - 1 minute walk to two nearby Bag Wash Laundry facility (NOTE: Not suitable for children under 10 years old) - The Bed: Real Quee
neighborhood_overview: "Newtown" Suburb - You will not be disappointed!  - Famous for its young and trendy neighbourhood.  - Home of the famous Enmore Theatre! Think "Cold Play," "Aqua"  "Burlesque" concerts!  - King St, Newtown filled with endless Cafes, Pubs, Restaurants and Theatres  - A very SAFE, friendly, buzzing suburb.
notes: - Sharing the home with other travellers - I am a neat and clean freak so will try to keep all common areas like that to provide a pleasant stay for all guests. - We will try our best to be flexible with your check-in and check-out time. - Security Deposit explained - No cash payment is required to be paid to me. Airbnb has a charge/hold over your credit card for this amount in the event it is needed.
transit: Don't waste time travelling! Public transport are only 1-3 mins walk away! Train or Bus!
access: - The Bed: Real Queen Bed Mattress in your own Private Bedroom on the ground floor of the double storey 4 bedroom home.  - Spacious bedroom with quality linen and plush pillows. - Additional charges apply for 3rd guest. A quality single mattress is provided for 3rd guest. - Shared lounge with large comfortable sofas  - A shared kitchen with kettle and fridge.  - Breakfast: Cereal, milk, coffee and tea  - Stove cooking facilities for light cooking with pots and pans provided.  - FREE Wi-Fi  - Two Bathrooms to share - Clean towels, shampoo and soap provided.  - Parking:  (1) In front and behind of the property: Limit to FREE two hours between 8am to 10pm. Outside those times, it is UNLIMITED FREE.
interaction: We enjoy our privacy so we will do the same for our guests, leaving our guests alone as much as possible so that you can have your own privacy.  This place is NOT suitable for: Children under 10 years old, Family, Babies, do not enjoy having too many people around, do not like meeting new people, need private bathroom or kitchen (this is all shared). This place will suit: Young adults, Clean and Tidy Travellers, enjoys modern living without the price tag, can share a bathroom and kitchen, enjoy people/travellers interactions, wants value for money, convenience to public transport, low maintenance in terms of host interaction.
house_rules: (1) No smoking inside the property. There is an undercover area at the back of the house for smoking area.  (2) Only guests checked-in with us are allowed onto the property. No outside guests allowed into the property. So No Parties! (3) For extended stays, existing guests need to book as soon as practical on Airbnb to block out the dates yourself.  (4) As it is a shared house, we expect guests to be CONSIDERATE to others and CLEAN UP after themselves.  (5) Common areas are for common general enjoyment so you will not be allowed to use it as your sleeping area or storage area. All your personal belongings must be stored within your own room. (6) Lost keys or failure to return keys is a $20 penalty charge.  (7) Lockout fee to your room and the house is $50. (8) Follow all house rules displayed around the house. (9) By booking the room, guests agree any injury incurred whilst situated at the property and host premises will not incur a lawsuit.

host.host_about:
Living in the Inner City suburb of Sydney. Sydney's inner city suburbs are surrounded by cafe cultures. Love eating and living in the inner city buzz without living right in the middle of the city either. My fave cafés and restaurants are in Newtown, Enmore, Leichhardt and Surry Hills! 

I love to travel to eat and shop. I have travelled around Europe staying with many "Airbnb" accommodation so understand the importance of being a good host. Plus I do genuinely enjoy giving advice to guests. It is also a very rewarding feeling when I hear my guests having a good time because of my advice. :)  However, my husband and I do lead incredibly busy lives and because we lead such busy lives, when we do have downtime, we love to have a chat with our guests, catch up for supper etc to wind-down. We have gained friends through hosting and I do believe that hosting is like "hosting my friends that I haven't met yet!" I treat all my guests like I would my longtime friends so I do hope my guests treat me back the same way by being polite and respectful of my house.

When I am a Guest at an Airbnb accommodation, I will always treat the house like it is my own and respect it. And when I am a Host, I will try to add a personal touch by personalising the experience to each individual that visits as I know each individual guest is different.

My life motto? "Treat others the way you would like to be treated"

reviews.comments: What wonderful hosts! The house is very clean an organized. Newtown is a great place to explore and being so close to the train and buses, we weren't far from anything. Five stars!
Our stay in the home of Miss D was perfect! The bed is very comfortable and well equipped home. Miss D and her husband are very friendly and always willing to help. Do not hesitate to stay there.

I had the best experience, I didn't imagine a BnB could be so organized! The bedroom is beautiful, the whole house is clean and very modern, I suppose it was restored recently. The location is ideal, very close to popular King St. and to buses and trains. I was happy to find out that while you have to enter the bedroom after 2 and leave it before noon when you check in and out, there is space for luggage so you can drop off and collect out of check time! I couldn't meet the host personally but everything is so organized that I could move in and out with no problems. I highly reccommend this bedroom and host.

Easy check in and check out.
Host very informative and helpful.
Great location of house, near to shops bars station and airport. 
Room great!
Thanks for a great stay!
Would definately recommend.
非常好的民俗 房主非常热情 房间非常干净 由于我们的疏忽把钥匙拉房间了 房主深夜过来为我们开房间 下次有机会还会再来

MissD was a great host. Although I never got to meet her she was friendly and responded to all my questions very quickly. The room was ideal for my boyfriend and I, location, cleanliness, value for money, everything.

Couldn't have asked for a better host than Miss D! Friendly, full of information and speedy response all the time.. 

Great place to get a good feel of Newtown.. Super close to the train station and plenty of food... Cafe options around.

Would definitely return to Newtown again! Thanks for everything Miss D :) till next time !

After staying in the room with the balcony for 10 nights I switched to a separate room for my remaining 4 (and then booked an extra one)
 The rooms were both really spacious.
I have loved staying in Miss D's house and I'm going to find it hard to move out. She is very friendly and helpful and I can give check in/ check out/ cleanliness / location all top marks!
The beds are amazing, the guests have all been lovely and I really enjoyed meeting and chatting to Miss D.
Location is 5 minutes from Newtown Station and easily accessible to everywhere in the city.
This was the perfect place to stay for my first 2 weeks in Sydney and I am going to find it hard to leave.
Thank you Miss D!

We had a lovely stay at MissD's home. It is very close (3 minute walk) to King Street for eats and drinks, as well as Enmore Theatre which was where we went for the evening. The home was clean, the bed and pillows were very comfortable, the towels were fluffy, and there are two clean and bright bathrooms. We will stay there again.

Nothing is too much trouble for MissD. I had literally booked the day before. We arrived early and MissD's friendly husband was extremely helpful and accommodating preparing the room in no time and then by chance securing a perfect, handy parking space for us. Great atmosphere, locality very clean and well kept. Quality linen and fluffy thick towels. We would love to stay again.

Miss D was very helpful and responded quickly to every query.  The home and room were just as described - clean, airy, comfortable, and in a wonderful location.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and hope we may have a chance to return.

We really enjoyed staying here! Easy to find, super close to the shops and a great location! The place was very clean, homely, beautifully decorated and very comfortable. 

Miss D made it very efficient and was very friendly when we planned to stay the night. We will definitely be booking again! Thanks so much :)

Excellent communication and kind gestures such as leaving Cadbury easter eggs for us in the kitchen one morning. Location is in a cool, young, hipsterish neighborhood 3 minute walk from Newtown Station, which was super convenient. The room is perfectly clean, The apartment itself has a lot of fun character and the owner has decorated in great taste that enhances the stay. Bed was large and VERY comfortable. I wasn't able to meet the owner, but briefly met the husband as he stopped by to welcome us. Seemed very kind. My girlfriend and I agreed that we have no choice but to stay here again if we ever visit Sydney again. We LOVED it!
Attentive host that made check-in easy. Room was clean and as pictured. The neighborhood is very nice for finding food, and not too far from both the city and the airport.
Lovely and clean, awesome location and Miss D bought us soy milk especially  - loved it thank you

We stayed 1 Night in Miss D.s lovely Appartement. The House is easy to reach and close to the Train Station. The Check in was easy and fast. Our Room was really nice furnished and really comfortable! Unfortunatly the room was a bit noisy at night because the window went towards the street. The shared kitchen and lounge were nice. all in all we had a really nice stay here.

MissD's Appartement ist sehr schön und zentral gelegen und alles war so, wie auf den Bildern gezeigt und wie es beschrieben wurde. Erwähnen sollte man jedoch für lärmempfindliche Menschen die Einflugschneise des Flughafens direkt über dem Appartement. Wenn man länger als eine Nacht dort bleibt, sollte man sich eventuell überlegen, ob man sich nicht etwas Ruhigeres suchen sollte.
MissD ist sehr hilfsbereit und jederzeit schnell zu erreichen, egal, um welche Frage es sich handelte. Auch die Informationen, die im Zimmer aushängen, sind sehr hilfreich.

I spent a night in Newtown during Easter. Walked into a neat and tidy room with welcoming bunny easter chocolate on the table. What a delight! Room was spacious. Very comfortable (and fluffy) bed! 

Although D was not there during my stay, she was very quick with replies and made sure I had no trouble getting in to the house. Self check in and check out system very efficient and flexible. 

Newtown is a lively suburb by day. Cannot stress more on the extremely strategic location of this listing. 4km / 15 minutes drive into CBD. Walking distance to famous cafes (Blackstar pastry 5 minutes walk) and there's a map to nearby cafes and eateries in our room! Street parking was free on designated hours, no issues at all. 

In general, very happy with the stay.

Me and my boyfriend stayed at Miss D's place for two nights and we had a great stay.

The location was in an excellent location, 5 minute walk to the train station and to the bustling street of Newtown.

The place was very clean and tidy! And there were cereals, milk, coffee and tea for all guests to use in the morning. There was also clean towels and two bottles of water in our room
upon arrival!

The communication with the host was great, she made sure we got in okay by sending a message and also messaged the next day to check that our stay was okay which showed how she cared about her guests!

The check in process was very smooth as clear directions were given of how to get the key for our room. 

Overall a very nice stay and we would recommend this place to anyone!

Thanks for a lovely stay!

The apartment has everything you need and you will look for in a place when you're in Sydney! I cannot emphasize how great the location was and how interesting the neighborhood is. Also a few meters away from the bus and train station. The apartment was very clean, orderly and was very photogenic as well. We really enjoyed our stay here. Miss D and her husband were very kind and accomodating, and even helped us book a cab for our super early flight. I highly recommend this apartment jf you want to maximize you. She even allowed us to leave our bags in the apartment while we roamed around as we were waiting for 2pm checkin. Bonus: you get free cereals and milk 24/7!

Organisation was great. No problems finding the lovely old terrace house or acccessing the key even though it was late Sunday. The room was bright, clean and airy with lovely linen. While the plane noise is a bit annoying the great location and access to trains and restaurants and the good price makes it a great place to stay.

The room is part of a 4 rooms lovely house in a very quiet street of Newton very close to King St. with all of its bars and restaurants. Everything is exactly as in the pictures. 
This place is also a good way to meet people as the whole house is for Airbnb travelers.
Last, Miss D was very reactive, flexible and helpful to make my stay as good as possible!

MissD really cares me and my family during the stay, as it was my first time to Sydney and i am not familiar with the transportation. We can get to the train from the house just 3 minutes. It is so convenient for those travellers. The house is very clean and comfortable. Even this house just behind the crowded street, but it is very quiet and makes us sleep very well. We must be back when we visit Sydney again:) nice people nice place

le taxi a trouvé facilement l'adresse.
La description et les instructions parfaites.

Thank you for hosting us MissD! Quick and helpful in responses to queries and on matters of check-in, settling in and check-in! A pleasant stay with clean linen and fresh towels arranged asap in order with our check-in. The room and common areas were kept spick & span and decorated to give a homey feeling. Host and her husband were friendly and did their utmost to make all occupants happy with their stay!
Charming and clean property in a great location. It was really easy to get around Sydney from here, but there's so much right on your doorstep too. We had everything we needed. Thanks!
We loved the street and location, the house is very well organised and convenient. Miss D kept in touch the whole time, making sure we had everything we needed.

Miss D was very responsive and helpful. I was amazed at how prompt she responded to all my queries. She also went an extra mile to always ensure that I was fully satisfied with the answers provided. I remember asking for a last minute change on the room setup as I had an extra friend joining us in the trip and she tried her best to accommodate my friend so we could all stay together. 

When I requested Miss D for an earlier check in, she also accommodated to my request. She even messaged me to ensure that I had no problem in checking in to the house. Throughout our short stay in Miss D's, she always ensured that we were comfortable and had all the necessities available and ready. Miss D was very friendly and exceptionally accommodating to her guests' request and feedback. 

I and my friend really liked the place! It was clean, organised, and very cosy. The room that we stayed in was also spacious even when there were 4 of us. The bathroom was clean. The house was very organised. I and my friend were so impressed that Miss D labelled everything so properly in the kitchen and put notes around the house which were helpful for visiting guests, who came from outside Sydney.

This was my first airbnb stay and I could not stop advocating this place to all my other friends :) I would without any hesitance come back again if I am to visit Sydney in the future. Thank you so much for making our stay a pleasant one. I am looking forward to visiting again in the future.

Cheers! :)
Very clean and brilliantly located. Very cool neighbourhood.
Thankyou Miss D, easy check in and accommodation exactly as described. Room and bedding comfortable and clean. Great handy location. Host provided good information and excellent communication.

The location was perfect and the house is tucked away in a quiet area so I slept so well. Everything is clean and comfortable with good faculties. Everything went smoothly and my stay could not have been better.

The listing was as described. Didn't get to meet Miss D, all queries we responded to very promptly either by SMS or email.

All instructions were clearly provided. 

Miss D assisted us with our arrival and departure times.

The bed was very comfortable, the pillows were too big (though this is a personal choice) so would have been good if other options were available. Was a little put off to see hairs in the bed ( just hoping it was from the person changing the sheets).

The room was clean as well as the bathroom and kitchen.

It would have been good to have a television either in the room or the lounge area.

Also first impressions, would be great to see the front garden looking a bit more loved.

Location is very convenient and I would stay again.

Thank you Miss D

Very good experience of BnB ! The location was excellent, 3min from train station, took us only 15-20min to go to the main sites of Sydney (Opera house, Harbour Bridge, etc). The street is quiet but if you walk 3min you will find a lot of restaurants/cafes.

The room and the rest of the house were clean and tidy. The instructions were very clear and there were some enjoyable tips about the neighborhood, the transports and Sydney in general inside the room.

Even if we didn't have the pleasure to meet MissD, she was a great host. Always available, kind and full of good advices, I would definitely recommend her.

Although I didn't meet my host face to face, I immediately felt welcome with instructions for getting into the house and amenities for cooking etc. 

Everything was exactly as advertised. This place is very easy to find in  a lovely neighborhood (yoga studio right around the corner, if you're into that!) and the most convenient walk to the train station. 

It was very clean. If you're looking for a calm, quiet, and easy place to stay, this is it. I'd definitely recommend it.

L'accueil a été parfait. Je suis arrivée de l'aéroport très facilement avec le train et tous les renseignements qui m'avaient été donnés m'ont permis de rentrer dans la maison. L'hôte a fait son possible pour me donner ma chambre avant 14h. J'ai pu prendre une douche et ce fut bien agréable après 21 h de vol. Merci. 
La maison est propre, extrêmement bien organisée et on s'y sent très à l'aise.
J'y retournerai si je reviens à Sydney. A bientôt. Michèle

The description is accurate and Station street is veryt quiet at night. Miss D is really nice beacuse she let us check in early in the morning. The room is tidy and clean, which is just like the picture. Good place to stay. :)

Check-in was very easy and I was lucky enough to meet the host upon arrival. The room is beautifully furnished and comfortable. The house is located within walking distance to the train station and there are also streets of interesting shops in the area.

It was a very welcoming and comfortable stay. The location is pretty convenient for us to travel around Sydney City by buses or trains. The room is clean and tidy and   Equipped with everything that we need during the stay. Thanks for providing us with this awesome stay and hope to see you again!

Miss D was very nice and professional. The room was lovely, simple and clean. I really loved the small things to make the stay more enjoyable and welcoming. Top Place to stay. And excellent location for something outside the city center.

it was a beautiful place with a very friendly host!
thanks for all
Lovely accomodation, quiet an relaxing near great restaurants. Pity was fully booked for my next visit to Sydney..

Amazing and beautiful place to stay! We loved our stay here and even took adventage of the kitchen. The kitchen is clean and everything we needed is available. Location is perfect, couldn't possible be any better. Great place to stay and definitely worth it.

The location of the house is indeed situated near to Newtown Station and a few bus stops. Check in and check out were a breeze, and the rooms looked exactly like that in the photos. Instructions and help were readily available at any time.

Breakfast and necessities were refilled very frequently and we never had to worry about running out of food or necessities. 

Miss D and her husband were extremely helpful and provided us with some really great recommendations for food places! We would definitely recommend Miss D's place to anyone looking to stay in the area and we cant wait to come back again. :)

Just a tip for lone travellers - it does get quite dark at night on the street leading to the apartment, so best if you get back to the apartment before nightfall or just carry a flashlight with you.

I wasn't able to make it for the trip but my friends did. The room was cosy and spacious, everything was pretty good. Didn't manage to see MissD but she readily agreed to let us extend the checkout timing.

Very good experience staying at Miss D's house. Good, quick communications with the host and very comfortable and convenient house. Clean and organised house with many extras not normally found at air bnb houses. Thank-you!
Host make access to the property simple. Spacious room & communal lounge. Off street parking was a big bonus. Thank you Miss D. Lyn

This was our first experience with Airbnb and We had really very good time at Miss D's house. The location is superb, the house is nice and clean. We could not get a chance to meet Miss D but she was always available on the phone or message and I really appreciate this. I would love to stay again on our next visit and recommend to my other friends as well.

A lovely comfortable and clean room was so nice to be in. The house is great. Got to chat with other guests and really handy to the yummy restaurants and transport. Reasonable price. Would not hesitate to recommend to others.
We enjoyed our stay. Newtown is a great location to start discover to Sydney.
Great room great location great everything~

The house is quite easy to find and very near to the train station. Out of the house and after turning left, straight up and following the road out to the main road, turn left and walk straight for about 2 mins and you'll be at Newtown train station. 

There were 3 of us, and lucky for us we booked the room on the lower level (it'll be tough for us to carry our luggages up and down the stairs! ). The room is nice and clean, but as there were 3 of us, an extra mattress was added in front of the bed, making the room a little smaller and cramp, but still there is room for us to open 3 luggages at the same time, just that it makes it a little hard to walk. 

There is a common lounge and kitchen for everyone's use, cereals and milk provided as well for breakfast! There are 2 toilets, one in the building, one outside the house, a right turn from the kitchen just few steps away. Towels and toiletries are provided as well. However, as it is a shared toilet, it gets a little messy and dirty over the days.

We stayed for 4 days and generally it was a quite a pleasant stay and the room is cosy enough. Just a note, our room is next to the main entrance so it gets a little noisy when people come in and exit the house.
Our second stay at Miss D's. A different room but the same quality, we loved it!
We had a pleasant stay. The room was clean and comfortable. It is easily accessible to public transportation which is a super plus factor. We highly recommend this place. :)

I really love the room-it is the best type of room for a female guest-portable mirror, hairdryer, hangers, elegant ambience and most importantly, a very comfortable mattress to sleep in with good number of pillows-I'd certainly like to stay here again whenever I drop by Sydney in the future!
Awesome room in a great house in the perfect Newtown location. Close to restaurants, bars and train station, check in/out was super easy. Really enjoyed our stay.

Miss D's place is conveniently located close to the station and many quirky cafes. The room looks exactly like the photo. Miss D is very friendly and informative. The local cafe/bars/restaurants Miss D recommended are quite nice. The area was a bit noisy at night but considering it was a Saturday night, it was acceptable.

Well located, efficient, clean and SO organized. Everything is labelled and written instructions provided in clear, simple language.  Nice and quiet, we slept well. 

The neighborhood is quaint, and great affordable restsurants abound, big supermarket, lower level 1/2 block from the rail  station, which is just a short walk to the address, but she's right in her advice to use a cab for to and from the airport.
MissD's place was very comfortable. The bed was good quality and I enjoyed a good nights sleep. MissD and her partner were very helpful and there to solve any issues. Thank you MissD for a good stay.

The house is located in a very special area of Sydney. Newtown is the beating heart of the underground scene and you have everything you need.

The house is conveniently located 5 min away from the Newtown station and it's basic but very clean. We didn't meet the host, neither all the other guests in the house but we didn't have a problem.

The room was really spacious and although we were expecting the third bed to be a real bed, my dad slept well on the floor on a thin mattress. The kitchen has everything you need for a basic cook and the two toilets were clean and very new.

The room did smell a bit of mould, but it's a very old house and those days Sydney was very rainy so didn't bothered us too much.

I would come back again for a short stay.
Fabulous location. Great room. Will definitely be back.
2nd time here-as good as I described before~thanks for the extra hangers!
We enjoyed our experience there. And the location was good. We love the decoration in the room.

Great accommodation! Very clean, well-kept, and atmospheric. MissD's husband was so gracious in giving us travel tips for our stay in Sydney. Would easily recommend this place for a pleasant, welcoming stay.

This was an unusual AirBnB stay in that I never got to meet my host. I arrived mid-day, stored luggage, left to do appointments, arrived back late and left very early for a flight. I only say that as I am unable to comment on any direct guest:host engagement. It was of no account in terms of my stay - the briefing material was clear, the room very clean and comfortable, good quality bed and nice linen.

Lots of interesting restaurants and little bars in the neighbourhood but far enough away not to get any noise from the busy main street. I would stay again.

Excellent communication! I didn't get to meet Miss D, but communication was clear and friendly. The location was very convenient and located in a cute town! It was easy to get around with the train station so close. We loved the room and the very detailed instructions for the place. Miss D was very accommodating and answered all our questions quickly.

The room was exactly as described and the self check-in process was super easy. The house is in a great location - Newtown has great restaurants, bars etc.

MissD was a pleasure to deal with (although we never met face to face).

I would happily stay here again in future. Thanks for having me!

The 4 nights in Sydney were amazing and the location of MissD's place was perfect. There were lots of food venues around and places to shop. Lots of cafes and a grocery store in easy walking distance. The Newtown Train Station was very handy, close, and made it simple to get into the city. The place was very comfortable and warming. I was surprised how nice the bathrooms/toilets were!! There was barely any waiting in line and the guest were mostly considerate of others and cleaned up after themselves in the bathrooms and kitchen area. I felt safe and comfortable especially on the first floor with the bars on the windows. Wifi work really well the whole time and if we needed anything (like fresh towels), we got it. I highly recommend staying here when visiting Sydney!! You won't regret it!!
Great big room and clean facilities. Really good locations near the trainstation. Easy self-check in and uncomplicated host. We enjoyed our stay.

Perfect Airbnb experience, with a host who knows exactly what her guests need.  I never met Miss D, but she gave specific instructions for arrival, and everything was in place and labelled, she had great recommendations to make any visit to Sydney comfortable. The room was beautiful. The house was quiet (I never saw anyone else). I would definitely stay again.
Chambre agréable dans un quartier sympa et animé de Sydney. Colocation très bien organisée avec de nombreux panneaux d'information. Cuisine tout équipée avec ustensiles pour cuisiner.

MissD provided us with instructions for self-check-in which was easy and clear. The house was clean, everything is labeled, and there are instructions on how to do lots of stuff. The location is top-notch with Newtown's train station and lots of cafés etc. just around the corner. Despite this, the neighborhood is extremely quiet. Only noise you may get is from the other guests if they're not being considerate. Communication with MissD was pleasant and fast. Everything went great and I would recommend staying here.
Great place for a short stay in Sydney. The fashion room is very spacious and confortable and the neighbourhood is just perfect with great restaurants and local environment.
Great room in a great location.  The room was spotless, as well as the other live spaces.  The host was very quick to respond and everything was very clear.  Had a great experience!

We had a fantastic time in Newtown it was exactly as described. The house was perfect for what we needed it was clean and quiet the only issue was the air-conditioning system did not seem to be working. However we did have a fan in our room so that was perfect. We would definitely recommend this Airbnb.
Very cozy room. 5 minutes walk to the train station and 3 minutes walk to bus stop. The King st is a perfect place for shopping. We had a good time here. Thank you Miss D.
Very comfortable, easy access, clean, great location - really vibrant part of the city, but leafy back street quiet. I'd definitely stay there again

Very pleasant stay. Excellent location being so close to restaurants, bars, and the Newtown train station. The Bed and Breakfast was spotlessly clean, had complimentary breakfast, and fast WiFi. My boyfriend and I loved the neighborhood and Mrs. D was extremely helpful with finding us parking for our van. I would highly recommend this place and would love to stay here again.
Perfect location in newtown! We had a great stay. We had an early check in so that was very Nice.
Comfortable room. Good amenities. Great location for Enmore theatre.
We had a wonderful stay at MissD's air BnB, the neighborhood was very quiet, the room was light and airy and all the facilities were perfect and as described!
挺不错的 去市中心就四站路左右 从住的地方去车站大约5-10分钟 住宿环境也很干净 物美价廉

We had a lovely stay in Sydney. We really enjoyed the room, it was really nice! Our door lock broke but she immediately fixed it. The neighbourhood was also really nice with lovely placed to have breakfast or dinner and really close to the train to the city. I would really recommend it!

The room was really nice and tidy, and so was the kitchen. It was super convenient to get to the city centre as the trains in Sydney are really frequent and fast! 
Things to improve: I would say the mattress on the floor (3rd bed) got pretty uncomfortable after the 3rd night - especially because the blanket was so thin. The toilet got a bit messy since it was a shared bathroom (but this was due to the fault of the other guests, not the host). 
Overall, however, it was a great stay! We had a lot of fun in Sydney, and the accommodation was good :)

The room was great, clean, airy and bright!  So close to Newtown, King St where there is so much to do.

The house is really nice and on a 'quiet' leafy street.  I experienced a little noise in the evening but not too bad considering proximity to a major city, suburb.

I'd be happy to stay there again.
Comfy and clean room with self checkin/checkout instructions. Close to Newtown train station.

We did not meet our host but she made entry into the apt easy. The neighborhood was excellent. A perfect location to access the city and plenty of stores/restaurants within walking of the apt. We were very surprised though about the accommodations in general. The room picture was very accurate and the room itself was very nice. However the apt was run more like a hostel than we expected. There were several other guests staying in various rooms and the bathroom, kitchen and living room had a very communal feel. I would bring shower shoes for the shower.
Such a great place, very central and so easy to take public transport from or get an Uber! Exactly what we expected. Great communications beforehand from hosts.
I'm really glad I choose Miss D's house. She is very organize and thoughtful, so I can just relax and enjoy holidays. Thank you for everything!
Our host was very helpful right from the get go. The home was very warm and welcoming. The amenities was great. It felt like staying at home away from home.

Devina was a very helpful and responsive host. Once i booked my accomodation, she contacted me directly asap. She was very detailed and we are able to locate the house quickly. The room was clean as shown in the photo. Thanks Devina!
This place was as described in the listing. Clean and comfy.

Parfait, quartier génial ! Chambre propre et spacieuse.
Bémol: 
Leger bruit de la rue
Toilettes dans salle de bain partagée

Overall, we have a pleasant stay. 
Convenient and easy to travel around in Sydney via buses and train. 
Near to Airport.
Well equipped kitchen.
This is a great location (very central) and the room was clean and tidy.
It was really a good choice. Clean, pleasant, good organisation... I hope to come back soon.
Awesome host and place that is very clean, comfortable and in a fantastic location. MissD was a fantastic and friendly host, and I'd definitely recommend staying with her.
Fantastic location and check in was easy as, no dramas
Great location, clean room and good communication from the host. Thanks!

MissD was a fantastic host with a lovely place conveniently close to the Sydney CBD. The Newtown neighborhood is actually a destination in and of itself. Lots of interesting places to explore including plenty of shops, pubs, and restaurants nearby. Station st. is a quaint and classic street with most of buildings from the late 1800's and early 1900's! The building and room are lovely! **Just note that there are actually 4 rooms in MissD's home each with a unique character. Mine was on the first level and featured a very clean & modern decor with high ceilings. There are two shared shower facilities and a communal kitchen. Public transport to the city via train is great and fast but if going to the airport, I found the taxi / Uber style service to be more convenient. I didn't get to meet the host until check-out but there was an easy self check-in/check-out method available! I am confident you will love staying here and certainly recommend the listing :D
great
房东人很好,帮我们解答各种问题｡厨房的大烤箱非常方便,从house附近的超市购买半成品pizza在用烤箱加工一下非常赞｡房子离Newtown火车站很近,到各个景点都很方便｡只是晚上有点吵,因为近飞机场｡
I like the neighborhood and the house is very comfortable to stay in. will definitely recommend my friends to stay in.

Miss D and her husband are very kind..If you have any problem them will help you with their best..Besides you can find a lot of nice restaurant in Newtown..and it is very convenient to catch a train to the city^^
Cute place. Super comfy bed... Not well lit at night if arriving late.
Great staying at Miss D, very clean bedroom and bathroom. Quiet neighbourhood with easy access into the city.
Great room and great facilities. Incredibly close to everything you need in Newtown and only a few minutes to the train station. House felt clean and secure. Thank you !

MissD's place was clean, comfortable and convenient. Pictures were accurate and the location was good; near the shops and near the train station. Newtown is also a fantastic neighbourhood to stay in. MissD gives her guests privacy and is also quick to respond to any queries. Overall a very pleasant stay!

O espaço era bom, mas o terceiro hospede dormiu num colchao no chao, nao havia cama. Nao havia lencol de cobrir para os hospedes. Na casa sao 4 quartos e 2 banheiros compartilhados, que sao limpos somente 2 vezes por semana, entao os banheiros nao estavam suficientemente limpos quando chegamos. E so foram limpos 3 dias depois.
Fantastic

Séjour très agréable dans cet appartement, aux portes de sydney.
La chambre était fidèle à la description, propre, de bonne qualité (literie ...).
L'ensemble de l'appartement est agréable, propre, les instructions pour les différents services sont très clairs.
Great value for what you pay!
only place I ever gave a bad review

The accommodation was in a quiet location close to everything in Newtown. It was more of a hostel than we expected as the other rooms of the town house were also rented out via Airbnb. As we did not spend any time in the house apart from sleeping at night and showering in the mornings we never really met any of the other people staying there. The only negative bit would be that my sister was sleeping on a mattress on the floor and there was no top sheet for her and only bare blankets and no doona. When we asked for a top sheet as it feels fresher miss d said: "why would you need that?". When we arrived to the accommodation there was also an unwashed plate in the kitchen, which we got a message about the next day implying that we had left it. As we never had any breakfast at the accommodation but went out to eat it could not have been us. We did not reply to that message though as we felt it had nothing to do with us, and maybe the guest which left the plate had cleaned up after him or herself. 
I am sorry if we came across as rude guests asking for the top sheet and not replying to the message about the plate. But for guests coming in the future: if there is dishes left by other people, maybe just do them for the sake of peace or tell miss d immediately, and if you are more than two people staying in one room, you can maybe bring a set of travel sheets for the one not sleeping in the bed.
We never met miss d and only communicated via this app. The house was clean and if you just need somewhere close to sleep it is a good place to stay.
Kind regards

The house is located in a great neighborhood with lots of places to eat around and just a short train ride from the touristic center. Kitchen and bathrooms were nice and spacious. The room looked just like in the photos, really nice and big enough for two suitcases and stuff. The window faces the street so it might be a bit too noisy  if u're very sensitive to that. MissD was very helpful with our questions although we never met her. The cleanliness of the bathrooms depends a lot on the other guests too. For us it could have been a bit better, but was ok. Value for money is great!
I was pretty satisfied with the effort the host took to ensure that I am comfortably settled down at the place
Excellent neighbourhood to live like a local and explore the city. Didn't get to meet Miss D but her communication was prompt and that's very important for a traveller.
Really comfy place.. We didnt get the chance to meet miss D though. Excellent bathroom, it was very near to the train station, not to mention alot of good restaurant around the area. Tq!

Was a lovely bedroom we stayed down stairs the room was spacious but the only downfall was we could hear every1s foot steps from upstairs. The Hosts were both really helpful to my early check in and check out. Both bathrooms were great, overall we would definitely stay here again

This is my first Airbnb experience.  The location of the room is excellent with everything you want in Newtown and Sydney at the door-step.  The room is comfortable and spacious.  The host is quick to communicate with the guests. However, the cleanliness of the house needs to be improved.  The bathroom was not cleaned during the entire stay unfortunately.  We ran out of toilet paper every second day.  This room is on the ground floor right by the stairs and also facing the street so it is quite noisy as the window is not fully sealed.  The listing was a little misleading as the host does not live in the house.

i stayed at MissD's place with 2 of my friends. we really love the place, the picture and the facilities are exactly the same as the description. We also thankful for MissD because we can contact her anytime and she will give fast response. The area where the house located is also very nice, so many restaurants and nice places and close to the bus stop and train station. Overall, it was a very enjoyable stay! Thank you MissD :D
I will suggest it!!! Definitely:)

Great neighborhood with lots of nice restaurants & cafes. Just a few train station from Central. The room was clean & big. Only 2 problems which were the dirty bathroom & smelly kitchen due to inconsiderate house mates. Miss D is a friendly & helpful host. She is contactable any any time.
Great inner city location with shops, transport and cafes handy.
Comfortable and peaceful:)
the appartement is very well located. the area was a bit noisy, but very close to train and bus station
I had a great stay. I felt safe and comfortable. Located on a beautiful, quiet street - it is easy to forget that King Street is only a minute away!

MissD's place was clean, convenient and a great place to stay! I'd highly recommend a stay here if you wish to travel to the city as it's really close by! There are lots of eateries around here too! MissD responds to messages promptly and was very helpful! Thanks for having us!:)
This was a very lovely place to stay. It was very comfortable, accessible and close to all amenities. Miss D was very accessible and helpful. Highly recommend to anyone!
About 5 mins walk from Newtown Stn and it's a nice, cozy place!
Really good location. Close to train station that and easy to go to the city.

Our stay here was absolutely amazing! After our original apartment ended up being horrific MissD was such a breath of fresh air. She responded quickly, and had her husband go and clean up for us, and he was there to greet us and give us the lay of the land. He was wonderful! 

These guys are suuuuuper organized!  They also have just about everything you could want, from shelf space (evenly divided by per room) to daily cereal & milk (that is replenished daily). Everything is neat and tidy, and the place truly is "chic" and has great design esthetic. 

The best part of all of this is the LOCATION! Not only is this city soooo cool and full of restaurants, bars, shops, etc. You're a 5 minute (or less)  walk to the train station and bus stops! All in all, I hiiiiiighly recommend this place! You won't regret it!

The location of the place is great for exploring Sydney. The kitchen and bathroom are quite worn in compared to the photos and were very dirty on check in. Throughout the stay there were cockroaches throughout the property even though the place had been cleaned.
great location in sydneys hipster area. close to bars and restaurants. feels a bit more like a hostel, with anonymous check in/out and almost no direct face to face contact.

Nice , tidy House , well located to the shops and the bus stop . 
Great room and good wifi ! 
Thanks for the stay !
house is clean and comfortable ,host always be warm welcome and friendly ｡New town is really a wonderful place to enjoy

Basic room but has a cool and calm feel to it. Plenty big enough, bed is comfy and enough power points. Wifi works well. Can be a little traffic about in the morning but nothing too bad. Bring a washer and thongs for bathroom and outside as there are more room rented. Can recommend. Great coffee shops close by and young henry's brewery in the street! Check it out!
We had a very good stay there, and also very easy for parking.
The room is pretty clean.The location is convenient as it is only a few minutes away from Newtown Station. It can get a bit noisy though due to planes and traffic.

This place is great for low budget travelers, however, you are essentially staying at a hostel. There is a shared bathroom, which is not that clean, along with shared amenities. The room itself was OK, but overall thought the price was a little steep for what you are getting. Location wise, it is great because you are right by the train. The bathroom was a bit dirty and on the last day there was no toilet paper.

Superb location down at Newtown. We stayed during mardi gras week; the vibe was cheerful; the neighbours were partying until the early hours on one of the nights. 

If you're looking for a no nonsense room in a great location, this place would be great.

2 bathrooms (one outdoors) spacious lounge and well equipped kitchen. Many shops and cafes nearby for you to try out.

A great place to stay for a weekend trip. Clean, comfortable and a great location, close to public transport, shops and restaurants. Miss D was a responsive and attentive host.

The only downside was that we were sharing the house with others and, as our room was near the front door, we heard everyone coming and going. But a minor downside to a great stay.
Location is brilliant!!!!! So close to everything. Direct train to airport so no hassle. Everything is as same as the pictures shown and the detailed description. Very nice experience there!!

Great location. Good sized room and bed. Bathrooms are good but could do with having a mop available to clear the floor after a house full of people have used them as the floor gets covered in water for the rest of the day. The cereal for breakfast in the mornings is great. Only gripe is that there was no laundry facilities available. All in all very pleasant.

We had a lovely stay as well as I experienced a little issue when I got locked out of my room and the key was in there. Miss D was very helpful and this issue could be resolved in no time. A great stay and very comfortable Would highly recommend this place!

Great location! In the middle of everything, so there is a little bit of noise but nothing too bad. Lots of cafes and restaurants all around plus the train just up the road. Miss D communicated everything well. The house as clean and taken care of.

Overall experience was below expectation. The photos were all modern and new looking, however, the house itself said it the other way.

Saw two cockroaches in the bathroom, floor full of hair (nasty!), loud noises at night (party and chit chat next door until 2am), overall cleanliness is about  a C-
Great location in the heart of Newtown....a great spot in Sydney. Lovely house. We shared with 5 other guests in the house but was easy to go in and out.
Very clean, nice area with lots of veggie/vegan affordable restaurants and close to the city centre
Nice house and great location.
Pretty much hostel accomodation. Room security minimum ... Lock flimsy ... had obviously been previously broken. Bed saggy, dusty dark room.
MissD's place is convenient with streets of food, pharmacies and a supermarket. She is a detailed and gracious host who provides more than just basic necessities. Highly recommended :)

El alojamiento esta muy Bien ubicado, muy cerca de la estación de tren , la zona de restaurantes y bares pero la casa es muy tranquila y puedes descansar. Todo estuvo acorde a lo ofrecido , la habitación muy limpia , comoda , baño compartido pero muy limpio así como la cocina. Viaje con mi esposo e hijo y fue buena experiencia Recomiendo al máximo a Miss D!!

It is a perfect place if you want to live near the city and the suburb is also full of cafes & Clubs. Everything was clean and tidy. The best part is it cheap as well. If you are looking for a place just to sleep for few days, this will be perfect.
非常好的一次住宿体验｡房间干净整洁,房主很友好,还贴心地准备了麦片和牛奶｡地理位置离市中心近,交通便利,周围king street 非常热闹,离超市､饭店､素食馆子都很近｡
交通很方便,房间也很干净,就是有点吵!
I enjoyed stay in miss D house. She is very considerable and very kind. :) Thank you
超棒的地理位置｡入住很便捷,房东也很Nice

Great location to base yourself when discovering lovely Newtown. Walking distance to all (cafes, bars, shops, train station) but still in the lovely residential side street.  Place is very clean and the host was prompt attending to all needs. Highly recommend this place.
Great front room with natural light and comfortable bed. Wonderful location. The place is set up for airbnb guests. The hosts accommodated a same day check in for me, for which I was grateful.
Location is convenient! Great gelato and cafes walking distance away, and near a train station. Easy access to the city too
.Appartement bien situé
交通比较方便,附近就是网红西瓜蛋糕,都挺好的就是一楼的房间有点潮湿｡
Not much more that you could ask for: great location, very clean, easy check-in, and comfortable!
Very good choice I made! So lovely!  Thanks a lot!
Nice large well decorated room in a very convenient location just a moments walk from Newtown’s main high street.
房東很親切. 地點方便, 鄰近有很多小商店及餐廳, 近火車站
房子位置很好,几分钟步行即是火车站,去city很方便｡房东人很nice,沟通及时｡House里四个房间均为airbnb房源,人比较多,起居洗漱等不是很方便｡没有洗衣机,对于需要换洗需求的旅客不是很方便｡也没有微波炉,略有不便｡我们的房间甲醛味道非常明显,不是很让人愉悦｡总体来讲,性价比较低,不十分推荐｡
便利で気軽く都心へ行けます｡隣店多く並んでにぎやかです｡部屋もきれいだし､他のｹﾞｽﾄと交流できます｡
Fantastic location; close to shops, restaurants, cafes and bars. Love the vibe and atmosphere in Newtown. The train station is also super convenient and 2 stops away from CBD!
This house is perfectly located, immaculate and easy to live in.  I will 100% be staying here again on my next trip home to Newtown.

Wir haben zwei Nächte bei MissD verbracht. Die Lage war super, Newtown ist sehr hip, mit vielen Cafés, Restaurants, kleinen Läden, fernab von den Touristenströmen. MissD war eine grossartige Gastgeberin, die Kommunikation war reibungslos und wir konnten sogar früher einchecken, was wir nach einer 30-stündigen Reise sehr schätzten! Wir empfehlen dieses Airbnb sehr!
We had a very good stay here! Clean room, felt like a hotel. Also the communication was good, miss D did everything to make our stay comfortable.

MissD's place is really clean and cosy. Fantastic location in cool Newtown with plenty of bars and restaurants on offer. Super easy to access and MissD was clear with instructions upon arrival. We had everything we needed so didn't need to follow up on anything during our stay. We were sharing with three other guest rooms but the house was cleaned regularly and guests were respectful of each other. Great value and would highly recommend for a stay in Sydney!
Great place and location! An excellent host and very responsive to questions. Will return for sure! Fully recommended! Thank you for having us!!!
Apartment located near the train and several restaurants. It is clean and well equipped.
交通便利 房間乾淨
Perfect

This is my first journey with Airbnb, and it is a happy one. Thanks for Miss D’ s hosting. Her lovely house is near Mary’s, black star pastry and Hakiki Turkish ice cream, which you don’t want to miss them. Few minutes walk to new tow station and king st.

Our stay was good, close to cafes and train. Big room, 2 bathrooms to share with other guest in the house. A bit noisy in the evening and night as a room a right above it and it's very  sensitive. Early check in was possible. Otherwise I can recommend the room.

My friend and I loved staying at MissD’s townhouse for a few nights! It was a lovely house in a perfect location - a short walk to the train station and to the bars and pubs of Newtown. Easy access to everywhere in Sydney. It was the perfect spot to spend a few nights when catching up with friends.
Great location in the heart of Newtown, definitely recommend to check it out.
Highly recommend MissD's place. My stay was incredibly enjoyable with no drama or confusion. Hands down the most comfortable AirBnB bed I've ever slept in.
Best Airbnb I have stayed in in Sydney! Will stay again
MissD’s place was clean and spacious and well organised. While she was not there herself she was very responsive. It is well located being easy to walk to King Street. A fun and lively area.
离火车站确实近,两条街的距离,公交车也很方便就在马路对面｡整个区都比较安静,就是每天早上和晚上飞机经过声音比较大,因为离机场不远在飞机起降的航路上｡房间干净卫生,厨房设置也很齐全,房东会为客人准备免费的牛奶｡入住及退房都是自助形式很完美｡以后有机会去还会选择这里｡

Highly recommended place. Definitely, it's a good spot in town. Everything is well arranged and we were pretty happy with cleanliness. Special thanks to MissD and her hubby for hospitality and cozy place.
Great location and lovely room

Had such a lovely stay.  Location is very near cafes and newtown station,  about 5mins walk, 
very near the bus stop - 2mins walk .  Ms. D is very responsive with quiries.  Thank you!

Such a beautiful place to stay! Close to public transport(walking distance to train station), airport, and nearby cafe/restaurants. Perfect place for foodie. The area reminds me of Chapel Street in Melbourne . Very clear instructions in the house, numbers of goodfood guide book to go for meals.
The room downstairs that I stayed gets the noise from upstairs, but everything else is great!

Great Airbnb! Super close to transit and very easy to get to the CBD within 15-20 mins! The room was clean and great value for money. Only honest complaint would be the house is a lot older than I expected and because of this you could hear every time someone walked and talked upstairs or went to the bathroom. This being said it wasn’t a problem and wouldn’t stop me from staying here again, I would definitely recommend it!
Great spot. Lovely room. Thank you!
Newtown附近不错的排屋｡
Good Value for money, In a nice location for exploring.
If you don't mind a freezing cold house and lots of noise throughout the night, the place might b suitable. Nice location and very convenient... but overpriced.

MissD’s place is clean, convenient and comfortable. The check-in system is hassle free and gives you the flexibility to check in at anytime. There is cereal and milk for breakfast along with various beverages and condiments such as sugar, coffee, tea etc.
The room also has a heater in case it gets too cold. The bedding was clean and hygienic. And professional cleaners clean the common spaces pretty frequently.
Location is just a stone’s throw away from Enmore road and the bus stop is just 5 minutes away.
All in all, it’s GREAT value for money. I’d definitely come back again if I’m ever in Sydney. :)
Good value, comfortable accommodation.  Some aircraft noise at night but bearable. Take own extras to go with cereal if wanted. Handy to rail station and wide range of shops.

Miss D is an amazing and wonderful host ever. 

Her instructions were clear and we managed to check in easily as per her instructions. It’s a small cottage style house with a friendly ambience in Sydney. The metro is near- just 5 mins of walking distance. You can use the metro to go anywhere to the city. Cabs are abundant in the area as well. We didn’t expect the place to be full of love and we met many friendly house mates there.  It exceeds our expectations. 

The bathroom and lounge area is indeed lovely. We had friendly chit chat with some of our housemates. Coffee, towel, tea, mugs and most amenities were provided. We had a heater in the room to keep ourselves warm. Overall, we love her place and would come back again next time. I would rate her place 10/10. 

I would recommend people staying at her cosy place anytime. Next time you are coming to Malaysia, please do visit us miss D. Thank you for hosting us. You are amazing.

Prime location in the middle of an funky hipster neighborhood. Great shops, cafe, restaurants, bar, weekend flea markets, train station, etc., within 5mins from the house. The room is neat, tidy and lovely but expect to hear noises and footsteps from the upper floor if you book room downstairs.
The house is amazing. Miss D is so nice. And it is closed to the bus station and the train station. Good experience in Sydney.Thank you.
Good location, nice house, shared space so bit noisy
房東太太人很好,很照顧房客,讓我們提前寄放行李,非常感謝!地點真的很棒!廁所廚房都很乾淨,房間也很整潔!唯獨隔音不太好,會聽到樓上走路的腳步聲｡

It's a good place at great hipster-ish neighborhood for a decent price. The whole vibe it gives out is much like communal youth apartment so if you're into that, you'll like the place. There were some cleanliness issues with bugs but it was generally okay. As far as the room goes you get what you see in the picture. :)
P.S. The complimentary breakfast (cereal) is quite good and a nice addition.

Communication was easy - Self check-in went smoothly; host sent out clear description on what to do upon arrival. Location was fantastic - multiple public transport options (train & bus), ~5mins walking to Newtown train station, many restaurants & cafes in the area - most open until late hours. The room was also spacious. Breakfast was provided. Host kindly accommodated my request for late check out. The only drawback was that the floor made noises when people walked, so it could be a bit noisy if your room was downstairs. Otherwise, it was a very pleasant stay! Truly enjoyed my stay there!
Wonderful location and responsive hosts!!
Great spot, huge room with comfortable bed. Stone's throw from everything you need in Newtown
good:)

The place was exactly as described. Large front room with heaps of natural light. Fantastic location. Although it's a room in a house with other travellers, it was so quiet I felt like I was there alone. Recommended for a stay in a great neighbourhood of Sydney.
Very nice, good place, close to the station, recommended

We had the room located at the ground floor with enough space for all our 3 luggage. The place is clean and the owner comes pretty much everyday and refills whatever needs to be like soap toilet paper etc... My girlfriend felt bad by the time of our arrival and he managed to let us in earlier than check in time. Really appreciated it! Thanks for a nice stay.

MissD's house is very central in Newtown with good access to public transportation, restaurants and cafes. The house has a lot of character and our room was beautifully decorated. Basic breakfast was provided and we enjoyed having access to a well-stocked kitchen where we could interact with the other guests. We were in the downstairs bedroom and you did hear a bit of noise from upstairs and the front door. But we knew that in advance so it wasn't a problem. 

Street parking is usually 2hrs, however there are some streets in the area with no restrictions.

Overall very good value, a great place to stay in Sydney and we recommend MissD's house.
This place is clean, quiet, and super close to the Newtown station. So much to do and try in that area!!
Perfect location, perfect host, recommend highly.  Thanks MissD, we loved it.

Fantastic location, great place just around the corner from King St. Very clean, 2 bathrooms which helps with a house full of travelers, good kitchen facilities although no microwave and no TV in the lounge but great WiFi. Downstairs front bedroom was lovely with a beautiful fireplace, hairdryer, mirror and lots of nice touches such as plants and ornaments. All bedrooms are lockable.

The communication with MissD is easy and clear. We did not actually meet her, but everything was self-explanatory - if you read and follow the advice that is laying in your room, all your questions will be answered. The room and the bathroom were very clean and everything that you expect from an AirBnB is provided. The location is also a plus, Newtown is an interesting, alive town with a lot to see and it is also close to the city center. 
The only thing that was not perfect is that the house seems to have thin walls and you can hear almost everything that is happening above or next to you, but that’s just the architecture of the house. 
I would definitely recommend MissD‘s place.

Great spot in the heart of Newtown! Everything at your fingertips! Place was spotless and rooms were spacious. 
The hosts were very hospitable.
Definitely recommend!

name: Istanbul Pera, Room for 3 (702)
summary: Tresuites Istanbul, located at the heart of historical Pera district,is just 150m to famous Istiklal Street and Metro Sta. It consists of 3 suites, with distinctive design and elegant decoration at a second floor of a 118 year old historical building
space: This room is preferred by our guests who are 2 or 3 people, this family friendly room is perfect for families to stay with their kids. This room has two seperate room, which one has a double bed, and the other has a single bed in.
description: Tresuites Istanbul, located at the heart of historical Pera district,is just 150m to famous Istiklal Street and Metro Sta. It consists of 3 suites, with distinctive design and elegant decoration at a second floor of a 118 year old historical building This room is preferred by our guests who are 2 or 3 people, this family friendly room is perfect for families to stay with their kids. This room has two seperate room, which one has a double bed, and the other has a single bed in. The amentities of the room include;  a Mini-bar  Wifi  TV with local and international satellite  Safe box  Air condition and heater  Hairdryer. ** Inroom Private Bathroom with Shower ** Room Cleaning is available.(which include vacuuming the floors and cleaning the bathroom)  Clean linens and and towels as you request from the cleaners. notes: Luggage Safety is available.

host.host_about:
I am a Financial and an tax advisor, lived in the Usa for over 9 years. moved back to Turkey couple years ago. 
My motto, while you stay at my place to have a perfect time, and enjoy İstanbul without any hassle.

reviews.comments: The room is very nice and looks like on the picture. Near metro station şişhane and galata kulesi. In room there are all what you need-fridge,air condition,tv,big double bed.Bathroom is big and comfortable. Ozgur is kind and pleasant owner. I recommend this room.

There is very central, comfortable and silence place, near to tube station. There is also so close to istiklal street, and Galata tower. 

Özgür and Sabrina are very kindly and helpfull friends. 

There was clean, safety and very usefull room. Kitchen, laundry machine, tv, wi-fi and every other option was great. 

İts best choise to stay in istanbul, beyoglu area.

name: Loft Miro
summary: A luxury loft for 6 guests by Plaza España.
space: Our Loft Arenas is the ideal apartment for travelers who wish to stay in a luxury apartment. The space has been completely designed, providing maximum comfort during your stay in Barcelona. The sweet tones in the decoration, the furniture, consisting of a mix of contemporary and traditional, create a unique, warm and discreet atmosphere. The large bright living room, consists in a sitting - dining room with double sofa bed, plasma TV and of course a table for six. From this room you have access to a private terrace for relaxing moments after a day of sightseeing in the streets of the city. The open space kitchen, ultra-modern, is fully equipped, you will find the necessary items to cook and enjoy meals, cocktails, during your stay. Our loft has two bedrooms, one with queen size bed, the other with 2 single beds you can join to make a queen size bed. There is also two bathrooms, one bathroom with bath, the other one with shower, ideal for a stay for 6 people. Finally, the apartment has
