The space has been completely designed, providing maximum comfort during your stay in Barcelona. The sweet tones in the decoration, the furniture, consisting of a mix of contemporary and traditional, create a unique, warm and discreet atmosphere. The large bright living room, consists in a sitting - dining room with double sofa bed, plasma TV and of course a table for six. From this room you have access to a private terrace for relaxing moments after a day of sightseeing in the streets of the city. The open space kitchen, ultra-modern, is fully equipped, you will find the necessary items to cook and enjoy meals, cocktails, during your stay. Our loft has two bedrooms, one with queen size bed, the other with 2 single beds you can join to make a queen size bed. There is also two bathrooms, one bathroom with bath, the other one with shower, ideal for a st
neighborhood_overview: Plaza España neighborhood is an ideal area in Barcelona for several reasons. First, you are in a dynamic area with a mall next door and at the bottom of Montjuic hill with one of the largest museums in Barcelona. You can enjoy the show of the magic fountains very close to the apartment, an activity you don't want to miss during your stay in Barcelona. If you come for business, you are right next to the Fira who organizes some of the most important congresses in Europe. Finally, the area is well served by public transport, Aerobus, Metro lines, 4 stations from Plaza Cataluña, 3 from Las Ramblas.
notes: Minimum age 25 years if it is not copy of ID or passport of all guests is requested upon arrival, it does not apply to families. Please respect the neighbours. Check-in regular time between 13h00 and 20h00 , after 20h00 you will have a 30€ extra for late arrival, after midnight 50€, after 1hAM it is 10€ more per extra hour. Sunday and bank holiday check-in have an extra of 30€.  Early check-in before 13h, if available, requires extra 20€.  Late check-out can be possible for 30€ more until 17h00, please check that on arrival with your contact. Barcelona city tax not included: 2.48€ per night per person.
transit: Subway L1-3 España
access: Access to the whole apartment.
interaction: The travelers have an emergency phone number 24h/24h if it's necessary.
house_rules: Check-in regular time between 13h00 and 20h00 , after 20h00 you will have a 30€ extra for late arrival, after 23h it is 40€ , after midnight 50€, after  1hAM it is 10€ more per extra hour. Sunday and bank holiday check-in have an extra of 30€.  Early check-in before 13h, if available, requires extra 20€.  Late check-out can be possible for 30€ more until 17h00, please check that on arrival with your contact. Barcelona city tax not included: 2.48€ per night per person.

host.host_about:
Hello Everyone
We are very please to welcome you in one of our apartments in the amazing and wonderful Barcelona.
After working many years as sales director and account manager in a travel agency we decided to manage our own apartments and take care of our own guests. We really appreciate this new life.
We hope you will enjoy your stay in one of our apartments, selected carefully for you...

Bonjour à tous
Nous sommes très heureux de vous accueillir dans l'un de nos appartements au coeur de cette magnifique ville qu'est Barcelone. Après avoir travaillés pendant plusieurs années comme directeur des ventes et account manager dans une agence de voyages spécialisées sur internet, Nous avons décidé de gérer nos propres appartements afin de faire profiter de Barcelone à nos hôtes en direct. C'est vraiment plus agréable et nous ne regrettons pas un instant ce choix de vie. Nous espèrons que vous profiterez pleinement de votre séjour dans l'un de ces appartements rigoureusement sélectionné pour vous.

Hola
Estamos encantados de recibirles en unos de nuestros apartamentos en esta increíble ciudad , Barcelona. Después de trabajar años como director en una agencia de viajes online y como account manager, decidímos lanzarnos y gestionar nuestros propios apartamentos. No hay un día que nos arrepentimos de haberlo hecho. Estamos muy contentos de atender nuestros propios huéspedes en estos apartamentos seleccionados para su estancia. Esperamos que disfruten de Barcelona desde unos de estos modernos y cómodos apartamentos.

Un abrazo a todos
A bientôt
Cheers

reviews.comments: I stayed at Loft Miro with my 6-year old daughter.  We absolutely loved our stay.  My top requirement, which was that the place was clean, was fully met.  It is a very modern and new apartment.  The furniture is good quality so the beds and the couch were very comfortable.  I liked the fact that it has both a bath and a shower so I was able to give my daughter bubble baths upstairs and I took my showers downstairs.  The WiFi was fast and the heating worked well (the temperature dropped in the evenings so this was handy).  The place was decorated tastefully and was very tranquil, just as described.  The location is also perfect.  It is located just a 5 minute walk away from the Plaza Espana, where there is a modern shopping centre with good restaurants.  It is close to 2 different subway lines (one just a block away and the other at the Plaza Espana), so there are plenty of options for getting around.  The train station is also close by.  There is a big park 1 minute away, which is great if you have children.  And there is a supermarket, a good bakery/cafe, a 24-hour pharmacy and a little grocery shop open evenings and Sundays - all nearby.  One thing that you cannot tell from the pictures or the description is where the apartment is located.  It is on the ground floor, in a private area (almost like a courtyard) behind an apartment building.  To get to it, you enter the building and then take a private, secured corridor behind the lift.  There is only one other apartment in this private area and no apartments above, so it is extremely quiet, which is refreshing after a day of being in a big, noisy city.  The only thing I recommend is that guests ask to be shown how to lock and unlock the doors to the apartment and the private corridor, as they can be a bit tricky.  They are very secure but you just need to know the trick.  Overall, the apartment was just perfect.  I would definitely stay again.

The welcome person, Ivan, was super friendly. The apartment is beautiful even better than the photos. Is well located in a quiet neighborhood …. definitely we will come back.
thank you.
Nice place, matched our expectations in every respect. Ivan, welcomed us warmly and sorted out everything for us. We'll be back here...

My friends and I stayed in Loft Miro for two nights in May 2015. The host, Ivan, met with us at the loft with the warmest welcome. He showed us around the loft and explained how everything worked (keys, wifi, bins, etc.), and also gave us loads of recommendations for nearby restaurants, bars and places to see. The location of the loft was just excellent. It was literally a two-minute walk from the metro station Tarragona, and about ten-minute walk from the train station.  There were several cafes, grocery stores and 24-hour pharmacy nearby. The photos here on Airbnb have shown exactly what the loft looked like. It was an independent loft on the ground floor behind a big residential building, so it was super quiet both day and night during our stay. The loft and facilities inside were in great conditions, and the beddings and towels are nice and clean.

La verdad que el piso esta genial y se ajusto a nuestras necesidades. 
La etencion con la persona responsable tambien fue muy correcta.

Alain met us at the apartment; very friendly and knowledgeable, even helped us with a problem with the taxi driver we rode with from the airport. 
The apartment was clean, attractively decorated, with everything working. Had 2 nice sized bathrooms which was very helpful for us as we were traveling with our 2 boys (12 and 15). 
The one minor problem we had was taken care of promptly and efficiently while we were out sightseeing, 
The neighborhood was interesting - while not in the center of things, it was not in a tourist saturated neighborhood, and it was very near a central transportation hub and one of the city's best shopping malls. We had breakfast every morning at the same charming neighborhood cafe  and after the second or third day, we were treated like regulars.

All in all, we had a great time and would stay at Loft Miro again.

I believe we were met by one of the host's agents. His name escapes me but he was extremely friendly and welcoming. He answered all of our questions and offered to help us in any way possible i.e. calling a taxi for the airport and translating conversations with locals over the phone if need be. He could not have been better or nicer. The apartment was true to the pictures posted. It was very nice and clean. It has a fantastic location just about 5-10 minute walk away from the metro. Would definitely recommend anyone to stay here.

Nous avons séjourné au loft miro du 10 au 18 juillet 2015.Très bien accueillisi par yvan.
Le loft est exactement conforme aux photos, confortable, moderne, fonctionnel -les salles de bain et cuisine sont modernes et impeccables bonne literie,  climatisé,très propre et surtout très calme.Seul bémol, pas de vue, mais un luxe à barcelone, très calme     !
A proximité de 2 stations de métro: sants et tarragone, très pratique  et à 5 mn des "arènes":centre commercial sur plusieurs étages ,avec un grand choix de restaurants à la terrasse au dernier étage et une vue panoramique sur la ville et les jeux d'eaux des fontaines , superbe.
En résumé , un séjour très agréable que nous recommandons

The loft is as pictured. A chic place to set up your home base as you venture the city. It is in a very convenient location. Also close to the aerobus. Alain was awesome and gave me some great recommendations and even made sure I was able to unlock the door!

The neighbourhood was nice and safe. It is close to restaurants and a shoppingcentre. The metro is around the corner. However it's not really in the centre of Barcelona, you always have to take the metro.The apartment was great. Everything was clean and it was well equipped. The WIFI worked very well. The contactperson was very kind, he explained us how Barcelona works en and he gave tips where it was expensive and where not. The apartment is perfect for four people, but for five it's rather small. There were plenty of cupboards for your clothes. I would certainly recommend this apartment to other people.

The loft is exactly as pictured, it was bright and spacious enough for me and two of my friends. The place was clean and prepared for our arrival. We were met by one of the agents who made sure to give us all the information we needed, as well as great advice and help on cool things to do around the city. Any help we needed as well as any concerns were easily and quickly managed! The location was great too. Very close to Las Arenas mall and Montjuic, while transportation to the other main spots were quite easy.  It was a great home base for us and we're definitely looking forward to being back.
Apartment was very beautiful and was very accommodating for 6 people. Diego gave us some great tips and was very helpful upon our arrival to Barcelona. I would definitely recommend staying here.

We enjoyed staying at Alain and Sylie's. We were greeted by Diego and another agent. They arrived very quickly after our phone call and gave us a detailed tour of the apartment, including information on local attractions, maps, etc. They answered some tourist questions we had.
My husband is very tall (over 6ft) and struggled a bit with the ceiling height up in the loft. We ended up not using the upstairs shower, as the ceiling was quite low. This wasn't a problem, though, as the shower downstairs was just fine.
We did run out of hot water one day, but I think that was because my daughter was washing her hair! The tank is in a cupboard on the deck, so it is easy to check the thermometer to see when it is hot again. :)
I really appreciated the washer/dryer and the clothes drying rack. Keeping on top of the washing is a priority when taking an extended trip with children.
The building felt safe and secure. We didn't see another tenant, but we did chat with someone from the cafe next door and they were very friendly and helpful. We heard some music each night around dinner time. Perhaps it was the dance studio next door?? But the music was never played too late.
The loft is in a great location, near Sants station, the old bullfighting ring that has been turned into a mall, the Montjuic fountain. I recommend walking to the top of the stairs at Placa de les Cascades for the amazing view.

The apartment was exactly as shown in pictures
Good location. Very close to subway.
The only minus is that amount of hot water is limited. We were 6 people and had to shower quickly :)
Otherwise no complaints

Ottima accoglienza di referenti dei proprietari. Hanno fornito informazioni su luoghi principali e consigli utili per il soggiorno.
L'appartamento è esattamente come le foto, al piano terra nel retro di un palazzo. La posizione è comoda per poter accedere a tutta la città.  Piazza di Spagna è a due passi e Parc Mirò proprio alla, uscita dal palazzo. Quartiere tranquillo e Piazza di Spagna offre molti posti per cenare.
Appartamento ottimamente fornito per il soggiorno.
Great place in a nice, convenient part of Barcelona.  Appreciated the quick response of the owners.  Highly recommend!
Wonderful appartement very well located.

Very close to the train station,10 minutes walking to the the loft which is behind a apartment building, but really easy to find. Two young guys welcomed us and took their patients to teach us how to open the door. Once you learned the skill you will find it's not like the other tenants said that tricky. 

The interior is quite new , clean and in a modern style. We pretty much like the furniture and painting colour. The pillow and quilts are really comfortable. Only the upstairs bathroom is a little small for a man, and since it's a loft the sound-proof is a bit weak. 
 
If you just need a good location and reasonable price its definitely a good choice.
A really Nice place with good service! All was perfect :)

El loft es tal y como se muestra en  las imágenes. Está bien situado. Una boca de metro justo al lado.Es acogedor a la vez que moderno. Está muy bien decorado. Las camas son muy cómodas y los 2 baños muy bien. En general está limpio y ordenado. La cocina es pequeña, pero para hacer desayunos o algo rápido es suficiente. La wifi funciona bien.
El único problema que tuvimos es que había quedado con Alain en que el dia de ida nos marchábamos a las 3 de la tarde, y el mismo dia de ida a las 7 de la mañana recibimos un mensaje de que teníamos que dejar el apartamento a las 11.30 horas. Esto nos causó un gran perjuicio ya que nos trastocó todos los planes del último día. Deberían haber avisado antes.
En general recomendable para una visita  a la ciudad.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Magnífico loft. Tal y como se ve en las fotos. Moderno y acogedor.Nada de ruidos. Cerca de transporte público. Repetiría

The apartment was really nice and modern, beds were pretty comfortable but the couch was a little stiff and not suitable seating for 4 people to watch the TV together if they wanted to. But overall it was great! Ivan was super friendly and helpful, would definitely recommend!

We like the apartment, Santiago was very helpful, gave us information, on how to get around in Barcelona. Train station is near the apartment walking distance  restaurants, supermarkets. But we had one inconvenience  the light brakers went down and most of the house didn't had no electricity for couple of hours, until Santiago, send someone to fix it.
The place was very comfortable and Ivan was very helpful when we had a brief power outage.

We had an amazing stay at Loft Miro. The host was extremely accommodating and helpful and answered any questions that we had. Close to  the metro which was really convenient and lots of places to explore in the area. Already recommended to our friends :)

Die Kommunikation mit den Gastgebern, sowie die Schlüsselübergabe hat problemlos geklappt. Die Unterkunft sieht so wie auf den Fotos aus und bietet jeglichen Konform. Einziges Manko: im Hauptraum (und somit auch im oberen Schlafzimmer) gibt es keine Heizung, kann bei kälteren Wetter etwas ungemühtlicher werden. Allerdings gibt es einen kleinen portablen Heizstrahler in der Wohnung den man im Notfall dafür verwenden kann.

We loved our stay at Loft Miro! Perfect accommodations, idyllic patio for wine, and a perfect home base for sightseeing. We felt totally immersed within the culture by living in Lana and Alain's beautiful neighborhood!
The flat is located very good. The host was organized and everything went well, when we got the keys. Thank's to Lana&Alain!

Sehr schöne und moderne  Wohnung. Alles war sehr sauber und gut organisiert. 
Mit den Vermieter hat alles reibungslos geklappt. 
Kann man nur weiter empfehlen.

We were welcomed at the door and the host was very friendly. He gave us many great suggestions as to what we should do while in Barcelona. The apartment was just as pictured and very clean. we thoroughly enjoyed our time here and would definitely stay again. The neighborhood seemed to be a great representation as to what local life is like in the city. Great cafes and restaurants near by.

This is a beautiful clean unit that is exactly as pictured.  It is a little bit of a walk from the city center / ramblas area, but we like to walk and walked everywhere.  The host was very helpful and communication with them was easy and great.  The host also arranged our early morning cab pickup to the airport which was very helpful.  The listing does say that the unit has a washer/dryer, and I did not see one.  Maybe there is one in the building...I did not check, but I did not see one in the unit itself.

Me and my friends stayed at this apartment for 3 nights and had a great time. It's a great apartment, nice neighbourhood and located close to a train station so easy to get around the city. Has everything you need and they were very helpful.
Lana & Alain are awesome hosts with awesome apartment to stay in Barcelona. We love the apartment and the location is convenient.

I booked last minute (2 days before) and was so happy a place of this standard was available. Tony very quickly got in contact to arrange meeting us at the flat, and even though he fell off his bike on the way to us he made sure he got to us as quickly as he could! The flat was exactly like it looked in the photos, a perfect modern place for a long weekend away!
Hermoso departamento, muy bien ubicado. Todas las personas dispuestas a ayudar. Recomendable
Excelente!!

Great apartment - the space is well utilised, so it worked well for a family of five. The place was clean and nicely decorated. The location is also a bonus - as it is a very short walk from the metro. Our host was helpful - both upon arrival and when we took off. Much prefer this to a hotel room - when travelling with children.

Très bel appartement, conforme aux photos du site.
Quartier calme et agréable proche du musée national d'art, du village espagnol, de la fondation Miro et du Montjuïc. (possibilité de faire tout cela à pieds).
Il y a également 2 stations de métro proche de l'appartement donc, pas de problème pour se déplacer. Nous avons tout fait à pieds et en métro!
Bon accueil et bonne réactivité dans les communications (mail, sms...) 
Je recommande cette appartement avec plaisir, nous avons passé 5 jours à 6 personnes. 
Il y a aussi un parking souterrain pour garer la voiture à proximité ( nous avons payé 50€ pour les 5 jours pendant le mois de juillet !)
Great place for 6 people, easy to get around, metro is close by. some things in the apartment didn't work well, but nothing that ruined our stay.

Ivan, il loro agente ci ha accolto molto bene, spiegandoci tutto dell'appartamento e dandoci indicazioni su come raggiungere il centro e altri punti di interesse. l appartamento è bello così come lo si vede in foto, siamo stati in 5 e avere due bagni è stato davvero molto comodo! Tutto pulito e pronto all'arrivo, con asciugamani già piegati sui letti, sembrava di essere in hotel! Lo consiglio molto!

Very nice stay at Miro' Loft. The place was nice and very clean. From there it's easy to reach the heart of the city. The agent came late to the check-in as he was busy with other customers, but didn't charge us for the late check-in. Much appreciated as we arrived ourself after 21h.
really cozy house ever!! very much kind host and all the appliances are perfect!!

Excelente, cumple a cabalidad con lo mostrado en las fotos y lo esperado.
El departamento está ubicado en un lugar tranquilo y muy cerca de Plaza España y Montjuic
Volvería sin dudarlo

Lana&Alain's apartment is very comfortable, Plaza Espanya and metro station are nearby by 8 min walking.
The rooms and decoration are nice, we had a joyful experience.
Yes welcome

Modern apartment in a quiet neighbourhood and yet close to key public transport nodes e.g. Barcelona Sants station, and Metro stations.  Also near to La Arenas - one of the larger modern shopping malls in Barcelona with a very well stocked supermarket.  Highly recommended for a family visit.

This is a lovely apartment centrally located with easy access to transport and historical sites. We enjoyed our stay here and the welcome accorded by the host helped us adapt to the apartment and the city of Barcelona.

Tudo foi bom. O único senão foi a água quente dos chuveiros. Super pontuais na chegada , ajudando inclusive com táxi . Local super limpo e espaçoso . Localização muito boa . Não é colado as principais atrações , mas é perto. Alem disto,  e muito importante , metrô pertissimo.  Silencioso e com boas opções para jantar perto.

La casa è molto accogliente, la zona in cui si trova è comoda vicino alla metro e a qualsiasi zona interessata. 
l'appartamento è fornito di qualsiasi comfort, ci siamo trovati benissimo, la consiglio assolutamente.

Everything of the apartment is same as the pictures, and the best thing is the location.  Its near Barcelona Sants, it is much easy for the traveller who came from other cities by train.  You can easy to find the apartment from the Sants station.  And it have supermarket & convenience store just downstair, you can easy to buy drinks & food. This aparment is really a good choice when you are in Barcelona.

This is a very good place to stay , I come to Barcelona with my family, 3 old ladies and 3 young teenaged. The location is really good, easy to get to great tourist place, and only 5 mins to metro station! 10/15 mins to train station, 15/20 to airport !! The house is very clean; with all the stuff we need for cooking, we cook four times !! Very nice place to stay . The only one thing to pick is the air circulation, but that might because of  we, as Asian, don't get used to warmer . They are very helpful and friendly !Overall , I really recommend this is the best place to stay in Barcelona !
非常好,设施很齐全,位置也很好,

Excelente apartamento, muy bien ubicado, cerca al metro, Lana & Alain siempre fueron muy amables. Sugiero que pregunten si hay una persona que haga aseo al apartamento si es que es de su interés, yo no lo hice.

Appartement bien situé et calme.
Accueil très bien organisé.

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour a Barcelone grâce a l'accueil parfait de Lana&Alain.
Le loft est spacieux, bien équipé, très propre et tout a fait conforme a la description.
Situé dans un quartier calme mais proche du centre, l'emplacement est idéal !
Merci beaucoup, nous n'hésiterons pas à revenir!

Very nice stay, convenient to go anywhere, close to metro station. Nice decoration and very clean, my kid kept talking about the wonderful stay in Barcelona. Lana & Alain helped to arrange the taxi to airport and introduced many good restaurant and travel guide, so helpful. Thank you for the good memories in Barcelona.

Bing
An amazing loft, in a central location, great for a group of young people! Excellent hosts!

Excelente opção em Barcelona. Loft bem localizado, ao lado da estação Tarragona (metro linha 3). Próximo a um supermercado (condis) e a um centro comercial (arenas shopping). Apartamento silencioso, limpo e funcional. Ideal para quatro pessoas, inclusive com crianças. Cozinha bem equipada, máquina de lavar roupa e louça. Pátio ideal para jantar romântico e toda infraestrutura de TV a cabo e Wi-Fi. Sensacional!!!!
Very responsive owners/staff.  Of our four vacation rentals this trip, they were the best.  Note the loft has a sloped ceiling , making it more difficult for taller guests.
Excellent hosts

The apartment is same as the pictures, great location and easy to access transport. (very short walk from the metro). We enjoyed our stay here.
The only thing to pick is the neighbor's loud party and quiet a lot of tiny black ants on the floor. :(

Except for the neighbor's loud party, we really enjoyed our stay.  Great location and walked everywhere.  We did not use air conditioning, opened windows in evenings and it was nice.  Bedding was a bit heavy for this time of year, but we came from Alaska so our temperature settings may be different.  The bakery around the corner (left out door, left at corner, immediate left) was really amazing.  Looks like several self improvement jobs were done, but nothing that makes any difference unless you are a perfectionist.  We would definitely stay here again.  We arrived earlier than planned and they were able to accommodate us - Thank you!
loft结构的室内空间､非常干净､交通很方便｡

Lana & Alain's apartment is absolutely beautiful!! I was very happy with the cleanliness. We was provided with everything we neeeded. The location is perfect and close to everywhere you possibly would want to visit in Barca. The host was polite, friendly and very helpful. Gave us all the info we needed for a first visit. definitely would recommend this apartment!!!!


Mel x
房子很新,很整洁,只是loft结构会导致楼上那间房没有门,不是特别隔音,但附近吃,出行都很方便｡房东人非常有耐心,很友好,而且很帅

This place was absolutely lovely.  My family and truly felt at home. I would recommend this place to anyone that wants to be close to almost everything and far enough to get some peace and quiet at the end of the day.
The check in was easy and convenient, and the stay was pleasant. I would stay in this aprtment again if I revisited the neighborhood.
Very nice place to stay, very clean and chic. Close to metro station.
Great place and neighborhood. Really enjoyed our stay

Location, location, location!!!  Loft Miro is so well located - near the Metro and country train station, and a delightful café around the corner for a delicious coffee and croissant breakfast a la Barcelona!

I recommend the property . Location is good , apartment clean and well equipped.
Comfortable , but wood floor in entrance hall needs repairs .
Muy cómodo todo!
Beautiful modern apartment, great location. Everything was perfect! The only thing that bothered was the lack of intimacy for the people in the bedroom upstairs. There's no door for this room.

Nice, contemporary modern loft that we enjoyed staying in during our 4 day stay in Barcelona. There were 6 of us and it was cozy yet spacious enough for all of us. The location was very convenient since it was close to the metro and in a quiet neighborhood which we enjoyed at the end of every day. 

The kitchen was stocked with everything we needed to eat in some nights. A carton of milk in the fridge was a very thoughtful touch since we were traveling with kids. A supermarket was right around corner and quite a few restaurants within walking distance. 

Highly recommend and we would choose it again if we visit Barcelona again.

Жилье находится в хорошем месте напротив парка Миро, недалеко от старого города. В квартире два этажа, на первом гостиная, кухня и спальня с ванной и туалетом, на втором этаже спальня и ванна с туалетом. Есть небольшое патио на балконе. 
На кухне есть все, что необходимо, чтоб готовить каждый день. Шустрый вайфай. Дизайнерский интерьер. 
Рекомендую данную квартиру. Спасибо!

Dear Lana and Liana, thank you very much for a great stay in Barcelona. The apartment is great, in a great location, well equipped. The stores around the apartment are great. We stayed there for 5 nights with our kids and we all had a great time. The check in was great as well. We highly recommend this apartment!
nice apartment for 2 couples, just a short a walk to arenas , plaza espanya , very nice location , quite pleased to stay there!
Thanks Lana for hosting us. We had a wonderful and comfortable stay at your beautiful loft.

Really handy place to stay. Next to metro and Sants station. No need for expensive taxis to and from airport. Right next to Plaza España. Clean, comfortable. Stayed with three adults and three kids aged 8-15 and we loved it. Very accomodating with late check out.
Emplacement parfait que ce soit pour les parking magasins ou métro

Appartement très jolie et lumineux. 
Très satisfaite je recommande
Una estancia estupenda, volveremos seguro!

Não tenho nada a reclamar. Acomodação excelente, limpa, confortável e check-in muito tranquilo. Sandro, o rapaz responsável por nos dar as boas vindas foi extremamente educado, nos mostrou todo o loft com bastante cuidado e ficou a nossa inteira disposição. Tem estação de metrô próxima, mercado e até um shopping. Vale muito o custo benefício!
We spent 6 days in Barcelona with my friends. The appartment was great. Everythig was good and also the wi-fi was fantastic. That was important to us because it was our work trip
Muy buen apartamento lo único que faltan las persianas.
The house is so close to the city centre. In a good place. It was clean and beautiful and had everything u may needed. You should stay in this house if you ever visit Barcelona. Thank you
Прекрасная квартира в удобном месте, приветливые хозяева, уютно, чисто и комфортно.
The place was perfect for 5 days for a group of 4. The place is located in a central but quite place.

Localização boa, internet e TV funcionaram bem, o local é silencioso e tem muitos serviços perto, cama confortavel.
Muitas coisas nos decepcionaram:
Falta de privacidade, uma pessoa entrou na casa sem avisar nem tocar a campainha, do nada.
Cobrança indevida, no site havia um valor de taxa de turismo, nos cobraram outra e quando reclamamos mudaram o valor do site para nos enganar, tive que me queixar ao airbnb, que claro percebeu a tentativa de nos enganar, os  anfitriões nem  manifestaram interesse em resolver o problema. Não houve  nenhuma retratação apesar do airbnb devolver 20 euros para nós.
O quarto superior tem o teto baixo, assim como o banheiro, isso deveria ser informado. Ninguém maior que 1.55 metros consegue usar esses ambientes confortavelmente. A chave de energia caiu várias vezes e a água quente acabava após 2 pessoas tomarem banho, ninguém nos explicou nada sobre.
A calefação é em grande parte feira com ar condicionado split inverter que adicionalmente havia um sensor de presença para desligar, ou seja o importante aqui é economizar e não dar conforto ao usuário.  Nos deixaram duas chaves da casa mas somente uma funcionava.A calefação dos banheiros estava quebrada e não arrumaram mesmo após nossa queixa. Por fim, muito frio impessoal  e não satisfatório um grande business como muita coisa em BCN, ou seja ganhar dinherio esta bem mas  o servço em geral  foi serviço ruim e portanto caro.

Lana & Alain's place is a stylish and spacious home with a loft bedroom. Located just minutes from Sants train station, their place also has a supermarket and affordable restaurants right at the doorstep. One thing to note is that the washing machine is located at the balcony so it was really cold to step out to use the machine during winter. Overall, it was great location to stay at.
Great place to stay for a few days visit to Barcelona! Close to transport and sights. Supermarket, park and cafes in walking distance. Hosts very helpful and quick to respond to queries.
Très bel appartement , calme et très bien placé : tout près du métro et d'une supérette, le top

Es un apartamento excelente, muy agradable, cerca al metro y otros lugares de interés, Lana & Alain siempre son muy cordiales y  la comunicación con ellos es muy efectiva. Ha sido muy grata la experiencia en este lugar.

Le logement de Lana & Alain est très spacieux, haut de gamme et plus que parfait pour 3 personnes, 2 styles de salle de bain différents. Les équipements sont optimales ( clim, chauffage etc ), les chambres spacieuses, l’accès au logements idéal pour toutes personnes.
La ville de Barcelone nous a enchanté de part son ouverture sur les différentes cultures, la gentillesse des gens, ouvertures d’esprits et j’en passe; les balades en villes furent convivial; une première pour nous. 
Le parc guëll avec son centre monumental nous a marqué particulièrement, une vue magnifique. En revanche prévoyez un moyen de transport ou autre pour vous y rendre, la queue pour les taxis est interminable lors des grosses affluences. 
Le quartier gothique,
la sagrada familia, magnifique sont à visiter absolument, sans oublier la barceloneta.

Все было просто великолепно! Расположение супер! Рядом отличный парк для прогулок с детьми и без. В шаговой доступности ТРК Арена с обзорной площадкой. Рядом с Ареной ресторан все включено Wok. 
Квартира отличная. Были с 14 марта по 20 марта, семья с 3 детьми. Всем было удобно. 
Спасибо хозяевам и персонально Сантьяго.
Рекомендую к посещению.

J'avais reservé cet appartement pour ma famille qui venait en vacances me visiter, les premiers jours ont été un peu bruyants á cause du voisin dén face qui faisait la fête tard, puis ensuite beaucoup mieux, ma famille a été tres contente de sejourner dans cet appartement, tres spacieux, bien decoré et bien placé. Le seul hic l'odeur dans la salle du bain du bas et comme je l'ai dit le bruit du voisin les premiers jours. Merci encore à votre agence Alain et Lana.

la casa è molto accogliente e curata nei dettagli.
il check in è stata fatto in tempi rapidi e con grande professionalità
la casa è vicina (circa 2 minuti a piedi) a due fermate della metro.
Loft impeccable, très bien aménagé et au calme ce qui est très agréable particulièrement à BCN. Métro à deux pas qui vous emmène rapidement partout. Une adresse que nous recommanderons à des amis.

Nous avons passés un très bon séjour chez Lana & Alain, nous étions 4 et nous avons été très à l'aise (grand appartement) nous recommanderons ce logement à nos amis.
Metro juste à côté qui dépose directement sur les Ramblas.
Bel appartement, bien situé, très calme. Idéal pour 4 personnes.
excelente lofm, bien ubicado y todos los servicios en orden
Amazing place for 6, everything we needed
Cozy apartment in a great position, ideal for a few days visit of the city.
Really nice apartment near Placa de Espanya. We much enjoyed our stay.
Best loft, good localisation, good communication, thank you so much Lana & Alain

Location perfetta per un gruppo di amici.
Casa bella spaziosa e accogliente.
Consiglio vivamente
Nice house but a little far from the city. Super private. Didn’t feel like an apartment more like a house. Supermarket and train station walking distance. Said 3 bedrooms but was 2.
The apartment is well-equipped and is situated at a very convenient location.

Location is great and property is nice. Communication with the owner was straight forward and clear. Had some minor issues which I am sure will be resolved for future guests! Overall a very good stay. By the way...mattresses are very comfortable in the bedroom upstairs!
The location is great. Metro station is right there. Lots of restaurants in the area too.

lana and Alain’s place is sparkling clean, comfortable, stylish and the location is awesome near placa de spanyol just 7 minuets walk so transportation is very easy. I highly recommend this place to everyone. For sure I will back to their place next time
muy buen loft

I do recommend the flat. The location is great, 5 min walking away from Espania Square and the Magic Fontains. Guillem is very friendly and helpful. The flat is big enough even for 6 people. Very clean and quiet. We had a great stay!

Lana and Alain’s place was very comfortable, stylish, clean, and functional. Beds and pillows were comfortable and the linens and towels smelled good. Kitchen utensils and appliances were complete. Space was ample for four people. Location was convenient, few minutes walk from Placa Espanya, Arenas de Barcelona, and Montjuic. Communication with hosts was fast and helpful. We hope to return soon.

Had a great time in the apartment.  We were 3 adults and 3 kids and we had plenty of space.  The split level plus 2 bathrooms worked very well for us.  The place was clean and modern as pictured.  The check in manager was great even though we were quite a bit later than expected.  The apartment was easy to get to and the neighbor hood was fine.  It’s close to the sites, but still requires using public transport to get down to the centre of town. We felt like the quality/price was well balanced.   We would recommend and would stay here again.
квартира очень понравилась, хорошое расположение,рядом метро и автобусные остановки, много разных магазинов и кафе. квартира уютная и чистая, все есть необходимое для хорошего отдыха в Барселоне!

We had a wonderful stay at Loft Miro. It is a quiet relaxing flat, far enough out of the centre to offer relaxing pauses in your stay, but just two minutes walk from a metro stop that has you in any number of locations in 10mins. You also have the advantage of having the exquisite Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya only 10mins walk away (plus a few additional steps)! An immediate local supermarket and pharmacy are on hand to the flat alongside many shops and restaurants within a few minutes walk, including Arenas de Barcelona for larger roof-top restaurants with an excellent view and even a cinema if needed. 

Our check in and check out experience were very easy with a wonderful host who gave lots of tips and stayed in touch throughout our stay. Late check out was very easily arranged for a small additional fee. The flat was spotlessly clean and is very well equipped for cooking if needed, which helps when travelling with children and the washer /drier is a also a useful addition. One bathroom has a large walk in shower, the other bathroom has a small bath and much lower shower, suitable for children and smaller adults. Any taller guests will need to share the downstairs shower. We had one or two minor requests during our visit for light bulbs and plugs etc and these were answered quickly. We visited out of season and the flat was warm and cosy. Lovely crisp white bedding is provided along with memory foam pillows and excellent mattresses / duvets - we slept well!

The street entrance to the complex is easy to find and well lit and the complex and wider local area feel extremely safe and welcoming. Entrance to the flat is on the ground floor so no major staircases or lifts required.  Be aware if travelling with older or disabled guests that there is a small external step up to the apartment entrance and one step within the apartment down to the nearest bedroom and bathroom. The second bedroom in the flat is up a small flight of stairs as seen in the flat photos. This didn't stop my older parents enjoying the flat, but it is not fully accessible. There are some works being done on the complex that temporarily make the second entrance to the flat darker, this is no problem for safety but visibility outside the flat door is a little restricted at night.

Overall we had a brilliant stay in Barcelona at Loft Miro with warm hospitality and good amenities, we hope you do too!

Great location livable and stylish property minutes walk to plaza Espanya and a shopping mall away from the touristic district lots of shops and grocery stores  a great place to chill and live around the locals
Super appartement bien situé, agréable et bien décoré. Merci à Guilhem PARFAIT pour son accueil, précis, ponctuel et disponible, c'est très rassurant! Un bonheur! PERFECT APPARTMENT!!!

loft appartment was clean and spacious, location ideal for a group of 4 - nice residential area with good connections on metro. William met us upon arrival and gave us local knowledge of where to eat and best tourist attractions. We had a slight issue with the hot water and messaged home owner and got a response straight away and someone came out to visit same day to resolve issue. Apartment has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, upstairs bath/shower is Abit awkward but works none the less. We asked for late check out for a few of €30 which we all thought was exceptionally reasonable. Overall excellent trip to Barcelona - thank you Lana & Alain !

The Loft is beautiful and comfortable. It is conviniently located near many places to roam or catch a metro. We appreciate the personal connection at check-in and explanation of how to get to sites we wanted to visited. The grocery store is steps away. 
Most importantly the Loft is clean, beautiful and comfortable. When we were tired or wanted some downtime, the Loft was relaxing.
Very good

name: Apartamento no Leblon - RJ
summary: Na melhor localização do bairro, a 3 quadras da praia, bem centralizado, apartamento arejado e ótima planta, ar condicionado na sala e no quarto amplo e todo o comércio muito perto, incluindo o shopping center Leblon.
space: Temporada no Leblon!  2 quartos,  1 bem amplo, sala, cozinha, banheiro, área de serviço. A 30 m do supermercado, de vários restaurantes, lojas de grife ou não,lanchonetes e padarias, 200 m da praia e centralizado no bairro mais charmoso do Rio.
description: Na melhor localização do bairro, a 3 quadras da praia, bem centralizado, apartamento arejado e ótima planta, ar condicionado na sala e no quarto amplo e todo o comércio muito perto, incluindo o shopping center Leblon. Temporada no Leblon!  2 quartos,  1 bem amplo, sala, cozinha, banheiro, área de serviço. A 30 m do supermercado, de vários restaurantes, lojas de grife ou não,lanchonetes e padarias, 200 m da praia e centralizado no bairro mais charmoso do Rio. Todo o apartamento estará disponível e de livre acesso durante a estadia. O Leblon dispensa comentários. É o melhor bairro para se viver e visitar no Rio de Janeiro. O meu apartamento fica perto de tudo o que você imaginar e precisar.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
A Vanessa nos recebeu muito bem e ela é muito simpática. Nos deu dicas para os blocos do Carnaval. O apartamento é muito bem localizado , em um bairro nobre no Rio de Janeiro, perto de restaurantes gourmets , bares e supermercado. É tão bem localizado que você pode fazer tudo a pé.
A praia fica há 2 quadras, bem pertinho.
Adoramos a estadia e a sua recepção. As fotos condizem com o que está no anúncio e o principal foi a existência de ar condicionado na sala e em um dos quartos, nos salvou neste calor! A ducha do banheiro também é ótima!

Apartment is simple but well furnished, gas range works well, water heater and AC worked well, mattress comfortable. The best feature was the location. Next to an outstanding grocery store with the best selection of fresh fish and vegetables. And the beach is just 2 blocks away. And next to metro station. And next to Bracarense. If you dont know what it is, (Hidden by Airbnb) it!
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Vanessa foi muito solícita toda o tempo. Eu perdi as chaves da casa, e ela se prontificou a sair do Maracanã até o Leblon no meio do carnaval pra me entregar cópia! Uma gentileza incrível! A localização é maravilhosa.

name: Top Floor Pipeline Lodge on Farm
summary: The top floor of our Lodge across from Pipeline on a farm and surrounded by a nature reserve. amazing view, is peaceful, has big deck, great kitchen and one bedroom.  please see Waihuena Farm FMI info on Waihuena Farm (downstairs is used by owners generally weekends only)
space: The Pipeline lodge at Waihuena Farm is one of a kind! MAHALO for your interest in one of the North Shore's greenest homes! We can accommodate you...and your 11 friends! need even more space? or want to be beachfront? inquire about our yurt on lawn just below home, beachfront PIPELINE solar home, or sharks cove oceanfront home. we are happy to host events as well!  yoga retreats, business retreats, small weddings...or large weddings on our back lawn! The Pipeline Lodge at Waihuena Farm, aka The Lodge. The Lodge is cozy enough for a couple and large enough for a family reunion!  Situated at the top of our organic farm property with amazing views, hiking out the backdoor, an 1,100 acre nature preserve, and just and a 5 minute walk to the ocean through a convenient beach access leading to three of the world's best waves' Pipeline, Backdoor and Off-The-Wall.  Don't worry though, most of the time the beach is quiet and great for swimming!  This unique home can be rented as- UPSTAIRS- one bed
