transit: The advantage of "living" next to the Sagrada Familia is you have endless possibilities to move around the city. Walking is always a healthy and fun option because you do not lose detail: in 10 minutes you get to Passeig de Gracia and "La Pedrera" down the street Provence.  The metro L5 and L2 will take you downtown in 5 minutes, and at different points of the city: Plaza de Spain, Camp Nou ...  If you are over bus there are many possibilities, any of the nearby stops will take you downtown and other points of interest.  What if you like the tour bus at the same corner you'll also find a stop, need tickets? Ourselves provide you all: D  Want more options?, Book one of our electric bikes (see reception for availability and rates) and enjoy all the miles of bike lane in Barcelona.
access: Ah, you come by car, then do not hesitate to leave it in our parking located in the same building. The cost is 30 € / night, if we consider that the street parking is paid and the ticket must be renewed every 2 hours ... it's the best choice! ;)
interaction: I always try to meet you at the apartments, but if you need anything you can always contact me by telephone.
house_rules: Rules are stated by common sense: don’t bother the other guests, the neighbors and behave as if you were at home. You can not organize parties.But two "metro stops" (Diagonal) can find Balmes & Tusset street where you can find good party;)

host.host_about:
Frustrado aficionado al golf, sigue disfrutando de juegos como MW o PES. Compartir el tiempo con mis amigos en situaciones similares a los hermanos Marx es la tónica

Resolver cualquier tipo de incidencia, mejorar el día a día de la empresa es mi principal objetivo.

reviews.comments: Really awesome place to stay, very comfortably fits 6 people. The location is good but certainly the attention to detail in the decoration, the cleanness and amenities were perfect. No access to the roof to see the view of the hotel and the spa is in the next door place rather than in the building, but still very satisfied.
I LIKE IT  !! VERY NICE APPARTAMENT ... SEE YOU IN SEPTEMBER 2013... THANKS JOSE'
great appartment ind great neighborhood

location is great! just in front of Sagrada Familia , the  apartement  was  amazing, the  decoration so nice and colorful (like barcelona), everithing is  new and  very clean, it  look like  a  5* hotel ... 2 min walk from the  station and  bus tour.
such an faboulous place to stay and  very confortably for  6 people , by the way  if  you  need  anything  you  just have  to  ask the concierge service (rental  car, taxi food delivery , book a restaurant , or club).
the metropolitan spa is faboulous and the access is very easy  with just a simple pass (free) . the roof also but is on the top of the spa building just next door. it was just awesome !!! thank u José ... ill be back soon !

Very nice hotel/apartment with an amazing Spa. I would say that I highly recommend this place if you plan on visiting the Spa next door. IT was perhaps the nicest spa I had ever been to. We joined a free water fitness class and used many of the facilities. The apartment itself is decent and clean. Not the largest but it was still fine.
Great service, nice appartment. We were with 6 people and enjoyed everything including the SPA. We stayed for 2 nights and even the room was cleaned in between.

Apartment is clean and in very good condition. Location is central and I felt very comfortable and safe. From an Airbnb perspective, it felt a little more like a hotel than a unique, authentic place to stay.
Very good location, but no reception .
Nice cosy apartment very close to Sagrada familia. Ask the staff for local recommendations.
Excellent séjour. L'accès a la salle de sport est très appréciable
excelente.

A pricey but lovely, clean funky apartment close to train, metro, supermarket and Sagrada Famiglia. We didn't use the gym much (and couldn't find the rooftop terrace in the promo photo) but did enjoy our stay here. Very efficient reservations and reception staff very helpful. Overall very happy thanks!
Very cool apartment; great location in Barca; spa is a nice bonus.
This accomodation is great. Very modern and everything we needed :) The pools are on a separate building which was no problem. Thanks.

Its a beautiful gated apartment. It was so neat and clean and we loved the kitchen and the living hall.
The place was in the centre of Barcelona and we found it so easy to go around places for sightseeing , since the Hop on n hop off bus pick up was just the next door. 
It is so so so close to Sagrada familia.... and was so beautiful.
Everything was so close, that even to get to the port the taxi would hardly cost about 7 Euro.
We loved the location, the apartment was beautiful and the reception was so helpful all time.
Thank you for making our Barcelona trip so memorable.

Très bel appartement et accueil chaleureux. un grand merci pour la surprise "HAPPY BIRTHDAY" et la bouteille de vin. Ce sont des détails que l'on a beaucoup apprécié !
Le SPA est magnifique, on se réjouit d'y revenir pour passer plus de temps.
VIVA ESPANIA !
Fatime
Très bon séjour bonne organisation de l'immeuble proche de tout.Appartement très beau et spacieux

Estupendo apartamento pero con un único pero nuestro apartamento tenía una cama de matrimonio y la otra habitación con unas camas muy pequeñas , midiendo 1,94 es un pequeño problema , lo demás genial , atención en recepción , limpieza y ubicación

Very comfotable apartments with a lot of space. The location is central and calm at the same time. The spa is a real plus, ideal in order to have a rest at the end of the day! The hosts are very helpfull and welcoming. I would definetly come back to this place if I have the possibility!
Superbe ! Lit un peu petit pour une des chambres sinon très bien situé et l accès au spa gym et vraiment un plus !

We spent five days at this wonderful and conveniently-located apartment.  La Sagrada Familia is only a block and a half away and it's easy  to get to the old town (just a 20 minute walk or so -- faster if you take the metro).  There is a grocery store right across the street as well.  Our only issues were an oddly-timed change of locks on the apartment doors and a key card to the main door that stopped working unexpectedly.

Also, the spa/gym next door was very nice -- but not for use by children under 17.  However, there is a municipal pool around the corner whose entrance fee was reimbursed by the apartment management so that our kids could go swim.
It is a perfect apartment, modern, tidy and spacious. It is extremely close to the Sagarada Família. We feel at home.

Very nice stay. The reception was very helpful and our apartment was cleaned during the day. The apartment itself is trendy, modern, and clean. 

It's close to Sagrada Familia and the Metro (2 blocks or a little less). Also next to a bar with some nice people (Chill Bar). I recommend the neighborhood and this apartment. Everything necessary is close by.

La photo principale c'est la terrasse et nous on l'a pas vu...
L'appartement est propre mais sans plus ( genre couverts mal lavés et laisser dans le lave vaisselle ) et pour moi il ne correspond pas aux photos, c'est une résidence " apart hotel " il y a donc une réceptionniste à l’accueil...
Si vous cherchez un appartement typique c'est pas ici...
J'ai louer cet appartement pour un voyage d'affaire et il y avait une très mauvaise connection Wifi, impossible de se connecter à part dans la cuisine... Imaginez ma tête...
En ce qui concerne le SPA c'est sympa et joli mais ce n'est pas dans la résidence, il faut sortir à l'extérieur, faire 50 mètres et aller dans un SPA avec des cartes gratuites. 
C'est un endroit fréquenté par beaucoup de Barcelonais donc n'imaginez pas être seul...
J'ai également envoyer deux messages par téléphone avant d'arriver pour demander de l'aide à l'hôte mais je n'ai jamais eu de réponse...
En gros les images et descriptifs prêtes à confusion...

Well equipped and modern appartment. Perfect for 5 people. The location is great and the free access to the spa next door was a nice extra. The receptionists are very helpful and friendly. It was convenient to have a supermarket just on the other side of the street and the metro station is within 2 minutes walking distance.

Let's be clear, this is a hotel. Jose never did meet me, in fact, I never received a response to my questions because there was nobody at reception when I tried to contact them. That said, it is a nice hotel. It is clean, well located, and reasonably priced. It is well stocked, but, since it is a hotel, everything has a price - tea, coffee, water, etc.... None of the friendly touches that you find in many AirBnB rentals. Although it does have what you would expect from a hotel: soap, shampoo, lotion, towels, TV, internet, and more. During business hours the reception desk has a host, but it can be difficult if you arrive outside of business hours. The woman at reception on the morning after our arrival was very clear that this is a hotel, and was surprised that we were surprised. The location is good, two blocks from the Sagrada Familia, and the Blue Line bus stop, as well as the metro. The restaurants nearby are, consequently, generally touristy. We have an 11 year old and felt comfortable with the lodging and the neighborhood. If I were looking for a hotel, I would consider staying here again.
We had a lovely stay at the appartment. It was very clean and well furnished. Just like in the pictures. Thank you for your hospitality!
I would highly recommend this apartment. It is well-equipped and clean and really well-located. The reception staff were helpful and friendly. I would happily stay here again.

Nice and cosy apartment next to Sagrada Familia.

Very helpful staff.

Apartment is clean, spacious and very comfortable.

We will return!

Het appartement was ruim, schoon en voorzien van alle gemakken. De SPA was van een fantastische kwaliteit. Er zijn wel een aantal kanttekeningen te maken. Ons appartement was op de eerste verdieping aan de voorzijde, en daardoor was de metro goed hoorbaar. Aangezien deze om 5 uur in de ochtend begint met rijden is dat geen feest. Verder was aan de achterzijde van het appartement een open ruimte wat ook de nodige geluidsoverlast in de nacht opleverde. De wifi-snelheid was matig tot slecht.
it's clean, well located, it's just like a hotel with kitchen, we enjoyed stay there.
Muy buen alojamiento, el apartamento está muy bien comunicado y cuenta con todas las comodidades.

I would recommend this place to anyone. We we're able to access all the places of interest. The unit was large and comfortable.  Also , there. Are some great cafe near buy.  The sagrada familia is right next door along with tour buses and the metro.  A great place for a first time visitor

We loved our stay at Castro! It is centrally located and just a block walk from Sagrada Familia. The apartment was clean, spacious, and modern. We would definitely recommend this apartment to friends and family for their Barcelona stay!

The apartment was clean and tidy. A bit smaller than it seemed on the pictures. Friendly and helpful staff. You get a maid daily to clean the apartment. 

We could never get hold of Jose though but this is fine as there's a receptionist downstairs who became our main point of contact. 

Flat is a 2/3 minute walk to the station and sagrada familia and if you hand over the balcony you might even be able to see a bit of it. 

The spa at the neighbouring gym is free to use and very nice. 

Would use again and recommend to people.

The flat was brilliant with all the mod cons and an incredible roof terrace. We also took advantage of the spa next door was great.

As the block of flats are run as serviced apartments there is a concierge by the door who is happy to help to book tickets to attractions, taxis or with anything else you might need.

I am sorry but I am very disappointed about my stay at your apartment. I think "exclusive residence" should be something more. First nobody met us when we arrived to hotel although it was afternoon and also during our stay. At the last day of our visit, we saw a woman and she gave us a parking card. The apartment was almost as in the pictures but a bit worn. The room was cleaned but the towels were not changed. Bathroom and bedrooms should be revised because it should be at least as the same quality as a hotel room. We will visit Barcelona many times, sorry but will not stay here again.

Great for what it is - a very comfortable apartment in a great and convenient location. Not that i minded, but not a hosted apartment more of a hotel experience. I enjoyed having service when needed. Staff was always very helpful. I will be happy to return next time in Barcelona. WiFi needs an upgrade...
Great location, perfect apartment for families.  Rooftop terrace was nice, check-in/out quick and easy and staff at reception were very helpful. Recommended!

Auf dem Flughafen wurden wir durch einen sehr freundlichen Fahrer willkommen geheissen, den die Reception für uns organisiert hatte. Er brachte uns und viel Gepäck bequem zu den apartments. Guter Start! Das Personal an der Reception war jederzeit sehr freundlich und extrem hilfsbereit. Das apartment ist gut gelegen, direkt bei der Sagrada familia, in der Nähe zweier U-Bahnstationen. Bei geöffneten Fenstern nachts manchmal etwas lärmig. Es ist schön eingerichtet, die Küche ist funktional. Die Räume werden täglich saubergemacht. Das SPA ist sehr ansprechend, leider mit Altersbegrenzung, die wir nicht realisiert hatten. Alles in allem eine exzellente Unterkunft, sehr zu empfehlen.

Siamo stati due giorni e l'accoglienza, la pulizia è il soggiorno in generale sono stati fantastici.
Zona più che centrale!
Ingressi alla SPA Metropolitan a dieci metri di distanza inclusi: la più bella SPA che io abbia mai visto! 
Voto 10 e lode!
Grazie,
Marck

We had a great time staying at this apartment. Just perfect for what we needed. Very clean and good size for our party of 6. Great interior decor. We loved the rooftop, though I would say the picture we saw of the view on the website does not reflect what we could actually see. We made full use of the spa and local amenities. I would definitely recommend staying here to anyone visiting Barcelona and would return on future visits.

We had a great time in Barcelona. The apartment is in a apart hotel building, and you might not get the exact one you see in the picture, but you get one with the exact same amenities and similar decoration. Alejandro was accessible and responsive, and he was flexible with an early checkin. We had a few issues on the first day that were fixed in a timely manner. The best perk of this accommodation is the spa area, which is incredible and has jacuzzis, saunas and a steam room. We'd recommend it to other travellers and would love to stay there again :)
Great location! Near metro.  Nice apartment!
Très bel appartement , 2 sdb , beau spa , belle situation géographique tout près de la Sagrada famillia
Hosts were great - but it just wan't for us. If you're not accustomed to European shower settings and doors, you might consider staying elsewhere.
Wir waren für eine Nacht im Appartment und hatten einen angenehmen Aufenthalt. Die Lage und Umgebung ist super und das Personal sehr zuvorkommend! Wir kommen wieder.
The experience was great, smooth and easy. Would recommend!
Great! Easy to find, great clean apartment, the spa next door is amazing!!!
We had a great stay here. The place easily met our expectations. It was easy to find, and checking in and out went smoothly.
Everything was perfect, we had a really nice stay

Die Lage des Appartements war sehr gut, nur 2 Minuten fußweg zur "Sagrada familia". Restaurants und Supermärkte sind gleich vor der Tür.
Die Wohnung war sauber und gut eingerichtet, allerdings war sie für 6 Personen schon knapp bemessen (z.b. keine 6 Sitzplätze auf der Couch). Die Dachterrasse war sehr schön, außerdem hat man die Möglichkeit das Gym nebenan zu nutzen.
Die Rezeption war sehr freundlich und stehts bemüht uns zu helfen (Taxi oder Restaurant Reservierungen). Insgesamt kann ich die Wohnung empfehlen.
Très bon accueil.Parking situé dans l'hotel pour 30euros par jour

This was the worst airbnb experience I have ever had. Being an airbnb host and also traveling pretty much primarily through airbnb I would highly recommend staying away - or accepting that this is not really an airbnb type property. 

This is an apartment hotel that the owner listed (Jose Castro) will never answer your messages, in fact, he doesn't even answer airbnb staff. Upon arrival we were greeted by a receptionist at the hotel that asked us for a credit card for guarantee (going against airbnb terms) and 30 Euro for parking. We were also informed the elevator was broken and "probably" won't be fixed. It wasn't. Jose would not answer our calls or airbnb staff. Having parked in a garage in minus 4 level we had to drag our suitcases up those 4 flights and then another 3 to our apartment. (the apartment itself is very nice). 

When we checked out there was a different lady at reception and when asked about the elevator we were told it was working. Great news... Only problem, turns out she never knew it was broken so we got stuck in the elevator and had to crawl out in between floors. 

To recap, worst airbnb experience ever. If someone wants an apartment hotel, look online and find a better deal. 

Also, the photo showing the sagrada familia - that is not from the room and you have no access to that patio...

The apartment itself was same as photos described. The only disappointment for apartment was that the terrace was not opened as there was the renovation ongoing and terrace is closed. Apartment is very clean, you have all you need there and if you need something you dont have there just ask and reception will bring it to you. You must understand that this is a hotel type apartment which is good as reception is working. Host himself was not present nor did answer any queries. This was done by reception. Upon arrival we had problem with quest amount and were requested to pay extra (even though in conditions you read "no charge for extra people"). The problem was solved by AirBnB customer service (the reception did not want to let us in before paying this extra). But end is good, all is good. AirBnb is definitely very professional and great at customer care and service! Thank you!

La résidence est très bien située pour visiter Barcelone, juste à quelques pas de la Sagrada Familia et à 20 minutes de marche du centre-ville. Il y a 2 lignes de métro à proximité. L'appartement est bien meublé mais manque un peu de vaisselle. Les chambres des enfants sont un peu petites, mais nous sommes peu restés dans l'appartement. Il y a accès à la piscine et salle de sport inclus dans le prix et une superbe terrasse sur le toit de la piscine.

The apartment was great! It was serviced on a daily basis. The furniture is pretty funky/colorful. The beds were comfortable. Upon arriving, all linens and towels were ready to be used. There was house keeping on daily basis, something unlikely usually for hotel apartments. The staff were very friendly. The place is literally 2 minutes away from Sagrada Familia and 20 seconds from a big super market. The street is filled with cafes and restaurants. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants a restful vacation.
Tres bon sejour a Barcelone au sein de cette appartement bien situé,  sympa et avec un acces au spa.

Couldn't recommend this place any higher. Jose's service was exemplary, with responses every minute! He organised the delivery of our tickets to the Barca game to the Castro apartment reception which was very helpful. The location couldn't be better IMO, supermarket is opposite, 2 minutes walk from the Sagrada, about a €5 taxi to the ramblers and a €10 taxi to the beach. Perfecto! The spa is absolutely stunning, especially the lighting. This place is perfect, don't hesitate and get it booked. Now. Thanks again Jose, see you again soon. Time for a Demi!

L'appartement est parfait, super bien situé à proximité de la sagrada familia. Un seul petit défaut, une des chambres était un peu petite pour 2 adultes mais idéale pour des enfants.
Le quartier est très calme, aucuns bruits le matin.
Le SPA est très bien, il est situé dans l'immeuble juste à côté et les services proposés sont digne de grands hôtels.

We were 4 people in total staying in unit 3.2 (3rd floor apt. #2) for one night. The building has a beautiful glass doors and LED signs. There is a reception desk on the left as soon as you enter. The asian receptionist assisted us. Everything was clean and modern. Great experience overall.

Sonntags ist bei Ankunft die Rezeption nicht besetzt und wir suchten eine Stunde nach den Schlüsseln die, ich sage jetzt nicht wo, versteckt waren. Der Check In Computer war defekt. Telefonisch niemand zu erreichen. Der Transfer vom Hafen hatte nicht geklappt, zumindest wurden wir nicht abgeholt, warum, weiß ich nicht. WLAN hat nicht funktioniert und nach häufigen Nachfragen ging es nach drei Tagen , stundenweise. Das Waschbecken im  Bad  war verstopft, wurde am Abreistag gerichtet, also nach 6 Nächten. Im Spa (Nachbarhaus-öffentliches Fitnessstudio) sind keine Kinder erlaubt. Die Terrasse haben wir  daher auch nicht besucht. Die übrigen Angaben stimmen und  wenn man die Wohnung nutzt, waschen  und kochen möchte ist das Preis /Leistungsverhältnis verglichen zu den Stadthotels dennoch sehr gut.

Great location, amazing view, everything we needed in the appartment. Loved the rooftop where we had our breakfast, coffee etc. Nice place!
We would go back any time.
The receptionist was very personal and accommodating with all our requests and advised us with great suggestions regarding the area.

Excellent location in a beautiful neighbourhood. Really close to the metro, no need to take a taxi. Spacious and clean apartment with everything you need. José was really nice and helpful.  I would recommend this apartment to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona.
Ok
It's a great place and located in the center city. Moreover the transportation is very convenient. Also we can enjoy the spa . Nice experience!

Great apartment in a super area -- right next to the Sagrada Familia, near bars and restaurants and good access to metro stations. The apartment was very well equipped and looked just like the photographs on the website.  We all loved the excellent spa right next door which we had access to every day of our stay.  No negatives at all and would definitely recommend staying here.

We had a wonderful time at Castro Residences.   The apartment was clean and had all the amenities described.  The concierge, Meoa was delightful and very helpful.  We particularly enjoyed the rooftop terrace which was very pleasant even in January.  Would recommend this apartment.

Jose was a really friendly contact. Checkin process was a little bit bumpy, but again Jose was very helpfull and we found an easy solution.
The location was great, so close to sagrada familia, public transport (metro), supermarkets and restaurants. If you like to walk a bit, you can discover the whole central city / get to the beach by feet from here!
Just keep in mind that all the restaurants (also McDonalds and stuff lile this) near the apartment close at about midnight. But you can easily find a Kebap restaurant all night in the neighborhood if you are hungry.
The rooftop and the SPA are special highlights, which you don't get in other apartments!
I can definitly recommend this place and Jose as a host!

Good place to stay for the five of us.  Central location and the place was well equipped  with two bathrooms and a balcony. Compact for sure an lobby looks a bit work in progress but that's clearly being dealt with. Was pleasantly surprised with daily maid service and helpful reception on level 1.
Nice place, staff was very helpful

Lovely base for exploring the city. Great location so close to the Sagrada Familia. Nice to be able to use the spa and cafe next door too (although under 16s not allowed in the spa and pool). Lockers in the basement to store luggage after checkout were useful too.

Sadly, during this trip there were more negatives than positives. First this began with 'Jose' refusing to reply to four of my messages during the two weeks before we arrived. When we did arrive there was no reservation in my name even though we had paid - thankfully the receptionist was extremely useful and found a free apartment. 

Inside the apartment was OK, but no where near the finish I expected from the photos. Bedrooms are extremely small and we had a lot of damage to floors, chairs, side boards and other pieces of furniture. This was topped off by the air-con being broken (constantly set at 24 degrees!) and WiFi not working, we asked for each of these problems to be solved, but sadly 'Jose' and his team were unable to meet out expectations. Also, watch out for the water strategically placed near your beds, which will cost you 5 EUROS! if you drink it. This is not what I would ever expect from an airbnb.

Finally, there was that roof terrace shown in the picture with the view of Sagrada Familia in the first picture. This picture is actually from a different building that holds the spa and gym. The apartment's roof terrace actually has a view of the cathedral that is 90% blocked by a concrete building, but thankfully they have painted a picture of Sagrada Familia on the side of the picture so you can still see something.....

Main positive from our stay - the SPA and gym, this is EXCELLENT! Probably because it is not owned or management by 'Jose' and his team.
La ubicación y el apartamento geniales, el SPA muy bueno (está en el edificio contiguo)
très bon acceuil, appartement conforme aux photos, quartier agréable
Good place. Central with excellent metro access.

What a fantastic place. The staff were amazingly friendly and helpful, the rooms were gorgeous and the location outstanding. I was celebrating a birthday and was surprised with balloons and cava that were awaiting me on my arrival . A very thoughtful touch

Our stay at Sagrada familia was awesome! The rooms were fit to house all 5 of us and provided comfort as well as modern contemporary feel. Definitely recommend in the future. Was a great spot close to the church and other spots in the city
We had a brilliant time In This wonderful appartement . Everything was Nice . Especially The terrasse and The Spa was a Big hit . We Will be back soon

Our stay at the Castro Apartments was great.  Check in at the apt was painless so don't stress about that upon arrival, and the location is fantastic and In a super safe area, it's just a 2 min walk by foot to Sagrada Familia and accessible to all the other must see attractions in the city, we walked almost everywhere including park güell, ramblas and the gotic quarter. There is access to a gym and spa/pool right next door as well.  The only thing I would mention is that there is a daycare run in the courtyard below so you may wake up to the sound of children playing loudly, so if you are late night party people this may be a consideration.  I would def recommend staying here for anyone looking for a centrally located place that will give you a great feel for the city and locals.

The apartment was easy to find and was large and well presented. We took advantage of the roof top terrace to catch a little evening sun on our arrival. The bathroom was well stocked with towels and toiletries.

The location of this apartment is fantastic. There are numerous bakeries, coffee shops and other small stores nearby. It is a few minutes to the metro and to the Sagrada Familia

The apartment was perfect for the 6 of us - 2 of the bedrooms are on the small side but were fine for our needs and this wasn't a problem. The location was brilliant! A few minutes walk from the Sagrada Familia and a short hop (or longer walk) to everywhere else on the metro or tourist bus. Having reception at the apartment itself was useful as it meant someone was there to check us in, give us keys and generally make us feel welcome. Small details like having more than 3 wine glasses, a knife sharp enough to cut fruit and having 6 chairs at the dining table rather than 4 would have been useful, but these didn't cause us any huge problems and I would have no hesitation in recommending this apartment.

Superb location 
Receptionist were lovely and helpful when on hand.
Apparthotel très bien placé idéal pour 4 a 6 pers.
Barrio ideal, Piso de muy buena calidad, todo perfecto

So, the condo was nice, but I feel the space is largely mis advertised online.. The Sagrada Familia is not actually that easy to see from the terrace, and the extra amenities are in a different building. Pain in the ass. Lovely apartment, but location and "luxury" feel was lacking. Also, the website said "penthouse apartment" for rent, not the 1st floor.. Bit of a disappointment. Be more specific in the OWNER's space's description. Fridge never really got cold, and coffee was €1/K-cup, which is kinda ridiculous considering the setting went for. Also, looks over a very loud playground/kindergarten, so don't expect to sleep in too much on a weekday, or in summer for that matter.
Супер место, хороший уровень сервиса, в общем и цвелом всё гуд)

Fantastic stay in Barcelona. The apartment was lovely and access to the gym and spa is a bonus. We enjoyed relaxing on the roof terrace as weather was fantastic. Thanks Jose, we all had a great time Louise

The apartment was clean and comfortable and just a stone's throw from the Sagrada Familia. The rooms are a little smaller than the photos suggest, but it was plenty big enough for the 4 of us. I cannot comment on the swimming pool, as my youngest son is 13, and minimum age to use the pool is 17 years old.
Clean, comfortable accommodation in a god location.

I tried to contact jose to arrange a time for check-in but he didn't reply to my message or email.  when we arrived at the building it was a little confusing as the building nos were different and we didn't realise it was in a block of serviced apartments.  Eventually we get into the building and attempt to use the automated check -in but the machine swallowed my credit card so I had to ring the receptionist, again.  She was very helpful and sorted out the machine but the whole arrival was not what I expected, time consuming and irritating making expensive mobile calls.  The rest of our stay was lovely, the apartment was really clean, well equipped and perfect for the weekend.  The spa was great after walking all day.  The receptionist was very helpful but she was only there for a very short time each day and if you wanted say, a ticket for the spa you might have to wait   until the next day as happened to us.
Jose was a great host who had a good staff helping out.  It's a apartment that is a hotel w a concierge and close to Sagrada Familia.  The gym is wonderful w a beautiful view.

I would not recommend a stay at these apartments. Unless if you’re willing to whisper and move around extremely carefully as most things are fragile and about to break. When we arrived, many things were half broken. One of the wooden doors with a glass pane were accidently broken, the glass pane was extremely thin and weak, and broke upon the slightest of impact. The receptionist ensured us that the cost would not be much at all, because they have had many cases like this. We were told that the cost would be nothing to worry about, but the next day we were given a scrap piece of paper with the amount 530 Euros written on it. After being told that the price would be ‘very small’, we were extremely shocked that such a cheap piece of glass could cost so much. It would genuinely cost me less to fly over a repairs company from London to fix the glass and then return back home, than pay 530 Euros. We were then told that they would give us the specifications of the glass so that we could find a replacement ourselves, as even they agreed that the price was extortionate. However, we received no information and upon leaving we were told that the money had already been charged to my credit card, without any invoice, despite asking multiple times for this. I am extremely confused, and feel exploited, as 530 euros could not possibly be the genuine cost of the repair, and feel as though they are profiting out of this incident, as we only received a piece of paper with the number 530 written on it, without any break down. All in all, a very unprofessional team, which is such a shame because the apartments were otherwise quite nice, and in a good location.  
The owner of the apartments, Jose, is very slow with communicating. Even now, I have received a notification that he has written me a review, however he has not replied to my message on AirBNB from the day of the incident, asking to speak with us regarding the problem. All in all, a very bad experience, and I will not be returning.

The description of the place is completely misleading. There is NOTHING exclusive about it - a completely average apartment with quite visible wear and tear - dirty walls in some places, particularly in the kitchen, large chunks of paint scratched off the walls in other places. The smaller bedrooms are tiny and feel cramped. The photo of the shared roof is just as misleading - it is just a small outdoor space, not a spacious one that the skillfully taken picture makes you believe it is. The worst thing is that THERE IS NO GYM in the building and THERE IS NO POOL. It is a lie - there is a commercial fitness center in the next building to which you can get a pass to only if you are smart enough to ask for it while there is someone at the reception. They do not just give it to you by default, undoubtedly trying to save money. So when you return in the evening and there is noone at the reception you are screwed. The gym does not let you in and calling the contact number provided does not help - the operator just tells you that there is nothing that she can do and that you would have to use the gym TOMORROW. The seemingly reasonable argument that you have already paid to use it today falls on deaf ears. s the incident with not being able to get into gym showed, the host was completely unresponsive. Upon my demand to speak to the manager or the owner, the operator called them and in the end told me that there is nothing that can be done now and that nobody would be willing to speak to me. She obviously consulted with someone so it was a conscious decision on their part not to speak to the client. Moreover the next day when I complained to the person who is in the building during the day, she replied that it was MY FAULT and that it was me who should have thought of asking for the passes to the fitness center when I checked into the apartment! To summarize: the words used in the description - "comfort, location, sustainability and modernity are the perfect definition for this exclusive residences concept in Barcelona" have nothing to do with the reality. The place itself is not dirty but because of dirt on the walls and scratched paint it does not feel very clean either - just average. Independently, one expects that an "exclusive" apartment would have not only the washing machine, but the detergent as well. Also basics like salt and pepper are not too much to ask for. The location is not bad, but more appealing on the map than in reality. Because it is so close to Sagrada Familia there are too many tourists around, while the benefits of being close to it are limited, as other main attractions are in other parts of the city. The apartment is...

José didnt respond to any of our messages before arrival. We didnt get any information about the check-in or that we had to pay an extra fee when we arrived. The pictures of the beautiful rooftop is fake, which was a huge disappoinment considering we actually chose to stay there because of the rooftop and the view of the Sagrada Familia. The place was clean and the bathrooms were fresh, so no problem with that. But we didnt enjoy our stay and would have choose differently if we could.
We had a great time in this Airbnb.  Smaller than expected but fully functional for our stay. Friendly and cooperative staff.

Kind of like a serviced apartment mixed with a hotel. The roof terrace is just like the picture. And the flat is gorgeous. The spa is next door in a gym/health club (and children can't use the swimming pool – I question the 'family friendly' description as it's more 'we will tolerate your kids' :-)). It's a lovely place in a lovely location. But it's not very similar to any other place I've stayed at with Airbnb; felt a bit corporate. If you're after clean and smart and well-located then this is for you.
clean and handy flat just next to sagrada familia.
Neighbourhood is great.  the host was completely uncomunicative - impossible to reach I tried for days
alles top!
Très bon séjour passé à cet endroit, à recommander vivement.

The lady at reception is the worst I've ever met, so be prepared. Also, when you are booking, here's the most important thing for you: they have two locations of the apartment, one near  sagrada familia, the other is in a very shabby neighborhood more than 10 mins drive away. So I strongly advice you make sure you won't be move to the second one. They told me the first location is full when I arrive and need us to stay in another location, believe me, you will not be willing to stay in that area. Location is one of the most critical reasons we select this apartment and we paid for that, can't believe they think it's ok to arrange us to the other location. (we went back to the main location after I insisted to cancel my booking if we can't move back to the main one). Their main apartment is fine, except it can barely fit into 6 people as the 3rd room is extremely small. 必须用中文提醒下中国同胞,他们有两个地点,一定不会被他们发配到郊区的那个,一定要求呆在圣家堂旁边的那个,同时,前台的那个女的服务态度简直差到极致,如果你觉着被不友好的接待,我们千万也别给她好脸色看

apartment was clean,  spacious and very central. 
We absolutely loved our stay. Only a few blocks to metro.
reading previous reviews I was concerned I had not heard from jose re check in. however when we arrived we were welcomed by s friendly receptionist who gave us everything we needed.
We will be back!
Cute place. Very hotel-like. Great spa next door with access to the pool and sauna. Hope to come back someday.
Awesome apartment and neighbourhood.  The rooftop is fantastic.

We were 5 young persons from Switzerland coming for the second time to Barcelona. We had a great time in Barcelona and in the appartment. The bedrooms are ok and the balcony, living room and kitchen were excellent. Nice restaurants are to be found in the near (insider tip: the venue steakhouse!) and the Spa on the bottom floor was amazing to visit in the evenings. Great place to stay and definetly recommendable for families, couples and young people.
Nice compound, the SPA is great and rooftop cool also with the sunshine!

Aufenthalt war sehr angenehm. Lediglich der Check In ist ein wenig komplizierter, da die Rezeption in der Provenca 110-114 ist und nicht in der angegebenen Adresse. Man geht direkt zur Rezeption und bekommt dort seine Karte für das Appartment. Alejandro haben wir nie zu Gesicht bekommen.

Notre arrivée a été compliquée. Personne pour nous accueillir afin de nous donner les clefs de l'appartement.
Juste une machine à l'entrée mais qui ne fonctionnait pas.....
Nous avions un contact téléphonique ce qui nous a permis après une bonne heure et payer une taxe de 11 € d'avoir la clef (mais toujours personne) 
Joli appartement seul bémol, très compliqué de prendre une douche , car soit brulante soit froide...
Great value of accommodation with good spa next door.
Very good place for the rest in Barcelona and visiting Sagrada Familia
Top top
Great location for visiting the sagrada familia

Fantastic location, clean, secure, private, and high end. I would highly recommend made our stay so much better, and easier to get around. You can literally see the cathedral as soon as you walk outside, amazing.
This place was beautiful! You could walk everywhere and everything was super clean and well organized. The spa was also awesome! It was a great stay
localisation is good , the rooms are clean. the house is a little bit smaller than we expected. Luisa is very helpful and kind
Très bel appartement. Bien placé avec de nombreux avantages comme le toit terrasse et le spa/piscine. Tout est très moderne et contemporain.
L'appartement et le quartier sont très sympa. Tout est fidèle à ce que l'on attendait! On a été tees bien reçu. Attention cependant à l'état de la salle de bain! A recommander tout de même!!!

Fantastic apartment which is serviced every day like a hotel! Beautiful sun terrace. The spa is amazing but be careful as no under 17s are allowed in which we didn't realize. Fully recommend the place though, it is close to the metro and easy to get around the city from. It also has a great kitchen plus washing machine etc. fully recommend it.

This airbnb is more like a hotel.  There is someone to greet you when you walk into the building.  Unfortunately, our host didn't let me know that earlier so I was worried about check in.  He did not respond quickly to emails.  Our room was ready when we arrived and the room place was great.  We loved having access to the spa.  The rooftop is under construction or something.  It doesn't look like the picture and the view isn't accurate.  We had a great time though.  The location is ideal, so close to Sagrada Familia and the metro.  Thank you for having us.

Parfait, logement très beau, très bien situé a coté de la Sagrada famillia, il y a un parking au sous-sol de l'immeuble (pas cher 30€ les 24h). 
je vous le recommande pour un weekend entre amis ou pour un weekend en famille.
Highly highly recommend! This well exceeded our expectations and was a steal given the price.

Jose's place was absolutely phenomenal. The space was kept clean, and was definitely enough space for a large group. The facilities were a nice tough to start off the day too! Would definitely recommend and I hope to be back to have a longer stay. Thanks!

Un airbnb che in verità è un residence gestito, molto automatizzato una sola persona e solo dalle 9 alle 19 il resto è gestito con un terminale ... orario di checkin alle 16 (tardissimo) e checkout alle 9.00 prestissimo !!
Detto questo l'appartamento è bello e munito di ogni confort, pulito, arredato in maniera moderna
La posizione è vicinissima alla Sagrata Famiglia
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place was very accommodating and right in the middle of where we wanted to be. Walking distance to Park Guell, La Rambla, the beach and more, and right next to La Sagrada Familia. We were also able to check in early which was nice, and to store our things in the lockers available on the day we checked out, even though we had already checked out. This saved us some worry and we didn't have to carry our heavy packs around with us all day. All in all I would recommend this place!
G
Great place ;  enough space for 3 older kids who sometimes to be on their own, awap from dad who pays the bill but who is also demanding
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice place, top location, very good price quality balance
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Super séjour !! Un superbe emplacement avec l' accès au toit et spa !!!
很棒的房东,专业的服务,airbnb多些这种商家就更棒了!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

El dpto es perfecto! Lindisimo, limpio, comodo, la cocina las habitaciones, la sala todo increible! Esta decorado moderno y todo funciona perfecto. A esto se suma la amabilidad de todos! Super recomendable! Fuimos con niños, en plan familiar. Y esta literalmente a una cuadra de La Sagrada Familia. Gracias por recibirnos!
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Inadmissible que ce logement soit présent sur ce site...
Alles tiptop, ausser die Schliessfächer beim Abreisen waren defekt, zum deponieren des Gepäcks. Jedoch wurde schnell eine Alternative gesucht und gefunden.

Very secure and upscale rental with daily cleaning include. Excellent location for sightseeing and transportation access within city. Would highly recommend to families with older children, very sophisticated decor. Definitely would rent again
Nous avons réservé cette appartement en pensant avoir une belle prestation mais finalement on est un peu déçu. merci tout de même a l'hote d'avoir pris en compte nos remarques.
It is a beautiful apartment in a lovely neighborhood. The spa was wonderful!

El apto impecable aunque un poco pequeñas las habitaciones. Servicio de limpieza perfecto y el gym y spa lo máximo !!
Gracias
Buena experiencia en su conjunto
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fast wie ein Hotel. Schnelles Internet kostet extra. Dachterrasse war leider nur am vorletzten Tag verfügbar

zentrum,direkt neben Saglada Familia!   
Sehr sauber aber vielleicht nicht für Party reise...

Det er ligesom at bo på hotel, og ikke denne oplevelse med de lokale, som Airbnb ellers kan være. Tagterrassen var ikke til rådighed på noget tidspunkt under vores ophold, og i selve lejligheden manglede der stole og glas til alle. Køkkenet er desuden ikke udstyret, så det er velegnet til egen madproduktion, bl.a. er der ikke et skærebræt. Dette ville være anderledes, hvis det var en privat lejlighed. 
Da det er en forholdsvis dyr lejlighed i forvejen, kan man undre sig over, at man skal betale 10 EURO for at få sin baggage opbevaret i 3 timer på afrejsedagen.

Bonjour appartement impeccable  par contre vous devriez dans l'annonce signaler que le spa n'est pas dans l'immeuble ... c pas pratique de plus qu'il faut payer bonnet etc ... donc budgéter la terrasse en haut était sale cdt

This place really was brilliant, it's more like a hotel than other air bnb properties. The daily cleaning service is great and and the spa is a great addition in the building next door. The only slight disappointment was the view from the roof terrace is not as displayed in the photographs and is currently having some improvement work carried out, but for us we were in Barcelona to explore the city not the roof!! Also note there is a fee of €10 to use the lockers and on arrival there is a city tax to pay which is around €10-12. Overall I would highly recommend this place to anyone, suitable for all ages!
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié le confort de l'appartement et l'accès au spa. Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour.
Great apartment and location! Very hotel-like.

The stay at José´s place was amazing. The apartment was super clean, the furniture elegant and classy and the view from the apartment was just beautiful. Also it was possible to check in already around noon as we arrived in the morning - what we really appreciated as check in time is normally 4pm. Further the location is also perfect - close to line L2 and L5 and also a supermarket is right across the street.
All in all a perfect stay - thank you José! :)

El apartamento está ubicado a dos cuadras de La Sagrada Familia, por lo cual se hace muy conveniente a la hora de salir a hacer los tours. La estación de tren està a dos bloques y hay muchos restaurantes y shops alrededor. El apartamento luce mucho màs pequeño de lo que se muestra en las fotos. Pero es lindo, comodo y super limpio. El spa y la piscina estàn en un edificio al lado. No en el mismo edificio del apartamento. La terraza es hermosa y tiene camas muy comodas para pasar la tarde. Nos sentimos muy comodos y muy tranquilos durante nuestra estancia en Barcelona.

Great place near La Sagrada Familia. Only downfall is check in time is really late 4pm. You have to pay for lockers if you want to store your luggage. This air bnb is Castro Residency. It is a hotel not really someone's house. You have access to Spa and Gym next door at Metropolitan which is nice.

Appartement conforme à la description, une entrée gratuite au SPA à 2min à pied 
Séjour très sympa !
Superb apartment with roof terrace and fabulous gym/spa facilities next door (included). The location is perfect and we would definitely book here again!!
An excellent value for money apartment which made a good base whilst visiting Barcelona.

Sehr schönes und großes Appartment mit fantastischem Preis-Leistungsverhältnis mitten in Barcelona. Die traumhafte Kathedrale Sagrada Familia direkt vor der "Haustür", 2 verschiedene U-Bahn Stationen innerhalb weniger Minuten zu Fuß erreichbar. Riesiger privater Balkon direkt am Appartment und tolle Dachterasse für alle Gäste auf dem Dach. Alles sehr modern eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Extrem freundliches Personal. Absoluter Tip für Familien oder größere Gruppen.
Great apartment in commercially run holiday apartment rental. The spa is amazing, and location near La Sagrada was superb. Very clean and comfortable.
Great location and nice place. Would book again!
Der Aufenthalt war sehr schön und angenehm. Jedoch war die Ausstattung der Küche nicht unbedingt genügend für 6 Personen. Ebenfalls gab es nur 4 Stühle am Tisch.
Everything went OK, 100% recommended
Stedet må oppleves synd vi ikke hadde mulighet til å bli lengre

Really great location.  Nicely decorated.  Staff was exceptional, especially the supervisor that assisted with lockers.  We were a bit nervous about leaving our luggage all day before we actually checked in to unit but it worked out very nicely.
It was a wonderful stay! The house is really cozy and cleanliness was at top level. We would definitely come back.

The location is excellent - very close to many good and reasonably priced restaurants but quiet at night, and lovely to be so close to the Sagrada Familia, a spectacular and beautiful building.  The apartment is spacious with all the facilities you would need, the beds are very comfortable, excellent shower in the main bedroom and balcony large enough to sit out on.  The roof terrace has good views but the spa is located in a separate building, not within the apartment block.  There was a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival, but there is a charge for tea, coffee and bottled water.  There are several food shops close by with excellent produce, especially the bakeries!  The staff are very pleasant, helpful and efficient.
muy bonitos los pisos (:

The apartment was beautiful, the location was amazing and the restaurant next door was great. The receptionist was very friendly and any question we had, she would answer. You would not regret staying here. The only thing I want to caution people is that you pay for everything that’s in the apartment (coffee and drinkable water) but they do give you a complimentary wine bottle. The good thing is there is a little market in from that you can buy water from and the coffee at the restaurant next door is about the same price and much better.
Great stay, thanks.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Расположение прямо возле саграла дэ фамилия. Чистые комнаты , хорошие люди.
Spacious apartment- fun neighborhood-spa was amazing but only 1 day pass included for a 6 day stay

Very comfortable and very happy with the space. The host provided a very special courtesy to us which shall remain confidential, however it was particularly trustworthy on his part which we appreciate so much. Very good value for the price. We recommend wholeheartedly. There is a tax that you have to pay on the room which is nominal but unexpected, I think it's just a Spain or Barcelona rule. Early check-in, if available, comes with a fee that is not unreasonable however we didn't know about it ahead of time. But really - a great value and a third of the price or less of a hotel with the same number of rooms and a living area, kitchen etc. We'd stay there again without hesitation and definitely recommend. Thank you for all!

We have a lot of problem when staying in this apartment, the entrance computer was not working well, the room was not ready so we are moved to another room (it’s not really a big deal), the shampoo and body wash was not enough for 6 people for 2 days, and the communication is always in trouble and late.  Basically, it’s a good place to stay despite all the problem we encountered, the room is cleaned. We have no time to go to free SPA, that’s a bit sad.

name: South Kona Country Home Ocean View
summary: Relax in the heart of South Kona, in a beautifully located hillside beach community. This 3 bedroom, 2 bath home offers a picturesque ocean view of Kailua Kona, Kealakekua Bay and Hualalai Volcano, with great snorkeling down at the local beach.
space: Home is where the heart is and this home is exactly that. Coming home to relax and BBQ on a large lanai with majestic ocean view is what vacation is all about.  Located near by are many activities for families, couples and friends.
description: Relax in the heart of South Kona, in a beautifully located hillside beach community. This 3 bedroom, 2 bath home offers a picturesque ocean view of Kailua Kona, Kealakekua Bay and Hualalai Volcano, with great snorkeling down at the local beach. Home is where the heart is and this home is exactly that. Coming home to relax and BBQ on a large lanai with majestic ocean view is what vacation is all about.  Located near by are many activities for families, couples and friends.  Guests have access to wifi, hulu plus and blue ray DVD player.  A simple gym with free weights, weight bench and DVD player.  BBQ, snorkel gear, beach chairs, umbrellas, coolers, stand up paddle board and surf board. The local pebble beach in our Kona Paradise sub division is one mile down the hill and has a magnificent coral reef. Amanda is my property manager and if you need anything she is available to you by email and text. Kona Paradise is a family, friendly, comfortable, safe quiet neighborhood. We are very clo
neighborhood_overview: Kona Paradise is a family, friendly, comfortable, safe quiet neighborhood. We are very close with each other and have many dinners, BBQ's and celebrations together.  There is always someone available if a helping hand is needed or and questions need to be answered.
notes: Kona Paradise is centrally located with many adventures to be had near by.  Volcano National Park is an hour and half away, Pu'uhonua O Honaunau National Historic Park is 15 minutes away with great snorkeling and swimming with dolphins. Captain Cook Monument is 20 minutes away, you can Hike down to monument or Kayak (with a permit). Hookena Beach park is 10 minutes away.  with possible dolphin swimming as well.  Green Sands Beach and South Point is 45 min away. Kailua Kona is 45 min away.  Hawaii GET# (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
transit: Rental Car is the best mode of transportation on Big Island.
access: Guests have access to wifi, hulu plus and blue ray DVD player.  A simple gym with free weights, weight bench and DVD player.  BBQ, snorkel gear, beach chairs, umbrellas, coolers, stand up paddle board and surf board. The local pebble beach in our Kona Paradise sub division is one mile down the hill and has a magnificent coral reef.
interaction: Amanda is my property manager and if you need anything she is available to you by email and text.
house_rules: • Check-in time is 4PM. • No parties or events • Not suitable for pets • No smoking Respectful to property and neighbors. Treat my home as you would your home and personal possession.  Be conservative with electricity and water. The home is in catchment so water conservation is key especially if it hasn't been raining. Leave the home the same way you entered it. Garbage leave in cans or take to transfer station on the way to town. My home is in the country so it is country living. It's not a hotel or condo, but it is charming and peacful. Thank you.

host.host_about: Aloha, If your reading this it means you decided to stay in my beautiful Hale (home in Hawaiian). My property manager Martin has been the one who has been answering your questions and in communication with you.  He takes care of my home and bookings while I am away at sea for work.  It is strange to write about myself but here goes.   I am a bit of everything, but at heart I'm a sailor. By being a sailor I can do the things that I love the most. I like to travel the world on my time off. To see, smell, feel and experience what I don't know and sometimes don't understand .  I am an avid reader and a complete science fiction freak, I actually subscribe to sci fi/fantasy magazine. Reading is my zen to chill and relax. I love exotic and different food while drinking yummy wine.  It helps loving the outdoors because I can burn off what I eat. I enjoy, hiking, camping, surfing, snorkeling, diving. Anything that is on or surrounded by ocean or forest makes me happiest.  I make friends easily and love spending time with cool and interesting people.  What drives me, is moving forward and always learning something new.  "you can never cross the ocean unless you have courage to lose sight of the shore."

reviews.comments:
This is a beautiful house for a family vacation or for staying with a few friends (there is plenty of space). It is located near a steep downhill road towards the sea and offers a beautiful view to the sea from the porch.

We stayed there for two nights and felt very at ease. As a nice touch, the host prepared a binder with all the necessary information in and around the house as well as plenty of useful suggestions for the area (shops, restaurants, beaches, activities, ...)

The only downside(s) we found was the steep(!) cleaning fee, combined with a lot of instructions on what needs to cleaned by the guests, especially as it applies to short-term stays like ours as well. The shower in the master bedroom and the stove were not fully functional, but as we were the first guests in the house, I'm sure this will be improved upon.
We wish we had longer vacation so we can stay here longer. The house is very clean. The kitchen has everything we need. More fans or air conditioner will make it become a prefect place to stay.
We really liked our stay at Simin's place. The sunset view is magnificent. And waking up seeing the sea is great.

We enjoyed our stay at Simin's. She wasn't in the area at the time we visited, but her friend Martin helped us with checking in. The home is about 30 minutes away from a grocery store/restaurants, but is very peaceful. There are lovely views of the ocean and a beautiful sunset everyday. Definitely a place to relax!
House was great - just as described in posting. We had a wonderful time.

We enjoyed our stay in this cozy home.  Inside and outside are both beautiful.  We are so grateful for the recommendation of the pebble beach in the neighborhood, we spent 3 evenings in a row playing in the surf until dark!  We are grateful for Simin's hospitality, though we did not see anyone upon check in or out, we felt taken care of through and through.  Aloha.

Wonderful home, great view, friendly neighbors, just as described. It is a perfect place for a family retreat. Thank you Simin for sharing your home with us. We had a great time! 
We hope to be back!

Nice ocean view and we arrived here around 10pm, location is good for snorkeling nearby. House has snorkeling gears and quite considerate. Drinking water is empty(maybe last customer drank them all) but everything else are good. Recommend for party and multiple people.
Simin's house was beautiful and comforting. I would definitely stay here again.
This house was amazing! We had a great stay! Everything was clean and confortable. Simin answered questions if needed and left a binder full of informations!

We enjoyed our stay in Simi.n's place. There was an issue with the master shower and she was quick to inform us and was very accommodating. Her place was well located to many things. It would have been helpful to have more instructions about how to use her TV other than what was in her book. She and her property manager were helpful and accommodating and fair.

全体的に清潔感の有る一軒家でした｡
お風呂やﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰも何も問題ありません｡
ｷｯﾁﾝに少しｱﾘが出ますがそれも問題ありません｡
ﾃﾞｯｷからの素晴らしい景色が全てを忘れさせてくれます｡
そのﾃﾞｯｷからは一生の思い出になるよな夕日が楽しめます｡
坂を下った先のﾋﾞｰﾁもまた最高です｡
黒い砂､青い海､打ち寄せた波の白さが印象に残ります｡
是非また行きたいです｡

Very nice vacation rental! The binder on the kitchen counter with information on the house and area is truly very helpful! We could not have found the food market without it on the day we arrive. And the barbecue equipment is great!

Great private setting and very comfortable home.  The deck was truly amazing.  Two of three  beds were comfortable. Caretaker was responsive to a few problems.  The residential neighborhood was pleasant.  Most of the surrounding neighbors have dogs, all friendly and "talkative".

Simin's house is stunning and we are very jealous that she gets to live there half of the year! Stunning spot on the West side of Big Island, with the most incredible balcony with an amazing view of the ocean and stars at night. The balcony has an amazing barbecue, and so we spent our evenings mostly on there! Lovely house, go for it!

the location is so amazing relaxing and fully equipped with all you need to cook, bbq, snorkle and feel good. the views are great, it is very spacious (2 adults, 2 kids) and in a very comforting and quiet neighborhood. it is also good located for trips. 100% recommendation. we had a great time...

South Kona Country Home is a peaceful home away from home.  You can only see one roof from the back deck, so it feels very private & isolated.  However neighbors were close enough to check on us in a heavy rain, and help us with garbage on the way out of town!

House is far enough down in South Kona that it is fairly rural.  Stores are a ways out.  Garbage is not collected on site, and needs to be dropped off at the dump station (easy enough to do, we just had cars full of luggage upon departure, so very friendly neighbor offered to take our garbage on his next trip).

Water for the house is on a catchment system, so conservation is of the essence.  We came from California (currently having our 5th year of drought), so conserving was not hard.  Plus it was rainy season, so there was plenty of water while we were there!

Deck is lovely, and truly the most inviting part of the house.  The rest of the house is nice and comfortable, but the outdoors beckon when your in Hawaii!  House is comfortable.  Fans in all bedrooms.  Kitchen is well equipped and has most everything you could need.  I wish we would have stopped by the house before shopping, because there was quite a bit of groceries (that seemed to be from previous visitors).  We ended up leaving some groceries like previous visitors did.  It's Hawaii so there are bugs, gecko's etc. so keeping doors & window screens shut is critical for your own comfort!

Lovely!  Comfortable! Hawaii country life!
Yes, the house was as advertised.  Simin's information book along with various brochures definitely helped.

Simi's house is a great place for family vacation. Even if she was not there, she left a lot of tips and indications to move around. The house is a lively and pleasant place. The view from the terrace is just inspiring. We had a great time. Thank you
Great

This home was amazing, Great view with an huge deck. The whole place is large -- plenty of space -- plenty of towels and the best thing is there are snorkel sets and boards available to use with mats & umbrellas ALL YOU NEED. The home was definately clean and cosy though it did have a smell to it (which I think is just the water that runs through the drains and such) but it's nothing over powering. it is a great home in a quiet place.
We had a very nice stay!! Everything we needed for 5 people was there and we felt comfortable and at home
Nice, secluded place with a to die for view. Although tired home and lack of cleanness diminish the experience
Simin's place is wonderful, great views, silence, a true Hawaiian gem!
Great little place on the coast!

We really enjoyed the scenic, quiet, and lush tropical location. The house is comfortable and modestly appointed with a really great rear deck that overlooks the ocean and provided some fantastic sunsets.  We prepared a lot of our own meals, which turned out to be a necessity, as the house is a good 45 to 55 minutes from Kailua depending on traffic.  However, South Kona (and Volcanos NP) are more accessible from here.
Simply amazing

sehr schönes, grosses Haus mit  grossem Deck mit Aussicht über das Meer. Der Pebble Beach  ist schnell zu erreichen mit dem Auto (steile Strasse). Es hat alles was man braucht und eine gute Beschreibung der Umgebung und Einkaufmöglichkeiten.
It was a great holiday! Easy and accurate communication, travel book and insider tips were awaiting us in the house. It's a great place and I'd return any time!
Lovely view and neighborhood. Definitely visit the beach park at the bottom of the neighborhood!  Could stand a thorough cleaning, but overall that was tolerable.

Very nice location, amazing view from back porch. Sunsets are beautiful, dramatic landscape. The black pebble beach at the bottom of the hill is wonderful. Short drive to great snorkeling spots. Host guide book is very helpful to find local things to do.

The house is beautiful and the terrace which overlooks the ocean is amazing.. the view is breathtaking and the space very open and large.. with very comfortable seating and a hammock to take in the sunset view or morning breeze...we have breakfast out in contemplation and enjoying the nice weather this time a year.. The rest of the house is specious and everything is as you see it in the pictures.. Location is good since it is somewhat half way between the north and the south for he west side of the island so you can equally go down to the Volcano or north to the Valley... with many beautiful beaches to admire in between. Pebble beach was great for snoring and even diving.. while being small enough and reserve enough to be quiet.  
The only thing that took us by surprise was how early the places close.. so plan dinners around 6.. not that many options for bars if at all at a reasonable driving distance.. so best to get your own provision to the house if you enjoy a night cap! Overall the experience and the house was great!!

Our group of 5 adults stayed here at the end of June. The size of the space was great. We used all three bedrooms and both bathrooms. The lanai is beautiful especially in the early hours of the morning. Fair warning that there is a big mosquito issue in this area of the island from the consistent sun/rain/overcast each day and lush greenery. We did not get to enjoy the lanai too much for that reason. Simin provides lots of mosquito candles but the mosquitoes are vicious. Our husbands tuffed it out and grilled battling the mosquitos. Simin's book is very helpful at explaining but maybe add to the listing description too.

The house is on a roof water catchment system which we didn't remember seeing in the listing description. Luckily we had plenty of rain to make sure we didn't run out of water for showers, dishes, etc. Simin's book explains the system. Drinking water can be bought/refilled at the market. Also, trash has to be taken to the local dump 15 minutes away. This was a bit difficult with our group and rental car size. We were not able to take trash on our last day and Simin was kindly good with that. 

The driveway and general area of this part of the island is steep, with curving highways. Be prepared to return at reasonable hours before sunset as the highway is also very curvy and dark. Also, restaurants, gas, and market are about a 20-30 minute drive away. They do close early so plan ahead. We enjoyed the Choice Market selection and Keoki's Ono Fish n Chips is the best! 

Kona is a good hour drive. Hilo closer to 2 hours. Volcano park 1.5 hours. 30 minutes or less to most of the coffee farms. 

The drive to the pebble beach is very steep. I don't recommend walking unless you are in very, very good shape. The area of the house is very safe and also secluded. The avocado tree in front is beautiful, 

Window coverings in the future would be nice. We often watched movies at night and are from the City, so it felt about odd to not have curtains. But the windows do let in a lot of natural light during the day. The master room faces the lanai. If you have a big group, privacy can be an issue. 

More fans would be nice. We bought our own. We had a few very warm days and lost power for we think about 30 minutes but luckily we were already heading to the beach. We kept windows and doors closed to keep out the bugs. They did often sneak in through the screens if not closed.

Overall, we enjoyed our adventurous stay and appreciated Simin's communication and book. We definitely had a memorable stay and the house was a perfect size for our group of five. Thanks, Simin.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our stay at Simin's place was just wonderful. The view from the lanai is breathtaking, the nature around it, trees, flowers and even the geckos made it very special - every morning we enjoyed it very much. Thank you for your hospitality and a very easy-going AirBnB experience.

This is a really nice and spacious home. We had five people with us and it was plenty big enough to a accommodate our needs. We loved the big Lanai and sat out there most mornings and evenings. The outdoor eating spots are wonderful. The view is spectacular! There are plenty of things in the kitchen to use for prepping meals and a propane grill outside as well. Simon provides many various beach supplies as well. The pebble beach at the end of the road as well as the “hidden” beach are Both really pretty. We very much enjoyed our stay here!
Good place, very nice balcony!

Incredible views of the Pacific, amazing covered porch with a gas grill. The two smaller bedrooms are on the small side, the master is quite large and has an amazing view. The house is comfy and lived-in, although not totally up to date or sparkling clean (it is the tropics after all). The location is on the remote side but for us it was a great home base!
坐落在科纳山区的安静小屋｡周围都是私家别墅｡房间设备齐全,天台超级大,视野超级美｡适合一家人悠闲渡过几天,但需要事先准备充分的食物,因为开车去餐厅和超市都要20公里以上｡

This is an amazing private home in the rainforest. The home feels like you’re in the jungle and then the deck opens up to unbelievable ocean views. Five of us stayed here and found it very roomy with lots of space to hang out. Great kitchen, fully equipped. 
The location is central to many island adventures and hikes by rental car. Simin left a cool homemade guidebook of her fave restaurants and day trips. The closest sandy beach is a quick 10 minute drive where we swam and watched dolphins. 
If you’re looking for a secluded retreat ... this place is for you. Thanks Simin!

ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝが最高で､毎日ﾗﾅｲで朝ごはんと夜ご飯を食べました｡ｺﾅ空港から1時間ぐらいかかる少し田舎にある家ですが､ﾋﾞｰﾁへ向かう道沿いが絶景だったり､ﾄﾞﾗｲﾌﾞするにはいい場所でした｡
ありがとうございました｡

Simin’s place is absolutely beautiful! The views are stunning and the beach at the bottom of the road was delightful! 
Location was a great base for us to explore the island. 
The house had everything that we needed for our stay, and loads of helpful suggestions for places to go and things to see.
Loved visiting Hawaii, and really hope I get the chance to return again one day! 
Thanks for letting us stay in your lovely home! 
Jane
An all-around wonderful place.

The outdoor space is phenomenal. Host was accessible and the place was more than adaquate and clean. Great location if snorkeling and kayaking are in your future. Neighborhood was friendly and helpful!

This place is a very solid pick. When you first drive up you might be confused because all you see at first is a very small building. That's just the gym! The whole house is quite large and is down below the workout shed. The porch is quite large and gorgeous. The first thing we did when we arrived was to crack some beers and lounge in the hammock and porch swing which look out on the water less than a mile below. The porch is surrounded by various colorful, flowering trees and avocado trees. It feels very lush. The vegetation completely blocks any visual of the neighbors so it took me a while realize there was a house on one side of us. We could hear them sometimes but it wasn't annoying. The house has a lot of extras that made our vacation special. The grill was crucial - we used it almost every night and it made dinners so easy and delicious, and clean up was a breeze. We ate out on the porch every night, and then played cards or just talked. The fridge is full of condiments so you probably won't need to worry about shelling out for long-lasting extras like ketchup, mayo, mustard, hot sauce, etc. There is a drip coffee maker AND a french press for coffee snobs. Beyond the kitchen, there is a lot of beach/water gear: Several sets of snorkels with fins; two beach chairs (one is a little worse for wear but usable); two beach umbrellas, a cooler and beach towels. You might need to sort through the snorkel gear a bit to make sure you're getting the good stuff, since a couple of the masks are broken. A couple of us still rented gear at Snorkel Bob's because we wanted to go several times and couldn't get a good fit with any of the masks at the house, but two of us just used the house gear the whole time. I wasted space in my suitcase on beach towels, since this place had solid ones on offer. Most notable of all, though, was the friendly and communicative demeanor of Simin and her property manager, Martin. Soon after my reservation, Simin let me know that the sink in the guest bathroom wasn't working, though she hoped to have it repaired before we arrived. Shortly before we arrived, she let me know that the sink was still broken, and offered us a generous discount without any negotiation on my part. I received a text message from Martin on the day we were supposed to arrive, and then he was refilling the water tank at the property when we arrived, and was helpful and friendly. Then, toward the end of our visit, I realized that I had overbooked our stay, so we were paying for an extra night after our flight back to the mainland! I sent Simin a message and she immediately responded, refunding me that night of our stay. She didn't...

I had mixed feelings about this place. The house definitely has its own character. The layout and amenities were awesome for the most part and the outdoor space was so inviting. The location was also central to the activities were were planning for the trip. There were a couple things that made the experience less than desirable. The outdoor patio would have been a great place to spend a good amount of our time, but the mosquitoes were out 24/7. Bug spray/citronella didn't help, those guys were vicious! So despite the patio being one of the main reasons we booked the house, we couldn't really use it :( Also, everything in the kitchen has a thin coating of dirt/grime. All the pots/pans/utensils/shelves etc were dirty.  Another downside to our stay was there was a leak prior to our arrival that caused us limited use of the second bathroom and one of the bedrooms. Martin was kind enough to warn us prior to our arrival, but it wasn't a desirable situation. The last thing, which isn't much of a criticism, but just unexpected was the windows in the master bedroom don't have shades, so be prepared to get up with the sun (and the neighbors roosters and dogs). Value-wise, not great compared to other rentals we've had in the area, especially since two rooms were out of order, but that's obliviously subjective. Other than that, this place is pretty much as described...country living, in a central location, with a great view.
A magnificent place. The area was so peacefull and lovely. The deck woooow. We just loves it. The Nature there is no word-to describe it. Highly reccomanded.
great stay! Thanks!
Amazing porch with an amazing ocean view.
Great space, worth the stay.  Great views of the ocean
Great views, has everything you need to soak up your Big island experience

name: Ainani Jade Ohana 3 Bedroom/2 Bath
summary: Ainani Jade Ohana in Volcano Village is a lovely and spacious beautified house with vaulted ceilings, many windows overlooking tall Hapu'u ferns in a rainforest setting, peaceful views awaiting you whether it is sunny, misty or rainy
space: Ainani Jade Ohana in Volcano Village is a lovely and spacious beautified house with vaulted ceilings, many windows overlooking tall Hapu'u ferns in a rainforest setting, with beautiful peaceful views awaiting you whether it is sunny, misty or rainy.   Fully furnished, nicely carpeted, wood stove, high speed internet, Brand new 50" flat screen TV with DVD/VCR player and new Black Leather couches, and a full kitchen with remodeled cabinets and new water filter for drinking water from the tap!   New Propane BBQ 4 burner on site for guests to use! Jade House has a King sized bed, and 3 Double beds in 3 bed/2 bath upstairs unit. Sleep up to 8 in beds! King size bed has 'Memory Foam Topper', electric blanket, separate controls, TV VCR player.  There are 2 double/full beds in the second guest room, and 1 double/full bed in the third guest room. All the beds have electric blankets! New Low Standard Rate of $75/night based on double occupancy!  $18/night/additional guests Additional 14.416% tax
description: Ainani Jade Ohana in Volcano Village is a lovely and spacious beautified house with vaulted ceilings, many windows overlooking tall Hapu'u ferns in a rainforest setting, peaceful views awaiting you whether it is sunny, misty or rainy Ainani Jade Ohana in Volcano Village is a lovely and spacious beautified house with vaulted ceilings, many windows overlooking tall Hapu'u ferns in a rainforest setting, with beautiful peaceful views awaiting you whether it is sunny, misty or rainy.   Fully furnished, nicely carpeted, wood stove, high speed internet, Brand new 50" flat screen TV with DVD/VCR player and new Black Leather couches, and a full kitchen with remodeled cabinets and new water filter for drinking water from the tap!   New Propane BBQ 4 burner on site for guests to use! Jade House has a King sized bed, and 3 Double beds in 3 bed/2 bath upstairs unit. Sleep up to 8 in beds! King size bed has 'Memory Foam Topper', electric blanket, separate controls, TV VCR player.  There are 2 double
house_rules: Service or ESA's are allowed provided you agree to pay for any damages made by the pet Smoking allowed OUTSIDE ONLY

host.host_about: We love helping travelers plan their vacations!

reviews.comments: We were looking for a place to crush in for our one-day visit to the national volcano park, and we contacted Merlenna the morning we intent to stay. Merlenna was super responsive - approving our stay and sending us instruction within minutes. The place, as described was very huge with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. It was quite clean although the bedding looked a bit of old, but we were satisfied with our one night stay. We even woke up in the morning seeing some peacock in the yard. The place is very close (~15mins) to the Jagger Museum where we saw the famous lava glow at night. Definitely would recommend this place!
It was a nice stay here. It's big enough for our family, 8 adults. There are plenty kitchenware.
Just as described....
