My friends and I had a wonderful time at Tutu’s Hale!  The location is in a very quiet neighborhood and near a couple of beautiful beaches.  Local eateries and a grocery store are less than 5 minutes away. Very convenient. 

The home is tastefully decorated showing its island family heritage.  We felt instantly comfortable. There is plenty of living space for everyone and the kitchen is well equipped to cook great meals/ dinners if you decide to stay in.
 
Vai, the property manager, was fantastic.  She provided the perfect amount of communication and service.  It was a pleasure coordinating with her.

We highly recommend.

The home was wonderful. Communication before arriving was great. We didn't get a chance to meet Vai but Blaine stopped by and he was very kind. The home was perfect for our family-- we came with both sets of parents and there were two separate wings which was great. The bathrooms were in good condition too. While we were there it was pretty hot and humid (trade winds were limited due to pressure over the island), but we had windows open and fans running and felt fine. We cooked breakfast every morning and a couple dinners and the large spacious kitchen made it easy for 4 people to be in the kitchen at once. Sitting outside in the yard on the reclining chairs while a breeze blew thru in the mornings and the sun came up over the mountains was one of our favorite parts! 

Totally recommend this place!

The house is just lovely with everything you need for a comfortable stay and location is fantastic for being close to "town" and the best beach at Lanikai and my favorite hike (pillbox and kaiwa ridge trail). The 4 bedrooms are situated in a way that still provides quiet from the common areas and television area where early risers might be gathering. The house is pretty warm and often hotter inside than it is outside - 1 bedroom does not have a ceiling fan but there are 2 standing fans in the house (but the house could probably use a cooling fan or standalone airconditioner).  The front door does not have a screen so I would not recommend leaving it open for air because critters fly in!

The house is very sweet.  It definitely feels like home.

It is very clean and well-maintained.  The large kitchen was great for a family 0f 8 staying there.  We also had my 6 month old baby with us.  It was definitely nice staying at a home versus a hotel with a young baby.  

I also forgot to request for an early check-in for my parents and brother, who were arriving one day earlier than the rest of us.  Blaine and Vai were very accommodating and made sure that my parents were able to get in earlier than planned and settled in.

Thank you again!
Very nice place, felt much more like a home rather than a vacation rental. We would rent it again if we come back to Oahu with a large group.

As a family of 5 the house was perfect, it has been renovated beautifully and has so many perfect touches throughout.
Spacious, comfortable and felt so homely.
Awesome location, close to shops and places to eat and a short drive from the beaches.
Vai is only a phone call away and will help with anything.
Cant wait to go back.

This place is really like home away from home.  So spacious and comfortable.  Amazing kitchen, plenty of room for everyone to sit at the dining table, plenty of comfy seats in the lounge area, extremely comfy beds, plenty of hanging space and drawers in all 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms makes it easy for large families staying here.  All appliances are new and spotless, as is the whole house.  Lovely to have the beach gear to use.  Many gorgeous beaches and eateries just a short drive away.  Quiet street.  Lovely views.  I could go on and on - it was perfect - I highly recommend this place.
Nice, comfortable home with washer and dryer available if needed.. Open floor plan which makes it nice to hang out and visit with family or friends..

Very spacious living area with huge kitchen and a big yard with a view. Convenient location, lots of beaches, grocery, and dining options within 10 minutes. Access to other parts of the island is also easy. Perfect option if you want to spend your days at the beach and your nights grilling at home with family or friends.
Great views, quiet neighborhood, convenient shopping, well appointed kitchen and a fun ginger kitty who entertained my grandchildren.  Very nice management/owners!!

After some issues with delayed flights (London clearly can't cope with a bit of snow!) we arrived later than expected and were praying that the long journey and shortened break would be worth it. We were not disappointed.

The house certainly exceeded our expectations -  the little touches such as the local coffee and chocolates were very welcoming and appreciated! You can tell this is a much-loved family home and we really enjoyed our stay. 

The location was perfect for us - unbelievable beaches only a short drive away. The view from the garden is lovely and we realised very quickly that our decision to stay near Kailua vs the touristy Waikiki was absolutely right.  

The communication from Vai was brilliant, she was very warm, friendly and professional. She answered my questions really quickly and when an issue arose (ours) she was extremely understanding. Vai and Blaine are the epitome of the amazing hospitality that Hawaiians prides themselves on and I would really recommend staying here.

Spacious, comfortable and well equipped house with amazing views from the back garden ideally situated for the beautiful Kailua and Lanakai beaches. Within walking distance of The Shack Bar which does food and is family friendly and a short drive from the town centre. Communication was excellent from both Blaine and the manager Vai.

This was a great place to stay!  The house is spacious, clean, and beautiful.  It was really nice to stay in Kailua in close proximity to shops and restaurants but away from the congested tourist traps.  The house is great, but the level of preparation and professionalism of the host is truly distinctive.  Everything about the process went smoothly.  This was the perfect place for the 6 people plus a baby in my party and offered an experience far better than any hotel could have.  I think this is a great value and recommend it to anyone planning to travel to Oahu, particularly if you have a large group!
The place was perfect for our vacation. Quieter area of Oahu, clean, and tasteful decor. The welcome treats, snorkeling gear, and beach stuff was an added bonus!
Such a cute home!! We loved the openness of the home itself, and was great for our bridal shower weekend. Highly recommend!

Tutu’s place was absolutely a great place to stay! It was the perfect place for three couples to stay with 3 rooms having queen beds and an extra double bed room. The location was great for us since we only minutes away from Lanikai beach and all the great food in Kailua. The place was very clean and very spacious for us. Vai was available to speak to throughout the day if we had any questions. I would definitely recommend this place for friends and family looking to enjoy a great time in Oahu! Thanks again!

Thank you so much for the wonderful stay!!! We loved your house and felt the beautiful family love and history all throughout!! We felt thoroughly spoiled by the kitchen and are going home with lots of ideas for renovating ours! :) The fenced yard was great for our kids to play in.

Our stay in your home was wonderful and we really appreciate all that you did to communicate with us and take care of us! We would definitely recommend your home to others.

Thank you again!!!
Our favorite place to stay when we travel to Oahu!! Can’t reccommed this beautiful space enough!

Tutu's hale is a special place and was perfect for our family visit. The home is spacious and clean.  My grandson loved playing in the yard while we barbecued.  The memorabilia and photos inside were special and very interesting. It was everything we hoped for and more, we would love to come back and hope to so soon.  Mahalo for sharing you hale with us. Aloha

If you are ready to escape your busy schedule and enjoy time with your family but don’t want to feel like a tourist (unless you decide to) - look no further! 
From the start communication with Vai & Blaine was very easy and their responses were very prompt. 
Our family arrived before 4:00pm and we were able to get in the house early. We were very grateful for that since some of our family had 10h flight from Australia. 
When you enter the house you feel very welcomed. Everything was clean and nicely organized. Snacks were waiting for us- very thoughtful and nice gesture. 
The house was perfect for 6 adults, one teenager and 15 month old. We enjoyed our morning coffee in the backyard watching sunrise. 
It was very convenient to have a kitchen equipped with all tools for cooking, dishwasher,laundry, towels, beach toys, parking for two cars, etc. The house has many windows and high sealing -great light and the wind keeps the house very cool and comfortable. (No need for AC in April -temp. high 70s). Each room has fans too. There are books, magazines and guidebooks to plan your activities. 

The neighborhood is quiet and just down the street there is Safeway and restaurants. 
Few min drive from the house are the most beautiful white sand (Website hidden by Airbnb) beautiful! 

We definitely recommend this house especially if you want to escape touristy areas and be woken up by soft sound of birds.  



Aloha! ✨

Beautiful home! Spacious, comfortable, great size kitchen and backyard space. Felt right at home. Blaine's home definitely made our stay more relaxing. Loved that there were plenty of beach towels, mats, and swim toys. I would definitely stay here again. Places we loved in Kailua: Morning Brew (best veggie breakfast sandwich & their scones are to die for), Island Snow (shaved ice & local wears), Down to Earth Organic & Natural (grocery & cafe), and Kailua Beach (morning walks).

This is a great house in a quiet neighborhood. The hosts are very nice and have gone above and beyond to supply the house with common items you may need during your stay. We would definitely book this house again.

This is a terrific place with all the amenities - clean and very authentic. We had meetings all day, every day there - so we did not see much on the outside but the house was perfect for what we did. It is roomy, well-appointed and we all enjoyed it very much. No issues or negatives that we can identify - Highly recommended to anyone tourist or businessperson that would be staying in Kailua.

We were so pleased with this home! We stayed here in the days leading up to our wedding with some friends of ours, and the house was perfect for our group! Vai was quick to respond to all of our questions, and she was so graceful when we accidentally parked in the wrong spot. The home is well stocked with everything you’ll need for your stay. It was super clean and spacious, too. Kailua was a perfect place to call home as we explored Oahu! We really loved our time here and would definitely be back!

My family and I absolutely loved staying at Tutu’s Hale. It felt so homely, we really appreciated the personal touches and the photos of your families history on display. The amenities were fantastic and the kitchen is one of the best we’ve ever been in! The house is styled do well and the back yard has such a wonderful view. 

Thank you so much for having us. Your house made our stay in Kailua very special. 

Many thanks,
Peach

Great house in a quiet neighborhood with convenient access to everything!  The backyard is a great place to drink kona coffee and watch the sunrise!  Very clean and has about everything you need for a fabulous vacation!

Home was great.. but I didn’t think to check if the home had an Air conditioner as I assumed all homes in O’ahu had them since it’s very hot and humid like Arizona.. we had to leave the house bcz my son was just having such a hard time with the heat.. didn’t get to stay at the home .. so we left without a refund.. so if this is a must .. do not stay at this home.. if you can tolerate the heat.. then this is a great home to stay at!

Beautiful home in local community. Great view, wonderfully accommodating for families with 4 bedrooms. Great backyard with a grill. Snorkeling gear for the kids. Gorgeous kitchen! 
We throughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend staying here to all our friends.

We recommend loading up with groceries at Sam’s Club versus the local Safeway. The prices were much cheaper.
Also “The Shack” was an amazing local hang out on the corner with great wings, waitresses, and drinks.

We really enjoyed the house.  It is clean, comfortable and has a great kitchen for cooking and entertaining.  The location is good if you want to get away from the hustle, but be close enough to easily get to beaches, Waikiki, and the majority of island destinations.  Vai, the property manager, was helpful and communicative.  The beds were comfy and the hosts provided basic toiletries and a nice welcome basket when we arrived.  Both the host and the house were charming.
Wonderful house that embraces Hawaii
Quiet neighborhood, great Kailua location.

A delightful family home, well equipped, in a quiet suburb. Walking distance to amenities (supermarket, food eateries, sports bar, cinema). Four genuine double rooms, tastefully furnished with a good sized open plan living area. Thoroughly enjoyed our two week stay.
와이키키쪽이랑은 떨어져 있지만 차로 접근하기에 불편함은 없습니다. 숙소 근처에 차로 약 5분거리에 식료품점이 있어서 음식을 사먹거나 장을 보기에 불편한점은 없었습니다. 한적한 동네에서 가족들끼리 전혀 불편한점 없이 잘 지내다가 왔습니다.
Really great hospitality, we felt instantly at home in Tutu’s beach cottage. Loved the open floor plan, was great for a group. Good view too!
Tumeke!
It was exactly as described, perfect for a family!

Overall terrific place to stay. Just about everything you could want in a vacation house is here. Excellent kitchen with plenty for prepping and cooking. Spacious and comfy dining area too. 

We slept well, thanks to ceiling fans and plenty of windows to catch the breezes. 

Nice location - quick shot to Safeway and central for beaches, hikes and plenty of beautiful Hawaii adventures. Hosts checked in often to see if we needed anything, and were always quick with answers.
Great house to relax and enjoy your visit to the island. The house looks better in person and has plenty of space and rooms to meet your needs. Definitely would stay here again in the future.

1歳8ヶ月の息子と主人と3人で訪れました｡日本からｵｱﾌ島へ10時過ぎに到着｡16時のﾁｪｯｸｲﾝでしたがﾜｲｷｷでﾗﾝﾁをしてから向かったら少し遅れる位でちょうどよい時間でした｡
車で数分ですぐにｶｲﾙｱﾀｳﾝへも行けますし､有名なﾊﾟﾝｹｰｷのお店やｽｰﾊﾟｰ､大型ﾎｰﾑｾﾝﾀｰなど何でもありました｡
ｵｰﾅｰは私の質問にすぐ回答してくれたので安心でした｡

部屋はとてもきれいにしてありましたし､食器を洗う新品のｽﾎﾟﾝｼﾞまで用意してあり驚きました｡食器類も足りなくなることはありませんでした｡
洗濯機もあるし､乾燥機は早く乾きとても助かりました｡

庭で子ども用ﾌﾟｰﾙで遊びました｡
芝生に山の景色が最高でした｡

なんといっても､全ての部屋のｾﾝｽがよくておしゃれなおうちでした｡
そしてとても家族を大切にされていた方が住んでいたのが良く分かる小物たち｡
みんなでこのおうちに集まって楽しく過ごしていたんだろうなと想像をすると､温かい気持ちになりました｡
またいつか泊まりたいと思います｡ありがとうございました!
Great place and like the title suggests, and amazing view!

Tutu’s house was everything we hoped it could be and more. The house was a dream and everything was so close to everything else. Kailua is the perfect place to stay. You’re still in a city but not in the hustle and bustle of Honolulu. I would absolutely recommend Tutu’s Hale to anyone! It was perfect for our family of 8

The host of the residence Vai was extremely helpful throughout the stay. She came over and spent a good couple of hours helping us with some issues we were having. 
The place was very clean and spacious and everything we needed for our stay. Def recommend staying here if you’re considering it.
Love being in a real neighborhood which is still close to beaches, groceries and freeway access.
House was inviting and relaxing to hang around at.

A beautiful home that has been tastefully refurbished. It has a small backyard, with off-street parking and district views.  It's in a lovely quiet neighborhood  and is very handy to the local supermarket.  Easy drive back into Waikiki, over to Pearl Harbour, the airport, or quick trip down to the local beaches of Kailua and Lanakai.
Beautiful place

Great experience overall. 

Our small family came from different parts of the country amd we hadn't seen each other in a long time. We were playing card games and were shocked to get a phone call saying a neighbor was complaining. It really sucked the life out of our trip. Expect VERY STRICT neighbors that complain.

The towels and blankets have not been updated in a really long time. 

It is a nice manufactured style home with a nice sized kitchen. 

The location and nearby amenities are what really make this place worth it. We could walk to nearby shopping. It really helped when we realized there wasn't any toilet paper supplied other than the nearly empty rolls that were there.

I don't mean to make this sound like a bad review, becaise other than these things, it was adequate for what we were in Hawaii to do.

What a great experience!  The house is even better than the descriptions.  Very clean, roomy and comfortably furnished.  Lots of little touches that made us feel right at home even a cute little tabby cat that faithfully guards the front yard.  Great home for a family stay.  Communications with Vai were excellent with quick replys to our questions.  Short drives to several beautiful beaches, restaurants, shopping, hiking, etc.  20-25 minute drive to Waikiki if crowds are your thing otherwise Kailua has everything you need.

I brought my family to Kailua, which is where I grew up!  The home was convenient to beach, stores, and food.  Vai, the host, was great at communicating and offered help should we need it.  Loved that the home had a bbq and beach stuff!  The neighborhood was quiet, which was amazing.  My one and only suggestion would be to have a patio set or more seating in the beautiful backyard.  We would have loved to sit out there more as the weather was amazing!!  Thank you for an amazing 10 days in your home, hopefully we will get to stay here again someday!

Blaine's place felt like a home away from home! The backyard offers beautiful views and plenty of space to sit outside and relax if you don't feel like wandering down to the beach. The kitchen is updated, spacious and perfect for having a big family dinner. Amenities like having shampoo, conditioner, soap, beach towels as well as bath towels were very much appreciated. The home is walking distance to Safeway, but also less than 2 miles away from much more shopping + food. The closest beach is 2 miles away, and some of my friends were able to go on morning runs to and from the beach! Everyone in my group was pleasantly surprised with the home. Thank you Vai (property manager) for making our stay so easy.
Very cozy. Nice View.
Home was spacious and very clean would highly recommend staying here.
Had a nice stay at this cosy home. Would recommend to guests who like a homey/family feel to it
우리는 가격이 싼 편이라서 기대를 안했지만 이곳은 완벽했다. 주방에있는 각종 도구들은 우리가 식사를 하는데에 있어 정말 많은 도움이 됐다. 화장실은 잘갖춰져 있었고 부족한점이라면 환풍구가 조금 지저분했다. 침실은 너무 완벽했다. 이 집은 다음에도 오고 싶은 집이다.

Great place in a great location.  Beautiful home.  We had a problem with the hot water but the host was responsive and willing to work with us when the problem couldn't be solved.  First stay in Kailua and it is a fantastic place.

name: traditional and Charming room

neighborhood_overview: Perfect for shopping and site seeing! - Free wifi  - Linen and towels provided  - Easy access from the airport  Guest Access - Access to living room, bathroom , and kitchen  Interaction with Guests - Always available on the phone or in person for everything you might need and make your stay in Porto a pleasant trip :)  - Please contact for any additional in The Neighborhood - Walking distance from the trendiest bars, cafes, restaurants, art centers, typical grocery stores, bakeries, take-away, ATMs, supermarkets.  - 5 min walk the most stunning of all cafés in the nation and one of the most attractive in the world – Café Majestic  - 14 min walk to the best francesinha - Bufete Fase. 10 minutes walking distance from the Beautiful old marquet Bolhão -5 minutes walking distance from capela das Almas church, famous for the amazing tiles. 20 minutes walking distance from the oldest part of town( medieval), were the Cathedral is located.
notes: There is a tourist tax of 2€ per person for each night.
transit: - Airport underground station (28 min underground)  - Bolhão underground station (1 min walk)  - Trindade underground station (8 min walk)  - São Bento train station (10 min walk)  - Batalha long distance bus station (7 min nutes walk).
access: - Access to living room, toilet, dinning room , and kitchen
interaction: - Always available on the phone or in person for everything you might need.

host.host_about:
Hi, my name is Maria and I'm from Porto.
I like to travel and go for long walks in my beloved city.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Our stay at Sofia place was very nice! she was really kind and even though we didn't meet, she always got in touch with us to know if everything was ok, and to give us some advices and an helpful list about what to do in Porto. Her mother, who stay in the house, was thoughtful too. 
The house was ancient and charming as mentioned in the description, it was in the city centre, fifteen minutes walking from the Ribeira area and the main monuments of the city.

The apartment was great: clean, cozy, just like the pictures! Plus, in such a great place, we never needed the metro for getting to know the touristic places. But still so close to the metro station for going to the airport. Our host was even better, she showed us the area, took us to the supermarket and was really nice to us, definitely made us feel like home. Thanks for everything, we would totally come back!

Es hat alles reibungslos geklappt!! Sofia haben wie nie gesehen, dafür Ihre sehr süße Mutter, die uns auf Französisch unheimlich viel über die Geschichte von porto erzählt hat! Das Zimmer, Bad und wohnung sind sehr schön eingerichtet nur leider wirklich kalt im Frühjahr ;) sehr zentrale Lage!!!! würden immer wieder kommen!

We were welcomed by her super sweet mother, who showed us the lovely flat, with all the antic and beautiful pictures, statues und furniture. It was all perfectly clean and we had towels and a fresh bed prepared for us. Her Mom cared so much about us and helped us with everything we needed. She even wanted to help us cooking :)  the flat is right in the place where you reach all the beautiful spots in Porto. we stayed two nights in Sofias flat and we can hardly imagine we could've found a better place to stay. we highly recommend it to everybody!

This is a great little flat very well located near all those lovely things mentioned in the description plus so much more. I didn't meet Sofia, but her mother who it seems lives in a seperate part of the flat was amazing. Despite our moderate language barriers, she was able to give us some really interesting information on and the history of Porto and Portugal and made us feel very welcome. Would love to visit again.

A nosotros nos recibió la madre de Sofia, fue muy amable y práctica, nos explicó mucha historia sobre la ciudad y Portugal i recomendaciones (como donde comer: Restaurante O'buraco, ¡teneis que ir!).

La casa era preciosa, antigua pero decorada con gusto, rústica. 
La situación muy buena, al lado de sta. caterina, del mercado, del centro...
Totalmente recomendable, muy muy agradecidos.

La casa de madre de Sofía es preciosa, nosotros estuvimos super a gusto los 4 días que estuvimos en oporto. Esta muy cerquita de todo y muy fácil de encontrar. Ella fue muy atenta desde el minuto cero con nosotros, todo esta limpisimo, vamos que merece la pena quedarse en esta maravillosa casa con detalles tan cuidados.

We had a lovely time in Porto! The flat is in a perfect location - in walking distance to the city centre. Unfortunately we never met Sofia, but her Mum let us in and was incredibly kind and gave us tips for restaurants and traditional food. The flat and the room both are amazing, perfectly clean, artsy and very cosy. We can only recommend it!

I think this is one of the best places to stay in Porto as it is located right in the heart of the old town and extremely close to the BOLHAO metro station which takes you direct to the Airport. Sofia was not there to welcome us, though her mother was, a very nice lady who does not speak English, but French. This is not a problem though as we understood each other just fine. 
The flat is a lovely early 20th century style interior, there is certainly a lot of style and charm here.
Excelente atención. Estuvimos en un lugar cómodo, limpio, céntrico y servicial. La Sra. Lourdes nos brindó siempre grandes consejos turísticos y referencias históricas de Porto.

Señora Lourdes es la persona más amable que he encontrado. Me he encantado la habitación y las historias que me ha contado la señora. Aunque el día cuando llequé a Porto no hacía buen tiempo, me llevó a dar una vuelta. La próxima vez voy a  reservar esta habitación también.

Maria is wonderful - a very intelligent and civilised person.  If you can speak French that is the next best to Portuguese, as she is fluent.  She is very helpful and (as a teacher) knows a lot about the city's history!!

The room and the flat are absolutely GORGEOUS - proper 1930s original style, with many of the original furnishings.  If you love Art Nouveau this is the place for you.  Note the place has a bath with a shower arm handle instead of being a traditional shower, in keeping with the decor of the place.

The place is perfectly clean and the bed is quite comfortable.  The water pressure is good and the boiler, while fiddly, really delivers.

The location, in fashionable Balhao, is great - you are 2 blocks from the 'main drag' of St. Catherine street and can go wherever you like.

We hope to visit Porto again so we can stay with Sofia and Maria!
The reservation was canceled 103 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The room is exactally what it seems to be. Shinny, confortable and clean. It's located in a good and central place. We were recived by Ms. Lourdes that was very kind and helpfull. We loved.

This flat is amazing! One of the most beautiful flats we've stayed! We fell in love with it and Maria instantly. We met Sofia on the day of arrival and her mum Maria showed us everything, though she speaks French but we kinda understand, and she's always so helpful. The location is very good, it's close to many restaurants, cafes and also the Bolhao market. Actually if you arrive at the S.Bento train station it's just like 10 mins walk, we took the metro as we didn't realise it's that close.

Everything okay! Sofia, her boyfriend and her mother (she is living in the apartment as well) were very helpful. We arrived very late and our hosts were so kind to wait and helped us to find the apartment and the parking space. They gave us a lot of recommendations for restaurants and what to see in the city. The apartment is very very beautiful! Thanks for letting us stay there! Marco and Svenja

Quarto conforme anuncio no Airbnb. Fomos recebidos pela mae da Sofia, que certamente eh a portuguesa mais simpatica que ja conheci na minha vida. Alem de nos 3 dias nos dar diversas aulas da historia portuguesa, ela nos deixou super a vontade e nos deu diversas dicas nao apenas de Porto, mas de Portugal como um todo. Nao poderia ter ficado em lugar melhor. Quarto aconchegante, limpo, boa localizacao, tudo muito bom. Recomendo, e quando voltar a Porto, certamente ficarei hospedado aqui novamente.

Nous avons été accueilli par la mère de Sofia qui est une personne exceptionnelle: en plus de parler très bien français, elle nous a donné de bonnes adresses,  échangé sur la culture portugaise etc. Elle est vraiment une bonne personne très cultivée, qui a su nous laisser notre intimité également. L'appartement est très propre, agréable, au calme et en même temps très bien situé dans Porto (nous avons tout fait à pied). Nous recommandons vivement ce logement chez Sofia :-)
Thank You Sofia et Lourdes for a great time in Porto!

地點離地鐵站很近,交通方便
房子就像照片中一樣的美麗優雅,是我在此行中住過最美麗的地方
但是再美麗的住宿地點,也比不上sofia的媽媽Maria
雖然語言不太相通,但她很熱情的介紹這裡,知道我們由台灣來,還點了香歡迎我們,每天可以見到她都很開心
在Porto最美好的相遇,就是在這兒當了Maria四天的室友
讓我們會想要再次到Porto去旅行

Mon épouse et moi nous avons passé un magnifique séjour chez Sofia à qui malheureusement nous n'avons pas connu directement mais Madame Maria sa charmante mère nous a reçu merveilleusement. elle tellement gentille et aimable que nous nous avons senti comme chez nous. Nous la remercions de tout cœur.

The last couple of days we stayed at Sofia's and Maria's apartment in the centre of Porto. It was a great place to stay and we felt really welcome. Maria took good care of us. The place is really beautiful and authentic. You should really stay here, an awesome place.

El apartamento está situado muy céntrico, justo al lado de la parada de Metro de Bolhaos y tiene todo tipo de comercios cerca (un supermercado justo frente a la puerta). La madre de Sofia es encantadora y nos atendió en todo momento, dándonos consejos sobre visitas restaurantes, etc. La habitación está decorada con mucho gusto y el baño es espléndido, muy amplio todo y con un mobiliario recuperado de la posguerra difícil de encontrar. Sin duda, una muy buena opción para pasar unos días en Oporto.

From my very first contact with Sofia all enquiries were promptly and fully answered. I did not meet Sofia, although I did get to see a numbet of her beautiful artworks proudly showed to me by her mother, Maria.
It was in fact Maria who effectively hosted me. She and I shared the very comfortable, well situated and tastefully decorated apartment. Being used to small rooms when visiting Europe, I was very impressed by the size of my room which faced the back of the building and was relatively quiet. I had my own bathroom which was large and luminous. Shower gel, toothpaste and hairdryer were all kindly provided. 
The highlight of my stay was meeting Maria who carefully explained in very good French how different things work, and then gave me a chance to practise under her expert eye. She also talk me on a walk through the neighbourhood showing many sites unknown to the average tourist. She is a really kind, caring person.

This room has a great atmosphere and its location - next to Bolhao Mkt and Bolhao Metro station - is just perfect for city exploration as well as for any further transfers. It´s in walking distance to anywhere in the centre.
And Maria ? She´s just a beautiful lady. We regret so much that we don´t speak French neither Portugese. I believe we could have had so nice discussions....
We fully recommend this place to anyone who appreciates the authenticity of Porto!
tres bien!!

We stayed for 4 nights at Sofia's place. She was not there but her mum Marie welcomed us. Her mum is adorable! Such a friendly and nice person! You will love her! 

The house itself is very nice and old. The entire style is from the past and it was really cool to sleep in such a place. 

The location is great and the wifi works perfectly! We had our own bathroom which made our experience even better. 

The only thing that is to pay attention to is the bed. If you are like 1.90m -2m the bed might be too short for you. My boyfriend is like 1.85m and he was touching the wooden board at the edge. It was still ok to sleep but for taller men it could be uncomfortable. 

I definitely recommend you to stay there.
Super accueil dans cet appartement magnifiquement décoré. On a été très séduit, par le charme que porte chaque objet et la poésie du lieu.

The host was very welcoming and gracious-- we were able to communicate even though she spoke no English and I do not speak Portugese... we could cover the basics.
The room was charming and comfortable, great location for walking and metro. Was a lovely experience to stay in a traditional Portugese home in Porto.
Sophie's mother is delight & made sure we had everything we needed.

Нас встретила Мария - мать Софьи. Просто замечательная женщина! Жаль, что мы не знали ни португальского, ни французкого и приходилось общаться на языке жестов. Но все равно все было просто отлично! Очень красивая, просторная квартира, всё в винтажном стиле. У нас была своя спальня и своя ванная комната. Так же мы пользовались кухней и столовой. Старый дом в самом центре Порту. Транспортом пользовались только когда поехали к океану. А так абсолютно все находится в пешей доступности. Огромное спасибо Марии за теплый прием! Будем рекомендовать эту квартиру абсолютно всем своим друзьям!

We really enjoyed staying at this wonderful place. The appartment is originally furnitered/ decorated with art deco and we almost felt turned back in times. We arrived late at night which was no problem and we were heartly welcomed. We stayed with sofias mum who is a great person who was always there for us for recommendations and helped us when my friemd was stolen her wallet. She accompanied us to the Police and was such a lovely help. I wish we could have stayed longer but we definitively will come back :)

We loved staying here!  Sophia's mum welcomed us and was a very kind and generous host, and we communicated most in French. The apartment is charming and clean, and the bedroom is very quiet and comfortable.  The location is ideal: 10minutes walk from the central station.  I highly recommend this place and Sophia and her mum.

Excellent accueil chez Marie (la maman de Sofia). Marie est une hôtesse charmante et très sympathique qui aime faire la conversation et qui parle très bien le français. La Chambre et la salle de bain sont telles que sur les photos, le logement est plein de charme et décoré avec beaucoup de goût dans un style années 30. On peut même disposer de la cuisine et la salle à manger. 
Je recommande cette chambre !!

We loved to stay at Sofia's house. The apartment is very nice located in Porto, we could reach the city center by food. It was also very clean and well prepared for our arrival. The communication before we arrived was pleasant and the information detailed enough. We didn't meet Sofia in person, but her mother speaks french and gave us some advices for Porto and the neighborhood. She even organized a taxi for our departure. Thanks again!
I would love to stay at the apartment when I will visit the town next time.

Goed gelegen, vlakbij de metro Bolhao. Toch heel rustig! 
Heel mooie kamer en badkamer, maar het meest leuke was de mama van Sofia (de eigenares van het huis). We hebben heel leuke gesprekken met haar gehad!

This was a spectacular room and overall an excellent Airbnb experience! We didn't meet Sofia but she was very communicative via Airbnb. Her mother showed us the apartment and was very sweet and helpful. The room and the entire apartment are beautifully decorated in an Art Nouveau style and everything was perfectly clean. The location was excellent, close to everything but quiet at night. I'd highly recommend it to anybody considering a stay in Porto.

Sofia haben wir leider nicht kennenlernen dürfen, dafür aber ihre bezaubernde Mutter Maria, die uns ohne ein Wort Englisch oder Deutsch (und wir ohne Französisch oder Portugiesisch) unseren Aufenthalt sehr schön gestaltet hat! Das Zimmer sowie die gesamte Wohnung sind sehr stilvoll eingerichtet, alles in sauberem Zustand und alle Küchenutensilien durften mitbenutzt werden. Lage ist top (Nähe an Shoppingstraße und Metro). Tipp: Unbedingt an einer Portweinverkostung teilnehmen!! Merci beaucoup Maria, thank you Sofia!!
Ravis d'avoir rencontré la maman de Sofia qui nous a très bien accueillis. Merci pour son sourire et cette maison de charme. Coup de cœur pour la salle de bain décorée à l'ancienne.

Très bon accueil de la part de la mère de Sofia. Chambre très agréable, et salle de bain immense! Bien placé dans un quartier un peu  moins touristique. Nous avons passé un super séjour, et reviendrons avec plaisir!
chaleureux accueil de la mère de sofia chez qui nous avons séjourné.  l appartement est très bien situé, spacieux et charmant. nous y avons passé un agréable séjour.

La casa è una bomboniera di arte nova portoghese. Il primo impatto con Porto è stato fantastico anche grazie a Maria (mamma di Sofia) che ci ha fatto da cicerona e fatto subito sentire a casa. Centralissimo e comodissimo.
Very nice room and well located. Sofia's mom was really nice to us too.

My friend and I stayed here for two nights and had a good experience. The apartment is beautifully decorated and Sofia's mother was very sweet. The bathroom is gorgeous and the kitchen has everything you need!

This is a fantastic place to stay in Porto. It is walking distance from everything you can see in the city. The flat is very charming and comfortable, it has a portuguese art deco style that make you feel living in a very traditional house. Maria (who I believe is Sofia's mother) was very sweet and helpful, we felt part of the family in no time. We just regret that we couldn't spend more time with her, because she has great stories about Portugal history (she was a history teacher) !

I never met Sofia personally, only her mother, who is a very friendly and warm-hearted person. The place is beautifully furnished and decorated throughout - just like on the photos. Thanks to the seagulls on the neighboring roof, there was even a bit of an ocean feeling to the stay.

The apartment is amazing, exactly like on the photos, very elegant and old-style well-maintained. It was a unique experience. Great location right next to the main shopping street of Porto. Sofia was very friendly and did her best to give us a warm welcome. We definitely recommend this place!

Wir haben uns bei Sofia und ihrer Mutter sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist ein Traum, die Lage vorzüglich; beide waren sehr hilfsbereit. Wir haben uns sehr gut mit Sofias Mutter verstanden (auf franz.) und würden gerne wiederkommen. Arno dit Bonjour!

Sofias Mutter hat uns sehr freundlich in Empfang genommen und uns das Zimmer sowie das dazugehörige Badezimmer gezeigt. Sie hat uns einen Schlüssel überlassen und schon ein paar Tipps für Porto mit auf den Weg gegeben. Bei unserer Abreise sehr früh morgens hat sie sich um ein Taxi gekümmert und ist extra um 5.30 Uhr aufgestanden um festzustellen, ob das Taxi auch da ist. Das war sehr zuvorkommend. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und die Anbindung sowohl zu Fuß als auch mit der Metro war top.

The place is lovely, well decorated and clean. 
Maria is charming too, she will make you feel at home. 
If we go back to Porto, we will definitly stay there.

We stayed at Maria's (Sofia's mum) place and it was a lovely bedroom. Maria was very nice to us. It's a very convenient location, a couple minutes walk from the metro station. We will stay again if we go back to Porto.

Very nice Location! Just a few minutes walk to the metro station bolhao in the main shopping street. 
The old Portuguese house is beautifully furnished. And you've got your own bathroom next to the room.  You live in Maria's (it's Sofia's mum) house and she is a very friendly woman! Thanks for letting us stay at your place
Really good! Perfect location to visit Porto!

The room(s) are very cosy and it was a pleasure to stay there for two nights. Everything is in walking distance and Porto is a beautiful city worth to visit for a weekend. We can highly recommend it :)

We had the best time in Marie's traditional and charming room! The whole flat is amazing. Everything is need and tidy. There is a metro station close to the apartment. Although you won't need it as it is a good walking distance to all central places of Porto! We love Marie a lot! She has been very kind to us an even cooked a meal for us which was by far the best we ate during our whole stay in Portugal. It is a perfect and interesting place to stay in Porto!
Everything was really good! The house is supernice and Sofia also! She gave us very nice tips for eating in Porto and the location was very good.

accueil par une grande dame aussi simple qu elegante , parlant un francais admirable . tout est vrai dans son descriptif , soit 25€ de taxi soit 5€ en metro aerien tres agreable et arret tres tres proche de sa maison. Rues typiques et commercantes a 3 mn a pied. Tout est splendide et confortable chez elle , la salle de bain avec ses estampes , baignoire a pieds de lion , tadlak et beton cire , jardin d hiver epoustouflant .... chambre admirablement decoree , un melange de styles et d epoques , de petits bibelots .... egalement un joli boudoir avec quelques oeuvres , esquisses de sa fille : grande artiste ::::un regal . allez jetter un oeil indiscret dans la ravissante cuisine : surprises ... un grand moment , merci et bien sur je recommande mais seulement aux amateurs et amoureux des belles choses . Sinon passez votre chemin sourire PS desolee ceci n est pas un clavier Français donc tres complique .....

Da ich meine genaue Ankunftszeit nicht vorhersagen konnte, musste ich nach einem Anruf bei Sofia kurz warten, dann kam ihre Mutter und hat mich herzlich empfangen. Das Zimmer ist wie beschrieben "traditional", also wie erwartet mit dem Charme einer vergangenen Zeit. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt. Da die Wohnung von Sofias Mutter bewohnt wird, die kein Englisch spricht sind Kenntnisse in Französisch oder Portugiesisch hilfreich!

Perfeito !!! Ótima estadia e localização!
A Lurdes, mãe da Sofia faz de tudo para que sua estadia seja perfeita, nos ensinou algumas rotas e trajetos, as incríveis historias de Portugal, além de nos tratar com muito carinho e atenção.O seu conhecimento deixou Porto muito mais interessante.
Apartamento super limpo, quarto grande e confortável, em alguns momentos nos sentíamos em um hotel, devido a limpeza e toalhas macias, roupas de cama limpas e confortáveis. É uma linda casa e perfeitamente decorada nos mínimos detalhes.
Indicamos de olhos fechados ! e quando voltarmos ficaremos lá com certeza.
Você se sente em sua própria casa.
Geweldige ruimte in het centrum van Porto. Auto eenvoudig bij deze woning te parkeren.

idéalement placé dans le centre de Porto, l'appartement est super. Maria, la mère de Sofia nous a très bien accueillis et la chambre est parfaite. la salle de bain privative est décorée dans le style début du siècle, baignoire en fonte, plein de plantes vertes... le petit plus : le séchoir à cheveux .On peut également disposer de la cuisine , Maria parle le français et nous avons pu laisser nos bagages en attendant l'heure du départ. très bonne adresse pour découvrir Porto.

Hier haben wir uns richtig wohl gefühlt, einfach eine schnuckelige Wohnung mit viel Charme. Wir hätten gerne mehr mit Sofias Mutter kommuniziert, Sie ist eine sehr liebenswerte Frau, die uns gut umsorgt hat. Es lohn sich portugisisch oder französich zu sprechen.
Gut auch, die Metro ist direkt vor der Tür.

Sofia's mum is the sweetest person. Although my French is not so good, we talked a lot. The apartment itself is amazing, far exceeded my expectation, although the photos look very good too. Thanks so much for everything, this is an exceptional experience.

Wer hier wohnen kann hat sehr viel Glueck, denn es ist ein wunderschoenes Zimmer/eigenes Bad in einer stilvoll eingerichteten Wohnung, die auch noch guenstig liegt ( zentral). Sofia und ihre Mutter Maria sind sehr nette, herzliche und offene Menschen!!

Tivemos uma experiência maravilhosa nesta acomodação. A Maria de Lurdes, mãe da Sofia, é uma pessoa encantadora, sem dúvida fez com que nos aproximássemos ainda mais do que a cidade do Porto representa. O apartamento foi todo reformado mas manteve todas as características originais da década de 30, incluindo preciosos itens da mobília. 
Cama super confortável e banheiro exclusivo bem ao lado, oferecendo grande privacidade. Localização perfeita, no coração de Porto. Recomendo a todos!

Nicest woman ever. Too bad she didn't speak English and I don't speak Portuguese or French! Got by with Spanish, which we both are not too good at! The flat has a lot of character! Great location. I would recommend!

Sofia 的妈妈Maria,真是个非常热心的好房东,尽管她的英文并不好,但还是很努力的和我们沟通,帮助我们解决遇到的问题｡房间非常的漂亮,Maria自己织的地毯也非常漂亮,墙上的画都是她和女儿自己的画,是间非常有艺术气息的房子,一次非常愉快的体验｡

Sofia's mother Maria is a very very nice host. Although she's English is not very well, but she try hard to communicate with us and help us to deal with the problem. The house is very beautiful and clean, a very Artistic house. We had a wonderful time with Maria.
Excelente boas vindas. Dona Maria dá uma aula de história e faz excelentes recomendações, além de deixar muito a vontade.
It was awesome. The whole flat was beautiful and perfect located. Sofia was very helpful! Thank you for the nice stay!
We only met Sofia's mother but she was so nice and friendly. It was in Halloween period and the house was decorated. Everything was perfect and the location could not be better. Thank you again!

Sofia and her mother were very very nice, interesting and helpful. We had a very good momet with them!
Sofia's home is great, the atmosphere is in consequence very relaxing! The bedroom is also great.
Moreover, it's perfectly situed in Porto, close to all you need there!
Do not hesitate to go in this flat!

Nous avons passe un tres agreable sejour a porto dans l'appartement de sofia. L'accueil de Maria est parfait, nous avons echange regulierement avec Maria sur l'histoire du portugal, sur ce point Maria est passionnee de son pays. L'appartement est adorablement decore et tres tres bien situe,a deux pas du metro et dans l'hyper centre. Tout autour plein de commerces, avec des petits cafes pour le petit dejeuner et des restos a gogo.
Merci pour l'accueil.

Non ho avuto modo di incontrare Sofia, è stata sua madre ad accoglierci,  una persona molto carina e disponibile. Ad ogni modo è stata un'esperienza molto (Website hidden by Airbnb) casa è centrale permette di muoversi a piedi, è servita da metro, supermercati, servizi di ogni tipo. La casa era molto pulita, confortevole, arredata in modo tradizionale e davvero con buon gusto... la consiglio vivamente!!

María es una gran anfitriona. Hizo que nos sintiésemos muy a gusto desde el primer momento, y muy simpáticamente nos ofreció consejos y una breve historia de la ciudad.

La casa es incluso más linda que lo reflejaban las fotos, y está situada muy céntrica.
Realy nice charming place!

Maria nous a très bien accueilli, elle nous a montré notre chambre et le reste de l'appartement. Elle nous a mis à disposition des guides et livres sur Porto et sa région. Les photos sont bien représentatives de l'appartement, très joliment décoré, propre et lumineux! Il est idéalement situé à côté d'une station de métro et du centre ville!

The house was very beautiful, clean and artistic. Sofia's mother treated us warmly and nicely. Very conveniently located, the best place for a Sunday walk around!(though many of the restaurants are closed) We only stayed one night there but it was definitely one enchanting night in Porto.
I had a wonderful experience at the flat. The location in Bolhão is great, and the room looks just like pictures. Sofia was very responsive, and her mother is delightful. Muito obrigado!
Staying with Sofia's mother was a great experience. She was really nice and helpful. Her place is in very good location which has easy access to the center.

I met Maria, Sofias mother and although we did not spoke same language(s), we had great conversation - lovely and beautiful lady. The flat has nice antique touch, almost as if being in a museum. The location is ideal for small trips, sightseeng, shopping - you are in the middle of the life in Porto - this wonderful city. Maria was so nice letting me leave my baggage in the flat after I checked out - to pick it up later on that day, prior to my leave - I can only say thank you!

I had great time there and can't wait to get back.
Lovely place. Sofia's mother, Maria, made our time in Porto very special. The room is cozy and the location is perfect.
It was a lovely house but unfortunately we didn't meet Sofia. Her mother was really friendly. Sofia would reply really fast. Anyway we got a good time there.
It was lovely house!! We enjoyed staying your house!!
el piso esta en el centro del ciudad, la habitacion muy bonita! mama de sofia es muy amable, me encanta la habitacion y gracias por todo
Beautiful room and apartment with great location. I would gladly stay here agian.

The apartment is amazing, quite traditional and delicately decorated. Maria and Sofia are all kind people, willing to provide many help, living their life with passion and enthusiasm. It is really lucky to live in their home. I'll come back to Porto and their place again. Best wishes to Maria, Sofia, and Sofia's little baby.
방이 고풍스럽고 아늑했습니다. 위치도 관광지와 가까운 편이어서 편리했구요. 호스트도 무척 친절했는데 한 가지 아쉬운 점은 호스트가 영어를 잘 하지 못하셔서 의사소통이 약간 불편했다는 점이었습니다. 나머지는 모두 좋았어요!
Nice!很精致的老房子 很复古 犹如波尔图这座城市给人留下的印象一样 接待我们的是Sofia的妈妈 她很热情 细心地解答我们的问题 去机场都是由Sofia和她妈妈帮忙叫车的 由于老建筑 没有楼梯 行李重的话可以找司机帮忙拎行李上下楼

L appartement est très bien situé et l accueil etait chaleureux.
Malheureusement le temps n etait pas au rdv et l appartement etait humide et insuffisamment aéré.
Very goos location and everything is within the walking distance. Porto is a walking-suitable city and Sofia and her Mom helped us a lot!

c'était vraiment un très bon séjour chez Marie(maman de sofia ) . elle est très  gentille, chaleureuse, et elle  nous a offert aussi la  sangria  portugaise,c'est trop bon. Nous avons beaucoup échangé  et elle parle aussi français.
 Située dans le centre-ville, 2  minutes  à pied du métro, la chambre est traditionnelle et chic avec la jolie décoration.
j'étais vraiment contente de rester chez elle.

A estadia na morada de Sofia foi muito agradável. Fomos recebidos com muita atenção e respeito. Trata-se de um apartamento aconchegante, com bonita e delicada decoração, além de estar muito próximo aos principais pontos turísticos da encantadora cidade do Porto
친절하시고 좋아요! 가격도 싸고 화장실도 바로옆이라 만족했습니다!!

Sofia c'est la fille, mais c'est en fait chez Maria... qui est très gentille et fait tout ce qu'elle peut pour rendre votre séjour agréable. Elle parle français (même si elle est modeste sur ses capacités) et connaît bien l'histoire de Porto. La chambre est comme sur les photos. La salle de bain attenante (super baignoire). Pour les personnes de grande taille le lit n'est pas très long. Nous avons passé un très bon moment dans cette chambre très bien située.

Très bon accueil de la maman de Sofia, soucieuse de notre bien être tout au long de notre séjour. 
L'appartement est très bien situé en centre ville à proximité du métro et des commerces.
Thank you. Everything went very well. We like the flat, the location. We enjoyed the bedroom, the private bathroom. And the wonderdul decoration.
Elle est gentille! She is so nice to us and tell everything we asked with patience, as well as help us send the postcards! It is a very good location in Porto!

Marias (Sofias morgen) Appartement is perfect to discover Portos fanous places. Is directly next to the bolhão market and the Shopping Street via Santa Catarina where you find nice tipical portuguese bakeries. Maria is very hospitable and her Apartment is super beautiful with tipical old portuguese Furniture. I can highly recommend this Place.
Madame Marine est très très très gentille. La maison est mignonne.
El lugar esta muy bien ubicado y muy lindo. La atención de la anfitriona es inmejorable. Una excelente estancia!
很開心可以入住到這麼漂亮的房間,房間很乾淨非常漂亮有鄉村的味道!房東的媽媽不太會說英文,會說葡萄牙文及法文,非常優雅及熱情! (房子內沒有洗衣機)
We had a lovely Time in this Flat in Porto. We met Sofia's mum who is delightful. We felt very well and would come back without any doubts.

Porto is an amazing city! We fell in love upon arrival. This apartment is no exception!!! The pictures couldn't do the history of this home justice. Sofia is wonderful and her mother is wealth of Porto & overall Portugese history. She embraced our excitement for her home town and made sure we understood what we were experiencing. We want to come back for a longer stay soon!! Definitely recommended (especially the bathroom :) !!!!)
The house of Sofia is really nice and good located. Her mother is friendly and elegant. She introduced us everything and we felt at home. I strongly recommend it.
Our host was available when we were and showed us the parking structure.  She was friendly and had a good knowledge of English and French to communicate.
Nice room, bed is antic and a little bit small for tall people. Nicely located in the city center.
房东很热情,家里的装修也很好,住的很舒服,整体都蛮好的｡

We really enjoyed our stay in Sofia's house. It's charming, the location is perfect and Sofia and her mother were really kind and helpful.
We would recommend everyone to come to Porto because it's a beautiful city! :)

We were hosted by Sofia's mother, Maria, who made sure we felt at home from the moment we arrived. Maria was a true pleasure to talk to and very knowledgeable about the history of Porto and Portugal. The apartment is perfectly located and, to put it simply, just the most beautiful Airbnb we've ever stayed at. The bathroom was gorgeous and you can tell a lot of effort was put into decorating the flat. Staying there definitely made our stay in Porto a whole lot better.

Maria was an elegant and helpful hostess - she speaks French & Portuguese  location is brilliant for the metro and buses (if you can work them out) and the Caso do Evangalisto cafe just down from the house was great.

O apartamento é maravilhoso! Tão bem decorado como aparece na foto. A cama é super confortável e o banheiro é divino! Super recomendo! Além da localização ser excelente. A mãe de Sofia foi quem nos recebeu! Ela foi ótima!

Beautiful apartment, charmingly furnished with a very kind host! The apartment is really central, just next to the metro station which you don't really need unless you want to get out of the city because everything else is in walking distance. The room we slept in was the same style as the rest of the apartment: furnished with lots of beautiful details, very bright and comfortable. We even had our own bathroom - plus bathtub with golden "feet", I desperately want the same :) The apartment is right in the city center, but you can easily sleep without earplugs - it's really quite. We will definitely come back!
Séjour de 1 nuit chez Sofia, accueillis par son adorable à maman, qui parle Français et a de bons sujets de conversation. Idéalement situé, nous ne manquerons pas de revenir.

The flat was fantastic! A time travel to the ArtDeco era.

And she was very helpful:
Our plane run late, so we arrived at 3am in the morning, and Sofia organized that we were letting in.
Thanks again!
La madre de Sofia es estupenda, muy atenta y simpática. La ubicación es perfecta, se puede ir andando a todos lados.

Ich habe nur eine Nacht bei Sofia verbracht. Sie selbst war nicht da, aber ihre Mutti hat mich in Empfang genommen. Das alleine war schon ein Erlebnis, denn sie erzählte mir von der Geschichte Portos. Ein für mich persönlich fantastischer Einstieg. Die Bilder halten, was sie versprechen. Es es hat eben den Charme der Zwanziger. Das sollte man mögen. Mir hat es sehr gut gefallen, auch wenn ich wirklich nur ein paar Stunden da war.
The neighborhood was really central, close to the metro station "bolhão". Sofia's mom was really kind when she hosted us! Thank you!

My husband and I really enjoyed staying at Sofia's mother's apartment. It was perfectly located for sightseeing and beautifully decorated. It was a pleasure to come back to every day. Maria, Sofia's mother, made us very welcome. The apartment was very quiet even though it was walking distance to many attractions. The metro is also very close by. There are many common areas in the apartment, and a microwave and a hairdryer if you need one. I really loved the plant filled alcove that adjoined both the bedroom and private bathroom. The entire experience made our stay in Porto a very pleasant one.

The location is perfect, very central but unfortunately the parking options are expensive so I would rather suggest this place if you have no car and want to visit the city by foot for a couple of days.  Sofia´s mum was very nice and waited for us to arrive till very late in night.
Sophia's mother welcomed us. The room is very handy to the metro and the tourist area of Porto

O imóvel corresponde perfeitamente ao anúncio e às fotos. Lindo apartamento, totalmente redecorado com peças de arte e móveis de época. Quarto amplo, cama confortável, lençóis e toalhas limpos, enorme banheiro de uso exclusivo. Localização privilegiada (3 min. da estação de metrô de Bolhão). São dois lances de escada (aviso para quem tem bagagem pesada). Recepção muito amável pela mãe da sra. Sofia. Flexibilidade nos horários (permitiram que eu ficasse alguma horas a mais com as malas no apartamento até meu horário de saída). Recomendo!

L'accueil de Sofia Maria était Top ! Elle nous a parlé de son pays, de son histoire, des différents types de Fados...bref on a adoré échanger avec elle. La chambre est encore plus belle que sur les photos : la déco est sublime et la salle de bain est un vrai petit paradis. N'hésitez pas une seconde, si vous voulez une vraie expérience locale, courez y !

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par la mère de Sofia qui parle français . Le logement est très bien placé pour découvrir Porto et à un prix très correct.
Décoration surprenante de cet appartement d'artiste très propre où nous avons passé 2 excellentes nuits. Merci.

We didn't meet Sofia but her mother gave us warm welcome and the house is extremely beautiful with 1930s style's decoration. Well located apartment within 5 min to metro and a lot of stores in the neighborhood.

Sofia's mum met us at the flat and was very welcoming. We spoke together in French and she showed us around the gorgeous flat and gave us a few recommendations for the area. We were only staying one night so we didn't use the kitchen but we had our own bathroom and the room was very beautiful and comfortable. Everything was really easy including connecting to the wifi and enjoying a hot shower. Thank you!
Truly lovely apartment in a very central location. Sofia wasn't there the night we stay d but her mother took good care of us. Would highly recommend!

The apartment was adorable. We didn't meet Sofia but her Mother was wonderful! Really attentive and welcoming, we felt immediately at home. Great location, lovely space and excellent hosts, we fully recommend staying here :)

Уникальная, аутентичная квартира с удобным центральным, но не шумным расположением.
Рекомендуем.

We were able to check-in after midnight and got a very warm welcome from Sofia's mother. She let us in and took her time to explain everything we needed to know about the house. The house itself is beautiful and the room we stayed in as well, it had a lot of nice touches, details and furniture which made it a very pleasant space to be in. It was a joy staying over at Sofia's place and we would definately stay there again.
Everything perfect and I had I nice portuguese history teach.

Sofia had such a lovely, beautiful place! It almost feeks like a museum. Her mother gave us the key and told us a lot of nice things about Porto, she is a very kind and helpfull lady. We parked Our car in the nearby garage. It is a good place to stay if you visit Porto, very close to a lot of tourist places. We had a great time! Thank you very much!

Nous avons été très bien et très chaleureusement reçus par Maria la mère de Sofia, que nous n'avons pas eu le plaisir de rencontrer.
Maria parle très bien français, et est de très bonne companie. De plus, elle nous a donné de nombreux conseils pour visiter Porto et profiter de la gastronomie locale. Le logement est atypique et des plus agréable, et est également très bien situé.
We loved the appartment. Cosy and with unique design vibe. The locasion is also perfect. We didn´t meet Sofia, but her mother was very friendly and helpful.
Great room! Just as described! Super convenient location. Stairs only
La mère de Sofia nous a accueilli très chaleureusement dans son appartement. Nous avons passé des moments très agréables à Porto.

We had a great stay at the lovely appartement of Sofia. Her mother, who lives in the house, takes care of the organisation of the guest staying. She is very helpful and friendly and can tell you a lot about the history of the city and Portugal. Not in english but in french though. The appartment is spacious, and nicely decorated. Great location in the center near bolhao metro station (direct metro line from Airport)!

Nous avons été très chaleureusement accueillis par Maria, maman de Sophia qui nous a mis à l'aise et fait découvrir ce joli appartement d'artistes. Ce logement est décoré avec grand soin et beaucoup de goût et rend le séjour dépaysant. 
Il est, de plus, très bien situé. On accède facilement aux points intéressants que nous voulions visiter.
C'est aussi plaisant de parler avec Maria qui possède un excellent français et passionnant de l'écouter parler de son vécu.
Je recommande cette adresse et espère vivement revenir dans ce joli endroit.

We had a nice stay in Porto, we didn't meet Sofia but her kind mother. The appartment is nicely decorated and clean. The bedroom is located at the back side of the appartment, so no streetnoise. The bed is not so big but cosy for two!

we arrived in Porto and Sofia's mother welcomed us very very kindly. She told us about the story of Portugal and Porto too, having an amazing view about what would be leaving in Porto for people of there. the place is really nice, 100 metres from the Bolhao station which connect you easly and fastly to the airport (25 minutes).

 You are in the center of Porto and you can visit everything by feet. 

I recommend you this comfortable and nice flat if you are looking for visiting the city!

thanks for the great time had!
Un lugar ideal pasar la noche en Oporto. Limpio agradable muy acogedor y super bien localizado. 100% recomendable.

Sofia and her mother were wonderful hosts, they helped us to organize parking just next to the house and provided all tips and directions. Lourdes is a very interesting person, we talked so much about history of Europe and Portugal. I could've spend so much more time with this nice lady.  Location is just great. The place is like a vintage museum and helps you understand how people used to live before. Beautiful and comfortable room.
Very recommended!
Really nice and cozy place. Her mother is a good and nice hostess. The metro station is also nearby. Over all very nice place to stay.

Staying at Sofias flat was amazing, cosy and charming as she said in her description before. Unfortunately we dont met Sofia, but her mother Maria gaves as a warm welcome and hosted us during our stay. She was very flexible with the check-in times, because we arrived late from the airport in the night. Maria is a friendly and open minded person but she only speaks portoguese und french so sometimes the communiciation with each other was funny.  We felt very comfortable during the time and could recommend this place for everyone who wants to stay in a exceptional place right in the centre of Porto. Thanks Sofia and Maria to be your guests!
Super séjour à Porto!

Maria nous a reçu chaleureusement.
L'appartement est très bien situé dans Porto. En plus depuis l aéroport on peut prendre le métro est arriver à deux pas de l appart depuis l arrêt Bolhao.

Sofia has been a super-host: friendly, careful and reliable. The apartment is few steps away from many of the Porto's monuments and charming with its romantic forniture. I definitely find Sofia's place the best solution to spend some time in Porto.
Die Wohnung hat eine sehr gute Lage und man kann fußläufig alles sehr gut erreichen. Die Einrichtung ist auch sehr schön und gut gepflegt. Wir können diese Unterkunft sehr empfehlen:)
Recomendo!

Mit Sofia hatten wir einen sehr guten Kontakt. Selbst die Anreise nach Mitternacht war kein Problem. Die Wohnung war individuell und gemütlich eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Die Nähe zur Metro war für alle Ausflüge ein großes Plus. Aber auch zu Fuß könnte man alle sehenswerten Punkte in der schönen Stadt Porto erreichen. In knapp zwei Wochen freuen wir uns auf einen weiteren Aufenthalt bei Sofia.

Es ist ein nettes kleines Zimmer, in einer super Wohnung. Sie liegt sehr zentral und ist idealer Ausgangspunkt für Aktivitäten.
Die Unterkunft ist auf jeden Fall für 1 - 2 Übernachtungen zu empfehlen.
Sadly due to being held up in a storm in northern Spain we were unable to make it to Sofia's flat! However her communication was excellent and she welcomed us another time!

Sofia's mother welcome us. The location was great, just was heart of city centre. The only problem was we got mosquito bites all over us and we still have serious scar. they must put something in the room for the guests.

I had a lovely stay at Sofia's Porto apartment. The flat is very traditional and has a lot of character. I was met by Sofia's friend Rui and met her Mother too which was very nice. They made me feel very welcome. Comfortable stay and great spot for the city, amenities and getting around. I had some challenges with the hot water, even though I was shown so ended up having two cold showers which weren't so bad given it was warm but could be a challenge in colder months. Thanks for having me stay! Porto was awesome!
It was really a nice place to stay

The hostesses wasn't their to see me but her mother was, even though the mothers English wasn't the best I managed to understand what she's was telling me. The room is. very large with ample space for two people, the best about the apartment that it was very close to the underground station with loads of facilities close by, even though I was in Porto for one night the accommodation was very pleasant with its retro feel. 

Thank you very much 
Sophia

Sofia ist sehr freundlich, zuverlässig und kulant (Check in-check out). Wir haben in der Wohnung insgesamt vier wunderbare Tage verlebt. Sie ist künstlerisch gestaltet, liegt sehr zentral und ist doch ruhig und atmosphärisch. Wir kommen gerne wieder.
Очень красивая квартира. Уютная и удобная комната, все очень чистое. Хорошее расположение, рядом есть, где припарковать машину, много магазинов и кафе. Всё Очень понравилось!

We didn't meet Sofia, but her mother Maria was a very lovely host and provided everything we needed. I really enjoyed the interior of the flat because of its originality and coziness. Location of the flat is also very good!

We stayed at Sofia's place for two night. We didn't meet Sofia in person but her mother, a very nice Portuguese woman, made our stay very pleasant. Speaking only Portuguese and French she helped us with every question we had during our two days in beautiful Porto. 
The location of the flat is very good, every sight can be reached easily by food. The next metro station (Airport Line) is just a few meters away. We would definitely come here again!

Tout était conforme à l'annonce, 
la maman de Sofia a été très gentille et disponible pour nous accueillir.
La chambre est idéalement située dans le centre de porto 
près de via catarina, le top! 
Seul petit bémol à notre séjour, la difficulté de réglage de la température de l'eau de la douche, sinon c'était parfait!

Tout était parfait, nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans cette très agréable logement! Nous avons eu énormément de plaisir à rencontrer la maman de Sofia qui nous a accueilli de manière très sympathique ! la chambre était super et parfaitement située.
This place was easy to reach. The flat was very unique and had artistic atmospheare. We did enjoy it a lot. Sofias mother was very friendly and easy to communicate.

everything was fine at Sofia's. her appartment is ideally located in the city centre and we were warmingly welcomed by her mother. She speaks french so it was easier for us who dont speak portuguese. Thanks for all !
Sandra & Vivien
Nous avons vu sa mère et non Sofia car elle travaillait.Tres gentille et très disponible.
wir hatten eine schöne woche in einer tollen wohnung. sofias mutter war unsere gastgeberin,es war eine grosse bereicherung für uns sie kennen zu lernen.

The flat:
1.Perfect location.
2.Windows face a back yard, so it is quiet at night.
3.Renovation is taking place in half of the house every day, except for the weekends and holidays. They start around 8.
4.You won’t be able to enjoy taking a bath as there is no water plug.
5.No soap provided.
6.No space for shampoos, etc in the bath.
7.No oil in the kitchen, but there is salt, pepper and a little bit of sugar. The host also offered some herbal tea.
8.The smell of old flat.
9.Not always easy to set comfortable water temperature in the shower.
10.There is a rubber sheet under the usual one on the bed, so the bed is pretty hot.
11.The bed’s headboard is dusty and the bed is long enough for a person of approx. 180 cm.
12.Lots of toilet paper rolls of different sizes like the ones in public toilets in the bathroom.
13.Two supermarkets not far from the flat.
14.Many mosquitos at night.
The host:
1.You will be staying with Sofia’s mother.
2.When I was taking the shower, the host went out to the stairs (my husband saw her), the gas turned off in the heater and then she came back. She said I was taking the shower for too long. 
3.On Sunday morning around 9 the host started doing some loud household activities.
4.One day we returned to the flat and the entrance door to the flat was open. There was no one inside. Luckily, nothing was stolen.
5.The host could not advise us how to get to the ocean.

Notre séjour chez Sofia s'est très bien passé. Nous avons été très bien accueillis par la maman de Sofia qui parle français. 
L'appartement est idéalement situé, il a beaucoup de charme.
Un chouette logement que nous recommençons chaleureusement.
Hermosa casa de época en ubicación inmejorable. María (mamá de Sofia) es muy simpática y amable y nos ayudó en nuestro viaje a Oporto.

Thank you Sofia, unfortunately we couldn't meet you, however your mother was great, she's very gentle and sweet. The flat is close to a metro station, many shops, easy to find and had artistic vibes. 
If you're looking for a place with aristocratic atmosphere that's the place.
We had a very good night at the house of the mother of Sofia. It is beautiful decorated and they put an extra mattress for the two year old on the floor. Recommended!

I, unfortunately, did not stay long. However the flat is charming, comfortable and perfectly situated. Sofia's mother is extremely nice and helpful as, it seems, most people from Porto! I will definitely be back next time I am in town!! Thank you for everything.
Great! Apartment is central and charming and Sofia's mother helpful and nice.
Great location which is 2 minutes from the metro and shopping area. The room has a very antique look which provides a cosy feel. Would recommend for all ages.
Chambre agréable avec salle de bain atenante, très calme, quartier central, animé, bien desservi, facile à trouver. Accueil très sympathique de Maria, la maman de Sofia.
The location and apartment were excellent.  I enjoyed a brief, but comfortable stay and intend to return.  Sofia´s mother was kind and considerate, I will certainly return to this unique place.

Niesamowite miejsce! Bardzo nastrojowe, urządzone w niesamowicie klimatyczny sposób. Meble i cały wystrój sprawia, że można poczuć się jak w Porto 100 lat temu. Maria była niezwykle miła i pomimo późnej godziny przybycia ( po północy) przywitała nas z uśmiechem i oprowadziła wszystko tłumacząc i pokazując wnętrze. Podczas kilku krótkich rozmów opowiedziała nam o historii Porto i całej Portugalii. Uśmiechnięta i pomocna osoba. Nie za bardzo mówi po angielsku jednak świetnie po francusku. Pomimo to udawało nam się dobrze porozumieć. Polecam dla osób, które chcą poczuć klimat dawnej Portugalii.

The flat is comfortable and well situated, located just in the middle of transport hub which is very convenient.
Our host was Maria - Sofia's mother, very nice and charming lady, ready to help when in need.
María fue una anfitriona extraordianaria, muy amable, atenta y hospitalaria. El piso tiene una ubicación excelente y un ambiente muy acogedor. Lo recomiendo 100%.
Great place, nice location and lovely lady to welkome you

Nous avons été accueillis par Maria, la maman de Sofia, dans un son appartement magnifiquement décoré de meubles et d'objets du début du 20ème siècle. La maison est également décorée de nombreuses peintures réalisée par cette famille d'artiste. La salle de bains contenant une pittoresque baignoire à pieds de lions donne sur une  loggia garnie de plantes et de dessins. Maria est une hôtesse chaleureuse, souriante et parle couramment français. Nous recommandons très fortement cette adresse hyper centrale à deux pas de la grande rue commerciale et en même temps très calme!

i really love this house, it is full of vintage and history.the host's mum who received us is an elegant and interesting madame. she is soooo nice. The house settled in the old town district,which is convienced.  and the house is clean, tidy and cozy. love it.it is the first choice when i visit porto again.

The apartment is s (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) beautiful and the host(Sofia's mother) is pretty helpful!!! It's central and closed to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) quick and easy to go anywhere. I love this apartment!!! I would like to come back if I travel in Porto again:) So highly recommend this place!

Magnifique appartement pour ceux qui apprécient bibelots et meubles des années 30, jsuque dans les détails comme la salle de bain et la baignoire majestueuse. Très bien placé pour la viste de la ville. Pas de petit déj, mais les pastarias sont à portée de main.

진짜 숙소는 예뻤습니다. 그리고 강가와 좀 떨어져 있었지만 강빼고는 왠만한 관광지근처에 있어 좋았습니다. 소피아의 어머니인 마리아의 집인데 마리아는 정말 친절했고 영어소통은 부족했지만 정말 잘 알아들을수 있게 친절히 도와주셨습니다. 문제가 있을때는 언제든지 다가와서 친절히 알려주셨습니다. 하지만 오래된 집이라 그런지 난방이 아쉬었습니다. 추울때 구비해 놓은 담요랑 히터가 있었지만 히터는 사실 켜 놓으면 화재가 날까봐 켜지 못하고 잤습니다. 숙박은 대체적으로 추워서 담요를 덮어도 추워 얇은 옷들을 3겹입고 겉에 겉옷을 입고 잠을 잤습니다. 추위만 없었다면 정말 아름답고 좋은 집입니다. 겨울이 아닌 여름에는 다시 방문하고 싶은 집입니다!

Auch wenn unser Aufenthalt nur sehr kurz war, waren wir von der Unterkunft sehr angetan. Gerade die stilvolle, wenn auch altmodische Einrichtung hat uns überzeugt.
Sofias Mutter war sehr gastfreundlich, hilfsbereit und herzlich. 
Wir würden wieder dorthin kommen.

This house has beautiful interier.
And she is very kind.
So I was comfortable.
Porto is beautiful too!

1. no elevator(lift). -very narrow stairs so it's bad to move big luggages and host didn't help. 

2. very big 2 dolls(a person size) in front of the door and kitchen. It's scaring in the night. 

3. good location.
Great place to stay! the house is perfect! Location is great, you can go walking everywhere, and Maria (sofia´s mom) is very welcoming! Hope to come back some day!
I really reccomend !
Bien situé, chambre avec cachet, nous avons été bien accueillis par la maman de Sofia, mais n'avons pas pu  rencontrer Sofia. Il faisait un peu froid dans la chambre

볼량시장에서 5분거리.
아늑한 방과 친절한 호스트.
편하게 3일 있다 가요.
Sofia et sa maman on été charmantes dès notre arrivée. Je recommande fortement !
É uma casa gira, a mãe da Sofia é muito amável e ajudou-nos muito,  a casa de banho e o quarto são limpos.

Sofia and her mother, Maria were very accommodating. The apartment is very quirky and full of character, it's like stepping back in time. Maria is a very interesting lady and she helped us find our way to the best Francescinha in town. The apartment is on the 2nd floor with no elevator  so not very good for some people. The location is very central and we found overnight parking for 6 euros. We loved it there and would definitely visit again but in the summer when the weather is warmer. Thank you for sharing your home with us!

The apartment is really nice, filled with old furnitures and plants ! It is very close to the center and Sofia's mother is really nice. 

Remark : we stayed during winter, the heater was a bit weak and the room a bit cold.

Netter Kontakt, mit der älteren Dame die noch in dieser Wohnung wohnt. Man fühlt sich etwas in die 20er-30er versetzt auf Grund des Mobiliars aber oder eben gerade deswegen ist es schön. Zu Fuß erreicht man innerhalb von 15min fast all das schöne von Porto. Bucht diese Unterkunft !!!

We never met Sofia but her mother was really nice and friendly. My friend was having a fever and she helped her and even made tea for her. The apartment is in perfect location, right in the center and close to everything. It was a very nice stay and we recommend it!
因为在lisboa犯了肠胃炎,来的时候一直发烧,Sofia的妈妈一直在照顾我,大米和鸡肉熬的粥,茶,面包,准备吃的又准备药,特别感谢maria,为了转移注意力一直在和我聊天,是个特别有风采又亲和的奶奶,对了,maria法语说的超好的｡整个房间的家具都是belle Epoque时期的,特别漂亮!离地铁也很近,也可以选择走路去教堂,对年轻人说都不是很远｡

A very eccentric property with old world charm but lack of modernity and facilities some may not appreciate. Very good location for exploring Porto and very good value. The bed would not suit anyone over 5'10". The hosts mother is the on site host. She is a very nice lady who speaks only a little English but French. This was an ideal base for us and great location.
Logement très bien situé à 3 minutes du métro - décoration charmante et calme absolu ! c'était parfait, Merci Maria :-)
Our stay here was very good and central. The mother of Sofia was lovely and courteous and and awesome host. We would be come back. Thanks for all!
Nice place

Nous avons été accueillis par Maria, la mère de Sofia qui habite dans la moitié de l'appartement, une dame extrêmement gentille et qui parle très bien français. La chambre est très chouette (même si un peu sombre) avec des meubles d'époque qui nous plongent dans l'atmosphère du Portugal d'antan! Pareil pour la salle de bain, avec une magnifique baignoire.
Le logement est très proche du métro et des rues commerciales et permet une agréable balade jusqu'au centre ville.
Une bonne adresse pour passer quelques jours à Porto!

We had an awesome stay with Sophia's Mom ! 
Thanks for everything !

Local bem localizado, perto de shopping, padaria, mercado Bolhão, comércio em geral. Não precisa alugar carro, pois transporte de Metrô e ônibus bem eficiente.
D. Maria, a anfitriã, pessoa muito meiga, comunicativa e amável. Ficamos bem a vontade.

This is a unique apartment! With a unique atmosphere!
The room is very cozy. Private bathroom was at our disposal. Inside there is everything necessary for life. 
We were greeted by Maria. She was very accommodating ) it was a pleasure to meet her )
My husband and I were very pleased with the choice! Thanks for the welcome!
Great place. Clean. Comfortable. Quiet place to rest before traveling. Thank you so much!!

Sofia's apartment is absolutely gorgeous. Located centrally, not far from all the beautiful spots in Porto, it is a true gem. Maria, Sofia's mother, is the most friendly host you can imagine. We definitely had a fantastic time in Porto and can only recommend to stay at Sofia's/Maria's. We'll definitely be back!
Una casa preciosa muy bien ubicada, solo pasamos un poco de frio, ya que no tiene calefacción pero sin mayor importancia.

그녀는 정말 친절했습니다! 
다만 영어를 잘 하지 못하셔서 의사소통이 
살짝 아쉽긴 했어요~ 그래도 좋았습니다.
상벤투역에서 10분걸리는 거리에 위치했고
자는 방의 인테리어는 살짝 바뀌었지만
다른 방의 인테리어는 유지되고 있어요.
특히 부엌이 예뻐요.

가끔 거울이 더러운 것하고 큰 인형이 있는데 저는 상관없었는데, 놀랄 수 있을 것 같습니다. 여자들의 로망같은 집이었어요.

Le logement était superbe,  parfaitement conforme à la description. Nous avons été très bien reçus par la maman de Sofia qui parle bien français.
