Nous ne manquerons pas d'y séjourner à nouveau si l'occasion se présente.

Lo mejor de este hospedaje es la gran atención que ofrece la anfitriona! Es una señora muy encantadora, amable y servicial. Estuvo siempre pendiente de que nada nos falte. Además la habitación muy limpia y cómoda al igual que el baño. Recomendado!
Recomendamos este lugar, nos atendio maria la madre de sofia es muy buena persona. Super servicial, amable y cordial. Um gusto haber podido compartir un lindo momento con ella

I defenetly can recommend this charming room. Its a really good option for exploding the wonderful city Porto. You find there everything you need for some good days. By Sofias mother I learnd a lot about the history and about Porto. Also the late check-in was no problem. Muito obrigada!
Estuvimos muy cómodos en la casa de María. Una zona muy accesible y con todo lo necesario. Tuvimos una linda estadía, lo recomiendo!

It would be difficult to find a better place in Porto. Just a short distance from the metro and an easy walk to places of interest. The room was as charming as Sophia's Mother.  I don't think you could find a better value in Porto!

È stato bellissimo vivere nella casa di Sofia! È centralissima, molto chic e arredata benissimo! Vicino al mercato, una laterale della via più famosa di Oporto! Sempre pulitissima, asciugamani sempre a disposizione,  molto molto carina la mamma di Sofia con cui chiacchierare amabilmente! Bello bello bello!
Eine schöne Unterkunft der besonderen Art in guter Lage um Porto zu Fuß zu erkunden.

Gostamos muito de nossa estadia em Porto. Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Sra Maria, mãe da Sofia, que é muito comunicativa e nos deixou bastante à vontade e com liberdade para desfrutamos as belezas de Porto. Amamos.
Très jolie logement, très sympathique accueil rehaussé d'une leçon expresse d'histoire portugaise

Tous c'est très bien passé, c'est Maria la mère de Sofia qui nous a accueilli et qui parle le français. L'emplacement est idéal pour visiter Porto, environ 10 à 15min à pied.
Et l'appartement à un charme fou.

Нас встретила мама Софии, Мария. Очень милая, приятная женщина. Квартира нас поразила своей обстановкой, возникло ощущение, что мы в аристократическом доме прошлого столетия. Антикварная мебель, кружевные салфетки, расшитые половики. Сразу захотелось выпрямить спину и надеть туфли)) очень красиво.  Отдельная большая ванная комната - большой плюс, но есть небольшое неудобство в том, что горячую воду нужно каждый раз включать через нагреватель. Квартира на втором этаже, лифта нет. Местоположение удобное, в двух шагах метро, рынок. Нам очень понравилось, спасибо, София и Мария!

I had a great stay here. 
Actually I did not meet Sofia she was not there but was hosted by her mother. 
As soon as I met here i was like "feeling like home". 
She explained us everything and gave us some advise. 
Conversation was fun a mix hetween French, English & Portugese. 
We spoke a lot and that was great to spent this time with her. 
The room was also great with own WC and Bathroom. 
Sofia s mother allowed us to let the luggage there the check out day, so that we can enjoyed our stay in Porto without them. That was nice from her. 
I would recommend this room and will definitely come back there and see Sofia s mother again. 
Obrigado

Un accueil super
Logement bien situé dans Porto, pratique pour services et tourisme
Appartement calme
Obrigado Sofia et Maria !
Nice trip in Porto. Sofia's mum is very friendly. The room was charming and the apartment is very good located. Near to subway and historical center.

Sofia haben wir zwar nicht kennen gelernt, aber ihre Mutter Maria war sehr gastfreundlich. Die Unterkunft fügt sich charakterlich sehr gut in die Altstadt von Porto ein. Trotz unserer späten Ankunft um 23.30 wurden wir sehr herzlich empfangen. Wir würden wieder kommen!

I can only recommend staying here. The old world charm of this beautiful apartment contributes to your experience of Porto. The room was very comfortable and clean. Host was very welcoming. Bathroom tip: pay close attention to directions. Hot water will only start once you actually turn on the water in the shower. I first tried at the sink, and it didn't work. 

Thanks!

Vintage and cozy house!
Some noise at night made us awake but it was acceptable.
Sofia is nice and caring.
bon accueil et bons conseils

The apartment was perfectly located, 5 mins away from the famous Bolhão market. 
Sofia's mom was so welcoming and gave us good advices to discover Porto and explore it. 
I would warmly recommend it if you'd like to stay in Porto for couple of days.
Mooie plek, goed gelegen. Aanrader.

Sofia and her mother are gracious hosts. Her mother's knowledge of ancient history and folklore was great. We enjoyed our talks with her. The apartment and bathroom were very well kept, neat and clean. The room we stayed in was very comfortable and gave us the true feeling of a home in Porto. We thank them both for their kindness and hospitaliy.
Décor sympa bien placé propre et accueil au top!!
The apartment is wonderful, I felt very much at home. Location is super, quiet but close to the center.  I highly recommend Sofia's apartment

The apartment is on the second floor and you have the bedroom and a bathroom all for yourself. The zone is very quiet and close to the metro station. From the apartment Is very simple to go to the principal place of Oporto.

This house has the most beautiful bathroom i have ever seen. There was also the biggest geranium i have ever seen. The whole place was very beautiful, very cozy and warm. The owner (her mother was in charge) spoke very good french and was very helpful. She gave us a short history of porto. There was also a nice collection of paintings of historical portugees clothing. We enjoyed that.

Sofia's mum greeted me and showed me to the beautiful bedroom and adjacent bathroom. The apartment is very well located, within walking distance of the centre and metres from a metro station. The water in the bathroom was a little hot but otherwise it was perfect.

L'appartamento di Sofia è veramente molto carino, arredato in stile novecento portoghese crea una atmosfera veramente speciale.
Molto comodo per visitare la città e con la gentilissima Maria, madre di Sofia ad accoglierci.
Lo consiglio!!
Really nice place with a quaint vibe in the city centre.

Wij hebben een heel fijn verblijf gehad in het appartement van Sofia! Het contact met haar moeder was heel leuk, ze was super vriendelijk! 
Ook de omschrijving is helemaal waar, het is midden in de stad en de foto's zijn helemaal naar waarheid! 
Een echte aanrader!
L'appartement est tres bien situé au centre de Porto
The place is at a great location. The host is very flexible, friendly, and helpful! The apartment is very spacious. We enjoyed our stay there!
매우 친절하시고 불편한부분없이 잘 대해주셨어요. 인테리어도 예쁘고 좋았어요. 꼭 가보세요!
Sofía es realmente acogedora. La habitación es cómoda y muy cuidadosamente decorada y equipada

La chambre bénéficie d'une salle de bain très charmante et d'un jardin d'hiver agréable. Elle est très bien située pour visiter Porto avec un restaurant qui propose de délicieux plats portugais à 20 metres. Maria nous a accueilli très gentiment et nous a bien conseillé sur les choses à faire ! (seul hic : cadre de lit un peu juste pour des personnes d'1m90)

Very nice little place in Porto, everything was just as is in pictures and even though we weren't able to meet with Sofia her mother was more than welcoming and very nice to talk with. Definitely recommend this place for anyone stopping by in Porto.

The appartement is located in a quiet street  and near the famous rua de Santa Catarina which has many cafe bars and restaurants. The room is beautiful and warm which is decorated with the old style furniture. The best thing I like is the bathroom which has a big bathtub and a nice old mirror.
Sofia's mother was very nice and kindly, she talked with us about Porto and Portugal history. It was so interesting.
We had a nice trip in Porto and in Sofia's appartement.

It was wonderful to stay in Sofias house! 
We would like to come back!!

La chambre est vraiment au calme. On s'y sent bien ! 
L'accueil par la maman de Sofia a été chaleureux et grandement facilité par ses capacités à parler français...
Très  bon  logement, propre, tres proche du  centre  historique  ! La  mère  de  Sofia  nous  a  très  bien  accueilli et  parle bien  le  français  !
房间特别赞,干净,安静,装修很有风格｡位置佳,公共交通､餐饮购物､观光都非常便捷｡房东和房东妈妈人很nice,沟通起来很开心｡推荐!

La casa es tal cual las fotos, una antigua casa de Oporto de techos muy altos y muebles de época, encantadora. Un baño con bañera de patas y muchas plantas en la ventana. Es una casa muy especial con  decoración muy especial. La zona donde está es perfecta para ir de compras o iniciar el paseo por la ciudad. Si se va en coche como nosotros justo al lado hay varios parkings de centros comerciales y públicos. Cerca también se consiguen restaurantes sencillos de cocina de mercado

Chambre très au calme, on entend même les mouettes !
Salle de bain décoré avec goût.
Accès bien apprécié à la salle à manger.

Piccolo problema iniziale nelle indicazioni, ma Sofia per scusarsi ci ha offerto una bottiglia di vino. Casa carina, molto tradizionale, così come la vedete in foto. Posizionata bene e tutto walking distance. Sofia ci ha dato delle ottime indicazioni sia turistiche che di ristoranti... La consigliamo. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo.
Buon compromesso qualità prezzo.
The most beautiful home, even better than the photos! It was like an little oasis. So glad I choose to stay here. Sofia' mother Maria was kind and very lovely person. Great value for money!

This exceptionally furnished home is the rare example of the perfect place to stay: quiet and relaxing, but at a superb location, right at the heart of the city. Shopping facilities, tourist attractions and excellent public transportation connections literally a few steps away. The host is very helpful and always there to help. It's an advantage if you speak French. Everything is totally nice and clean in the flat.
Maria is a wonderful and lovely host. Book this room. You won’t regret it!

Very good contact. Nice welcome by Sofia's mother Maria. Very good localization and charming, clean apartment with amazing atmosphere. Apartment very close to the metro and centre of Porto. I recommend!

La stanza di Sofia si trova in una meravigliosa casa d' altri tempi ! Ad accoglierci è stata la gentilissima madre di Sofia che si è resa subito disponibile per qualsiasi cosa .
L'appartamento si trova praticamente in centro, a cinque minuti a piedi dalla via centrale! 
Camera matrimoniale con un ( meraviglioso aggiungerei )bagno in comune.
Consiglio vivamente !

Très bon accueil avec des explications sur le quartier et la vie à Porto.
La chambre était très propre et fonctionnelle et très bien située dans le quartier du Bolhao de Porto

Sofia's place is beautifully decorated with antique furnishings and everything was very comfortable. It is in a great location for sightseeing and Sofia was really helpful with nearby parking options. We really enjoyed our stay :)
EMPLACEMENT PLEIN CENTRE VILLE PARKING A PROXIMITE AVEC UN PRIX RAISONNABLE  8 EUROS PAR JOUR POUR LES TOURISTES ET MERCI A MARIA SA MAMAN
It was really beautiful and atmospheric room. 2 minutes from the pedestrian street with shops and cafes. Thanks Sophie and her mom.
Tutto perfetto! La casa di Sofia è incantevole, accolti dalla  sua affascinante mamma, ottima posizione a due passi dalla fermata Bolhao. E Porto è una bellissima città.
Sofia’s place is nice and cosy. Easy to find and everything is close by at walking distance. You have everything you need and you’ll feel like you are in a piece of historic Porto. Would recommend!
very nice. amazing location. my dear lady.
너무 예쁜 집에서 머물렀네요. 볼량역에서도 가깝고 좋았어요.

The apartment is just as fascinating as the city (which is so beautiful you can die). Very clean and comfortable,  super close to pretty much everything. Less than a minute away from the metro station, two minutes away from the market, five — from the main square. The only problem my wife had was with the temperature of the water in the shower — it's either too hot or too cold and always changing, even if you don't touch the tap. I guess Sofia doesn't know about it, as it's a separate bathroom only for the guests. All the other things could't be better, thanks a lot!

布置的非常好的房子,Sofia的妈妈很贴心,房子非常干净,我们的行李第二天也可以留在屋里,玩完回来后取了行李再走｡
地点很不错,五分钟路程之内有一个地铁站｡

I really enjoyed stayed at Sofia's place. Her mom was really nice and elegant lady. She offered me a black tea in the morning. The location was great and her place was beautiful. I would stay again in the future.
Wonderful apartament in the heart of Porto.
хозяйка до последнего момента была недоступна. когда зашли в дом, встретил зппах старости. много личных вещей, которые напрягали. квартира явно не для сдачи.
Apartamento charmoso, confortável, organizado e limpo! Não podia esperar mais! E Sofia é un doce de pessoa. Recomendo!

Quirky and beautiful flat in great location next to Metro with direct link to Porto centre and airport. Excellent communication with Sofia. Very comfortable and spacious with everything you need. Would definitely recommend. Had a wonderful stay and would love to come back one day.
This place is the coolest and prettiest airbnb I've ever stayed. Loved it and the comfort was outstanding.

Local cêntrico e muito charmoso, um mergulho em Porto de outro século. Cama confortável em um quarto espaçoso. Banheiro gostoso de ficar, com boa iluminação natural, secador de cabelo e ambiente repleto de plantas. Cozinha equipada .

The room certainly has its charm :) the apartment is situated at a superb location: public transportation connections in 2 min walking distance, shopping facilities right around the corner in the centre of Porto. Sofia's mother was really nice and helpful!
Sofia’s home was lovely! A great location and her mother was very kind and welcoming.

I managed to see a lot of Porto and I really liked the Bolhão area. I particularly liked the cheese and meat stores around the Bolhão market. Having the metro available within easy walking distance was a great advantage and the house was a great old place to come back to in the evening.

The apartment is amazing! French style, I really love it! Especially the stunning garden, which is really nice! The location is good, just right next to the metro station, and the building locates near the shopping centres. Sofia’s mother is really helpful and nice. We feel good to stay in sofia’s place. However, the bedsheets are a bit dirty, and there is no shampoo or shower gel provided, so you have to bring your own, which is quite inconvenient to stay a night over there.
I booked Sofia's place in Porto for my parents, who really enjoyed their stay. Everything was great and Sofia is a lovely host. Thanks a lot for everything!

Stayed in this apartment for only one night and fell in love with it. The room is very nicely decorated and might give you a nice royal/vintage feel to it. The bathroom is huge with everything that you might need. We didn't use the kitchen so no idea about that. 

The bed can be small for two plus sized people but wasn't a problem for us, it was comfortable and cozy. The WiFi was fast, Towels were provided and we were welcomed by the host's mother who is very sweet!

The location of the house is perfect. It is in the centre of the city and everything you need is just 5 mins away. The metro stay is just at the end of the street. There are a lot of places to eat and shop in the radius of 500 metres. We used the public transport only to get to the airport, otherwise we walked to all the major attractions and they were just 30-40 mins away by walk. 
Loved the house and would Definitely stay again.
Amazing experience! The room is beautiful and when you open the window and see all the plants you have the feeling you are in a fairy tale. Also really good hospitality!
Sofia and her mother are very friendly. The apartment is beautiful and really well-located, at only 15  minutes walk from the Ribeira. I recommend staying here!
Ottima posizione, vicina alla via dello shopping e alla metro. Casa molto caratteristica, pulita e accogliente. Molto consigliata :)
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Place packed with character! Close to cuty centre and easy to commute. Only downside is the lack of central heating, which can make things a bit nippy!

really cool place for stay! close to metro station (for the airport), you do not need to use subway in Porto, because this apartment is close to city center so everything is by walking distance :). only issue was that sofia's mum speak only french and Portuguese but it's not big deal, she seems to be very nice and explained everything to us
We had a very good time in this charming room. It's situated in the center of Porto.
Super séjour, très belle chambre et salle de bain.

Sofia’s home is located right in the centre of Porto. Very accessible by public transport. Although we didn’t meet her personally - her (I think mother) was kind enough to show us around! The place is very homey (like the pictures) and nicely decorated!

Sofia's place is in a great location, walking to all tourist places, shopping area and very close to the metro station. Her mum is really sweet and though she doesn't speak english, she made great effort to communicate and make our stay  comfortable. Will stay there again!
Stress free stay.  Sofia's mum is friendly on the day receiving me. Show me how to use everything

Nice place, clean , near the centre
The owner si very kind!

This is a charming place on a main commercial street just north of the historical centre. The apartment is done up in a 1930s style and has a relaxing, old-world vibe. It's on the second floor but be aware that there's no lift, and it's lived in by Sofia's mother, who speaks Portuguese and French but no English. Sofia is always on hand though if necessary.

We stayed one night in the room of Sofia’s Apartment. We didn’t meet Sofia by herself but her mother welcomed us well. The communication was okay because we can speak French :)
We would recommend this accommodation.
房子超级漂亮,甚至比我们想象的更漂亮,完全欧式古典装修,住在里面有种穿越的感觉｡Sofia的母亲很和蔼耐心,房子的地理位置也很好,基本上可以步行去所有景点｡总之 十分推荐!

As shown and described, the room is quite spacious and uniquely decorated with antique furniture and some exotic drawings which match well with the whole house. Sofia's mom kindly helped me to make myself familiar with the room and also the gallery-like bathroom, which is also spacious and filled with interesting artefacts. The small green house with lots of plants(ferns) connected to the bathroom(it used be a balcony, I guess) gives the space fresh and healthy atmosphere. Besides, it was very thoughtful of her to provide guests with an extra blanket and even heating fans in this unusually cold winter. My stay in Sofia's place was very comfortable and peaceful.
Kylpy oli upea kokemus pitkän päivän päätteeksi, ja kasvit olivat ihania.
The location is perfect. The bedroom is comfortable and the flat has everything that you need. Check-in/Check-out easy.

Sofia's place is very clean and well situated. This apartment would be good for those who enjoy visual art pieces such as paintings and life-sized mannequin dolls. An interesting place. However, do note that you will need to bring your own shampoo and soap as they are not provided there.

Le logement de Sofia est une véritable expérience Airbnb comme il y en a rarement : tout était bien indiqué, l'accès au logement facilité, l'appartement est charmant, dans un style ancien qui nous a fait remonter dans le temps... Sofia et son ami nous ont raconté toute l'histoire du Portugal depuis les conquêtes arabes et nous ont admirablement conseillé sur les lieux à visiter. Passionnant ! À recommander absolument surtout à ce prix !! Proche du marché Bolhao, incontournable !
춥다는 다른 게스트 말을 듣고 걱정했는데 여분 담요와 난로가 있어서 춥지 않았고 위치가 정말 Good이었어요! 쇼핑가 3~5분거리입니다. 짧게 묵는 동안 소피아는 만나지 못했지만 어머니인 마리아가 친절하게 도움주셨어요!
very nice apartment with large bath, I recommend
볼량역에서 가까워요! 숙소도 넘 예뻐요!! 호스트는 에어비앤비 메세지 하시는 분의 엄마셨어요 ~ 추천합니다!!!!

Die Unterkunft ist wahrlich etwas besonderes und macht den Aufenthalt in Porto sehr authentisch. Großartig und sehr liebevoll eingerichtet! Trotz der Kälte im Februar konnten wir uns mit Heizstrahlern warmhalten und die dicke kuschelige Decke hat ihr übriges getan. 
Die Lage ist super, wenn man es etwas ruhiger bevorzugt, trotzdem ist man schnell zu Fuß in der Stadt. Ein paar Häuser weiter ist auch ein Fahrradverleih. Nur zu empfehlen! :)

Wir waren sehr spät in Porto angekommen, was aber keine Probleme beim Einchecken in die Unterkunft darstellte. Sofia haben wir in der Zeit nicht kennengelernt, jedoch ihre liebenswerte Mama, mit der wir aufgrund meiner geringen Spanischkenntnisse ein wenig ins Gespräch gekommen sind. Die Lage Ist absolut unschlagbar und man ist in wenigen Minuten mitten drin im Getümmel. Wenn ich mal wieder in Porto sein sollte, dann wird hoffentlich wieder ein Platz bei Sofias Mama frei sein. Danke!

It‘s really worthy to stay. I don‘t think there is a better place than here. My friend thought it may be a haunted house, because it‘s indeed well furnished and arranged. And the location is also perfect.

Sofia und ihre Mutter sind ein unschlagbares Team, welches dir eine tolle Zeit in Porto bescheren wird. Die Wohnung ist wundervoll eingerichtet und wer nicht erwartet eine Profiküche zum Kochen vorzufinden, wird sicherlich nicht enttäuscht werden. Wir können diese Unterkunft nur weiterempfehlen, da sie durch ihre perfekte Lage und die geschmackvolle Einrichtung auf ganzer Linie überzeugt.
Stylowy pokoj niedaleko stacji metra Bolhão. Nie mielismy okazji poznac Sofia ale jej mama byla bardzo sypmatyczna i miła. Mogliśmy przechowac bagaz w ostatnim dniu pobytu.

We have got nice charmy apartment, with furniture and nice details from XX age begining. The apartment is cosy, but you must like antique environment to like it. Geographicaly apartment placed in very good place as well.
I can recommend to stay here.
Beautifully furnished apartment, almost like a museum. Central. Can get cold in winter.
Belle appart chaleureux et acueuillante et bien situé Hôte des plus serviable et super gentille.

Really beautiful old apartment in a nice quiet neighborhood. At the same time, very walkable to all the main attractions, and right next to a metro line for access to the airport/anything else you might want.
Perfect location and kind people
设施完善,房子很古朴的设计,位置也很好

Le logement est bien situé dans Porto.
Il ne donne pas sur la rue mais peut être bruyant selon les saisons car il ouvre sur une cour intérieure sur laquelle donnent d'autres logements: cela doit être sonore lorsque les fenêtres sont ouvertes. Comme certains logements sont loués à des touristes, il arrive (nous l'avons vécu sur place) que la "fête" prime sur le respect des autres. Ces appartements sont vieux et mal isolés contre le bruit. Nous avons trouvé un logement conforme à la description mais attention aux allergiques, l'ancien et "authentique" est synonyme de poussière.
Le contact avec Sofia a été agréable.
地理位置十分优越, (Hidden by Airbnb) 都特别方便｡整个房子就好像一件出色的艺术品,非常美丽,非常喜欢｡
I would recommend to speak French / Portuguese and do only go when it is warm outside.
Una casa está muy bien ubicada y es tal cual como las fotos. Puedes andar a todos los sitos del turismo. Sofía y su mamá son muy amables y acogedoras. Sin duda, recomendable
Great stay with Sofia's mom. She was very hospitable. Her apartment has lots of character and personality. Good location, too.

L'emplacement est parfait; le logement est proche des lieux touristiques.
La chambre est confortable, propre et calme.
Je recommande fortement ce logement à tous ceux qui visitent Porto.
Cozy room near the city center and only a 2 minutes walk away from the metro. Easy communication and great hospitality.

Had a great stay with Sophia. She showed us many different local hot spots. 
Bed and bathroom were very large and clean. Would definitely recommend.

We absolutely loved Sofia’s place! It was absolutely a stunning, uniqueplace to stay right in the middle of town. Maybe the most beautiful apartment flat I’ve stayed in yet! Sofia kept us well informed about checkin,  very responsive with communication/info and Maria made us feel very welcome and was so helpful during our short stay in Porto :)

L'appartement est très bien situé, nous avons aimé la décoration, l'accès est y facile proche de toute commodités .
C'est maria la maman de Sofia qui nous a accueillis et était présente durant notre séjour .
Maria es-tu une femme élégante et sympathique qui saura vous charmer par sa culture et son authenticité, elle reflète à elle même la beauté de ce lieu.
Encore merci pour votre accueil Maria , nous recommandons vivement

Logement très bien situé, très proche de la station de métro Bolhao, dans la vielle ville. Cet appartement est en lui-même une œuvre d'art, sa décoration est très recherchée et originale. Nous avons été accueillis par Maria, la mère de Sofia, qui est adorable, et qui parle français.
Wonderful stay at Sofia’s with her mom :) Such a sweet and charming place!
The apartment itself is an amazing experience! Great location, Sofia's mum is very kind, speaks mostly French. Would definitely recommend this accommodation!!

I strongly recommend Sofia’s apartament. Location is perfect! About 100 / 200 meters from the train Station that goes streight to the airport. Super easy to get there! Very close to some of Porto’s main attractions and restaurants. The  bedroom is finally decorated and very clean. Enough room, especially when comparing to european hotel rooms! Same good commenta for bathroom. I would certaily stay there again and recommend to my friends and family. Even though I did not meet Sophia,i would life to Thank her and her mammy for the nice stay!

Lovely home, I did not meet Sofia myself, but she was always on hand to take any queries, her mother was lovely, but could not speak English. I would recommend anyone to stay here, but please keep in mind, it's 2 floors up.
Great place and location!!!

Sofia's place is full of charm! It is though you went back in time. Everything is neatly arranged! The bathroom and entire home is very clean. The bed is big enough for an average couple. We so appreciated having Maria (Sofia's mom) greet us! She is a gem! The location is amazing and close to the  public transit! We felt very safe. Although we did not eat at the house the kitchen was accessible. Thank you very much! We will recommend your place to others. Mary and Linda

The apparment is really close to the city center where you can realy party, but the photos are not as the reality!
There is a specific smell( old and moldy),the kitchen was dirty and the table was full of breadcrumbs and also when we arrived there were dirty dishes in the sink! Also in the second room, if we were 3 persons(luckly we ware 2), the third person wouldn t have where to stay because the room was dirty, the bed was untidy and the room was also dirty!
All in all the apartmen is very good because is near the city center, and that is the only plus that it has.
Great little place with a lot of character. Close to cafes, restaurants and shopping. The only thing I didn’t expect was the lady who lives in the apartment does not speak any English.
Un charmant appartement dans lequel le temps s est arrêté.

This place was great for a very quick stay in Porto. The location is great! The room itself was nice and well-kept and we met Sofia’s Mom, I believe, who was very kind. There’s nothing fancy about this place, but for the price, it really is a great deal!
Ótimo apartamento, muito estiloso e super bem localizado! Quarto e banheiro bem grandes e espaçosos.

The flat is incredibly stylish, with lots of plants and vintage furniture. The bathroom is lovely and entirely for guests, however the bath is for shower use only. The location is great as it is next to a tube station, market, shops and cafes. Also, a nice walk to the river and the tourist sites there. Sofia’s mother was very welcoming and friendly despite the language barrier!
One of the best Airbnb city apartments I’ve ever stayed in, stylish, central and comfortable

que puedo decir..... la casa de sofia fue la mas linda que visite en mis vacaciones... cada detalle nos acariciaba el alma.... todo esto en un maravilloso barrio.... lo recomiendo plenamente.... ahhhhh y su madre Maria, un encanto de mujer
如果你想感受波尔图古老公寓的格调推荐来住,如果你和我一样胆小请慎重考虑,因为在客厅和厨房过道放着两个穿黑衣的人偶,我每次经过都感到害怕!
The apartment is unique with vintage stuff. We met the mother of Sofia and she is very kind. The location is very good. It’s in the city, nearby the sightings and metro station.
Toll gelegene Wohnung mit wirklich süßem Zimmer. Sophias total liebe Mama(?) sprach zwar nur französisch, dennoch hat die Verständigung gut geklappt. Nur zu empfehlen!
A really unique room in a charming flat in a buzzing part of Porto. Really wonderful stay, Sofia was very helpful and check in was very easy. Would highly recommend.

Everything was perfect, it was easy to communicate with sofia.. she gave us opporrunity to leave our bags in the apartment after checking out.
Apartment and room are very nicely decorated with antique furniture and lots of little details and the whole apartment was really clean, what was really imortant to me. But the things that made us feel really uncomfortable were two  humansize dolls sitting around the apartment, especially during the night. Everything else than that was really good.

we have stayed at Sofia's place last year. Back then everything was perfect. That is why we decided to stay there this summer as well. 
fortunately everything was still perfect.
Was a very cosy place to stay for a night. I thoroughly enjoyed it
Excelente!
Beautiful, vintage, quiet and clean appartement with lovely bathroom near to the metro station and city center.
Brilliantly located flat, with interesting art and lovely plants in the bathroom. Very good value.
Tal y como sale en las fotos. Ubicación inmejorable. La madre de Sofia es muy agradable y atenta. La casa tiene un estilo muy particular que me gustó mucho.

Our flight had 4 hours delay and Sofia's mom stayed up to great us at 1:30AM. Place is very clean with very unique touches. Spacious room and old-charm bathroom. Few steps from mall and walking distance to city center. Next day we left our luggage there while sightseeing and picked it up before our flight. Sofia's mom is the nicest lady, although we could not communicate because of the language barrier. Loved our stay at Porto. Thanks a million times.
Un lieu où unique ou règne une agréable ambiance.  Top pour les amoureux.
This stay was really perfect, everything is super near, parking also nearby possible! Very helpful and really a nice style - we enjoyed a lot!!!

The flat was super cozy with Portuguese styled interieur. For us it was a perfect location to explore Porto from.
We would definitely recommend this place and would come back ourselves, if we go to Porto again.
La estancia ha sido genial, la madre de sofia ha sido encantadota a sofia no la hemos podido conocer. Pero ha estado todo muy bien. Si volvemos a oporto sera nuestra eleccion seguro.

Eine tolle Unterkunft mitten in Porto.
Die Ausstattung ist wie auf den Bildern dargestellt, sehr extravagant, aber toll. 
Leider haben wir Sofia nicht kennengelernt, aber ihre Mutter war vor Ort (kann aber nur französisch).
Tipp fürs Parken: Nebenan ist das Einkaufszentrum Via Catarina. Dort kann für 8€/Tag geparkt werden.

Sofia’s place is very unique and beautiful. It’s an old, traditional flat, decorated with attention to detail. We spent there only one night, having special experience. The only thing is that we never met Sofia, either nobody showed us a flat, we didn’t receive any information what we can use, except self check in instruction. We had to guess which room is ours. Location is central, walkable distance to main attractions.
Great location, the room is small but sufficient. The furniture was gorgeous and it was nice to have a private bathroom.
We loved our stay in Porto! Good appartement with good services!
Très belle chambre et salle de bain ! emplacement parfait ! Et très facile pour l arrivé et la départ !
Le logement à beaucoup de charme et l'hôte très réactif. Bien situé. J'ai passé un très bon moment. Je recommande !
The location is excellent and the apartment is a lovely space. we arrived at midnight so it was lovely that we were greeted at that hour. so central to everything

this is very special place to stay especially the Asians. we can see old european mood here. very unique and cozy. 
Bolhão market is very close to here. 
fully suggested here
L’appartement de Sofia est typique, très bien placé, propre et vraiment charmant! Nous y avons très bien dormi! C’était super!
Amazing place, good locatrion, outstanding interior!
Mieszkanie w samym centrum Porto. Bardzo blisko do stacji metra. Stylowe i przytulne. Mama Sofii jest przemiła kobieta. Dziękujemy, ze mogłyśmy zostawic wcześniej bagaż. Polecam!
Sofia war eine sehr gute Gastgeberin. Die Lage und Sauberkeit der Unterkunft sind wirklich super!
Wonderful and Amazing place! Poetry and beauty places
Von der Lage top. Vom checkin einfach. Wer jedoch etwas staubsensibel ist, für den ist es wohl nicht geeignet.

Sofía’s mother welcomed us to her house. They were generous enough to let us check in early. The room was exactly as pictured as well as the bathroom. We were comfortable though I wasn’t sure if we could make use of the rest of the house. We didn’t ask, however, because we were out most of our stay seeing the city. My only complain, and there’s nothing our host could have done, is the noise the neighbors made on both nights. I’m extremely sensitive to noise, and unfortunately didn’t sleep well. But, we were happy with the location, couldn’t have been better. Sofia was helpful and quick to respond to our messages.
The location is amazing!!! Really nice clean place, the lady that owns the place is very kind.
House was pretty as on photos! Everything was tidy and clean. Sofia's mum is very kind person. We came about 11 p.m and she show us our space with smile. Localization is perfect, close to everywhere.

We had a great time in Porto and the appartment is beautiful! Especially Sofia's mother, who lives in the appartment and is a very warm and welcoming to her guests, made us feel at home. The room was smaller than expected, but absolutely fine for a citytrip. The location is very good, near the centrum, but far enough for a nice an quiet night.
推荐
All was great. Extremely central place.
Wie in einem Fellini Film!!
Todo estuvo muy bien, la habitación que rentamos es tal cual como se ve en las fotos y en la descripción, es cómoda y confortable, y el apartamento tiene una excelente ubicación.
Casa molto particolare nel centro di Porto! La consiglio se si è alla ricerca di qualcosa di più spartano

The place was spotless and very charming.The bed was very comfortable. The room represents the real portuguese style, so does the whole appartement.  The place was close to the center and metro. Would go back anytime. We also liked the warm welcoming of Sofias mother. A good start for our trip through Portugal.
Nice spaces - nice decorations - practical location

Nous avons été accueilli par la maman de Sofia, une dame charmante. une petite chambre dans un appartement plein de charme des années 30.  Très bien situé et tranquille malgré la proximité du centre-ville.
Das war alles gut.

This place is at the heart of Porto - very great location! The room and bathroom look like a work of art. The host has great aesthetics! But just be aware of the gigantic doll in the hall of the kitchen. It scared me a couple times - you'll get used to it though
호스트는 에어비앤비 메시지 하시는 분의 어머니셨어요! 프랑스 분인데 매우 친절하시지만 의사소통에 조금 어려움이 있어요. 완벽한 위치이지만 층간소음과 방음이 정말 열악합니다.
The place is amazing!

Le séjour chez Maria a été un très bon moment passé dans un appartement très cosy ,décoré avec tellement de personnalité,et l accueil de Maria est vraiment sympathique et sincère. 
très bien situé dans la ville et proche du métro,calme,bonne literie .
A recommandé

Muy agradables anfitriones. El apartamento cuenta con todo lo necesario para una buena estadía y se encuentra cerca del centro de Porto. A 100 metros hay una estación del Metro que permite llegar en muy poco tiempo, tanto al aeropuerto como a las estaciones del tren. Apenas a metros del edificio se hallan dos centros comerciales, uno de los cuales tiene un supermercado. Bares, restaurantes y otros negocios se encuentran en las cercanías.

Impressions de l'appartement de Maria Lourdes :
1- Vous arrivez à son l'appartement au 2ème étage après un escalier étroit et tortueux sans lumière ...
2- Dans la chambre il y avait des émanations d'un gaz ou d'un produit chimique toxique (je me suis réveillé à 3 heures avec un fort mal de tête)
3- Baignoire fisure, sale et plein de poils avec l'eau de la douche ou très chaude ou très froide.
.4- sol de bain de glace (sol en pierre très froid)
4- La corbeille n'est pas évacuée pendant tout le séjour.
5- Bruits très forts avec rire et voix forte dans la pièce voisine jusque tard dans la nuit le jeudi soir et répété à 2 heures le vendredi soir.
Alojamiento recomendado al 100%. Si queréis conocer Oporto en un sitio centrico,  con estilo y una amabilidad al 100%, este es el lugar adecuado.
房间位置非常好,从casa de musica坐地铁可直达,房东及房东妈妈都非常热情,房间装潢很有特色,推荐入住
Highly recommended!

I thoroughly enjoyed staying in Maria's place. Excellent location - on average a 10-min walk from all the main attractions/spots. Strong wifi too (I had to be on my laptop and work in the morning). Mind that there is no elevator though, and the place is on the 2nd floor (go up 2 flights of stairs). Thank you Maria (and Maria's mother!) (:
Really lovely room and bathroom. Excellent location. Homely. Truly lovely welcome. Anytime I pass through Porto, this will be my first choice to stay. Thank you so much
Such a wonderland. Highly recommend :)
Gute Sauberkeit, schönes kleines Zimmer. Sehr zentral gelegen und die Gastfreundschaft mit kulinarischen Ratschlägen hat gut funktioniert.
정말 아름다운 곳입니다! 하루만 지낸것이 아쉬운곳이었어요. 호스트분께서 매일 집을 관리하시는것 같았고 집이 굉장히 아름답고 깨끗했어요. 역에서도 가깝고 좋았습니다. 다시온다면 또 이 곳을 선택할거에요:) 호스트 할머니께서 영어를 잘 못하시지만 정말 러블리 하신 분이십니다.

Maria’s place was exquisitely decorated with vintage furniture and posters. Staying there was like entering a time machine, in the best way. Close to the city center, it’s an extremely convenient spot for any tourists to stay. If you have luggages, you have 2 flights of stairs to climb so be ready. The climb is totally worth it though!
房东Maria超热情!很喜欢她和她的房子,卫生间太棒了!住过很多民宿最喜欢这里!交通方便,楼下有很多餐厅小店,步行街｡强烈推荐!

The Apartment is a stylish place set up by a real Artist Family. Stay away if you prefer modern, steel, glass, urban hotel style. This is for retro-historism and vintage Lovers. The welcome is genuine, personal and heart-warming. Great Location in the City centre, the place is quiet and large. I will certainly return.

위치 좋고 근처에 임시 볼량시장도 있어요~ 
숙소도 편하고 화장실도 깔끔합니다!

super vriendelijke host
super locatie
zeker aanbevolen prijs kwaliteit

怀着非常愤怒的心情写下此评价｡到达波尔图是下午四点,之前联系房东一切顺利,房东的英语有些地方难以理解但还好能沟通｡房间非常非常隐蔽,在一栋老建筑三楼没有楼梯,我们自己找到房间入住,进去后就完全shocked了!!这绝对是五年来使用airbnb最差的一次体验,不夸张｡房间非常昏暗,客厅混乱,并且我们也无法得知我们入住的是哪一间房,房间通往厨房的走廊很窄,在尽头居然摆了一只斜躺在地上的甚至比人高的黑发红唇假模特,我尊重房东的艺术追求,但我不能苟同,这一点其他客人有在评价提到,怪我单纯以为只是玩偶!走进房间更令人失望,整个房间里充斥着一股浓浓的潮湿霉味,这也怪我单纯以为30s是屋主的气质和装修风格,但这个房子可能就是接近百年的历史｡卧室没有锁只有铁钩,只有盏昏暗的小灯,没有空调,是一只放在地上的小烤火炉,就国内农村土房即视感不夸张,房间镜子也不是镜子因为根本照不出人,床单上一层厚毯子也有历史感,浓烈的霉味!然后是厕所,通往厕所的走廊居然还挂了一件巨大的黑色寿衣,整个房间到处都是旧照片和破碎的镜子,是我本人和同伴实在是不能接受这样诡异的装饰风格,当时的感受就是在闯鬼屋!没有提供毛巾,我们只在生锈的浴室里发现了那种农家乐才会有的洗破了的毛巾｡我们只在房间里呆了一个小时就离开寻找其他房子了,在这期间房东一概没有现身,她的母亲中途回家但无法用英语沟通,更令人绝望｡本人定这个房间完全是因为照片和好评,后来我们找到了只比这家贵100的小酒店体验后才真的觉得愤怒｡既然你的价格并没有什么优势,为什么不诚实地当上你房间的图片,以及那些正常人不会接受的装饰? 另外房东的态度非常傲慢,事后我们尝试索取赔偿时,房东只强调我们没有入住就离开了很不解!因为我和同伴都是女生,在那种诡异的环境下真的很害怕,所以来不及多想没有拍照就离开了,导致我们在后期赔偿投诉时完全没有优势｡本人自认为睡过机场野外徒步住过帐篷绝不矫情,很客观的评价就是房源与实物完全不同!我一分赔偿拿不到没关系,但我不想害了之后入住的朋友! 当然,如果有人不信或者觉得我夸张,欢迎亲身体验!另外波尔图很小,经济也不太发达,这一程下来更推荐选酒店,airbnb在这种非大城市地区,除非喜欢找刺激求不同否则都推荐住酒店!

With the mood of anger I  write this evaluation. I have to give some honest advice. It was a very old house, damp, dark, and terribly furnished. The host did not appear from beginning to end, only an old woman who could not speak English helped us.  We did not check in because we found the room was totally different from the picture. There is a huge, scary human models in the room. The room was unheated and the quilt smelled musty. Our room has no door lock but only a hook, and with the toilet connection. Lack of light and those scary furniture give us a sense of insecurity. That is the most important point why we left there. What made us angry is that the host didn’t feel sorry for her dishonesty about her house but think we’re unreasonable. It was the worst accommodation experience I've ever had.

As condições deste quarto não correspondem à imagem da página. A sala está húmida, escura e destrancada. 
A decoração do quarto é assustadora, e não é recomendada a entrada de raparigas. 

방은 실제 사진과 전혀 맞지 않았고, 매우나 쁜 경험이었기 때문에 입주 할 수 없었다.어둡고 습기 가 많고 깨끗 하지 않 으며, 매우 무섭다
Excelente lugar y ejemplo claro del porqué existe Airbnb. 100% recomendado

Sofia and Maria's flat is amazing, a perfect place to start a journey in Porto. Every details in the house is the result of a personal research or a very act of art. Mother and daughter are both artists and you can understand this at the first sight. I hope to visit you again and soon. All my best from Berlin.

name: Ko Olina Ocean View Condo 2BR/2BA
summary: Penthouse Beach Tower 10th Fl (1003) - Steps from the Ocean. Escape to a Hawaiian Paradise at the Beach Villas Palekaiko on Oahu! Sleeps up to 6. Please note: Ko Olina Resort is a growing resort community. Starting sometime in 2018, construction will begin on one of two new hotels on the two parcels of land next to the Beach Villas.  There may be some construction noise M-F from 7:30 AM to 5 PM. Access to the lagoons and beach will not be affected.
space: The Palekiko welcomes you to paradise from the moment you walk in the door with all you need to relax and rejuvenate during your stay. This villa is 1,400 square feet and has 2 bedrooms and 2 baths.  Custom contemporary decor and upgraded appliances give a 5-star feel, but the price is one of the best values you can find on Oahu! This luxury condo is ideal for a romantic getaway or a family vacation. Located just 45 minutes from Honolulu.
description: Penthouse Beach Tower 10th Fl (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) - Steps from the Ocean. Escape to a Hawaiian Paradise at the Beach Villas Palekaiko on Oahu! Sleeps up to 6. Please note: Ko Olina Resort is a growing resort community. Starting sometime in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , construction will begin on one of two new hotels on the two parcels of land next to the Beach Villas.  There may be some construction noise M-F from 7:30 AM to 5 PM. Access to the lagoons and beach will not be affected. The Palekiko welcomes you to paradise from the moment you walk in the door with all you need to relax and rejuvenate during your stay. This villa is 1,400 square feet and has 2 bedrooms and 2 baths.  Custom contemporary decor and upgraded appliances give a 5-star feel, but the price is one of the best values you can find on Oahu! This luxury condo is ideal for a romantic getaway or a family vacation. Located just 45 minutes from Honolulu. Onsite fitness center Beach Bar Beach Toys High Cha
neighborhood_overview: Spend your days basking in the sun on Ko Olina Beach, just steps from the Palekaiko, or in one of the four lagoons, perfect for swimming and snorkeling. For those with an adventurous side, play a round at the 18-hole championship golf course, embark on a whale-watching tour from the marina or see the many sites the island has to offer. The Palekaiko is located just 45 minutes from Honolulu and Waikiki Beach, and 45 minutes from the North Shore.  The Beach Villas Resort is one of 4 beach front resort properties on Ko Olina.  You are within walking distance to the Disney Aulani, Marriott Ko Olina Timeshare, and the soon to be Four Seasons Hotel.
notes: A rental agreement will be emailed upon reservation. All prices are inclusive of local taxes (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) %).  One-time $300 cleaning fee applies. Inclusive Amenities: - Comfortably sleeps six guests - Two master bedrooms with full baths - King-sized bed in master bedroom, two twin-sized beds that can be converted to a king-sized in the second master bedroom - L-sectional sofa with and 1 full-size Natuzzi sofa bed - Simmons Beautyrest mattress in each bedroom - 600 thread-count Hotel Collection Egyptian cotton luxury linens - Hotel Collection microfiber bath towels - Luxurious bath robes - Full kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances - Extra comforter sets, sheet sets and pillows - Cable TV, cable box in living room and master bedroom - Complementary Wifi internet connection - Climate controlled air conditioning in each room - Remote control curtains in living room - Unlimited long distance calling in US, Canada and US territories - Access to the fitness center, inc
transit: If you plan to explore the island, the best way to get around would be by car. We recommend that you rent a car at the airport. We have TWO parking stalls available with the rental of our condo. Of course you can enjoy your entire vacation just at our resort. There are shuttles and limos available at the airport for your convenience.
access: Onsite fitness center Beach Bar Beach Toys High Chair and Pack n Play are available upon request
interaction: Upon check-in, you will be greeted by, one of our Aloha Ambassadors who will escort you to our villa. A property orientation will be also be provided.
house_rules: This is a non-smoking property.  No Pets

host.host_about:
Aloha! My husband Duke and I run an online business. We have two beautiful children. We love to travel (whenever we can), eat, and revel in great company.  

We purchased this condo so that our family can enjoy a piece of paradise. Although we'd love to live in Hawaii, we call Huntington Beach, California our home.  We take great pride in creating a memorable experience for our guests.  We hope you will find our condo your home away from home.

reviews.comments:
It is always nerve racking looking at a listing and hoping the photos and description match the property you are looking at renting on vacation...I CAN TELL YOU, THAT THIS PLACE, WAS MUCH BETTER THAN EXPECTED AND DESCRIBED!   WOW, MY FAMILY OF 6 LOVED EVERY MINUTE WE WERE THERE. From the meeting of Louie,  who is her manager to, the terrific items included in the unit: cooler with wheels for cold drinks to beach hop, to the boogies boards provided, to the snorkel gear, and the multiple beach sand castle making tools, everything was provided!  I cannot say enough about the unit itself and the condition it was in!  This place is one of the best my family has experienced with airbnb.
Thank you Jackie for your hospitality and your wonderful unit, you made our vacation what we hoped for!

Our first Hawaii vacation was a blast.  The condo is as described in the listing and its pictures: newly built with great view.  The entire process was smoothly managed, from the moment I submitted the reservation request with Jackie to the time I checked out from the front desk.

We spent most of our time swimming in the lagoon #2, which is super quiet and relaxing  compared to the over crowded neighboring Marriott and Disney hotel areas.

We would definitely like to come back this villa condo and Ko Olina.

The check in process was smooth and friendly with the front desk.  I was quickly provided with everything needed to give me access to the very secure property. I was greeted by Patrick, who had been communicating through text ever since my flight arrived.  He was super friendly, informative and showed us where to find all the amenities that came with condo, how to work all the appliances, windows, air-conditioner and even provided the phone number for a great on-site massage therapist. While showing us around Patrick realized that the beds in one of the rooms had not been adjusted, he called and a service attendant showed up within minutes to convert the twin beds into a very comfortable queen.  
We loved staying here, the beach was pristine and safe  We were able to find both serenity and liveliness as desired and had the convenience of accessing the amenities of the Marriot and the Disney Resort easily.  
We dined at the Monkey Pod restaurant several times during the stay because the food was excellent, they had live music, the staff were really friendly and it was located in thee Ko Olina shopping  area, which made it very convenient.  Every time we mentioned to anyone where we were staying the response was " now, that is good living". It was very GOOD living!

Ko Olina beach condo is a phenomenal space in a great location!  Condo premises was immaculate and staff was full of aloha spirit.  The owners were quick to respond to any questions leading up to and during the visit.  (A faulty iron was replaced within ten minutes of a text message!)  Furniture was comfortable and beds provided an amazing sleep.  The lanai was where we ended up spending most of our time while in the condo because of its nice views and relaxing breezes.  I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a relaxing hassle free experience.

We had a fabulous time at Jackie's place.  The views were beautiful.  Our family was very comfortable staying there.  We often stay at the Aulani, next door, and all of our children agreed that the pool area was better here than at the Aulani.  I really enjoyed the mellow vibe at the pool.  It was the perfect place for our children to play and swim.  We would definitely love to stay here again.

Wow, this place is fantastic! I really wish I booked more than three nights, I could stay here forever!! Breathtaking views of ocean and lagoon directly from the whole apartment; modern appliance; spacious bedrooms and living rooms, and friendly service on site... I enjoyed every moment here during the stay. My kids had a great time playing at the lagoon, the water is very clear and not cold at all even in the morning. We dipped into the jacuzzi (which you would need the key card to get in) after playing in the beach, the swimming pool is beautiful as well (we don't have a lot of time to experience that this time, what a pity)! They also have Disney junior Chanel available, which kept my kids quiet when I was busy doing the cleaning work. 
Patric, the onsite manager, is very friendly, and showed us how to operate everything. Jackie, the owner, is very professional and send us all the agreement, map,  instructions ... as soon as we confirmed our stay. 
The stove is a little bit slow to warm up, and it takes long for the dryer to get the work done, but that is nothing to be worried, we are not preparing a big feast or doing heavy laundry everyday. We only prepared our breakfast during the stay. There is a small plaza with dining, cafe, and market, so you don't need to worry for food. 
This place is a comparatively new area, the exit from the highway leads to the entrance of the whole resort which includes 4 major groups: four season, Disney, Beach villa (where we stayed), and Marriot. It is a little bit far from Waikiki and Diamond head. The distance is OK, but we always got caught at the traffic. So be sure to allow extra time to get to those places.

Jackie's apartment is more than great. Really good taken care furniture and appliances. It has a wonderful view of the beach and an incredible sunset, that we watched every day from the spacious balcony. From there you are steps to the beach and have access to the pools that are incredible. We cant wait for our next family vacation, there!!!
Would definitely stay there again. It was very beautiful and loved how they had beach items ready for their guests!!! Thanks!

From the second I inquired about Jackie's condo she was amazingly responsive and helpful thru email and messages . Upon arrival the 5 star service didn't end there . Patrick our greeter and Michael who checked us in were both very friendly and offered great service . 5 star all around . I don't have to mention how beautiful the place is as the pictures are all 100 % accurate depiction of paradise . We will be back . Thanks Jackie !!!!

This villa and the view of the ocean from the balcony was even better than the pictures! My family of 5 enjoyed our 4 nights of staying here.   The villa was very clean and only a few minutes walking distance from the beach.   We liked all the complementary use of sand toys, beach chair, towels, and snorkeling gear.   Jackie was easy to communicate with prior to arrival.   After we arrived, the on-site manager Patrick helped with our questions and checking us in.  The only area of improvement would be the dryer took a while to dry clothes and the stove took longer than usual to warm food....but these aren't a big deal to us.   Everything else was great.   We would love to come back and stay here in the future!
Highly recommended.  The photos are very accurate.  The amenities are everything promised and more.
This Condo was amazing! The View was incredible and the home was clean and comfortable. We would definitely stay there again!

This place is just as great, and probably better than the pictures. Shops and restaurants within walking distance and the lagoons to swim in are wonderful. The local coffee shop is great, we especially enjoyed the acai bowls! Would highly recommend staying here!
Great condo.  Exactly as advertised, great common room for spending time

Stunning condo with everything you need for an incredible vacation. Jackie's place is comfortable, tastefully decorated and complete with all the amenities. Check-in and communication were first class! We loved every minute of staying here.

Thank you so much Jackie for a perfect family vacation.  The pictures of your condo really don't do it justice--the location and the view are stellar.  We loved all the attention paid to details--beach gear, fluffy towels and comfy beds, a well-appointed kitchen.  Also, this particular lagoon of Ko'olina is less crowded which makes for a more relaxing beach than the others which is nice.  Mahalo!
A great place. As accurate as it has been advertised or even better.

Great place. Top end everything. Amazing views. Perfect escape for our family. Quiet but active. All the amenities you might imaging including a smoothie maker. Easy communication and check in. Highly recommend.

This condo has everything you need for a resort and beach holiday. 
It has a great view of Ko Olina beaches and fabulous views of the sunsets.
We would definitely stay here again. Six nights just wasn't enough.
Thank you Jackie.

Jackie's space is amazing. Never have I gone somewhere based in photos and been surprised that the space was even bigger than it looked. Already dreaming about our next trip. 

今回の旅は､両親は日本から､そして主人とは私はﾆｭｰﾖｰｸからﾊﾜｲへ｡ｺｵﾘﾅはたくさんの日本人がいますが､こちらのｳﾞｨﾗにはほとんど日本人がいません｡部屋は広々としていて､素晴らしい景色､設備も整っており素晴らしい時間を過ごすことができました｡ｼﾞｬｯｷｰ素晴らしい機会をありがとう!

This condo was great for 5 adults for a week.  The location was fantastic, away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki.  It definitely feels more like a getaway in paradise when you're here away from the city.

Jackie's place is such a wonderful condo. Everything was perfect and we had great time.  The view from lanai is  superb and the lagoon which is only 3minutes on foot from the condo is great for my little kid.  The condo is next to Aulani Disney hotel , there are shops and restaurants near by too.  Ten-minute drive will take you to Shopping district called kapolei shopping center. There is Safeway and we got groceries there and enjoyed cooking at the very nice kitchen.  We would love to stay Jackie's place again:) Thank you, Jackie!!

Beautiful property in a PERFECT location!  There is a new hotel being built next door which is a bit noisy on weekday mornings but we were forewarned :)  The view from the lanai is spectacular, enjoy it before the new hotel partially blocks the view!  Gorgeous lagoon-style pool and protected beach, perfect for little ones.

My family and I were travelling to Hawaii from the East Coast of the U.S. to attend a destination wedding in Ko Olina. After a long day of travel, we were so glad to be resting at Jackie's place. We had a great view of the lagoon all the way to the mountain ranges and it was a comfortable and enjoyable stay for everybody from my older parents to my 4 year old daughter and I. Everything we needed was there, from a stocked kitchen (just stop by the grocery or the nearby target if you plan to cook) and my 4 year old appreciated the step ladder that helped her reach the sink to wash her hands or climb into the comfortable beds. You could spend several days of your trip just on property, in the nearby lagoons or the community pool, though I'd also recommend renting a car and seeing some of the beautiful mountain scenery nearby. Thank you Jackie, for being a part of our memorable Hawaii trip.

This was our first trip to Hawaii with 4 kids and the property was amazing. The pictures were very accurate but to be honest doesn't do it justice until you're sitting on the lanai watching the sunset. The unit was clean and well stocked. We had a minor issue with the dryer which was resolved the same day we reported it. The pool was relaxing and not crowded with easy access to the lagoon. Logistics and communications were very organized and clear making checking in and out a breeze. Highly recommended for those traveling with kids and looking for hassle free, relaxing stay.

This is a well maintained unit with spectacular views of the ocean and lagoons.   It is far better than we had expected.

The place is well kept with beautiful modern furnishings and high-end appliances.  You can watch the sunset on the ocean from the spacious balcony.

The security is great.  Renters can only access their floor, the lobby and the assigned parking garage level.  For this unit you have 2 assigned parking spaces.

It is located in an area surrounded with good restaurants (Roy's, Monkeypod Kitchen, Fish House at the Four Seasons, Disney Resort dining...) as well as local grocery stores.    Honolulu International Airport is about 21 miles away.

The lagoon was never crowded with tourists or local people unlike Waikiki beach.  You can really relax and enjoy the beautiful views.  You can also access the other 3 lagoons which are within walk-able distances.

We would highly recommend Jackie's unit and would love to come back in the future!

P.S.  If you are into golf, there is a beautiful golf course across the street.
Great location away from the noises of Waikiki if you want to visit Oahu. The close location to the lagoon was also great.
Awesome location and view!! Resort style stay without the noise level. Lagoons are awesome for kids.

Jackie was a great host. She responded quickly to confirm the reservation. The pictures don't do the condo justice - the whole wall opens up to a spectacular view. The kitchen is well equipped. The property is awesome - we hung out at the pool and had easy access to the lagoon too. It's great for kids. My 18 month old son loved the beach entrance pool. The host at the resort made everything really easy too. I'd absolutely recommend this condo.
The place was just as described.  Beautiful view, very nice decor and suited our needs perfectly.
The Ko Olina Ocean View Condo exceeded all expectations.  Jackie was great to work with and was available to answer any questions I had.

We greatly enjoyed our stay here! The unit is beautiful, clean, and well-appointed. And the views from the lanai were incredible. We spent a lot of time at the pool and the lagoon/beach – both of which were within quick walking distance from the unit. We'd stay here again in a heartbeat!

Terrific condo and host. Our family typically goes to Hawaii once a year, alternating between Maui and Oahu. If you're like us and want to avoid the more touristy spots like Waikiki, I would definitely recommend Ko Olina. You're away from the crowds, but still a relatively short drive (so long as you avoid commuter hours) from Honolulu and sightseeing spots. There are 4 man-made lagoons in Ko Olina. The Ko Olina Beach Villas are right at lagoon 2. Lagoon 1 has the Disney Aulani resort and I think the Four Seasons. Lagoon 3 has the Marriott and lagoon 4 is the public one, though all four lagoons are publicly accessible. We think lagoon 2 is the best, not just because it's the shortest walk from the condo (basically just down from the elevator and through the outdoor pool area), but also because it tends to be the least crowded. The lagoons are perfect for children - waters are pretty calm and don't get deep until you get pretty far out. We saw some people snorkeling, but it's not a real good spot for that. There are two towers in the Ko Olina Beach Villas. The condo is in the beach tower, which is the one closest to the beach. We've stayed at the other tower before, and while still nice, just isn't comparable to the beach tower. For the other tower, you're basically overlooking the interior of the resort and get barely, if any, a view of the ocean. The parking garage is also over the beach villa, meaning from Jackie's condo, we can take an elevator directly down to the garage (and one of the parking spots is pretty much right in front of the elevator), whereas in the other tower, you have to walk to the beach tower to take the elevator down to the parking garage. Jackie's condo also has one of the best views. It's on the penultimate floor on the side of the building where facing the empty lot where I think they will build the Atlantis resort, but you get a great view of the beach and ocean and of the sunset from the lanai. The condo has two rooms with two full bathrooms. The master is a nice size with an ensuite bathroom with a separate tub and shower. The other bedroom is smaller, especially suitable for kids. The second bathroom is just outside of the second bedroom. The condo is nicely furnished and not cluttered. Kitchen is modern. There is a smallish washer and dryer. I don't know whether the dryer was broken, but it wasn't giving out much heat. I'm sure we could have just called maintenance and they could have easily fixed, but we ended up just hang drying our clothes - they dried fast because of the weather and we helped conserve some electricity. There's plenty of towels and beach gear, including folding chairs, snorkeling gear, boogie boards and other flotation devices. There are a variety of restaurants...
Beautiful place in a great location. We loved our stay here and will definitely be back. Great communication from the host. Thanks so much!

We had a fabulous time staying in this beautiful, so well designed and stylish condo on the 10th floor at the beach tower. It feels new and clean and at the same time so comfortable and cozy with lovely details. Jackie is a wonderful host with fast, friendly and reliable communication. She left us lovely details that made us feel home immediately. We hope we can come back one day.

Jackie my family and I wanted to thank you for one of the best holiday vacations that we have ever taken, your condo is amazing and the pictures do it no justice.  Clean, beautiful and the location is one of the best that I have experienced.

The amenities were endless not only in the condo but around as well, we had dinner at the Four Seasons Mina's Fish House and had the pleasure of meeting the head chef Michael Mina himself.

We are looking forward to returning back to Ko Olina and most importantly back to your wonderful condo!!!

Thank you so very much Jackie for wonder family memories!!!!! 

The Nachman's

Jackie's condo was exactly as advertised. Although the pictures didn't quite do that beautiful view justice. The condo was clean and the check in process was super easy. We had everything we needed to be comfortable, and I really appreciated the bag of coffee in the room! The building is so quiet that we were never bothered by any outside noise. No slamming doors or stomping feet. It was the perfect place for a family, with plenty of space to spread out. Comfy beds too!  And we didn't have any trouble with the washer and dryer at all. I'm glad that we stayed here, instead of a cramped hotel room. Also, grocery shopping and restaurants were a short drive away.  My kids loved the beach so much, they didn't want to go anywhere else. Great vacation!

这是夏威夷一个很安静的沙滩,房间很干净,小区设施很全,周围很多餐饮,离商业区不远,非常方便!
海景很棒!
房间准备了很多餐具,厨房设备很全,适合4-5人生活!
屋主很好,提前介绍很多餐馆!
物业很尽职,入住和退房很方便!

Jackie was very gracious in helping us booking her apartment with only a few hours notice when we had to fly to Honolulu for a family emergency. The apartment was perfect for me, my husband, and our to kids. This is a state-of- the-art place and beautifully decorated. The facilities itself has many amenities such as a bar and swimming pool. There is a man made lagoon perfect for younger children and adults that just want to relax and float in the gentle water. The apartment has an excellent collection of boogie boards, snorkels, beach chairs and the like, which makes beach going very simple. If you haven't been to Ko Olina on Oahu you should definitely check in out! I am from Oahu and I love it! Aloha
Wonderful condo! Spotless and quiet. Comfortable beds. Beach and snorkeling gear provided for the lagoon. Can’t beat the view!
Outstanding host, first class amenities. Place is beautiful and the location is fantastic. Family had a fabulous time, can't wait to be back.
This place is even better than the pictures. I would recommend it any time and the customer service is exceptional. Thank you
Great place
Beautiful condo with gorgeous views! Jackie was quick to respond to all our inquiries. We would definitely love staying at this condo again.

If you’re looking to have an experience of a lifetime I truly recommend staying at Jackie’s Condo. The location is unbeatable and pictures don’t compare to how nice this place actually is. Jackie was an amazing host and made sure all my needs were met while I was on vacation. Next time I come to Hawaii I know where I will be staying at again. 10/10!
This a very nice condo in a fantastic location. It is better than the photos. We loved our time there and were sad when it can to an end.

Loved everything! The Villa was perfect clean, was nice having towels, chairs, beach toys, cooler,  etc.  Beautiful view. My kids loved the lagoon and pools. We will for sure be back! Thank you for everything it was a dream come true in every way. Best place to stay hands down!
This is an awesome place with a great sunset view and private beach and lagoon. Facilities were awesome and the location was great. Would definitely book this place again next time.

We really loved our stay here. Check in process was smooth and easy. We were greeted by the great staff and Shane who oriented us to the unit. The view was fabulous and love that the kitchen opens right on to the balcony. The weather was perfect and we ate almost all of our meals on the lanai. This place is perfect for families with older children since it's located on the 10th floor. The beds were very comfortable with air conditioning in both bedrooms. I'm pretty sensitive to noise and had no complaints with noise whatsoever in this location. The amenities provided were great with wifi and 2 parking spaces that are included. The kitchen was fully equipped with more than anything and everything you need to cook and have a great family meal. The beach equipment provided was more than enough to have a fun and comfortable beach day. The pool area was nice and clean with lots of lounge chairs and areas. The pool has direct access to the lagoon. The lagoon was less crowded than the neighboring lagoons at Aulani and the Marriott, perfect for families that want more privacy and like to stay away from the crowds. This place is truly a home away from home. My kids are already asking to stay at the Beach Villas again!

Jackie's condo is gorgeous. It was perfectly suited for our family if 6. Beautiful mornings and phenomenal sunsets from the lanai.  Close to shopping and restaurants. The lagoons are perfect.  We loved every minute of our 5 days here. Mahalo!
Jackie's place is as advertised. Clean, stocked and built will all the luxuries.

This is the place to stay!  The 10th floor balcony has Ocean/Lagoon views as well as sweeping maintain views.  The location is in the Beach Tower which makes it extremely convenient to the pools and lagoons.
The sleep arrangements are awesome and we never heard any outside noise or other noise coming from other condos.  The kitchen is very high end and we typically were able to eat breakfast and lunch in the condo.
A special add with this place is that it provided chairs for the beach, boogie boards, mats for the beach and even a cooler.  
We would highly recommend this place and will look to book it again next year.
We have stayed at the Marriott Beach Resort in Ko Olina several times and would select Jackie’s place over that for sure.
You will not be disappointed by staying here!!!!!!
Lovely place to stay with family!  Great location,  and the full kitchen makes meals in a breeze.  Highly recommend for families!
Jackie was quick to respond to messages. Wonderful home with beautiful scenery. We look forward to coming back! Very recommended.
Great location and all as expected.

This is truly an amazing place to stay in Oahu. The suite is clean, spacious, and beautiful. It has everything you need for a fun relaxing vacation. The views are gorgeous and the location is perfect. Everything from check in/out, parking, to all the amenities are first class! Jackie is a great host. She gave us plenty of information about the Beach Villas and Ko'Olina area beforehand and made sure everything was in order for our arrival. It was definitely a vacation experience to remember!

This is the 2nd time staying here.  Love this place and the area.
Furniture, furnishings and decor is top notch
The amenities within the complex are also great for everyone.
Staff is helpful and welcoming

When my family and I visited Oahu, we stayed at Jackie's place. Based on location, condo quality, and amenities, we all thought it was one of our best Airbnb stays. Also, our interaction with Jackie was extremely pleasant and we can see why she is a "super host".
Beautiful view of the beach and close walking distance to the grocery store and other hotels. Would definitely stay here again.
Clean place with a wonderful pool and beach access   she even supplies families with some beach toys!

Thank you Jackie for providing a beautiful living space which met all our family needs. Sitting on the lanai, sipping pinot noir, and watching the sun set was a dream come true. This family vacation will be cherished for a lifetime.

Jackie was quick to respond to questions I had! I loved how the home was very accommodating to kids. Her host Shane was welcoming and detailed with the grounds tour. The home was absolutely beautiful! Will Definitely book again.

We were 3 adults, my husband, my mom, and I, and we all loved Jackie's place a lot! 
 Since the rooms were so comfortable and there was such an awesome view, we only went out during the day, and enjoyed the rest of time, breakfast and the dinner at the venue every day! 
And we were also lucky to see the fireworks at Ko Olina beach on Saturday night!!!!!
We would love to come back again!

Jackie's place is amazing! The view from the 10th floor is breathtaking. The villas include several pools and hot-tubs, and access to the a calm and quiet beach. All the amenities we needed for the family were there, including beach towels, sand toys, floaties, kickboards, beach chairs and boogie boards. There was also a pack-and-play and high-chair for the baby. Our whole family thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Jackie's place.

Beautiful place with a breathtaking view (I woke up every morning to a gorgeous sunrise). If you and family members are staying in Kapolei, I would not hesitate to recommend Jackie's condo. Very spacious, well kept, and in great approximation to a private cove. Thank you again for the privilege of staying at your lovely condo!

My family loves the slower pace lifestyle that Ko Olina offers. The lagoons are great for everyone to play in and snorkel. Sitting on the lanai and enjoying the sunset views is so peaceful. 
Jackie’s place has all your beach needs, other than your swimsuit and sunscreen! (Big cooler, boogie boards, chairs, umbrella, sand toys, infant floatie, beach mats, noodles, and snorkel gear) There was a pack and play, high chair, and strollers which make it convenient for families. The pool is not heated, but is a nice area to hang out in.
Although no restaurants were in the building, the other lagoons had a few options and are just a short walk.
Excellent venue, condo is spacious with everything you need to cook in or relax in.  Appointed with high end touches everywhere and views to die for!

Another wonderful stay!  This is the third time for us staying in one of Jackie's condos at Ko Olina.  Again, the condo and service was excellent.  We stayed in the 2 bedroom condo on the 10th floor facing the Aulani.  The views are spectacular and the condo is amazing too.  Very clean and modern.  Full kitchen and 2 bathrooms.  The pools and beaches are great.  And we love the peaceful atmosphere of Ko Olina.  We are looking forward to our next stay!

name: Unique NYC Loft - Guest Room
summary: Located downtown Manhattan, this renovated artist loft offers over 2,000 sq ft of chic living. Steps from Battery Park, Wall St, the Seaport, Tribeca and all major subways. The space offers a unique opportunity to live out your NYC dream vacation.
space: This is a true artist loft with 10 ft high ceilings and views of the East River. Located across from a quaint park, the space is adjacent to bustling Stone Street and trendy Dead Rabbit Bar & Restaurant. There is a full kitchen with enough space to make family meals and the living room offers a sanctuary to spread out in.
description: Located downtown Manhattan, this renovated artist loft offers over 2,000 sq ft of chic living. Steps from Battery Park, Wall St, the Seaport, Tribeca and all major subways. The space offers a unique opportunity to live out your NYC dream vacation. This is a true artist loft with 10 ft high ceilings and views of the East River. Located across from a quaint park, the space is adjacent to bustling Stone Street and trendy Dead Rabbit Bar & Restaurant. There is a full kitchen with enough space to make family meals and the living room offers a sanctuary to spread out in. The whole apartment is accessible to guests. I usually make a pot of coffee, and doing my morning routine, gym, run, mediate.  I am friendly, gay and well traveled.  I love learning about other cultures and experiencing life through my guests.  Sometimes I work from home or in nearby coffee shops in the afternoon, generally it's pretty quite here though.  Nights the TV is usually on or I'm in my bedroom watching the news.  F
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is reminiscent of old-school Europe. In the early 1800s the area was a major port, and the building use to be a warehouse for the storage of spices. All around there are cafes, pubs, and restaurants that line cobble stone streets, and the nearby park offers a refuge from the concrete jungle life. While there is a lot going on, the apartment is quiet, which is unusual for NYC.
transit: Most major subways (1, 2, 3, N, R, 4, 5, J, & M) are 3 blocks away. It takes 15 mins to get anywhere in Manhattan.  Central Park (where I work) takes 20 mins on a workday.  The A, C, E trains are 6 blocks away at Fulton Street. We are very close to the west side highway bike path as well and CitiBike is located just around the corner. Cabs are always available right outside the door.
access: The whole apartment is accessible to guests.
interaction: I usually make a pot of coffee, and doing my morning routine, gym, run, mediate.  I am friendly, gay and well traveled.  I love learning about other cultures and experiencing life through my guests.  Sometimes I work from home or in nearby coffee shops in the afternoon, generally it's pretty quite here though.  Nights the TV is usually on or I'm in my bedroom watching the news.  Feel free to come and go as you please!
house_rules: We just are looking for people who are respectful to our home and keeping it a nice place to stay.  We generally goto bed around midnight and would ask you to respect quite time after that.  Please be tidy and respectful of the common areas... And I do my best to keep everything tidy on a day to day basis.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I've lived in NYC for 15 years and have worked in Advertising over the last 10. I spent a great deal of my early years working on big broadway shows, and enjoy New York's wonderful theatre and art scene.  

I enjoy learning about culture, I'm deeply inspired by Asia, and am well traveled.  I spent over a year living in Hawaii, several months in Taiwan, 6 months studying in Paris, and  I use to work for a School based out of Sweden and have spent a great deal of time there as well.  I love the world and I enjoy getting to know new parts through the people I share my home with.

I head into work every morning around 9AM and come back to the Apt around 6PM each night.  I like to bike there each day if i can, and try to do a 6 mile run every night after work.  I'm active and love NYC and the waterfront.  I spend most of my free time just running, walking, or playing in the river parks by my house.

reviews.comments: We had a really good time in the apartment! Luke its a really good host! He is really friendly and helped us every time. It was so good place for sightseeing!

This was the last leg of my very first trip to the US and my second airbnb experience. My first was in San Francisco the week before and unfortunately it was not great so I was a little disheartened and not sure what to expect. 
My sister was joining me for my time in New York (she flew in from Australia) and we arrived at Luke's all full of chatter and excitement and the pictures of the apartment were spot on. It is a great apartment, industrial in look and Lukes artwork and style make it a wonderful and funky place to stay....just what an Aussie imagines a New York apartment to look like.
My sister and I were sharing the room and Luke gave us an option of putting a foldout bed (or cot as they call it in the US) in so we did not both have to share the queen size bed provided. We decided to go with this option on the second night and I ended up sleeping on the foldout for the whole trip as it was very comfortable.
The location of Luke's apartment is amazing. It is close to everything and we found getting around quick and easy. 'Stone Street' is just around the corner and not only did it  provide a huge range of eating options it also had a very cute look as the street is all cobblestones and in the right weather everyone eats outside.
