We even found ourselves an Aussie coffee shop in Broad Street which is just a 5 minute walk from the apartment and if you are an Aussie you will understand that this is a bonus as while New York is an awesome place the coffee is a little different to what we experience in Australia.
As a host Luke is wonderful even racing out to buy us a hairdryer when he realised the one in his bathroom was missing. The linen, pillows and towels were all clean and of good quality which was very noticeable to me after my stay in San Francisco.
Luke as a person is sweet, interesting and very easy to share an apartment with (which is important when you are renting a room)
My sister and I were often very excited and very talkative and Luke took this all in his stride and we loved sharing our day with him in the evenings when we arrived home.
Luke is intuitive and I think can judge just the amount of interaction his guests require. For my sister and I we felt comfortable with Luke pretty quickly and we now consider him a friend and he will always be an important part of a very special time for my sister and I. We had not seen each other for two years and this trip and the accommodation/location/host was a very big part of what made it so wonderful. Thank you Luke.....Thank you New York!

All is great here!! 
My son and I had a fantastic stay and we felt very welcome. 
Apartment looks great (love the paintings!), bed sleeps super, location is perfect. 
A lot of nice little places to eat in the surroundings. Beautiful old houses mixed with new large officebuildings. Lively during the day but quiet at night. So no noise when you want to sleep. 
Metro is nearby. (thanks Aussie girls that we could use your spare days on the metro card!)
Luke is a perfect host, with smooth communication and is a very nice guy!

Luke was a wonderful host and became a friend over the two weeks in his apartment. He is an excellent communicator and goes above and beyond to make you feel at home. His apartment is incredibly well located in the heart of the financial district with subway lines all over. It's a chic contemporary and quirky apartment with wonderful artwork, spacious and clean. The room was really comfortable and Luke went out of his way to provide a small travel sleeper bed to accommodate for us both (especially as we got a little ill on our trip and having two beds was great!) - loved spending time there and it's equipped with Netflix, Amazon Echo and his quirky dog Baude who was a pleasure to be around in addition to the robotic hoover that cleans the place which was really cool. We really appreciate Luke making us feel like his own friends / family and being super accommodating - would highly recommend Luke and his place, it's a great experience and we'll be back again!
Really nice stay in great apartment with loveliest host ever.Thank you very much.Hopefully back soon.Best Bebe
Awesome place, awesome host. I will definitely be staying here more often, whenever I can.

Lucas's place was perfect for my last-minute business trip. He was welcoming and social, but not intrusive. The place is a cool old industrial space divvied up into two bedrooms—lots of character, added by the building and by Lucas. I plan to return!
2nd stay at Lucas' place. And I again had a great stay! Truly a gem of a host.
Amazing hosts! My second time here and nothing but great things to say.
Your home away from home in NYC. Would recommend to friends and family in heartbeat. Lucas is a great host and his place is just Magic. The ultimate NYC experience.
I had an emergency trip come up and Lucas was fast and helpful. Great location. Cool place with an artsy feel. Just a great experience all around.
Luke's loft was great! Its in the heart of the financial district and close to several subway stations. Luke was very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed our stay very much!

Really beautiful apartment, Lucas was friendly and help us with everything.
The dog is not a problem, you will not see him.
It is like rent the own apartment, he never stay there.

My parents loved their staying at Lucas's place! The bedroom was a lot bigger than what's shown in the picture and the entire place was so clean and cozy. Location was very ideal too - heart of Wall Street, walking distance to restaurants, grocerie stores, and the river. Lucas was happy to let us use his kitchen and even his rice and eggs to cook!!! He's an amazing host and I'll definitely recommend this place!

Lucas is an excellent host and his place is very clean and comfortable.  The room we stayed in was exactly as described - comfortable, creative and practical.  The apartment is in an amazing spot - a great little corner tucked away south of Wall Street without traffic noise or fumes.  There are two sets of fairly steep steps to reach the apartment but it's very secure and was no problem for us.  We loved it and can't wait to stay there again!

Lucas è stato molto disponibile sin dall'inizio quando a causa di una serie di inconvenienti siamo arrivati in ritardo all'orario prefissato per il check-in. L'appartamento si trova nel cuor del distretto finanziario comodissimo al ferryboat per la Statua della Libertà berta ed Ellis Island. Anche the New World Center non è molto lontano. 15 minuti a piedi.L'appartamento é molto carino e colorato. Consigliatissimo!!! Grazie Lucas

Lucas' place is in a great location in the financial district, right beside battery park and the statement island ferry port.

The space itself is beautiful with his original art works everywhere.

It's a Perfect spot to see New York, and Lucas himself is a gracious host who was happy to share his home.

Also the Dubs beat Mayo in Croker and took home Sam so the weekend was some craic hai.

MAGIC.... this place is not only perfectly located-  super easy access to everything!... it is an honest-to-goodness, real artists loft, with ambiance galore. Lucas is an amazing, creative, patient, friendly host, that truly wants your experience to be a good one. The space is much bigger than the photos suggest and it has every amenity as well as Lucas' beautiful art everywhere. Steps away from the water and the ferry to visit the Statue of Liberty with loads of amazing New York bars and restaurants less than 3 minutes walk.  You won't be disappointed. Awesome Airbnb..
Lucas was a great host and nothing more you can ask for. The location is great and the room was much better than expected.

I chose Lucas' apartment as my base for a short stay in New York City for a number of reasons. Primarily location - I didn't want the noise/chaos of midtown, but wanted to be able to travel around the city with ease. The location was ideal for this. I also wanted a space which was a bit more interesting than the average hotel/Airbnb - the apartment did not let me down on this one - even though I didn't spend a huge amount of time there, the space had a huge amount of character from Lucas' art.

The apartment was comfortable and Lucas was a very warm and friendly host. Lucas was able to accommodate awkward check in/check out times and communicative on any queries I had.

Aside from everything else, the bed is super comfortable - perfect to get a good nights sleep after a full on day exploring the city.

As a woman traveling alone I was worried about feeling safe. 
I felt so safe from the moment I met Lucas. His place was clean, bed was comfy and it was a pleasure to come home to him every evening for some light chit chat. He was very respectful of privacy. I highly suggest renting from him. I know I will rent from him again.
Lucas and his place were great. Super easy communication. Fantastic location. Funky and comfortable space. Highly recommend.

Lucas' place is super stylish and cozy at the same time. It is perfectly located (close to different subways& ferry) in the financial district with shops, coffee places and sightseeings close by. Lucas and Bode are great hosts. We loved staying at the loft.

Lucas is an awesome host! He is 100% responsive and makes special effort to be accommodating. I really enjoyed staying at his apartment and will definitely come back next time I am in NYC. I cannot thank him enough to make my very first Airbnb experience an awesome one!
Lucas’s place was A++++ from top to bottom ...from the fabulous shower to comfortable pillows ....his coffee selection was fabulous...perfect location highly recommended airbnb
A stylish yet very comfortable apartment with a great host in a great location.  I will happily rent again if my travels bring me to that area.

Lucas was a great host, his apartment is really stylish and has a great location. It's a perfect spot to do some sightseeing, the metro lines going to midtown are around the corner, so it just takes about 20 minutes to get to the Times Square / Empire State Building etc. 
We really enjoyed staying there and would highly recommend it to others :)
Lucas was such an incredible host! It’s the nicest Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in and he was so welcoming and friendly. There’s no better place to stay in New York and no better person to stay with!

Lucas is the ideal host -- very conscientious and kind, he made us feel completely at home in his stylish apartment.  His apartment is clean, well-located and comfortable, with amazing art work.  We will definitely try to stay here again when we come back to New York!

Even if we didn't meet because of Thanksgiving period, Lucas was very kind, with lot of informations and messages for us to be sure that everything was good for us. And it was!
The flat is beautiful, comfortable, near subways, the room quiet.
A very pleasant place in FiDi in New York!
We were very happy of this airbnb experience!
Very nice appartement with a great host ! Well located, well decorated. Lucas is really nice and reactiv. We recommend this place !
If we come back, we 'll definitly stay in Lucas place again. It is  perfect!

Lucas it was the most awesome host ever! We love his stylish house, we love the amenities and we love Lucas too. His place it’s awesome! It’s calm to sleep at night, restaurants and public transportation is near! It’s a perfect place to stay in NYC. 

Lucas foi o melhor host de todos! Nos amamos a casa estilosa, as amenities e o próprio Lucas. O apartamento dele é maravilhoso! É calmo para dormir à noite e há muitos restaurantes e transportes públicos ao redor. É um lugar perfeito para ficar em NYC.
A Nice apt in nice street with a nice host!
Lucas is one of the best AirBnB hosts we could ask for. Hands down felt at home and he was super accommodating! Would not hesitate to stay here again!
Lucas is a great host. His home is fantastic. Very comfortable room and I slept great all week. He made it simple to extend my stay as required.
Lucas is a super accommodating host. His place is so lovely. Beautiful pieces of art and very well put together. It's a comfortable room and is filled with extra amenities. AWESOME airbnb :)

We honestly felt that Luke himself was one of the best parts of our NewYork trip. He offers the perfect blend of hosting : engaging enough to be helpful and honoring enough of your time as a guest w just the right balance. The apartment is comfy and artsy. It’s near several subway stops so you can have easy access to anywhere in the city. There are great coffee shops, bars and restaurants nearby. This was our second stay and we can’t wait for a third.

It was my 1st time using Airbnb and I've traveled alone. I have to say that staying at Lucas's place was a very good experience, actually beyond my expectations! His place is so cool, so unique, with a lot of canvas painted by himself and it is a smart home with Amazon's assistant Alexa. The subway is just 2 blocks away and neighborhood is safe and quiet.

The location is fabulous - you can see the water and its only a block to the subway. Much quieter at night than I expected as it is in the financial district, which also means that some of the restaurants are closed on Saturday night. Plenty still to choose from though. Luke's place is more spacious than what I expected for NYC, but keep in mind that the building is very old so will feel very different if you are used to newer midwest suburbian homes. Two flights of steep stairs to the apartment may be taxing with luggage or after a long day of sightseeing. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Ne cherchez pas plus loin. La chambre que loue Lucas dans son magnifique loft d'artiste et l'endroit idéal pour passer des vacances inoubliables à New York. Les murs en brique sont décorés par d'innombrables toiles faites par lui-même, ce qui rend le lieu très coloré et chaleureux. Aussi, Lucas vous donne accès à toutes les pièces communes sans aucune restriction. A noter que l'endroit n'est pas trop bruyant. 

Lucas est une personne extrêmement chaleureuse et gentille. Il saura vous donner des conseils pour vos visites. Il est également très discret lorsqu'il est à la maison et vous fera presque oublier sa présence.

L'appartement est situé à deux pas de Wall Street, du ferry pour la Statue de la Liberté, du site du World Trade Center et du Brookling Bridge. Midtown, Time Square et Central Park sont à environ 30 minutes en subway. 

Définitivement l'endroit où je serai pour mon prochain séjour à New York. Bref le top.

Lucas's home is absolutely beautiful and filled with wonderful art and books. It's also in a fantastic location surrounded by delicious food and right by the water. Lucas is also extremely friendly and a wonderful host. I highly recommend staying here!

I could never wish better place to stay in New York. Lucas is a great host and his apartment is adorable. Moreover it's close to the subway. You can find lots of places to eat and drink nearby. So if you want live as a stylish New Yorker, you definetly should choose this place!

This is a must- stay! Fabulous place with lots to look at and amazing hospitality! Lucas makes his guests feel welcomed and taken care of. The area is central and was easy to come and go. Thanks Lucas!

Centrally located with easy access to subways and lots of nice bars around the apartment. Lucas is an amazing host and nothing is too much trouble.  Lots of hints and tips which helped us during our stay. The apartment is very stylish and has a nice relaxed feel. We definitely recommend his place and even more so the coffee. You will not be disappointed. We will definitely be staying again. X

Had a great time at Lucas' place.  He's one of the friendliest, most accommodating hosts we've ever stayed with.  Communication was excellent and check in was super smooth.  We liked the location because almost all of the subways run down by Battery Park, so it's pretty easy to get almost anywhere with minimal transfers, especially downtown and midtown.  The apartment itself is very spacious and has everything you need.  Great place overall.

I would highly recommend this place for my friends and family. This place is amazing. Nice and clean Bed is really comfortable. Lucas is wonderful host. I will definitely book this room again if I come back!

Excellent option! Centrally located with a comfortable space. Everything was just as described , extremely clean and great artwork. Lucas is a fantastic host, excellent with communication , highly recommend a stay if you are looking for a great place.

Lucas is a great host and his space is inspiring. I would recommend for anyone traveling to the Manhattan area to stay here. It's a great location with easy access to food, drinks, sightseeing, and other activities.

The place was well decorated. Lucas is a very friendly host. The room and apartment is spacious. The area is good if you like it quiet. The subway is a 5 min. walk. The check-in and out was very flexible. thanks for that...

This was my first time to not stay in a private apartment - ( not shared with the owner )Lucas was SO amazing, gracious, and the flat was as shown and better!  I would definitely suggest it for anyone!   It was warm , welcoming and fun!
The apartment is super cool and centraly located with easy access to anywhere in NYC. Lucas is a great guy - we really enjoyed our stay.

I had an amazing stay at Lucas's home. His apartment is such an incredible  space, full of color, art and books. He is an amazing host, incredibly welcoming and has the best energy. The location is also fantastic. I wish I could have stayed longer!  I highly recommend!
Really cool place, in a good location with a great host!

We had a great stay at Lucas’s place. It’s a very stylish loft in a great location in NYC just a few mins walk from the subway. 

Lucas is a great host, very welcoming and accomodating. I would highly recommend his place for a visit to NYC.
Awesome spot, fantastic host, highly recommended.
Great host who wants you to have a good experience in the house. Friendly and professional. One of the best host we’ve ever had. You’re sharing the flat but it feels like home from the very beginning

Our stay was perfect! Luke's home is unbelievably cool, from the artwork and interesting books to the 'Alexa' smart home integrations. Luke is an awesome host, and was very accommodating with check-in/check-out times. Thanks again for sharing your incredible home with us Luke! :)

Lucas is the absolute best. His place is awesome. Great location. The bed was comfy and the room was plenty big. He was quick to respond and made sure to give us all the information needed. He was so kind and hospitable. We didn’t want to leave and can’t wait to come back!

Luke’s apartment is BEAUTIFUL!!! It was such a dream for our first few nights on our big America’s trip!!! Luke is lovely and the place is super nice and tidy. Fans and aircon were left on for our arrival, which was amazing in the intense muggy heat!! Even though we didn’t cross paths much he is JUST LOVELY and bubbly and so friendly!! The apartment is in a really easy location to get to by a few different train lines if you want to be in lower Manhattan. Thank you so much! X

Super perfect. 
Kind host.
Very clean and neat.
Artistic interiors.
Perfect location.
(if you want to hang around downtown and Brooklyn)


But no elevators
 
Definitely gonna visit once twice more and more.
Perfect location in lower Manhattan. Beautiful space and Lucas is an excellent host.
Lucas was friendly and charming and his apartment was spacious and in a great location, we had an awesome stay and would highly recommend staying here!

Lucas has the best apartment I’ve ever seen. His works of art give so much character and life to the apartment. He is also a great host! The location of the apartment is perfect to get around downtown NY and has great restaurants near by! Thank you for the enjoyable weekend, Lucas.

Amazing host, great location, loft is very cool and Lucas was very helpful every step of the way.  Even allowed us to leave when rushing to airport and couldn't find his keys which we sent back by mail after returning home.

Dear Lucas,

We would like to thank you for our amazing stay at your beautiful loft, your hospitality and your warming welcome. It was our best experience with Airbnb!!

We are definitely recommending your apartment to our friends if they come to New York!

Take care! 

Greetings from Belgium,
JJ

Lucas’ place is THE BEST!!! I’ve literally had an Instagram post dedicated to it with the following caption: ‘not sure what I liked better - NYC or this apartment’. Super stylish, super spacious and mega (!!!) clean apartment, morning coffee before you even open your eyes and cherry on top - all this in Lower Manhattan (just around the corner from Wall Street and Statue of Liberty. Can someone name me a better place to stay at in NYC??). Lucas is another one of New York’s gem - super friendly, super easy going and is just sooooo COOL. Stalk him on Instagram and (Hidden by Airbnb) if you don’t believe me!! And very down to Earth at the same time (despite all coolness and the amount of followers! Haha). Staying at Lucas’ place was literally the best Airbnb experience (and it definitely made our trip to New York!!) and I don’t think anyone will ever be able to match it.  

Highly recommend this place if you are looking where to stay when visiting NYC!! Lucas, we miss you and New York already, buddy!!!!! Thanks for everything! Hugs, Ema & Raminta.
Lucas has an artful and art filled living space. Everything was neat and tidy.
Perfectly located accommodation. Close to transit, great restaurants and many attractions. Extremely comfortable and welcoming environment.

¡Ubicación inmejorable, atención maravillosa! ¡Literalmente, te sientes como en tu casa! 
El lugar es espectacular. Lleno del arte de Lucas. Un típico loft bohemio de NY. 
 Lucas está siempre atento a lo que se necesita. Es amable y dispuesto a ayudar en lo que se requiere.
¡100 % recomendado!

OK!!!! If you’re looking for the coolest spot with the best host in NYC literally look no further. Lucas in unbelievably accommodating and incredibly welcoming. I left feeling like family. He’s the coolest. 
The apartment is way cool too, from the original art, all the way down to the sheets (which smelled so nice and were super soft btw). There were plenty of towels and Lucas has everything you could need on your trip! :D
great location, also with some pubs nearby. and you can have glimpse on the east river from the working room.

Sin considerar la excelente ubicación del lugar (ubicado a unos pasos de Wall St., del embarcadero hacia Staten Island, a unas calles del WTC, etc.), la estancia en el loft de Lucas, es sensacional. Él, es un anfitrión excepcional. Siempre pendiente de sus huéspedes. Muy amable y considerado. Te hará sentir bienvenido desde el primer momento. (Incluso, contra sus mismas políticas, que son bastante flexibles, tuvo la amabilidad de reembolsarnos una noche que perdimos por un problema en el aeropuerto).
El espacio es, en realidad, una galería de arte, creada por él mismo, así que te sientes como en película. 
Si tienes la fortuna de encontrar disponible el espacio, no dudes en reservarlo. ¡No te arrepentirás!
Luke was amazing and so accommodating! Great space, great host!!

Lucas was really nice and friendly. We loved his flat and we will definitgely will stay there again. He answered our doubts really fast and his flat was amazing. He left everything written and he was almost never at home, so you feel that the flat is just for you. It has an amazing location.

I had a wonderful stay with Lucas while I was in town to run the New York City marathon, and I would highly recommend his place to anyone running or visiting the city (a quick walk from the ferry!). His apartment is beautiful, I loved being surrounded by his artwork, plus our bedroom was spacious and comfortable. He was a generous and welcoming host!
Lovely tranquil space despite being in downtown Manhattan.  He’s a considerate host, easy to share his home with him without feeling that you’re imposing.

Lucas’s apartment was awesome for the authentic, NYC local experience. It was a cool spot, well lived in but really quiet and comfy for a good nights sleep. We found everything well kitted out for our needs as a couple. 
There’s not a whole lot to do in the immediate vicinity but we were out and about most of the time.

The host though...wow!!! This guys is one of the friendliest people I have ever had the pleasure of meeting and his willingness to help, share stories and chatter with a big smile on his face made our trip!!

Hi, Everyone!!! I do recommend Lukas' Appartment. Eveything is as the pictures show!!! The neibourhood is quite calm during the nights, so resting is great after a long day walking and sightseeing!!! And it's greatly connected with everythig. There are 3 subways lines in the nearby so you'll be able to go wherever you want in minutes. Lukas is a great Host; we lived with him for 20 days and He always was very friendly and there for us for whatever we asked or needed.
The location couldn't of been better, central to everything and only a quick subway to the city centre.

I loved staying at Lucas' place he is a very thoughtful guy and a fantastic artist. I fell in love with his home and his art. he is very friendly and I felt like I was just staying with a friend. overall l really enjoyed my stay, it was like a home away from home!

Lucas was a fantastic host. His space was spacious, welcoming, warm, and so close to everything! You’re right next to a poke place and other restaurants and food/drink options, as well as transportation. Although the apartment is on a busy street, it’s quiet. Lucas is also super nice and accommodating. He was flexible with my check in and very communicative. I’d definitely stay again and highly recommend his space!!

Lucas’s home is wonderful. The location is fantastic, convenient, & so stylish. It’s spotless- absolutely spotless- I went home and had to dust out of guilt. The neighborhood is quiet at night, right off the water, and the building has a cluster of great restaurants below-all centered around an adorable square. The very best thing about the place is Lucas himself- he’s got wonderful energy, is fabulously creative, and makes you feel completely at ease. Lucas’s home will be my first choice next time I am in NY- it should be yours too.

name: Newly Renovated Flat, McKibbin Loft
summary: Largest of three rooms available for rent throughout the month of March. Located in the famous McKibbin lofts the block of flats and surrounding area is buzzing with energy and creative individuals, the perfect location for your New York experience
space: This newly renovated flat has played a huge part in my personal experience of New York. The entire block is full of friendly and creative individuals, and the flat itself is occupied by some very close friends. It consists of a large living area with a kitchen space, and three bedrooms. Being on the third floor and having very high ceilings makes the rooms and flat generally soundproof. I am yet to experience and evening or night where any noise from surrounding flat's have been an issue.  The bathroom has a large shower and bath, again newly renovated with the apartment, in impeccable condition.  My room is the largest of the three, consisting of a raised queen sized bed, desk space, office chair and storage space. Even with all of this present theres is still, so much room for activities. Once again the high ceilings really open the space out with a ceiling fan for that light breeze on ya face while you sleep, bliss.
description: Largest of three rooms available for rent throughout the month of March. Located in the famous McKibbin lofts the block of flats and surrounding area is buzzing with energy and creative individuals, the perfect location for your New York experience This newly renovated flat has played a huge part in my personal experience of New York. The entire block is full of friendly and creative individuals, and the flat itself is occupied by some very close friends. It consists of a large living area with a kitchen space, and three bedrooms. Being on the third floor and having very high ceilings makes the rooms and flat generally soundproof. I am yet to experience and evening or night where any noise from surrounding flat's have been an issue.  The bathroom has a large shower and bath, again newly renovated with the apartment, in impeccable condition.  My room is the largest of the three, consisting of a raised queen sized bed, desk space, office chair and storage space. Even with all of this pre
neighborhood_overview: Bushwick is an area rich in culture for a genuine experience of Brooklyn and New York. You have all your general needs in walking distance from restaurants, supermarkets, bars and the L train.
access: Guests will have access to everything. The flat as it is partnered with the amazing occupants will have you entering as if it's your own home. There will be enough space in the fridge for your own supplies, and all the cooking utensils are there for you to use, the same applies to the wide range of spices, carefully selected over months of exquisite cooking.
interaction: The current (Hidden by Airbnb) are there for you to interact with as much or as little as you like. The room offers enough space for you to keep to yourself, and the living area allows you to chill or socialize as you wish.
house_rules: You are expected to act like the King or Queen you are.

host.host_location: Kingston upon Thames, England, United Kingdom
host.host_about: 21 year old Graphic Designer and Photographer studying in London, originally from Ireland. Looking to spend my summer in New York with some relaxed and easy going people. Hoping to get a part time job, along with some internships/ placements at studios to keep me occupied during the day.

host.host_about:
Aloha! 

My wife and I were born and raised in California, fell in love with the aloha spirit of the islands and moved to Hawaii to raise our two precious children. We are so happy to open our vacation home to visitors and share our little slice of paradise!
) I will always try to meet your expectation and even go beyond the expectation of your stay. If you have suggestions for me, please let me know! 
Some great features I have are due to the inspirations of other guests that stayed with me and had interesting ideas. So please don't hesitate to let me know your thoughts. Feel free to communicate with me! 
Aloha - Hope to see you soon, Glen

reviews.comments: Beautiful home with great views of Waikiki. Home itself was well furnished and had all amenities for a family including surfing and snorkelling. Kitchen well equipped. Great internet and wifi. Was only 10 min from Waikiki and outdoor spa and barbecue great. We also used the minivan that Glen arranged and was perfect for our family. Glen was do easy to communicate with and prompt with any queries. Highly recommend for a family. Will definitely try to stay here on our next trip.

Glen is really nice and helpful, he offered us extended stay (because our flight is at night, so he let us stay later than the check-out time) at no charge. The house is very children friendly, I would recommend it for families with kids :)

This house has a great location which is only 15 mins drive to Waikiki Beach and downtown. The area is a residential community which is quite and beautiful. The house has a hot tub which is good for kids. Kitchen is full of cooking ware and seasoning which is convenient for all kind of cooking.
Amazing views, and close to the city... The House was everything that we needed for our family trip. Cheers ~

A beautiful house with an astonishing view over Honolulu. We were a group of 8 and everything was perfect.
Thank you for all, we will definitely come back again!

We were two families, a total of nine, had a great time. Location is great and the view was spectacular. Very clean and Glen was quick to respond to any questions. Rented out the Honda minivan from him as well, great deal. The Bar-B-Que was clean and the kids enjoyed the jacuzzi. Would love to stay there again.

Great home in Oahu with a spectacular view. A group of 6 of us stayed here for a work assignment and it was a lot better than staying in a hotel. Would definitely stay here again. Glen was very responsive to any question we had.

We rented 2 of Glen's homes. Staying at Glen's places was better than staying at a 5 star hotel! Glen is a rare human being. He is genuinely kind, attentive and thoughtful. He provided everything we needed and then some. The houses had beautiful views and they  were close to many activities. Glen made our stay memorable. The spirit of aloha is definitely present in the homes that Glen rents.

Big space, plenty of bedrooms and bathrooms. Location is not in the main stream light of downtown Waikiki, but close enough that All locations are within a short drive away. Just becareful of the hills but hey what do you expect to get such a great view to both end your night and start your day. Definitely recommend getting the rental van that is an option with the rental, totally worth it.

Beautiful home with a breathtaking view and outstanding amenities - lTV in every bedroom and in the living room, air conditioning, large deck with ample seating, hot tub, cold water dispenser, Keurig coffee maker, bakeware, beautiful bedding, luxurious bath towels; large toaster oven, rice cooker, lots of kitchen utensils, well-stocked pantry, air freshener, first aid kit--well supplied in so many ways. A lovely welcome basket was ready to greet us when we arrived, and chocolates in a small dish next to our beds.  

It was a perfect home for entertaining, and a very beautiful and comfortable place where we were able to bring our friends and family together during what was a very trying time for us. 

Glen was very flexible and accommodating in every way and responded to all our requests.

Be aware, as another previous guest mentioned, that you definitely need to be able to climb a flight of stairs and be ready to carry your luggage up the same stairs.
Glen was very communicative and accommodating, and the home was perfect!

Please read carefully our house rules before booking in order to avoid potential problems and miscommunication before and during your stay

Please read carefully our house rules before booking in order to avoid potential problems and miscommunication before and during your stay The Rambla Catalunya runs parallel to the chic Passeig de Gràcia and the busy Carrer Balmes. It has always been a street crammed with shops, art galleries, theatres and cinemas, some of which have disappeared or been transformed with the passing of the years. neighborhood_overview: The Rambla Catalunya runs parallel to the chic Passeig de Gràcia and the busy Carrer Balmes. One either side of the boulevard, there are buildings with a plethora of modernista details. The Rambla grew up in the middle of the Eixample and was influenced by the elegance of the new Barcelona. It has always been a street crammed with shops, art galleries, theatres and cinemas, some of which have disappeared or been transformed with the passing of the years. In addition to two cinemas and traditional shops, you can find a wide retail offering in the form of leading fashion boutiques, destined to make a shopaholic's dreams come true. Select shops blend with more traditional outlets, tracing a shopping line that follows the layout of the street. Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas are a 5-minute walk from the apartments.
house_rules: *  NON Smoking apartment!! *  Please be aware that noise after 21:00 / parties are strictly forbidden in this building. *  Groups of young people below 25 years are not allowed due to earlier experiences. *  It is not under any circumstance allowed with more people in the apartment than what is stated in the reservation. Violation of the rules will result in immediate evacuation without any refund of remaining nights. *  After 21:00 there is a late arrival fee of 20€, and 50€ after midnight. *  A local touristic tax of 2,48€ per adult and night needs to be paid and is not included in the price. This amount can be either paid via resolution center prior arrival or by cash/card during the check in  (Law 5/2012, of 20 March, on tax, financial and administrative measures and creating the tax on stays in tourism establishments.) *  Also I´m obligated to register all the guests who are staying in the apartment so I will request to provide full names, dates of birth and ID/passport numbers of

host.host_about:
Hi there,

My name is Enrique and I am a Barcelona Local. I have always loved traveling myself, but also sharing the beauty and wonders of Barcelona with others, so a few years ago I started renting out 2 apartments to travelers coming to the city, always meeting everyone in person so I could share my insights and hidden secrets about Barcelona :)

Now I rent out a few more apartments and it is no longer just me, but we are a small team of people managing the apartments together, but with the same focus on personal and attentive services in authentic apartments that allow for the genuine Barcelona feel for your trip! We call our little team Stay U-nique, because of this focus on a unique feeling when staying with us.

If you have any questions, want to hear about an apartment or just say hi, don´t hesitate to reach out :)

Have a great day!
Enrique

reviews.comments:
Una increible estadia en el departamento de Enrique en Barcelona! Nos recibió super bien y estuvo super pendiente de nuestras consultas y pedidos. 
La ubicación es buenísima y el departamento muy muy bueno!!!
Excellent appartment, in a very central neighbourhood.  Nice little atentions: bottle of white wine in the fridge, coffee, bottle of water...

My family of three just spent a delightful two weeks in Enrique's "Casa Batlló" apartment, and we could not have been more pleased with the experience. The apartment was exactly as pictured, with one exception: the view of the back of Gaudi's amazing Casa Batlló from all the windows was even BETTER than the pictures! We loved looking out onto this stunning building every day, and on several evenings, opened the windows wide to enjoy the concerts that were occasionally held on its roof. 

The location was fantastic, right in the center of the Eixample, and within walking distance of a large majority of the major sights in the city. It was on one of the loveliest streets in the neighborhood, not too busy, not too noisy, but lively, and with everything a traveler could possibly want within one or two blocks: great restaurants, shops, a grocery store, metro stop, taxi stand, and a wonderful bakery/ice cream shop (very important!) literally next door. 

The apartment itself was simple, clean, well-stocked; it had everything we needed, and everything worked. (We especially appreciated the great air conditioning, as Barcelona was having a heat wave when we were there.) 

While we didn't meet Enrique personally, he was incredibly responsive and easy to work with. In particular, we appreciated how he allowed us to check in quite early on the day we arrived. We had flown through the night from the U.S. and arrived bleary eyed in Barcelona on a Saturday morning. We were able to come straight from the airport, and were met at the apartment by Enrique's colleagues, who had a breakfast of croissants and juice waiting for us! This was so thoughtful, as we had barely eaten on the plane. 

In short, this apartment was a perfect home base for us as we explored and got to know the wonderful city of Barcelona. We highly recommend it!

Excelente piso, súper ubicado, cerca de lineas de metro, a 10 minutos  caminando de Plaza Catalunya.
Muy limpio, remodelado.
El servicio de Enrique fué excelente.
Regresaríamos felices

Very good apartment, clean and Enrique responded promptly always. The location is very good and the apartment is confortable with the basic items needed. He was kind enough to give us a bottle of wine as reception.

La localización de este alojamiento es inmejorable lo que para nosotros constituyó la mayor ventaja. Extrema puntualidad de los colaboradores de Enrique a la hora de entregar y recoger las llaves y que nosotros apreciamos también. Sábanas y toallas impolutas. Un bonito detalle: nos esperaba una botella de cava de bienvenida. Ciertamente, recomendaría elegir este apartamento.

Excelente!!! En todo sentido!! Realmente el departamento es muy lindo, con todas las comodidades y por sobre todo una ubicación inmejorable. La comunicación con Enrique fue muy buena, siempre estuvo a disposición para ayudarnos en lo que solicitamos como late check in y check out. La persona que nos recibio estuvo en hora esperando por nosotros, y a la llegada tuvimos unas bebidas y snacks de bienvenida. Habia cuna, plancha, tabla, secador de pelo, crema de enjuague, shampoo, jabon, caja de seguridad, amolios placares, muchas toallas y sabanas. Muy cómodas las camas! La zona es super segura, llena de lugares ricos para almorzar y cenar y a pie de la mayoría de las atracciones turísticas, shops y a pie de plaza catalunya con conexión a metro, aerobus y colectivos. Realmente me volveré a alojar en este departamento y recomiendo hacerlo!! Su vista interna (a la parte trasera de casa batlo) y mucha luz entraba todos los dias, al igual que su patiecito que si bien es el pulmón del edificio, es lindo para disfrutar en primavera-verano una cervecita al aire libre. Dos lugares de tapas muy buenos a pie cerveria catalana y la flauta!

We stayed almost a full week in the nice apartment of Enrique. The description and photos represent reality well. The location is perfect; very central but still calm and in a safe and pleasant neighborhood. Rooms were sufficient for our family of 2 adults and 3 teenagers. Apartment was clean, and we were welcomed by a friendly lady explaining all we needed to know. Also a nice Cava and some local ham and cheese were waiting for us upon arrival. All in all a place we really can recommend!
Great location! The apartment is overall clean and as it descibed in the picture. Communication is not as easy as it is run by a company and company phone. Viewing batilo is a great plus!

We spent wonderful days in Barcelona and Enrique's flat had its share.
We found it as described and shown in the fotos. The communication with Enrique before the arrival was very prompt and helpful. When we arrived, there was a young man waiting for us who welcomed us and introduced us to the apartment. 
What we want to point out is that we found the beds/ matrasses to be excellent. We slept very well in them. 
Everything else as the excellent location and the spectacular views on the back side of the famous houses has been described by others as well. 
We will recommend the place to friends.

Enrique's apartment was a very good choice. It is located in the center of Barcelona with an amazing view of Casa Batlló, close to many restaurants, bars and the biggest shopping mile Passeig de Gracia. The apartment was comfortable and nice and has everything you need.
Special thanks to Enrique for my birthday present. He was very nice and attentive and made me happy. :)
Me and my friends would always stay at Enrique's, should we ever come back to beautiful Barcelona.

Excelente apartamento!!! Localização perfeita, proximo a tudo e ao mesmo tempo tranquilo!!! Muito bem montado, com camas confortáveis e toda mobilia, conforme as fotos!!
 Recomendo

Nous sommes venus pour 3 nuits avec 3 enfants de 6 à 13 ans.
Le logement est idéalement situé à 200m à peine de la station de métro Passei de Gracia qui dessert 3 ou 4 lignes qui vont vers la Sagrada Familia, les Ramblas, la plage...) Super séjour, avec un panier d'accueil très bien rempli (saucissons, chips, vin, biscuits apéritifs, nécessaire sel poivre etc...), qui nous a ravis surtout que nous sommes arrivés un dimanche. Un supermarché Carrefour Market est à 200m également. L'appartement est bien conçu avec de nombreux rangements et équipements, et avec vue sur la Casa Battlo. Calme, moderne, je le conseille vivement.

Stayed here for Mobile World Congress. Great apartment, wonderfully central and excellent check in process. Noise could be a problem, thin walls and ceilings, could hear neighbours conversations, but other than that a great place to stay.

El departamento tiene  muy buena ubicacion, que permite moverse a pie perfectamente y con paradas de metro muy cerca.  el primer dia tuvimos inconveniente con la calefaccion, mandamos mns de texto y nadie respondio. para coordinar el check in, escribimos a enrique mediante air b&b, y tampoco respondio. 
al dia siguiente llamamos al telefono de contacto y nos atendio una persona del staff de enrique.
el apartamento es alquilao por una empresa llamada "unique stay", perteneciente a enrique.
lo mejor: ubicacion y restaurantes de la zona.

Ho trovato l' appartamento come descritto; pulito, confortevole e anche se è in pieno centro (dalle finestre si può vedere la gente che passeggia sul tetto di Casa Batllò) è molto tranquillo 
Bastano 20 minuti a piedi e si possono raggiungere le principali attrattive di Barcellona.
Abbiamo potuto fare il check-in alle ore 12 e la ragazza che ci ha accolto è stata molto gentile offrendoci un bel cesto di benvenuto.
Da tornarci.
Consigliatissimo!!!!

Appartamento ben equipaggiato, spazioso e molto luminoso. Vista bellissima sul retro di casa Batlló, io e le mie quattro amiche siamo state benissimo!
La posizione è ottima, pochi minuti a piedi dalla fermata della metropolitana.
Non abbiamo conosciuto Enrique personalmente, ma siamo state accolte e seguite per ogni nostra esigenza dai suoi collaboratori.
Consigliato!

Logement très bien situé, agréable complet. Nous avons été très bien accueillis et bien conseillé.
Nous y retournerons.

This was a great place for our Barcelona vacation. Near lots of great restaurant, shops, and Las Ramblas. Starbucks is half a block away along with a local cafe that had excellent pastries and sandwiches. Because it's so close to Las Ramblas it is easy to find a taxi. The place was very comfortable and we enjoyed it very much, Enrique gave us a welcome basket that was very thoughtful, thank you.
Espectacular ubicación. Muy buen espacio, y bien equipado.

Do not stay here! Ants in the kitchen, mouse trap in the kitchen. Shower drain didn't work. Rug in the living room with multiple stains and highly dirty. Location is the only thing this place has going for it. 

Also, maintenance men came in during our stay and we had to leave as we had prior engagements. It made us feel very nervous about our luggage and personal documents.

The apartment does not look like in the pictures, the place needs some renovation, in the kitchen there is a strong smell of food and the whole place needs a proper cleaning day. Otherwise the communication with the host was good, location is downtown and supper convenient and although is central there is no noise.

Very well located just behind paseo de gracia. With a lot of tapas restaurant at your doorstep. The hotel for our conference was 10 min walking. The communication was really quick and nice. 
Totally recommended!
Excelente ubicación y el departamento muy cómodo

Enrique's apartment is very close to Plaza Catalunya but on a quiet neighborhood. The place is very comfortable and has all the necessary amenities. It is exactly how it was pictured. Also, Enrique's friend who checked us in was very nice and informed us everything we need to know about the apartment and about the area. The welcome basket Enrique provided was also very much appreciated. Me and my family really enjoyed our stay.
Great location, but have a bit noisy
Just as you see it in the photos. The location is probably the best thing. Would definitely como back.
Very nice place near the Casa Batllo -  you can hear the lovely music coming from their roof top!

Location was perfect! Close to shops/food/cafes!  Great view the back of Casa Batló!  Stayed with 4 adults and 2 children.  We originally booked for 5 days; but as our plans changed and the unit was still available, we extended our stay to 8 days total.  Enrique and his staff did a good job with check in/out and communications.    Nice to have a working elevator and air conditioning!    Only provided enough toilet paper for a few days and we were expected to purchase our own.  Laundry machine works, but unfortunately locks itself for 4-6 hours before being released.   We definitely loved the location and really got to know Barcelona!

La ubicacion de este departamento e (Website hidden by Airbnb) es excelente, bien comunicado, en una zona comercial y gastronomica por excelencia.  Es un barrio muy seguro, ademas cuenta con personal de vigilancia diurna. Sus estancias son luminosas menos la suite ppal, que ademas tiene un baño pequeño dificil de usar, el otro baño es muy cómodo pero no bien ubicado. De todas maneras el depto es muy limpio, confortable y amplio. Se nota que el uso del mismo es intensivo, por eso habría que hacerle algunos retoques para que esté impecable. Tiene caja fuerte, ventilador, Aire acondicionado,  microondas. Nos recibieron amablemente con una canasta de bienvenida llena de comida y bebidas, es un gesto importante para recibir a un viajero. Muchas Gracias.

The  best part of the place is its location, indeed a superb central location.  The building is also quite nice with elevator.  The unit's size is decent but the ensuite bathroom is small, with a standing shower that is almost too small to fit a person and a not so functioning shower door.  There is also a bit of plumbing related smell in the toilet.  
Another problem for us is that the second bedroom doesn't have AC.  Overall the unit is quite ordinary, nothing special.  It still works for a quick stay if you are aware of these small issues and can live with them, because the location is indeed superb.  But in the middle of summer it was still quite expensive compared to the value.  
Check in check out was ok, communication was smooth.  It's run by a professional team
El departamento está ubicado en el mejor lugar de Barcelona, es muy cómodo y confortable. Perfecto para visitar Barcelona. Enrique fue atento a todos nuestros pedidos.

The apartment is in the best possible location for a person wanting to explore the city of Barcelona. There are infinite cafes and restaurants right outside, the best shops, and the view of Casa Batlló is such a special treat. The apartment itself is very comfortable and clean - we slept great - and had everything we needed. My only comment would be that the walls could use a fresh coat of paint, maybe some rugs and artwork on the walls to make it more homey. Also, the hallways of the building are pretty shabby and in need of refurbishing. But those minor things didn't really matter to us - we enjoyed ourselves immensely and will certainly be back!
Nos encanto la estadía hermoso
Great location and very nice and spacious apartment.
Apartamento muito bem localizado e confortável. O anfitrião foi muito amável, inclusive nos recebeu com uma cesta de Natal. Eu recomendo!
Great location! Right on the Rambla De Catalunya in the neighborhood of Eixample.  Close proximity to great restaurants, Gaudi's Casa Batllo and Casa Mila and the subway.
Buena ubicación y condiciones generales

Localização excelente para viagens a turismo ou trabalho. Perto da região central da cidade, onde há diversidade de lojas, mercados e restaurantes. 

O apartamento é simples, mas bem cuidado. Todo processo de reserva e check-in foi simples. O Enrique estava disponível para ajudar em todos os momentos que precisei contactá-lo.
The place was just what we needed, the team was helpful and thoughtful. Thanks!

The place was perfect for my family's visit to Barcelona. Having lived in Barcelona myself, I can attest to how great the location is. Enrique's team was very helpful and accommodating of an early check in.
The apartment was in a great location and checking in was so easy. Enrique is very organised and quick to respond.

Great location for everything.  Centre of town just north of The Ramblas. The Ramblas is a short stroll away (5 mins),in a straight line,  with the apartment still on the main street but away from the hustle and bustle.  The lounge and bedroom 1 overlooks the back of Gaudi's House of Bones which is beautiful.  Easy check in.  Lovely lady assisted with bus tickets, left a wonderful welcome basket and very helpful and knowledgeable. The apartment felt very safe and secure.  Would definitely stay there again when I return.  Enrique was extremely helpful during booking and always responded to queries.

Das Appartement ist sehr zentral und ideal für 4-6 Personen.
Die Küche ist mit allem ausgestattet was man so braucht. Zudem gibt's noch eine kleine "Terrasse" hinter der Küche.
Der Ausblick fällt direkt auf die Rückseite des  Casa Battlo.
Vor der Haustür sind mehrere Geschäfte und auch Restaurants.
Es ist vieles zu Fuß erreichbar. Auch die Metro ist nur 5-10 Gehminuten entfernt.
Die Kommunikation hat bestens funktioniert. Das Team war sehr aufmerksam und hat immer sofort geantwortet. 
Jederzeit wieder! :-)

Brilliant place to stay central to everywhere!
Great communication throughout which put me at ease with the whole process.
Loved the personal touch of the welcome nibbles and drinks.
 Being able to drop the bags prior to check in was also a massive help.

Great Place! Terrific Location!!
We loved the appartement: Great view on Casa Battlo, Few minutes away from place Catalunya and La Rambla..
Nicest host and comfortable appartement. We had the best weekend in Barcelona!
Thanks for your hospitality

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, perto de tudo e do metrô. O banheiro da suíte é muito pequeno. O apartamento é simples mas atende muito bem. Fomos muito bem recebidos e Enrique teve uma excelente comunicação conosco.
I loved the location.. super

Beautiful apartment, amazing location. We had a great time as the location is central and there was so much to do/see/enjoy right outside our front steps. Enrique is a great host, left us a thoughtful welcome package and his response time to any emails we sent was extremely fast.

The AC in the master suite and kitchen/family room worked great, and it was cool enough in the 2nd bedroom by just leaving the door open (there is no dedicated wall unit in the second room). 

The location is amazing, restaurants and shopping literally outside your front door. The washing machine wasn’t working but we were able to make due. 

All in all, we really enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back soon!

The apartments is located in a privileged zone, a nice view to the back of batlo, and in the heart of the rambla Catalunya.  The apartment has everything that we need, comfortable beds, good amenities, a washer, tv and wifi and a very nice air conditioner.  Enrique and his team were very communicative and make us feel like we were at home.
Good location for the price you are paying

5 stars - wonderful hosts (great communication before and during stay, pleasant & helpful staff, fast & easy checkin & checkout process), great apartment (2 full sized bedrooms & bathrooms, accurate description in listing, WiFi works well), awesome location (living room faces acourtyard area that looks onto the rear of Casa Batllo, perfect location in Eixample - many great restaurants, cafes and shops all within walking distance)

Easy check-in process and great location. The apartment was a good size for our group of 4. The walls are very thin (we were able to clearly hear conversations from neighbors!) but it did not bother us too much as we were out of the apartment most of the day.

Easy communication, with quick responses. Check-in was flexible.
Walls are thin, hence if you are a light sleeper, please bring ear plugs as we can easily hear neighbours talking. Location is TOP.
great location great place

Vous pouvez choisir Stay U-Nique en toute confiance. Nous n avons pas été trompé par les photos. L appartement est super, bien situé, très propre avec toutes les commodites,...
L accueil à été charmant et très professionnel.
 Nous sommes ravis d avoir fait ce choix
Fuimos 4 amigos y hemos tenido un fin de semana estupendo. Muy buena ubicación, cerca de todo y en una zona inmejorable. El equipo es rápido y amable. Recomendable 100%
El pis està molt i molt bé. És espaiós, molt net, i la localització immillorable. Nosaltres hi vam tenir tot el que necessitàvem :)

The flat is in a great location, about 6 minutes walk from Plaça de Catalunya. It is quiet, with a good view from the sitting room and one bedroom. The other bedroom looks into a lift shaft, but who needs a view when all you do is sleep in it!  Beds were comfy, the showers were hot, with a good water flow, and the seating area comfortable. Snacks, water and wine were all left by the hosts, who provide a personal, cheery welcome. The kitchen has everything you need if you wish to cook, but with so many great restaurants nearby we ate all meals out.
위치도너무좋고 깨끗합니다 호스트와의 연락도 빨리이루어지고 너무 좋습니다
위치가 매우 좋습니다. 집 앞 거리에 맛집이라고 소문난 식당들이 늘어서있고 카사바트요가 바로 반대편에 위치해있어요. 조금만 걸어가면 카탈루냐 광장이랑 람블라스 거리로 갈 수 있습니다. 따뜻한 물 잘 나오고 그냥저냥 괜찮은 숙소였네요.
Apartamento confortable. Bien equipado. Excelente ubicación. Muy buena gestión.

Todo perfecto.
El.departamento, la ubicación,  la comunicación,  todo

name: 1 bedroom apartment in DUMBO!
summary: Waterfront living and breathtaking views outside are yours with this 1 bedroom loft style unit with huge closets! Modern Tiled Bathroom, High Ceilings, Complete this 1 bedroom apartment.
description: Waterfront living and breathtaking views outside are yours with this 1 bedroom loft style unit with huge closets! Modern Tiled Bathroom, High Ceilings, Complete this 1 bedroom apartment. This is the most famous block in the 5 boroughs of NYC Close to the A, C, 2, 3 trains and 10 minutes to Manhattan. Minutes to Brooklyn Bridge Park, Brooklyn Bridge and the surrounding waterfront with the most extraordinary views of the Sunsets, Brooklyn Bridge and Manhattan Bridge. Walking distance to Brooklyn Bridge to connect to Manhattan Bridge by foot! Treat yourself to a romantic dinner at the famous River Cafe while enjoying the ocean view!
neighborhood_overview: This is the most famous block in the 5 boroughs of NYC
transit: Close to the A, C, 2, 3 trains and 10 minutes to Manhattan. Minutes to Brooklyn Bridge Park, Brooklyn Bridge and the surrounding waterfront with the most extraordinary views of the Sunsets, Brooklyn Bridge and Manhattan Bridge. Walking distance to Brooklyn Bridge to connect to Manhattan Bridge by foot! Treat yourself to a romantic dinner at the famous River Cafe while enjoying the ocean view!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Great location and very responsive host. Highly recommended!

Michael was great with communication and quick to respond. It was so easy and convenient to "check in" and "check out."  The place is in a great location. The place was neat and was everything the listing said. It was a good experience.

Michael was a great host.  He responded right away to my texts and emails.  The check in was easy, I met Andrew the super and he provided everything I needed. The listing itself is a classic new York walkup, and is as Michael described on the most famous street in Brooklyn.  Right outside you can find three very famous restaurants including Grimaldi's and the Shake Shack.  And you are steps away from the Brooklyn Bridge Park with spectacular views of the Manhattan skyline.  This location is about as centrally located as it gets.  I would recommend this listing to anyone who wants to be in the middle of the action!

- Keys were very easy to get and drop off
- Huge comfortable bed and solid kitchen/living room
- Hip and convenient area
Nice place and decent person, but was a little hard to get a hold of

Michael was brilliant, always very responsive and the caretaker Andrew is friendly and helpful. The location is amazing, close to the A train and an easy walk over the Brooklyn Bridge to Manhattan.

The apartment is as described, shower is good and the bed is very comfortable. This is great base for someone looking to get out and about exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan.
Michaels place was great, DUMBO is a beautiful area. He made check in and check out very easy!

Appartement très bien situé spacieux proche du pont de Brooklyn et pas loin en métro de Manhattan. Resto a proximité. Michael très serviable et disponible nous avons eu les clés des notre arrivée par le gardien Andrew qui nous a attendu aimablement à l'arrivée et au départ et nous a même aide avec la valise. A réserver les yeux fermés
Everything went as planned. Easy to check in and out.

Michael's place is nice and comfortable. Check-in and check-out was really flexible. Michael was awesome and responded to my questions really fast via messaging. The building caretaker was great and offered help if we ever needed it during our stay. The neighborhood has a cool friendly vibe, next to a great park, and good restaurants. The subway was close, which was a plus since we made trips to Manhattan often.  I loved my stay in Brooklyn. I recommend this place!

Michael and the building caretaker Andrew were pleasant and professional.  The apartment is located in a beautiful part of Brooklyn right under the bridge.  My only complaints are that the apartment smelled a little like mothballs and the bathroom was somewhat dirty.  The caretaker Andrew was quick to respond to all communications.  I enjoyed my stay overall.
Listing description and neighborhood description were accurate.  Wifi worked great. Great location!

Appartement très bien situé. Quel plaisir le soir d'admirer la "Skyline" et de faire juste 100 mètre pour rentrer. L'appartement est très bien situé, Brooklynn le soir est tres agreable. L'appartement n'est pas bruyant nous avons dormi les fenetres ouverte !

Michael was not home, so the apartment landlord Anthony came to meet me when I arrived and when I checked out. He was extremely punctual and helpful, and even carried my gigantic suitcase up the stairs for me :) The apartment is as described, comfortable for 1-2 people. The location is fantastic, as it is so close to the Brooklyn bridge and right by a park and some great restaurants. Definitely recommend if you are interested in exploring the neighborhoods in Brooklyn and Manhattan.

Great, quiet apartment in a great neighborhood. There is no better possible location in Brooklyn. Right under the Brooklyn Bridge, so close you can hear the sound of the cars going over it. The view of the city right outside the door is amazing. Would stay again.

Don't rent.  Had to wait 25 minutes to get into apartment.  Apartment is tiny, with two windows that face a brick wall less then 2 feet away. Cupboards, bathroom, kitchen, walls... DIRTY.  Wi-fi did not work, as the Network was not available nor recognized.  Michael, who offered the apartment was no help, and was dismissive.  Didn't know password or network name.  Not clear on box.  Found infor packet behind fridge on dirty shelf, and network was not recognized.  The only redeeming parts of the place were sheets and bed. Location was fine.  Would have cancelled after immediately arriving but would have been a hassle.  Would have gladly spent 3x the amount on another place, had I known.  The picture of the place is misleading.  Should be priced at $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) tops+ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

Michael was very easy to contact and he responded very promptly.  For New York standards, this apartment was spacious and was described accurately.  Michael's "guy" met me at the exact time we scheduled and was very nice and helpful.  Would definitely recommend Michael's apartment to an out of town guest.

This apartment was perfect for our needs - great location, easy access to the subway, close to cafes and a couple of great pizza places. It's comfortably furnished with the basic necessities, including A/C (so essential for NY in the summer). Michael was quick to respond and easy to communicate with. His landlord Andrew let us into the apartment and was nice enough to move our check in time forward because we had large backpacks. Overall, a great experience from beginning to end!

Great apt that has a prime location! Easy access to subway, great food and shopping nearby and walking distance to the waterfront with an amazing view of the city. For those who are looking for an upscale place to stay in, this may not fit your bill. But for anyone who wants a piece of the city and right in DUMBO, best location! And HUGE space for a NYC apt. My friend and I had ample room and we were SO grateful for how flexible Michael and his landlord Andrew were for both check in and check out. We even got to check out a little later than originally planned which was convenient for us having a Very late flight. I will look up this location again in the future for any NYC trips!
The area was nice and the apartment was fine. I booked the day before and the response was fast.
Very clean apartment located very conveniently.

Located right down the street from a Shake Shack & Brooklyn Bridge park the apartment was in a great location. Huge bed & the A/C was clutch since it was a hot weekend during my stay. Also a huge walk-in closet incase you have a lot of stuff.

Great location. But there was water leaks and there were flies when we were there. Turns out the rubbish from the precious tenant has not been cleared. The toilet is not clean and its door doesnt lock. And the host took quite a while to respond when we want to arrange check in time

This is a fantastic location at the foot of the Brooklyn Bridge. That is the best part.  The bedding & towels etc were clean and the greet n meet passable.  The price was a sting - I think it was too expensive for a one star joint [bedroom with no window, tiny pokey bathroom etc] but I guess that's the price you pay in the peak summer holiday period. However, be aware if you stay here that the building does not appear to comply with any modern fire safety regulations, there are no fire escape stairs, you can't jump out the window because there is only a 1ft gap with the  building next door, the stairs are wooden & if the place caught fire you would likely be incinerated.
Unbelievable location!  Two minutes walk time to a lovely park under the Brooklyn Bridge.

The location was ideal since it was close to my office and the bridge. However, the apartment could use some TLC.  We ended up staying at a hotel because the sheets were rather dirty and bugs were flying in through a crack where the A/C units are located. 

Michael was quite responsive and kind, but the person he uses to check people in and out could have been a better experience.
Everything was perfect, amazing location!!

I stayed at Michael's with my dad on short notice. Everything worked out fine for being last minute. Michael's place is roomy by Brooklyn standards. People from out of town will like the location for being close to the carousel and riverside parks.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

La casa si trova in una posizione molto comoda, non molto distante dai collegamenti con la metro, e uscendo dal portone si può godere di una vista mozzafiato dello skyline di Manhattan.
L'appartamento, considerato il costo, è adeguato. C'è un letto matrimoniale, e uno di una piazza e mezza.
L'aria condizionata funziona bene ma è un po' rumorosa, il bagno è piccolo ma sufficiente.
Appena arrivati è stata necessaria una rapida pulizia, poichè l'appartamento era un po' impolverato e il bagno non pulitissimo.
Il proprietario è molto gentile.
Nel complesso, considerato anche il costo, è stata una scelta soddisfacente.

The place was clean and roomy.  The air conditioning worked well and the bed was comfy.  Andrew, the caretaker was helpful.  The neighborhood is fun.  It was about a nine block walk to get the metro into Manhattan.

Cockroaches! Rundown!
I would never ever book this apartment again. Except of location and quick respond of Michael there is nothing positive. The apartment has two windows with view of brick walls (so near that you can touch them), so there is no daylight. There are no dishes (only 2 glasses and 2 cups) no kitchen utensils...nothing. Light in bathroom is nearly coming down and a big fat coackroach is waiting there for you. The apartment need to be renovated!
The A/C is so loud that you couldn't sleep. And Wifi did not work (it didn't come up). Michael is available at all times, but saying sth,but does (Website hidden by Airbnb) it is a piece of impudence to require so much money for this sh...apartment. Bed sheets are dirty. We paid over $500 for 4 nights...unbelievable!
Don't book it!

The apartment could use a renovation, it is old and worn. when we arrived the apartment was dirty and smelled, but Michael was easy to get a hold of, and he sent Andrew, the caretaker who clearede the place while we were sightseeing. we wrote a list of the things that was missing and it came the day after. we did not meet Michael, but Andrew was very helpful. But the apartment has a super good location, in a super nice neighborhood and right on the harbor promenade and pier 1-6 where there is plenty of life. sweeping views of Lower Manhattan and just under the Brooklyn bridge. it takes 5-10 minutes to get to the metro, drive straight to Manhattan. we loved the location and would definitely come again, just the apartment is cleaned. The last 2 days, there was no hot water.

I had a difficult stay here. The apartment was filthy. The bed was not made when I arrived. The rolled up sheets and towels in the closet were not clean.  Internet, TV was not available. Michael has LOTS of excuses and my impression was that he did not tell me the truth when I contacted him (more than once). Ultimately I had to file a complaint with air bnb.

Nuestra estancia en el apartamento fue perfecta! el apartamento es muy acogedor. Dispone de aire acondicionado y calefacción y la cama es muy cómoda. Michael fue muy atento con nosotros y nos envío mensajes para preguntarnos si necesitábamos cualquier cosa. La localización del apartamento no podía ser mejor! Espectaculares vistas al lado del mejor mirador donde poder observar las vistas de Manhattan. Debajo del apartamento hay varios restaurantes muy populares: Grimaldi's, Juliana's... Hay muy buen ambiente en el barrio, varios supermercados cerca y la estación de metro a 2/3 minutos a pie (High St.) a solo una parada de Manhattan.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Michael was easy to contact, quick to respond and did his utmost to assist us with anything. The location is amazing, it was perfect.

Michael was a great host. He was flexible and easy to communicate with. Andrew, the caretaker, was friendly and helpful. 
The place is spacious but not much decoration. The pictures match the place well.
Listing was accurate, and the location was good.  The apartment was basic but comfortable.
Great location. Easy to book , no hassle. I would definitely make a reservation again

The apartment was exactly as we expected when we booked it. The location is great, near the amazings views of Manhattan from Dumbo. Michael made things easy with the check-in and check-out. On the other side, the fridge is a bit noisy.

House was great, Michael was very helpful in getting me checked in, even though I arrived at well past midnight on an early Tuesday morning. The Bed was very comfortable, the sheets were clean, and there was an ample supply of hot water. Finally the location is unbeatable if you are going to be in or around DUMBO.

Le logement est conforme á la description faite sur airbnb.
Une chambre avec une banquette dsns le salon.
Appartement très bien placé.
The apartment is ok with the description to the website. Is nearky to the subway and the brooklyn bridge
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Michael was absolutely FANTASTIC. We ended up coming to the apartment very late around 12pm and Michael was very patient and made sure to keep contact with me to ensure a smooth stay. The apartment was very simple but cool. He provided everything you need for a comfortable stay. The apartment is in a beautiful location with a view of Manhattan and the Brooklyn bridge. Just a couple blocks from the major subways. We couldn't have asked for a better place place to stay. thank you
Posting was accurate and it was truly a great location. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Overall a great experience, would definitely come back!

Great experience in an ideal location. It's down the block from a gorgeous view of the city and steps away from great restaurants. Michael and Andrew were always a text or phone call away if I needed anything. They were also both available promptly for check in as well as checkout. Highly recommend staying here !
great stay. PERFECT location.

Been going to NY for years, but never stayed or visited DUMBO. LOVE IT!!! Such a great area and this listing was right in the heart of the action. The downside is that it is a NYC-style apartment with some shortcomings. But the location and price make this an unbeatable combination. Would stay there again in a heartbeat. We were there on business, and the bed-sized couch was quite comfortable. Plenty of linens, AC worked great, good wifi connection and full cable tv offerings made this a place to hang out in. 100 yards away is the Ferry, so access to manhattan and beyond is a breeze. A subway is located 5 min away (2,3 lines). 
Maybe the best part about DUMBO are the restaurants. Cranberry Street took my heart. The activities on the water are extensive and we ended up taking multiple walks in the evening.

Excellent location, 2 steps from  the brooklyn bridge park with a great view of the city. 5 min from the Brooklyn Bridge and from metro station.
The appartment was nice with A/C even if the bathroom is a little bit small.
Michael was nice and very responsive. 
We enjoyed our stay.

Location- Steps away to amazing food places AND Brooklyn Bridge Park (with beautiful view). One among our group was a runner, and he said it was perfect for his morning runs. Very central to several subway lines into Manhattan. It was also quiet despite being under the bridge.

Apartment was spacious for 3. Clean with all the bathroom amenities and extra towels and sheets. Very accurate to what pictures and description show.

Michael was very responsive and accommodating. We dealt with Andrew the building manager for keys, and he was available anytime by phone.

Awesome location, very convenient to the things I needed to get to over the weekend. small, but comfortable quarters. Was mostly there to sleep which was totally fine. May be better in the fall when the A/C doesn't need to be up so high all the time. Super easy/fast checking in and out.

In my opinion best location to stay in NYC. Gorgeous panoramatic view on south of Manhattan only 1 minute by walk. Must see sunrise and sunshine from this place more than once. Also great location as a starting point for trips to Manhattan. 8 minutes by walk to the nearest subway (just one stop to Manhattan) Apartment was not so important as the location. But it was usable for sleeping. Most time you want to be outside because you want to see new and new things. Apartment is little bit noisy because of Brooklyn bridge. But it is still acceptable. Thanks for great opportunity to stay at this place for 8 nights.
Great location, clean and simple.

Michael and his property manager Andrew were fantastic. Checked in with me multiple times before my arrival and was very flexible with my check in time, which was important since I was driving in and had to pick up a friend from the airport first before rushing to a wedding ceremony. Andrew met me right when I got there, no wait. The place was pretty big, in a great central spot in Dumbo. We didn't spend all that much time actually staying in the apartment, but it was exactly what was described and fit our needs perfectly. There was even a parking garage around the corner for way easier parking than I expected. I'd definitely stay here again!
The location is amazing! Seriously, an amazing view of Manhattan.
Unit was as described.  Worked with Andrew and he was very helpful.  Wifi and TV worked well.  Bed was comfortable.  Bathroom was small but adequate.  Would stay here again.

Apreciei muito a localização, Micael atendeu nossos pedidos prontamente eu e meu filho gostamos muito,  queremos que Michel nos receba no próximo ano, obrigada michel por tudo, grande abraço. Ines e Ruan
Classic NYC apartment. Very nice would definitely recommend.
Great place, great area, and a great time. Would book again

Host did not make us feel welcome or valued as his guests. No information about the neighborhood provided. The space was not clean. No comfortable place to sit. No information on how to use the tv. 

Loved the area
Everything was great. Wish we could have stayed longer. Loved the location, loved the neighborhood. No complaints.
We'Ll located but dirty
Great location and easy parking. Both Michael and Andrew are very helpful. Had a pleasant stay.
On perhaps the most scenic block in Brooklyn, place is spacious, quirky, a worth it.
Great place!  Excellent location!
Michael was an extremely accommodating host. He went completely out of his way to make sure we were taken care of and was super responsive to our inquiries. Would give him 6/5 stars if I could!

Michael communicated well throughout booking and allowed me to check in early. I was doing a photoshoot in the area and only needed the apartment to do hair, makeup and somewhere for my model to change. The bathroom needs completely cleaning out, mould in the shower and the sink brings out orange water but other than that it is in a great location and good price.

Michael is outstanding with communication as a host. We were in NY on transit for a flight to SE Asia. Storm Stella disrupted our travel plan and Michael was truly flexible and understanding with the subsequent changes. When we finally arrived with all our luggages and snowy grounds, Andrew was extremely helpful getting us settled in. The apartment is 2 flights of stairs up, so if you have big, heavy luggage, please be aware. The apartment is also neat, albeit a bit dark due to lack of sunlight/window (there's only one window but it was totally covered by a neighboring wall inches away). Very small and tight bathroom, and the shower stall might need updating, or serious cleaning. There are 2 beds, a Queen (?) in the main bedroom and a twin in the living room. There are sheets and pillow cases but not blankets/comforter/duvet. Also lacking proper shower amenities. Hopefully those issues can be taken care of in the future. Location in DUMBO was extremely convenient. Overall, Michael is an exemplary host.

Very well located. Restaurants in the same block.  Nice walk to the Brooklyn Bridge and Chinatown :)
There are street parking close by under the bridge for free. Watch for the cleaning days only.
Amazing location! The apartment worked perfectly for us. Had a great trip! Can't wait to return.

Michael was very helpful and very quick to reply to all my questions and queries. The location of this flat is AMAZING! We made full use of the close proximity to the Brooklyn Bridge Park and the great restaurants in the Dumbo area. The flat was much bigger than I thought it would be. The bedroom was quite large and the bed was extremely comfortable. The bed in the living area was also a good size, and very comfortable. The small kitchen had everything which we needed. Overall, I would highly recommend this flat.

This apartment was in a great location. Citi Bike rentals right across the street with a beautiful bike path along the water nearby. Everything was really clean and as described. I'd highly recommend Michael's place to anyone wanting to spend time in Brooklyn
Great, really good location. Right next to bridge and food. A place to sleep that's centrally located. Basic furnishings. No view at all. Friendly Bldg manager

The accommodation is perfect ....great location with easy access to transport, restaurants, bars and local attractions. This place is great if you just want a place to wash and sleep.
