It is very dark with no views of anything and the accommodation is very basic. Be fit....2 flights of stairs! The place is in need of DIY but perfect location. It really suited our needs and Michael and the manager Andrew were great (nothing was a problem). If you just need a bed for a few nights this is perfect.
Absolutely perfect. ! Thanks a lot !!
This place is great for visiting New York. This is are second time staying in this place. We like it a lot. Easy walk to Chinatown.
Soso

The flat is simple but comfortable. The location is perfect if you want to enjoy a view of the Manhattan skyline and a walk across Brooklyn Bridge. Although the flat is right below the bridge, the small internal widows make it fairly quiet.

We stayed in this apartment for 5 days and I must say the location and neighborhood is amazing! The check-in process went very smoothly, Andrew was extremely helpful and polite. The apartment itself is small, but has everything you need for a comfortable stay. We would definitely stay here again on a future trip to NYC. Big thanks to Michael, Danny and Andrew for being so accommodating and nice to work with!
The space was great the only down side is the internet wasn't working. It's so convenient staying here, it's close to the Brooklyn bridge and walking distance to a rooftop lounge.
Great location in DUMBO for an apartment (not a private room). Luke's Lobster is right around the corner; don't miss it. Take time to enjoy the Brooklyn Bridge park right down the street.

Michael's place worked perfect for us, since we were there for our daughter's wedding and the venue was within walking distance. It's a great location and very easy to get to (we drove from CT).
There was plenty of cold water in the fridge, which was a pleasant surprise!
Michael was very accommodating and helpful, and although he couldn't be there himself to let us in, he made sure the super was there, who couldn't have been nicer! All in all a good two days!

This is great location to stay while visiting the DUMBO area of Brooklyn.  You step outside the apartment, to a few restaurants and an amazing view of the Brooklyn Bridge.  The bed was comfortable, the A/C worked great and the shower pressure and temperature were perfect.
Cons: This apartment is not lived in, so there is nothing cozy/homey about it... just the basics.  The views are outside of this apartment, you can't see anything from the inside windows.

We stayed at Michael's place for 2 nights. The area is really nice and the subway station is closeby. The apartment is quite dark. The bathroom is small and was a bit dirty.
AC worked very well. 

Would stay there again.

Great place to stay, great location, roomy. 

Only the shower needs cleaning and the smelly curtain needs replacement.

Having said that, would stay here in a heartbeat!
Great location and space! Right next to the Brooklyn bridge which was awesome, lively location. Apartment is as described. Will definitely try to stay again next time we head to the city!
Very well located, and Michael was easy to communicate with and flexible with check-in and check-out times.

Cute little apartment, worked with me on early check in since my flight got in early, amazing 2 min walk out the apartment to the very scenic dock in dumbo right under he Brooklyn bridge. Third floor so get ready for a few stairs but other then that I would stay again!
Great location! This was the perfect to stay while we explored Brooklyn.

The house is at a perfect location at the Brooklyn neighbourhood, near the bridge, the bridge park and nice places to eat. 5 to 10 minutes from the metro (according to each line you want). The apartment is good for a couple plus one person that will sleep in the living room. It wasn't as clean as we expected and we found some cockroaches. Michael guaranteed us that we will take care of it.
Cute place. Easy check in and out. Awesome location. Not fancy but definitely worth the money.

Michael's place in DUMBO is absolutely excellent. It is in a prime location: walking distance from the pier with an amazing view (less than 1 min), the bridge (about 5 to get up on it), the metro (7-10 minutes depending on pace), and the wedding we were attending that weekend. It was spacious, at far as NY goes, and provided the basics of what we needed. Thank you for letting us be New Yorkers for a weekend!
Très bel emplacement, à proximité de 2 lignes de métro, de bons restos et d'un bar terrasse au bord de l'eau (environ 1 minute à pied). Appartement petit mais avec toutes les commodités nécessaires.

I can't say enough about the location of this apt.  Everything there is to do and see in Brooklyn is within walking distance - Grimaldi's, Starbucks, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Brooklyn Bridge, Manhattan Bridge, Piers, Jane's Carousel, DUMBO Flea Market,
About the best possible location in Brooklyn, and way more spacious and clean then expected. Thanks!

We had a wonderful time while staying at Michael's.  Juliana's Pizza which is next door is an absolute must. The other establishments in immediate area are touristy. However there are great places nearby.
Great NYC getaway apartment in an outstanding location!
Great house, superb host and location on point. Absolutely stay again if I were in New York
Michael was very easy to communicate the place was nice and cozy for 2 people. The place was chilly at night but portable heaters were provided. Would definitely book again.

Positives first... Breathtaking location and a fairly big space. Comfortable bed and  building manager Andrew was very helpful at check in. Good communication with host. Big issue is cleanliness. On our second night we returned to a cockroach scurrying between the kitchen floor corner and the stove. The towels were very dirty and we had to ask for new towels. Michael did send someone over with clean towels. I’m concerned that the spot was not cared for properly and is not being adequately cleaned in between rentals. The water in bathroom shower clogs and does not drain well, and there is standing water in the shower as one is showering. Despite the awesome location, cleanliness needs to be addressed.
Good location - minimal amenities (no microwave or coffee maker)
Amazing location and everything as described!!

A perfect location in Brooklyn. The apartment is obviously old and the renovation work is not top notch. Another thing to take into account is that this is not suitable for seniors at it would be too difficult to climb the stairs up two stories carrying bags. And just basic stuff in the apartment. The location is so good that everything else can be overlooked (except seniors having to climb stairs of course).

The location of this place is hard to beat. We were able to access so many areas all over the city and the close proximity to the river was awesome. 

This is truly a bare bones rental though designed for people not spending much time there. 

Michael was very responsive to any and all communication which was much appreciated. We would definitely come back to this spot in the future.

This listing contains several significant inaccuracies regarding the views and the bathroom. It is on the third floor of the building.  I don't know how fast a guest could exit in case of an emergency.
This apartment is in a great location-many things to do and see.....the apartment is nice but it’s basic-which was fine for me bc we always out in about.
Fantastic location in the neighborhood, clean, responsive host, and easy access.

The  location and cleanliness were terrific. It goes downhill from there. There were no breakfast provisions (coffee pot, coffee or anything). There were see-through flimsy curtains which didn't block any light. Although there wasn't much light as both windows were about 1 foot from brick walls. (while not exactly  stating it, the description implied water views.)The building super was supposed to let me in between 1 and 2. He arrived at 1:25.  There was no mention of two flights of steep stairs with rickety bannisters.
All great! Thanks Michael!
Great great location!
Très bon emplacement mais je déplore l'absence de lumière naturelle dans le logement et la propreté.
It’s a great place to stay! Very well located and it’s simple to get in and out, it’s spacey and cozy. It’s got all it needs.

Having been to New York many times I have found that homes here are either perfectly located but too small or have plenty of space but are too far out from the tourist spots. Michael’s place, surprisingly, is perfectly located and also has ample space for 3 people. 

Located in Brooklyn, it is close to 2 subway stops and I could take my parents to most tourist spots in NYC just by a short walk and taking the train. We did the liberty ferry and we got back to the apartment using the water taxi stop in DUMBO (costs $2.75 same as one ride in the metro) and a minute’s walk.

Great view of Manhattan at night nearby and highly recommend the slightly expensive but delicious pizzas 2 doors down from the apartment.

Can’t recommend Michael’s place enough

Overall, we have no issue in our stay in Michael's place. For a tourist like me who want to explorer brooklyn and wants to be near in Manhattan, this is a perfect match. Location, huge space, communication and value for money are excellent.
Perfect place and amazing views
Excellent location great host

Viaggio spesso, anche a New York, e non ho mai visto niente di più squallido e sudicio. Se trovarsi in una buona location, come sotto il ponte di Brooklyn, vuol dire fregarsene di tutto il resto, non sono d’accordo e lo ritengo una grossa mancanza di rispetto per gli ospiti. La casa non ha FINESTRE, ovvero aprendo la finestra, tutta piena di polvere e con una tenda che non viene lavata da anni, a 5 cm c’è’ il muro. Cio’ non ti permette di avere luce naturale durante la giornata; e’ una pessima sensazione!!!! Inoltre il wc, pur avendo fatto attenzione a non buttare carta, si è otturato ben 2 volte. Appena arrivata, avrei immediatamente cambiato appartamento, ma la mia ricerca era specifica in quella zona e purtroppo non ho trovato all’ultimo momento niente di disponibile. Anche io sono un host a Roma e sinceramente mi vergognerei ad affittare una casa del genere, e mi domando come airbnb possa permettere questo.

La localisation est géniale!!! A deux pas de magnifiques points de vues du pont de Brooklyn et du pont de Manhattan. 
Quartier très agréable, metro pas trop loin
Seul bémol, la propreté de l’appartement lors de notre séjour
Great location in the middle of Dumbo.

Very basic no frills —A GREAT VALUE for the LOCATION!!! The day bed worked well for a third guest - PLENTY of suitcase space in the bedroom and closet - lots of blankets sheets and towels - 
It has minimal kitchen supplies and thanks to another review we were alerted to bring our own travel coffee pot but there’s a Starbucks next door!! HUGE PLUS!! Also the famous Grimaldis pizza is next door!  SO WORTH GOING This area of Brooklyn is fantastic - literally under the bridge and a short walk to the subway- if you are going to NY to stay in luxury and spend time in your room relaxing and enjoying scenic views this is not your place- but if you are on a BUDGET -AND want the privacy of an ENTIRE APT  in a GREAT LOCATION with a comfortable bed to crash - this is it-

We enjoyed our time at Michaels place.. it was basic though which was ok as we were out mostly. we had just come from an amazing suite in anothwr city so we had been spoiled previously. Area was lovely with great restaurants and suoer easy to get into Manhattan

It was a great place to stay for a weekend in NYC. Location was in a cute area in Brooklyn and several coffee shops and restaurants around. Communication was good and someone was able to meet us and carry our luggage up and down the stairs.

name: Luxurious Hotel experience
summary: Evo Vieux-Montréal offers all-inclusive, high end housing in Montreal. It is located in Old Montreal near Downtown, steps away from countless cafes, bars, restaurants, shopping malls and universities.
space: Swanky lounges. Modern furniture. A heated pool. A state of the art gym than never closes. At evo Montreal, you'll feel more like you're at a students' paradise than a typical dorm
description: Evo Vieux-Montréal offers all-inclusive, high end housing in Montreal. It is located in Old Montreal near Downtown, steps away from countless cafes, bars, restaurants, shopping malls and universities. Swanky lounges. Modern furniture. A heated pool. A state of the art gym than never closes. At evo Montreal, you'll feel more like you're at a students' paradise than a typical dorm Life at evo is all about community - within, as well as outside of the perimeter of our walls. From our exclusive and neighborhood-wide social events to our unique outreach initiative opportunities that serve the surrounding communities, evo residents quickly develop a sense of responsibility, loyalty and commitment to each other and their neighbors. You know what they say about all work and no play. Take a break from your studies with a friendly game of pool, foosball or video golf, or even a sauna With the accessibility, excitement and beauty of Old Montreal and its direct connection to the underground city,
neighborhood_overview: With the accessibility, excitement and beauty of Old Montreal and its direct connection to the underground city, evo Vieux-Montreal has a certain charm and je ne sais quoi that makes it one of the most desired housing choices in Montreal.
notes: When we say all-inclusive, we mean it. From a heated indoor pool and sauna and 24-hour fitness center to common lounges for cooking and entertaining, and awesome social events, evo Montreal provides premier living in both of our high end residences.
transit: Evo Old Montreal is directly connected to metro Square Victoria meaning that you don't even have to get out(unless you want to to take the metro). Parking is included and free at certain times(big bonus given the fact it's Montreal)  From the Airport, either a cab and he will know. Or a bus will take you to a metro station right next to Evo
access: Life at evo is all about community - within, as well as outside of the perimeter of our walls. From our exclusive and neighborhood-wide social events to our unique outreach initiative opportunities that serve the surrounding communities, evo residents quickly develop a sense of responsibility, loyalty and commitment to each other and their neighbors.
interaction: You know what they say about all work and no play. Take a break from your studies with a friendly game of pool, foosball or video golf, or even a sauna
house_rules: Unfortunately, pets aren't allowed, smocking isn't in the apartments, one can still sit outside on the bench of the entrance, enjoy his "cigarette" while admiring how beautiful the view is  It is a very silent and calm space and we would like to keep that way : )

reviews.comments:
I had three amazing weeks at Jad's. It was an absolutely pleasant experience. His place is super clean, organised and comfortable with all the comfort you can imagine.
Great location, close to the metro and train station. 
He's a generous host with friendly attitude, always ready to help.
Highly recommended! Would love to go back to visit.

L'expérience dans l'appartement de Jad a été tout à fait extraordinaire. Très luxueux complet, localisé au centre-ville près de tout, je le recommande pour ceux qui aiment le milieu urbain dans un appartement hôtel

True to description - perfect "hotel like" experience. Spent a weekend at Jad's with my girlfriend in what is essentially a hotel room suite. The room was well equipped with everything we needed and most importantly it was very clean. We also made use of the heated pool which was great. 

Location wise it's perfect. Connected to the Metro and underground walking path. Also it is easy enough to walk to the Old Port and some of the other points of interest in the city center.

Jad was honestly the BEST host you can ever imagine, he was there at the door with a croissant (like actually). I couldn't have found a better host, suite, or location. The building was 5 minutes from the bus station and within 10 minutes of walking distance from everything! The room is exactly as in the description with some extra fun things Jad has put in the room (we got a lava lamp and a foot massage, haha). It was my first time using Airbnb and honestly, Jad and this location have set the standard. It was perfect.

My boyfriend and I had a great time at Jad's place. The building has all the amenities you could ask for and is in walking distance to everything. Jad was quick to respond to any questions we had and went out of his way to provide us with some of his favorite snacks. Would definitely stay at his place again in the future.

Jad was an awesome host. He met up with me even though my train arrived late and it was really easy to get in touch with him! He had all the necessities at his place in the event that you forgot something.  

The location is fantastic (right beside the via station). The view is great.

This experience was above my expectations. I would definitely recommend him for anyone staying in Montreal.
Jad was a great host and his apartment is fantastic! We loved the foot massager haha. Jad gave us a nice tour when we checked in and was very helpful all around.

Jad's place was amazing! Great view, and so close to everything. We had a blast!
Jad met up with us to give us a quick tour of all that his space has to offer... Which is a lot! He was very helpful and answered all our questions. Would definitely recommend his place. Thanks again, Jad!!! We'll be back! :)

Jad is a fantastic host! He was very welcoming, showed us around the building and a brief tour of Montreal. I do not live far from Montreal so I was already very familiar with the streets. The apartment was SO clean and it had everything we needed. The view was amazing as well, the windows were facing the view of Downtown Montreal and was even better when lit up at night. HIGHLY recommend this place to anyone!! Although, it is a shared kitchen, as it is a residence but that did not bother me at all. Oh, and, the king sized bed was the most comfortable bed I have ever been on.  All in all, I would recommend Jad's place to anyone!

Jad a tout organisé et est un hote trés sympa , nous avons profité de la salle de sport , de la piscine et même pour laver le linge ! Le lit est trés confortable . La situation est excellente pour visiter Montreal .
J ai aime mon séjour très propre avec très vu. Ce un endroit que j vous conseille très sécuritaire. Merci

Jad went above and beyond to make my experience exceptional.

The location of the unit is perfect for walking and exploring Old Montreal.

Jad is first class!

The place was great and the description was very accurate. It was right in the middle of downtown, near trains and shopping areas. And Jad did a great job on checking in with me to see if everything was okay. Thanks Jad!

Jad's room was really lovely and exactly as pictured. It is centrally located. I short walk to the University and to the old city and shopping and great restaurants. The building has excellent services - gym, pool, library/business centre and the staff are most friendly. We very much enjoyed our stay.

Great location
Great apartment 
Clean & tidy
Great view

J ai vraiment beaucoup aimer ma première expérience Airbnb et beaucoup aimer le logement de Jab ses digne d un hôtel 4 étoile  ses bien aménager fonctionnel toute es bien penséles produit de base des plus complet et  proche du centre bell et de toute les commode de la ville. A relouer sans hésitation
Everything went smoothly. Great location, just a few minutes walk from downtown and old Montreal. Such a great weekend. Jad was very communicative and always replied promptly.  Will stay again.
Excellent séjour ! Chambre spacieuse et claire. Tout à disposition dans l'établissement et prestation au top ! Merci Jad !

Notre passage à Luxurious Hôtel Experience, nous fûmes des plus agréables, cet hôtel vous propose de très belles prestations qui vous permettent dès votre arrivée à ce que votre séjour puisse être dès plus appréciable… Jad dispose d’une très belle chambre avec tout le confort que vous pouvez souhaiter avec une vue imprenable sur Montréal ….Merci Jad pour ce séjour bien agréable
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Unfortunately we didn't get to meet the host personally but everything went extremely well. We received two room cards and one laundry card, and have access to all the facilities including the communal kitchen. The room was fantastic and high-class, and the host was very considerate -- we have everything in the room that we can possibly think of! Great location and neighbourhood, close to McGill University and shopping centres. The only con is residents need to beware of potential drunk students in the building and keep your door closed at all times. Overall wonderful experience. Thank you so much Jad!
Bien meuble, confortable, pour être au centre ville ou encore à proximité du vieux Montreal emplacement idéal.
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Spacious Nolita 2 Bd w/roof garden
summary: Our apt. is on the fifth floor of a small, renovated, elevator building on Prince Street in Nolita.  It is warm and colorful and full of original art work. There are great restaurants nearby but not on our block so that it is quiet at night.
space: Two bedrooms, one with Queen size bed, the other with a full size.   Although we have two beds, we can only accept two people, so as not to disturb our neighbors.  Recently renovated kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, etc.  Renovated, porcelain tiled bathroom.  Internet, WiFi, cable TV. Our roof garden is large and has great views over the city. Use it for breakfast,lunch or dinner or just a drink.    We have been here for 25 years and have seen Nolita grow!  We are near beautiful Old St. Patrick's Cathedral and many subway lines making it  easy to get anywhere in the city (east or west). A Whole Foods supermarket is about three blocks away and a smaller, convenience market is right on Prince Street. There are many cafes and restaurants right in the neighborhood.   *Air conditioning *Fresh linens and towels *Fully equipped kitchen *American, French Press and Italian coffee makers *Free Wifi *Cable TV *Close to all subway stations Also: Hair Dryer Iron and Ironing Board Free local tele
description: Our apt. is on the fifth floor of a small, renovated, elevator building on Prince Street in Nolita.  It is warm and colorful and full of original art work. There are great restaurants nearby but not on our block so that it is quiet at night. Two bedrooms, one with Queen size bed, the other with a full size.   Although we have two beds, we can only accept two people, so as not to disturb our neighbors.  Recently renovated kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, etc.  Renovated, porcelain tiled bathroom.  Internet, WiFi, cable TV. Our roof garden is large and has great views over the city. Use it for breakfast,lunch or dinner or just a drink.    We have been here for 25 years and have seen Nolita grow!  We are near beautiful Old St. Patrick's Cathedral and many subway lines making it  easy to get anywhere in the city (east or west). A Whole Foods supermarket is about three blocks away and a smaller, convenience market is right on Prince Street. There are many cafes and restaurants right in t
notes: Also:  Please make sure you have posted your photo, bio and verifications before inquiring. It is important to us to know who will be staying at our apartment!
interaction: We are always there to meet and greet our guests, so no problems about getting the keys.  If you need help, we are only a phone call away. Olivia speaks fluent Italian, Spanish and French and English of course!
house_rules: No smoking.  Guests may use the roof garden, but no loud noises after 11pm. No pets. Turn air conditioner off when leaving the apartment. Please be as neat as possible.  This is not merely a rental apartment. It is our home.  Please follow rules for recycling.  Rinse out plastic and glass bottles and put them in the grey container in the hallway.  Leave paper shopping bags in the apartment. Kindly do not roll your suitcases around the apt., especially if you are leaving very early in the morning. There are sensitive neighbors downstairs! Thank you.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a filmmaker and my husband is a retired journalist.  We love New York but we also love to travel.  I lived in Italy for 6 years working on feature films and traveled all over Europe, the Middle East, Asia and later Latin America where I made several ethnographic films.  I met lots of great people and hope to continue doing so now.  Our daughter now lives in Vermont  so we have an extra bedroom.  We still travel "low budget" because I think that is more fun! I speak Italian, French and Spanish and my husband tries!  We have a big house upstate New York and spend a lot of time there gardening and farming.

reviews.comments:
Olivia and Bob were lovely and thoughtful hosts, personable and generous. They received us with open arms, offered us a bottle of wine and provided all sorts of helpful information and precious recommendations. 

Their apartment, located in the heart of Nolita, which is such a great area, is comfortable, clean, quiet at night and full of amenities that make it a great place to come home to after a long day in the city. 

There are heaps of restaurants, shops and grocery stores within very close walking distance. A perfect home for anyone wishing to experience as much as possible of this great city within a limited time. 

We spent a week at Olivia and Bob's place and would definitely love to be their guests again!
Une excellente expérience: un bel appartement et une rencontre de qualité avec sa propriétaire.

I rented Olivia and Bob's apartment for a couple of friends who were in town. While I did not stay in the apartment, I had a couple of opportunities to see the apartment and meet with Olivia. 

The apartment is bright and spacious, and very tastefully furnished. And the location, the location.... can there be a better spot to be living in when visiting NYC? You're just steps away from everything and anything. 

Olivia is also a fantastic host. She's incredibly warm and friendly, and very accommodative in making arrangements.

This is a great apartment in an absolutely perfect location! I stayed there for a week with a friend and we had a great experience. Bob and Olivia were warm and wonderful hosts who welcomed us into their apartment with a bottle of wine and personally hand-written notes, assuring us that everything had been arranged to ensure that we had a good stay. They were very friendly and helpful and gave us plenty of information/tips on NYC places of interest.
Great and  apartment in a fantastic part of the city.  Even though Olivia and Bob were out of town, they made the logistics of getting the keys a synch.  Can't recommend this place enough.
Excellent apartment. The location is great, the owners are very nice people, the apartment is comfortable and the roof terrace is great.

Best location! The appartment is all renovated and comfy and so close to shops, bars and restaurants.. Great experience. Olivia and Bob were really nice and helpful. They gave me a special price on my second weekend with them. I highly recommend their place for a NY stay.

The apartment was charming, spotless, and very spacious. The location is ideal, and Olivia and Olivia and Bob attend to even the smallest details. I will always try to stay there when I come to the city.

The apartment is located in the heart of Nolita, with a lot of restaurants, bars and nice shops around. It's clean, well-decrated, comfortable and close to Prince St subway station.
Finally Olivia is a nive hostess worth having a conversation with.

We spent two consecutive weekends in Olivia/Bob's home and it was perfect. Located in the middle of Nolita and with a lot of litlle shops and restaurants around i can say that it probably was the best of my many trips to NYC. Definitely a good choice to stay!

Olivia and Bob were incredibly gracious hosts. They apartment was just as described and quite lovely. It was very clean and in a great part of town surrounded by lots of shopping and restaurants. There were thorough instructions provided and helpful tips on things to see and do. We could not have been happier with the place and the location and hope to return many times to their place.

Staying at Olivia and Bob's place was awesome! This is now the place I want to be in NY! As hosts they did everything to make us feel home, great welcome gift and super easy way to get the keys. The neighborhood is one of my favorite and especially where the apartment is located. The apt is very quiet extremely comfortable and very big too...the rooftop is the cherry on the cake!
Thank you Olivia and Bob!

We spend 5 days in NYC at thanksgiving in Olivias apartment and had the best time. The location were just perfect for our needs - close to the subway, close to the shops in Soho and a great neighbourhood. The apartment itself had everything we needed - it is very spacious, clean, quiet at night and the roof terrace were an added bonus! Olivia was very responsive and helpful in our communication throughout the whole time and we felt very safe dealing with her. The notes in the apartment were very helpful and had a lot great tips. We would definitely recommend this place to everyone.

We absolutely loved our time at the apartment. The location was ideal, immersed by shops, bars and restaurants and easy access to transport. Staying in the apartment allowed us to feel like locals for four days, much better than staying in a chain hotel! 
'The apartment itself was clean and spacious, the comprehensive notes left for the apartment and neighbourhood ensured no detail was left behind. Although we did not meet Olivia & Bob, their neighbour was there to greet us, and made us feel welcome.

My parents and I spent a week in Olivia and Bob's apartment, we had a wonderful time. The flat is very well located in a nice neighborhood, close to subways and interesting touristic sites. The apartment is very clean, very comfortable, and Oliva and Bob are great host, very welcoming!

We stayed at Olivia and Bob apartment, Olivia gave us a very friendly wellcome. The apartmente is very well located in a beatifull neirbourghood like Nolita, near a lot of subway lines and there connection. 
The aparment is verry charmy, spacious, we got a great time in here, and Olivia and Bob are great host.
We recomend it!!!!

We´ve spent 10 perfect nights on Olivia and Bob´s apartment. They were waiting for us the day of our arrival with delicious chocolate chip cookies and a bottle of sparkling wine. They also came to say goodbye the day we leave. 
The apartment is very nice, just as it looks on the pictures, very clean, and it has everything you would need for a comfortable stay. The neighborhood is charming, full of little restaurants, bars and shops, but not noisy. It is close to many subway stations so as to go everywhere you want without even changing trains. 
Olivia and Bob are wonderful people and great hosts. We strongly recommend the place and are looking forward to return someday.

Nous avons séjourné 9 nuits dans l'appartement de Olivia et Bob. Nous y avons passé un très agréable moment. L'appartement est exactement comme l'annonce le décrit. Il est situé dans un petit quartier très sympa, Nolita, entre Soho, Chinatown et Little Italy. Un bon point de départ pour visiter la ville. De plus Olivia et Bob sont des personnes vraiment sympathiques et toujours prêtes à nous aider et nous informer. 
Bref, une très bonne expérience à New York!

We loved staying at Olivia and Bob's apartment on Prince St, the perfect location for us to explore the city again and the perfect hosts!

Olivia was there to greet us on arrival and showed us around her lovely apartment.

We even managed to get up to the roof terrace when the sun was shining for an alfresco drink- what views!

Would recommend and definitely return!

This apartment was perfect.  Very spacious, airy, comfortable and the location for us was perfect.  300 feet from my niece's apartment, in a vibrant, interesting neighborhood, and close to the subway.  Olivia was charming, punctual, and contientious.  Would highly recommend this location to anyone - and the rooftop deck was an added bonus.  Great place for your morning coffee or a late night glass of wine.

We (three people) stayed in Olivia and Bobs apartment for a week in May, and it was perfect! 

Before we left Denmark, Olivia was very helpful finding the best transportation from Newark Airport. When we arrived, there were fresh flowers in the apartment and a bottle of sparkling wine for us. 

The apartment has the best location in Prince St., Nolita – surrounded by fantastic, cozy restaurants in the area.  And a lot of good shops! And the subway lines are nearby, so it’s easy to get around in the city. 

The apartment is spacious, quiet and clean and has everything you need. It’s exactly like Olivia and Bob describe. The rooftop is amazing – breathtaking day and night! 

We met Olivia and Bob just before we left NYC and they are really kind and helpful. We provide the best recommendation!

The apartment is very clean, spacious and quiet. Olivia and Bob met us and showed us around in a very friendly manner. Beforehand, Olivia even helpfully checked out the distance from the apartment to the relatives we were visiting. They thoughtfully ensured there were fragrance-free cleaning products appropriate for allergies and provided useful tourist information and guides. There is a well-stocked kitchen, sufficient linen and towels and good wifi reception. Olivia and Bob even left a bottle of wine to welcome us.  The location is excellent-  close to subway stations and in the centre of a lively, vibrant area filled with restaurants, shops yet it is quiet. Food shopping is easy as it is close to Wholefoods and Dean and Deluca. The only thing we would have preferred would have been a slightly larger bed . Otherwise our stay at the apartment allowed us to  enjoy our  time as if we were real New Yorkers.

Wonderful stay at Bob and Olivia's. Great location, beautiful flat and the view from the rooftop is unbelievable. Special thanks for the very helpful instructions/ recommendations that Bob and Olivia provided, very thoughtful!

Apt parfaitement situé pour une découverte de NYC mêlant culture et tourisme, dans un  quartier véritablement très agréable. Le logement est tel que décrit, confortable et entretenu, nous avons vraiment "logé chez l'habitant", comme si des amis nous avaient confié leur maison, et cela donne une dimension humaine supplémentaire à notre séjour.
Nos hôtes sont charmants et véritablement New-Yorkais dans leur accueil.
So long Olivia & Bob, and nice to meet you again !
Pat, Eloïse 'n JP

Olivia and Bob s flat  was an absolute gem! Our trip was our first family holiday with our 9 month old daughter, and they really were wonderful hosts, very helpful in providing a cot, excellent clear instructions on the general workings of the flat. The flat itself was very clean, well organised and spacious enough for a small family of 3. The location was brilliant, easily accessible to the whole city and also great for just hanging out locally. We loved every minute of it and felt very fortunate to have had such a lovely place to stay. This was our first AirBnB experience and readily recommend Olivia and Bob as hosts and their place to stay.

This apartment is so roomy and the location is OUTSTANDING.  Only 15-20 minutes to Midtown via subway and two other subway lines equally as close.  I stayed here for a month and had plenty of space, light and comfort.  Could use some upgrades on the furniture and some non-stick pans for cooking but overall this place is wonderful.  I will want to stay here any time I come to New York.  Thanks Olivia and Bob for making my month-in-Mahattan a success!

The apartment was lovely newly fitted out and clean. Great Bathroom too. Great Location - lovely shops/ Cafes and lots of interesting sights. Easy access to the subway to go uptown or to Brooklyn.
Olivia and Bob were extra helpful with help and info. Thank you very very much

Olivia and Bob's apartment is very nice and we can definitely recommend it. There is plenty of space and a nice kitchen and bathroom. Everything was fine and clean. It is a pleasure to stay in an artistically decorated apartment where you really feel at home. Despite our late arrival at 9 o'clock in the evening we were still warmly received by both of them - and a bottle of sparkling wine. They are lovely hosts and very nice people.
We spent 8 wonderful days in the condo in the heart of an  awesome neighborhood with very short distance to the subway and therefore everything you want to see in New York.
The area around the apartment is the best. Lots of life, great shops, cozy restaurants and rich opportunity to buy groceries. Rooftop is absolutely also an added plus. Great views both day and night and the best place to sit with a glass of wine in the evening.
We will definitely come back to the same apartment and can only give the best recommendations.

Just wonderful hosts. Olivia made me feel most welcome and I was even offered home made soup after a tiring long haul flight. The flat is large and spacious and incredibly clean. Also there is a well stocked kitchen. I loved it so much here am returning next year for another visit and will be staying at the same (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommend this place most highly.
The reservation was canceled 60 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This apartment was fantastic for us!  Olivia and Bob were wonderful hosts, showing us where things were and how to use them. They provided us with maps and guidebooks of the city, and a detailed list of recommended restaurants, grocery stores, and laundry services in the neighborhood.
There were 2 in our party. We each took a bedroom; both complete with comfy bed and clean sheets. The recently renovated bathroom was beautifully done and had good water pressure, plenty of hot water, and fresh towels. Although we ate most of our meals out, we enjoyed using the well-appointed kitchen for snacks, breakfast and drinks. The rooftop terrace has fabulous views of the city, a perfect place for sipping morning coffee or evening cocktail. 
We found the neighborhood charming with many restaurants, cafes, shops, and grocery stores within a few blocks radius. Yet, the apartment is conveniently located close to several subway and bus lines making it super easy to explore the rest of town. Little Italy; Chinatown; the Tenement Museum; and Dean and DeLuca are all within a few blocks of home base.  
Considering all of the activity in the surrounding neighborhood, the street and apartment were very quiet.
We unequivocally recommend this apartment and will wish to stay here on future visits to NYC!

Very nice place to stay in NY. In a nice area, where are lot of shops, restaurants and a very good supermarket around the corner (wholefood market, great!).
The place has a very good bathroom and kitchen. Also a spacious bedroom and a very nice living room. There was even another room which we didn't used.
Also the contact before, during and after our stay with Olivia and Bob was nice and good. surely very nice people. When we came they were waiting for us and explained about the apartment.
Because it was lying at the back of the building, it was also quiet (for NY).

If we go back to  NY we certainly will try if this is available. And Bob and Olivia, thanks for the bottle of Cava we have got from you!

we loved being here, the location is brilliant, the apartment is very comfortable and QUIET...our hosts were extremely helpful. we would love to be able to use this as our NYC base for all future trips. We highly recommend Olivia and Bob's place to anyone needing a home in New York.
Excellent apartment with very good amenities and close to transport etc. excellent hosts. Highly recommended.

Another great stay in this lovely Appartment. Hosts are a lovely couple who are very attentive. Well appointed bathroom and kitchen amply stocked. The roof garden is a real bonus!!!
A great place to stay in a lively cool area.
Very nice apartment. Perfectly organized. Great location in NOLITA.

We had a fantastic time staying at Olivia and Bob's place! It was very comfortable,well furnished and Olivia and Bob were great communicators and very thoughtful We loved the position, which allowed us to almost walk the whole of Manhattan, yet retreat to a peaceful sanctuary at the end of the day.
The rooftop was magical, and only added to what was a perfect initiation to airbnb. Thank you Olivia and Bob!.

L'appartement était très bien situé à proximité ,commerces, transports, restaurants...appartement spacieux .
Vraiment je garderai un très bon souvenir de ce séjour, votre appartement est si agréable plus la terrasse et vraiment vous avez été très accueillants pour nous trois. Merci ,je vous recommanderai à mes amis et famille. Monique

The apartment is really nice. One feels like at home directly. The rooftop terrace  for breakfast is the best feature. There is a wonderful view over New York. The hosts, Olivia and Bob, are really helpful and nice. They are the greatest. I would love to stay here again. 
The area is calm to be on Manhattan. The streets around are nice and there are plenty of cafés, restaurants and shops. Apple Store is on the same street. The buildings in Nolita are not very high which gives the area a more welcoming atmosphere than the areas with highrises. 
Black Seed nearby sells wonderful bagels for breakfast. Katz's Delicatessen is a wonderful breakfast/lunch/dinner place nearby. A real genuine delicatessen and a New York institution. They played in When Harry Met Sally there. If you want a real American breakfast try Clinton St. Baking Company. There is also a very good supermarket (Whole Foods Market) nearby. SOHO and Greenwich Village are within walking distance.

We just got home from a fantastic holiday in New York and Olivia and Bob`s apartment in Nolita. It was clean, well organized and had a lovely atmosphere with the couples art pieces on the wall. We really loved the location and the roof terrace. We had breakfast at the roof-garden every day, and even brought take-away burritos from Café Habana one night for dinner. Olivia was very easy to communicate with, and she met us when we arrived, and when we left. She had even brought fresh flowers from her own garden and put on the kitchen table. A very nice welcome! We had a great stay in Prince street, and would recommend it to anyone who is looking for the perfect place to stay in New York.

We loved our time in New York made very special by our stay in this apartment. Our hosts were extremely helpful and welcoming with full explanations about how the apartment works and also insider knowledge about the fabulous nearby area. The roof garden is a wonderful bonus.  The neighbours too were very pleasant and helpful. The area is extremely well serviced with public transport and walking in the area is a joy.  We hope to return in the near future.

Olivia and Bobs apartment in Soho is an excellent choice, when visiting NYC. The location is perfect: great atmosphere, best shopping, Little Italy and Chinatown with great restaurants. And East Village close by with lots of community gardens, the Pickle Guys, Katz' deli and Tennement Museum. 
The apartment itself is what we danes call "hyggelig" and the roof terrasse has the best views ever! You will spend a lot of time there! 
Olivia and Bob are the nicest people and great hosts ... Very helpful and available for questions. They make you feel right at home with flowers from their garden as well as fresh salads homepicked. 
We can recommend Bob and Olivia highly as well as their apartment. And when we go back to NYC we will be back in Soho ❤️
Extremely comfortable apartment in a perfect location.

We spent a great week at Olivia and Bob's place in Nolita. 
They are very helpful and pleasant hosts. The kitchen is well equipped. The living- room and library likewise. Everything is clean and with a lot of personal charm. The apartment is situated in the heart of everything: Awesome restaurants just around the corner. Small and interesting shops in Prince street or on nearby Broadway and Lafayette street. Here you may also the major Subway-lines to all the museums and other attractions that New York has to offer.  We enjoyed every minute of our stay.

We had a wonderful stay at Olivia and Bob's lovely apartment.  Their home was nicely furnished with lots of art and treasures from their travels.  Olivia gave us great directions and suggestions when we arrived.  Our whole transaction with Olivia and airbnb went smoothly, just as you would expect.  Their location in Nolita was great, subway stations were nearby with loads of restaurants and shops right within easy walking distance.  We would definitely stay here again.  Thanks Olivia and Bob!
Lovely people, wonderful apartment, great location. We really enjoyed our stay in Olivia and Bob's apartment.

We arrived late at 11 Prince Street, but Olivia and Bob was gracious enough to wait for us, even though they had a 3 hour drive to get to their other home. We were greeted in the best possible way, and there was even a bottle of Cava waiting for us in the fridge. 

The apartment is absolutely brilliant. Roomy, modern, cool and best of all is the location. Nolita and Prince Street is right in the middle of where you want to be in NYC. The hosts are also were accommodating and will go to great lengths to help you have a great stay. Which we had! We won`t hesitate to book this apartment again.

The rooftop is also perfect. We had breakfast there several times, and also enjoyed the company of friends one afternoon. The views are spectacular!

The only regret is that we didn`t find the time to meet you before we left. Next time! Thank you so much guys, and we hope to see you in Norway some time.

We quite appreciated the kindness and the trustfull well comme from our hosts
We appreciated the accommodation the Space Bd its location 
We will recommend it to our friendly and family

Returned to NYC after 20 odd years. We (wife, daughter (8), and I) were looking for a nice place in one of the more 'rural' parts of Manhattan (if such a thing exists). This place fits the bill. Prince Street is a quiet, small side street off Bowery. In the 90s not a place to go. Now it is fine. Olivia's apartment is great. Modern, clean, and quiet. Olivia is fantastic and we wished we could have spend more time with her. She is a very nice and interesting person. A filmmaker. Need I day more? ;-) We met also one of our neighbours on the roof garden. Very nice too. Overall a great experience. We would definitively come back to her place. The only note of caution: if you are rather tall (190cm+) the beds are a bit short. It worked out for me though.

We had a fantastic week in Manhattan. Covered all of the main sites and enjoyed the splendid ambiance of the charming districts around Nolita, all from a fantastically located at 11 Prince Street. 

The apartment is perfect for our needs, and so much better than a hotel room. It was quiet, comfortable and had everything you would need for a week stay. Olivia the host was always available. We will use it again, cannot recommend higher than that.

L'appartamento di Olivia e Bob é piacevol, ben organizzato e la terrazza é davvero un incanto.
Il quartiere é vivace e dinamico, un soggiorno riuscito!
The reservation was canceled 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Bob and Olivia's apartment is in the best location in NYC! A lovely apartment with great facilities, we enjoyed our 8 night stay. The rooftop terrace a bonus.
Located in Tribeca, a fantastic neighbourhood, it was a short walk to the subway and all the shops of SOHO.
Highly recommended.

Die geräumige und schön aufgeteilte Wohnung war auf unseren Besuch bestens  vorbereitet: viel Platz in Schränken und Kommoden, Ausrüstung von Küche und Bad mit vielen Annehmlichkeiten. Wir wurden herzlich begrüßt, bekamen zahlreiche Hilfen (Karten- und Infomaterial, das  von den Gastgebnern selbst verfasst ist: z.B. Hinweis auf das spannende Tenement Museum ein paar Straßen weiter) um uns in New York zurechtzufinden und viele Erklärungen auf dem Gang zur Dachterrasse mit Aussicht (bei Sonnenuntergang begehen!). 
Das Viertel Nolita ist ideal: viele kleine Läden junger Designer, "der" Wholefoodmarket um die Ecke, Cafes und Restaurants uvm : ein junges und lebendiges Viertel mit Anbindung an mehrere U-Bahnlinien, die einen in den Rest der Stadt bringen.

We have had a suepr nice stay at Bob and Olivia. The welcome was nice and very well organised. Olivia have made at fine litttle folder to describe everything. The appartment is very nice (the bed in the small room is a bit short if you are a very tall person - but it is wonderful that it is NOT kingsize (I feel so alone in these big beds). Kirchen, bathroom ect works fantastic and is very cosy. The location ia absolutely fantastic - in the middle of everything!! COULD NOT BE BETTER!
Nice with all the tourist brochures and maps ect - and even af metrocard.
The only SMALL thing is that we had to sneek a little in the corridor and on the roof, because that some of the people in the building are not so fund of AirBnB....but this a VERY MINOR DETAIL.
We would love to come back!!

Just returning home from an impressive week in New York! The appartment was exactly like described and Olivia and Bob were perfect hosts. They tried everything to make us feel at home and the appartment including its locatione were very nice and convenient, so that we could walk to the nearby restaurants or take a subway from one of the various Metro stations. With a Party of up to three people I would always try to spend my time at their beautiful place again.

Olivia and Bob were warm and welcoming hosts who gave us lots of very helpful advice about transport and what to do and see in New York.  They were also very accommodating about our arrival and departure times and the excess luggage we had accumulated over three weeks in New England - USA shopping, especially for antiques, is very attractive for us Australians!
Olivia and Bob's most attractive and spotless home was perfect for our needs and very comfortable for three adults,   The neighbourhood was an oasis in central New York, with supermarkets and restaurants close by but just a short walk to excellent shopping.
We mainly used the many available taxis in order to see more of the city when we traveled further afield, but there were subway stations close by if needed.
We would love to return when we find ourselves in New York again!

We were made very welcome by Bob and Olivia with a very welcome bottle of Lambrusco in the fridge ready for consumption. The apartment is in such a fantastic position, easy subway access, great shopping and easy walking to convenience stores etc. All facilities were available in the apartment which we made very good use of over thanks giving, everything was very clean and tidy. we felt right at home here and wish to thank Bob and Olivia for allowing us access to their beautiful home, we would recommend this to any one who wants an easy  and convenient introduction to New York. This has given us a different perspective and one we will treasure. Thanks for the experience
Jeni, Carlo and Vitti Di Martino

I  booked that apartment for a visit of New York for a week with my mom. The apartment is perfectly located and nearby subway, shopping (Soho), multiple nice groceries. The place is quiet and comfy (perfect if you want to come back during lunch time to rest for while).  The apartment is well furnished with comfortable materials (bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, etc.). Nothing to say! 

We were warmly welcomed by Olivia and Bob with plenty of explanation very useful for our trip. 

I would definitely recommend that place and book it again should I go back to New York next time.

Many thanks for everything!

Living in Nolita we experienced the real New York City neighbourhood atmosphere. We felt like locals and we looked forward to going home each evening to this delightful apartment! The 2 bedroom apartment is spacious, immaculately clean & has such character no doubt due to the lovely couple who own it. Olivia and Bob went out of their way to meet us and assist with settling in and they were always quick to respond to any query we had. The building is secure and safe, the decor is creative and comfortable and the access to the rooftop and outlook from the windows adds to the character. We stayed 8 nights and then didn't want to leave! We would love to return to see more of New York and wouldn't consider staying anywhere else! The hosts are welcoming and this apartment is a home - it doesn't have  that holiday rental feel at all. I recommend this apartment to mature and discerning people who appreciate authenticity and style. Thanks for a truly memorable experience Olivia and Bob

We loved staying in this delightful Nolita apartment. The neighborhood is the place to be and access to Subway was great. it fits the bill for middle-aged woman and her 17-year-old son… Hard to please both. 
The apartment is spacious immaculate and comfortable and welcoming. Olivia and Bob are most gracious hosts... delightful, generous, welcoming and great communication. Five stars

We had a lovely stay at Olivia and Bob. We had a good contact before we travelled to New York and we were greeted by Olivia who showed us the apartment and gave us the last tips on purchasing, etc.


The apartment was just as described on the Airbnb's website. It is centrally located for shopping and metro stations. And the neighborhood is wonderful.


During our stay, we were also contacted by Olivia and Bob with various proposals for experiences.


We highly recommend all to rent Olivia and Bob's lovely apartment. Olivia and Bob takes care of their tenants.

Katrine, Anita and Kaj Ask Madsen

My mum and I had a wonderful 9 night stay at Olivia and Bobs apartment in Nolita NYC. From the apartment itself which is spacious,  comfortable and has a rooftop with great views of the city to the location which in my opinion is unbeatable. If I was to move to NYC this is the neighbourhood I would be moving to with all the restaurants and shopping  available plus multiple subway lines enabling quick and easy transport around manhattan and beyond. We also found it helpful having Olivia and Bob a quick phone call or email away to answer any questions we had about anything,  they were very helpful. All in all a 5 star stay!

From the moment we saw the listing we had a greta feeling that this would provide us with the unique New York city living experience.  Olivia and Bob were very communicative prior to and during our trip and their welcome could not have been  better, particularly after a long day of travel.  The bottle of welcoming prosecco was a great touch of kindness.  Both Olivia and Bob explained many features of their lovely cosy home and the surrounding area.
The apartment is very roomy and cosy and we thought it looked much bigger "in the flesh" compared with the photographs.
The bedrooms are a perfect size, the bathroom modern and the kitchen is fully equipped.  We stayed for 10 days so some nights, when we just wanted to chill out, the kitchen facilities came in really handy and with a supermarket very close by we really did feel home from home.
The area where the apartment is is great. There are so many restaurants, shops, bars and is less high rise than most tourist parts of New York so it really feels village-like, adding to what was just a brilliant experience.
Olivia and Bob are very knowledgeable about the area and their contact details were on hand 24/7 if we had any questions.  Luckily Ive been to New York a few times but there's always more you can learn and the welcome pack that Olivia/Bob provide is very useful for first timers and the more experienced NYC tourist.

Overall an exceptionally magnificent and true NYC experience! Thank you Olivia and Bob.

Olivia and Bob are warm, friendly and very helpful hosts. Their apartment is spectacular - spacious, beautifully decorated with every amenity  for a perfect holiday . It is also the quietest place l have  stayed in in NYC.
The bedrooms are comfortable with plenty of closet space  and opening windows.
The kitchen is clean, serviceable and has everything you need for self catering.

The immediate neighborhood is lovely. Well off the tourist trail it is packed full of interesting boutiques,galleries and lovely restaurants and bars. Olivia and Bob provided great recommendations which we followed up on and were delighted with our experiences.

Lots of information was provided on arrival and we were encouraged to contact the hosts with any further questions. Its a big city with a lot to see so the maps, timetables and guide books provided saved us a lot of time.

The roof top garden is a big bonus - the views are breathtaking and it was a lovely place to sit in the evenings.

To conclude : If you are considering a homestay in Manhattan - look no further - you have just found the best. We look forward to our next trip

We have spent 3 wonderful weeks in NYC.
The aparment is accurate as can be seen in the pictures.
Our hosts were very friendly and concerned about our needs.
I recommend this accommodation to my friends.
Thanks Olivia and Bob !

Liebe Olivia, lieber Bob
Wir hatten eine aufregende und wunderbare Woche in New York und haben schon furchtbar Heimweh nach Big Apple.  Mit Euch und eurem Appartement hätten wir es nicht besser treffen können. Es war für unsere Bedürfnisse (Tante und Teenie-Neffe) absolut perfekt.
Wir haben uns wie Freunde willkommen gefühlt.  Die Freundlichkeit, die ihr ausstrahlt, ist wunderbar. Allein die vielen Tipps im Voraus und die e-mails haben uns so viel weiter geholfen.  Das Infomaterial von Euch für die nähere Umgebung waren sehr hilfreich. Außerdem sind die vielen kleinen Hinweise in der Wohnung super praktisch.
Und wie gut hat es getan am Abend "nach Hause" in ein wunderbar ruhiges und heimeliges Appartement zurückzukehren.  Die Beschreibung der Wohnung war absolut treffend und alles hat perfekt funktioniert. Ein besonderes Highlight ist natürlich der Roof-Garden mit spektakulärem Blick - besonders am Abend.  Die Lage ist perfekt mit vielen kleinen Restaurants, Shops und die Metro um die Ecke  --  und dennoch leise.
Ich bin voller Dankbarkeit, dass unsere Woche gerade auch wegen der Unterkunft  ein so intensives und angenehmes Erlebnis war.
Alles Gute für Euch - und wenn wir wieder kommen dann nur zu Euch.

Nous avons passé 9 jours magnifiques dans le superbe appartement d'Olivia et Bob, idéalement situé dans le petit quartier animé de Nolita, proche de toutes les commodités. 
L’appartement est très confortable, calme et décoré avec beaucoup de goût. La literie est excellente, nous avons dormi comme des bébés.
Olivia et Bob, tous les deux adorables et très sympathiques, nous ont reçu chaleureusement et ont été attentifs à nos besoins. Nous avons eu l'impression d'être reçus par des amis et c'était fort agréable.
Quand nous reviendrons à New York, c'est à nouveau chez eux que nous logerons.
Merci Olivia et Bob !

Olivia and Bob are wonderful hosts. They met us at the apartment to go over everything and answered all of our questions. Lovely people. The apartment was wonderful and in a great area. Walking distance to the subway, restaurants, bars, shops and everything you need.

A lovely & spacious apartment in a great location. We spent a long weekend in May.  Lots of Windows, a full kitchen, comfortable beds. The neighborhood was quiet (for NYC) residential with trendy shops. Easy walk to subway lines. Great restaurants. We had a great experience. Olivia & Bob were very warm & welcoming. Would highly recommend their place.

This is a nice 2 bdrm, 1 bath apt in a great location for anyone looking for lower East Village/ SOHO/ Little Italy area with good restaurants and shops, near NYU or just being close to good subway stops that can then get you quickly to pretty much anywhere else in the city. Is already a great street that seems to be getting even better with still more shops and restaurants nearby that go late into the evening.

Apt spacious for NYC standards, quiet - as in no street noise – with washer/dryer in basement of elevator building. Has window AC units for warm summer days. Overall, nothing particularly fancy, but good. And was clean. Can also go up to roof for great view of city skyline or just to chill out. 

Was very busy during my time there, so made minimal use of kitchen, but it has gas range, fridge, dishwasher – everything needed to settle in or just prepare quick meals and snacks. Wireless Internet, too. Everything provided for bath and kitchen. Rented for about a month and apartment worked well. Understand they are changing some lighting, which will brighten up the living area. 

Unit definitely reflects its owners, right down to the multi-page apartment guide and its do's and don’ts. They are very invested in the unit and everything in it and how it will be used. My first time to use Airbnb, so having the owners that involved was a little unlike other experiences where have rented for weeks and months at a time elsewhere in the US and Europe. They, too, may still be getting used to the idea of renting out their apartment, and how to furnish it and let go to reduce their anxiety.

Olivia and Bob are the perfect hosts.  You feel immediately welcomed by them.  The nice flowers in charming little glasses across the flat made it extra especial as well as a delicious bottle of Proseco that they left in the fridge for us. We also found on the table in the living room various maps and information about New York which were very helpful. Olivia would often send me emails with information about nice events happening in Manhattan during our stay, including the unique "Manhattanhenge" solstice day - when the setting sun aligns perfectly with the grid.
The flat is beautiful.  I loved the warm colors and the great artwork with pieces collected from all over the world.  Bedrooms and beds are comfortable and all appliances in the flat are easy to use.  The location could not be better for us.  Lots of great restaurants, boutiques and interesting shops.  The main museums, concert halls and art galleries were only a half hour uber or underground trip.  
Definitely, when I go back to New York I will be looking to staying at Olivia and Bob's apartment again.

Olivia and Bob have great personality.
They were so polite and kind. so I had been happy from first day of my staying.
The house is really clean and nicely designed. Location is also nice for everything.

I strongly recommend to stay here!

Thank you a lot, Olivia and Bob.

Olivia and Bob were great hosts. Lots of communication in advance of our trip and they were highly responsive to any questions. They made sure we knew all the ins and outs of their place when we checked-in and even left us an overview of Nolita and nice (chilled) bottle of Prosecco. Their apartment was clean, well equipped and comfortable and the AC was a life saver. We would be happy to return.

My daughter and I have been coming to NYC  for about 20 years. This is the best place we have ever stayed. It's in an excellent location, close to subways and any kind of shopping and restaurants you could want.  Very large, two bedroom, great kitchen and great bathroom.   Olivia and Bob couldn't have been nicer to us during the whole process.  We also liked the detailed instructions about their home and surrounding area. Can't wait for our next trip

What a great location and great apartment. This was so central to our new york stay.

Great and friendly hosts

Thanks Olivia and Bob and it was great to finally meet you both

Dave and gab

Two years after our first stay we returned from Australia to again spend several days at this charming apartment. It is so comfortable and convenient, a home away from home in New York.  It was lovely to reconnect with Bob and Olivia, who were so welcoming and kind to us.
Thank you and enjoy your travels!
Great apartment, great location, great hosts. Highly recommended.

Olivia and Bob are delightful and attentive hosts. Their fabulous Nolita apartment was exactly what we needed for our girls getaway to NYC. It is a gorgeous neighbourhood with loads of boutiques and awesome little restaurants, cafes and delis. We loved its proximity to four different subway lines, and used them constantly. The area has a safe and friendly vibe. I will definitely be recommending Olivia and Bob's place to my friends and family.

This beautifully appointed apartment is a lovely haven to return to after a day of sightseeing. It is very near three different subway stations and is in a really great area with many restaurants, cafes and shops. Olivia are very generous hosts and we appreciated them providng bagels, coffee, champagne on our arrival. The roof provides a brilliant 360 degree view of the city. The main bed is very comfortable, the second less so. The water pressure in the shower is not that great. The apartment is beautifully clean and toiletries and cupboard space are provided. We had a great stay there with only a couple of small problems over 10 days. I would really recommend this as a great place to stay.

What a find! Extremely clean, well-equipped, and comfortable.  Especially enjoyed the roof top view at night. Location was great because it made you feel like a local far from the tourists, but still convenient to everything either on foot or subway.  We managed to find several excellent spots to eat just a few blocks from the place. Olivia and Bob were wonderful hosts, making us very welcome on arrival and checking in during our visit as well. Highly recommend!

Ubicación en la zona Sur ,en barrio muy agradable, con muchas tiendas , museos, restaurantes. Ambiente del barrio estupendo. Única desventaja es que para ir al midtown necesitas coger metro pues está algo lejos para ir andando.

We had a wonderful week at Olivia and Bob's place. The location is perfect - right in a fabulous area on a fabulous street. Even more amazing is that the apartment itself is so quiet and  perfect escape from a long day. We could not fault it at all - except perhaps for the shower pressure (not very strong) which let's be honest....first world problems!!! And also made us shower quickly and gave us even more time to explore and enjoy NYC. From check in to check out - they are wonderful hosts. Do not hesitate to stay - it will be my first choice. We traveled as two single women and the apartment was more than spacious enough for us. An absolute winner.

Olivia And Bob are wonderful hosts. We had a great time. This is a wonderful neighborhood and a charming place.  I do wish the water in the shower got hotter, but that didn't seem to matter so much by the end of the trip. We would definitely stay here again.

Tout était exceptionnel ! Déjà avant le séjour, nombreux contacts afin de nous aider à préparer le voyage. Accueil chaleureux, remise des clés en mains propres, Olivia nous avait même préparé des pâtisseries ! Un petit guide nous présentait quelques adresses dans le quartier (petit déj, restos, shopping,...) et pendant le séjour, réponse très rapide en cas de sollicitation. Conseils utiles et avisés. L’appartement est vraiment bien situé à Nolita, quartier à la mode, comme un petit village, vivant la journée mais calme la nuit. Très proche de plusieurs lignes de métro. L’appartement est spacieux, joliment décoré, on s’y sent immédiatement chez soi. C’est un appartement dans lequel les hôtes vivent réellement (de loin pas systématique avec Airbnb), et donc il est parfaitement équipé et fonctionnel (salle de bain, cuisine,...). A conseiller absolument ! Nous espérons pouvoir y retourner lors de notre prochaine séjour à NYC.

This is a wonderful place to stay in the city. Nolita/SoHo is less touristy, very posh and close to restaurants plus shopping. The space is very large and well suited for relaxing and working.  The rooftop is spectacular with fabulous views of uptown and downtown!

The hosts were so helpful, especially since this was my first Airbnb stay.  They responded quickly to my questions and left great guidance on the area.

Will definitely stay here the next time I’m in the city!

Olivia is a great host, easy to communicate with. We briefly met her and Bob, they are lovely. The flat is as described, very good space and very clean. Fantastic location in Nolita with a great view from the building roof terrace. Maybe not the brightest flat, especially in the kitchen - dining area. Kitchen very well equipped. Highly recommended!

Two of us stayed at Olivia and Bob's place for over 2 weeks in October.  Bob and Olivia met us and provided keys and a tour of the apartment on arrival.  The apartment was as per the photos, very clean and large by New York standards.  The living room is sizeable and comfortable and is a great place to wind down after a day. There was plenty of storage available in both bedrooms and the bathroom which really assists in settling in for your stay.  The lift access to the apartment was a godsend at the end of a day touring New York.  The view from the rooftop is amazing and the photos do not do this justice.

The location of this apartment is fantastic, close to multiple train lines in the heart of Nolita.  There are restaurants, bars, shops, coffee shops and Wholefoods just around the corner. A 20 minute walk to Union Square to the green market and 5 minutes from Broadway.  The location is perfect for those that want to experience New York out of mid town and feel more a part of day to day New York.
Both of us had been to New York a number of times before, so did not need much assistance from Olivia. Olivia checked in with us a number of times during our stay to ensure all was OK and there were no issues.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Olivia's and would recommend the apartment and location to anyone.

name: ENTIRE BUILDING in the City Center/Beach
summary: ENTIRE BUILDING in a fantastic location all for you! :-) 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms 5 minutes walking from the beach and 10 minutes from the Gothic quarter. ALL INCLUDED: Towels, Sheets, Blankets, Hair dryers, Iron, Washing machine, Wifi ... In the area you will find lots of restaurants, supermarkets, market, bars and other corner stores. Enjoy a chilled-out stay right by the Mediterranean, the Gothic quarter and El Borne! Feel free to ask! :)
space: This 4-storey house is in a quite quiet street of Barceloneta. It boasts 3 double bedrooms with a king-size bed (2 of them with ensuite bathroom), one room with a set of bunk beds and one area with a single bed. The room with bunk beds and the room with a single bed don't have independent door.  All rooms have parquet flooring and at least one window or balcony. The house can accommodate up to 10 people in 3 double beds, 2 bunk beds, 1 single bed and 1 sofa bed. On the ground floor is the living room with the kitchen. And you have 4 bathrooms with shower, WIFI, air conditioning and heating. Also television in several rooms. The spaces are somewhat smaller than it seems in the photos.
description: ENTIRE BUILDING in a fantastic location all for you! :-) 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms 5 minutes walking from the beach and 10 minutes from the Gothic quarter. ALL INCLUDED: Towels, Sheets, Blankets, Hair dryers, Iron, Washing machine, Wifi ... In the area you will find lots of restaurants, supermarkets, market, bars and other corner stores. Enjoy a chilled-out stay right by the Mediterranean, the Gothic quarter and El Borne! Feel free to ask! :) This 4-storey house is in a quite quiet street of Barceloneta. It boasts 3 double bedrooms with a king-size bed (2 of them with ensuite bathroom), one room with a set of bunk beds and one area with a single bed. The room with bunk beds and the room with a single bed don't have independent door.  All rooms have parquet flooring and at least one window or balcony. The house can accommodate up to 10 people in 3 double beds, 2 bunk beds, 1 single bed and 1 sofa bed. On the ground floor is the living room with the kitchen. And you have 4 bathrooms wit
neighborhood_overview: La Barceloneta is a former fishing village in the Old Town plenty of shops, restaurants and markets. Apart from the obvious pleasures of swimming in the Mediterranean or sunbathing on the sand it is well worth taking a stroll along the Passeig Maritim as this particular sea front is as about as colourful human circus as you'll encounter here in Barcelona and you'll find tonnes of things to see like the Rebecca Horn's monument 'Homenatge a la Barceloneta', and further towards the Olympic Port the Frank Gehry's spectacular, glittering gold Fish. El borne neighbourhood and the Gothic quarter are just few steps ago.
notes: Tourist tax is not included in the price (2,48€/guest/night). Late check-in after 22:00h incur an extra fee of 30€. If check-in is after 24:00h the extra fee is 45€.
transit: The nearest metro station "Barceloneta" is 3 minutes walking.
access: The kitchen is equipped with microwave, fridge-freezer and vitroceramic cooktop. The house also has a washing machine and is fully provided with bed linen, 2 towels per person, iron, shower soap and all the necessary kitchen utensils like toaster, coffee maker, kettle. There is also a baby cot available upon request.
interaction: Hello, during your stay I will be available for whatever you need. I live near the accommodation and I will be always available at a phone call.
house_rules: It’s not allowed to make parties or any noise after 22:30h.  We are flexible with check in and check out times but when we have guests departing and arriving on the same day, we ask that those departing can do so by 11am, and those arriving can do so by 3pm to allow for cleaning in between. From 11am you always be able to leave your luggage and get the keys.

reviews.comments:
Angels was a very nice host.
Very helpful and flexible with the check in and out.
The location is really really good. So close to the beach and in the really cozy Barcelonetta.
The apartment is big, and can host up to 10 people.
It is very nice with 4 bathrooms.

I can definitely recommend this nice place.

This property comes highly recommended . We had the entire house which meant lots of space for the 6 of us . The kids enjoyed the wi-fi and the location was perfect for the beach , with lots of supermarkets , a full market and an amazing bakery a few steps away . Marketa met us as arranged and was generous with her time and gave us lots of  information about using the metro and local interests. We loved it and would loved to have stayed longer .

The apartment was everything I expected and more. Four of us stayed in the apartment and we all had a double bedroom with an ensure and air con each. The location was ideal as it is literally a 5 min walk from the beach and close to all transport links.

Maison parfaite ! Située en plein barceloneta, à 10min à pied de la plage, à 300m du métro barceloneta. Très pratique pour les soirées au bord de la plage, on était 5 et on avait tous assez de place pour chacun. 
Vraiment recommandé, rapport qualité/prix imbattable pour la période d'été.

This is an amazing townhouse apartment in a fantastic location. It is beautiful building, spacious, well equipped and clean. Angeles was very  helpful and responded quickly to requests. Upon arrival we were greeted by the lovely Marketa who told us everything we needed to know about the apartment and the area. I would not hesitate in recommending this to a large group or family looking to visit the incredible city of Barcelona. Thank you Angeles

Fantastica!! La casa è prorpio come è descritta: bella e spaziosa.  Quattro superfici autonome, ognuna con una camera da letto e da bagno.   Siamo stati accolti dalla carinissima Marketa che ci ha dato molti consigli sulla città.  La posizione della casa, a due passi dal mare e dalla metropolitana,  ci ha consentito di vivere il mare di Barceloneta, la parte più allegra e colorata di Barcellona e di raggiungere velocemente i luoghi più belli della città. Siamo stati molto bene, speriamo di tornarci presto.

The home was as described. Because I don't know Spanish, communication in English with Angeles via email seemed to cause misunderstandings at times. Marketa met us at the apartment at the appointed time and was super helpful. She arranged a taxi to the airport for our flight home when we checked in. She was very helpful with giving us tips about our visit. The apartment is in a great location, easy to get anywhere you want to go. It is also very spacious, spread out over 3 floors. FYI-the kitchen and laundry are on the top floor. Be prepared to do lots of stairs. The decor was very minimal and didn't feel very warm or inviting. The house is in mostly good repair. There is a washer, but no dryer. There are a couple of clothes drying racks provided. If you intend to do any cooking, the kitchen is not particularly chef friendly. It's tiny with essentials provided. There are no spices, etc. And no coffee pot. The mattress on the top floor is very hard. My husband loved it. I did not. I did not try the rest of them. But the kids didn't complain, so they must have been fine.
The host was very accommodating even allowing us an extra couple of hours before checking out

Great house, I'd fully recommend it and return in a heartbeat. Perfect location by the beach but close enough to walk into the centre. Lots of shops & restaurants nearby as well as a metro station. The house itself is brilliant, 4 stories with a bedroom and bathroom on each floor so it was ideal for us as 4 girls. Small kitchen to make food & really good air con individually controlled in each room. Really quiet steet plus wifi in the whole house. Completely smooth check-in with great communication from the host at all times and no problems during our stay at all, we'll be back!

Everything was great. We got very nice support from a very good English speaking host, which is not really common in Spain. Some technical issues where fixed very fast, the location is really good for either visiting the city or just hang around on the beach. Only the WIFI is a little issue, but only if you are in the apartment on the top. 

Thanks for everything!
We had a lovely stay at Angeles apartment!
Sehr schöne, gepflegte Unterkunft.
주변 자연환경과 생활여건(슈퍼마켓, 레스토랑, 자전거-스쿠터 대여점 등 다수), 교통여건(지하철, 공항행 기차, 다수의 시내버스 등)이 매우 뛰어남! 4층 구조로 각 팀간 독립성이 보장되나, 4층 주방으로 오르내리기가 다소 어려움.

A great place to stay. Perfect location with easy access to all the city and beach. With 8 people staying the kitchen and dining area was somewhat cramped eating breakfast and, on the odd occasion, lunch on our knees. That said it wasn't a problem.
