The ages ranged from 12 to 78 and the 5 flights of stairs became a little tiring after 3 days of walking! There was plenty of hot water for us all to shower before going out for the night with hairdriers and towels provided in each room. Marketa welcomed us with plenty of information and also booked taxis back to the airport. Would certainly recommend this to anyone visiting Barcelona.

Situation géographique excellente entre le vieux Barcelone, la plage, le port. Très propre et spacieux, idéal pour petit groupe.
Réactivité pour les conseils et  accueil agréable.

Bon séjour à Barcelone, dans ce logement spacieux et très propre. Il y a une chambre ou 2 par étage (en tous 4 étages, avec beaucoup de marches), et la cuisine est au dernier étage. La literie est récente, mais il n'y a pas d'alèse sur les matelas et les oreillers. Les sanitaires sont très propres. L'environnement est calme, la rue est passante mais pas durant la nuit. La cuisine est minuscule, pas du tout adaptée pour 10 personnes, tout au plus pour 4. C'est vraiment le gros défaut de cet appartement.

Muy buena ubicación, muy buen servicio, muy buena zona - tranquila y cerca de todo!!!perfecto para grupos/ parejas!!!

Inconvenientes: limpieza pésima, 1 toalla de ducha para 4 días, sábanas, nevera y armarios sucios.

Volvería sin duda siempre y cuando la limpieza mejore!!!!!!
The apartment is very nice, perfect for big groups of family or friends. We had a great time there!

Nous avons été bien accueillis, le logement est tout à fait conforme à la description et très propre. Nous étions trois familles avec plusieurs enfants. La pièce commune n'est pas très grande, mais cela n'a pas posé de problème car chaque famille avait son espace avec sa propre salle de bain.
La maison est parfaitement située pour découvrir Barcelone.

We loved our stay at this property in Barceloneta. Everything was easy and straightforward. Good communication from Angeles our host throughout. We called through to Marketa from the airport who met us at the apartment to give us the keys once our taxi arrived from the airport - we loved Marketa, felt very welcome, and despite being regulars in the city, enjoyed her useful Barcelona advice! The apartment itself was brilliant, lovely and spacious, clean and fab central access to the city. We spent lots of time in Born which was no more than a 5 minute walk, but also had the chance to check out more of Barceloneta and the beach from this position which made for a really great trip. The neighbourhood itself, despite the occasional passing moped (standard!) was actually remarkably quiet considering the central location, and well lit. We also had luck on our side with 23C temperatures in the first week of Jan which made for a perfect visit! Thanks again, we would not hesitate to recommend this place or to stay there again in future.

This was a great place, great location, huge rooms, clean apartment. Everything just fit perfectly. Also really great if you're with a big group. We will definitely book this one again on our next trip to Barcelona :)!

We had an excellent stay at Angeles' place in a location you cannot beat in Barcelona. The walk down to the beach only take 5 min and you are in the middle of everything. The rooms were clean and beds were super comfy. There was more than enough space available as the apartment has 4 floors and numerous bathrooms. Thanks again for making our stay in BCN so memorable.
Host was very welcoming and made the process so easy. The place was amazing so nice all modern and clean. Kitchen was full as well. Great for a group of people looking to stay together.

Super schönes Haus in einem tollen Viertel. 
Obwohl wir mitten in der Nacht angekommen sind, wurden wir nett im Empfang genommen und durch das komplette Haus geführt.
Es war alles sehr sauber, die Betten war sehr gut und die Zimmer hell und ausreichend groß.
In der Küche ist alles vorhanden was man so braucht. Bei der Anzahl an Personen die im Haus platz haben, wäre aber eine Spülmaschine nicht verkehrt.
Barceloneta kann ich als Wohngegend nur empfehlen. Auf der einen Seite des sehr urigen Viertels gelangt man direkt zum Hafen, auf der anderen Seite zum Strand.
Und der Placa de Catalunya ist gerade mal 20 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt.
Es gibt viele nette und vor allem von Einheimischen besuchte Lokale in der direkten Umgebung und einen kleinen 'Groß'-markt zum Einkaufen.
Wer mehr Party möchte findet an der Hafenmeile immer etwas.

this location is exceptional, exactly matches the description, the neighborhood is full of bars, close to passaige de borbo ', asseggiata waterfront to Port Vell, near the Barceloneta metro and beautiful walks up the Ramblas from the Mirador de Colom, the house is aredata very well, spacious and clean, equipped of all the ' (Website hidden by Airbnb) room with attached bathroom, large kitchen to eat in gruppo.Noi we were 6 persons instead of 8 as we had planned, and we had available throughout the home. the house is spread over 4 floors where the interior staircase overlook the .Consiglio strongly rooms in groups, there torneremo.Marketa has been very clear in the information and available .Davvero congratulations to Angeles, for us a wonderful stay.
This is a fantastic apartment in an area that is close to the beach and close to the gothic quarter

We had an amazing weekend in Barcelona and this flat really fulfilled all our wishes. Great location, clean, no noise, great interior, nice bathrooms (not all too common in Spain!), and we also felt safe all the time. 
So if you consider having a great time in this awesome city, you are at right adress!

We got a very bad and rude welcome from the host due to her not reading the request properly and expecting less people and then accusing us of providing false information. We were shouted upon with rude behavior at 11pm in the night and not let into the house for a good while with all the kids and luggage just sitting on street. After argument were we allowed in the house and eventually stayed for the couple nights. Very bad experience from start. 
Also the space and house layout was not properly communicate from start and the host had multiple opportunity to realize we were 4 more people that she expected. 
In terms of the house, it is in great location very close to the beach and was clean and well maintained. 
The experience at check in was horrendous and stuck with us for the remainder of our stay and trip.

Everything was perfect.
The girl who assist as to the house was very helpful and friendly.
The house is very big, clean and had everything that we needed.
The location is just perfect, really close to the beach.
Bars, restaurants, super markets, metro station are really close to the house, making our stay easier.
It was the best choice for sure, i suggest it to everyone.
Everything ok. Good location and nice apartment.

This is a great place for a large group to stay. We had a lovely time in the flat and apart from a small issue with some broken furniture (which was quickly resolved) it was a great find. It is a brilliant location with supermarkets, bars, the beach and many other amenities nearby. Thanks very much Angeles!

The apartment and the location are really awesome. Everything was as described and shown on the pictures. 
Marketa gave us a very warm welcome and gave us a lot of tips for the area. 
I can definitely recommend this flat to any guest.
Tolle Unterkunft, nette Schlüsselübergabe, prima Informationsaustausch. Sehr empfehlenswert.

Angeles was very accessible.  Apartment is in good location.  I was not aware that the apartment is four rooms one above another without an area to come together as a family other than the kitchen area.  If you are staying in master bedroom, then it is just fine. I stayed in the room above and the ac did not work and is very small. WIFI very slow or not working and must constantly reset router.

Boendet var över vår förväntan! Lägenheten hade ett väldigt bra läge men i ett lite halvdåligt kvarter. Ca 500 m till stranden och mataffärer och allt annat låg precis utanför dörren, helt perfekt! Vi kommer definitivt åka dit igen!

Kjempebra leilighet å leie hvis man reiser flere sammen. Vi ble møtt av Markreta som var veldig hyggelig og kunne svare på alle spørsmål. Vi var 7 stykk og det var mer enn nok plass. 5 av 7 fikk egen seng. Sengene var gode og airconditionen var enkel å bruke og effektiv. Rommene var rene og ryddige. Gode håndduker. Kjøkkenet hadde alt man trengte. Leilighetens beliggenhet med et par minutters gange til både strand, La Rambla og det gotiske kvartalet var helt fantastisk. Vi var alle enige om at hit kunne vi reise tilbake og bo som dronninger!
Very nice place. We where very happy!

Our host was welcoming however overall we were disappointed in our stay. The house is smaller than expected and is arranged on 4 levels and exhausting hiking all those stairs after a day of exploring Barcelona. The washer is also broken and couldn't be fixed until "after we left". The shower head was also broken, but they did come fix that the next day. The showers are cramped but we did have enough hot water for 8 of us to take quick showers. The linens were well used and rough. I would not recommend staying here. It is affordable but I wish I would have invested a little more money to be more comfortable.

Our host made us feel right at home.  Check in was smooth.  Our host met us at the apratment and showed us each of the floors and discussed the surrounding neghborhood.  

The location is great.  It is near the beach, metro trains and walking distance to many restaurants and tourist sites.  There is also a nice grocery store and fresh food market nearby.

This house has the most perfect location. The owner is very nice. I went with my family of ten people and there were plenty of space for all of us. Two minute walk to the beach and two minute walk to the city. Will definitely come back again!
Great place in perfect location

This apartment is an absolute gem! We were a group of 7 girls on holiday to make the most of Barcelona and this apartment certainly made that possible. Location is great, right next to the beach but super easy to travel further into the city centre. Upon arrival Augusto welcomed us in and was extremely helpful! The apartment is 4 floors so it really felt like everyone has their own space and also enough communal areas for when we did come together. It was very clean and modern. Highly recommend this for any groups visiting Barcelona!!
Had a great time, accommodation is good, clean, Augusto was very welcoming and helpful.

Great building in a fantastic location. Check in was super-easy and accommodated our early arrival. Everything very clean. Communal space is as described - a little limited for large parties, but bedrooms are spacious. Would definitely stay there again.

This place is very clean and near of all accommodations ! 50m you have 2,3 supermarket. 50m you have two of the best tapas restaurant of Barcelona . 
After 5 minutes walk you are at the beach and the port. 15min walk you are at the begin of la rambla.
The host was very kind, he booked a taxi for our return, and explained all the house. 
I recommend this place. It a a good place to visit Barcelona ! 
Thanks a lot

Tuvimos una excelente semana en este departamento, es amplio, limpio y está bien ubicado. 
Angeles y Augusto nos ayudaron con lo que necesitamos y respondieron rápidamente.
Muy recomendado.

My friends and I stayed in Angeles' apartment while we were in Barcelona for a conference, and we had a great time! The apartment was clean and well-located - convenient to access with public transport, making it very easy to go anywhere. As it is close to the beach and to the main attractions, we were able to enjoy our time in Barcelona even though had to work all day.
Angeles and Augusto were very helpful and accommodating, and always responded promptly when we had questions.
We particularly liked the fact that we each had our own space, with separate bedrooms and bathrooms.

The House was very nice and situated in Barceloneta near the beach, Metro and good restaurants. The rooms were spacious and the kitchen perfect for our group (6 people). All the practicalites were taken care of in a very professional way. I highly recommend this house andet its owner.
Angeles was so helpful before arriving. We had such a great stay here!! The location was perfect. I would recommend this house highly. Thank you so much!!

Really great value! Nice and clean appartment on a superb spot in Barcelonetta. You can walk easily to the beach, restaurants, coffee and market are all a few blocks away. Also close to Gothic area. 
Small minor point are the bunk beds and the shower on the second floor.

Very clean apartment in very good location. Had a very friendly welcome which went smoothly. Well worth the cost. Only downside is the wifi is very slow (when working at all) but everything else very good.

I was visiting Barcelona on business with three other colleagues and the apartment was absolutely perfect for what we needed.

The location is great, with easy metro access (Barceloneta) and being extremely close to both the pier, the city centre and,as a consequence, great restaurants, shopping etc.

I would recommend this apartment for any type of visitor (business or pleasure) and you will not be disappointed.

The host (Angeles) and Augusto who let us into the apartment were great and very helpful.
Everything was as expected, good communication welcomed and given a tour of the house, even given a map highlighting local places to see along with good restaurants.
Host was very helpful. Location was great.

Abbiamo soggiornato dal 13 al 16 di ottobre. .....esperienza positiva....Angels molto precisa con gli appuntamenti e sempre pronta ad ogni consiglio. Ci ha accolto Augusto che ci ha fornito una mappa e molti punti di riferimento per muoverci a Barcellona. Noi abbiamo soggiornato un 10 ed è stato perfetto...anche la posizione in cui si trova ti permette di passeggiare sul lungo mare di Barceloneta molto frequentato oppure recarti facilmente sulla Rambla con una passeggiata di 10 (Website hidden by Airbnb) lo consiglio a tutti.....

Werkelijk een perfect huis voor een wat grotere groep reizigers (wij waren met 9 personen).
Iedere verdieping is ruim en biedt de privacy van een eigen badkamer.
Het huis is ook ideaal gelegen in de wijk Barceloneta. Tip: ga in Barceloneta eten en drinken in een van de buurtrestaurantjes, topkwaliteit voor een schappelijke prijs.
De verhuurster Angeles was ook zeer behulpzaam toen we onszelf een keer buitengesloten hadden op een van de verdiepingen, ze heeft toen telefonisch de oplossing doorgegeven.
Al met al een perfect verblijf, we maken graag een volgende keer weer gebruik van dit huis.

The Ceck Inn with Augusto was great, super nice Guy.
The House is big and well equipped. Everything was clean. The Location is perfect, close to the Beach and the City Center. We had a great stay and would come back for sure :)

Cette maison est située au coeur de la Barceloneta, à quelques rues de la plage, des commerces et d'un marché couvert.  Relativement grande pour le quartier, elle est très propre et le ménage est fait pendant le séjour.  La communication avec l'hôte est parfaite.  Les chambres sont bien équipées.  Il manque juste un peu de confort dans la cuisine (four, lave-vaisselle, verres à vin...).  Attention : Barcelone n'aime pas Airbnb et les voisins sont très rapides à accuser sans raison les hôtes de Airbnb.  Nous recommandons cette maison agréable dans un quartier pittoresque de Barcelone.
Piso genial!! Y muy bien colocado, lo aconsejo a todos! Dueños muy amables!

Angeles a pris soin que nous soyons accueillis dès notre arrivée. Notre hôte nous a donné de bons conseils pour visiter la ville et nous a bien orientés pour les détails pratiques (métro, où manger, etc...). Le logement est fonctionnel pour accueillir un groupe. Parfait !
Great place for smaller group!
Bon emplacement, Bon acceuil et très sympa sur les modalités de départ.

Ottima sistemazione per gruppi di persone dai 5 elementi in su. L'appartamento è strutturato su 4 piani ognuno dotato di ingresso autonomo e bagno. Solo quello al piano terra è dotato di cucina e divano letto. Anche se lo stabile è non è proprio di recente costruzione, gli appartamenti che ne sono stati ricavati sono tutti nuovi e ben tenuti. Anche se Angeles non è stata presente al momento del check in (erano passate le 12.00) è stata più che tempestiva nell'inviare una persona che potesse farlo al posto suo.
Un emplacement génial !

We were a group of 5 adults and 3 children aged 8, 10 and 13, and this house was just right for us. Great location, with a couple of very good restaurants near by, a taxi stand at stone's throw, metro station close by, convenience stores around the corner.....really, very easy indeed. We got great tips from the host's friend who showed us in.

Will definitely recommend this to anyone visiting Barcelona.
Good location, friendly host and a very big house

Very close to multiple restaurants. Spacious place, basically 3 apartments in one house. Our host was very helpful and knowledgeable of the surroundings and best places to eat and sightsee. There were 6 of us and we were more than comfortable in this space.

Excelente ubicación, muy recomendable para disfrutar de Barcelona.
Angeles es una anfitriona que no deja nada librado al azar, la propiedad es perfectamente adaptable a viaje en familia ó grupos
Très bien dans un quartier sympa, proche de tout !!

Una casa muy agradable y limpia con mucha independencia y cuatro baños .Muy buena ubicación cerca de cercanías estacion de Francia y cerca del metro también. Buena zona de bares y restaurantes. Muy cerca del mar. Gracias Angeles y Augusto por vuestra hospitalidad y por hacernos la estancia tan increíble.
Un emplacement parfait, une maison idéale pour un séjour entre amis, propre, bonne literie, rien à redire ! Un excellent séjour chez Angeles
Nice location, kitchen fully equipped. There is everything you need. Every room has its bathroom, very comfy

Great place! Clean and well equipped. Easy reach if metro to all areas of Barcelona ( very cheap)! Right by beach and food places. Lovely old Square behind apartment. Rooms excellent. Only wish is for a larger seating area - only a two seater sofa in kitchen, although there are plenty of chairs at the long kitchen table! No oven but has microwave and well equipped kitchen. Lovely place. Lots of stairs so may be difficult for elderly or disabled.

Great position for sightseeing and nightllife, very nice house,spacious and well organised; the neightbours are a little bit too sensible about noise, but we managed anyway.I can really recomend the house
Amazing place to stay! Super clean, tidy and full of all the main essentials. Great location and ideal for tourist locations
séjour parfait, à recommander !
Clean, cozy and conviniently located in Barcelonetta. During the daytime it's a bit noisy due to narrow streets proximity but not an issue after ten pm. 6 of us enjoyed our week stay.
Je recommande..

I have been to Nice several times and this apartment is the best location you could wish for.
Modern and clean.
Everything was fine on arrival.
I would certainly recommend this apartment to get a good and comfortable stay in Nice.
Estancia genial!!
Très bon emplacement. Logement propre. Nous sommes arrivés tardivement avec un accueil chaleureux et sympathique
The apartment is 4-stories which gave us lots of space. Cool old school neighborhood too and just a 5-10m walk to the main beach in Barcelona. Lots of restaurants in the area.
El lugar es amazing , súper súper limpio mis amigas encaradas , cerca de todo , restaurantes , taxis , buses , metro , lo recomiendo de corazón , quede enamorada gracias Angeles
Absolutely a pleasure! Big house that was centrally located in Barceloneta. Just a few minutes from the Subway, but we were able to walk to almost everything. Highly recommend to the family traveler.

Excellent & accurate communication, great location, perfect for our family of 6 people
Thanks to Angel and team

Great location, within walking distance of a number of restaurants, and bus stops.
Everything was clean, and plenty of privacy for everyone.
The beds were very comfortable.
A great house near the beach, the harbor and nice restaurants. Perfect for two families with children!

Angeles' place is in a great location and close to all transport links so getting around the city is easy. In 5 days we managed to do most of the sights. Neighbourhood was safe with lots of supermarkets and restaurants close by. Apartment was spacious and best of all, plenty of bathrooms. A highly recommended place to stay and would definitely try to stay there again on any future visits.

Thanks for being such a great host. Apartment was great and very spacious since we were only 4 guests. Would definitely book this one again!.

10/10
Grande maison idéale pour les groupes, très bien située (moins de 10 minutes à pied de la plage !). Logement conforme à la description, rien à redire sur la propreté.

This property is in an awesome location, we couldn't have asked to in a better place. A 5-10 minute walk to the beach, 5 minutes from the marina. It is also great if you want the hustle and bustle of being on the main road leading to the beach, and also the quite, quaint area behind it all. The quiet area behind the main road, had a host of local bars and restaurants that were mainly used by locals, and not filled with tourists. The property is to a great standard and all you could ask for on a short or longer break. The road was a little noisy, but nothing major. Angeles, the host was super responsive through the whole process and would highly recommend this as your next option when visiting Barcelona. All in all our stay was awesome! Thank you Angeles!
Central location and great for our group.
Underbar lägenhet med många badrum vilket är ett stort plus. 5 minuter till stranden och bra läge överlag. Perfekt helt enkelt!
Angeles place is really nice and great value
Perfect location, very clean, highly recommend
Best location and best place in BCN
For a group of young girls, this was amazing. Perfect location, right by the ocean and not a far walk from the clubs at all. Was perfect for holding as many girls as we were.
El apartamento es una finca entera y la verdad es q es muy cómodo y muy bien ubicado. Hemos dormido muy bien y la comunicación con Angeles ha sido muy fluida.
Wir waren ein paar Nächte in der Wohnung und wir haben es sehr genossen. Es ist eine tolle Wohnung die ich gerne weiterempfehle.

This place is perfect for a large group traveling together!  Angeles was very good at communicating and had someone meet us to give us keys and instructions.  The place is a four flat....large comfortable kitchen and a full bathroom on the walk in Street level.  Another large bedroom on second floor with full size bed and full bathroom.  Lots of closet space and a pull out twin.  Go up another flight to the third floor for another bedroom with a full bed and full bathroom, plus another room with 2 twin bunk beds.  From here take another flight to the final room with room for 3 to sleep plus another full bathroom.  Very clean, convenient to shops, restaurants and a short walk to Barceloneta Beach and the harbor.  Nice linens, towels, blow dryers Nd air conditioned.  No beach towels so either bring your own or a beach blanket (they also sell these on the each for 20€. ).
Perfect Location and a very nice apartment for a friendly stay !

Gutes kompaktes Haus in zentraler Lage zum Hafen, Metro, Bars und Nightlife. 
Sauber und ordentliche IKEA Einrichtung ohne Abnutzungserscheinungen.
Klare Empfehlung wer über das Wochenende eine einfache Unterkunft für bis zu 8 Personen sucht.
Ótima estadia

Very nice stay and a great location.  The kids loved going to the beach after a long day of touring.  Just be sure to ask the host directions to the beach before they leave.  There is no information or maps in the apartment but markets, restaurants, metro are all within walking distance once you get your bearings.

Angeles's was not available to meet us upon arrival and our host kept 9 of us waiting for 20 minutes outside on the narrow sidewalk with our luggage in the heat; even though we called him an hour before when we arrived at the train station.  That was not a great introduction and we were nervous we were not in the correct location.  However, Angeles was great communicating before and during our stay.  

The kitchen does not have an oven but does have a two burner stove top and microwave.  We mainly ate pasta while there so it worked out fine.  The stairs do get a bit tiring but for the size of our group, the privacy it provided and the apartment location, it worked out fine.  One bath and hand towel is allotted per person for the length of stay so you need to buy/bring beach towels.  There is no dryer so you really need to plan when washing towels.  The washer takes about 2 hours for a cycle and drying time is a day on the drying rack.  

Overall, a nice stay!
Good location and communication but there were some problems with the naighbours
Great location close to Barceloneta beach. Clean and well equipped apartment. Perfect for a large group

This place is amazing. Great location, and very attentive host. I would highly recommend it. Close to the beach and all other tourist attractions.
Lots of great food around as well.

God plassering i byen i forhold til serverdigheter og strand. Fint for venner.  Skulle gjerne hatt en uteplass/terrasse, da eneste mulighet for å samles var på kjøkken på gatenivå. Men det var flere restauranter i område , hvor man kan sitte ute. Alt i alt meget godt fornøyd.

This is a wonderful, large, flat central to everything you could possibly want in Barceloneta! Has everything you need and can sleep a very large group. Angeles was very easy to work with. Would love to stay here again.

A bunch of friends and I spend three nights at Angeles's place, and it's great in every way. The location is amazing, right in the middle of La Barceloneta, in walking distance to the old town as well as the beach.

The place was clean, and the neighborhood was reasonably quiet at night.

Tips for the neighborhood:
- Tapas at Bar Bitácora were our favorites, it's just around the corner.
- The bread and pastries at Forn Baluard were amazing. Perfect for any meal, and the bread goes incredibly well with good serrano or jamon.

Alloggio molto carino ed accogliente, super consigliato sia per l'ottima ospitalità avuta da Angeles sia per l'ottima posizione, a pochi passi dal mare e vicinissimo alla Metro :-) 
Provare per credere!!!

Das Haus befindet sich Nahe dem Hafen in sehr zentraler Lage. Alles ist mit dem öffentlichen Nahverkehr oder zu Fuß erreichbar. 

Insgesamt ist alles in einem sehr guten Zustand. Lediglich geringe Abnutzungen an den Wänden. 

Nette und unkomplizierte Kommunikation mit Augusto.

If you going to Barcelona for the beach this is the right place to be! 
The apartment was really nice

Die Unterkunft ist zentral zwischen Strand und Altstadt gelegen. Wir wurden total freundlich durch Augusto begrüßt. Er hat uns die Unterkunft gezeigt und noch einige nützliche Tipps zur Umgebung gegeben. Die Unterkunft ist sauber und gut ausgestattet.

The apartment was as advertised.  It worked out great for the 6 of us.  We stayed four nights.  The location is great.  Walking distance to the beach, to the hop-on hop-off buses, and the subway.  Plenty of bars and restaurants in the area.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and our visit of Barcelona.  I recommend this apartment.

This lovely house is situated in the heart of the old town, Barceloneta. It is less than 5 minutes walk from the marina and from the beach, both of which have great bars and restaurants. La Ramba is a half hour walk away, but a taxi costs just €7 and will have you there in five minutes. There are bars, restaurants and small supermarkets in the old town itself.
The house is made up of 3 separate units plus a large kitchen and bathroom on the ground floor. The first floor has a good sized double bedroom and ensuite bathroom. The second floor has the same layout as the first, but also has an additional door off the landing. This leads into a large living room with a bunk bed and balcony and a staircase to the third floor. The third floor has a large lounge with a single bed and balcony, plus doors leading to another double bedroom and a bathroom with a washing machine.
The house was spotlessly clean with plenty of towels and all the beds had new sheets and bedspreads. There were extra blankets should you need them, but we didn't. All areas have their own air conditioning and heating. The kitchen has all the crockery and utensils you could need, large fridge with freezer compartment, electric hob and oven and microwave.

When we go back to Barcelona this will be the place we would want to stay again.

Angeles' location is conveniently located near shopping, groceries, and lots of restaurants in a vibrant part of town.  Check in was easy, check out a breeze but hard for me personally as I fell in love with the city during my stay.  Would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends and family.
Great place for large groups. Its an entire building with a double room and bathroom on each floor. Highly recommend. Thank you!

Great place! It was perfect for our group. Close to the beach and anywhere further we caught the public transport or walked which was easy. Was a great base for us and there was plenty of space. Having 4 bathrooms was a bonus. Host was friendly and helpful. Would stay again and recommend. Thank you.
Le logement est très bien situé et bien aménagé . Nous avons pu nous déplacer très facilement dans la ville avec les différents moyens de transports.A recommander
Thank you for a lovely weekend! We enjoyed getting out and about and see this beautiful city! Thanks for being so kind and letting us stay!
Great place in a great neighboorhood. The rooms were large, all have their own bathroom, a comfy bed. Restaurants, supermarket, taxi's and the beach were all very close.
非常干净,非常安静,位置好,离海滩近,早上起来跑步去沙滩也方便,入住方便,可住十人,有四个卫生间,这个非常好｡还会推荐给朋友
Perfect location, had a lot of fun in Barcelona, definitely recommend :)
Gran estancia, ideal para un grupo de amigos. Buena ubicacion, veracidad, comunicacion y limpieza. Altamente recomendable
Très bon appartement, bien placé.
The place was wonderful, perfect rooms, clean, well situated next to the beach, close to shops and restaurants, really close to the metro station. This is definately your place!
amazing location. practical house.
Este lugar para viajar en grupos es excelente. La localización es de las mejores, cerca de muchos lugares para comer y “walking distance” de muchos lugares por ver.

Angeles place is great if you are looking for a larger place with a central location. The flat is located in the heart of Barceloneta, and the walk to all the main sights was a very easy distance. The place was perfect for a group of 10 of us and we all slept very comfortably. The only struggle we had was with the wifi but it was very trivial because we were out and about! Thanks for the great stay!

Appartement très propre, bien équipé et très bien situé. 
Appartement idéal pour une grande famille ou un moment entre amis!
Angeles et Augusto ont été aux petits soins pour nous. Ils ont su répondre à nos attentes et questions quand nous en avons eu besoin.
Appartement que je recommande sans aucun doute!!!
Merci pour tout!

A lovely and very clean... It was better than hotels I've stopped in.. It's so close to the beech and caters for everything, lovely restaurants, everything you need to explore... Everything was walking distance...
The host canceled this reservation 488 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I really enjoyed Angeles place. It was big enough for my all of my family and friends. 4 floors all to ourselves. 
It was very local to everything. 5-10min walk to the beach, las ramblas, and other fun areas. 
I totally would recommend this place to anyone.
War super.
Lots of space, good location and value.
Apartment was clean, comfortable and in a good location. Angeles was helpful. Thanks.
We had a very good stay at Angeles! The house is perfectly located, very convenient for large groups and Angeles shared great tips about Barcelona. It has been a pleasure

The stay was very nice and comfortable! The house is spacious with enough showers and bathrooms for 6 or more people. The location is super central with all shopping possibilities. The hosts are very polite and friendly and are helpful throughout the stay! Definitely would recommend for anyone and for my own next visit as well!

Fabulous location within walking distance to lots of restaurants, the marina, the beach and the metro.  The apartment has everything you need and ample space and facilities for lots of people! Highly recommended - Cannot fault at all.
We had 2 families (ten total) and the bed spaces worked out great. Very walkable to many restaurants/cafes and sights!

A good fit for our group of six adults and a child with room to spare.  Communication was prompt and helpful.  Wonderful location a few blocks from the water.  Lots of stairs, but we didn't find it to be a problem.

L'appartamento è in una posizione fantastica, a due passi dalla fermata di Barceloneta, vicinissima al mare, al Born, al barrio Gotico e anche al Parc de La Ciutadella. Camere spaziose, letti molto comodi, arredate con gusto e con tutto il necessario. Zona silenziosa, ma servitissima allo stesso tempo. 
Noi viaggiavamo con bambini piccoli e Angeles è stata molto gentile nel farci trovare un seggiolone e un lettino da campeggio. 
Assolutamente consigliato, ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo.
The house is as described. Everything you need is provided. The communication goes easy. Baceloneta is a great place to stay, right in between the old city and the sea.

Great apartment with plenty of space for our 7 people (and we could have fit more). A quick 15 or so minute walk to all the places we wanted to see - La Rambla, Casa Batllo, Casa Mila, Sagrada Familia, The Gothic Quarter... or easy to access an Uber or Taxi. Great restaurants right nearby. Angeles was quick to respond to all my questions as well. Great stay!

The host is communicative and easy to reach. The building has several rooms divided on 4 floors with the kitchen on the bottom. It was a good setup for me and my friends but of course optimal had been if it was many rooms on the same floor. We used the building mainly for used  sleep over since there is no good hangout area like a terrace (small  balconies only) - only a kitchen with hard to reach sunshine. Overall: I highly recommend the building for bigger groups who wants to have a cleen and central place to sleepover at.

The house is situated in the perfect place when you want to explore Barcelona and enjoy the beach.
Angeles made sure everything was sorted and thought of additional things like shampoo is the showers.

This place was fantastic.  We stayed with two families with infants and three single adults and there was enough space for all of us to have our own little spaces and then to convene in the communal kitchen.  Barceloneta is a fantastic neighborhood, lots of restaurants, close to the beach and the metro.  This is great for a bigger group that would benefit from some private spaces for individuals or families.  There is a high-chair and porta-crib which was wonderful for our 9 month old.
Location location location!   Lots of space for extended family or group of friends.  Also lots of stairs but the multiple sleeping options great bonus.  Nice balconies and 4 full bathrooms great
Perfect appartement in an absolutely perfect location. The owner was very kind and helpful. We had the BEST stay and would love to go back!

This appartment is rather basic, nothing fancy. Each room is on a seperate floor. It sufficed, was clean, communication was about the best we ever had in Barcelona. It is a matter of taste but for us the location was great.
This property is perfectly located in the seaside area with access to everything you could want. Modern well appointed property with heaps of room for our 2 families of 10 people.
Perfect accomondation gor big groups or familys. Superb location close to the beach

Angeles is incredibly helpful, quick to respond and beyond that her space is amazing.  It was very spacious, high quality, safe and only about a 5min walk to the Barceloneta metro.  There are plenty of things to explore within a short walking distance and comfortable to lounge around in if you don't want to go out.  Each floor is a different room, so do be prepared for stairs (kitchen on the ground level, then  4 more floors beyond).  Would absolutely stay here again!

The apartment is in a great location, close to many restaurants, the beach, and the metro. It was a great space for our group, having a washing machine was very nice. The apartment is spread over 4 levels, so there are a fair amount of stairs, but no trouble for us. Communication was fast and easy. I would recommend staying here.
Great location and beautiful big house.

Ich schreibe eigentlich keine Bewertungen, aber dieses Mal muss ich einfach :) 
Ich kann das Haus wirklich nur empfehlen! 
Wir waren aufgrund eines Junggesellinnenabschieds von Freitag bis Montag in Barcelona und waren 8 Mädels - die ideale Größe für dieses Haus. Wie in der Beschreibung mitgeteilt, sollte man allerdings ab 22:30Uhr wirklich leise sein. Das haben wir bemerkt, als 3 Mädels abends vor der Tür eine rauchen waren und sich unterhalten haben, da haben sofort die Nachbarn an die Wand geklopft - man darf aber auch in der Küche/Aufenthaltsraum rauchen. Ansonsten waren wir abends/nachts nicht im Haus, sondern feiern ;-) 
Der Kontakt mit der Gastgeberin war sehr freundlich. Auch der Check-In sowie Check-out war einfach und unkompliziert! Das Haus ist sehr sauber und hat an Ausstattung einfach alles, was man benötigt. Die Lage ist top...der Strand, sowie Supermarkt und Restaurants/Bars sind um die Ecke. Ich würde die Unterkunft sofort wieder buchen!
Great location.
Perfecta localización, y gran equipación del alojamiento

The location couldn’t have been better for us! Only a 5-10 min walk to the beach & metro, and very close to local markets and many restaurants. The space is well equipped for cooking on the main level, next level up is the master suite with fold out couch, followed by floor with 2 rooms (1 with bunk beds and the other with double bed), top floor includes 2 rooms (1 twin and 1 double)- each level has full bath. There are 3 sets of keys available for the house, each set including main door key plus individual room key. There is not a safe present on-site, but still your passports & cash are safer here than on your body. Pick-pocketing is a HUGE problem in this city!

We were 9 girls and had I nice stay at Angeles apartment. The apartment is close to the beach, about 5-10 mi walk, and also really close to grocery shops. 20 minutes walk to the shopping street Las Ramblas, or you can take the metro situated 200 meters from the house, for 5 minutes. The apartment is perfect for 3 families who wants to stay together, or a group of friends. There is no living room in the apartment, but that was not really a big problem, because there was a big table in the kitchen. The neighbors were really sensitive the first day, because 9 girls living together make a lot of noise, but after a conversation with angeles everything went fine, and we didn't here more from the neighbors. So if you want to be noisy after 22.30, this apartment is not for you. The best thing about the stay was the easy communication with angeles. She answers fast, and does not hesitate to help you.

Realmente nos decepcionó el trato brindado por la anfitriona, siempre se contactó solamente a través de mensajes de la aplicación, que tardan demasiado en llegar y dificultan la comunicación. No nos permitió ingresar al alojamiento hasta las 11 PM que estuvimos los 9 huéspedes, violando las normas de Airbnb y lo pactado en la publicación. En ningún lugar aclara como norma de la casa que tienen que estar todos los huéspedes para ingresar, y además por ingresar a esa hora nos cobro 30€ que tampoco estaban establecidos.
Respecto del alojamiento es lo que se muestra, pero el trato y la veracidad de la publicación dejan mucho que desear. La empleada que nos recibió nos dijo a las 11 PM que si no nos gustaba pagar los 30€ nos vayamos, ademas nos hizo firmar un contrato que decía que el check out era a las 11 PM, y nosotros pensando que coincidía con el horario de entrada nos quedamos tranquilos, el día de finalización del alojamiento la anfitriona nos dijo que había sido un error y nos obligó a retirarnos 11 AM a pesar de tener un contrato redactado y firmado por ella. Realmente el trato fue inaceptable y pediremos el reembolso de lo pagado indebidamente.
awesome
Great place to stay, amazing town house which gives a real feel into authentic Barcelona life, some great local restaurants and bakery’s, definitely would recommend!

I stayed here with a group of 8 others and we really enjoyed it. It's in a really great location--very close to the beach and the metro, but also quiet. Every floor has a bathroom with shower so that was amazing for such a big group, as well as having a washing machine. Do note that the top floor bedroom doesn't have air conditioning and that 5 people are living almost railroad style (you need to go through the room with the bunk beds to access the staircase for the rooms with the queen bed and single bed). I would stay here again!
Great location.   no noise due to neighbours.  3 sets of keys.   3 stories.... lots of stairs.

Hard to imagine a better location. A short stroll to the beach, the beautiful plazas of El Born and Gothic, the city park, the marina, the list goes on. We really enjoyed the space, it was very clean and comfortable and the communication was excellent. Thoroughly recommended.

Amazing location! Residential feel. Great privacy if traveling with large group. Separate “apartments” in one large home. 

Only downside is that there is no living room/common area, only a kitchen fo gathering.
Great place and location!
Great
We had a group of seven.  Had plenty of beds.  It was very clean and the location is in beach area which was good.  All worked out very well.  Absolutely recommend it.
Very clean and homely accommodation for us and our kids with all the amenities we needed. Great location too.
Top localisation, proprete exemplaire et communication tres facile!
Great place for groups or large families.  Centrally located, comfortable, clean, lots of restaurants, stores, walking distance to the beach and to a local market.  Great host.  Highly recommend.
This place was great and very close to the city center. We loved how much space we had, the separate rooms, and the fact that every room had a shower. I definitely recommend this place.
Gran alojamiento en pleno barrio de la barceloneta, impecable y muy bien amueblado
it is great  of  convenient transportation and clean room.

Host was great!!! PERFECT LOCATION for shops, restaurants, market, transport, safe pay parking, friendly neighborhood, adequate space for 8 adults and one child, very clean and secure apartment, properly maintained , lay out of home was well thought of. Looking forward to stay at Angeles place over and over again. THANK YOU ANGELES FOR MAKING OUR BARCELONA EXPERIENCE EXTREMELY MEMORABLE!!!

Location is outstanding. Quiet street but close to the best of Barcelona. Shopping for everything you may need just steps away. Same for great places to eat and drink.  Walking to points of interest is very easy and public transportation is close by. Plenty of space in the building, clean, nicely remodeled. A full bathroom on every floor! Would stay there again.
Great location. Will have to return for a longer trip. Close to shops, markets marina and beach.

A nice accommodation in a great environment. The communication was great and the answers very fast.
Only the WiFi could be better.

Ideal location, great house with excellent equipment.
Very nice welcome from the host following good communication and we appreciated all the valuable advice regarding things to do, places to visit or to go out.
I strongly recommand Angeles and her full house appartment.

Amazing location- but weird layout and cold rooms.
Won’t be back.
Great place, centrally located!

name: Best location 1 bed apt + sun room
summary: Our cozy and huge 1 bedroom apartment plus a sunroom is located in the heart of Bondi Beach. 3 minutes walk to the beach, in the middle of the shops and cafes of North Bondi and 50 metres from the bus stop. Feel and experience the true Bondi Beach.
description: Our cozy and huge 1 bedroom apartment plus a sunroom is located in the heart of Bondi Beach. 3 minutes walk to the beach, in the middle of the shops and cafes of North Bondi and 50 metres from the bus stop. Feel and experience the true Bondi Beach.

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: Easy going who loves travelling.

reviews.comments: Overall a great stay! Central location made it easy to get everywhere. Unfortunately it was quite loud from neighboring streets and rooms

The emails with Javier and then contact and meeting with his friend, who gave us the keys, was very friendly. That was probably the best part of our stay in this flat. It does not meet the quality and standards that we have enjoyed from other flats on airbnb, whose customer service responded quickly and helped us relocate.

The photos of the flat are misleading: some furniture (like the two tables) has disappeared or been moved, some has been replaced, the two main blinds are broken, as is the shower-head holder - all in all resulting in a much less friendly and less practical feeling.
 
Besides that, we found there to be a general feel of neglect: though the flat had been cleaned before we arrived, we had to bleach the bath tub twice and scrub it to make it look not disgustingly grimy. At least its cleaner now ... The shower curtain was mouldy, and there was an unpleasant smell from the kitchen cabinets.

Finally, as the previous guest described in his comment - unfortunately posted after our booking - the neighbours are very very loud: they partied for three nights in a row until 4am, their front doors open to the corridor. We know Bondi Beach is a party place, but didn't expect it inside a residential building, and at this price for the flat.

Javier's apartment was perfect. The location was incredibly convenient, quiet and tranquil and beautifully furnished. The apartment was clean and inviting and provided a perfect Bondi base for my stay.
Buena estadía

We had a great stay at Javier's apartment! The location was ideal- so close to the beach and town. The flat was spacious and homely and perfect for our Christmas stay :). The bed was very comfy and kitchen had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend Javier's apartment!

We had the most amazing time at the lovely home of Javier! They made us feel like we were just at home and it was so central we could reach everything in 5 minutes. Eventhough we were a little late you guys were so laid back and easy going that we experienced the surfinglife exactly like it is. Thank you guys so much for everything! It  was such a blast to stay at yours!!!!
nice place! (bit humid) awesome neighbourhood! we had a really good time in Bondi and this apartment made it complete

Fantastic location, great place, a few bumps. The apartment was very clean, very comfortable, in a great neighborhood.  Javier was not in town but contacted me via email to make sure all was ok when I arrived.  I had originally booked a different place but it was cancelled last minute so I was lucky to find Javier's place.  Unfortunately, I was driving and did not have time to verify the parking situation.  Javier tried to offer ideas, but in reality I was stuck paying for parking whenever I was at the apartment on either a 1-hour or 2-hour meter.  Pricey and inconvenient!  If you are not driving, you'll really enjoy the chill apartment and great neighborhood.
Very welcome, easy going and good to communicate with

The unit was exactly as described. Was walking distance to everything we needed. Javier gave us tips on free parking which was only a 5 minute walk and easy to find. Communication was great with quick responses to any questions asked. We had our son with us which the sofa bed was fine
for. Would stay here again.
Fantastic location in the heart of Bondi and very friendly host!

name: OCEANFRONT - TOP FLOOR - SUNSETS - VIEWS - PRIVATE
summary: ***CONSTRUCTION SPECIAL JUNE THRU OCTOB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) /NIGHT*** PERFECT DEAL FOR THOSE GUESTS THAT WILL BE OUT EXPLORING THE ISLAND AND BEACHES DURING THE DAY! Kahana Reef is scheduling repair work to the seawall during SUMMER daytime hours. Construction will be Mon-Fri 8am - 5pm, with heavy construction starting after 9am. The work will require heavy machinery which may be loud and disruptive during your stay. The lawn and pool may be inaccessible.
space: Our “Maui Getaway” is located in a very peaceful setting on the top floor of an oceanfront condominium complex. Relaxing on our private lanai enjoying some Kona coffee is the perfect way to start your day. You never know what you will see while watching the ocean reef from here: humpback whales during the winter season, dolphins, turtles, eagle rays, and possibly a Hawaiian monk seal, which is a very rare site. This is also an ideal spot to enjoy the sunset over the island of Lanai or simply sit back and watch the kayakers, snorkelers, swimmers, and sometimes even surfers. Kahana Reef has an oceanfront pool just down the sidewalk and 2 Jenn-Air gas grills by the lawn. There are elevators either direction from our unit for easy access to the top (4th) floor. There is a laundry room onsite with 6 washers & dryers.  If you are looking for a quiet haven or a romantic escape this is it! The sound of the waves and the gentle breeze of the trade winds are sure to lull you asleep at night.  Th
