This is also an ideal spot to enjoy the sunset over the island of Lanai or simply sit back and watch the kayakers
neighborhood_overview: Kahana Reef is an oceanfront complex on the west side of Maui.
transit: The Maui Bus has a stop walking distance from the condo.
interaction: I am available via cell phone at any time by cal (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) . I do not live on the island currently but have a management company available 24/7.
house_rules: •This is a non-smoking unit including the lanai. Hawaii Law prohibits smoking in all enclosed or partially enclosed areas open to the public. •This resort allows one unassigned parking space per unit. •Your rate does not include interim maid service or beach towels unless you make arrangements when booking. •Check in time is not before 3 PM. Check out time is no later than 11 AM. •This condominium does not have air conditioning. •The proprietors are not liable for damages and/or injuries incurred during your visit.

host.host_about: Aloha ... I lived on Maui in the 90's and fell in love with the island. I currently live in Colorado and like to hike, camp, and be in the great outdoors. My condo in Kahana is truly oceanfront ... I love listening to the ocean at night.

reviews.comments: Sue was prompt, helpful and altogether wonderful. He place is perfect for two a little tighter squeeze for 4.  The sunsets were amazing and the fourth floor offers a great view of the ocean.  I highly recommend this condo and for the price you can't beat it.

What a great place to stay!  Went here for a sunny getaway, and loved both the location and the condo.

There was a very short drive to some of the nearby beaches, and being able to watch a beautiful sunset over the ocean from the balcony was a definite plus.  

Other nice things: 
    - Reserved parking at the condo
    - Sue has the place fully stocked with cooking/grilling utensils, plenty of assorted kitchenware, a coffee machine, and all other things to make this a home away from home.
    - There were occasionally sea turtle guests swimming around in front of the condo
    - One of the top rated chinese restaurants is directly across the street

Unfortunately, there were some insects that had made their way into the apartment, which I suppose is fairly common in tropical environments.  

Sue responded in a very timely manner any time we contacted her, and was a pleasure to work with.

We had a lovely, relaxing time in this condo, all things considered. :)

This was a very pleasant stay. Sue was very easy to interact with and prompt in responding. It made our trip very easy.

We stayed for 6 nights in the condo, and it was very pleasant. The space was clean, laundry on site, and fast internet, yay! The kitchen has everything you need, the view was great, and we felt safe in the neighborhood. We spent most of our time in Lahaina, and the condo is situated in a very convenient location with onsite parking. It is a few blocks from a great little coffee shop, a convenience store, and a few places to eat. 

Oh, and while there's direct beach access from the property (just down a few steps), it seems to be better for things like kayaking or taking a paddle board out, not so good for sunbathing/swimming. (But there are deck chairs to sunning on the patio and near the pool).

The space is perfect for two people, perhaps a little tight for three. But we'll be booking with Sue if we can the next time we head out there. 

And one last thing to note: there's a DVD player! Whoot! We didn't find anything we wanted to watch at the redbox around the corner, but perhaps bring some favorites?

Excellent location close to shopping and restaurants. The Maui Brewing company is within walking distance. We went there almost every day. The cries were terrific and breathtaking, the condo was fully equipped, even a few cold beers in the fridge when we arrived. The bed was comfortable and the living spaces were great. WiFi was a bit slow and iffy. No Wifi access in the bedroom :( Parking was easy and elevator helped a lot. There were coolers of all sizes, two beach chairs and one snorkel mask that worked. We loved the location on the island. Very close to Napili Bay! Overall a wonderful experience and we would recommend the place for anyone wanting a home away from home feel and views of the beautiful ocean.

The condo is great and has everything and anything you would need.  Sue has supplied a kitchen with anything you will need for cooking and baking.  She also has supplies to take out to beach like chairs, cushions, and paddle boards. And she was very accommodating.  

We loved the location!  We made sure to have breakfast and lunch on the balcony to see beautiful scenery.  Make sure you see sunsets...great place to see it with comfort.  The only thing I didn't like is that the beach isn't downstairs but that didn't really affect us as we weren't there for too long.  Either way, I would book again!!

What a great spot! We really enjoyed Sue's place! The view was incredible, the location was convenient, and the condo was well stocked. Every morning we were able to walk to a good local coffee shop. Also within easy walking distance was a convenience store with a decent amount of groceries and an inexpensive place to rent snorkel gear. The sunsets were beautiful and the facility was very quiet (which we liked). 

Two minor things. One is that there wasn't a lot of information in the condo (ie checkout procedures, location of trash & recycling, etc.) Also, there were no beach towels, which wouldn't have been an issue at all if we had been able to get clean towels during our stay. But instead we were using our bath towels at the beach, and they get pretty sandy and dirty quickly that way. But really, this was a very minor issue. 

We would definitely recommend this to others (probably parties of 2 but no more) and hope that one day we can come back! Sue gave us lots of great beach gear including chairs, coolers, ice packs, boogie boards and beach mats. All very much appreciated! 

thank you so much for making our Christmas stay such a delight!

This was the best place we stayed our whole trip! The view was amazing, the apartment was beautiful, clean and had all the right little things you need while traveling. The bed was really comfy, you can see whales from the balcony! and it just really felt like home. We HIGHLY recommend anyone staying here! You will love it!

By far the best place I stayed on my trip to Hawaii which included three Airbnb spots!  This place is right next to the ocean.  The grounds lead to a beach which had maybe two other couples on it when I went out to snorkel.  Very secluded.  Sea turtles were feeding and swimming around every day right by the stone wall that surrounded the grounds.  The view from the lanai (balcony) is breathtaking.  You see two of the other Hawaiian islands right there.  The place itself was very clean and has a full kitchen, so you can cook sometimes instead of eating out every day.  Sue was an amazing host.  Very communicative and responsive to any questions.  No surprises!

Nothing but comfort. Everything about the condo was great. From the amazing view to the comfortable bed, all was enjoyed by my wife and me. It had it all. Even things we didn't know we'd need were there. Cooler, binoculars, wine opener, etc. Thank you. Now if we could only get out of this aging hotel in Kona and go back.

Sue was very accessible and helpful throughout the process. I highly recommend renting properties from Sue in the future and plan to do so myself. This particular apartment was AMAZING and even better than described! Sleeping each night listening to the ocean was heaven, and the views of the ocean were spectacular. 

The neighborhood itself had everything I needed within walking distance (There's even a great Chinese restaurant directly across the apartment complex itself). And having spent the last seven years in New York City, I wasn't used to just how nice everyone was! :-) 

I fell in love with everything about Maui that I'm actually attempting to move there by summer's end. Do yourself a favor and stay at Sue's place. You WILL NOT be disappointed!

This is an excellent condo in a fabulous location.  We had a great time and would certainly stay here again.  The view is awesome, we saw rainbows every morning and turtles swimming by regularly.  There is no AC but even though it was July we did not miss it at all.  There is good cross-ventilation and a steady breeze, and ceiling fans in the living area and bedroom.  The complex is very friendly and we had several nice conversations with the residents.  We made good use of the Jenn-air grills, cooking up steaks and burgers from the Safeway down the road in Lahaina and watching the sunset over dinner.  The pool is on the small side but spotlessly clean and refreshing.  The groundskeepers do an excellent job maintaining the place.  Parking was easy and convenient.  There is a little swimming beach right next door.  There were a number of nice touches provided, including a couple of beach chairs and boogie boards.  The convertible sofa was comfortable for sleeping to the sound of the waves.  There is a TV and DVD player but no stereo to plug your music into.  While we were here we went to the Wednesday night Slack Key Guitar show at the Napili Kai just up the road and really enjoyed that.  Our only problem was a minor one, the wifi, which was extremely slow.  Like dial-up speed.  I ended up using data on my phone as that was much faster (fortunately there is good coverage from AT&T).

Overall this is an outstanding rental at a good price, the best place we have rented on Airbnb.
Sue's communication & instructions were great. No problems.

Decent place with outstanding view.  Spent much time on the lanai. Sue is a good communicator with routine information.  We didn't need to contact her for anything else.  Was a comfortable stay despite not having air conditioning.  Place was very quiet and can walk to small strip mall. Sandy beach access, which we didn't discover until later, was just  2 buildings to the South.  Clean, with everything you need for the week.

Sue's place was the perfect getaway for us! Two girlfriends and I decided on a last minute trip, and Sue's place worked out perfectly. She had absolutely everything we needed and it was in a great location. If I head back to Maui any time soon, I will definitely be looking into Sue's place again.

My husband and I loved staying at Sue's condo.  We fell asleep each night to the soothing sound of the ocean.  Everything we needed was in the apartment, from beach chairs to a bathroom night light to a coffee pot.  Best of all, you can't beat the patio where you can sit and have your coffee each morning, peacefully watching the waves roll in.

There was a small beach right next to the condo, but we did not spend much time there.  We had a rental car and traveled to other beaches.  Only 10 minutes from downtown Lahaina and we spent each night exploring the charming shops alongside the tourist traps.

Bring your own beach towels.  I forgot to bring them, but we bought a couple cheap at the local supermarket.

Checking in and out was as easy as can be.  There was a key waiting in a lockbox for us when we arrived and we just left the house keys on the kitchen table and locked up when we left.  Never had a problem, so did not have to contact Sue or the property manager during our visit.

We would definitely stay here again.

Beautiful place, great location. It's truly an ocean front view from the balcony. Close to everything and great food nearby. The sound of the ocean everyday was extremely soothing. The condo comes with everything that you need from cooking utensils to beach supplies. Sue was a great host, we'd absolutely stay here again when visiting Maui. Thank you Sue!

My wife and I spent a week here on our honeymoon. Everything was perfect for us. The view off the Lanai is amazing. She had chairs and other beach gear on the deck for our use which was cool. The kitchen was well stocked with any and all utensils. There is a bbq right on the ocean outside on the main floor which was awesome. The California king bed was very comfy. We will return here for sure!

We enjoyed staying at the condo. It was clean and had things we needed.

We enjoyed having breakfast and watching the ocean, definitely romantic.

Not having AC was a bummer since it was so hot when we got there but having the windows and sliding door open really helped cool it down at night. I would recommend another fan for summer to help with the heat. 

The beach gear was pretty worn out (one chair was torn up and not useable, the other had stuck zippers so we didn't use either).

It was not clear how to get beach towels so we bought one. If there were ones in the complex, there were not any instructions on where to get them. Since they are not provided, having suggestions/instructions for guests would be helpful.

The upgraded large 4K TV was nice and we watched TV at night.

Overall it was a good experience.
Overall experience was enjoyable, and I would recommend this listing to others. The host was accommodating, and the property is very close to the ocean.

Kahana Reef was absolutely amazing! This 4th floor condo, with beach views to die for, was the perfect setting for our honeymoon. We had everything we needed for trips to the beach! Towels, chairs, noodles, boogie boards, coolers, wet suits and snorkel gear. But if your an avid snorkel, we recommend renting from boss frogs. Having no AC, was great, if you open the windows in the bedroom and the balcony door, it creates a great breeze. Location is fantastic! You can walk to any restaurant, from the condo. There's Miso Phat, China Boat, the pub, Maui Brewing Co. and a coffee shop. Anyone of the dozens of beaches is 15 min drive or less. Or you have access to a smaller beach next to the condo which is great if you like a quiet beach. If the weather isn't so great, there are plenty of books, board games, dominoes, etc. to keep you busy. The condo itself is very clean and well kept. We bought food to make breakfast for the week, and the kitchen has everything you need. Even oils, and spices, but if you're particular, i would check the cabinets first before you run out to the store. Overall we had a great week and would love to come back for our anniversary!
Sue was a great host!  We loved the apartment.  Sunsets were amazing.  Quiet apartment complex.  Great location as well! Thanks Sue!

We had a wonderful stay at Sue's place. The views of the water are unbeatable; we saw lots of whales (from a distance) and had multiple sea turtle sightings right next to the seawall. The king size bed was incredibly comfortable. The condo has lots of beach equipment, including snorkel masks, though you need your own beach towels. The kitchen is basic but quite functional for our needs, and we used the condo's community grill. We were sad to leave and would definitely stay here again in the future.

The condo had a wonderful view of the sunsets, whales, and even sea turtles.  Beaches are close by and the compound is quiet.   It is everything that Sue said it would be.   We will be back next year.

This condo is located at a good location (4 min drive from Kapalua Airport), free 1 car parking, and has a nice view of the ocean. The condo is generally very clean (bed, floor, furniture) and would deserve 5 stars if not for the exception of some serious flies/mosquito issue inside the condo. Over the course of 3 nights stay, my fiancee and I killed at least 30 each and they just keep coming (can't find where they are coming from). Both of us ended up with numerous bites on face and body and ultimately my fiancee ended up with hives on her face and upper body.

I would recommend this place only after owner fix the flies/mosquito issue.

Awesome spot on the water, fantastic view of the sunset and whales swimming, great swimming (and turtles) immediately north of the property, easy access to everything in the area, easy host, clean property, loved it.

Overall we had a great stay. Of course, the number one reason to choose this place is the view. It is amazing! We used the lanai for breakfast, sunset viewing, and general lounging. The location is pretty good, halfway between Kapalua and Kaanapali but also a little tough because there isn't a beach to walk to (we knew this though). Really, our only hesitations were in the kitchen where we felt the stove top needed to be replaced (some of the burners don't work well). Plus we felt the kitchen could be better stocked with a tea kettle, for instance. The bed is comfortable but the sheets didn't fit well and kept coming off. The beach gear is great and useful but we had to rent snorkel gear because we didn't find the snorkel gear at the place very good. And also we couldn't find fins! One big thing to note: there are no beach towels. This is a huge bummer because you'll either have to spend about $17 for each or pack your own which is bulky and takes up space. 

Overall we liked this rental! It was quiet, comfortable, and had amazing views but with a few updates and changes, it could be spectacular!

The view is amazing! We had a great stay here, and spent many hours sitting out on the lanai enjoying the view. The bed is comfortable, the kitchen was really well stocked, the wifi was really good, and there is everything you need for a day at the beach. There is a decent little store, coffee place, and Maui brewing within walking distance. We would definitely stay here again!

A great place right on the water.  We saw big turtles swimming and feeding near the rock wall most days.  Close to a swimming beach and beach equipment supplied by Sue.  4th floor unit with elevator and fantastic view.  Chinese restaurant across the road.  No supermarket close so stock up before you come.  Well maintained pool,  barbecue and grounds.  Would love to come back for longer.  Parking permit comes with the unit.

Sue's apartment in Kahana is perfect for some relaxing days on the Kahana coast.  The views from the lanai are breathtaking. Direct oceanfront views of the island of Molokai with rainbow treats almost every morning. The green turtles feed up along the sea wall every morning.  The apartment is very well appointed including comfy beach chairs and umbrella. The kitchen has anything you could possibly need and the entire apartment was spotless upon arrival. Sue is a great communicator and always quick to respond to my messages and requests. I've definitely bookmarked this condo for the future.

Clean, smart apartment. Wonderful views from the Lanai. We were only there for a couple of nights for a quick stop, so didn't have the opportunity to explore everything the local area had to offer, but would consider it as a base if we return. Mahalo!
Great ocean view

We were impressed by photos and description.  Then upon arrival, we were amazed by the location and amenities.  This unit has just about anything you could need (minus food and drink of course).  Sue does a great job!

The location is great if you prefer West Maui (as we do).  Has a little walkable beach next to the complex and we found some pretty amazing shells on our morning strolls. 

We would not hesitate to recommend Sue's place to anyone.

Beautiful & clean space with direct oceanfront view. We loved being able to enjoy the Maui sunset from the lanai every night during our stay. Close to Kaanapali Beach & Lahaina. We would recommend/stay at this place again!

Sue's condo exceeded our expectations.  Bed, kitchen, bathroom were excellent.  View of sunsets and sunrises exceptional.  We hope to return soon.
Relax and soak in Maui.

We stayed at Sue’s for a week and it was great! Good location close to food, shopping and lots of beaches to choose from. She shares tips on where to eat, places to snorkel and beaches to visit. There’s a DVD player to watch movies on and a RedBox right down the street for renting movies. Beautiful view and well stocked with the things you would need to make yourself at home. 
The shower had trouble draining one day and she promptly had someone come fix it. 
There is no AC but if you open the porch door and windows and turn on the fans it’s cool enough. 
Overall we had a great stay at Sue’s place at Kahana Reef!
We loved our stay at Sue’s!
Everything was as described and communication with Sue was good. We had a great time.

name: Cosy city apartment
summary: This is a cosy one bedroom apartment in Asian side of (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a very safe area.Walking distance to sea side 5 minutes walking.Close to Bağdat Street,the most famous street of shops,cafees of Istanbul.Very close to public transport.
description: This is a cosy one bedroom apartment in Asian side of (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a very safe area.Walking distance to sea side 5 minutes walking.Close to Bağdat Street,the most famous street of shops,cafees of Istanbul.Very close to public transport.

host.host_about: I have my own business in textile.Living in İstanbul,kind hearted person.I love traveling myself.

reviews.comments: Öncelikle sıcak ve samimi karşıladigi ve bize kendimizi evimiz de gibi   hissettirdiği için ebru hanıma teşekkür ederim.evin bulunduğu semt sakin,merkezi ihtiyacınız olan herşeyi rahatlıkla bulabileceğiniz bir konumda oldukça memnun kaldık

Ebru was a fantastic host and was easily reachable if I had any questions. The location was centrally located, with Kadikoy being a short minibus ride away, and provided a unique experience living on the Asian side of Istanbul. 
The attention to detail in preparing the apartment was amazing and I'd highly recommend this location to base your exploration of Istanbul's Asian side.

Oh Istanbul 
Je n'oublierai jamais cette magnifique ville ou tu te sens entrain de faire un voyage dans le passé, je te remercie Ebru pour ton accueil et ta délicatesse j'ai adoré ta spontanéité  tu m'as mise  très alaise dé le début.
J'adore ta maison très cosy et elle est bien située surtout pour quelqu'un qui aime découvrir 
Une chose est sûre JE REVIENDRAI

Ebru was a great host, she welcomed us and handed over the keys to her place. It was a very cosy and spacious place to stay for two people. 
The location is also perfect, very close to the ferry and the main streets and areas (bagdat caddesi/kadikoy/moda/) of the asian side of Istanbul. 

Till next time Ebru,
Thanks for the hospitality.
Friendly welcome and great location

Mrs Ebru apartment, is quite and in a very good position, very very close (Just 5 minutes walking) to the beginning of Bağdat street (best place in istanbul to be) and the dolmuş station. In the house you find everything you need, from water to the hairdryer and the services offered like Wi-Fi or even a smart-tv are really good. Furthermore  in front of her house there is a little market with every product you could need more.  I definitely recommend everyone who wants to stay in Istanbul for some days, but even for some longer period, cause Istanbul is really worth it and Mrs Ebru apartment the place to be. Last but not least I can not mention the fantastic disponibility, patience and the fast answers Mrs ebru gives you as a host. Really a person, who you can trust.

Second time at Mrs. Ebru apartment and it starts to feel like a second home. The disponibility, hospitality and kindness of Mrs.Ebru are unique and this makes her a great host. Highly reccomended for staying at the Asian side of Istanbul. Can't wait to come again :)

Ebru Hanım'ın evi her açıdan çok başarılı. Konum olarak eski Bağdat Caddesine inanılmaz yakın olduğu için her türlü yere kolaylıkla gidilebiliyor. Ev inanılmaz temiz, çok geniş ve ferah ve bir o kadar da kendinizi istediğin kadar samimi hissedebileceğiniz bir evdi. Çok rahat, sıcak ve keyifli bir konaklama süreciydi. Şansımız olsaydı daha fazla kalmak isterdik. İstanbul'da kalacak yer arayan kişiler için önerilir. Bir daha ki ilk fırsatımız da tekrar burada kalmak için elimizden geleni yapacağız.

Ebru's house is sweet and kind, it has everything someone could ever need. Moreover the cordiality and disponibility of the host is unique. It is rare to find such a great host and trustworthy place to stay. It starts to feel like a second home.
Ebru is an excellent host. We highly recommend this nice and spacious apartment. Close to everything, shopping, restaurants, transport.
Always perfect :))
Çok güzel bir yer. Ebru hanım her konuda çok yardımcı.

The apartment was really nice. Was easy to find it. Ebru provide very quick answers to all your questions. At home you can find everything you need. WiFi with really good speed. Home very clean and warm! No noise from neighbors. Excellent location. Very close to Baghdad street. Easy to get to center. If you come with car, many places to park car next to home. I would highly recommend this apartment and Ebru . Next time with pleasure will stay again. 
Tanismak icin cok memnun oldum. Hersey cok guzeldi. Tekrar tesekkur ederim

name: Hello To Everybody from Taksim center of the İST
summary: Hello, My name is Sevilay.  I'm single and 34 years old. I'm a web designer and I have an office in Eminönü so im working between 10 am till 6.30 pm.  (I'm not abble to receive any guest between that times just after 19:30 pm) I'll be happy to meet you guys. You'll feel  comfortable here as your home. :) I am looking forward to get new expriences.  See you soon ;)
space: you can stay 2 people at the room. But just 1 bed  you have to share with your friend...
description: Hello, My name is Sevilay.  I'm single and 34 years old. I'm a web designer and I have an office in Eminönü so im working between 10 am till 6.30 pm.  (I'm not abble to receive any guest between that times just after 19:30 pm) I'll be happy to meet you guys. You'll feel  comfortable here as your home. :) I am looking forward to get new expriences.  See you soon ;) you can stay 2 people at the room. But just 1 bed  you have to share with your friend... Entering the other room without permission is forbbidden... General rules after 12 am you should be quiet because someone can be sleep at home :)) If not we can talk together ;) I'm always trying to get contact with you.. Taksim; You can find easily during 24 hours , market taxi, restourants :) Going to Asain side is very easy.. You will definitely observe Turkish life in  that area .. :) Bus, subway, metro bus, taxi Dont scared going around everybody knows to Taksim and Mecidiyeköy ;)
neighborhood_overview: Taksim; You can find easily during 24 hours , market taxi, restourants :) Going to Asain side is very easy.. You will definitely observe Turkish life in  that area .. :)
notes: Dont scared going around everybody knows to Taksim and Mecidiyeköy ;)
transit: Bus, subway, metro bus, taxi
access: Entering the other room without permission is forbbidden... General rules after 12 am you should be quiet because someone can be sleep at home :)) If not we can talk together ;)
interaction: I'm always trying to get contact with you..
house_rules: pls be clean at home because its not hotel :)) I cant accept animal because its forbidden at building :(.. also u cant smoke at home but we have balcony  guys. ;)

host.host_about: Hello there guys . im sevilay . a web designer who has an office in eminönü  . i live with my boyfriend and we would like to host any respecful person .

reviews.comments: I couldn't imagine a greater place to stay and a better host than Sevilay. She was taking care so much about me. She picked my up in the citycenter by car when I arrived. She also took a lot of time to show me around in the city and brought me to some really lovely places. You definitely don't wanna stay somewhere else if you go to Istanbul. The room was clean and as described! Thank you again for everything Sevilay! I appreciate it so much! Take care and hopefully see you soon again!
mon hôyeest ven me chrché à la place tahir, l qartierst très cormmercant

The flat was clean and big enough. Savilay is a  busy person but always answers when help is needed. 
I got the single bed room. The bed unfortunately was a little small for me but everything else was good.
Super lovely host, I definitely recommend it to every one, She is the best, fast respond, quite friendly with her boy friend as well and very respect full host.

Sevilay and Mohamed deserve to be considered super-hosts.  It's easy to feel their 
place  like home after a couple of days. They are cool, relaxed and generous people that I was happy to have meet in this wonderful city, by the way the world can be found in this little street, and so lively, so full of humanity!

I recommend this place 100%. Location is convenient and the place comes with the host with the mostest. Sevilay was very helpful in local tips and she was generous with her time. I definitely will stay there when I go back. She makes your stay in Istanbul memorable. Thank you
It was a great experience. Sevilay and her boyfriend are very nice and helpful.

There’s not much to say.

Just Get u yourself there and enjoy your time in Istanbul.

Probably u think the place isn’t as modern as you think but it’s awesome awesome to stay and spending your holiday there.

She’s the best host ever had in Istanbul.
very nice and helpful
Sevilay is a great host and makes you feel like home. Great location as well.

Sevilay and Mohammed were the best! Very friendly and helpful both.
The place is very close to Taksim Square by foot and there are plenty of shops and restaurants in the neiborhood.
The house is really comfortable and spacious, with several comfy armchairs and plenty of windows and light.
Everything is spotlessly clean. The kitchen is very well equipped too.
The room is really nice and comfy too, with a large window and light.The bed is very big, the matress may be could be better but it is a home and not a hotel, so you know.
I will always try to come back when I am in Istanbul, and I am sure I will.
Good Luck guys! Seeya soon I hope!

This is truly a good place to stay, great value for money. The location is excellent, like you are in the center of everything. Be prepared to climb three flights of winding stairs and no locks on the room doors, otherwise lovely place with a lovely couple.
Great host, very available, super generous, perfectly clean room and flat in a very strategic location to discover Istanbul as it should. All was perfect.
apt  is located at very near to Taksim Square

Sevilay has given me an experience of Istanbul that I will never forget. The cleanliness of the rooms and common areas, the strategic location of her building, easy for transportation, shopping and restaurant are excellent. For sure, I would recomend this place to anyone who want to have an outstanding stay in Istanbul.

name: A Lovely, Modern, 1bd Apt in Center
summary: This is the top floor flat of my historical building, which I bought and completely renovated it in late 2011. I originally designed this flat for my partner and myself but unfortunately we don't live in Istanbul right now and rent it out.
space: - it has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and a living room with kitchenette. - very conveniently located in the city center, kurdela street, omer hayyam in Beyoglu. Only five minutes to walk to bustling Istiklal Street and Taksim. - electricity, central heating system, water and unlimited wireless internet connection are all included in the price. - great orientation, bright apartment. - security and alarm system for the entire building, including gas and fire detectors in kitchen and bedrooms, cameras in front and back facades. - shared laundry room with two washing machines, iron and vacuum cleaner. - basic furniture (bed, study desk, wardrobe, coach), double glazed wooden windows and warm and noiseless floor, 24 hours hot water, newly fitted modern kitchenette (cooking unit, fridge), common backyard. - available for short or long term rent.
description: This is the top floor flat of my historical building, which I bought and completely renovated it in late 2011. I originally designed this flat for my partner and myself but unfortunately we don't live in Istanbul right now and rent it out. - it has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and a living room with kitchenette. - very conveniently located in the city center, kurdela street, omer hayyam in Beyoglu. Only five minutes to walk to bustling Istiklal Street and Taksim. - electricity, central heating system, water and unlimited wireless internet connection are all included in the price. - great orientation, bright apartment. - security and alarm system for the entire building, including gas and fire detectors in kitchen and bedrooms, cameras in front and back facades. - shared laundry room with two washing machines, iron and vacuum cleaner. - basic furniture (bed, study desk, wardrobe, coach), double glazed wooden windows and warm and noiseless floor, 24 hours hot water, newly fitted modern kitchene
neighborhood_overview: It is a very central place, walking distance to main pedestrian streets full of cafes and restaurants, and also transportation hubs. 5 minutes walking distance to bus station, and 10 minutes to metro. There is a local market in the street on Sundays, which you can buy cheap and fresh vegetables and fruits with good quality. A small Carrefour and SOK supermarket is around the corner. Another local market is located just opposite the street, which you can buy all essentials. It is not a touristic neighborhood, more of a local, working class one. Municipality started a huge regeneration project couple of years ago, not too far from our street. This triggered the transformation of the area. Low-income families are moving out, and recently many students and foreigners have been moving in due to its location. We still have the traditional social life in our neighborhood. Next door carpenter and electrician, owner of the market, or the guys from the local tea house are great helps whenever we
transit: The location is very central. 10 minutes walking distance to main pedestrian street with lots of cafes, bars and restaurants which is called Istiklal. To the historical sites and museums you can go by bus, metro or tram, you may need to combine couple of them. It takes only 30-40 minutes.
access: You'll have the entire apartment for yourself.
interaction: Unfortunately I don't live in Istanbul, I live in Nairobi. But especially summer time I try to spend my time in Istanbul as much as I can. When I am in Istanbul, you can be sure that I spend a lot of time with my guests! And sometimes it turns out to be a good friendship :) When I am not in Istanbul, my nephew, Baran, who is also a university student, lives in the same building and helps me to welcome my guest. He is a great guy!
house_rules: - Smoking is not allowed inside the flat due to the wooden floor, windows, doors and furniture. - Your security is at your own risk and I do not accept responsibility for any loss. - Please keep the windows closed when you are not at home. - Do not reset Internet settings and modem setup, and do not touch or adjust security cameras. - Do not adjust the level of central heater. Due to the security, it should not be exceeded 60 degrees. - Do not throw your hairs in the shower drainage, and use particular chemicals to remove blocked items regularly. - Do not use towels to wipe up floors. - Be responsible in using the cleaning materials and replace the amount you use. - Keep all shared items and materials at common place, do not keep them in your room/flat. - Do not leave bad foods in the fridge. - Gas stove and electricity bulbs should be switched off after use.

host.host_about:
I am an urban planner and bought a historical building in the city center of istanbul. I completely renovated my building and let it now.

Currently I live in Nairobi, but I have a friend called Firat, who assists me excellently to welcome my guests in Istanbul. We try to provide our guests a warm atmosphere, with basic and comfortable accommodation at reasonable price. Because this is simply what I want while I am traveling!

reviews.comments:
I have stayed in Pinar's apt at Kurdela Sok for 8 nights in June 2012. She told me that I was her first renter via this website after the students who rented the apt before had left. It's located in a lively and colorful and relatively poor popular neighborhood, in which it is one of the very few renovated buildings. This means that you get in touch with the life of real Istanbul people that you normally might not meet as a tourist in the regular tourist aereas. It is very near very well known and touristy aeras as Taksim Square, Istanbul's main shopping street Istakal Caddesi and the major aera with bars, cafés and clubs (all 5-10 mins walking). On Sundays there is a nice and busy market on the street. Lively means also quite noisy: bring your earplugs if you want to sleep early or sleep in the morning. 
The apartment itself has been renovated in a simple and tasteful way: wooden floor, simple but adequate bathroom and kitchen 
tyhe only inconvenience I acn think of is that the bathroom floor isn't perfectly inclined to the shower drain, in a way that the bathroom floor remains partly wet. The absence of airconditioning is not a problem, since the large number of windows make that there is enough ventilation. Pinar has been very kind: she even left some food and drinks in the fridge. 
Last but not least: istanbul is a great cuity, which will make your stay unforgettable!

We had a really nice time in Istanbul and enjoyed to stay at Pinars flat. It is in walking distance from the main shopping area around Istiklal and Taksim Square. The street and area is very lively (also in the evenings) and there is a local market on Kurdela Sokak on sundays.

The flat itself is very nice, but staying there in the middle of summer with 35 C, air-condition would be a nice upgrade.

A clean and nice flat in the center of Istanbul.
Close to accomodations.
Pinar is a friendly host.
You have laundry,little balcony etc.
The area can be very busy during the market and sometimes a bit noisy in the evening.
Good spot!!
Расскажите другим участникам сообщества Airbnb о вашей поезкде. Это будет показано на странице объявления.

Pinar's place is a cute, well-renovated house in a working class neighborhood near Taxim pedestrian area. The place is spotless, only hiccup is that it does not have ac, however if you are visiting out of season it should not be a problem. Pinar is a cool host. She responded to our last minute request and since she lives in the sme building she was superflexible with check-in/out. She was really nice and helpful.

We can only affiliate with the previous reviews. Pinar`s flat is comfortably furnished, clean and excellently located. We spent a wonderful time in Istanbul and can only recommend Pinar`s "cosy flat".

Pinar's apartment is very well renovated, comfortable and clean. We had a very pleasant stay! The flat is located in an authentic, non-touristic Istanbul neighbourhoods which we enjoyed very much. Pinar is a very quick responding and nice host. She organised all we needed for a good stay, and there was a lack of nothing! We would select the flat again.

we had a wonderfull time in pinars apartment.
the flat is situated in a very original part of istanbul, which i find great.
off the beaten track, this is where you really get to know turkey.
especially the market is fascinating and super tasty.
the perfect place for two, if you are looking to stay in istanbul from one night to a year!

The apartment of Pinar was very cosy, nice and clean. It felt immediately like home. It was a very great location in a neighborhood very close to the Istiklal Cadessi and Taksim, but far enough from the real tourist area. Wednesday, there was a market in the street, with a lot of fresh fruit and vegetables. If we come to Istanbul ever again, we will certainly book this great flat. Pinar and her friend were also very helpfull!

The flat looks exactly like in the pictures: very clean, newly renovated and sunny. The area is a quiet, non-touristic neighborhood, but only a 10 minutes walk from the frenzy of Istiklal Caddesi. We enjoyed it very much, especially the Sunday market. We did not meet Pinar, but her her friend Firat welcomed us to the flat. Everything was perfect and I would definitely recommend the flat!

The flat was really the same as the pictures show - it is very cosy! Also the equipment of it was very good - the kitchen had everything you need. There was even a hair dryer in the flat. We also used the washing machine in the basement which enabled us to keep our luggage small. Which was important to us as we spent there 3,5 weeks and with two children (3 years, 8 months). Pinar and Firad were so nice and gave us extra mattresses that we put on the floor so that the four of us could stay in this apartment. 
It was also great to have WLAN which worked pretty well.

Opposite the apartment there is a small grocery store (and several more in the street) where we bought most of our food. Generally, the people were very friendly in the neighbourhood, a neighbourhood with "normal" people, not touristic at all. Which we liked a lot and was also one reason why we took this flat. Secondly, it was the location of it: maybe a 15min. walk to Beyoglu. 

It was very easy to communicate with Pinar, she was very accommodating so that we would love to be her guests again. Next time...! 
çok teşekkürler!

The apartment is great and in a really good location! The market on Sunday is amazing. Firat was a great help and suggested places to eat and go in the evenings! He also came and rescued us when I locked us out of the flat!

We spent an amazing 3 weeks in Istanbul.  The location, the flat, the wifi, the neighbourhood - everything was awesome.  The flat is huge and there is a lot of room to relax, work, rest, or people watch at the windows!  The water was shut off one day - but that had nothing to do with the flat as it was the whole neighbourhood.  The flat isn't exactly as it is in the pictures - it is definitely more worn than they appear, but still a great place. The market on sunday is an added bonus - as are the hills to help burn off some of the cheese we ate! :)  I would love to stay here again and highly recommend this place to anyone. Thanks again Pinar!

+  The apartment is sweet
+  There are 5 other People who are very nice
+  During the day the neighborhood is nice
- at night it was very spooky, their are many men on the street
+  Dining options and Shops, very good, lots of people to help you learn Turkish if you  like
-  For this area the rent is to much (we were their for 5 months)
-  in winter it is very cold in the Apartment, the Windows are not good, when it rains, it's damp inside, it is very windy.
- Tarlabasi has Problems with electricity and water supply
- in the garden their are a lot of cats, sometimes they became disruptive to my sleep

We stayed at Pinars place for about 6 months, and absolutely loved it! The apartment has the best location imaginable, close to the center and with a wonderful sunday market right outside the door.

The area is super charming and has some of the tastiest and cheapest food around. Highly recommended!!

Pinar was an excellent hostess. She was home from Kenya during our visit, and even took us around the city and out to a Turkish dinner. Wonderful!

The apartment is as listed - it is lovely, clean, bright, and big. It's on a quiet street, very comfortable, and has all amenities you might need. There is a wonderful street market outside on Sundays. 

Wifi is 3-8MBS, but that is common throughout Turkey. I would recommend getting a SIM card with 3G to tether if you need fast Internet. 

One issue to know before you book: This apartment is solidly in the ghetto. It is very close (3 blocks) to the nice, touristy part of town. But make no mistake - this is the ghetto. Example: A homeless guy slept in our doorway for 3 nights (Pinar's friend quickly took care of this), and there was presumably human feces left by this homeless man outside our door for a few days.

So while this place was fine for us, just be aware of the location - I would not recommend this spot for families with small children, or anyone who feels uncomfortable around overt poverty. It is not dangerous, however. I never felt unsafe - the area is just unclean, and there are a lot of squatters. 

So if you're ok with an area with "character" - this apartment will be perfect for you! Overall very nice and exactly what we expected.

We stayed in Pinar’s apartment for 1 month in December and January. We found the apartment to be clean and bright and very much like the photos. Pinar was visiting from Kenya and we had the opportunity to meet her. She was very friendly and was quick to clear a couple of issues with the house when we moved in. The kitchen was adequate and we were able to prepare our meals in the house. There are stores nearby but selections are not great and visits to multiple stores might be necessary to find what you need. The washing machine on the lower level was a welcome addition. As others have done, I would have to mention that the neighborhood could be seen as rundown and difficult for some. The apartment is located a short distance from Istiklal Avenue, however the hill up to Istiklal is very steep and you have to walk in the busy road most of the way. It could be seen as dangerous to some. We also found public transportation difficult unless you first walk to either Taksim Square or Tunel Funicular which are both nearly 20 minutes away. There is a tram on Istiklal but it is not reliable. The neighborhood can be noisy, but we found it to be nice when we met people in shops in the neighborhood. The Sunday market outside the door would be a highlight for anyone visiting.

This lovely house is in a unique and must seen historic neighborhood in Beyoglu. We really enjoyed being 4-5 minutes away from the mid point of the most famous avenue called Istiklal Street. The hosts  are kind and nice people. It's the right choice if you want to enjoy your visit in Istanbul.

+Good location, confortable flat, kindness host family+  The flat located 5min from Omer Hayyam bus stop,10 min from Istiklal street,20min from Taksim or Sishane metro stations on foot. Many small supermarkets are around the apartment. Every sunday we can see big street market in front of the door.  Rooms are clean and pretty same as photos. I stayed in winter time, it was snowing it was so cold outside, but inside was warm by heating machine. Also there was a airconditioner in bed room, but I didn't have to use it. Enough speed wi-fi, foldable dining table(I used this as a big pc desk), enough kitchin stuffs were there. I really relaxed in this flat.  Thank you Pinar!!

I stayed at Pinar's apartment three plus weeks for what amounted to a very comfortable stay. The apartment itself is excellent value -- spacious, cozy, & with everything you should need. I loved spending hours reading on the cushions in the bay windows overlooking the street. It's very well located less than a ten minute walk from Beyoglu and Taksim. The neighbourhood's somewhat rough character could be an issue for some people, but really, they shouldn't be put off -- everyone I came across was friendly and I never felt unsafe. Tarlabasi is a lively, fascinating area, with one of Istanbul's more interesting stories. One night I was invited to join in the dancing at a Kurdish wedding celebration just down the street. The shopkeeper with the food stall across the way was unfailingly helpful. And Sunday mornings are a nice surprise when the entire street is given over to a market, which is when I did most of my grocery shopping. (You step out the front door and there's a guy selling olives or cheese or spices for the day.) When I eventually return to Istanbul I would definitely consider staying here again.
Konumu itibariyle hosnut olmasak da ev ile ilgili bir sıkıntı yaşamadık

Pictures do reflect the place, clean and new, which is in a renovated house in a slowly gentrifying area. Pinar and relatives were quickly responsive and helpful with all issues.  Will rent it again for my next long term visit.

warm and comfortable apartment in family style neighborhood ,you will feel like a local and  surprise yourself during on Sunday market, not  far from  the  touristic   area  by  walk  ,  leave  yourself    free   to  explore   around     the    unknown   part  of   historic    area  of   Beyoglu!

Pinar's flat was a disappointing experience. The main difference from the photos is the bathroom - it's really old and needs remodeling badly. I even wore flip-flops in the shower. There is no shower curtain or separation of the shower area, so water gets all over the bathroom floor. Despite what the listing said, there was no shampoo or hair dryer. The neighborhood is also rough - really poor and not somewhere I would want to walk at night alone.

We booked Pinar's flat very last-minute after another host cancelled, which was very flexible of her, but 45 minutes after booking she informed me the flat was being painted and we had to stay in another room for the first night. The "other room" turned out to be a room in her nephew's downstairs flat. We had no idea we would be sharing a flat for the first night, and the flat we booked wasn't ready until 7 pm the next evening because they hadn't cleaned it. She didn't offer us a discount or anything for staying in a shared flat instead of the one we booked, or for the very late check-in.

In summary - this place might be fine as a long-term choice for students on a budget, but if you're in Istanbul for a few days and are looking for a nice place, stay somewhere else.

Everything was ok but the appartament  is rather dark not like on the pictures , if you switch on the light it’s dim particularly in the evening , it was very cold to take a shower so we couldn’t because it was too cold ! And as for the area that was very important ! It’s like Arab district and in the evening it was not pleasant and not safe for us to come back home ! Very dirty street and if you are two girls you will be scared to come back alone ! And it is very noisy because in the morning the cars come , people cry so we didn’t sleep ! 
P.s the new phew of piñar is a good pleasant person who showed us everything
Great place to stay in Istanbul!
Pinar and Baran were very communicative and helpful. Provided me with all I needed!

Pinar's apartment is ideal for both short and long-term stays. If you enjoy walking, it is perfectly located to discover the city by foot. The place is spacious and quiet, as there is not much traffic. The market on Sundays is a particular highlight as it is literally outside the front door.
Baran, Pinar's nephew, is there to ensure that you find everything you need and is a terrific help.
I spent a month here and am happy to recommend it to anyone visiting Istanbul. What is more, both Pinar and Baran are extremely forthcoming and very quick to respond to any questions.

Smooth check in & out! Pinar & Baran were very responsive and helpful!
Very cosy apartment! Thanks a lot.
Very nice, good value!
Very nice flat in a popular area, close to buses from/to both airports. Baran was really nice and helpful. The flat was clean and looks like the pictures. We recommend it!

Grand appartement ! Un cadre idéal pour des vacances ! Prêt d'une rue assez passante, la chambre est située du côté opposé donc parfait ! (pour les oreilles sensibles comme moi, je conseille tout de même les boules quies) (Website hidden by Airbnb) 10-15 minutes à pied de la grande rue menant à Taksim Square, où l'on trouve vraiment tout. L'appartement est située dans une rue descendante de la grande rue Tarlabasi, un ami m'a tout de même conseillé en tant que femme seule de ne pas trop y traîner la nuit, car on s'excentre un peu) (Website hidden by Airbnb) Le neveu de Pinar est très réactif aux questions et dispo pour aider, donc hôtes au to (Website hidden by Airbnb) Je recommande cet airbnb pour tous les couples (avec 1 enfant aussi je pense que ce serait parfait)!

I’d recommend a couple looking for a central private flat in Istanbul to stay here! The location was excellent, very close to our favourite areas of the city with hip bars and independent shops! The flat met all our basic needs, although not to the standard of a hotel we were barely in the flat as there was so much to do nearby! Pinar and Baran were very helpful and always responded quickly to any questions we had, perfect hosts. Thanks so much to both of you for letting us stay, we loved exploring the city!
Good for couples looking to for some privacy and good location to do some sightseeing and feel the Turkish way of living.
the apartment of Pinar is located not far (approx. 5 minutes by foot) from the main shopping street and is beautifully and functionally furnished.
We had a wonderful time here.

Very nice stay. Our host was really welcoming and helpful. The Appartement was really clean and conform to the description and pictures. 
I wholeheartedly recommend them

Adorable newly renovated, comfortable flat. Everything you need is provided, including a well-equipped kitchen. Pinar's nephew Baran helped us with check-in and questions, and since he lives in the building that was very easy, and he was very friendly and helpful. The immediate neighborhood feels rundown, but the flat is walking distance to restaurants, transportation, coffee shops. It's a good value for such a large place, but the tradeoff is being a little farther away from the action.

Thanks to our host for having us. Istanbul is definitely worth a trip. Pinars appartment is lovely and clean. Communication with her and Baran was easy. He helped us with first steps when we arrived. The neighborhood is not that nice but we didn‘t mind.

Pinar’s apartment is absolutely gorgeous. It is bright, clean and spacious. It is well appointed with everything you’d need for your stay. It’s located in a lively and colourful neighbourhood. There are grocery stores and restaurants nearby and a market in the street every Sunday, selling fresh produce. 
This place is wonderful, I would highly recommend a stay here.

We had a lovely stay at Pinar’s apartment during our week in Istanbul. We met her nephew, Baran, on arrival, who lives in the apartment below and was friendly, helpful and quick to respond to any queries we had during our stay. The apartment is well located, 5/10 minutes walk from the Nevizade restaurant area and bars to the South. The only thing I would recommend to other guests is to bring earplugs as the apartment is very close to a mosque. We really liked the apartment - it was exactly as the photos- clean, bright and spacious.

I stayed at Pinar's apartment in the Tarlabasi neighbourhood of Beyoglu for one month. The 1-bedroom apartment is spacious, clean and well maintained. The bed is firm, but comfortable and with radiators in every room it was sufficiently warm at night. (My stay was in the late fall, when the Istanbul weather is a little unpredictable.) The kitchen, though small, was perfect for cooking and Pinar provided nearly every kitchen item that one could need for meals small or large.

Contrary to what you might hear or read online, Tarlabasi is a safe and very interesting neighbourhood. It is very much a local area, where people live their lives, go to the local stores, drink tea for hours at the local shops, and go to the amazing and enormous Sunday market that is right on the same street as Pinar's building. It is very close to more touristy & fashionable areas (Istiklal Street, Galata, Taksim, Cihangir, Karakoy, etc.), but it is not a tourist area. So if you want a relatively quiet and relaxing place to stay, where you can see how "normal" people live in Istanbul, I'd highly recommend Pinar's apartment.

Pinar and Baran, her nephew who lives in the building, were extremely helpful and responsive to my queries. I would stay at Pinar's place again & recommend it for open-minded and thoughtful visitors to Istanbul.

Çok teşekkürler Pinar!

This apartment is one of the true treasures in Istanbul. Huge space, lots of light, perfectly decorated, comfortable bed + couch... everything was perfect. And the Sunday market is just about the most local experience you can have. When I come to Istanbul, this is the only place I will stay at. It's perfect. 

Per the comments on the neighborhood, this is the real Istanbul! None of the touristy fake stuff you'll get up on Istiklal. Families live here, chat here, hang up their colorful laundry together, so you truly do get an actual feel of the city. 

Book this place immediately, and for longer than you think.
We had a fantastic stay at Pinar's place. It is well located and many of the attractions of the city are easy to reach.

name: Comfortable room in Pedralbes
summary: Private bedroom. King size bed. Bathroom inside the room. Big wardrobe and windows with views to Tibidabo and the sea. Apartment near Camp Nou and Universities.  You can also use the kitchen and the living room.
space: The garden and the pool, the natural light and that is a 10th floor and there isn't noise to sleep.
description: Private bedroom. King size bed. Bathroom inside the room. Big wardrobe and windows with views to Tibidabo and the sea. Apartment near Camp Nou and Universities.  You can also use the kitchen and the living room. The garden and the pool, the natural light and that is a 10th floor and there isn't noise to sleep. The room (with private barthroom), the kitchen and the living room. Of course I will be disponible to help you in case you need it. Also I can give you some recommendations. Is 5 minutes walking from the Metro Station (Maria Cristina). Is a calm neighborhood but close to the center and city activities. Close to Camp Nou, Universities, La illa, etc... The metro station is 5 minutes walking. Also the bus station to go to the center is 2 minutes walking. The travia is 3 minutes walking. And there is the possibility to park the car.

host.host_about:
Me gustan las relaciones humanas, el campo y los animales. Cada momento es único e irrepetible, por ello hay que aprovecharlo al máximo. Me encanta viajar y recorrer mundo, siempre que se puede. 

¿Una frase? "Valiente no es el que llega primero a la cumbre, es el que regresa cuando los demás lo necesitan"

name: Flamengo Flat
summary: Studio located in the Flamengo neighborhood, very close to the beach, subway, Airport, all sights, with bakeries, supermarkets and bohemian zone very close. It is quiet, sleeps 2 people well and I still leave local sightseeing tips.
space: The stúdio is well located, close to supermarkets and public transport, but very quiet and cozy for two people.
description: Studio located in the Flamengo neighborhood, very close to the beach, subway, Airport, all sights, with bakeries, supermarkets and bohemian zone very close. It is quiet, sleeps 2 people well and I still leave local sightseeing tips. The stúdio is well located, close to supermarkets and public transport, but very quiet and cozy for two people. Guests will be given the full stúdio for them on the days of booking. I will not be available on the premises, but on the cell phone all the time to provide support, if necessary. Flamengo is a neighborhood with metro, located in the South Zone, but with easy access to all sights (Christ and Sugar Loaf). It has parking nearby but the visitor can use the Flamengo metro and bus stop which is in front of the building.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Belle maison familiale au cœur de Villeray
space: 4 bedrooms apartment  with 2 double bed and 2 single bed ; 2 bathrooms.  Good for 4 adults and 2 kids.  There is a large living area where you find the kitchen, the dining and the living room (with a piano).  The kitchen has a direct access to a large outdoor sunny patio with a view to our garden (if you are lucky you can get lettuce, tomato or grapes).  Access to BBQ on demand. House comes with 2 cats and wireless internet.
description: 4 bedrooms apartment  with 2 double bed and 2 single bed ; 2 bathrooms.  Good for 4 adults and 2 kids.  There is a large living area where you find the kitchen, the dining and the living room (with a piano).  The kitchen has a direct access to a large outdoor sunny patio with a view to our garden (if you are lucky you can get lettuce, tomato or grapes).  Access to BBQ on demand. House comes with 2 cats and wireless internet. All the house is accessible. The neighbor can assist if needed. Villeray is a nice neighborood where you will find local designer store, fabulous restaurants and coffee shops. The night scene is although limited.  Local shops can be found on the next corner ( bakery, coffee shop, restaurants)  Jean-Talon Market is a 5-10-minutes walk and Jean-Talon subway station is 10-minutes walk. Close to Little Italy, Jarry Park (Rogers Cup). Near Jean-Talon subway station (lines blue and orange) On street parking available.  Close to Bixi shared bike system

Close to Little Italy, Jarry Park (Rogers Cup).

interaction: The neighbor can assist if needed.
house_rules: Non fumeur / No smoking

host.host_about: Un couple de professionnels qui aime le voyage, la bonne bouffe; la belle vie quoi!

reviews.comments: We couldn't be more grateful to Geneviève and Yanick. The apartment was more beautiful than the pictures led on and these hosts were even more kind and easy to work than we could have hoped for. Total sweethearts...thanks again for everything!

We had an amazing stay at this home! It is so much bigger and lovelier than the pictures even convey. The neighborhood is fantastic too.  It's a bit north of the trendy neighborhoods of Mile End and Plateau, but we were so happy we ended up staying here.  It has tree-lined streets with a wonderful village feel.  It also seems to be a destination restaurant neighborhood and we ate really well. I highly recommend both Jean Talon market and the Indonesian tapas bar.  The home itself is airy and spacious with a wonderful back deck. It's particularly good for families.  Coming back after a day out biking and exploring felt like coming home - only much nicer.  Genevieve and Yanick were out of town when we were there but communication was quick and easy and there neighbor Dan was enormously helpful in letting us in and providing advice.  Would definitely stay again if possible.

We spent an wonderful week in Geneviève & Yanick's charming home, with its lovely back garden terrace. The apartment is very large and well organised for family life (we were 2 parents with three teens), and possessed all necessary amenities for visitors. The beds are comfortable, the two bathrooms are recently renovated, the kitchen is great to cook in, everything was clean and organised for our arrival, no problems with the wifi or tv.  And the cat is friendly.  Our questions were quickly answered.
The neighbourhood is fantastic, very family-oriented, close to 2 métro lines, several bus lines, a fantastic bakery, Jean-Talon market, great restos, Dumoulin bike shop, Bixi bikes....you can walk everywhere you need to go!
We highly reccommend this home to family travellers.

Le séjour s'est très bien placé! La maison de Geneviève et Yanick est très bien placée, dans un quartier très sympa. Elle est par ailleurs très très agréable à vivre. Tout était prêt pour qu'on passe un bon week-end! Je recommande vivement!
We had a great stay at Genevieve and Yanick’s home. The community was beautiful and the home was was more than we expected!

name: Grand 5½ meublé
summary: Je suis à la recherche d’un/une colocataire d’avril ou de mai prochain à décembre 2015 (dates discutables). C'est un beau et grand 5½ meublé, très ensoleillé, en plein cœur d’Outremont (Van Horne et Mceachran).
description: Je suis à la recherche d’un/une colocataire d’avril ou de mai prochain à décembre 2015 (dates discutables). C'est un beau et grand 5½ meublé, très ensoleillé, en plein cœur d’Outremont (Van Horne et Mceachran).

name: Spanish family host U/private WC
summary: Our home is your home, we are a family from La Rioja, we enjoy our culture and we love to share it with people from around the world. The room is comfortable and very good located, private bathroom. Be welcome at our home...
space: You can see Las Ramblas from our balcony, just next to metro station Liceu.
description: Our home is your home, we are a family from La Rioja, we enjoy our culture and we love to share it with people from around the world. The room is comfortable and very good located, private bathroom. Be welcome at our home...    You can see Las Ramblas from our balcony, just next to metro station Liceu. Kitchen, private bathroom, living room, dining room, balconies...Kitchen, private bathroom, living room, dining room, balconies... We interact with our guest as they ask for. We also respect their privacy but we are ready to help them all the time. We are in the border betwen The Raval and Gotic area. Many different places to eat, drink, dance and enjoy the historical places as well. Our place is situated just next to metro station Liceu (L3 green line) on the Ramblas. Many buses and taxis day and night. As we are located in the center of the center of Barcelona you also can walk to the most important touristic atractions. A bus goes directly to the beach (5 minutes) For security reasons
neighborhood_overview: We are in the border betwen The Raval and Gotic area. Many different places to eat, drink, dance and enjoy the historical places as well.
notes: For security reasons is necessary to present an ID copy of each guest when you do the check in.
transit: Our place is situated just next to metro station Liceu (L3 green line) on the Ramblas. Many buses and taxis day and night. As we are located in the center of the center of Barcelona you also can walk to the most important touristic atractions. A bus goes directly to the beach (5 minutes)
access: Kitchen, private bathroom, living room, dining room, balconies...Kitchen, private bathroom, living room, dining room, balconies...
interaction: We interact with our guest as they ask for. We also respect their privacy but we are ready to help them all the time.
house_rules: We don't have military rules, we want to make you feel at home, but expect common sense and respect for our home, we ask you to respect our rest, but especially the rest of the neighbors. It is NOT ALLOWED TO USE DRUGS AT ALL, you can smoke at the balconies. NOT ALLOWED TO BRING PERSONS TO THE APARTMENT. If any element of the apartment is damaged or the rules are broken then we will ask for the security deposit to Airbnb

reviews.comments: I am Traveling with Airbnb more than 3 years and I can say that this is one of the best apartments. I stayed there only one night, but I can say that this family  are very friendly and warm . I am recommend for all.

It was a very nice stay at Maria's. Maria and her family and friends are very nice and kind with lots of social interaction. Her flat is located in the centre of the city and it is very easy to go any place. The room is very stylish and comfortable with attached individual bathroom. I enjoy my stay with her very much.
I had a fantastic time. The space was lovely and the hosts were very accommodating. The location is perfect for enjoying an action packed weekend in Barcelona.
great location and great hosts. The bedroom was nice and looks exactly the same as pic. Maria, Juan and Sylvia are very friendly and warm. I've enjoyed my stay and can recommend to anyone

Barcelona was very beautiful and Maria apartment was completely near to the city center. They welcome us kindly.  The apartment was clean and you can use shared kitchen, washing machine simply. They get us the overview of the city and many information about sightseeing and transport and so on. We stayed there 3 days. 

Thank you Maria and Juan for hospitality and kindness. Hope to meet you again.

Die Unterkunft war genau so wie beschrieben, nämlich sehr schön und sauber. María hat uns sehr nett empfangen, uns die Wohnung gezeigt und Tipps für Barcelona gegeben. Es war eine sehr angenehme Atmosphäre und man hat sich sofort wohl gefühlt. Das Apartment war sehr sauber und auch ruhig, obwohl die Lage sehr zentral war. Zudem hatte man seinen eigenen Bereich mit eigenem Bad und ein zusätzliches kleines Zimmer, welches man noch als Wohnzimmer oder zusätzliches Bett benutzen konnte (zusätzlich zu dem allgemeinen Wohnzimmer des Apartments). Generell kann ich den Aufenthalt nur sehr empfehlen und würde es auch nochmal buchenm.

Hola ! 

It was one of the best trips made so far in Spain!
One of the best part of the accommodation was the location it was in the prime area La Rambla! Traveling to the airport or by metro to many junctions was convienent ! 
The family was wonderful and. Extremely helpful. The day we arrived they helped us with our itinerary for the weekend as per our wish! They recommended good cafes just the local style.exactly what we were looking for.The room was very comfortable. Thank you to Maria and her son!

Ein fantastischer Aufenthalt in Barcelona- Dank Maria und ihrer Familie! 
Marias Unterkunft hat mir und meiner Freundin sehr gut gefallen. Das Zimmer sieht aus wie auf den Fotos und war super sauber!  Auch das zweite Zimmer mit einem Single Bett eignet sich für einen Besuch zu dritt. 
Die Lage ist perfekt für jegliche Art der Tagesgestaltung-ob an den Strand, zum Shopping oder zu den Hauptsehenswürdigkeiten... zu Fuß oder mit der Metro (die nächste Metrostation ist keine Minute entfernt!)
Wir haben uns sehr willkommen gefühlt!!!  
Danke für ein paar wunderschöne Tage in Barcelona!

María and her family are very friendly and warm. They are extremely welcoming and kind hosts. 

The apartment is very spacious and clean. It was a really comfortable stay. It's located right in the centre of the city and it is very easy to go anywhere, with a metro station close by. Thanks for preparing us a tasty breakfast each morning!

We highly recommand her place!

My wife and I arrived just after 8 pm on a Friday evening and was received by Maria who made us feel at home. The whole apartment is clean and tidy and the bedroom and bathroom served our purposes completely for our short stay of two evenings. The shower unit is a tad small but was perfectly adequate for our needs. Although we didn't expect it, Maria had set out a continental breakfast for us on both mornings; the second morning of which we had to get up at 6 am to get to the airport, but she still got up to set breakfast and see us on our way. All in all, Maria's apartment suited us perfectly. Would we use it again? YES.

Maria and Juan were terrific!  Her home--with elevator!- is a few steps off  Ramblas, yet positioned so there was little noise. The Room/bath/ was at teh end of the house and very private.  The house was very clean and airy, and Maria provided us with a good breakfast every morning.  The Liceu Metro line was right near her on Ramblas, so any sight not walkable (very few!) was Metro-close. She really helped me!  Her friend--an expert hairdresser--wonderfully came to the house and cut my hair--sorely needed.  I left Barcelona happy and well-groomed, too! We could not have been in a better property than at Maria's.

I must admit, everything about the stay was perfect, spot on distance , in the heart of La Rambla, everything was easily available and accessible. Maria and Juan was very kind to offer daily breakfast, thanks to Sylvia as well for the initial briefing. I definitely reommend this B&B to anyone without any hesitance to have a great memorable stay in Barcelona.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Maria and Juan were excellent hostess. The location is unbeatable. 100% recommended.

The apartment is perfectly located just across a metro station. the unit and room is as described. Very clean and comfortable beds. beside this, the host was wonderful, and she tried as much as possible to help even though we had almost zero knowledge of Spanish. I would highly recommend this to anyone that wants to be in the heart of the city and la Rambla area.

The host was wonderful. Very welcoming. The apartment was very clean and the bedroom was spacious with a clean bathroom.

I highly recommend this place.

We had a lovely stay in this centrally located apartment. Maria was away on business, but her son Juan was there to great U.S. and offer tips for visiting Barcelona. We enjoyed visiting with Juan tremendously. The apartment is very nice, and we had full privacy. We would surely stay here again.

First of all, Maria was incredible. She truly made us feel at home and helped us with everything. Her recommendations as to where to go, what to see and what to eat were incredible and she gave us directions and instructions on how to get everywhere we wanted. It was amazing to see how at home we felt. When even we wanted to go to the beach one day and she even gave us sunscreen, towels and an umbrella! I cannot stress enough how sweet and accommodating she and Juan were. I am lactose intolerant, so I let her know and that same day she bought me soy milk! She made us breakfast every morning and it was lovely!

The apartment was in a perfect location! There was an elevator in the building, which made it easy to bring all of our luggage up. The metro is literally ten steps from the apartment, which makes everything super convenient to get to. We could not have asked for a better location. The room itself was a good size, very comfortable with big windows, and with a comfortable bed. The bathroom was just what we needed and the fact that it was private made the living situation that much more comfortable. The other bedroom was also a great size and with a comfortable bed and large windows.

I highly recommend this apartment! It really was perfect for what we needed and the Maria and Juan made the experience that much better for us!

Maria was an amazing host. We were able to check in early, she gave us directions on how to get to her apartments. The apartment has a private bathroom and we had two fans as it was very hot. The apartment is very close to the metro, like right a cross the street. We asked Maria for recommendations about where to go eat, what neighborhoods to visit, what metro to take and her recommendations were  on point. She made us continental breakfast every morning. Juan recommended places where to go out. Overall we had a great experience and would definitely recommend her place.

Maria (and juan!) where such great hosts. Wrote back instantly. Answered every question, gave really good tips away from all that typical stuff. We recommend them absolutely! The location was very good, the room and the private bathroom where perfect for us. And we enjoyed the lovely breakfast. Thaaaanks for everyting!

Maria , Helena and Juan are very kind , helpful and positive persons . Helena helped me with check-in and helped me search information about transportation. Maria cook me nice breakfast everyday ,although she speak little English , but using (Hidden by Airbnb) translator actually helped me learn many Spanish:) . Juan is very cute and encouraging , he  knows each nice places for eat , drink or walk around ~~  The private room with bathroom is really nice , although the downstairs neighbour little noisy at night but they play very good Spanish music , I kind of enjoyed it ~ The apartment is right at the center of city , beside La Rambna , near to everything , walking distance to other sight seeings . also busy area too ~~ The good thing of the apartment is it has an elevator but unluckily during my stay its not working , Maria is so kind and helped me with the heavy luggage .  I do enjoyed the stay there a lot :) thanks

Maria was very welcoming and her son Juan was very helpful. I ended up not spending the nights at their apt and I couldn't cancel at last min, but the room is as what's described in the ad. It's nice to have your own bathroom and shower though the space was rather limited.

Maria was a wonderfully welcoming host. The apartment is perfectly described, right off La Rambla, quiet once you closed the shutters, comfy bed and your own bathroom. The whole arranging process and arrival was very smooth for key collection and I would recommend this place for couples as well as people travelling alone like I was. I felt very safe and had plenty of friendly tips for tourist things to do!

María was an exceptional host who went the extra mile to ensure my stay was pleasant, welcoming, and comfortable. From the first time we interacted to the end of my stay, she was always approachable for questions and helpful with recommendations. I recommend María wholeheartedly, especially for international travelers, as she made my stay in a new country feel just like home.
It was one of the best places we've stayed during our European Tour. Maria' s place is very neat and cool. Best breakfast is served as well.
Maria has a lovely apartment, just steps away from La Ramble. She is also a charming host and made us fantastically comfortable for our stay.
The location is perfect. Right off the metro station and in the middle of  action. Host Maria was very welcoming and the description were accurate.

Maria was lovely - a wonderful host. Very friendly and happy to give advise on directions and restaurants etc. Her home is beautiful, and the location is unbeatable. Right in the heart of La Rambla. The bed is very comfortable and the room is a good size. The neighbours downstairs can be noisy late at night and the shower is very small but these were both small things in the scheme of it all. Highly recommended for your next trip to Barcelona.

Everything was great. The room is big enough to spend the night in and the rest of the apartment is very clean. Maria and Juan are very friendly and helpful. My girlfriend and me had a great time in Barcelona.

Really nice family and very helpful!
They gave us some good recommendations for restaurants etc.
We loved to stay there! The location of the apartment could not have been better! 
The bathroom for ourselves was awesome!

Maria made us feel very welcome even though we did not speak spanish and she did not speak english. Maria's house was very comfortable, clean and tidy. It is situated in a prime location and was close to a number of tourist attractions. Maria made a big effort to help us and I would highly recommend this listing.

Maria and Juan were amazing hosts! This was our first airbnb experience and I was scared it might be awkward to stay with another family that I had never met, I was wrong. As soon as we walked in Maria made us feel at home.  She was warm and kind and gave us advice on where to go and how to get there. I also enjoyed being able to use my spanish with her. Her son, Juan, speaks english well and is very nice. Since he is 20, he was able to tell us about all the nightclubs and bars in the area. 
The privacy was great. The room is at the end of the hall away from the living room and kitchen and has its own hallway and bathroom. Maria gave us a key for entry to the building, her apartment, and to lock our bedroom. We never locked our bedroom door when we left for the day. We knew we didn't need to.
