The room has an armoire (closet) in there for you to put your things in. The bed was super comfy and the wifi worked great. My fiance and I were even able to relax one night and watch a netflix show. The room looks exactly like it is pictured. 
Maria and Juan never came into the room or bugged us. When we got back at night they just asked if we enjoyed our day and then offered us cold water for our room. 
The shower and bathroom are small but still works great. My 6'4 fiance was still able to stand in it. Water also got and stayed nice and hot. Maria provided towels and shampoo. 
The area is one of the best areas to stay at in Barcelona. The Lucia metro station, which will get you anywhere you need to go in Barcelona, is literally a 1 minute walk from her apartment. Maybe even 30 seconds. She is on a side street right off of Las Ramblas. Which was great because we were steps away from tons of bar and restaurants but not too close to all the noise. The room was pretty quiet. However, I still recommend taking air plugs if you are a light sleeper. 
Maria is also just a 5 minute walk to the Gothic quarters, which is an amazing area. My fiance and I were randomly walking around on our first night and stumbled into a food and wine festival going on in the Gothic Quarters, it was so much fun.
Stay with Maria and Juan! You won't regret it.

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona, it's one of our favorite cities. Staying at Maria's was fantastic. Her location can not be beat. The metro is a few steps away from her home and there is an elevator in the building. Her house is spotless and our accommodations were great. Having a private bathroom off our bedroom gives a feel of your own little apartment. Sleeping was a little difficult as we could hear neighbors talking at all hours of the night. That would not deter us from staying again, her place is great. Maria is working on her english and her son speaks perfect english. We were able to communicate just fine. She is definitely recommended by us.

Maria and her son were the perfect host. Very helpful with check in and check out timings. The place is a at a great location off LA rambla, very clean, and good shower. Would highly recommend anyone visiting barcelona.
La habitación privada cuenta con un baño muy pequeño y el piso de la ducha es muy resbaloso. Una de las ventajas, es su ubicación muy cercana al metro.

Logement très bien placé sur les ramblas et chambre très propre!
Malgré des voisins bruyant le premier soir, ce fut un bon séjour

Maria was a great host! Even though our stay was for one night, she did everything she can to help us stay comfortably at her place. Her English was not too good and I didn't get to see her son who speaks good English, but she has the language of heart and we had no problem. We really felt welcomed by her hospitality.

The location of the apartment is ideal. It is close to many Barcelona highlights and has easy access to public transport links. The room and private bathroom are exactly as described in the listing, with all the essentials. María was a perfect hostess. She was easy to get in touch with, and great to get back to us with any queries we had. She was also very helpful in recommending some great restaurants and cafes, and other helpful hints for getting around Barcelona. We highly recommend the coffee and breakfast at Satan's Coffee Corner! We had a wonderful weekend in Barcelona and hope to visit again soon!

The place is clean and tidy. The fact that it comes with an attached private bathroom offers much personal space and convenience. While the room/flat is not super sound-proof, that is clearly understandable. It is also just a few steps off La Rambla and metro station Liceu, ideally located to gain easy access to different attractions and good restaurants.

Maria was a great host. She waited for us for the welcome and was very helpful showing us the house and the area. I felt very comfortable staying there. The appartmert has an excellent location just next to the Ramblas and the Gottic and the Raval. The room is really comfortable, has a lot of light, a private bathroom and great windows.

The whole stay in this flat was perfect. Great location. Maria and her children are a great people who wants to help with everything. Check in and check out any time without any problems. Rooms very comfortable with bathroom. Can't say any bad word :) I recommend. If I come again to Barcelona I'm sure it will be a perfect place to stay :)

Maria's AirBnB location was absolutely perfect for experiencing authentic daily life as well as tourism in Barcelona. With it being right on Las Ramblas there was very easy access to metros, trains, popular sites, bars, and nightlife. As far as the the family goes, anyone who is able to stay with Maria, her son, and (if you're lucky enough) her extended family should feel very grateful. They were extremely sweet and helpful. My only regret is not staying a few days longer :( but hopefully there will be a next time!

I had a wonderful time at Juan and Maria place!
They are really nice. The place is just what you are looking for and very central.
I made too much noise the second night, please accept my apologies Juan and Maria.

People, don t look any further, that s the place you need in Barcelona.

Maria gave us a warm welcome to Barcelona, making us truly feel at home.  The room was clean and private, with an ensuite bathroom.  We especially liked the good water pressure and hot water, something that was not consistent during our visit to other cities in Spain.  We especially liked the location - a quieter street on the corner of Las Ramblas, the biggest shopping and dining area in Barcelona.  Maria made herself open to questions and helped us check in early.  We would definitely stay here again.

Nous garderons un très bon souvenir de notre séjour chez Maria ! Maria et son fils Juan sont des personnes très accueillantes et chaleureuses. Bien que ne parlant pas français ni anglais (et nous pas l'espagnol), Maria nous a donné de bons conseils sur les lieux à visiter et les transports en commun. Juan parle très bien anglais et son enthousiasme est communicatif ! Vous pouvez aller les yeux fermés dans les cafés ou restaurants qu'il vous conseillera !
Nous avons aussi beaucoup apprécié la situation centrale du logement : idéale, surtout pour un séjour assez court. 
C'est sûr, nous n'hésiterons pas à revenir chez eux la prochaine fois !

We are welcomed by the host Maria, she's not an English speaker, but still very communicative, warm-hearted and very helpful.  The apartment sits in the heart of La Rambra, directly at L3 Licea station, 1 minute walk, making us very easy to get anywhere, either on foot or take metro. There are also bike rental in the near, giving us more choices touring the city. Other than the unbeatable location, the room is not too big, but neat and clean, with a convenient private bathroom. Despite locating in the most popular street, it is very queit. Maria and his son Juan is living in, they share kitchen and living room with us, but left us great privacy. On our "tourist" schedule, we hardly met them time to time, especially we never got chance to met Juan, but when needed, Maria is always around. We had a wounderful stay at Maria's, and would recommend to others.

I had a great experience staying with Maria and her son. 

They were both very welcoming . I would stay again in a heart beat !

Look no further! This is the place to stay when you are in Barcelona. Location is superb! Cleanliness of the room is superb! Both Maria and Juan are superb! Responsiveness of the host is first class. MUST stay!

Abbiamo trascorso un week fantastico! Nota dolente, stanza e il bagno molto piccoli e gli spazi ristretti ma in compenso è tutto molto pulito e profumato! Maria è una persona squisita, gentilissima è pronta a soddisfare ogni esigenza! Ma un 10 e lode va sopratutto alla posizione della casa, al centro di Barcellona sotto la Rambla e a due passi da tutto. Consigliatissimo!
Logement au top, super emplacement, maria a été super accueillante

Maria was very a welcoming host, the room was perfectly clean, comfortable as described. The place was very close to the frequently visited places (La Rambla, Catalunya), the metro station was 20 meters from the flat. I had a very relaxing stay. Maximally recommended!

Couldn't imagine a better place to stay in Barcelona other than at Maria's extremely cosy and modern apartment in the centre of Barcelona! Maria is extremely friendly and very helpful! 
Her food recommendations are 10/10! 
I've also met Maria's son JUAN who also gave me an amazing tips such as places to eat or places to go! JUAN and MARIA deserves an excellence in hospitality! I will miss M&J beautiful apartment and their hospitality.

Firstly, Maria and Quan are amazing hosts, hospitality was perfect. We were with my 4yrs old son, who enjoyed lot with Maria:)  The Rooms were well equipped, nice and clean. The location is perfectly made for people to enjoy the city and crowd outside, everything is reachable in just couple of minutes walk!!! I definitely suggest this listing if someone want to visit Barcelona, La Rambla:)

La gentilezza e la disponibilità di Maria, il bagno privato, la stanza in più per nostro figlio, la posizione centralissima della casa e la fermata  Liceu della metro a 100m scarsi fanno di questa casa la soluzione ideale per una viaggio famigliare di più giorni a Barcellona.

What a beautiful place and what a lovely warm and welcoming people.
Maria, Jorge and Juan were the best. The back part of the apartment is nice and private and very quiet. You enter bedroom nr 1 which has a door to the hallway with bathroom and another bedroom in the back. Perfect for 2 or 3 people to stay. Communication is amazing, very helpful and great service. Definitely would go again.

Maria's son Juan was our host while she was out of town. He was very welcoming and shared lots of information with us when we arrived. He spoke excellent English. The room was PERFECT for our family of 3 - double bed in one room, small hall to the private bathroom and single room for our son at the other end. It was like having our own little apartment. It was very clean and comfortable and a fantastic location! Would absolutely stay there again and recommend to others.

Clean attractive apartment at a reasonable price but we did not get a more personal welcome than a typical hotel provides. Nice neighborhood but the host has no map or list of supermarkets, etc for guest use. Juan is quick to answer emails on behalf of Maria (who speaks no English) but he was very rarely home in person during our four days. Maria never suggested we call Juan for answers, so i presume the phone number provided during reservation is Maria's own number. The bedroom is smaller than pictured, so the bed crowds a space cut up by two hallway doors in opposite corners and an armoire in a third corner. The bathroom and the kitchen are located on opposite sides outside the bedroom. So if one guest is moving things in or out of the armoire, the other guest can access either the bathroom or the kitchen but not both except by climbing on the bed. The guest bedroom door is at the end of a long (and nice) hallway that connects the kitchen, the living room and all other rooms. So the bedroom door has to stay closed if guests want privacy, otherwise the interior is visible from everywhere in the hallway. Keeping it closed can slow air circulation on a hot summer day, but for me the bigger concern would be the absence of a normal and fixed heat source in the bedroom for winter because in the US a portable heater is considered a potential fire hazard (except for temporary purposes) and therefore illegal in a rented bedroom. Fortunately there is a fixed electric heater in the bathroom 22 feet from the guest bed. I recommend this rental for its cleanliness and great location for sightseeing and the airport bus.
Super appart. Très central et pratique avec deux vrais chambres séparées et une salle de bain. Notre hôte a été charmante et réactive même au dernier moment.

I went to Barcelona with my mum and cousin for couple of nights to celebrate my cousins birthday and offer her an unforgettable experience of a city she had never visited before.

I can truly say that, thanks to Maria, Juan and their home, we had one of the best holidays together which will be hard to forget!

The house cannot be more centrally located, with everything reachable by foot (saving you money on transportation), the rooms and bathroom were very clean and comfortable and the breakfast coffee was fantastic (I am Italian and I love my coffee and this one is Good!).

But what really set This experience apart is Maria's kindness and willingness to take the time to suggest us the best way to make the most out of Barcelona, as well as to recommend us a fantastic local place to eat (one of the best arroz in my life!) - this is what really enabled us to have an absolutely wonderful time!

For these reason (location, cleanliness and welcoming) I will certainly recommend this accommodation to everyone who wish to have a good time and make the most of Barca!

Gracias Maria & Juan! :)
Maria was a great and fantastic host. Very helpful and friendly. She can recommend you local places in the neighbourhood
Fantastic location, gracious hostess (Maria), comfy bed and private area to ourselves. Who could ask for more, with the Rambla just steps from your door?  Great experience!
Maria and family was such great people! The apartment was great too! Close to the tube and Las Ramblas. Overall we really love the place the whole time there.
Great place! Clean. Enough towels and it is so close to every sites! Maria and juan were also very friendly! I will definitely visit here one more time if i come back to barcelona

Maria and Juan were absolutely amazing. Such a nice experience in a really great location, I would recommend to anyone.
Our stay with Maria only added to the amazing experience of Barcelona.

Maria was a sweetheart! She was very welcoming, and flexible with our checkout. Although there was a language barrier, we were both able to understand each other (and only needed (Hidden by Airbnb) translate once!). I ran into her son, and he was pleasant as well. 

The bathroom is a bit small, so if you're picky or want something lavish you may want to look elsewhere. However, everything was clean, neat, and had everything we needed. 

The best part? THE LOCATION! Just steps away from La Ramblas without being exactly on it. The Liceu train stop is right out front as well. I would definitely stay here again.

Maria è una ospite disponibile e molto gentile. La descrizione della casa è assolutamente veritiera e la posizione è assolutamente fantastica. Casa tranquilla ma a 30 mt dalla fermata della fermata Liceu e al cuore della Rambla. Consiglio vivamente.

The best location in Barcelona!!! Just around the corner in Las Rablas, but still quiet room to the inner yard. It is just like staying in a hotel, because you have your own bathroom, but you can still have the local touch and new friends, if you like. The room and bathroom were very clean, and the bed and pillows very comfortable. Maria and her son and really friendly and nice. María took me out for a walk and some tapas in the evening and we had a good time. I felt very welcome! Muchas gracias María por todo, fue una experiencia muy buena!
Elle a été disponible, nous a attendu malgré notre retard. Le logement était conforme à la desciprition et le quartier très bien
Muy buena habitación, se duerme muy bien porque hay mucha tranquilidad
Really great stay at Maria's place! We enjoy the private bathroom and the location. Room very clean and Maria is a great host!

La estadía en lo de María fue excelente. Ella es una persona muy atenta y esta en todos los detalles. Tanto ella como sus hijos nos hicieron sentir como en casa.  La ubicación es perfecta a 30 mts de la rambla. Las habitaciones muy limpias.....sin duda para recomendar y volver. HASTA PRONTO MARIA!!!

María est une hôte adorable, accueillante, disponible et discrète. A 30 mètres des Ramblas, cette chambre est pourtant très calme. Propre, douillette et claire. Elle possède sa propre petite salle de bain (+wc) et peut accueillir facilement trois personnes dans deux chambres séparées reliées par un petit couloir.   Je vous recommande fortement cette chambre pour un séjour agréable en plein cœur du quartier le plus touristique.  Quant à moi j'ai adoré María et mon prochain séjour à Barcelone se fera forcément chez elle!
Great Host!
Best ever. Super nice family. I would go again for sure! Great location by Las Ramblas as well :)
La habitación de María es muy acogedora y el piso no podría tener mejor localización. María y su famila son todos muy amables y serviciales, muy recomendable!
Maria and her family were so nice and welcoming. Her apartment was in a very cool central part of town.
쪼금 덥긴 하지만 친절한 호스트와 깔끔한 집을 만나서 좋았어요.

Maria nous a réservé un très bon accueil et prodigué de bons conseils pour notre séjour. L' appartement est très bien situé pour les visites, les chambres sont très calmes et on y dort (Website hidden by Airbnb) nous revenons a Barcelone c'est sur que nous reviendrons chez Maria.
Great host!

Maria's house is very nice and clean, also very strategic place, so close to the metro station, restaurants, and the city attraction La Ramblas. Maria is very nice and funny. We love our stay and we'd love to stay there again.
房间装修非常棒!地点也特别的棒!Mary非常非常的热情｡
Maria gave us wonderful welcome and explained all places to visit. House is center of the city and we enjoyed a lot.  Thanks Maria for your help in Barcelona.
Perfect host. Highly recommended. Thank you

Maria was very nice, gave us lots of useful information! The appartment has a perfect location, next to a metro station and next to La Rambla. 
The private bathroom is a plus very much appreciated ! 
We recommend this room
Super friendly, recommended restaurants for dinner.
Adoramos a estadia na casa da maria! A casa é linda, e a localização maravilhosa, fica ao perto da lá rambla e a alguns passos do metro! Casa limpa, roupas de cama limpas, tudo perfeito!
Maria和她的家人都很热情,教我们使用洗衣机咖啡机打印机｡房间收拾得很干净,床也挺舒服｡关键是位置好,出门20米就是地铁站,到哪都方便,也不用担心晚上回去会不安全｡房间朝向庭院,非常安静｡

Our stay at Marias place was excellent, the room and the bathroom were very clean (even cleaner than in most hotel rooms we've been), the place is very central (close to Metro Station "Liceu") and Maria is a friendly and very welcoming person. We would totally recommend staying there and will sure be back!
Juan and Maria were really nice and open. They were more than happy to give us recommendations show us around and help us with anything. Really great people. Highly recommended! :)

A warm and welcoming family home with a private space to unwind and your own bathroom. The location is fantastic, at your doorstep is everything you need including the metro and all the food and nightlife, but the room remains quiet at night.

Maria was very accommodating, I got turned around on the location and she came and found me, I was very grateful! The room and accommodations were just what my mom and I needed. The Ramblas is a fun location with lots of great food and a close metro station. Thanks again Maria!

Cet emplacement est l'idéal pour visiter Barcelone
C"est pres de tout.
Cependant l'endroit est tres bruyant et les chambres donnent sur une cour intérieure
Tous les bruits et odeurs de cigarettes sont perceptibles
Les barcelonais sont des gens qui se couchent très tard
Malgré tout c'est un bel espace à reserver

Maria is a wonderful host, she is very caring and helpful and I felt very welcome at her place. The room and bathroom were spotlessly clean and tidy. The location of Maria's place is amazing, within walking distance to many of the main sights and the area is inundated with shops, bars, restaurants and cafes. I would definitely recommend Maria's place.

Maria's place has the best location you can get. It is near the main street in Barcelona but on the other side it is quiet so we slept verry well. She is a great host, accesible and she gave us many valuable tips. We liked the fact that she live in the same apartament but you don't have that impression. She's like the friendly ghost, if you need her,she'll be there. We hightly recomand this place to the families with children! Wish Maria a verry good luck and we will definitly recomend her to our friends.
非常好的房东,房子布置很整齐!有次正好碰上他们吃晚饭,羊排特别好吃

Maria was a really great host. She gave us a lot of informations about Barcelona and recommended several restaurants and places to visit. The room and bathroom were clean and big enough. The appartment is located directly at the famous las ramblas, and was just a few steps away from the metro. We enjoyed the stay in Marias appartment.
Maria was very responsive and flexible regarding check in/out. Spoke limited English but this was not really an issue. Very clean.

This owner may not speak much english but she knows what clean is and she knows what you need, towels ,bits of carpet on floor,hot water etc I am sure she would give you a cup of tea but I did not want to ask for fear of rejection. Nice lady as well with lots of coffee shops outside her flat .thanks 
(But Please provide a kettle and cups instant coffee for future UK residents )

Great location, wonderful host , very kind & friendly.
room was clean and neat. perfect for a couple (these is even 1 extra room for a kid if needed).
i would definitely come back here if i travel to Barcelona ever again.
Maria is really wonderful person, even though we had issue to communicate in english, she still gave us great useful tips.
Maria is a delightful host. She has terrible noisy neighbours. They drive her nuts late at night, as they did us!

Wir fanden den Unterkunft sehr gut. Es ist alles wie geschrieben, gar nicht klein, sehr sauber, die Lage ist super, María antwortet super schnell und ist sehr nett und hilfreich. Das Rauchen riecht man gar nicht.
Ich fand nur den Preis ein bisschen hoch im Vergleich mit privaten Apartaments mit Küche, Wohnzimmer, Schlaffzimmer gegenüber von María, wo wir für den selben Preis waren (natürlich Monaten davor gebucht). Aber es ist auf jeden Fall sehr empfehlenswert.

Maria made us feel very welcome in her home, which is located right next to Liceu Metro on Las Ramblas - very busy until the early hours.   
Perfectly situated for seeing Barcelona.  Our rooms and furnishings were clean and the beds comfortable - all as pictured.  The shared kitchen is ideal for making coffee or a snack.

Maria's house is in a great location just off La Ramblas. Maria was very welcoming and very helpful. The bed was comfortable and the space was private. I would recommend this house to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona. Thank you Maria for a wonderful stay.
Excellent and convenient location. Room was clean.

María es muy simpática y te da muchas informaciones sobre Barcelona, lo que es interesante, a ver o hacer. 
El apartamiento es muy limpio, acogedor, grande, y en el centro de Barcelona (muy cerca de las Ramblas). 
¡ hasta la proxima vez en Barcelona !

Maria was a very nice host.  She offer suggestions and help us when we needed to know howto get to other places we wanted to go.  She was very responsive to our need and at the same time respectful of our privacy.

Maria's house is too high to walk up the stairs. She said the elevator was broken that morning. My family walked up to her house with huge baggage. My mother was in trouble because she has knee pain and it made her pain worse. If you travel with your parents, ask her if the elevator has been fixed.
Maria is a great host. Caring and concern. the accommodation is in great location, and rooms are clean

La atención de Maria es estupenda, accede a cualquier consulta y brinda información muy acertada. En cuanto al lugar es muy acogedor, muy recomendable ya que tiene fácil acceso a transportes públicos y muy céntrico.

We had an amazing stay at Maria's place. She is so warm and helpful. She was very excited to share her favourite restaurants with us. Her place is absolutely perfectly located in the city with top attractions close by. Her house is quiet and clean. Highly recommended.
María es una excelente anfitriona y el lugar inmejorable
Una experiencia muy buena. La habitación con baño privado es moderna, limpia y confortable. A 20 metros del Liceo. María es encantadora.
Muy buena atención me hizo sentir como si fuese mi casa.

Maria was a wonderful host. She is very kind and friendly. Her son was very kind and helpful as well. The location was great, walkable to many places. We had a great stay and if ever we are back in Barcelona, we'll definitely come back to stay with her.
The room was very clean and it has excelletn location
Nuestra primera experiencia en este tipo de alojamiento con Airbnb. Excelente estada y Maria excelente anfitriona, muy atenta con todo. La habitación con baño privado es un puntazo. Recomendable 100%

Great location! Very close to La Rambla and Liceu metro station (1 minute walk) so very easy to see all the sights in Barcelona. Host was very friendly and her family was welcoming as well. I recommend this place.

Maria is a best host I have ever met. She is kind and lovely. The room is too spacious to live. And the house is located in the central of Barcelona. You can walk every sight and the brach. Everything in Barcelona is good!

Our stay at Maria's was lovely. She was an impeccable host, warm without being pushy. We got coffee and towels, and she explained where we could find a bar on our first night.
The flat's interior is pleasent, everything is in good shape, clean and tidy. We had no complaints.
The flat has a supreme location, about 10 metres off La Rambla. Plenty of nice bars around, and the port is easily in walking distance.

Overall I would definitely recommend this place. Good value, with a pleasent apartment and a lovely host. I reserve the fifth star for truly great value for money, and La Rambla is a bit shady at night. So don't get the wrong idea from that;) I hope to stay here again.

What a fantastic stay it was with Maria in Barcelona! She communicated very well from the start.  Maria was very friendly and welcoming, she even spent the time to recommend several places on the map.  Her home is exactly as described, bonus points for having the two beds in separate rooms.
The train station is very close to the apartment, but we were able to get to most places just by walking.
Thanks again Maria!

María is really kind and her son speaks good English so everything was really clear. Our room and the bathroom was perfect - good location, clean, big enough and also had heating (which is not obvious in Barcelona). We had a very good time in Barcelona thanks to María.

Our lovely host Maria, was very welcoming and made us feel at home for our very short stay before heading to Sitges....our room was beautiful and spacious and was decorated with love...We also had our own bathroom to use which was also clean and very pleasant. Gracias Maria
sehr sehr zentrale Lage und denn noch ruhig, Metro 1 Min. ander Sehenswürdigkeiten kann auch zu Fuss erreicht werden.
Excelente ubicación , maravillosa anfitriona.
Great communication& super convenient location!!!!it's very easy for u to discover Barcelona here.The apartment is also very clean&cozy^^thanks a lot!!!
Estudio comodo, con acceso con ascensor y una buena opcion es tomar el dormitorio con baño privado.
O local eh muitíssimo bem localizado no coração das Las Ramblas a 20 passos do metro..os quartos não são tão claros como aparece na foto, mas são extremamente limpos e bem cuidados.

Really awesome location and a very kind host. The room was nice and comfy and had a heating, which was very nice for the February climate in Barcelona. Everything worked fine and we enjoyed our trip very much.
Super homey. Lovely host. Great location. Close to everything. Maria is very kind.

Nice basic room. 
Thr hosts are very nice and helpful.
Fantastic stay and hosts.  Everything as advertised.
The room is really close to Metro and City-center.  it is good to stay for sightseeing.
Logement agréable, avec une hote peu présente.
Muy buena ubicación y mejor anfitriona! Lugar muy cómodo y limpio!
Maria and her son were extremely friendly and nice. We had a blast during the stay. The location is great and close to metro and some attractions.
Maria's place was exactly as described. She and her son were great hosts and we didn't have any problems! Would recommend 100%
地理位置极佳,房东人好｡

De locatie van deze Bnb is uitstekend ,op 50 m van de Ramla(zijstr.)en centrale uitvalbasis vlak bij Metrohalte Liceu .Maria is heel behupzaam en we zijn  vriendelijk ontvangen.Spanjaarden leven ook 's nachts maar de geluidshinder was beperkt.

The location of her place was perfect, right by Ramblas St. with plenty of restaurants, grocery stores, and shopping near by. Close to the hop on, hop off,  bus to airport,  and Maritime Museum. Our room and bath were fine and the elevator worked well. The problem we had were other guests along with Maria stayed up until over 2am drinking, smoking, and talking loud making it very hard to sleep.

Maria's apartment is in a perfect location just off La Rambla.  Despite being close a very busy street the bedroom is on an inner courtyard and is quiet at night. We received a warm welcome from Maria and family and were encouraged to use her place as a home away from home.
Very accommodating and flexible!
Logement simple, propre et calme et situé à 30m de La Rambla. Excellent accueil de Maria qui nous a donné des conseils très pratiques.

Excelente, Maria fue muy atenta con nosotros y hospitalaria, nos ayudo mucho en nuestra estadía, hicimos grandes charlas, nos recomendó lugares, buenisimos, una limpieza y atención GENIAL!!!!!!!!!!! Si volvemos, no dudo volver a lo de Maria
Great location next to La Rambla. We enjoyed our stay.
Maria's place is perfectly located off Le remblas st. You can easily walk to lots of shops, restaurants and Metro. Our stay was ok and good value for the money.
Could not have found a more central location. Great place and great host!
Exelente ubicacion, muy tranquilo el departamento y lo mejor el trqto de Maria. Recomendable

We clearly communicated what time we would arrive. We ended up waiting an hour and a half for our hosts son to arrive. Communication was very poor and we received no notice that there would be a delay. Other than that the room was clean and the location is good.

Super nice host. She cannot speak English well but she makes an effort to show her kindness through body language. Anyway, he has a boy who can help her to speak English. The location is extremely strategic, only few steps from la rambla and liceu metro station! She opens the other room (it should be opened to a group of 4 people only) because she sees our big luggages. Very clean and tidy, you can see the details of how she puts everything. All facilities are there (free coffee tea, washing machine, fridge).

She was very nice and kind. She put everthing to our room which we need. We used her house like our house. I can really recommend her house for Barcelona trip because it's too big and comfortable and also it's on La rambla street so it was too easy to go out and come back to home.
recommended. 1 minute to L3 Liceu station. 2 rooms with a bathroom, you can have the privacy.
Sentral beliggenhet hvis du vil oppleve bylivet, shoppe, gå på kafé.   Hjelpsom og blid vert, også fleksibel.

Excelente decisión fue la de elegir el hogar de María para alojarnos en Barcelona. La ubicación es perfecta, en plena Rambla, y la comodidad de la habitación es muy buena, ya que nos alojamos tres  personas y cuenta con una cama matrimonial en un espacio totalmente separado de la otra cama, es prácticamente 2 habitaciones con baño privado, independientes del resto de la casa. Lamentablemente no conocimos en persona a María, pero la comunicación con ella fue muy buena. Al llegar nos recibió su hijo, quien fue muy amable con nosotros. Feliz elegiría nuevamente este alojamiento para pasar una estadía en Barcelona.

This home was a fabulous home away from home! The location was absolutely the best possible location in Barcelona. It is truly just steps away from Las Ramblas and the Liceu metro stop was at the corner. 
Maria's home was quite lovely and very comfortable, while Maria herself was very gracious and hospitable. She even had coffee and muffins for us, which was unexpected but greatly appreciated. There was an array of business cards and helpful information in her very welcoming entrance foyer, and she answered any question we asked.
The rooms for us were much more like a private suite than simply a room. First there was a locking door to separate you from the other areas of the flat, then the largest bedroom, a hallway with a comfortable and clean bathroom, then a second bedroom with a smaller (twin size) bed. All perfect for us. The hall and both bedrooms have very tall windows. The elevator to the flat was also very appreciated after we spent our days walking all over town.
The street seemed quite lively, even into the night on the weekend, but I always felt very safe and no noise whatsoever traveled to our bedrooms.
Maria was always friendly and pleasant when we saw her, but also gave us plenty of space. 
Staying at Maria's house added nothing but lovely memories to our great time in Barcelona. I wouldn't hesitate for a minute to stay at this great place on any future trip to this wonderful city.
Maria practices excellent communication, and will above and beyond in exceeding expectations. She is the future of Airbnb!

Maria is a perfect host.
Thanks you for everything
nice place

Nice place & amazing location and very friendly host. Only issue was there were loud slamming of the doors in the middle of the night. Not sure if it was from the wind or intentionally by someone. Apart from that had an okay stay at the place
Une chambre impeccable et calme avec un emplacement central, proche de la Place de Catalunya. Accueil sympathique.
El lugar es muy cómodo y Maria es muy servicial y limpia! Recomendamos ampliamente hospedarse con ella!

Juan was extremely kind and helpful in guiding us where to go! 
A great apartment for all ages.

Maria was a great host, she was very flexible with our check in and she gave us some great advice about the city and location.

The room was as described and Maria offered us use of the kitchen and other amenities in the apartment.

All in all it was good place to stay.

La chambre est très agréable. Elle est directement connectée à une salle de bain privée et il ne faut donc pas passer par les communs pour passer de la chambre à la salle de bain. En outre, le lit est confortable, le lieu est calme et Maria est très accueillante et agréable!
Great location!

Maria's beautiful home is so centrally located it makes exploring the streets of Barcelona very easy. The house is clean and tidy, great internet and comfortable beds for three. We felt very at home here and were able to use the fridge and kitchen as needed. Maria was helpful when we needed to store our bags a bit longer and the building is secure. Maria gave ha a useful briefing on how to stay safe and where not to eat! All in all, everything you want from an airbnb. We'll stay again.
Maria was very helpful in providing us with directions and suggestions. Her home is in the perfect location. Would definitely stay there again!

Maria and her family were gracious hosts for our stay in Barcelona. They gave us a warm welcome, showed us to our cheerful bedrooms and clean, well equipped bathroom. Their place is a great base for getting to museums, nightlife, beach, and parks as their apartment is just a few steps off of La Rambla, 1 minutes from the Metro station, and a 6 minute walk to Plaça de Catalunya. WiFi worked great. We also appreciated Maria's recommendations on which museum tours to a book a few weeks before we arrived. Very comfortable central space for relaxing between excursions, getting ready for next moves, and sleeping- highly recommended.
Maria ha sido una anfitriona muy buena, la casa estaba muy bien y era todo muy limpio y ordenado, repetiremos una próxima vez!

Clean and central place, it was great. It is exactly what you see in the pictures. Maria's apartment is 1 minute walk from the Ramblas, and all the main shops and restaurants. Only 5 minutes away from there you can take the city bus tour, that bus takes you everywhere in Barcelona. Maria is amazing very informative and kind, she replies quickly to messages. Thank you for everything Maria.

Sono stata ospite di Maria con mio marito e mia figlia,  ci siamo trovati molto bene, Maria  è un Host molto attenta e premurosa, ottima pulizia e pur essendo in una zona centralissima la nostra stanza era rivolta verso l'interno ed era silenziosissima. Zona strategica per raggiungere qualsiasi luogo.

Maria was a great host and her home was lovely. She does not speak English well, but we were able to communicate. The apartment was as advertised - the room and bathroom were both separated from the house, neat, and tidy. My husband got sick while we were there, so we didn't go out much, but it's right off Las Ramblas and you have easy access to everything. Even though the adjoining street is busy, the apartment was quiet. Also, building has an elevator which was nice.
Schoon en compleet appartement. Perfect voor 3 of 4 personen. Direct aan Ramblas. Vriendelijk en behulpzame gastvrouw. Aanrader.

Maria and her son were great hosts! Super kind, friendly and very easy to get along with. Maria was very helpful with tips of restaurants and public transports. They've recently got a puppy, Rihanna, that is the sweetest dog! We were so happy to get a bit of love from her! 
The apartment is very well located, close to everything you'll need. The room feels quite isolated from the house, and has its own bathroom, which was the reason why we chose Maria's place over other options. I was there with my mum and sister and we were all happy with our stay.
绝佳的位置,出家门走十步就是兰布拉大道,旁边就是著名的博盖利亚市场｡

The apartment is right next to La Rambla and a metro stop. Beautiful apartment and very well connected to everywhere. The Placa Catalunya is also very close from where we can get direct bus to the airport. Very convenient and we had a lovely stay here.
Maria is a great host and was very helpful during the events on Aug 17. Her apartment is very conveniently located and perfect for our family of 3. I miss Barcelona already!

Très bon emplacement, appartement très propre et calme. 
Très bon accueil de María.
Je recommande!
We had a great time in Barcelona and location is really good to reach good places and bus tours. The down side the room doesn't have AC and it was too hot in the room.

great location! really close to placa catalunya and there is a metro right by the house. 
Maria gave us a key to the room+house+entrance of the building so we felt free coming in and out at any time!
the room isnt big but it's great for 2 people, everything was clean and it basically looks like the pictures show.
we were worried a bit about have noise coming from La Ramblas but it was really quiet during the nights.
she doesn't have an air conditioning but has a ventilater. we came to Barcelona when it wasnt so hot so it worked out well. 
she has a dog but tried her best so that we dont feel her presence 
Maria was really kind, gave us many tips and info about everything!
definetly recommend!!

Maria's place is what you're looking for if you want to be centric and close to the main tourist attractions. Las Ramblas is a place not to miss when visiting Barcelona and this apartment is literally by it. We had our own bathroom as well which is great as you don't have to worry about sharing with anyone else. It is true that the pictures looked only slightly different and also it got quite hot during the night, we had higher expectation for the price being, but I guess the price is more about the location. However, our visit was nice and María was a very nice host.
María es una excelente anfitriona. Nos hizo sentir como en casa desde que llegamos. Todo muy limpio y tal cual las fotos.

Marias Appartment war sehr gemütlich und praktisch eingerichtet. Wir hatten ein eigenes Bad und konnten gemütrlich in der Küche frühstücken. Jederzeit konnten wir Maria etwas fragen oder mit ihr reden, wenn sie da war. Das Appartment hat eine tolle Lage, von der man Barcelona erkunden kann.
Wir würden jederzeit wieder gerne bei Maria wohnen.
Terrfiic location for walking and public transportation
My two friends and I had a wonderful time at Maria's place. She was so warm, welcoming, and helpful. The place is in a wonderful location!
Incredible location, steps from La Rambla and Liceu Metro stop.
Barcelona es hermosa y mas si tenes una anfitriona como Maria. La habitación y el trato fue excelente. Vamos a volver seguro!
Muy bueno todo,bien ubicado y la hospitalidad de María y su hijo excelentes

Great location, very clean.  Maria doesn't speak much English but her son does and he was very helpful with directions and travel tips.  Bedroom is small but nice and bed is comfortable.  Bath is small and shower did not have a lot of hot water but I don't think that is the usual situation.
This is a must stay - close to everything and also a very nice posh room

Ik verbleef met mijn zoon van 14 op deze plek. Schoon en netjes. We werden welkom ontvangen door de moeder van Maria. Helaas sprak zij geen Engels dus communicatie ging met handen en voeten. We hadden allebei een eigen kamer. Kleine nette badkamer. Locatie van de woning is top. Paar stappen vanaf La Rambla. Dichtbij een metrostation. Er is een lift in het gebouw aanwezig. Totaal geen last van de geluiden van de drukke straat. ‘s Nacht wel veel geluid vanuit het huis. Het is er erg rumoerig. Deze plek is een aanrader voor jong en oud.

This apartment is so central to everything with a bar just downstairs and next door which will help you go through Spanish wines, it is 20 steps from the most famous street and the gothic quarter. I can’t even describe how central and fantastic this area is.. the metro is so close and so easy to use. 
The room is so grand for the cost with private bathroom and as I travelled with my daughter we had separate bedrooms. 
We were able to use all kitchen and laundry facilities and Maria is such a help with transport and areas to visit ( her son speaks fantastic English and such a joy to talk to). 
We actually picked their place as they had a puppy, we are animal lovers and we were so lucky to enjoy the love of Maria’s Dalmatian puppy! 
Staying at Maria’s house felt like visiting with family in the best way!
I cannot recommend her highly enough!!
Increíble lugar. Excelente ubicación, María es una gran host y te solucionará cualquier duda que puedas tener. Recomendado 100%.
Every thing was lovely Maria perfect host very sweet and accomadting do not hesitate to book - great value too thanks
Maria is super friendly, accommodating and hospitable. High marks !

El alojamiento es muy cómodo, el lugar es increíble, maria es una persona muy buena y esta disponible para despejarte cualquier duda. Tuvimos un problema con nuestro vuelo y de todas formas nos recibió de manera perfecta, es super recomendable para pasar unos días en Barcelona, cerca de las ramblas y super cómodo a todos los lugares turísticos de Barcelona, definitivamente volveríamos a ir.

Excelente estancia! Limpieza inmejorable, muy buena ubicación!
Si Maria nos acepta estaremos de nuevo con ella en nuestra próxima visita!
Hôte attentionnée
모든게 정말 좋지만 위치와 청결도가 정말 좋습니다.
Hôte attentionnée et chambre parfait pour passer une ou deux nuit ! Merci pour l’accueil !

The place is really nice, location is GREAT, hosts are very kind. Maria and her son Juan were very helpful, gave us suggestions where to eat and where to go. I highly suggest to stay there, and would come back again next time I come to Barcelona.
Everything was wonderful. Perfect location, very new building, warm and clean room. But the best thing was a kind host Maria! She has a warm heart and always helped us with beautiful smile :)

Great clean place and location, walkable to shops & restaurants. When out & about Just be aware and keep your belongings very close to you. My friend’s backpack was stolen at Cappuccino restaurant at La Rambla, 76, (very close to Maria’s place)not sure how since we both were sitting at a table and backpack was wedged between the wall and her leg!
Right off La Rambla, perfect location close to the metro and makes getting around Barcelona a breeze.  Maria was so friendly and helpful and the space was perfect for a short stay in Barcelona!
Maria was very helpful and hospitable. Made me feel very welcome.

The place where we stayed 'La Rambla', I think is the most happening and lively place in Barcelona. And for me this has been the most important aspect for staying at this apartment.

We had everything in the area ranging from shopping complexes, food stalls, local bars, pizzerias to churches and even one UNESCO World Heritage site (Güell's Palace to be precise).

As for our host, Maria's as good a host as you would expect. And for the apartment, it's really a nice and quite place to spend the night. The only downside I can think of is the apartment's WiFi which regularly got disrupted and we had no internet for a while. Also, since we visited Barcelona in March, it was quite cold and we were really surprised with the inconsistency of hot water for bathing. It was one of the quickest bath I've taken until now :P

Nevertheless, the place 'La Rambla' with it's exhilarating atmosphere, be it day or night, should be a good enough reason to stay at Maria's.

立地が非常によく､ﾊﾞﾙｾﾛﾅ市内の観光が快適にできました｡
ﾎｽﾄのﾏﾘｱは親切で､ﾊﾞﾙｾﾛﾅ観光をするなら
ﾏﾘｱの家はとてもｵｽｽﾒです!

This place is a few steps from the Opera House and the Gothic quarter. It is less than 10 steps from La Rambla but is still quiet inside. The location could not be more perfect.
Maria let us check in late and was always  extremely quick with her responses on the phone, both before and during our stay.
This room actually has two rooms separated by a small bathroom sharing one entrance so it's perfect for two people or a small family.
The place is simple, adequate with no frills. Maria and her son were friendly and helpful.
It was unfortunate that I could hear heavy snoring from the guest staying in the room outside mine and noises from the adjacent bathroom which woke me up early in the morning.

María's place was fantastic all around! The room was very clean and well kept and was spacious enough to keep my bags and luggage. The location is one of the highlights of her apartment. It is located in La Rambla and within walking distance of a majority of attractions in the city. María is also a fantastic and kind host and offers all sorts of guidance and advice on navigating the city and maximizing your time there. Overall, it was a great experience and I would absolutely stay there again in the future!

Excelente anfitriona junto a su hijo. Nos sentimos muy cómodas, tranquilas y seguras con todas sus recomendaciones. La ubicación es importante, se encuentra al lado de la estación de metro Liceu, a pasos del barrio Gótico, la rambla, comercio, etc. Excelente en todos los aspectos.

La estadía en casa de María fue muy satisfactoria. La recomiendo 100 %.
La habitación estaba muy limpia, es confortable y tiene baño  privado. El apartamento de María está muy bien ubicado: a menos de un minuto a pie de la Rambla, de la estación del metro, de buenos restaurantes, etc.
María y su hijo Juán son muy agradable y siempre dispuestos a ayudarte y a aconsejarte.

Marìa è un'ospite eccezionale, amichevole e cordiale. La casa è molto bella e lo spazio a disposizione è ampio e confortevole. Favolosa la posizione, comoda per raggiungere ogni parte di Barcellona, visto che è centralissima e con la fermata della Metro a pochi metri. Consigliatissima!

Totalmente recomendable hospedarte en la casa de María! Ella es super amable y está atenta a todo lo que necesites. La habitación con baño privado es super cómoda, y con una limpieza impecable. La ubicación es ideal.
La estancia fue excelente. maria muy atenta justo en las ramblas y al metro super recomendable la ubicacion perfecta
She was lovely and very accommodating
Maria was a great host.  she was super friendly.   her place had everything we needed and the location was amazing

Recomiendo absolutamente alojarse en la casa de María. El departamento está en un segundo piso, con elevador, a medida cuadra de la Rambla y del metro. La habitación es cómoda, con todo lo necesario para tu estadía.  María es muy atenta y agradable. El alojamiento perfecto!
The location is great! Just a few steps to La Rambla. The place is clean though the shower leaks sometimes. The place is warm and cozy. Would recommend!
The space was just what we wanted. Clean, quite and close to all the sights we wanted to see. Amazing location Thank you, María!
Great nights sleep , quiet and clean. They have a lift so I didn't climb any stairs. Lots of help with local tips. I would stay here anytime.

Maria is a very good person, during our trip my brother had a leg injury and she took care of us really well, she even took us to the nearest hospital.
the room is very clean and smells really good and is located close to everything that we needed. it was a great experience.
thank you Maria.

Amazing location !!! Maria is really a nice person. Room was clean and nice ..good enough for 2 .. but I must say I would have thanked God at least a 100 times that this place was so centrally located !! 
We loved Rianna too .. very nice dog !! :)

Excellent location which u can access to La Ramblas and popular La Boqueria market. ..10 minutes walking to Aerobus station to airport.  Small room and bathroom. . No wifi in the rear (Website hidden by Airbnb) tv..no shampoo. .share kitchen.. not recommended. One night may be ok

Very convenient location in the Gothic quarters near the metro station and La Rambla.  Maria and her family were lovely!  Room was great, clean with an attached bathroom.  We enjoyed our stay very much! :)

Maria was a wonderful host from start to finish. Our flight was initially delayed and Maria was incredibly understanding around this, upon arrival Maria was easy to communicate with and helped us check in and made us feel right at home with her hospitality and local tips. 

The room was actually much nicer and more spacious than we expected with a double bed in one room and a single bed in the other and we were given a separate set of keys for our own space. Very clean, nicely decorated and the perfect place to recharge from the fun of Barcelona.

We did a few loads of washing while at Maria’s and this was never a problem, she was always helpful and we found her an absolute delight to chat to despite the language barrier - which sometimes made it even more fun!

Great location, everything was either in easy walking distance or accessible by the metro. If you’re sensitive to cigarette smoke note that there are people in the home who smoke but we didn’t find it a big deal. We would definitely stay with Maria again and recommend you do to!

Maria’s place is perfectly situated at the heart of La Ramba. One step from her door steps and you have access to everything, from transportation to restaurants, shops, pharmacy, stores, the mall, beach and everything you need. The room is immaculately clean and comfortable. She has double rooms and our place is big for two. Her kitchen is complete and we have access to her kitchen and washing machine which is very important to long travelers like  us who needs to cook meals and wash our clothes. She wasn’t around when we stayed but she was very accommodating in answering all our queries and needs. She let us leave our luggages while we went around the area. Her place is a few steps away from the famous Boqueria and the Maremagnum mall. I highly recommend her place to anyone visiting Barcelona. I will definitely book my stay at her place the next time I visit Barcelona.
Ubicación al lado de las Ramblas y todo súper limpio.
Gracias por todo.

When we arrived, Maria met us downstairs at the building's entrance, and she ensured that we got safely into the building and then familiarized us with the apartment, immediate area, and city. At Maria's apartment, my friend and I each had our own bed and bedroom, a private bathroom, and a lot of room to unpack all of our belongings. In addition, there is a shared kitchen, and Maria gives you full access to that space; for us, this meant making many delicious espressos. The location of the apartment is also spectacular. It is immediately off of La Rambla, which is very touristy, but still in close proximity to some terrific areas, namely the Gothic Qrt, Raval, and the beaches. I highly recommend this listing to anyone traveling to Barcelona.

Este apartamento está muy bien ubicado, en todo el centro de Barcelona, a media cuadra de las ramblas. Esta ubicado en una zona comercial, hay una parada de Metro donde te puede llevar a cualquier parte de Barcelona.
La habitación y el baño es muy limpio cómodo. Maria es una excelente anfitriona. Nos guió y nos recomendó sitios de interés a donde ir. Me volvería a hospedar allí.

Location : excellent in terms of being right in the centre of la rambla . You get down from the apartment and you are on la rambla . To the left was towards the shopping and to the right was towards the Bay Area . Liceu station right outside and Jaume station 5 mins walk to gothic quarter . 
House : super clean , cute two rooms with a bathroom in between . Although bathroom was the tiniest but you get used to it . We went in the summers and there is no air conditioning . Open access to the kitchen is there . There was a hall in the house which we never got to see cause I guess it was her or her dog 's private area . We had no problem with accessing the house at any hour of day/night as we had our own set of keys . 
Communication: she could write her mails in English , but she couldn't speak much there was a gap there, but she was sweet to help with whatever little she could.
This is a clean, well organised flat, good communication and a nice welcome. Very central location just off La Rambla but because the rooms open on to the back of the flat it was quiet at night time.
Great place to stay
Lugar correcto.
交通超级便利,出门就是大街,走两分钟就是那个著名的大市场｡房东超级热心｡

My friends visiting Maria a weekend i july, they had a really good stay at her place. Maria  helped them to get from the air port and met up my friends at the metrostation, gave them water and was a really good host during the stay. I can really recommend this accomodation...:)
This place is located in an incredible place. Maria is a wonderful host. You can't go wrong staying here, as you are 100 feet from La Romba.
Great location right where you need to be, Maria and son very friendly and gave us a very accommodating late check out. Thanks

Hermoso hogar! María es una gran anfitriona, te hace sentir como en casa.
Limpio, cómodo y tiene una muy buena ubicación.  
Nos ha dado buena información de a dónde ir en Barcelona. 
Gracias María por tu generosidad en la estadía.
Nice, very clean place.
totalmente aconsejable, lugar inmejorable
Excellent location!  Maria is friendly and sweet.
Great location, private light and airy rooms with private bath. I was thrilled to find how quiet it was despite being in the center of the city just off the metro!!
Posizione ottima, ambiente confortevole e pulito. Maria è stata molto gentile e disponibile.
Great location for La Rambla, with a 2 minute walk to the subway. 3rd floor apartment with a lift. Quiet and peaceful. Recommended and would stay again at Maria's place.
We had a great stay in Maria's home! The space is private and clean. It is a perfect location for exploring Barcelona. Maria gave us some good tips as well. Highly recommend!

Maria fue extremadamente cordial. Nos ayudó en todo lo que le solicitamos. Su casa esta inmejorablemente ubicada para disfrutar del Barrio Gótico y en general para explorar toda Barcelona. Está a unos pocos metros de la parada del metro. Cuenta además con todas las comodidades necesarias para una estancia placentera. Muy recomendable.

Excellent location in the heart of the city! There is a lot going on daytime and nighttime (but becareful at night time after midnight along the ramblas). Must-visit places and main attractions are nearby and walkable, the metro is only a few steps away!
Lugar acogedor, cerca de la estación del metro y lugares importantes.
Très bon rbnb et très bien situé.

This home is in a fantastic location, close to everything yet very quiet.  It is basic accommodations and there is another locked room in the apartment that is also rented out.  I had almost no hot water during our stay which was a bummer.
위치 정말 최고고, 숙소도 깔끔한 편입니다. 2층이지만 엘리베이터가 있어서 편리했어요. 귀여운 달마시안도 구경하고 싶으시다면 강추해요

Maria is the best host ever!!!! 
Everything was exactly as described, even better! The bed was really confortable. The location was perfect, right there at the rambla, but quiet enough during the night to have a good rest. Once again, the appartment was correct, but the outstanding hospitality of Maria made my stay absolutely great. At the end, for Air b&b users are the experiences that we make along the way! Gracias, Maria!
Comodidad y atención de primera. Te hará sentir como en casa. Perfecto para descansar.

Very nice and super clean place! Also, a very helpful and friendly host! Much recommended. Although bare in mind in order to get in and out from the smaller bedroom you need to walk through the adjacent double bedroom... can get a bit awkward if you're not very close with your travel companions! 
Overall, me and my friend had a lovely stay in Maria's house :)

Maria ‘s apt is exactly how she describes.. literally foot steps away from La Rambla and across the ST from the Gothic Quarter.. The Boquera Market is a quick 3 min walk from her apt. Our room was extremely clean and comfortable.. the bed was very comfortable for two. Maria is quick to respond to any questions and our check in was a breeze. I definitely would suggest her place.. you won’t be disappointed.
Great stay. Great location. Subway right in front the apartment. right next to La Rambla. Maria is very nice host.
Maria's house is very close to metro so you can reach almost all places very easily.

Maria est une personne qui a réellement le sens de l’accueil.  Seule la configurations des chambres oblige à vivre un peu trop au rythme de ses voisins. Surtout lorsqu’ils se lèvent à 7 heures du matin pour prendre leur douche 
Mais Maria veille au grain... Et l’emplacement de l’appartement est idéalement situé.
A fantastic place to stay. great location, a great room for two people. Maria was very nice.
카탈루냐 광장과 굉장히 가까워서 교통편이 다향하고 보케리아 시장이랑 가까워서 아침을 시장에서 해결 할 수 있었던것이 정말 좋았습니다. 호스트의 응답도 굉장히 빨라 애사소통하는데 불편한점이 없었습니다.
Very good location!

My daughter and her female friend had a wonderful stay at Maria's apartment. 
The location is fantastic, hospitality and communication were outstanding.. They had the unit for themselves, enjoyed the amenities and felt absolutely at home. All these made their visit to Barcellona an unforgetable positive experience!!
Highly recommended.
Thank you Maria and Juan for taking such good care of them

Maria is a great host,
Her apartment is near las Ramblas, very convenient lots of restaurants, stores, and public transportation which can safe you money.
She also gives lots of tips about the city. the bed is very comfortable, and clean 
You won’t be disappointed. Would stay again on my next trip to Barcelona
Maria is an excellent host.
El piso de maria tiene  excelente ubicación, es limpio y acogedor, María fue  muy agradable y nos suministro buena información sobre los lugares que se deben visitar, super recomendada 10/10 .

name: Grande chambre et bureau a louer!
summary: Quand ? Du 2 mars au 10 avril inclusivement Où ? (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Rue St-Denis, Montréal Quoi ? Une chambre et un bureau sur 2 niveaux, dans un appartement 8 ½, propre et calme.  Avec qui ? 3 étudiants universitaires, calme et studieux. (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: Le logement est un grand 8 1/2 déjà habité par 3 étudiants Universitaire de l'UQAM ainsi que de l'UdeM. Le quatrième coloc part pour une durée de 6 semaines (2 mard au 10 avril). Alors il nous ferrait plaisir d'accueillir quelque'un pour une période durant ce temps. N'hésitez pas a me contacter!  Marie-Hélène
description: Le logement est un grand 8 1/2 déjà habité par 3 étudiants Universitaire de l'UQAM ainsi que de l'UdeM. Le quatrième coloc part pour une durée de 6 semaines (2 mard au 10 avril). Alors il nous ferrait plaisir d'accueillir quelque'un pour une période durant ce temps. N'hésitez pas a me contacter!  Marie-Hélène Les voyageurs ont accès à tout ce qui est a leur disposition commune dans l'appartement; douche, laveuse-sécheuse, frigidaire, WI-FI, chauffage, électricité, air communes.  Nous sommes 3 étudiants ayant voyager dans plusieurs pays, et ayant déjà fait affaire avec air bnb. Alors, il nous ferras un plaisir d'accueillir les voyageurs intéressés parmis nous! Nous parlons anglais également et comprenons l'espagnol.
neighborhood_overview: L'appartement est situé coin Jean-Talon/St-Denis. Vous avez à 2 minutes de marche, le métro Jean-Talon, ainsi que le marché Jean-Talon. De plus, vous avez le métro (l'épicerie, à 4 minutes de marche). Malgré le fait que l'appartement soit sur la rue St-Denis, le bruit des voitures est pratiquement inexistant! De plus, la chambre a louer est au fond de l'appartement donc le son des voitures y est inexistant. Vous avez également une pharmacie à 2 minutes.
access: Les voyageurs ont accès à tout ce qui est a leur disposition commune dans l'appartement; douche, laveuse-sécheuse, frigidaire, WI-FI, chauffage, électricité, air communes.
interaction: Nous sommes 3 étudiants ayant voyager dans plusieurs pays, et ayant déjà fait affaire avec air bnb. Alors, il nous ferras un plaisir d'accueillir les voyageurs intéressés parmis nous! Nous parlons anglais également et comprenons l'espagnol.

name: GUESTROOM in BARCELONA/SANTS
summary: We have a nice and comfortable ROOM for max. 2 people which has a double  bed ,fridge,coffeemaker,tv,wifi,balcony and guest bathroom along the hallway. Busses and metro right outside our building . Traffic hearable 5 minutes walking distance from transtation Sants. PLEASE NOTE : latest time for check-in 11.00 PM.
description: We have a nice and comfortable ROOM for max. 2 people which has a double  bed ,fridge,coffeemaker,tv,wifi,balcony and guest bathroom along the hallway. Busses and metro right outside our building . Traffic hearable 5 minutes walking distance from transtation Sants. PLEASE NOTE : latest time for check-in 11.00 PM. Since we do not rent our apartment,but only the guestroom,the use of the kitchen is not included. For security reasons we would like our guests refrain from cooking at the room. Main railway station (Estacion de Sants) 10 minutes walking distance and the busstop for the D20/50 right outside our building.
neighborhood_overview: Ein Waschsalon ist direkt in der Nähe
notes: Der Preis bezieht sich auf eine Person/Nacht. Für die 2. Person berechnen wir weitere 15€.
transit: Main railway station (Estacion de Sants) 10 minutes walking distance and the busstop for the D20/50 right outside our building.
interaction: Since we do not rent our apartment,but only the guestroom,the use of the kitchen is not included. For security reasons we would like our guests refrain from cooking at the room.
house_rules: Check-In until 23.00H. We are non-smokers,but our guests may smoke on their balcony.

host.host_about: Wir sind ein schwules Ehepaar  ( spanish/deutsch) und freuen uns auf Euren Besuch

reviews.comments: La habitación es tal cual aparece en las fotos, amplia, con balcón y muy equipada, tienes nevera y equitación de cocina suficiente para desayunar o preparar comida en frío. Un baño que usas tu solo el cual también es amplio y muy limpio y la localización es muy buena, justo debajo del piso tienes bus y metro, en 15 min estas en el centro. Tanto Klaus como Omar fueron muy amables y dedicados en todo en momento y me ayudaron con todo os que pedí. Un estancia perfecta que repetiría sin lugar a dudas, muy recomendable.

Wonderful!
Klaus and Omar were super friendly, helpful and very hospitable, very good communication before my arrival and super great hosts. 

The room was lovely, very good size, clean tidy and with all the amenities you need, self contained. The apartment is in a great location on a busy street with lots of shops nearby & very good transport links. The room is above the street however so if you are a light sleeper you might need to pack some ear plugs, but Klaus & omar provide some :) although it's not too bad at night. [I was at a festival so sleeping a lot in the day]

I would highly recommend and will happily stay here again if I return to Barcelona. perfect stay.

I don't really have enough words to described the amazing welcome and days that Klaus and Omar offers in  their flat.
They are real nice people, helpful for anything you can ask, available to help you for any needs and questions related to the city.
The flat is wonderful, enormous and with an incredible taste of design all made by this incredible couple.
The flat location is just few minutes by walk to the main station in Barcelona (Sants). From here you can go wherever you need and also there are so many shops around that you won't have a chance to try all of them. Just beside the corner one of the classic Spanish market to buy fruits, meat, serrano or just enjoy a nice cup of cafe con leche :) 
The bedroom on the listing is really big, clean, with a lovely balcony. Klaus and Omar add to the bedroom a fridge, a table with chairs, many place where to put stuff and clothes  and a big TV.
Fans for summers are available in the bedroom to spend a lovely fresh nights and very quite because the good windows that cancel any possible sound from the outside.
I probably miss from the listing but you have your PRIVATE TOILET!!!! So happy about this and you cannot imagine the shower, wow, so large and completely new. 
The building is fantastic, all decorated inside and outside.
Elevator available and maximum respect from all the neighbour that I never heard.
If you want to spend a lovely time in Barcelona I definitely suggest this 5 stars airbnb bedroom :)

This conveniently located apartment was one of the highlights of my Europe trip! Omar was there to welcome me, even after I checked in almost 12 hours too early. The location is close to all transportation, and makes Barcelona easy to see. I'll be back!

Klaus and Omar were very friendly and made us feel at home, which was important as we stayed 6 nights.
The appartment and the room were as discribed in the profile and the commentaries, the bathroom was very nice (great shower head with funny lights !) and clean, the bed was very confortable, and we had enough room to put our stuff.
The neighboorhood was very lively, with a real market for instance.
We were quite happy to have stayed there, the return to Paris was hard, 2 days later... That's why we are not so inspired to write our commentary, sorry.

Einfach nur toll!Wir sind immer noch ganz von dieser Gastfreundlichkeit verzaubert.Klaus und Omar boten uns einen einen durchaus perfekten Aufenthalt- waren stets ansprechbar und hatten immer einen guten Tipp für uns parat!Das Gästezimmer bot alles,was man braucht!Wir werden definitiv wiederkommen!Durch und durch empfehlenswert!

Kuten kaikki aiemmat vieraat jo ovat todenneet, näiden kavereiden kanssa kaikki sujuu mallikkaasti. He ovat fiksuja, avuliaita ja mukavia. Huone on mukava ja tilava ja siisti, vuode hyvä. WiFi toimii hiukan hitaasti huoneessa, mutta olohuoneen tienoolla mainiosti. Asuinalue on sopivasti sivussa turistien kansoittamasta keskustasta. Erinomainen paikka pitempäänkin oleskeluun Barcelonassa. Suosittelen lämpimästi ja toivon itsekin voivani palata.
Sehr angenehme Gastgeber, zentral gelegene Unterkunft, Läden und Restaurants in unmittelbarer Umgebung.

The flat is really centrally located, and there are metro and bus stations minutes away, but we even walked from it. The room and bathroom are really clean, spacious and have all the necesities! Klaus and Omar were excellent hosts, Klaus waited for our late arrival and helped with all nedeed info. I would definately stay here the next time again!
Klaus and Omar, two helpful people, room and bathroom are perfect. Convenient metro location at 100 meters you will reach everything in a few minutes. Highly recommended .. !!!

I stayed alone 4 nights at Klaus + Omar's apartment which I really enjoyed living in a spacious apartment. Klaus and Omar are very friendly to me. We had very interesting conversations. The apartment is a dream one with high ceilings, many spotlessly clean rooms and beautiful decorations. It has a romantic atmosphere showing the owners' soul for lovely accessoires. You will feel peace in the apartment, in other words, it is a place to relax, an isle of your own. I love this apartment. Here, I have the feeling that I am a part of Barcelona. Thank you, Klaus and Omar, for sharing your apartment with me. I would highly recommend this apartment to guests of arts who love decorative details and peace once you enter the apartment. I will surely stay here again when I come to Barcelona.

Klaus & Omar made us feel very welcome, and even with our flight being delayed by 2 hours, Omar changed his plans to greet us and provide us with lots of helpful information about the area (and the apartment!).

The room is lovely and immaculate. It is spacious and includes a fridge, a table and chairs and plenty of storage space. It also has a fantastic view of the street below and the gorgeous buildings opposite. We had our own private bathroom, which had everything we needed - including an amazing shower with colour-changing head and many, many yellow ducks!

Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to stay in Barcelona. Buses run from just outside, and you're also just a two minute walk from the Metro.
I really enjoyed staying with Klaus and Omar. They were friendly attentive hosts. Their space is clean and comfortable. Highly recommended!

Klaus and Omar were very hospitable hosts and made me very welcome in their beautiful apartment. The apartment is located in an ideal position being extremely close to a metro station with shops nearby for supplies. It’s a short walk to the Nou Camp and one of the main train station in Barcelona (Sants) which was ideal for me. 

Having a private balcony, fridge and bathroom was also great and only added to my enjoyment of staying with them. The apartment itself is very spacious and was extremely clean. I couldn’t have asked to stay in a nicer place. 

I cannot recommend them highly enough and I had a great time in Barcelona. 

Thank you!

Klaus and Omar are lovely hosts. Their home is beautifully decorated and in an excellent part of Barcelona. Omar graciously met me at the apartment despite my delayed arrival. Very accommodating and helpful throughout the process. I would absolutely recommend this location to a friend in the future.
Gute Lage. Schöne Wohnung! Alles ok.

Klaus und Omar haben uns herzlich empfangen und uns hilfreiche Informationen über die Stadt und mögliche Aktivitäten gegeben.

Beide sind sehr nett und stets hilfsbereit.

Das Appartement ist groß, sauber und sehr schön eingerichtet. Das Zimmer bietet alles was man braucht!

Die Anbindung an die Metro könnte nicht besser sein.

Der Aufenthalt bei diesen netten Gastgebern hat unseren Urlaub perfekt abgerundet.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had the pleasure of loving my first Airbnb stay with Klaus and Omar. Klaus was very welcoming and most helpful with information about the Sants area. 

My room was bright and airy with a small fridge, coffee and tea facilities, cutlery, mugs and glasses. There is also their kitchen close by for water. There is a table and chairs, so it is cosy to enjoy a meal and snacks purchased from the nearby supermarket, or sitting on the balcony people-watching.  There are many good restaurants and cafes nearby too. 

The apartment is very close to Sants station and metro and bus services. The street is noisy but there is insulation on the balcony windows, which blocks the noise and light. There is also a TV with some English programs. 

I was able to walk to the magic fountain within 20 minutes and felt safe on my own and late at night. 

Klaus and Omar are very interesting and friendly - overall a highly recommended experience staying in their beautiful apartment.
이 숙소의 가장 좋은 점은 위치입니다. 주요 관광지 어디나 쉽게 갈수있으며 지하철역과 3분거리라서 매우 좋아요. 다만 대로에 위치해 있어서 새벽에 싸이렌소리 등 차소리가 많이 들려요. 소리에 예민한 분은 다른 곳이 좋겠어요

Klaus me apresentou o local e deixou as chaves para ficar a vontade na estadia. Visto que eu ficava mais tempo na rua turistando, quase não tive contato com os anfitriões. Consegui conhecer Omar no penultimo dia da estadia. O local é super bem localizado, tem tudo por perto, inclusive a estação de metro é de frente para o apartamento. Recomendo.

Highly recommended!!!
Omar and Klaus were great hosts!! We felt so welcomed! They were so hospitable, warm, caring and respected our privacy. We had our OWN BATHROOM/Toilet!!! 
Aside from these, the place is spectacular & within the city, only less than a kilometer from plaza de espana. We feel so blessed to have stayed here! Thanks much to Klaus & Omar! May God bless you both abundantly. Tc
Klaus and Omar are welcoming hosts with a clean, homely apartment in a well situated quarter of Barcelona. Would not hesitate to stay with them again, thank you

Klaus and Omar made us feel welcome. Klaus was there to brief us and answer our questions. 
Their apartment is most tastefully decorated. The washroom was for our use only. 
Our room is well furnished. It has a TV and cutlery, plates, coffee, tea are provided. 
The location is most convenient. Just one minute walk from Placa de Sants metro station which is served by L1 and L5 lines and 15 minutes walk for Barcelona Sants rail station. A bus stop is located just in front of the apartment. 

Many eateries are nearby. We particularly recommend Forn Balta, a cafe located just a few shops away from the apartment. Two streets to the left is a market and supermarket at Carrer de Sants Jordi. 

For Barcelona FC fans, this location is ideal as the Nou Camp is just one metro stop away.

I definitely would recommend staying here.

Klaus y Omar son unos estupendos anfitriones, la habitación es amplia tal y como se anuncia, con tu propio baño y todos los servicios que indican. 
La casa esta situada en un lugar magnifico con todos los transportes públicos cerca (metro, bus, renfe...).
Un lugar genial para pasar tu estancia en Barcelona.
Omar and Klaus are such lovely and nice people and hosts, the room/apartment is great, and the neighborhood interesting. I would come again immediately!

Hemos pasado unos días fantasticos alojados aquí, es un piso ENORME, típico edificio de Barcelona, techos altos y con un encanto especial.
La habitación es muy espaciosa, tiene un balcón directo a la calle....una de las calles con más comercios de la ciudad. 
El cuarto de baño es privado y no le falta de nada.
Klaus y Omar se preocuparon en todo momento de nuestra comodidad, recibiendonos el primer día con una breve explicación sobre su hogar.
Lo recomiendo 100%.
La estancia en casa de KLAUS Y OMAR,   ha sido buena y agradable, me han hecho sentir cómoda, y eso facilita las cosas.
Klaus and Omar are very friendly people. Room is confortable, clean and big enough for two people.

C'est un logement situé à proximité de la place d'Espagne, à proximité des transports en commun et des restaurants / commerces. Donc très bien situé. Salle de bain privée et tout le nécessaire pour cuisiner des repas froids. Logement très agréable.

Klaus was away during my stay but Omar was very friendly and accomodating. Room was nice and cozy - one thing to note was in the description it states a king size bed and this is not true.  Beautiful home with lovely scent throughout.
 Loved how close it was to sants train station and metro/bus lines. 
Would 100% recommend and would stay here again if I were to return to Barcelona.

Very nice apartment, close to public transportation and grocery store. The room has a mini fridge, electric kettle, and private bathroom outside the room. Would recommend to anyone visiting Barcelona.

We had a great stay in Klaus apartment .Although We couldn't meet Klaus,his friend Omar helped us and gave full support during our stay.Superb place with all amenities and great location closer to all attractions.We would definitely prefer to stay here again.Thank you.

Klaus and Omar are perfect hosts, so friendly and accommodating! Although we didn't see much of them they were more than helpful and made our short stay in Barcelona even better! The room, flat and building are all stunning and the location is fantastic for walking around or getting public transport further afield. I would definitely want to stay at Klaus's place when returning to Barcelona.

The experience Klaus and Omar gave us in their beautiful house was superb. The place is neat and super clean. You'll get a full bathroom with bidet included. A little fridge but enough for 2 people in your room and glasses, plates and all needed if you want to have some meal in your room. They also advice us to visit Montserrat and it worth the 1 hour trip to get there. They are charming and super polite people. Anyone will enjoy a stay in their beautiful home.

Habitación enorme, comodisima y super luminosa. El baño también comodisimo. Todo impecable y ambientado con muy buen gusto. La zona repleta  y de bares y comercios con todo lo necesario o deseable. Sobretodo Klaus y Omar muy amables y respetuosos.
Klaus and Omar are so sweet, very welcoming. The view from the balcony is the icing on the Airbnb cake!

My boyfriend and I really liked the location of the apartment, as it was walking distance to where we wanted to go. We flew into Barcelona, and it was easy to get to Klaus and Omar's place by metro, as it's across the street from the metro station. They were super nice and friendly, even when our flight was delayed and we arrived later than we expected. We left by train, and the train station barcelona-sants is like a block away and easily walkable. We walked over to FC Barcelona one morning and MNAC at night to see the magic fountains! We also happened to be in town when there was a street festival going on, so the street was closed off and there was live music right outside our balcony! Because the area is busy, it does get loud. However, the hosts installed foam sound barriers on the balcony doors to help insulate most but not all of the sound. We still slept great though, and would recommend staying here to others!
很好很好很好,房子本身就美美的,房间里更美,房子很大,很漂亮,有独立卫生间,不错,两位户主很棒,位置在地铁旁,很方便,总之都很好,就是有一点,有些吵,因为在主要街道,还是过道口,车水马龙,晚上睡觉有些吵,除此之外都很完美｡户主很帅!

Do not hesitate to choose to stay At this Airbnb offering. The hosts are a welcoming couple and the room is large, clean and with a private use bathroom. The location is excellent with transport links to everywhere in Barcelona right on the door step.
