Barcelona Sants Estacio is an easy walk away. This station is a super hub serving both the city of Barcelona and links to all of Europe. Magic Fountain and Mont Juic are within easy walking distance. 
Cafes, supermarkets and many specialty retailers are also an easy walk from this charming period apartment in a rather classic building. Go for it people and do yourselves a favour.
Ha sido agradable la estancia en vuestra casa. Recomiendo el alojamiento, muy buenos anfitriones.

Klaus and Omar were lovely hosts! They are friendly, wanted to make sure I felt comfortable and safe, and were helpful in giving me suggestions about the neighborhood. I was worried about being able to sleep at night because the room faces a busy street and it is quite noisy, but I didn't have any problems. I had a nice stay, and the location is great for public transit and getting around the city.
Increíble lugar, muy limpio y muy atentos anfitriones, muy recomendable en verdad.
Klaus's apartment is only a 10 minute metro ride away from the Gothic Quater. There are great restaurants right around his apartment as well. We had a great stay!

Nice and friendly, clean and practical to have the fridge, waterboiler/coffeemaker and cutlery in the room. Unfortunately we had difficulties to sleep because of the traffic outside at night and the noisy fan.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Klaus's place is a nice place to stay. The place is easily located by common transportation namely Metro and Bus.

The room is exactly what it showed in the advertisement and it is comfortable,clean, roomy and value for the money.

Klaus is a great and friendly host who try to make you comfortable to stay and willingly give you information and advice.

Klaus place is something to consider if you want to stay in Barcelona.
Thank you for the warm welcome. I had a great time in Barcelona!
Amazing! We had a great stay with Klaus. The room was clean, bathroom was perfect and Klaus was very good at helping us with directions around the City. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Wir hatten einen sehr tollen Aufenthalt. Es hat uns an nichts gefehlt. Bus zum Strand und zum Stadt zentrum fährt direkt vor der Tür. Auch zum Flughafen gelangt man schnell und unkompliziert. Die Gegend ist sehr schön. Es gibt ein paar Einkaufsläden und auch zu Essen findet man genug direkt ums Eck. Die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich und helfen einem gerne und geben auch sehr gute Tips. Alles war sehr unkompliziert. Wir würden jederzeit wieder dort übernachten.
Es war ein sehr netter Aufenthalt bei den beiden! Kann ich nur weiterempfehlen! :)

We would highly recommend staying here, from the moment we arrived to when we left, Klaus really took his time to make us feel welcomed. He took his time to get us familiar with the transit system along with various sites to see in Barcelona. He is very good at making his home genuinely feel like your home while you are staying there!

Klaus and Omar were great hosts. They were very gracious and extremely helpful in giving us advice on places to go, and how to get there etc. The apartment is very clean and it was great having a personal bathroom instead of sharing one. Noise was not really an issue unless the balcony door was open as it is located right on a busy road, but once you close the balcony doors the noise is very minimal. The location of the apartment was great as it was very close to the metro station (2-3 min walk) and buses run literally right outside of the building door. To add to this, there are many cafes and places to eat nearby/ walking distance from the apartment. 

Our only issue during our stay was the bed was a bit small for two people to share and the pillows were not very comfortable. It was manageable though, but that could be one thing to improve the experience/stay. This spot offers tremendous value for the price/location of the apartment. You won't really find anywhere that can offer you both the comfort/hospitality and also be right in the middle of the city.

very good position, just a couple of minutes from the metro station of placa de sants, about 5-10 minutes from the Sants train station and a bus stop right at the door of the house. The room was large enough, clean and fully equipped for us with bed, table, chairs, wardrobe, fridge and cutlery. We had a small bathroom for our exclusive use, which was really nice. Klaus and Omar were really nice hosts and made us feel very welcome in their home, and gave us good advice on places where to eat

Klaus and Omar are very nice and treat us like friends. Their house is very clean and cozy. We indeed enjoy our stay in their house. The location is 10 mins walking distance to BNC saint station. It’s very ideal for people want to take bus or subway to sightseeing spots in BCN. The neighbor is very friendly to the travelers. There are several supermarkets, cafes, coin laundry near by. Thank you Klaus and Omar.

The room is big enough for two person. The whole family is very worm. It's very close to Metro station and downstairs have a bus station. Thomas and Klaus are very kindness. The pravite bathroom is clean. I recommend this apartment.
Klau's place was just as described. It's  very clean, and close to the city centre. Will book again if I ever visit Barcelona again.

It was a great pleasure to stay at your home. The room and the bathroom were very clean, home very quiet. You were very discreet but available when I wanted information.
In the room, there is a fridge and a coffee machine..., which is very useful when you don't want spend too much money on restaurants and coffee shops.
With my own key I could come home whenever I wanted. And it was very convenient that the metro station was very close. By metro, the airport is about 40 mn max away.
Thanks for everything.

Klaus is a wonderful host. We best loved his place for its proximity to Sants railway station, the metro and bus stop at the apartment entrance itself and not to forget the bakery next door to start your day with :).
Klaus has been a great host. His suggestions and tips helped decide some of the places we visited.
Overall the best place to stay in Barcelona :). We look forward to visiting in the future.

Klaus's place was a perfect base from which to explore Barcelona.  It is not right in the central tourist area, but there are super easy transport links (metro and bus stops literally on the main road outside the front door) to everywhere you might want to go, and we liked that it was more of a normal neighbourhood with local shops, restaurants etc.  Check out the great bakery/cafe 'Forn Balta' a few doors down for breakfast. The room and bed are comfortable, and you have a table, fridge and tea/coffee making facilities in your room, plus your own private bathroom down the hall.  Klaus and Omar are very lovely and happy to help with any questions you have during your stay.  We will definitely stay here again if we come back for another visit to the city.

Bueno, fui a Barcelona y usé la reserva inmediata que Klaus tenía activada, cuando llegué en el vuelo a Barcelona, ya de noche, esta reserva se había anulado. Tuve que cogerme otra reserva, que no cumplía las expectativas que me había hecho con la habitación de Klaus. Su compañero me llamó y envió mensajes pero fue para decirme que lo habían anulado porque no tenían la habitación preparada. La verdad es que me enfadé porque yo también soy anfitrión de Airbnb y nunca he anulado una reserva, si me veo apurado, me pongo a limpiar o se lo digo a una chica que me ayuda. Realmente me decepcioné.  Como digo, conseguí otro alojamiento, pero con el de Klaus, pues mal.

The room is warm, the landlord is very warm, the surrounding traffic is convenient, close to the railway station! The landlord gave me sincere help after knowing that I had lost my wallet! thank you Klaus

El apartamento está en un sector un poco alejado de los sitios turísticos pero un  área muy comercial y tanquila. Además está tan bien comunicado que la distancia no es un problema:  tiene una parada de bus enfrente y estación de metro en la esquina. Todo el apartamento es hermoso.  La habitación es bastante grande y con balcón, realmente, muy completa.  Los anfitriones muy atentos.  Absolutamente recomendado.

This was a fab experience! I highly recommend staying here. You will get your private bathroom, and your own bed. This was comfortable, clean, and simple. I like that they have a small refrigerator and utensils in the room. My favourite part was the convenience of the location to markets and bus stops/metro. I would return here if I stay in Barcelona again.

My first time in Barcelona, Airbnb, AND solo trip. This place was perfect. Omar and Klaus place is so comfy and inviting. I felt like I was at home. Literally a step from the metro bus and across the street from the metro trains you can't ask for a more perfect place to get around the city. I read other reviews about the noise outside but it's not bad. Omar provided me with ear plugs. I came in late most of my time, and while everyone was sleeping or out themselves- the hallways have motion detection lights. Very soft lights to see your way to the room and bathroom. The bathroom was kept clean and had a large shower along with cabinets to store your things.  The bedroom was also very big and had a small bistro table and chairs, mini fridge, clothes cabinets, and TV. Utensils, coffee maker, and plenty of sheets and towels were provided as well. I truly loved this place. I won't stay anywhere else next time I visit.
Amazing hosts and a great place to stay at, would stay here again if i'm back in Barcelona. Across the street from metro and bus stops. Very nice room with a view and a very clean, private bathroom.

Klaus and Omar were very nice. The room and the bathroom were clean and tidy. The location is very convenient, there are bus stops in front of the building and metro nearby. Nearby there are many restaurants and shops. Thank you for your hospitality.

We had a lovely time in Barcelona in April 2018 - and the very warm welcome in the flat of Klaus and Omar made it even more lovely. During the booking process communiation was always super quick, we also got some nice tips for exploring the city as we arrived. 
Everything was super clean, just as described and decorated with love.   
It was a perfect starting point to explore the city, metro and bus station are very close, also bars and restaurants and a sweet bakery for breakfast are in walking distance (2-5min.).

We totally recommend staying in Barcelona at the place of Klaus and Omar. It was perfect and we if we're travelling to Barcelona again we'll definitley check if the room is available.
Klaus e Omar são muito educados, simpáticos e agradáveis. A acomodação é ótima, requintada, muito limpa e muito bem localizada. Recomendo.

Es muy agradable, muy cerca del metro,  bus en la puerta a minutos del Ave,  zona con comercios, bares y restaurantes, tal cual lo publicado, Klaus no estaba, pero Omar es un excelente anfitrión, muy recomendable, lo volveríamos a elegir
Bon emplacement. Bien desservi.

L'appartement est très bien situé. A deux pas du métro et desservi par deux lignes de bus qui vont au vieux centre et a Barcelonette. Il est aussi à moins de dix minutes à pied de la gare ferroviaire Barcelona Sants.  Tous commerces autour et bonne boulangerie pour prendre le petit déjeuner! Accueil très gentil de la part de Klaus et Omar.

Our stay in Klaus & Omar’s home was beyond our expectation. They were both extremely welcoming and friendly and made us feel very comfortable from the moment we walked in. The room itself was very clean and tidy and included everything as described. We loved that the room had a balcony that allowed some fresh air in and let us take in the sounds and sights of the local neighbourhood. The apartment is located on a main road so it was not surprising that it did tend to be noisy at times. They have foam sound barriers installed on the balcony doors that help eliminate a lot of the noise. We slept perfectly and the noise did not bother us at all. We were able to reach all of the major sites and attractions quite easily from this location either by walking or on the metro. The Plaça de Sants metro station was less than a 5 minute walk away, and the major Barcelona Sants train station was also within a 10 minute walk where you can catch a train directly to the airport. There are also plenty of delicious bakeries, restaurants and markets nearby. We would absolutely recommend Klaus & Omar’s apartment to anyone visiting Barcelona, and would really love to stay there again if we are ever back!

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt bei Klaus und Omar in Barcelona. Das Zimmer ist sehr schön uns die Wohnung liegt verkehrstechnik sehr, sehr günstig an 2 Metrolinien und der Bus vor der Tür geht direkt zum Strand.
Das Bad und die Dusche sind super!
Dass eine große Straße direkt vor der Tür ist, steht ja in der Beschreibung. Sie ist laut, aber dank Ohrstöpseln haben wir sehr gut geschlafen.
A beautiful apartment in a great location with very helpful hosts.

Friendly and warm hosts who are happy to help and make recommendations. We had some good banter and a laugh which added to the experience. Really patient with us when things went wrong our end. 

Apartment itself absolutely beautiful. Room comfortable and clean with lovely extra touches, for example foam covered shutters to reduce noise and a fan. We had our own bathroom which was spotless. There were problems with the boiler and hot water supply which was not the fault of our hosts, who worked to get the problem sorted quickly. 

Area is a few stops away on the metro from the main tourist hotspots. You can get the D20 bus straight to the beach also. Apartment is located in the Sants area which has lots of shops and some bakeries which are perfect for breakfast.

My stay in their Airbnb was more than perfect. 
Klaus and Omar are lovely and very helpful hosts. 
I instantly had a feeling of being home there. 
Room was very clean and I could very well enjoy my own space. 
Definitely coming back.
Thank you once again
Thank you for the few days we were in Barcelona. It was a pleasure staying at your apartment. Lovely hosts and good place to stay in Barcelona.

Good price during the peak season in Barcelona. Very close to the metro station and walkable distance from Barcelona Sants. During our stay, the weather was really hot and humid. It was quite hard to stay in the room even there was a fan. Traffic was  noisy so we had to close the balcony door. The room became extremely hot. Some description/rules was/were not clearly mentioned when we booked the room. Now Klaus and Omar make one clear. It is much fair for the future users. In the past reviews, we didn't find the following points.  The room didn't have a lock. Besides Klaus and Omar, some other family members also live in the apartment. Maybe they are useful information.
Very good localisation. The room & bathroom fully equiped and very clean. Klaus & Omar are really friendly and helpful, will give you all the details needed about the city. Highly recommended.

This was our first time staying in an Airbnb and we are thankful for having such a great experience. Klaus & Omar are very friendly and helpful hosts. Made our stay as comfortable as possible -  even borrowing us umbrellas as we were not prepared for an heavy morning shower. Close-by are many yummy bakeries. The bus stopp right outside and the metro station in walkable distance  are very convenient to explore Barcelona.

Klaus und Omar waren 2 sehr nette Gastgeber, ihre Tips für Barcelona waren einfach toll.
Es waren ein paar traumhafte Tage und wir kommen bestimmt wieder.
It was an amazing rest at Klaus and Omar's home. Beautiful apartment, at a perfect place. There was an atmosphere. And finally our host are very accurate and kind people!

Super sympathische Gastgeber, wir haben uns bei Klaus und Omar wirklich sehr wohl gefühlt ! Wir hatten alles was wir brauchten, das Bett war auch sehr bequem. Die Unterkunft hat eine super Verkehrsanbindung zu Bus und Metro und zum Plaça Espanya kann man auch zu Fuß laufen. Beim nächsten Barcelona-Aufenthalt sind wir bestimmt wieder bei Klaus und Omar.

Très chouette endroit 
emplacement idéal avec les transports en commun juste à côté.
Rue avec beaucoup de petits commerces et restaurants
Ottima posizione dalla stazione ferroviaria e metropolitana. Sotto casa la fermata dei mezzi pubblici con ottimi posti per fare colazione
Klaus and Omar are very kind and friendly hosts, I very much enjoyed my stay in their home :)
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Highly recommend! Was travelling on my own and Klaus and Omar’s place was a safe, warm homebase. Klaus was friendly and chatty, he gave me some great recommendations which added to my trip. The bathroom is sparkling clean and the bed is very comfortable. Location- you can’t beat it. I purchased a 4 day metro card which took me all over the city. Their place is right next to Placa de Sants so it was easy to get back. Supermarket and cafes are close by. a Very good stay x

The traffic outside could stop you from having a quiet sleep because but this is an advantage because it is very well located. You will have no trouble to find your way back or to catch public transportation. It is safe at night. I highly recommend it for a woman traveling on her own.
It is well equipped, very clean and quiet. The owners are friendly and helpful.

We really enjoyed our stay. The room and bathroom were very clean, the flat is amazing! We had plenty of towels, shampoos, soaps etc. we also had a hairdryer. The room can get a bit noisy at night from the busy street below but my partner and I didn't really have any issues with it. Considering the location and value for money, this was the perfect accommodation for our trip.

name: Fab Park Slope garden apt w/ patio
summary: Approximately 700 square-foot (65 square-meter) garden floor apartment of a Park Slope townhouse just half a block from three subway lines. It has a separate bedroom with a queen-size bed, kitchen, a big living/dining area with cable TV, sofabed & a small patio. The apartment also has a basement laundry room for guests' use. Restaurants & the F/G/R subway lines are conveniently close by.
space: This is a lovely garden floor apartment in a turn-of-the-last-century brick townhouse. The apartment has been renovated in a more modern style with a great open layout. The separate bedroom has french doors that provide privacy, and a decorative non-working fireplace. The kitchen is fully functional with stainless GE range and dishwasher, a full size refrigerator, and all the basic utensils you need to make a meal. Control your own central heat and a/c. We have cable TV and a small library of diverse reading. The patio is small (about 7' x 10'), but has a small cafe table and two chairs. (Patio may be unusable during periods of snowfall.) A laundry room in the basement is for the exclusive use of our guests. There is a good-sized bedroom with a queen-sized bed and a full closet.  A fold-down sofa in the living room functions as a full-sized bed (very firm mattress). We provide linens for both. We also have a small travel crib (29" x 20" interior dimensions) and a Bumbo booster seat we
description: Approximately 700 square-foot (65 square-meter) garden floor apartment of a Park Slope townhouse just half a block from three subway lines. It has a separate bedroom with a queen-size bed, kitchen, a big living/dining area with cable TV, sofabed & a small patio. The apartment also has a basement laundry room for guests' use. Restaurants & the F/G/R subway lines are conveniently close by. This is a lovely garden floor apartment in a turn-of-the-last-century brick townhouse. The apartment has been renovated in a more modern style with a great open layout. The separate bedroom has french doors that provide privacy, and a decorative non-working fireplace. The kitchen is fully functional with stainless GE range and dishwasher, a full size refrigerator, and all the basic utensils you need to make a meal. Control your own central heat and a/c. We have cable TV and a small library of diverse reading. The patio is small (about 7' x 10'), but has a small cafe table and two chairs. (Patio may be
neighborhood_overview: Known for its stately townhouses and tree-lined streets, Park Slope is a dynamic neighborhood that we love for its people, the varied opportunities for food and fun, and its central location. Our home is at the foot of the "slope," where homes were built for the working classes of the late 1800s, so the homes are less Victoriana and more utilitarian. Today, there are numerous bars, fabulous restaurants of every price range, and Prospect Park is a leisurely 15 minute walk away. In the park there are hiking and running trails, skating (ice and roller), boating, fishing and a weekly green market. Barclay's Center is a 20-30 minute walk away.
notes: We have a flat-screen TV with cable, HBO, NetFlix and Pandora. As the owners and residents of this two-family building, we are not subject to the recently enacted NY State laws regarding illegal hotels. They apply only to buildings with three or more units. You can be confident that your stay with us is legal and that we pay all required hospitality, sales and income taxes out of your guest fees.
transit: The F, G and R trains are a half a block from the house. Buses and cabs are plentiful as well. It is a 22 minute subway commute to Greenwich Village. There is street parking on the block, but it is hard to come by. If you plan to drive, please inquire about city parking regulations, etc.
access: The entrance to the apartment is at the ground-floor level (two steps down). The patio is accessed through the kitchen (up two steps) and has a small cafe table and two chairs (please see house rules regarding use of the patio). We have a smartlock system which allows for self-check in if guests are arriving at a time when we are unable to greet them.
interaction: This apartment is on the ground floor of the townhouse. We live on the upper two floors of the building. We have our own separate entrance so you may not see us unless you need to. However if you have questions you are welcome to call or ring our doorbell.
house_rules: Check in is at 3pm.  Check out is at 11am.  If we don't have another reservation coming in we may be able to extend the checkout time. Guests may use a smallish portion (about 7 x 10 feet) of our backyard patio.  There is a small cafe table and two chairs.  We ask that you use it very quietly between 11pm and 7am as the noise travels and we prefer not to wake the neighbors. Patio is often inaccessible when there is snow on the ground.   Smoking is allowed on patio, but never in the apt.  We charge a fee of $20 for lost key replacement.   Please note that for short-term stays, prices include NYC occupancy taxes of  5.875% + $2/room/night as per NYC law. Guests acknowledge that this is a one-bedroom apartment with one queen-size bed and one sofa that folds out into a full size bed. We also have a small travel crib for those traveling with infants.  We ask that you bring your own linens for the crib.   Guests will turn off central air conditioning units whenever they are leaving the apart

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Mid-west born and raised, but moved to NY more than 30 years ago.  Live with my partner/husband of 25 years, Orlando.  Jack of all trades: have been waiter, actor, development director, activist, ad man, philanthropist and am now a licensed associate real estate broker. Love Brooklyn and everything it offers.  Happy to share my insight with visitors.

reviews.comments: Michael was such a kind, honest, and accommodating host.  The place was just as advertised and I felt that it was a real good deal for the entire place.  The neighborhood was very safe and had everything we needed.  I had no complains and would definitely stay again on the next visit.
Loved my stay , clean , quiet . Walking distance to pretty much everything you need ! Will defiantly stay here agian

I've stayed in a lot of Airbnbs in NYC and it's generally always been a good experience. However, Michael's place tops all of them: it was neat and clean, well designed, comfortable (with great AC), and stocked to the last detail. Michael communicated well the whole time and was always ready to help. He even provided a guide to apartment and surrounding area with everything you'd need to know.

The neighborhood is quiet and it's a short walk to the metro or to multiple good restaurants, bars, and groceries.

A++

I had a wonderful stay with Michael and Orlando. When I showed up on a weekend they invited me to their backyard BBQ. How cool is that!  They were incredibly kind and gracious hosts. They even had a couple beers waiting for me. 

The apartment is very nice, HUGE, a deal for the price and ultra convenient to the F, G and R trains and well stocked with all the comforts of home. 

Is definitely recommend it for anyone, especially if you'll be commuting into the city often.

Beautiful apartment!  It is clean and modern, with plenty of light and space. It is only half a block from the F/G/R and very close to all the shops and restaurants on 5th avenue. I would definitely stay here again.

We just spent a week in this absolutely perfect apartment!  Michael was easy to communicate with and made us feel very at home.  The apartment is nicely appointed and very clean.  The little patio is a perfect place for morning coffee. Everything you cold possibly need is so close in this neighborhood - market, drug store subway, great restaurants and shops.  Michael has a wonderful guide to the neighborhood for his guests, which makes it easy to plan your stay.  Comfortable bed, great shower, easy access on the ground floor, quiet...and cute!  We can't wait to go back!
Michael was a welcoming and gracious host.  The apartment is bright, airy, and lovely.  It's perfectly situated..close to everything.  I can't wait to visit again.

Michael was a wonderful host and the apartment was really lovely. The listing is accurate and is as charming, clean, and private as described (A+). The location is incredible, with a two minute walk to the metro, great restaurants nearby, and convent grocery and pharmacies around.we hope to stay here again during our next visit to the city.

Without a doubt, we have found our go-to Brooklyn spot for when we come to visit family. The apartment is fantastic and exactly as pictured/described. The location can really not be beat. Literally steps to the subway; on a safe and quiet residential street; lots to walk to in the area- restaurants, shops, playgrounds, parks. We came and went and found free street parking without a problem. Michael was great communicating with us, and was so nice. An organized binder awaits with lots of helpful info/recommendations, along with a thoughtful surprise in the fridge. We will be booking family visits around the availability of this awesome space!! Highly recommend!

The apartment is lovely and perfectly located.
Michael was fantastic, so helpful and quick to respond with any questions.

We loved staying at Michael's apartment. The apartment is really lovely, clean, organized, it has everything that you need. I loved Park Slope area, calm and comfortable. The subway is incredibly close to the apartment. We definitely recommend this apartment and Michael was always available. Great experience!

The apt is very nice, clean and we felt very comfortable there. It is spacious, nicely furnished and air conditioned.  Subway station is a 2-3 min walk away (at end of block), we mostly took the F line to get to Manhattan. There are many restaurants (serving great multi ethnic food), grocery stores and a Rite Aid within short walking distance.  It was easy to communicate with the host.  Overall, we highly recommend this apartment.

Our experience with Michael and Orlando was superb.
The apartment is exactly as delightful as the picture, and it is literally 60 secs from the subway, right near a zipcar lot, and minutes from shops and restaurants.

Michael was genuinely hospitable, and we kinda hoped we might be able to move in forever, except that we had to go home...
Highly recommended.
It was a great experience. The apartment is exactly as we see in the pictures with the additional warming touches of the host. The area is safe and easy location for transfers. I do recommend.

This apartment was absolutely perfect! It is so charming, and we felt safe and at home. All the cool places to see, restaurants and bars were moments away from the front door. Having the train on the corner was a blessing! We marveled at the convenience. Our stay was just what we envisioned and so much more. Michael made us feel so welcomed and made himself available if we needed anything at all. Highly recommend!! We want to come back!
Siamo stati benissimo!!L'ambiente è molto accogliente e Michael è una persona estremamente (Website hidden by Airbnb) casa è cosi' come descritta,molto pulita ed accessoriata.

Michael and Orlando are the perfect hosts. They were quick to respond, made checking in and out easy, and provided lovely personalized welcoming touches on our arrival. Their beautiful apartment is in a charming neighborhood, and having the subway on the same block made getting around a breeze. Highly, highly recommended.

Great stay in Park Slope. Steps from the subway. The apartment was very clean and tidy when we arrived, and Michael was helpful and accommodating throughout our stay. The bed was super comfortable, the street was quiet, and the apartment was secure. Just a short walking distance from many good restaurants/bars.

Great stay in a safe and nice area (Park Slope). Michael was very friendly and helpful from the beginning, we had a late arrival and the snacks and drinks he left us were very handy after a long flight. Very nice place and decor, perfect for our party (3 people). Subway stop just half a block away. Highly recommended.

Perfect location.... Space was more than we expected...we were 2 adults and 2 kids and never felt cramped ... The beds were more than comfortable....Michael and Orlando's suggestions and list of favorites were great and helpful after long days of touring the city.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again.  Thank you to our hosts.

Michael was a fantastic host; he was unable to meet us right at check-in, however the lockbox was well located and very easy to use - and he came to check how we were as soon as he was able.
There is a house manual inside with answers to all your questions, and a guide to the local area with recommendations for restaurants, supermarkets, laundries etc which we used for most meals!
The apartment is exactly as it looks in the photos; so spacious and really well maintained, it was great to come back to at the end of each day. The location is also fantastic, super close to multiple shopping strips, and just half a block from subway! It really was the perfect place to stay :)

We spent 10 days in this cosy apartment and felt at home from the first minute. It is nicely furnished and has a  perfectly equipped little kitchen with even a microwave which was very useful. The patio was ideal for having breakfast or reading a book in the afternoon. I liked watching the squirrels hiding their nuts in the garden and the various birds. 
10th Street is very quiet, hardly any traffic especially during the nights. We slept with our windows open. With so many trains and buses just steps away every part of NY can be reached in no time. Michael is a wonderful host answering our questions immediately and even rushed home to "rescue" us when we locked ourselves out in the backyard. He and Orlando live upstairs but they gave us all the privacy we wanted. 
This was our third airbnb experience in Brooklyn and it was the best!
Really beautiful little apartment. Felt like our own house. Michael was really easy to communicate with. Really close to the Subway. Highly recommend it.

Michael's apartment is a gem.  It's updated, comfortable, and perfectly located with easy access to Manhattan via the subway (1/2 block away), and Prospect Park via a lovely walk.  The studio feels homey (lots of games and books) without making you feel like you're intruding.  I enjoyed coffee on the patio each morning, an added bonus.
Michael himself was a fabulous host:  I'd mentioned when I reserved that we'd be visiting NYC to celebrate my wife's birthday, and Michael left us celebratory libations (!); he made us feel at home, and accomodated our need to arrive a bit early and leave a bit late.  We'll recommend this to anyone who asks, and definitely stay there again next time we're in NYC.

Most importantly, the apartment and the host Michael were both well-deserving of the great reviews that they have received. The place was super clean(as I guess it should be for the $75 cleaning fee-worth it when amortized over 4 days), spacious at 700 sq.ft., well-stocked, & located on the ground floor( a plus for us older people). Michael was very pleasant & helpful on the one occasion that we needed help, & very available, an obvious advantage of having the host living in the same building. When he came down to help us with a TV technology problem(shocker-an older couple having trouble with how to work the remotes), he seemed genuinely glad to help us, rather than it being an annoyance to him. Communication was very speedy & helpful. Checking-in and out was easy & went smoothly; we even quickly found a parking space on the next block & didn't have to move it until the weekly street sweeper came in 4 days). The neighborhood info booklet, put together with effort by Michael & Orlando, was useful, as were the travel books. We would add a semi-close coffee/pastry store, Martin's Café, apparently popular with the locals, on 5th Ave., opposite the Middle School, near 5th St., as I recall.
5th Ave., in general, had many stores, with a number of eateries, including fast food places and non-fancy, affordable sit-down restaurants. Prospect Park was a 15 minute walk away, but you're walking through blocks of lovely brownstones, etc. with very nice autumnal flowers & other decorations. And another 15 min. walk through Prospect Park (not Central Park, but still very nice) has you at the Botanical Gardens & Brooklyn Art Museum. 
Traffic noise was hardly noticeable and not a problem. The neighbor's construction must have finished, or if not finished, it didn't produce any morning noise. The only noticeable, but bearable morning noise was the low-grade rumble of the very near-by subway, an acceptable trade-off for the convenience of having 3 different subway lines steps away from your front door.
I would definitely recommend this lovely apartment with its great location and its Super Host.

Siamo stati una settimana in questo bellissimo appartamento.. Luminoso, spazioso e accogliente!! Ancora più bello di quanto le foto possano mostrare.. Michael è un host fantastico.. simpaticissimo e disponibile per ogni nostra esigenza.. ma assolutamente non invadente. Il quartiere di Park Slope è molto carino, pieno di negozi, locali dove mangiare, market e a solo un minuto dalla metropolitana.. In conclusione consiglio vivamente a chi vuole visitare New York di prenotare da Michael.. Garanzia assoluta!!!
Very nice and comfortable place! We enjoyed our stay.

Just back from eight nights at Michael's apartment in Park Slope Brooklyn. From the very first contact through the site Michael was very quick to come back to us with answers and any information we required. 
On our arrival it was very easy to gain entry to the apartment & Michael was available if we had  any problems. The apartment was as described in the listing, was spotlessly clean & well appointed with a very comfortable bed. The bathroom was a good size and had a very good shower.
Michael had made up a local guide listing local amenities & restaurants, he had also left some complimentary drinks in the fridge on our arrival. We made good use of his restaurant recommendations. The subway station was at the bottom of the street and made access into Manhattan very easy. 
We were also impressed with the Park Slope neighbourhood and Brooklyn generally and would recommend visitors spend some time exploring locally. 
He also let us have a late check out on our departure. Would definitely 
stay in Michaels apartment again.

This was our first visit to NYC and we had the best time. After a long day of shopping, sightseeing and fun stuff we returned to a very nice, spacious, clean, warm and welcoming apartment. There is nothing Michael hasn't thought of. There was water and beer in the fridge when we arrived and a very helpful binder with useful tipps. The kitchen had everything we needed and the bathroom was stocked with towels, soap, lotion, a hair dryer and so on. The bed was very comfortable and we had a lot of space to put our clothes. If we weren't in the mood to go out in the evening we watched Netflix or Hulu on the couch. I could go on and on... We couldn't be happier with our choice to stay here and we'll come back as soon as possible.

The apartment was 100% true to the photos - gorgeous! It was really easy to get the keys from the lockbox, and even though the bedroom faces the street, the apartment was incredibly quiet. Communication with Michael was clear from the beginning and my parents had everything they needed. The apartment is basically in front of the 4th Ave/9th St station which made it super convenient as well with out of towners who aren't used to walking much. Would definitely rent from Michael again!

This place was great and in a spectacular location for getting around. Just down the road you have plenty to eat and Prospect Park and less then a block from the house you have access to the F G and R Train which makes getting into the city or around Brooklyn easy! The apartment itself is very spacious and nicely up kept. Very happy with the overall stay here.

Michael was pro-active and thorough with pre-trip communications, and with check-in details the day of our arrival. He allowed us to leave our bags before check-in, which was a great help to us. A huge vase of gorgeous flowers greeted us inside the well-appointed and freshly cleaned apartment.

We never saw/met Michael during our long weekend stay, but it was nice knowing he lived right upstairs in case we had any questions. We already knew the neighborhood, so we didn't need much help. Proximity to the subway (150 yards?) could not be better, and there are numerous excellent eating and shopping establishments nearby as well. 

All in all, we loved our stay and would certainly return next time. Thanks, Michael!

We had a great stay at Michael's apt. A spacious place where my wife and I could hang our hat when we weren't out exploring the city. Michael was an excellent host and very prompt to respond to any inquiries. He left a binder full of suggestions which we made good use for restaurants, etc. The Park Slope area is full of cool places to explore, especially the awesome Prospect Park! I imagine it must be a busy oasis in the Spring time, but we enjoyed a brisk winter walks through there anyways. There is a subway that will get you to Manhattan in about 20 min that is literally a half block away. As an airbnb host myself, I definitely notice the little things Michael does to ensure that guests enjoy their time at his apartment. I hope to be back the next time I'm in Brooklyn. And if you're thinking about his apartment, just book it! You won't regret it.

Las fotos del apartamento reflejan fielmente su aspecto real: totalmente reformado, limpio y acogedor. Cuanta con todos los utensilios necesarios, pero además su anfitrión Michael siempre está disponible para facilitarte cualquier utensilio o ayudarte. La zona es muy tranquila y sin ruidos y además está muy bien comunicada. Sin duda, MUY RECOMENDABLE!!!!
Smooth and easy! Michael is the best host I've had. Very attentive. The place is perfect.

Great place and great location! Lots of space and very tastefully decorated. Michael made us feel very welcome by leaving us beer and snacks in the kitchen. He also put together a very helpful guide to restaurants and bars in the neighborhood

Micheal is an excellent host with an awesome place in Park Slope. It's a spacious layout, decorated with cool art, books and furniture. The place is very well put together, my wife and I felt right at home. The neighborhood is nice and quite, very close to the F, G, and R train lines. Many great restaurants and bars are within walking distance or a train stop away. My wife and I really enjoyed our stay. Thanks!

Michael's place in Park Slope is indeed fabulous. It is perfectly decorated, cozy, and the kitchen is perfect for cooking meals in a snowstorm -- which is exactly what we did -- it was the perfect place and the perfect weekend.
It was a great stay at Michael's place - subway access, great restaurants and of course, spacious, lovely and comfortable room. My parents and I love it so much

I loved feeling like I was in my own Brooklyn apartment, eclectically decorated with a nice mix of vintage and modern furniture and travel memorabilia from all over the world.  The apartment is light filled and spacious, plenty of room for everyone to spread out, it is equiped with everything you might need for a multi-night stay. Robert was immediately available to answer any questions though, I didn't have many as everything was well explained before my arrival and further explained in the handy notebook full of information about the apartment and the neighborhood. The convenience to the subway stop can't be over stated, half a block! We had an easy drive to Park Slope from D.C., and just as Robert suggested we would on a Friday night, found a parking space right on the block. Some of our favorite Brooklyn restaurants are within a few minutes walk, Al Di La (Italian), Culture (the best frozen yogurt), Martin (coffee), Locanda Mariella (Italian wine bar), Olivier (a sweet little French bistro) and on 5th Ave are a great Thai and Mexican restaurant whose names I don't remember at the moment. I'm looking forward to returning in warmer weather when we can also use the garden patio for coffee or a glass of wine.

This place was perfect for my husband and I on a recent visit to Brooklyn to see our daughter who lives nearby. It is only a half block from the subway to almost anywhere and walking distance to great restaurants, shops, the Brooklyn Museum, the Brooklyn Botanical Garden and Prospect Park. Easy to get to Manhattan as well. We were easily able to take the train from JFK Airport as well.
The apartment was stocked with everything we needed and was very comfortable. 
It was also much quieter than expected.
We hope to return!

Michael's apartment was perfect for our trip to New York. Great central location close to the station and some fantastic places to eat and drink within walking distance. The apartment was immaculate and Michael's binder with places to eat and drink was extremely helpful ! I only wish we could have stayed longer.

Easily one of the best AirBnB experiences I've EVER had.  From the ease of communication with Michael to the quality and comfort of the space. I loved this apartment and wish I could have stayed longer (especially to enjoy the patio!!!).  Thanks for the hospitality! I'll be back!
Staying here was an overall great experience.  The home is right in the heart of the Park Slope, which made exploring easy.  Michael was very hospitable and made everything simple for us.
Beautiful appartement in a fantastic neighbourhood. We had a blast! Definitly recommend this place. Thanks again Michael!

Beautiful spacious apartment that really made us feel at home and made exploring so easy. In a great  location, so close to the subway and in a safe area. Michael was extremely helpful and welcoming going above and beyond what we expected from a host. We would definitely recommend and wouldn't hesitate to book again if returning to New York. Thanks again Michael.

There are many reasons this apartment is almost always booked!  

My stay at Michael's apartment in Park Slope was perfect in many ways.  I travel to NYC weekly for work so, certainly appreciated the quiet yet, central location in Brooklyn.  The apartment is exactly how it looks in the photos...super clean, spacious, comfortable decor, tons of storage & well appointed kitchen.  Michael even left some cold beverages in the fridge and snacks to make the stay even better!  You can walk to many shops and restaurants in the area.  There is even a book that contains Michael's guidance and feedback on local retail and eats - that came in handy.  Unfortunately, I did not get to enjoy the outdoor garden due to the weather but, hope to do so when can stay again!
Great place!  Clean, spacious and great for 3 people. Comfortable beds, close to subway.  Entry was easy. Would stay here again!

Super easy dealing with Michael. We never got to meet him due to late check in and early check out but Michael was very responsive and made everything easy to deal with. He even offered to pick us pizza up as we were arriving so late! Carroll gardens is only a 15 min walk away and the subway is super close and easy to use.

Michael was a great host, he was always ready to help. From the beginning to the end he was a great host, communicative, welcoming, friendly and helpful. The apartment was as described, well located. I highly recommend this apartment for visitors. We enjoyed every minute.

We have just returned from a month stay at Michaels Accomadation in Brooklyn 
The experience and the host were great - Would definitely recommend

Our host made us more than welcome, so obliging in any help we sought, even inviting us for a glass of wine. We were really touched by that. Our host provided detailed listing of local restaurants which we enjoyed, it was so helpful. The listing is accurately described. We were more that happy in this spacious apartment that had everything we needed, particularly air conditioning so important over summer.  It is a wonderful neighbourhood. 2 minutes from the subway where all of New York City is easily accessible. We would have no hesitation to recommend staying here to any New York visitor.
Very positive experience . Apartment is confortable and close to subwa (Website hidden by Airbnb) R. Michael is really kind and available

The property is located right near a F live station which provides convenient access to Manhattan. It's also a short stroll through beautiful Park Slope to Prospect Park. The owner met us on arrival to show us the apartment and how to access it.

My friends and I really enjoyed our stay at Michaels. It's in a fantastic part of Brooklyn that is safe and surrounded by super convenient metro station and food options. The apartment itself is modern, clean and very well looked after. We really enjoyed having the garden out the back too for summer afternoons. Beds were comfy, even the sofa bed! Only thing to note is 3 beds means 1 queen bed, 1 double sofa and 1 crib.

I had the pleasure of staying at Michaels listing for 2 weeks while in NY for business. The proximity to the subway was fabulous! I could be anywhere in the city within an hour. Any questions or concerns that I had regarding the stay was answered quickly by Michael, and the apartment met all my needs. The neighborhood is great as well! I highly recommend the farmers market on 5th Ave between 4th and 3rd streets, and the juice shop between Steve's O town grocery and the CVS.

Apartment was exactly as advertised. Comfy for all 4 of us as family. It had all the essentials for us. Michael was extremely helpful and caring. And he gave us our privacy. The small details like our names on the inside welcoming us and the wonderful wine was deeply touching. Thanks for letting us in your home which felt like our home.
Michael was very welcoming and accessible. The place was in a convenient location for public transport and was just the kind of place we needed for our trip.
Michael is an excelent host. He is very helpful. The house is very clean, 30 meters from a the subway and very comfortable. Evrything was ok.

Michael was a fabulous host.  He and Orlando greeted me upon my arrival, had a sign in the house with a personalized hello and a box of amazing cookies.  The home was spotless, comfortable and quiet.  It was certainly a bit of heaven after long days working in the city. Michael made it easy to get around and choose places to eat as he had assembled a notebook of "things you need to know".   I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

This is a great base for a visit to New York.
The apartment is large, bright, and convenient for 3 people (even 4 if they share the sofa-bed).  Full kitchen makes it easy to eat at home.
Bed and sofa-bed are very comfortable. Good heat and a/c and quiet.

Excellent location for tourists: half a block from the junction of two subways, so quick transit to downtown & midtown manhattan (or to williamsburg), Short walk to Prospect Park or to Brooklyn Heights / Cobble Hill. One block from a major local shopping street. 


Michael was friendly and helpful and always available by instant message,
Beautifully decorated garden apartment located in Park Slope near the train, restaurants and shops.  Michael is a wonderful host.  You will love it!

Michael's apartment was amazing to stay in. It was very clean and spacious. Public transport was very easy to access, with a subway stop very close by. While we didn't get a chance to meet Michael and Orlando, Michael was very prompt in replying to messages and was very accommodating.

Michael is a very thoughtful host who provides a wonderfully convenient location to explore all that Park Slope has to offer. This secure apartment is steps away from the subway, and easily accessible to restaurants, parks and shops. Michael responded immediately to our inquiries, and even came to our rescue late in the evening when we thought we had locked ourselves out of the apartment. There is an informative notebook that Michael has carefully compiled about the area that shows the extent of his concern for his guests. Thank you Michael for your gracious hospitality!
fantastic place the hosts are definitely well organized and very friendly

This really was a fabulous Park Slope garden apartment just as advertised.  We were able to find everything we needed and more right in the neighborhood.  Beautiful Prospect Park is nearby, as well as subway service that opens up the whole city.  Michael was very understanding when I had a little trouble figuring out how airbnb works, and he made the process, and our stay comfortable.

First time staying in Brooklyn and Michael's house made it amazing. Location is perfect for my 4 yr old, safe and s (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) quiet. It's much more spacious than what it seems, and having the backyard is great! The apartment is clean, well equipped and the bed's super comfy. Best part of our stay was our host who was amazing... He was always reachable, responsive and made us feel so welcome. We'll definitely want to come back and stay again!
A very nice and cosy apartment close to the subway, nice cafés and restaurants. And not too far a walk to Prospect Park. We recommend it!

Michael was very communicative before the visit and very clear with instructions to get in. Felt very welcomed with a greeting note and fresh bagels and cream cheese. The apartment itself was great. Very nicely decorated with all you needed and a functional kitchen. Will definitely be back!

What a great place to stay!  The apartment is just as it is presented - clean, comfortable and bright.  Michael greeted us upon arrival and made us feel very welcome.  Many personal touches and a great location close to the subway, shops and dining allow you the pleasure of living like a local.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Michael's place was top notch! Definitely giving it 5 stars. It was super clean & quiet - worked brilliantly for our weekend! Thanks Michael!

Michael's apartment was a great home base for our trip to NYC. We liked being in a neighborhood a little bit removed from the bustle, but had no trouble getting to and from Manhattan via the subway station 1/2 block from the apartment. The apartment was beautifully decorated, and Michael had thought of everything--there were answers to every question we might have in a little guest book left for us. We enjoyed our stay immensely.

Michael's South Park Slope apartment is perfect. It's clean, quiet, and comfortable. Great restaurants, bars, and Prospect Park are all within walking distance and a subway station is only half a block away. I would highly recommend this apartment for anybody looking to stay in the area.
Great place / convenient location in great neighbourhood/ friendly and helpful hosts= ideal Airbnb
A nice flat in a quiet neigborhood but near to shops and restaurants

Fantastic apartment in Park Slope, very convenient to that part of Brooklyn but also super easy to catch the trains from the end of the block and head into Manhattan (or anywhere else). Spacious and clean, with your own laundry and access to a private patio and small garden, which is really nice to have in the middle of the city. (We woke up to birds singing). Well stocked with essentials and a nice extra touches like a great collection of books. On top of all that, Michael is an incredibly fast and responsive communicator and very easy to work with. Highly recommended.
This was a spectacular spot for my business trip. Cozy and elegant. The home baked cookies were a sweet touch.

This is a great launchpad for actitivites in the area, or just a place to hang around.  With the small outside terrace with table and chairs, it offers the outdoors without the hustle-bustle of the street activity.  It was quiet and the only thing I noticed occassionally was a distant rumble from the subway.  Highly recommend.
Nice garden apartment in park Slope. Michael was a friendly and informative host who told us out-of-towners about the neighborhood. Clean and well furnished. We enjoyed our short 2 day stay.

Michael was a very hospitable host. He was easy to contact, he was home in the middle of his working hours to let us in, earlier than we had agreed. When the weather turned hot, he came to fix the air conditioning. He even invited us to a party that he was giving in the backyard on a Sunday afternoon but which we unfortunately couldn't attend. The apartment was spacious for two people, the separate bedroom a good thing and the big bed very comfartable. The location is good if you want to go to Manhattan or the areas of Brooklyn - the subway and the bus stops are just in two minutes' walk. There are lots of good restaurants nearby, and Michael had given good advice to find them - and  other things too - in the little personal guidebook for visitors on the table.

A very comfortable stay, host very informative.
Very well equipped.
Perfect location, very thoughtfully appointed, great design sense, and perfect hosts.  Couldn't get much better.

I found Michael's apartment even better than what it looked like in the pictures. It's spacious, perfectly clean and very well taken care of. I particularly appreciated the cozy garden. Michael and Orlando were always available both before and during our stay,  answering all our messages within minutes. Their superhost badge is well deserved. They were so kind as to welcome us with complimentary drinks and fresh bagels. They also provided detailed instructions about the house and very useful information about the neighborhood. The house is located in a quiet street – you hardly ever hear a car passing by. The F line is just half block away and it takes no longer than six stops to reach Downtown Manhattan. I can definitely recommend Michael's place and I'll consider staying there again if I come back again.

This was our second visit to Michael's place. Each time we stayed for 3 weeks. We found the place perfect for us. It is virtually adjacent to a subway station, it is a lovely neighbourhood, the apartment is spotlessly clean and has everything that you might need. The host are delightful and helpful. To my mind any visit to New York makes this the perfect place to stay.

Michael was available when we checked in. Great communication, very organized, he keeps a folder with pages and pages of places to eat, shop, visit, etc. There were 4 of us, including 2 teenagers. Everyone in our party enjoyed their stay in Brooklyn. Everything is just a few blocks away: gelato, restaurants, bagels, grocery store, and of course the subway stop down the street. We have stayed in Manhattan several times before, so we wanted to try a different neighborhood away from tourists! If you are traveling by car, the neighborhood has free street parking. You may have to park a block or 2 away, but there are spots.

Michael & Orlando's garden apartment is a comfortable, quiet and lovely base to explore Brooklyn. We were especially delighted to find the bed quite comfortable by our standards... firm but not hard. Our backs were very happy and we were grateful for the deep sleep.

What an amazing place and great hosts!  They have the best binder ever with place recommendations and maps - it really helped us explore the neighborhood. Some complementary bagels and beverages to greet us, guide books to borrow ideas from and so close to the subway so we could explore easily.  What a comfortable, quiet and clean spot.  There was even a little backyard spot to have breakfast coffee and that bagel!  I would recommend this spot to anyone. I'm a little sensitive to noise and it was nice and quiet while also close to the subway and plenty of great places for food and drink.   I would stay here again in a second.

The apartment is at the cusp of 5th Ave in Park Slope next to all the bars and restaurants you could want and a 20 min walk to Barclay's center where there are even more. Michael is extremely nice and accommodating. The apartment was cute, cozy, clean, and comfortable. Would absolutely re recommend.

Loved the complimentary beverages in the fridge,came in handy after frenetic days in the city,loved the local guide you put together,got fantastic use out of that,the apartment was very well appointed,easy to get to,safe,clean,nice little court yard.Highly recommend to anyone wishing to stay in Brooklyn.
Very comfortable, clean and well-equipped apartment! We had a very pleasant stay, subway is 3 mins walk, 25 mins to manhattan. Grocerys, shops and restaurants are nearby. Highly recommend!

The apartment was delightful- everything we needed was there - Michael kindly left me food as I arrived late. The location was fine and we had an excellent stay. Michael was a great host without being intrusive.
This is a great place in a very good neighborhood in Brooklyn. Very close to the subway. The place is very roomy and comfortable.

Michael and Orlando were great hosts! They were very out of the way, but still readily available via messages, or by just walking upstairs and knocking on the door. The apartment was larger than I expected and a shorter commute, too; it really is ideally situated if you're commuting into the city for work. Everything was clean and convenient. I would stay again!

The apartment was great, exactly as described and immaculately clean. It was perfectly located with easy access to the subway as well as for walking round park slope.

Michael was very helpful and quick to respond to queries.

We stayed with 2 small children and found it ideal for our needs.

We would definitely book it again for a New York trip.

Michael's place was terrific!  It was comfortable, neat and clean, so nicely decorated, had all the necessities and extras to make our stay extremely comfortable.  All instructions were written out in detail, which made the stay so easy.  The location is great.  Michael is a fantastic host.  From the beginning he was available and happy to answer any questions, was flexible, could be reached during our stay if needed.   I highly recommend Michael as a host, and his place as a wonderful place to stay.  I'm looking forward to staying there again!
Great Place/clean/ quiet/ close to everything!!!   Very good experience!  Highly recommend!!!!  Michael was gracious at check in!!!  Very polite and explained everything!!!'

Michael's place was perfect for our stay in Brooklyn.  Michael was very thoughtful with small touches, like cold drinks in the fridge and bagels waiting for us! He also set up the pack and play for our 10-month-old prior to our arrival, which was very nice.  Thanks, Michael!

Michael es un muy buen anfitrión. La comunicación con él fue excelente, solícito y atento. El barrio es hermoso y está muy bien ubicado con respecto al metro. El departamento fue muy cómodo para tres personas, tal vez le falten algunos mínimos detalles del equipamiento. Excelente y recomendable experiencia!
Beautiful, central place with a hip, modern feel in one of the best New York neighborhoods.

Michael's place was great! I am a last minute planner, and he made the check-in and communication super easy. He had a cleaner come in asap, allowed me to drop my bags while they cleaned, etc. The bed is comfy as can be - I was stopping through after a long trip and this really hit the spot. Location is safe, convenient and on very cute block. They left snacks in the kitchen, coffee in the cabinet, and a binder with all info needed. Bonus and one of the best parts is that they have a really great yard area in the back, which I utilized in the morning for coffee and catching up on work emails. Highly recommend!

The place was clean, very comfortable, all amenities for a delightful stay in Park Slope.  Location was ideal for subway/bus.  Dishwasher/washer/dryer priorities for us - and it fit the bill perfectly.  Bed very comfortable.
Michael and Orlando’s place is perfect! Very clean and cute, quiet, and in my favorite neighborhood. I will definitely be booking again!

This was one of our favourite Airbnb stays. It was exactly as advertised but Michael goes the extra mile with details that go a long way. There was a binder with all of the information we could possibly want from an intro to our hosts, where to eat, our WiFi info and more. Simple things like Welcome Paul and Nadia written to us in the entryway and candies in the kitchen....they have thought of everything and it felt like home and then some. We will definitely stay here again when back in the New York area.

Micheal’s condo is very comfortable and clean.   He was very responsive before, during and after our visit.  The condo is about a half block from subway, convenient to restaurants and grocery store.  We drove and found parking easily within a block each time we left.   We took a few uber rides as well and it was convenient for a quick pickup.  We would stay there again.
I've been going to NY (Brooklyn) since 2011 and this is first time using airbnb, what a great way to start off! Best experience I could have hoped for. Amazing host, will rebook without hesitation.

Our 2nd time staying with Michael, and it was more than perfect of course! The laundry was a big plus, and having that backyard space when it snowed was so much fun for my son. Thanks again our amazing hosts!

We were very grateful, in the midst of a winter bomb cyclone (?) and frozen pipes at our home, to find this cozy, well-appointed and well-positioned apartment as a retreat. Michael was very thorough and responsive, and the place was quiet and clean. Even though we've lived in the neighborhood for years, I found the binder these guys have put together with tips on local restaurants and attractions really engrossing.
The location in Park Slope is ideal as it is close to public transportation (subway and/or bus).  Michael's place is clean, bed is comfy and all amenities work.

This is a great apartment. I liked it so much I stayed for 5 months. Michael is a terrific host who made sure everything was how it was supposed to be, even when he was travelling outside the country. Space is comfortable and feels spacious. Location is within spitting distance of 5th Ave, a great street for bars/restaurants/shopping. Incredibly convenient to the subway. Highly recommended.

This unit far exceeded our expectations! We have stayed in numerous different places and neighborhoods in New York and this was by far our favorite.  Michael was very accommodating and considerate. He held a parking spot in front of the unit for us when we arrived. He also helped unload our car, and then helped load us back up as we were leaving. Everything was extremely clean. Plenty of space, even with our 18 month old and all of his toys! We will definitely be back!
Micheal was a great host.  Location was perfect and so convenient.  We would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends!

This was our second time staying with Michael,we wanted to have more of Brooklyn experience this time  and the apt is a perfect launching pad,fantastic location,quiet,safe and close to all amenities,Michael went out of his way to help us out with a dental emergency by recommendation and contact details whilst we were still in transit to Brooklyn from Boston which was greatly appreciated,couldn’t recommend Michael and the apartment highly enough.

Michael is a welcoming host, and is very organized and thoughtful in all the touches in his property.  The bed is very comfortable; the garden area was a delightful space, and the living area is well equipped and  relaxing.  Subway is very convenient and made getting around easy.   Michael has provided a lot of extras--including a great guide of the neighborhood.  It was a pleasure to stay there!

My teenage daughter and I stayed for a week in Michael’s apartment. The apartment was very clean, quiet and perfect for us. We loved the special touches of the drinks in the fridge when we arrived, our names on the chalk board when we entered and all the wonderful restaurant suggestions! The apartment is very close to a subway station that easily takes you to manhattan. The neighborhood is nice with a grocery and drug store very close. We felt very safe in the neighborhood and apartment. We will be back again.

年数の経ったお家ですが､綺麗に維持しています｡
駅からも近く､周りにお店やﾚｽﾄﾗﾝもあるので､便利でした｡

I stayed here for three nights while traveling on business. There was an F train stop on the block, which was extremely convenient and gave me a door to door to commute to the office on 42nd Street. A+

The location was also great in terms of day to day amenities. When we arrived, Michael showed us the apartment and a local guide he had put together. He highlighted the 24 hour rite aid just around the corner, as well as the closest grocery stores.

My wife came with me, and she was able to book some morning gym classes less than a block away.

I would definitely recommend this place to anyone (including my future self :) ). 

The apartment itself was extremely clean and had a lot of nice touches in terms of style (wall art, etc.). The bed was freshly made and there were plenty of pillows and blankets.  There were plenty of towels and the shower was a comfortable size.

The kitchen was not too small and there was a nice couch area and a nice dining room table.

Thanks for a great few days!

We had a great stay at Michael & Orlando's home and it was beyond our expectations. We were greeted when arrived and communication prior and during the trip was accurate and quick. Michael & Orlando's home was extremely clean, had all the amenities, comfort, and located in a walkable neighborhood (near the subway station) with great restaurants and a nearby grocery store.
We would definitely recommend this place to anyone; It was a pleasure to stay there!
We had a very enjoyable experience. The apartment is very nice, Michael is a real gentleman and made everything for us to feel confortable. Definitelly would stay there again.

We had really good moments in the apartment and would defenitely stay again. Michael is a very good host and made everything that das possible to make us confortable. It's a charming and well equiped place, in resume

This is the ideal Airbnb if you're staying in Brooklyn! Amazing location (very close to the train) and Michael gave us many recommendations for local spots around the area. As someone who is particular about clean spaces, I can assure you this spot was incredibly clean. Best of all, Michael was a great host - very helpful and accommodating. Highly recommend this spot and will be trying to book for my next visit!

My stay exceeded my expectations.  The apartment was warm and welcoming, clean and beautiful.   The efficiency was top-notch in both information about the apartment and visiting Brooklyn.  The close proximity to the subway made getting to the city really easy, and the neighborhood is one of the best in Brooklyn.  I would highly recommend this rental to anyone looking for an awesome place to stay!
Comfy clean space, convenient low key neighborhood away from NYC throngs but close to everything, host responsive easy to connect with.  Definite recommend.
As advertised. Great location and a delightful unit. Hosts are very responsive and provided valuable information in their “local guide “.
Close to subway, very clean and comfortable

This is perhaps the perfect space for a visit to NYC. Access to transportation could not be better, the washer and dryer means you can pack fewer things, the space is large and comfortable and cozy for the winter and the AC appears to be well placed for summer. We will be back.

One of the best hosts we ever had, lovely people, great location in Park Slope, half block away from the F, G and R trains. Good restaurants, bars and close to parks too. Vinyls, books, board games, Netflix for the cold days and a backyard for the warmer ones.
Totally recommend it :)

We live in the area already but needed a place while our own was undergoing work. This apartment was perfect, great value, excellent location (Shelsky’s!!!) and Michael even set up the baby crib in advance. Ideal experience

name: CHARMING NYC Studio Loft NEAR SOHO!

Also, the apt located on the ground floor so no stairs climbing for you after a long day out in The City. In Addition, the apt located in the back of the building what makes it super nice and QUIET which is a big advantage in a place like NYC!!! The apt is FULLY ACCESSORZIDE with:  - (very) High Ceiling  - Exposed Break Wall in the living room lounge  -Queen Size bed  - Big cozy Couch (opens-up to a Full Size Bed!!)  - Big screen HD TV with over 100 cable channels  - Complimentary High Speed Wireless Internet  - Fully accessorized Kitchen with NEW appliances  - Full size Walk-In Closet for your privet use & dressers  - Every other necessity you might need as Iron & Iron board, Hair Dryer, etc…  EVERYTHING YOU NEED!!! :) * You will get fresh clean linens and towels!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ** FREE high Speed Wireless Internet + 120 HD cable channels -Complimentary!!!!!!!!!!!
