neighborhood_overview: The Greenwich Village is a very beautiful, cool residential neighborhood filled with great restaurants (Waverly Inn, Morandi, Minetta Tavern, the Spotted Pig are just a few), cafes, bakeries (Magnolia Bakery, Amy's Bread), bars, jazz clubs (Small's, the Blue Note, the Village Vanguard) and great shopping (endless!), bookstores (Three Lives), markets (Union Square greenmarket, Faicco's Pork Store, Murray's Cheese Shop, Gourmet Garage), and contemporary art galleries…
transit: Close to ALL the major subway Stations (C,E,N,R,B,D,F,M,1,6).
access: Walk to amazing Soho, Chelsea, Union Square, Meatpacking District, the Highline, Washington Square Park, NYU and many more in just only few blocks away!  …And you will get this AMAZING APT right in the middle of it all !!! ;)
interaction: Always :)
house_rules: No smoking  No pets!  Please take care of the apt as it was yours!  Please make sure that when checking out it is in the same condition as you got it when checked in!  Thanks a lot and your cooperation is highly appreciated! ;)

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hello everyone, 
I'm Olga
I just moved to NYC and totally in love with this city, its fast tempo and the endless possibilities and energy it gives you. 
This is truly the best city in the world!!! ;) 
So, if you are ready to come and explore it yourself, please feel free to contact me about my apt for a great stay in an amazing city!

Hope to see you soon :-)

reviews.comments: Nos alojamos 9 días allí. El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Esta súper bien ubicado. No es muy luminoso, pero dado que solo lo usamos para dormir, estuvo perfecto. La cocina es bastante amplia, pudimos desayunar a algunas noches cocinar ahí mismo. Tiene un lavaropas y una secadora que nos fueron muy útiles. Todo salió tal cual lo pactado. Los dueños tuvieron el gesto de demorar el check out unas cuantas horas mas para no complicar nuestro regreso (nuestro vuelo salía en la madrugada). Súper recomendable!

The apartment was exactly as described it was clean and tidy. It is a beautiful apartment in a truly amazing location in New York, Great food is all around as well as a whole range of other activities.

Your host will be able to answer any questions you might have and are always contactable if you need anything.

I had an amazing time at this apartment and would stay again if I could.

We had a great time staying at Olga's apartment the location was perfect and just as described, great shops and restaurants, the washing machine so useful and Nir was very helpful and quick to respond when we first arrived, we would visit again:)

Honestly, we loved our stay!! Unlike so many other listing Olga responded immediately and continued to keep in contact on a very short notice rental.  Nil(boyfriend) was likewise in constant contact, easy going and patient when waiting for us to arrive.  He was awesome!!!  The place was spotless with expert cleaning services. Nil helped us settle in, showed us our space and gave us tips on the neighborhood. Easy 1st floor access and perfect location in center of the Village..does not get better!  Space actually is bigger than seems in photos.  This is officially our spot in the city when we come to stay for the night!!  btw AC on 90 degree day....phenomenal and the wifi.....perfect, fast no (Website hidden by Airbnb) it should be!!!! Thank you!!!!!

Olga's place is in a great neighbourhood, close to everything you could want including lots of great eateries and a nearby subway with an elevator so you don't have to struggle with (Website hidden by Airbnb) is just how it looks in the photos, the beds are comfy, it's clean and has everything you need. I was met promptly and shown how to use everything and then left to my own devices but I am sure if I had needed anything I could have easily asked. Great value!

I've spent 8 days with my wife on Olga's apartment. Great location. I can't think on a better one. Lots of nice bars around and very close to the Washington Square, which is my favourite park in NYC. 
The apartment is nice and quiet,  but the building is a little bit older than I would like.
The host was very nice and everything went pretty well. Her boyfriend was kind enough to let us send stuff bought on Amazon to his place and then left on the apartment.

La estadia fue buena. Nir estuvo pendiente de todo lo que necesitásemos  e incluso paso por el departamento en una oportunidad para revisar el aire acondicionado que finalmente resulto ser un ruido que generaba un vecino con su aire. La ubicación es muy buena, cerca de todo lo que se disfruta en Soho y a pocas cuadras de varias entradas de diferentes lineas de subte.

Olga and Nir's apartment is the perfect place to stay in the West Village.  There are many cheap options for food in McDougal St, and it's relatively close to the subway system.  Olga and Nir were great hosts, and the apartment was perfect for me, as I was travelling alone.  The Washer and dryer were great to have access to as well.
Fantastic apartment in an amazing location.  We really enjoyed out time in New York and couldn't fault our accommodation or host they both made the trip perfect.
Olga was awesome!!   Very communicative and helpful in making out stay comfortable.  The place is in a perfect location in the heart of the village, but also very quiet.  Great amenities, too!

The apartment was excellent.  Located in a great neighborhood with access to the entire city.  The apartment was everything advertised, clean, and very comfortable.  I don't know where you got that bedroom chandelier but it is exceptional.

Thanks!
J&J

This is a lovely quiet place to stay in the lively Greenwich Village. It is at the back of the building so is extremely quiet for the area and there are minimal stairs which makes checking in a breeze. Nir even helped us with our bags!! The apartment was clean and comfortable for a couple to share very happily. Olga's boyfriend Nir was who we felt with and was friendly and helpful to us during our stay. We had only one minor concern and he was able to help us and sorted it out very quickly and offered assistance when we asked. An excellent host. Nir recommended a restaurant to us called 12 chairs which we very much enjoyed. Thanks Olga & Nir!

We loved our stay at Olga's place! We couldn't have asked for a better location and it was great to have access to a washing machine and dryer which are both brand new. The shower pressure was great which was lovely for the cold days and the temperature was easy to adjust to suit us. Olga's boyfriend met us in arrival and was so lovely. He helped us with our bags and happily answered our many questions and had loads of recommendations. He even walked us to our nearest subway to show us where to go.

We had such a great stay here - the location is amazing, and a great space for 2 ppl.  We loved that the home had a very warm vibe, without having any clutter around! The (brand new) washing machine was such an added value to have and Olga and Nir were very hospitable, especially given we arrived so late at night.  Would really recommend as a NY stay to any couple!
The apartment was clean, pretty, and perfectly located. Olga and her boyfriend were incredibly responsive and even checked in to make sure that my stay was going well. 10/10 would stay here again

Très bons échanges et réponses rapides d'Olga à la réservation. Elle a répondu à toutes nos questions. Excellent acceuil à notre arrivée. Appartement très bien équipé et extrêmement propre. Situation idéale pour se promener au Sud et au Nord de Manhattan. Métro proche et tous commerces à proximité. Egalement bars et restaurants. L'appartement est très calme et le rez de chaussée appréciable après une grande journée de marche. Le lave linge et le sèche linge indispensable pour nous, c'est un grand plus ! Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.
 Literie très confortable !

Our stay at Olga's was great. The apartment is just like the pictures, absolutely lovely and couldn't have been in a better location. Really close to bars, restaurants and stores and near to a lot of subway stations. Olga was really nice and answered all of our questions online really quick. It was a great experience and can't wait to come back again. 100% recommended!
Nice place to live, convenient

Great to be on the first floor (no stairs).  Ride share with Juno, they are great and give 30% off for first 15 days after you sign up.  Lots of great food nearby.  This place is "worn" but clean and coxzey.  We wanted a bathtub and it was nice and deep.  Lots of hot water & great washer and dryer!

We had a great stay at Olga´s place, super location in Greenwich Village, very nice and cozy apartment and very good and responsive communication with Olga and Nir, no problem at all during the week - definitely recommendable!
Great host, great location.  I would stay in this Airbnb again.

Amazing location, so many restaurants and bars and yet the room is very quiet because it is in the back of the building. Easy access to subways. Room is typical of older buildings, but very well appointed with everything we needed. Definitely on our list for next trip.

Great host. Extremely fast communication. Place is in a great location in the middle of the village. Very convenient. Close to transportation. Stayed for a week. This is an older apartment but very clean and with great host.

El apartamento es tal cual aparece en las fotos. Tiene todo lo necesario para una cómoda estadía. Buena calefacción que resultó muy acogedora en uno de los inviernos más fríos que ha tenido la ciudad en los últimos cien años.El anfitrión fue muy amable en todo momento. Nos esperó a nuestra llegada pese a que nuestro vuelo llegó a Nueva York en la madrugada. El vecindario ofrece un cómodo acceso a todos los servicios. Una experiencia recomendable.

What a great place to stay in NY! Their place is right in the middle of all the action, close to several different subway lines, and right next door to so many delicious restaurants. Their place was clean, spacious, and a perfect place to walk home to after a long day of touring the city. Thank you!
Thank you so much Olga! We had a great time. Perfect spot in the best location!
Очень классный вариант. Останавливался здесь на неделю. Потрясающее месторасположение. Рядом есть всё: рестораны, супермаркет, метро. Квартира уютная. Отличный wifi, что редкость для Америки

Ground floor, Great Security- Very Clean, Very Quiet & warm -
A perfect location close to everything and great communication from the hosts when needed 
Doesn’t Get better
Right in the center of the best neighborhood. We loved it!

We (couple from the Netherlands) had the best time in Olga’s lovely village apartment. The apartment is neat and exactly matches the pictures and description. The location in greenwich village is among the best you’ll find in NYC, according to locals we met during our stay. Price seemed reasonable for NY standards. Although we arrived with a one-day delay our hosts proved extremely flexible and our midnight checkin was easily accomodated. Also appreciated that they touched base regularly to check whether we needed anything (which was never the case as we already had everything we needed, but still). Big thank you!
Great location - close to so many great breakfast and dinner options, shops, and the Washington Square Park. Loved it! Would definitely stay here again.
Great space and location. Excellent host

Super séjour ! Appartement typiquement new-yorkais dans un quartier très vivant et au milieu de tout. Beaucoup de choses à faire à pied et sinon métro très proche. Notre hôte était formidable , prévoyant et disponible si besoin. À bientôt
cheers olga

Olga and her boyfriend are very friendly and approachable. The communication between myself and them was outstanding, they are extremely prompt in replying. For an older style apartment the cleanliness couldn’t be faulted. Location second to none! Moving around NYC from this location is very easy with access to multiple subway locations and easy walk locally to many well known restaurants. Olga’s boyfriend gave us invaluable local tips regarding eateries and grocery shopping and getting around. All in all a fantastic stay and would highly recommend this apartment. 
Martin & Meg

We really enjoyed Olga's place. Its location is one of the greatest benefits. The apartment was precisely as it is described in the listing. We were welcomed by her husband who was very helpful, informative, relaxed and prompt to reply. A very nice guy. We would seek to coming back to this place for our next visit to NYC.

Hands down best location in NYC. Close to West Village  for beautiful strolls & picturesque streets , night life in SoHo and Greenwich, beautiful Washington Square Park, amazing cafes, bars & restaurants every direction, shopping in SoHo! 

On top of this, Olga & Nir are lovely hosts and spent time explaining everything in the apartment and even sent us a list of their favorite places to visit in the area. 

The apartment itself is a decent size for NYC standards but lacks natural light. But honestly who cares about this because you just need a nice clean space to live and the rest of the time was spent in the city! 

Thank you Olga & Nir for your hospitality :)

Great little aparment for hubby, myself and 2 boys. Plenty of cafes, bars and restaurants within 1 min walk. Subway only a 5 min walk which was very handy.
Olga was so pleasant and very thoughtful in meeting us at the apartment and happy to help in anyway.
Highly recommend to stay!

After staying in NYC more than a dozen times, this couple are two of the nicest people you will ever meet in the big apple. The apartment is exactly as listed. The location can’t be beaten. Super clean. Fantastic water pressure and kid friendly.
A warm welcome and wonderful stay!  This is such a charming space in an excellent location, with close proximity to fun and unique neighborhood spots. Definitely recommend!

Perfect location. Beautiful apartment. Pictures very accurately represent the place. 

Extremely happy with stay and would recommend highly!
Great location - quiet area for NY and quiet building - great value.
Great location!

name: The Bali House Oceanviews w/Hot tub @ Kehena Beach
summary: Aloha and E komo Mai! Unwind at this Authentic Bali House located less than 150 ft. from Kehena Beach! This Beautiful Bali Home has unobstructed Oceanfront Views of Kehena Bay! Built in Bali and re assembled here in Hawaii,  it is over (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sq ft of indoor w/ over 550 sq of outdoor living space. Gated and beautifully landscaped Estate.  On the Puna Coastline and only min. away to Pahoa, Pohoiki, Kalapana, Kaimu beach,  & Uncle Roberts Awa bar.   Become part of Ohana today. TAT (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: Aloha! Take an Incredible Break from Reality and Enjoy Blissful Ocean Breezes and Relaxation Beyond Compare! Break away from the Hustle and Bustle of your routine and lose yourself in the serenity of Big Island and all it has to offer! Unwind at this very Romantic and Authentic Bali House located less than 150 ft. from the World famous “Kehena Black Sand Beach”! This Beautiful Bali Home has unobstructed Oceanfront Views of Kehena Bay, home to Spinner dolphins and Humpback whales (during the winter months). Built in Bali and re-assembled here in Hawaii, the Bali House is over (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sq. ft  and over 550 sq ft of  out door living space  on a fully fenced, gated and beautifully landscaped Estate.   The indoor space  features an open concept living space with 3 separate Bali roof pods that inter-connect giving you amazing ocean views from almost every room, beautiful gardens, covered gazebo, private 4 person Furo style Hot tub, private covered parking, thatched roo

Built in Bali and re assembled here in Hawaii,  it is over (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sq ft of indoor w/ over 550 sq of outdoor living space. Gated and beautifully landscaped Estate.  On the Puna Coastline and only min. away to Pahoa, Pohoiki, Kalapana, Kaimu beach,  & Uncle Roberts Awa bar.   Become part of Ohana today. TAT (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Aloha! Take an Incredible Break from Reality and Enjoy Blissful Ocean Breezes and Relaxation Beyond Compare! Break away from the Hustle and Bustle of your routine and lose yourself in the serenity of Big Island and all it has to offer! Unwind at this very Romantic and Authentic Bali House located less than 150 ft. from the World famous “Kehena Black Sand Beach”! This Beautiful Bali Home has unobstructed Oceanfront Views of Kehena Bay, home to Spinner dolp
neighborhood_overview: Kehena Beach Estates is a small coastal community that is the closest one to Kehena Black sand beach. There is a drum circle on Sundays and on Wednesdays there is a nighttime farmers' market with live music nearby.
notes: The  Bali House and Cottage share the same location, but are totally separated from each other, about 50 ft away. They have their own Private Hot Tub's ( non sharing) , own gardens, and gated from each other. They only share the carport.  Farmers market in Pahoa,  Kehena beach just across the street 150 ft away down the cliff. Pahoa is about 20 min away for groceries, restaurants, shopping. post office, urgent care, surf shops and more. Hilo is about 40 min away.  Kalapana is 2 miles away  with a mini mart, Uncles Kava bar and Wed. night Live Music and Farmer's Market and Kaimu beach. We are on the Red Road or coastal road of 137, where you can find, Cliff fishing, Pohoiki Black Sand Beach Park , Mckenzie State Park,  Lava Tree State park and beautiful scenic coastal drive.
transit: A car is must. We are about 45 min from the Hilo or ITO airport, and about 2-3 hours from the Kona or KOA airport. Your parking is on property, gated and covered, shared with either the Bali house. ( That is the only thing you share) Check out our website for written directions.
access: Covered and gated Carport, Gated property, Covered Gazebo over Hot tub, tropical gardens, Oceanfront Views, decks and covered lanais. TV's, DVD Player,  and Free Media streaming with Roku Box, Free Netflix and more. Free long distance to US and free WIFI.
interaction: Greeted upon arrival, only a phone call away, owner lives a block away.
house_rules: No smoking indoors,  please see our website under Rates and Terms, Stairs, in a neighborhood.

host.host_about:
As a Native from Hawaii, we love and call the Big Island  our Home. We  love hosting Guest from all over the World and love sharing our little piece of Paradise to all and treat  all our Guest like our own Ohana. Come and stay with us ... The Bali House and also our Bali Cottage  .  They are both located in Kehena Beach Estates a beautiful coastal community on the Puna Coast. Experience first hand our Aloha Spirit and Hawaiian Hospitality!

TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: The Bali House is a wonderful serene and private place to stay. Iliani has worked hard to make it a complete get away experience. It feels like your own resort. My favorite part was watching the ocean from almost every room in the house and hearing the waves as we fell asleep.

This is such a beautiful House! In such a beautiful area! When we arrived we were expected and enjoyed a very warn welcome including lays! Fantastic way to start the stay.
The Bali-house itself is just gorgeous, we felt more than at home. We are alredy looking forward to stay there again. Thank you for everything!!

Beautiful and well equiped house, fantastic location, so close to nature.  Hidden beach for open minded souls across the street.

Polite, hospital and friendly folks managing the property.

Overall great experience and fully recomendable!

We visited the Bali House on a trip to celebrate our anniversary.  It couldn't have been more perfect!  Tim met us upon arrival and showed us the property.  There was wine waiting for us in the fridge, which was lovely.  The house is beautifully furnished and appointed in an exotic style with a beautiful Buddhist altar being the perfect heart of the house.  There is a full kitchen, a hot tub and two separate sleeping areas.  The hot tub was lovely for a soak after a day of exploring Volcanoes National Park.  There is a washer/dryer which made it nice to be able to pack clean clothes before we headed to our next stop.

There is a beautiful black sand beach across the street, but unfortunately we didn't get to spend time there - we will have to visit again!   It's about 30 minutes to the nearest town, so if you are in search of a nightlife and party spot, this isn't the place for you.  However, if you want to feel like you are literally in the middle of the rainforest you will love Bali House!  We fell asleep listening to the surf and the frogs, and woke to the sound of rain on the roof.    Everywhere we looked there was something new to see - baby pineapples in the garden, a friendly gecko in the bathroom (we called him/her Java!) and beautiful views from the lanai!

Iliani was very helpful from the moment we first sent an inquiry about the house.  She answered every question quickly and graciously.   She and Tim are wonderful hosts and provided a wonderful retreat!  I would highly recommend Bali House to anyone who would like to experience the Big Island up close and personal.  I truly hope we are able to visit again!

Mahalo!
Julie & Dave

This house is pure magic. The decor is stunning and it had every amenity one could desire, from bathrobes and wine and chocolate, to snorkel gear and coolers for the beach, and even some amazing locally made cream for my sunburn :) Thank you Iliahi and Tim! I had a picture perfect two night stay for my birthday :)

Beautiful place right across the road from the sea. The road runs along the ocean and is a beautiful walk or drive. The house is very well furnished and set back from the road enough that you don't hear road noise in the house. Two bedrooms provide ample space for two couples. Great option for visiting the coast near Pahoa. 

IMPORTANT: Keep in mind that this area is very close to the lava activity just uphill of the town of Pahoa, and while we didn't have any problems that could change any time. There are no stores open in Pahoa, so you have to do your shopping in Hilo. 

Also there is no cellular service at the house (there is wifi and a landline phone), and (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps / Apple Maps gives incorrect directions to the address. You need to go to the south end of Hwy 130 and then double back on 137 about 3.5 miles to find the house.

What a wonderful place to be!! Everything was very clean and neat. The interior is  just great done. When ever possible we will come back. The booklet in the house gave us very good advise what to do in the area. Big thanks to the hosts who made our stay comfortable.
perfec house for vacation! Anything you need or you want is there in the house.

The hosts were very welcoming. The neighbourhood had a very relaxed vibe and hippy feel. We enjoyed having the place all to ourselves. The lanai and hot tub were big hits with us. The frog sounds drove my husband a little nuts the first night but we bought ear plugs and that solved the problem.

We absolutely loved our week long stay here. The house and location are just as in the pictures. The house is peaceful, with beautiful ocean views and the decor in the house is amazing. Best airbnb rental we ever stayed at!! The house had everything we needed, from a well equipped kitchen, extra snorkeling gear, to a much loved hot tub (kids fave), a BBQ patch and washer and dryer. The black sand beach on walking distance from the house was beautiful and we could watch the dolphins play, but the surf and undercurrent were too strong for our 6 and 9 year olds. Instead we spend a lot of time snorkeling at the tidal pools at Kapoho Beach and swimming and snorkeling in the spring fed Ahalanui Beach Park, both reachable by car. As the location of Bali house is secluded, you need to drive to Pahoa for groceries (30 min drive), but for that you get a quiet neighborhood without being run over by tourists. On the same plot as the Bali house is also a small cottage. During our stay there was a couple staying there, but there is enough privacy. If you're with a larger party, renting the Bali house and cottage would be a perfect solution. Although many people made comments about the frogs, we kinda loved the background noise when falling to sleep (and they are not your usual frogs ... More like birds)

Tim was waiting for us at the gate to the lovely & peaceful Bali house. He then gave us a tour familiarizing us with the property. There was a bottle of blush wine and glasses chilling in the fridge. The house is right across from the ocean facing easterly so we watched beautiful sunrises and a splendid full moon reflecting off the Pacific. We rested well here and spend our days exploring the beautiful island. Thank you Iliahi and Tim for making your property available in this way. We preferred this private setting to a resort and recommend it.

Our host met us when we pulled up and gave us great instructions on how to reach the home.  Everything was furnished with great care and pride of the culture.  We were comfortable and peaceful.  Tim shared with us some of his personal favorites.  We had two couples and had plenty of space and privacy.  Thank you for making our vacation memorable.  (The erupting volcano was a bonus)
Wonderful stay at the Bali house! Everything was better than described!

My husband and I had a fabulous start to our honeymoon at the Bali House. It is a unique, remote and special place to stay. If you are hoping to leave behind your day to day lives, this is the perfect spot. Be sure to visit Kapoho. We loved the tide pools and the neat community. Driving the Red Road is an amazing visual experience. Kehena Beach is really something else! You can never guess who you will find enjoying the waves and the black sand. It's the shortest of hikes/easy climbs from the Bali House to the beach. Watching the volcano erupting at night was a tough trip for these East-Coasters (we found ourselves retiring uncharacteristically early), but was a major highlight of our time on the Big Island. Tim and Iliahi were incredible hosts, ready to help at a moments notice. We would highly encourage you to consider the Bali House for a complete escape in Hawaii.
We had a great stay! Loved all the Kona geckos on the property and the beaches are gorgeous. The people in this area are so friendly and chill.

This was the pretty much the perfect way to finish up our time on the Big Island. If only there wasn't so much to see and do we would have been quite content to stay in and luxuriate in this amazing Bali House. The attention to detail was perfect and Iliahi and Tim have truly created a special little hideaway to relax and rejuvenate. With a friendly welcome from Tim and the generous sharing of local sights to visit, we felt very well cared for. The house has everything you need for a hassle-free stay, including regular visits from our gecko friend (unimaginatively named Gordon!) and the unusual serenading from the coqui frogs. Mahalo Iliahi and Tim for your generosity and aloha.

The Bali House was a great place, the house is wonderfully decorated and full of places to hang out and relax.  Tim and Iliahi were great hosts, leaving us a great welcome packet full of things to do and explore in the area.

We had a fantastic experience at Bali House. Tim greeted us upon arrival and oriented us very comprehensively to the house. Our hosts were extremely welcoming, gracious and helpful. The home is exquisitely decorated, with amazing attention to detail. It was immaculately clean, very spacious and well equipped. The kitchen, bathroom, hot tub, and hammock were really great. The location is terrific, right across the street from beautiful Kehena Beach, you can see the ocean right in front of the house. The sunrises from our lovely bedroom were absolutely gorgeous! We had complete privacy the entire time. What a blissful experience, we definitely plan to return.

What an amazing place! So unique. The house location is away from it all yet only 15 min to anything you would need. A great homebase to explore the south and east side of the island. Equipped with all the modern luxuries and a fantastic shower. Tim was a great host and met us when we arrived to show us the place and talk about the surrounding areas. I can't recommend the Bali House enough!

We loved staying in the Bali House! Such a wonderful retreat. The house is lovely, full of perfect details and super comfortable. Jim and Iliahi are wonderful hosts. Anytime we needed anything, they were super responsive. And they had lots of tips and suggestions for things to do. We went to Uncle Robert's on Wednesday night and had a fantastic time. Kehena Beach is practically across the street, and is beautiful. We saw dolphins swimming out in the water, and the beach felt private and secluded. The Bali House is a perfect home base to explore the Puna Coast and Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. We had so much fun, and hope we can come back. Wholeheartedly recommend.

The home was lovely , exactly as pictured . Clean and comfortable , just lovely... A great location ! 
Would certainly stay here again !

Great house, great hosts! Enjoyed our stay here. Super comfy bed and fully loaded with everything to cook at home if you choose. The coffee grinder was a welcome bonus! The hot tub was great after long days of hiking. We would totally stay at this location again. Mahalo!

we had an amazing time at the Bali house!!  we loved being across the street from the black sand beach and the coastline is stunning.  the location is quiet and perfect for exploring this side of the island.  the hosts are also fantastic and very available for any questions or needs!

We had a wonderful stay at the Bali House for the last half of our honeymoon! The house is GORGEOUS and the view and proximity to the beach was perfect. We fell asleep listening to the waves every night and woke up to the waves in the morning, it was perfect! They had beach towels and snorkel gear to use and the kitchen was perfect for making breakfast and would have been perfect for preparing dinner if we had had time! It is right across the street from the beautiful black sand beach-Kehena Beach. Tim greeted us upon arrival and gave us a quick tour and some great recommendations for places to eat and explore. We did not get to see Tim or Iliahi again but we still had a fantastic time! The house feels like it's in the middle of the rainforest even though the beach is across the street! The house is a bit out of the way for exploring, but it was worth it to come back to such a beautiful place! Thanks for such a great stay!

Tim and Iliahi were wonderful hosts--Tim was there to greet us upon arrival, get us situated, and then gave us all the information and space we needed to have a nice, relaxing, adventurous visit to the Big Island.

The Bali House was stunning and unique, with an incredible view just across from a beautiful local black sand beach. Looking forward to a return visit some day.

The Bali House is incredible! We loved every minute of our stay- from the hot tub, to the various spots in the house (indoor and outdoor) to enjoy meals and drinks. The design of the home is welcoming, inspiring and so peaceful! The beach right down the trail from the house is a spectacular black sand beach and everyone is extremely friendly.

The Bali house was amazing! My wife and I spent 4 nights there as part of our 10 year anniversary trip to several Hawaiian Islands. We loved the style and cultural feel of the place! Very calming and relaxing. The roaming geckos were cool and the sounds of the coqui frogs at night and the very light but short rain spurts let you know you were in a tropical rainforest environment. The architecture and decorations are very unique and fun to explore and admire. We got there at night and had trouble figuring out the gate but we contacted the hosts and they got us in within a few minutes and gave us a guided tour  They were always available and helpful! The Kehena beach across the street was beautiful. Great privacy to watch the amazing sunrise before 7am.  Not a place to swim if you are not s strong swimmer because of rough surf and strong undertow but breathtaking place to hang, get a tan, and a quick dip. We frequented Uncle Roberts Awa Bar 3 miles down the road to eat daily and had a blast there during the Wednesday evening market where hundreds of people from over the island come to eat, sell goods, listen to music, drink, and dance. The active lava flow is only 4.25 miles from Uncle Roberts, but you have to walk there on a stone trail or rent mounting bikes. Rent the bikes! The trip is totally worth it and no need to pay for a tour when you stay at the Bali house because it is so close! We also ziplined the Akaka Falls just north of Hilo with a zipndip tour. Totally worth it! We also toured Volcano NP which were both only an hour away. If you want to have adventures yet stay in a private and romantic place away from crowded tourists then choose the Bali House!

The Bali House is like a fantasy from a dream. If ever you have read stories of the Pacific or seen movies, you will feel especially transported. We didn't get to meet Iliahi, but she was lovely on the phone. We did meet her husband, Tim, who greeted us and took us on a tour of the house and property. He was truly genuine in making himself available if we needed anything during our stay and offering for us to eat any fruit we found on the property. And Iliahi and Tim kindly swapped out the greeting bottle of wine with papaya and pineapple from the grounds since we don't drink. They were incredibly fresh and sweet! So if fruit is in season during your visit, trying them is highly recommended. The house is pretty indescribable; the photos do it the justice words can't. It is a magical construction, with everything needed for a memorable stay. We were able to prepare meals in the well-appointed gourmet kitchen, and we slept great. The location is excellent for enjoying and exploring the whole Puna region, and really the rest of the island, for that matter. The part of the property and stay that we enjoyed and appreciated most was the incredible night-time stargazing and the most densely-visible Milky Way we've seen anywhere (and we've had excellent viewings in Australia, Colorado and the Adirondacks). You can actually see the full arch of the Milky Way from this location, which we had never encountered before, so we appreciate Iliahi and Tim sharing their home.

We stayed at three different locations on our trip and this was hands down my favorite.  I have already told my boyfriend this is EXACTLY where I want to stay when we come back.  The cottage is exquisite and many extras were already provided.  Our host provided a very informative manual about the area, and gave us a tour and told us about the things travelers actually want to know.  Where the cool party is, where the secret beach is, etc.  But the location is what I was most grateful for.  You are literally right across the street from the path to a beautiful beach, about 30 minutes from the mesmerizing volcano park, and while we didn't get to explore it, downtown Pahoa seemed like a good spot for a chill night out.  The beach is accessible by a rocky path, so I don't recommend for anyone who has unsteady footing.  Also, the cottage has many gold dust day geckos, which some people may not like, but I adored.  They are beautiful and our host mentioned how to win their favor so I had fun interacting with them.  Ocean sound and coqui frogs at night, ocean view from bedroom.

A beautiful place! The property and the location were made to fall in love with. A truly unbelievable experience in the Bali House, so beautiful. Ili and Tim were incredibly welcoming and helpful and are great at creating a truly unique atmosphere. Thanks you two!

The Bali House absolutely made our trip to the Big Island. We loved it here in every way; so much so, we found a way to change our plans midstream and stay another night!

Iliani and Tim were outstanding hosts. Tim met us and gave us a tour of this truly unique place. It is a beautiful and unique house with just about every amenity you could want, stationed just across the street from the ocean and a secluded black sand beach.

The house was well-appointed and functional but also truly unique with its layout and decor. It's shaped like a boat with the kitchen and dining area on one end, a sunken living room and a loft bedroom on the other end. Walking through to the back reveals a great open stone shower, private bath and a full second private bedroom that makes you feel immersed in the jungle.

Out front there is a hammock which we enjoyed for hours, as well as a jacuzzi that was perfect at the end of each day. There was also a small patio out back and washer/dryer for handy laundry. 

This location is off the beaten path for sure; but we loved going into Pahoa which is only about a 15-minute drive. Great local eats and coffee there. 

From this location we did day trips to the Kapoho tide pools, to Hilo and to the Volcanoes national park. Our location added a bit of distance but it was trivial and the reward was to post up at this truly special location each night. 

Making fresh coffee in the morning and seeing the sunrise with the occasional rain shower only added to our fond memories here. 

Tip: be prepared that Coqui frogs are pretty loud at night! They add to the rainforest ambiance but they also don't let up until dawn. You get used to it, but definitely advise earplugs. And do yourself a favor and be sure to get up for sunrise a few times. Worth it 100%.

We will be back! (there is a second guest cottage on property - very private - and we hope to bring friends and rent that out too). 

Best possible review here. Highly recommend - thanks Tim & Iliani!

The Bali House is the perfect place to relax and enjoy the natural beauty of the Island.  The home is spectacular!  If you want a truly unique and memorable stay, look no further, this is the place.  The hosts went above and beyond to make sure our stay was amazing.  They and their home are filled with Aloha!  We will be back!
The Bali house is very cool. The floor plan and space are fantastic complete with beautiful ocean view. Secluded, great location!
Beautiful spot!

This is a truly magical space to spend any time. The airy, unique home is immensely comfortable. Tim graciously checked us in, and gave great recommendations. The bathroom was luxurious, the bed so comfortable, and the hot tub a real treat. Every aspect of this space is dreamy. So proximate to the local beach where a drum circle rages with delightful freedom on Sunday. I couldn't give a more glowing review!

The Bali house is absolutely beautiful! It's just as the pictures show. Quite a relaxing place and a very well done house - comfortable, well laid out & exquisitely decorated! The master bedroom faces the ocean and it's just lovely waking up to the ocean sounds. The frog sounds are pretty loud at night but a wonderful way to fall asleep. There are a lot of geckos crawling around everywhere - they're harmless but if you're bothered by any of that just keep in mind they're everywhere on the walls in the house. The location was perfect for us - we didn't realize until we got there that the lava flows from Kilauea are just a few miles down the street. It was an easy drive and we had a great time biking and seeing the lava flows up close and personal on our very first night in. There are also tide pools 10miles from the location that are just perfect for snorkeling - absolutely beautiful! We also enjoyed walking to the beach across the street. The location is secluded but close enough to a number of excursions. The town of Pahoa is only 15 mins away and a great place to grab food - we loved having breakfast at Pele. We also drove to Hilo a few times, went to the Volcanoes national park & Mauna Kea from here and the drives were not bad at all. Great location & a beautiful getaway house!
We loved the location of the Bali house. It was right next to the black sand beach.  We had a great time!!

The Bali house was great! My wife and I spent 5 nights here for our honeymoon. It is very private and very quiet. We loved having the beach across the street. We also loved coming back to the house after a day of adventures! Highly recommend the Bali House or cottage if you are looking for a quiet retreat after a full day of sight seeing!

Such a beautiful house! We stayed here for our honeymoon and 4 nights was just simply not enough!
Can't say enough about how beautiful the house is... just simply enjoy that if you get the pleasure to stay here!
The black sand Kehena beach is literally across the road (but you have to negotiate a semi-difficult climb down some rocks to get there, it's easier to get back up) and it's a clothing optional beach (not creepy - but good to know!).
Lava flows are really close - but - get ready for a long hot walk to get there and back!! 
Kitchen is well stocked to make your own meals. So many places to just back and relax when you're there. 
Thank you so much for an amazing stay!!
Bali House is absolutely amazing! We had the best time enjoying a cold Kona brew on the terrace overlooking the ocean after a long day of exploring. We'll definitly be back!

A nice place to stay to enjoy the relaxed atmosphere of Pahoa. Enjoyed the home's architecture and thoughtful amenities (having a rice cooker to use was a nice touch). Snorkeling in the nearby tide pools was our favorite part of the trip. Also the star-gazing from the patio was the best I've seen.

The Bali House was the highlight of our trip to the Big Island. Nestled near the lava flows and along the Kalapani-Kapoho road with a full view of the ocean, living in the house was pure escapism. The house is lovely in both design and function. It is very easy to relax here. Despite the remoteness of the area there are lots of nearby activities: visiting the volcano, plunging into the Kapoho tidepools (highly recommended as it seems a lot of people are not aware of its existance), tree tunnels along the Kalapani-Kapoho coastal road, gorgeous scenery and much more. Tim and IIiahi are terrific hosts and highly recommend anyone to visit and stay for several days at minimum, as the place really grows on you.

Balistyl ; sehr schön eingerichtet; grosse Dusche! Blick aufs Meer, ruhig ausser den Cuquis Fröschen; die Abends erwachen und laute Töne von sich geben, 20 min bis nach Paia; Einkaufsmöglichkeiten; Restaurants und Bars. Nähe Vulkan Kilauea

A few days at the Bali House was the perfect ending to our honeymoon. It was so relaxing to sit outside and enjoy the view and sounds of the ocean. We stopped on our way to get some groceries at Tim's suggestion, and enjoyed making breakfast each morning in the well-equipped kitchen. The location is great to stick closeby at Kehana Beach or meet up for the Kalapana lava tours at the end of the road. We also did a day trip to Volcanoes National Park, which was an easy drive. I would highly recommend the Bali House to anyone who is looking for a relaxing, comfortable spot in a laid-back part of the island. Tim was very helpful during check in and available for any questions. We hope to make it back for another visit some day!
The Blai house was amazing! It really is your own tropical get away.  The hosts were great, and the amenities were even better. Would definitely return!

We stayed 2 weeks at this property. The first week in the cottage, please see our review, and the 2nd in the main house, here is that review... Thank you again Iliahi and Tim for hosting us in your spectacular home. This was a special and long anticipated visit. We were in no way disappointed. This property is so beautiful and welcoming, with great thought put into guest comfort.  From the high quality linens to the well stocked kitchen (we cooked most of our meals), everything we needed was available.  The location is special, you can hear the waves crashing day and night, watch the sun rise from the lanai, pick limes and mangoes from the garden, enjoy the geckos dashing about, walk down to the black sand beach just a few yards away. Really just a tropical paradise, without the crowds and tourists.  Remember your earplugs for the coqui frogs at night and you will have a magical stay at Bali House

Beautiful home with lots of amenities! Loved the beach across the street and access to coconuts in the garden. Thought the frogs were very loud at night, but not the hosts' fault! Would love to stay at this home again

This is a bit out of the way and wonderful for that if it’s what you’re going for. The beach right across the street, the sounds of the jungle at night with waves crashing in the background - simply amazing. The house itself is crazy wonderful. 

The host’s recommendations are very good! Wish we had had one more day to just relax at the beautiful house!
The Bali House is an incredible home that has views of the ocean. Perfect for couples and families looking to get away.
房子的设计很有特色,设备一应俱全｡房子离沙滩和看岩浆都很近,值得推荐｡

Bali House is a dream! Hospitality is superb and the space is truly special with amazing views, a wonderful kitchen, and a hot tub! Tim and Illiahi take care of every need. I cannot recommend this BnB more highly. We cannot wait to be back!!!
An amazon place to experience the beauty of the big island from. I loved hearing the rain and ocean waves at night. Couldn’t have pictured a better place to stay. Great hospitality too
We loved our stay here and are already planning a trip back ! Highly recommend.
Great location. Very lovely they were very nice host. My only complaint is the other small rental. You can hear everything and it is literally a few steps away. But still a great place to stay.

The Bali House is a one of a kind, transcendental experience that enables its inhabitants to both time travel and travel the world all at once. Calling it a house does not do it justice; rather, it is a vessel designed for self exploration and rekindling of our universal connection with nature. Virtually every nook and cranny of this property is worth photographing. My wife and I were lucky enough to book this stay while it was available, and it ultimately created an experience we will likely never forget. Tucked away on the southeastern side of the Big Island, this gorgeous estate offers an off the beaten path opportunity to embrace the true concept of Hawaii while soaking in the splendor of feeling alive. From fresh pineapples, limes, coconuts, papaya, etc. (depending on the season), to a well rewarded hike down to Kehena Black Sand Beach, as well as out of this world views of the nocturnal red glow of the magma that the Goddess, Pele, has extracted from deep within Earth to grow her lush paradise, the Bali House will certainly not disappoint. Tim and Illiah are exceptional hosts. They truly have dedicated their lives to create an experience that everyone should share. Additionally, if you're lucky enough to run into the keeper of the grounds, absolutely take time to chat and pick his brain. He was a delight to converse with, and his botanical tour was definitely a highlight of our stay. We will likely book here again in the near future.
Looks just like the pictures! Beautiful house and great location.

My wife and I had an exceptional stay at the Bali House! The house is exquisite, unique, and quite large with gorgeous views. It's even more beautiful in person and very peaceful. We only met Tim who gave us a tour of the house and recommendations. 

- The bed, sofas and chairs were very comfortable
- The screened-in balcony was amazing
- Awesome hot tub
- Lots of amenities (safe, sunscreen, scuba gear, beach chairs, board games, etc.)
- Full kitchen (everything you could need including a dishwasher)
- Samsung washer and dryer
- The Roku was a great added touch
- Professional WiFi system (multiple APs with cloud-based management)

A few things to note:

The gate is a bit of nuisance; unless you're driving a small car, you'll have to pull over to the side somewhere down the road and get out to close or open the gate.
Ideally, a sliding gate would be installed but even a better place to pull in front of the gate would have been appreciated.

The Kehena Black Sand Beach requires going down a rather steep hill with rocks. We went in flip flops and hands full the first time not knowing about it. So be aware of this and wear shoes.

Highly recommend the Bali House for anybody looking for some solitude on the South East side of the Big Island.

If you are seeking a quiet, picturesque and unique accommodation this is the place for you! Far way from the concrete jungle and maddening throngs of tourists this home is stunning both in its architecture, decor and setting.
Perfect location next to idyllic beaches - very unique house with a lot of style. Loved staying there and love the offbeat area it’s in!
The Bali house is beautiful and a rare experience.
Bali House is a beautiful and unique home in a great location.

name: Cozy 1BR  Near Theater Distict!
summary: My cozy 1BR apt. is located in the center of Hell’s Kitchen, a thriving neighborhood filled with bars, restaurants & nightlife! The lively avenue is famous for Restaurant Row and is within minutes of the Theater District & Times Square!
space: My cozy apartment with stylish décor is located in the center of Hell’s Kitchen on the 4th floor of a charming walk up on 9th avenue between 49th and 50th streets. Enjoy being close to all major tourist attractions but without the tourist crowd!   •Available bedroom has a queen bed that can sleep 2 comfortably.  -Second bedroom pictured will be locked. •No Sleeping on couch please-people caught sleeping on couch will be charged an extra fee.  -I have a full usable kitchen  -a spacious (by NYC standards) family room
description: My cozy 1BR apt. is located in the center of Hell’s Kitchen, a thriving neighborhood filled with bars, restaurants & nightlife! The lively avenue is famous for Restaurant Row and is within minutes of the Theater District & Times Square! My cozy apartment with stylish décor is located in the center of Hell’s Kitchen on the 4th floor of a charming walk up on 9th avenue between 49th and 50th streets. Enjoy being close to all major tourist attractions but without the tourist crowd!   •Available bedroom has a queen bed that can sleep 2 comfortably.  -Second bedroom pictured will be locked. •No Sleeping on couch please-people caught sleeping on couch will be charged an extra fee.  -I have a full usable kitchen  -a spacious (by NYC standards) family room •Clean fresh sheets  •Clean fresh towels •Shampoo, Conditioner and body soap.   •Please bring your own toothbrush, toothpaste and facewash. •No coffee maker but Dunking Donuts on 9th Avenue between 47th and 48th streets and Amish market right
neighborhood_overview: •Within steps of the Theater District  •7-minute walk to Lincoln Center  •10-minute walk to Times Square •13-minute walk to Central Park & Columbus Circle •14-minute walk to Rockefeller Center •24 hour Duane Reade down stairs for odds and ends •Amish Market downstairs open until 11 PM for snacks
notes: Do not be discouraged by the building itself when you get inside.  It's an old building but I assure you my apartment is very nice :) Please, please, please make sure to turn off heater, A/C, lights and lock door. No shoes in apartment. Treat house like your own.  I have neighbors who know me well-they are good people and very harmless despite their occasional late nights.
transit: •Close to Penn Station, Port Authority, ACE, 123 and NQR Trains
access: •Clean fresh sheets  •Clean fresh towels •Shampoo, Conditioner and body soap.   •Please bring your own toothbrush, toothpaste and facewash. •No coffee maker but Dunking Donuts on 9th Avenue between 47th and 48th streets and Amish market right down stairs has coffee.  •Refrigerator (please do not touch the food items in fridge or in cupboards). •Microwave •Oven/Stove •Toaster Oven •Heater/Air Conditioner (not central) works well but a bit fussy - please refer to manual •Pots, pans and dishes available for use - PLEASE CLEAN UP AFTER YOURSELF!! ***ABSOLUTELY UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL SMOKING BE TOLERATED.  A fee will be applied if smoking is suspected. -No Pets please •ABOSLUTELY NO Sleeping on Couch •Please remove your shoes before entering apartment •Lock Door behind you when coming and going •No ordering movies  •Do not touch the DVR List
interaction: Occasional text or phone call check-in but will be available 24/7 for any needs. I'd like you to be as comfortable as possible in my home!
house_rules: Please take care of m home as you would your own (unless you don't take good care of your own place and at that point, please treat my home with respect). Please, please, please make sure to turn off heater, A/C, lights and lock door, no shoes in apartment.  -No Pets, No shoes in Apartment, NO SMOKING

host.host_about: Hi There!  I’m Sara, a 30-year-old female living in NYC.  I originate from Detroit, Michigan and have lived in New York for 8 years. I used to work in the Ad Technology space but recognized my true passion was elsewhere.  Now I’m working on my home organizing business and taking time to travel.  I’m a passionate home décor enthusiast and take super great care of my guests! I put myself in your shoes to ensure you're as comfortable as humanly possible in my home! Please reach out with any questions!

reviews.comments:
A perfect, comfortable, clean apartment right in the middle of Hells Kitchen neighbourhood! There is pretty much everything you would need: small but nice bathroom, well-equiped kitchen (really) and a small bedroom yet with huge bed. There is also nice grocery store nearby. 

Sara was a great host, meeting me in the apartment and explaining everything. She was also flexible about check-in/check-out time. 5 stars!

 I really enjoyed staying there for a week!

Sara was a wonderful host and was great at communicating throughout the entire process. Her home is lovely and in such a great neighborhood. You will definitely get a true NYC experience staying here. Her apartment was also very clean and cozy!

i had a really nice stay at sara's place. sara was incredibly helpful and accommodating. the apartment was cozy and pleasant. the neighborhood is fun. the location was very convenient and accessible to everything.
Really cute apartment. Sara was responsive and accommodating. Flat is exactly as pictured. Would definitely rent again. Thanks Sara!
The place had excellent location. Little bit small and a tiny walkway to climb up but it was cosy and homely in a way. Sara was friendly and accomodating with our requests for our luggage. Thank you!
It was really nice to stay at Sara's place. She was really welcoming and thé place is clean and cozy. Great neighborhood and localisation in NY. Thanks !
Sara! We cannot thank you enough for your hospitality and helpful recommendations! The place was perfect and we have had a wonderful time! You rock!

Sara was a great host & there when you need her . Her places is very comfortable and homey i hardly ever left to be honest . There are quite a bit of stairs and the halls are very narrow so if you have a lot of luggage or wide luggage you may struggle a bit . Right out / downstairs is everything you could need and want , and Sara's place is very quiet you don't hear all the outside noise .
Would for sure recommend this place and stay here again . Thank you Sara !
Sara's apartment was lovely and the location was amazing. She was very kind and always there when we needed her. I would definitely recommend staying here!

I loved Sara's apartment! It was so cozy, felt like my own home. There were times when I almost didn't want to leave because it was so comfy. 

It was also conveniently located. So many restaurants nearby, a grocery next door, the subway a block away and PABT just a few blocks away. I'm so happy I found her place.

She is an amazing host and made sure I was well provided for. She explained everything about her apartment and was always just a text away. 

The only downside to her apartment was that it's on the 4th floor of a walk-up. I already knew that though so I was prepared to make the trek with my heavy luggage. :) 

A really great experience! I'd love to stay with her again next time I'm in NY!

Nossa experiência foi muito boa! Sara sempre foi bastante atenciosa e prestativa. O apto é fiel às fotos publicadas no site. Pontos negativos: não tem elevador, o chuveiro tem uma ducha fraca e o ar condicionado é um pouco ruidoso. A localização é excelente, o apto é muito limpo e organizado, a cozinha é completa e a internet é rápida! A cama é ótima e as roupas de cama e banho perfeitas! Tem supermercado e farmácia no térreo, o que facilitou muito nossa vida. Por ser um apto de fundos, é bem silencioso. Recomendamos muito e voltaríamos com certeza!

Very nice apartment, clean and comfortable. Also good location, near the subway and neighborhood has a lot of bars and restaurants.
Really quiet, you can't hear noise from the street and it is on the 9th Av.

name: CWB Harbourview Apartment
summary: Hello,thanks for your interest in my apartment. It's located very close to Hong Kong's most popular shopping center Causeway Bay. It's just 8 minutes walk from Tin Hu metro station, 3 mins walk to a bus station for airport and other popular destinations like Wanchai, Central, Mongkok etc. If you have plans to go to mainland cities like Guangzhou, you can get a express bus downstairs.
space: The apartment is in a building with 24-hour safeguard. There is also a private pool for residents in the building on the six floor between June and September every. Very few apartments in Hong Kong will have almost a wall of glass window, through which you can have the harbour view. Lots of books in the living room.
description: Hello,thanks for your interest in my apartment. It's located very close to Hong Kong's most popular shopping center Causeway Bay. It's just 8 minutes walk from Tin Hu metro station, 3 mins walk to a bus station for airport and other popular destinations like Wanchai, Central, Mongkok etc. If you have plans to go to mainland cities like Guangzhou, you can get a express bus downstairs. The apartment is in a building with 24-hour safeguard. There is also a private pool for residents in the building on the six floor between June and September every. Very few apartments in Hong Kong will have almost a wall of glass window, through which you can have the harbour view. Lots of books in the living room. It's a very hispter area in Hong Kong. You can easily find good restaurants on Wun Sha Street (where my house is located), along with a few lanes connecting to the street. There are a few good/famous ones that provide nice Vietnamese noodles, Hong Kong-style milk tea, Korean BBQ, spicy hotpot,
neighborhood_overview: It's a very hispter area in Hong Kong. You can easily find good restaurants on Wun Sha Street (where my house is located), along with a few lanes connecting to the street. There are a few good/famous ones that provide nice Vietnamese noodles, Hong Kong-style milk tea, Korean BBQ, spicy hotpot, Italian pasta, ice cream etc. There is a newly-opened bar which has very nice beer.
transit: 天后地铁站走过来十分钟以内｡从家里步行五分钟有中旅香港的上车点,买票可以直达广州等珠三角各个城市;步行三分钟就是A11车站,上车后大概45分钟到达香港国际机场｡步行三分钟抵达的巴士站很多车去到中环,湾仔,九龙｡的士很多很多,去哪里都非常方便｡
access: 租出的是其中一件卧室,但是有时候不在家的时候就是整幢楼｡

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Good location,  a lot of delicious restaurant nearby. Jeanny is very nice. I wish I could stay again here.
居住環境非常好,靠近地鐵公交,交通方便｡不遠處就有許多有名的店面,能吃到很多正宗的港式餐點,滿足｡期待下次再來!
距离机场1.5H的大巴车- 距离天后站10分钟步行 -离铜锣湾的SOGO比较近
Jeanny很nice,公寓很干净,交通非常方便,步行十分钟内可达地铁站或铜锣湾商圈,下次一个人来还住这!

Jeany人很好,准备也很周到~
楼下就有很多其貌不扬的好餐厅,大家好好挖掘
Jeanny is very nice and thoughtful. Flat is sweet and convenient for shopping and transportation.
房东人很好,很容易沟通,地理位置也不错,卧室有点点小,一个人睡还可以,楼下餐厅很多~
房东非常热情体贴,人非常善良,容易相处｡还为我提供了很多关于香港的指引和帮助,并且成为了很好的朋友｡房东早睡早起,作息非常规律｡家里非常整洁和舒适｡这次旅行住在这里非常惬意,是性价比非常高的住处,下次还会再来!
房东友善,位置优越,靠近维多利亚公园､中央图书馆､SOGO｡闹中取静,楼下百佳､地道肉骨茶,附近日本菜等美食多多｡愉悦的住宿体验｡
房东Jeanny人很nice,很好相处,房子地理位置靠近天后地铁站,步行10分钟之内,步行至铜锣湾商业圈15分钟以内,交通很方便的｡小区环境也很好,总之很满意,下次来香港一定还来住
地理位置很好,楼下有很多东西吃,房东很友好!
第二次入住,以后还会选择Jeanny家｡

Jeanny was very nice at the beginning, there was a smell with the pillow case and no toilet paper, but she took care of it immediately. 

However, the day I left, she texted me and said I took her adapter away, I didn’t get to reply in time and she said she will call the police for that. It was so unnecessary and turns out she just miss placed her items elsewhere. Without apologize or anything.
Highly recommend to stay with Jeanny!
很好哦 下次还会住
She is a kind and Lovely. If we need anything, She will help us. There r many books in her house, and everything is perfect there.  Small apartment w sweet host. Thank u very much Jeanny.
房间有点小,但是干净｡房东人也很好,回复及时｡

Jeanny was an incredible host. She was very accommodating and quick to respond to any questions we had. Honestly one of the friendliest and most considerate hosts I've ever met.

The neighbourhood outside the apartment is very safe as compared to some of the other airbnbs I've stayed at in Hong Kong. Definitely would recommend anyone to stay.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This location could not be better! Tai Hang is full of restaurants and cafes, and with so many low rise buildings and pedestrian streets, it is the ideal place to spend time in Hong Kong. Easy access to bus and taxis, and just 10 minutes walking from Tin Hau (Japanese food everywhere there!) or Causeway Bay (EVERYTHING there!), but yet super quiet and cute!  Jeanny is a very nice hostess, and was extremely responsive to all questions, even though she was away on holidays herself. 
There were a few issues- no towels, aircon, or WiFi, but Jeanny had helpful suggestions to rectify. My elderly parents were staying here, so it could have been a bit cleaner in the bathroom and kitchen, but other than that, the place was nice.
A great place to stay, very clean, convenient, and quiet. The landlord is very helpful
Clean, convenient, great location, everything you look for a short stay. Tons of restaurants around the corner.
住房位置很好找,小区物业管理很好､非常安全,周围交通便利,房间很干净,浴室也很干净,非常好的入住体验!

name: Standard Double Bed Room
summary: Seprate Toilet and shower in bathroom and hair dryer Housekeeping service once a week  Fax, printing available / Laundry services available ( 40 hkd around 2kg ) / Safe box / Kettle /Electric Stove/microwave / free wif
description: Seprate Toilet and shower in bathroom and hair dryer Housekeeping service once a week  Fax, printing available / Laundry services available ( 40 hkd around 2kg ) / Safe box / Kettle /Electric Stove/microwave / free wif

reviews.comments:
Great location, right in the middle of tsim sha tsui and 2 mtr stations on 2 different lines. Makes getting around really easy. Would have liked housekeeping to have been more often than once in 7 days, but I made do. Room was small, but almost all hk apartments are at this price. It was a little dusty, like it was newly renovated, but it wasn't too much of an issue.

The toilet was problematic during my 1 month stay. It was stuck/leaking from the pipe and was really gross. My neighbour had the same issue as the pipes seem to be linked. The host was very helpful in this regard, letting us use the toilet in a vacant adjacent room until ours was fixed. The toilet was fixed the next day both times it happened. They did their best to solve the problem, which is all I could really ask for.

The room is conveniently sandwiched between two mtr stations, in a convenient area with a super market, places to eat and a few nice bars. TST is wonderful, there is so much going on there. The host was friendly and helpful. The toilet broke a little bit twice and both times it was fixed again within an hour as soon as we mentioned it too them. The room is normal sized for Hong Kong (there is definitely enough room for two people), very clean and nicely decorated. We had an excellent time and we will definitely be coming back.

Would I stay in this same room again. Yes I would, the location is great and the room was clean. The building isn't the greatest, but hard to beat for the price.  I would only advise checking with the host about amenities and understand thst this is NOT an appartment, but a hotel room.

Great location, TST is a good place to stay in Hong Kong.
The room is clean enough, fresh towels every day and we checked in past midnight no problem.
Only thing is that the rooms are even smaller than I expected - and I am aware of Hong Kong's lack of space. I have seen other places at a similar price range with larger rooms in the same great location.
Still, decent experience and would recommend.

I had a cockroach on crawling on my bed. Maybe it’s just a hit and missed thing but it was enough to give anyone a sleepless night. 
The walls are dirty. 
Communication with host was good when giving direction to property. Host was friendly and called me to walk me to property.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

host.host_about: I do need to say that you are lookıng into Galata which is one of the best oldest neighborhoods of Istanbul, and important cultural center for local people and foreigners that located at the North of the Golden Horn, towards Taksim Squere that includes Pera and Beyoglu. I want to let you know about myself, my job and my home studio. Firstly,  I was born in Bursa, Turkey in 1979. I have been living in Istanbul for 15 years. I have got my Bachelor Degree in Istanbul, Bilgi University, department of  Photography and Video (P.O.V.). As you see I am really interested in art and I love creating. I do my job freelance, because I belive that I need to feel free to create more and express better. I have had my own studio before I have decided to have my own home-studio. Now, I do not only love working and living here becouse of the location, but also because of the atmosphere of my place. I mean there are beautiful old houses , buildings, cafes, museums, galleries, historical places, all kinds of restaurants and all kinds of transportations options. Further more, it really helps me to  let go of anxiety, stress and feel more confortable, that is peacefull and relaxing. For instance I am able to listen loudly music whenever I would like, or I do not hear any other’s in here.  Lastly, at these days, I am planning to be a part of one art collective or collaborate with some young artists . If you like, you  can bring you ideas, creativity and art into my collaboration.

reviews.comments: Ersan's apartment was wonderful and he was a great host. He met me in the morning to walk me to the apartment and was always available in case of questions. His apartment is located in such a convenient location and easy to get around from. The apartment is also a huge space and a really great layout. I'd definitely recommend it.
Neighborhood was quiet and nice. Very well located, very big loft.

This was my very first experience with Airbnb and it was really a pleasure to stay in Ersan's lift for three days.
It is verr good located where you could avoid the tourists' noise from the sultanahmet district during the night and it's also way too comvenient to get to that district cause it's just five minutes walk from the Galata bridge in the new europe part side.
The loft is well designed, simple but cool, and there's some smart design which you really have to experience it yourself. I'll tell you that the picture is exactly what the loft really is so you could trust the picture if you are into Ersan's loft.
Ersan is a friendly and trusted host even we just met one time at our arrival. He waited us there till midnight and still warm to welcome us. He even checked if everything's alright by SMS during our visit which is lovly and appreciated.
Ben..I'd absolutely recommend Ersan's loft for everyone cause you all deserve a great stay in Istanbul.

Big apartment in great location. We booked last minute and ersan was on vacation. As I'm traveling from abroad I did not have cell service and it was a bit of a challenge to get the key handed over. Luckily I was at a coffee shop just a block away when he responded so I was able to run over to meet the housekeeper. 

A couple of downsides were that there was no toilet paper and the shower is open so unless you are very careful or crouching down you will splash half of the bathroom. There was also no wifi info easily visible anywhere but we were able to communicate with the wifi at the coffee shop. 

Besides that Ersan was kind and sent messages to check in and was flexible about key drop off as we were in a rush to leave in the morning and couldn't wait for the housekeeper.

We had quite nice and long stay at Ersan's loft (did not meet him personally). The place is huge comparing of what you can get as an entire apartment. It is a former photo studio in the basement with all its attributes, a living space and big window with a view to the 'forest' yard. 
I would agree with the all the previous comments. It needs some improvements, but the location (Galata tower and Istikal street are just few mins walk) and spaciousness of the loft are big advantages comparing to other places.

We had a lovely stay at this huge and stylish place. Ersan was quick in replying and helping. Unfortunately, we didn't meet but that was our own fault due to our delayed arrival and busy schedule.
Fantastic location, close to a lot of nice places but still with the feeling of being in a local neighborhood. 
As mentioned by others, some things (eg. shower, broken sofa bed) could have been better but we enjoyed in anyway.
The host canceled this reservation 50 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The place was beautiful, just like the pictures, and I had no complaints. The neighbors were also very friendly and helpful. Ersan had a very hands-off approach, which I greatly prefer, so it was a perfect fit for me and my friends.
The host canceled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

space: Space; 275 sq ft.   8th floor (doorman building with elevator)   Studio with Queen size bed Living room has sofa 40" TV with Apple TV, Netflix, Hulu Free Wifi access Modern washroom with separate shower. Washing machine for clothes Open kitchen with microwave and refrigerator 5 Windows on 3 sides provide amazing natural light and view of sea.

Five windows provide amazing natural sunlight and a great view of the sea!    Space; 275 sq ft.   8th floor (doorman building with elevator)   Studio with Queen size bed Living room has sofa 40" TV with Apple TV, Netflix, Hulu Free Wifi access Modern washroom with separate shower. reviews.comments: When i first communicated with adam, he was responsive and friendly. Upom arrival at his apartment, it was extremely clean and he had already made the necessary arrangements or given me enough information on how to get around and where i can grab a bite in the area. Quite a few good local eateries within a 2 block walk. The congee place about 2 traffic junctions was cheap n good. There is a claypot rice n also a dim sum place nearby that i did not manage to try as they are always packed!
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Stylish 2 bdr Glebe terrace
summary: Cosy 2 bed terrace on quiet street in heart of Glebe village, approx 3km from city.  Would suit small family with baby or a couple. Walk to City, Syd Uni, Newtown, Surry Hill etc. Close to shops, bus, light rail.
space: Renovated throughout the house features open plan living/dining room, fully equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms (main: queen bed - second room:1 double bed & childs cot), 1 bathroom with shower & washer/dryer,  and outdoor courtyard. Suitable for a couple or a small family wanting a quiet base to explore Sydney's inner west.  We have a 10 month old baby, so house has baby equipment - cot, high chair and loads of toys! Although please be aware that open staircase makes it unsuitable for climbing toddlers! Street parking only.

We will leave a Welcome Pack with a  list of all our favourite bars/restaurants and
neighborhood_overview: Ahhh Glebe - so leafy and quiet, yet so close to the City!  Cafe & student culture mix with aging hippies, inner city professionals and families. Big rambling parks with water access to enjoy spectacular City skyline views.  Glebe Village on your doorstep with plenty of pubs, small bars, Saturday markets, cute cafes and cheap eats. Or pop into neighbouring Newtown, Chippendale, Redfern, or Surry Hills!
notes: 2 night minimum stay over weekends. 3 night minimum during long weekends/holiday periods.
transit: Perfect for leaving the car behind and enjoy a walking holiday. 20 min walk to Darling Harbour, 25 mins to Sydney CBD, 20 mins to the art gallery/bars of Chippendale/Newtown, or $15 taxi ride to Surry Hills. Our house is one block from Glebe Point Rd with buses to City/Balmain/Leichardt. A 10 min walk to light rail station and close to Central Station (airport train).
access: - Wifi  - Fully equipped kitchen  - Linen/Towels - Baby Cot & High Chair  - Gas BBQ
interaction: - No interaction (unless emergencies or if  you request it).  We want you to enjoy your visit! We will leave a Welcome Pack with a  list of all our favourite bars/restaurants and activities to do in the neighbourhood.
house_rules: No Smoking No Pets No Parties Note open staircase may make it unsuitable for some children/toddlers

host.host_about: Well travelled couple who proudly call Sydney home. Enjoy all the delights the our inner city location allows and want to encourage others to do the same!

reviews.comments:
Stephanie is a delightful,thoughtful and generous host. She was prompt in responding to questions and left her home in a welcoming manner. The cottage is delightful,comfortable and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay there. Glebe is just wonderful with lots of atmosphere and close to many of Sydney's highlights.
This was our first foray into Airbnb and we are hooked! It was an excellent initiation and no doubt a hard act to follow!
I thoroughly recommend Stephanie and her cottage and Glebe. I hope that I can stay there again.

Stephanie is an excellent host and her house is lovely.  It was perfectly ready for us when we arrived, Stephanie communicated well with us throughout the booking and arrival process, and her instructions for using the facilities were clear and easy to follow.

The house is in a wonderful location, close to Sydney University and Glebe Point Road.  Staying there was thoroughly enjoyable as the house was in perfect order and the kitchen was well appointed.  The view out to the back garden was an added bonus.
We had the best time & that was due to Stephanie's home & how at ease she made us feel. It was just like home away from home & Glebe is a beautiful suburb.
The house was clean, beautiful and had a lot of character. Steph is warm and professional, and we had no issues with any of the amenities or access during our short stay. Highly recommend this place!

We had a great stay at Stephanie's house.
A walking distance from cafes, groceries stores and other amenities came in very handy. The apartment is very well kept and very clean. It has a cozy flavour as well.

Highly recommended! Stephanie was a gracious host and her home was an inner city delight. Great location within walking distance to Sydney Uni and the restaurants and bars of Glebe, her home was comfortable and well appointed. A great experience!

Free WIFI, satellite TV channels and covered parking in the building! Swimming pool, Sauna, and BBQ grills. The gym and the sauna are not guarantee for use.

Your own washer and dryer so you never have to go downstairs to do your laundry.  No hassle of finding a street parking since you have your own parking stall in the building! There is a queen size bed in the living room and a sofa bed which is Double extra long size to accommodate a total of 4 adults. There is a full kitchen with brand new appliances and all the cookwares you may need to prepare your favorite meal. Free WIFI and digital satellite TV for your entertainment. host.host_about: Aloha! I would love to share a piece of paradise with you.

reviews.comments: Thanks Jun for providing such a lovely place for us to stay. The unit was in a really good location, easy walk to the beach and general shopping and eating area of Waikiki, very central. The apartment has been recently refurbished which makes it very clean and beautiful. It is very liveable, and everything you need is there from the kitchen to the washing machine. We would highly recommend this place and we would definitely stay again.

Had very good experience and loved the location. The apartment is of a very good size compared to other hotels and locations around the area. It is a block from major shopping areas and 3 blocks from the beach. It is at a location that is near were all the activity happens, but at a street that is quite and calm. I would recommend this location to anyone!!

This rental came up randomly after a week of searching hard for a place for my group which consisted of 4 adults and 1 baby. Our stay was fantastic, and it was a such a good deal at this price. It was great to be one street back from the main street of Waikiki beach, as well as have free parking, a washing machine, A/C, free wifi and no resort fees. With our group we were comfortable in the space we had there, and we all had a great sleep. 

The apartment has been decorated well with beautiful pictures, and decorations, and the towels and linen were quite nice. Jun was great with instructions as well, and everything was easy to find. Thank you once again. Hope to come back again in the future.

Jun provided us with a very detailed set of instructions, which was very helpful and made our check-in a breeze. The place was clean, bright, and the décor added a nice touch to the beachy ambiance. Also loved that there was a guaranteed parking spot. The windows were a bit thin, but that didn't bother us too much.  

I'm so glad my friends and I booked here instead of at a hotel. Would definitely recommend this place and would love to stay here again. Thanks Jun!

셀프체크인이라 황당했고 걱정스러웠지만
다행히 호스트가 보내준 안내 파일대로
실행한결과 15박 17일동안 아주 편히
